University of Benin
Lilian Imuetinyan Salami (amuru Ọgọst 8, 1956) bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria na osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Benin, Edo State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwanyị osote onye isi oche nke mahadum nke abụọ ka Grace Alele-Williams gasịrị na 1985
Ọ bụ director-General/chief Executive nke National Institute for Educational Planning and Administration (NIEPA), Ondo State, Nigeria
Onye bụbu onye isi, ngalaba mmụta na Mahadum Benin, Salami bụ onye otu nke Nutrition Society of Nigeria and International Federation of Home Economics/Home Professional Association of Nigeria
Salami bụ prọfesọ nke ụlọ akụ na ụba / mmụta na-edozi ahụ na onye òtù ndụmọdụ na eze ukwu ya, Oba nke Benin, Omo N'Oba N'Edo, Ukukpolokpolo, Ogidigan, Oba Ewuare II
A mụrụ Salami na Jos, Nigeria
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ onye Edo, kpọmkwem nwanyị Bini

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ nwata na Jos, Plateau State; mana n'ihi agha obodo Naijiria (1967–1970), ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na steeti Edo wee nweta asambodo West African School Certificate (WASC) n'okpuru nkwado Baptist High School, Benin City
Agụụ ya maka agụmakwụkwọ klaasị ụwa kpaliri ya ịga ￼￼ mba United States wee nweta BSc
(Hons) akụnụba ụlọ na MSc
Nri na North Dakota State University na 1979 na 1982 n'otu n'otu
Otú ọ dị, ọ nọ na Mahadum Wisconsin na Mahadum Minnesota maka oge okpomọkụ tupu ọ gafere na North Dakota State University, ebe o mesịrị gụchaa akwụkwọ ya n'ihi na ọ lụrụ di na 1977
Dịka onye Naijiria hụrụ mba ya n' anya, ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ wee jee ozi n' obodo ya n'okpuru ikpo okwu National Youth Service Corps (NYSC), Benin City n'etiti 1983 na 1984
Ịhụnanya o nwere maka agụmakwụkwọ dị ụmụ mere ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na mahadum Nigeria na 1989 ebe ọ nwetara PhD
na nri mmadụ na 1991
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Benin, ọ debanyere aha ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ebe ahụ wee nweta diploma na agụmakwụkwọ (PGDE) na 2001 maka ebumnuche ịkwalite nkà nkuzi ya

Nke ka nke, ịhụnanya na-enweghị afọ ojuju Salami maka ihe ọmụma, mmetụta na mmepụta ihe mere ka ọ malite akara ugo mmụta postdoctorate ya na Vaal University of Technology, Vanderbijlpark na South Africa, nke ọ nwetara na 2005
Salami malitere ọrụ ya na Mahadum Benin dị ka onye isi nkuzi na afọ 1994
Tupu nhọpụta ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ a, ọ kụzirila nwa oge na mahadum Ife mgbe ahụ, ugbu a Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ka ọ rụchara ọrụ ntorobịa nke mba ya na NYSC, Benin City n'afọ 1984
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Maiduguri site na afọ 1985 ruo 1994
Ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba site na afọ 1996 ruo afọ 1998 na Mahadum Benin wee nweta ọkwa prọfesọ na 2005

Nwee ọkwa nchịkwa dịka onyeisi oche nke Board of University of Benin Integrated Enterprise, director of general studies, director of part time programme, director-General/chief executive, National Institute for Educational Planning and Administration (NIEPA), Ondo State, ma
ndị ọzọ, Salami elekọtala nke ọma karịa 15 PhD
Ma ụmụ akwụkwọ master's degree rụrụ iri anọ n' ọnụ Ọgụgụ
Salami a gbalịala na mmụta, site n' article nke ode gasiri na mba Nigeria na mba of esi
Ọ kusieziela ọtụtụ ihe ọmụmụ n ' ihe mmụta nke Home Economics na Nutrition
Àtụ Infobox scientist
Lilian Sinclair Stevenson (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 16 Nọvemba 1870), bụ onye Kraịst na-eme udo, onye na-ede akụkọ ihe mere eme na otu n'ime ndị guzobere International Fellowship of Reconciliation

A mụrụ Lilian Stevenson na Dublin, Ireland n'ụbọchị 16 Nọvemba 1870 nye Reverend William Fleming Stevenson, onye ụkọchukwu Presbyterian maka Christ Church na Rathgar na nwunye ya, Elzabeth Montgomery née Sinclair, ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya ma na-ekpe okpukpe
Onye Kraịst siri ike, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi nke Student Christian Movement nke Great Britain
N'afọ 1914, o sonyere na nnọkọ na Cambridge nke malitere otu udo nke Ndị Kraịst na UK
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, n'oge Krismas nke afọ 1914 ruo afọ 1915, otu a guzobere Fellowship of Reconciliation
O sonyere na Nzukọ Bilthoven nke 1919, 1920 na 1921
Site na nzukọ afọ 1919 nke kpọkọtara ihe dị ka mmadụ iri ise, ihe o kwuru banyere ihe omume ahụ bụ 'Anyị zutere dị ka ndị ọ na-amaghị anyị kewara Fellowship'
N'ihi nzukọ ndị a, MTCI (Movement Towards a Christian International) ghọrọ International Fellowship of Reconciliation (IFOR)
Onye ọzọ sonyere na nke a bụ Pierre Cérésole onye sonyere na nzukọ ndị a wee kpebie ịmepụta Service Civil International naff 1920
Lilian Gertrude Woolf, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Lilian Wolfe (22 Disemba 1875 na London n'ụbọchị 28 Eprel 1974 na Cheltenham), bụ onye England anarchist, pacifist na feminist
Ọ bụ onye otu Freedom Press maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya
A mụrụ Wolfe na ụlọ ahịa ọla nna ya na Edgware Road, London n'ụbọchị 22 Disemba 1875

Nne ya, Lucy Helen Jones, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Birmingham onye Wolfe ga-akọwa dị ka 'nwanyi nwere nkụda mmụọ' nke hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ mgbe Wolfe dị afọ iri na atọ iji soro ụlọ ọrụ na-eme egwuregwu mee njem n'ụwa, ebe nna ya, Albert Lewis Woolf bụ onye na'ere ọla na Liverpudlian nke sitere na ndị Juu na nke nwere echiche na-agbaso omenala
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, ma nwee ọzụzụ dị mma na nke orthodox, nke ndị na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mbụ ma mesịa bụrụ obere oge na Regent Street Polytechnic
Lillian Dube (a mụrụ na 30 Septemba 1945) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta Masebobe na ihe nkiri soap opera Generations
N'afọ 2007, a chọpụtara na Dube nwere ọrịa kansa ara ma na-ebelata site na afọ 2008
Ọrịa kansa ahụ laghachiri ọzọ n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Dube nzere doctorate na Drama na Film Production na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Tshwane
Lilian Mary Nabulime (amụrụ na 22 Disemba 1963) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi Fine Art
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na College of Engineering, Design, Art and Technology (CEDAT)
O bipụtala ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi dị iche iche nke mba na nke mba ụwa
A mụrụ Nabulime na mpaghara Kampala, mpaghara etiti nke Uganda, na 1963
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke ụmụ nwanyị Nkoni ebe ọ nwetara asambodo PLE ya, ọ gara Makerere College School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndri ya
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na nka mara mma na Mahadum Makerere n'afọ 1987
O nwetara nzere masta ya na Mahadum Makerere na PhD ya na Machị Newcastle n'afọ 2007
Nnyocha a bụ maka ọrụ nke ụdị ihe a tụrụ atụ dị ka ngwá ọrụ nkwurịta okwu gbasara ndụ na ahụmịhe ụmụ nwanyị nwere HIV/AIDS na Uganda
Nabulime bụ Onye nkuzi Ukwu na onye bụbu Onye isi nke Ngalaba Ihe Ọkpụkpụ na School of Industrial and Fine Arts, College of Engineering, Design, Art and Technology(CEDAT), Mahadum Makerere

Ọrụ ya na-eji ihe ndị nkịtị (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ncha, myọ, ákwà, enyo, ite ígwè, akụkụ ụgbọ ala na ihe ndị a chọtara) iji gosipụta atụmatụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, dị ka ọrịa, okike, na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-anwa ịkwalite mmata na ịkwalite mkparịta ụka yana ịkwaga ihe nka pụtara karịa ihe a na-ahụ anya

Lillian Nakate Segujja (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1978) nke a na-akpọkarị Lillian Nakame, bụ onye injinia na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye omebe iwu na-anọchite anya Luweero District Women' Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
A mụrụ ya na Wobulenzi, Luweero District, na Central Region nke Uganda, na 11 August 1978
Nne na nna ya bụ Francis Segujja na Annet Segujja
Ọ gara Wobulenzi Parents' School maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya

Ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, gụnyere Saint John's Secondary School na Nandere, Luweero District, Mulusa Academy Secondary School, na Wobulenzi, na-agwụcha na Luteete Secondary School dị na Bamunanika, ebe ọ nọrọ ule O-Level ya
Ọ laghachiri na Mulusa Academy maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya
Ọ debanyere aha na Uganda Polytechnic Kyambogo, nke mesịrị bụrụ akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị ochie na Uganda, na nzere Bachelor of Science (BSc) na Civil Engineering
Ọ sochiri nke ahụ na nzere Master of Science (MSc) n'otu mpaghara ahụ, n'otu mahadum ahụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2011
O nwekwara asambodo na Project Planning and Management, nke Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics na Mahadum Makerere nyere na 2008
E nyere ya asambodo na Financial and Business Management of Road Construction na 2013, site na Multitech Business School na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Kampala, ụlọ ọrụ Tectura International Planners, Architects and Project Managers, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ, site na 2000 ruo 2001
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka injinia maka Luweero District Local Government maka afọ ise, site na 2001 ruo 2006
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye injinia obodo maka Wobulenzi Town Council, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ maka afọ anọ sochirinụ
N'oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye injinia distrikti maka Luweero District
N'afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri na ngalaba onwe ya dị ka onye injinia bi maka Bestway General Contractors, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ mba ụwa nwere ọrụ na Uganda
N'afọ 2012, ọ kwagara na Parrot 50 Uganda Limited, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi na-ahụ maka injinia, ruo n'afọ 2016
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ civil engineer na UB Consulting Engineers Limited, ụlọ ọrụ injinia ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ
N'afọ 2016, Nakate sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan site n'ịgba ọsọ maka Luweero District Women's Constituency, na National Resistance Movement
A họpụtara ya, merie Brenda Nabukenya nke Democratic Party (Uganda)
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, Nakate bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu na sayensị na teknụzụ ma bụrụ osote onyeisi oche nke kọmitii omeiwu na akụrụngwa anụ ahụ
Lillian Nakate bụ nwanyị lụrụ di na nne nke atọ, gụnyere ejima, amụrụ n'ihe dị ka 2007 na nwanne, amụrụ otu afọ ka e mesịrị
Lillian D
Wald (Amụrụ n'ọnwa March 10, 1867 ruo ọnwa September 1, 1940) bụ onye nọọsụ America, onye ọrụ ebere na onye edemede
A maara ya maka onyinye maka ikike mmadụ ma bụrụ onye guzobere ọrụ nọọsụ obodo America
O guzobere Henry Street Settlement na New York City ma bụrụ onye nkwado mbụ maka inwe ndị nọọsụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha
Mgbe o tolitere na Ohio na New York, Wald ghọrọ onye nọọsụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike n'oge dị mkpirikpi wee malite ịkụzi klas ahụike obodo
Mgbe o guzobesịrị Henry Street Settlement, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agba mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ka nta
Ọ gbara mbọ maka ikike ịtụ vootu ma bụrụ onye na-akwado njikọta agbụrụ
O sonyere na ntọala nke National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP)
Wald nwụrụ n'afọ 1940 mgbe ọ dị afọ 73
A mụrụ Wald n'ezinụlọ ndị dọkịta German-Jewish bara ọgaranya na Cincinnati, Ohio
Nne na nna ya bụ Max D

Wald na Minnie (Schwarz) Wald 526 Nna ya bụ onye na-ere ahịa anya; nwanne nna ya, Henry Wald, MD, bụ dọkịta na-awa ahụ nke Mahadum Vienna zụrụ nke malitere usoro ahụike nke New York City na Mahadum Columbia na 1880s
N'afọ 1878, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Rochester, New York
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Bekee-French nke Miss Cruttenden maka ụmụ agbọghọ
O tinyere akwụkwọ na Vassar College mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, mana ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ chere na ọ dị obere
N'afọ 1889, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nọọsụ nke New York Hospital
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na New York Hospital Training School for Nurses n'afọ 1891, wee gaa ọmụmụ ihe na Women's Medical College
Lillie Mary Clinedinst (née Barbour; March 3, 1885 - May 18, 1985) bụ onye America na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-arụ ọrụ
A mụrụ Barbour na Machị 3, 1885, na Rocky Mount, Virginia, nwa nwanyị nke James Randolph Barbour na Abigail Ferguson Barbour
Barbour biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Virginia ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Nevada n'ihe dị ka 1924
N'afọ 1925, Barbour lụrụ Joseph B
Clinedinst, onye jere ozi n'akụkụ ya dị ka onye nyocha ụlọ ọrụ maka Virginia Bureau of Labor, onye mechara bụrụ onye ọrụ Nevada State Labor Commissioner
Barbour bụ onye nkwado ama ama maka ọtụtụ ihe gụnyere ọrụ ọrụ, ikike ụmụ nwanyị nwere ịtụ vootu, na nchedo ụmụaka
Na mbido afọ 1900, Barbour malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ uwe ma bụrụ onye otu Local Union No
48 nke United Garment Workers of America na Roanoke, Virginia
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 1910, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii na-eme ngagharị iwe maka Virginia Federation of Labor, ebe ọ gbara ndị otu ahụ ume ka ha zụta naanị uwe ndị otu ahụ mere

Site na 1915 ruo 1916, Barbour bụ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na kọmitii iwu maka njikọ ahụ, na-eme nke ọma na Virginia General Assembly ka ha mee iwu gụnyere nchebe dị ukwuu maka mmanye iwu, ndị mbụ na-azaghachi, na ndị ọrụ mgbanyụ ọkụ
Ọ kwadokwara ka e nwee omume ịkwụ ụgwọ hà nhata iji gbaa ụmụ nwanyị ume ịbụ ndị uwe ojii
Barbour bụ onye nnọchi anya a họpụtara na American Federation of Labor na 1917, 1919, na 1926
N'afọ 1921, a họpụtara Barbour dị ka onye nhazi steeti maka njikọ ahụ
N'ọrụ ahụ, Barbour gara Virginia niile na steeti ndị ọzọ iji hazie ndị ọrụ nwanyị, gụnyere na Louisiana na 1922

Mgbe ọ kwagara Reno, Nevada, n'ihe dị ka 1924, Barbour nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị ọrụ ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ-onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke Nevada State Federation of Labor ruo ihe karịrị afọ asatọ
N'ọrụ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka akụ, Barbour nyere aka ịhazi ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na ihe onwunwe iji kwado Franklin D
Roosevelt na ntuli aka onye isi ala United States nke 1932
Ka ọ na-erule n'ihe dị ka 1910, Barbour na-agbasa akwụkwọ mkpesa na-akpọ maka mgbanwe na Iwu Virginia iji nye ụmụ nwanyị ikike ịtụ vootu
Barbour bụ onye otu mbụ nke Equal Suffrage League nke Virginia
Ọ gara steeti ahụ dum ma gwa ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị dị iche iche na ndị otu ọrụ okwu banyere mkpa ikike ụmụ nwanyị nwere na otu o si emetụta imeziwanye ọnọdụ ọrụ
N'afọ 1914, Barbour gbara akaebe n'ihu Virginia House of Delegates Committee on Privileges and Elections iji kwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ bụ ezie na mgbalị ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, Barbour gara n'ihu na nkwado ya n'ime ọtụtụ afọ sochirinụ, ka ọ na-akwado mgbalị ịchọta kọleji ụmụ nwanyị na Mahadum Virginia site na Co-Ordinate College League of Virginia
Barbour gara n'ihu na-agba ndị ọrụ aka ike iji kwado ihe kpatara ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na 1917 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na nkwado nke Virginia Federation of Labor maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na mgbakọ ya kwa afọ

Mgbe ụmụ nwanyị nwetara ikike ịtụ vootu na mba niile mgbe nkwado nke Ndezigharị nke Iri na itoolu na 1920, Barbour nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe kpatara ịkwalite ndebanye aha ụmụ nwanyị na itinye aka na obodo
Mgbe ọ kwagara Nevada, ọ bụ onye otu Nevada League of Women Voters ma họpụta ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ steeti
Site na 1910 ruo 1917, a họpụtara Barbour dị ka onye nyocha ụlọ ọrụ maka Virginia Bureau of Labor
N'ọrụ ahụ, ọ gara steeti ahụ dum ma nyochaa mmebi iwu ebe ọrụ steeti metụtara nchekwa, ịdị ọcha, na ọrụ ụmụaka
O kwuru ọtụtụ narị ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ maka mmebi iwu
N'afọ 1915, Gọvanọ nke Virginia Henry Carter Stuart họpụtara Barbour dị ka otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya Virginia na National Child Labor Convention

N'ọnwa Eprel 1917, Gọvanọ Stuart họpụtara Barbour dị ka naanị nwanyị na-eje ozi na Virginia Industrial Council of Safety nke e guzobere ọhụrụ, nke e nyere ọrụ nyocha ọnọdụ na-enye aka na Great Northward Migration of Virginia's African Americans na inye ndụmọdụ nye gọvanọ na ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara Barbour dị ka onye nyocha maka United States Children's Bureau na 1917

Ọ gara United States niile gaa n'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ụlọ ọrụ canneries, ebe a na-arụ ụgbọ mmiri, na ebe ọrụ mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka iwu Keating-Owen Child Labor Act nke 1916
Mgbe e mesịrị, Barbour rụrụ ọrụ maka Internal Revenue Service dị ka onye nyocha ụtụ isi na-elekwasị anya na nsogbu ọrụ ụmụaka

Dị ka onye a họpụtara na gọọmentị etiti, Barbour bụ onye otu Association of Governmental Labor Officials of the United States and Canada, ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke nnọkọ gbasara ọrụ ụmụaka na 1922 ma kwuo na ọ dịghị steeti dị na United States nwere 'ihe kwesịrị ekwesị maka itinye akụkụ ọ bụla nke iwu ya maka ichebe ụmụaka'

Barbour megidere mmachibido iwu na United States ma họpụta ya dị ka onye nnọchiteanya na mgbakọ Nevada iji kagbuo Ndezigharị nke Iri na asatọ na 1933, na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ a họpụtara ahọpụta nke mgbakọ ahụ
N'ime afọ 1930, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Mmụta Nevada
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Barbour bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba Reno nke American Legion Auxiliary, na-enyere aka iduzi ọrụ n'ihu ụlọ iji kwado mbọ agha ahụ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nke National Committeewoman na-anọchite anya steeti Nevada
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Reno Women's Civic Club n'afọ ndị 1960
Barbour bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu steeti Nevada na 1944 dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ntuli aka Democratic
Barbour laghachiri Virginia ibi n'ụlọ ndị agadi Roanoke n'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, ma nwụọ site na nkụchi obi na Mee 18, 1985, ọnwa abụọ mgbe 100 afọ ya gasịrị
E liri ya na Mountain View Cemetery na Vinton, Virginia

Lilly Adong (amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 1976) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na onye otu ndị omeiwu kemgbe afọ 2011, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka mpaghara Nwoya
Adong nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2003, e nyere ya diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ gburugburu ebe obibi site na Institute of Housing & Urban Development Studies na Rotterdam
Ka e mesịrị na 2005, ọ nwetara asambodo na iwu na Law Development Center na Kampala
N'afọ 2008, o nwetara diplọma postgraduate na njikwa esemokwu na ọmụmụ udo na Mahadum Gulu
N'afọ 2010 o mere diplọma postgraduate na nchịkwa ọha na eze na njikwa na Uganda Management Institute
O mere masters nke nchịkwa ọha na eze na ọmụmụ njikwa na Uganda Management Institute na 2014
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nhazi nhazi ọdachi na mpaghara n'ọfịs praịm minista na mpaghara Amuru site na afo 2009 ruo na afo 2010
N'afọ 2003 ruo na afo 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu na gọọmentị ime obodo Amuru na Gulu District
Site na afo 2006 ruo afo 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na kansụl (gọọmentị mpaghara Amuru)
Lilly Platt (amụrụ na 21 June 2008) bụ onye Dutch na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi nke a mụrụ na Britain
A maara Platt maka ntorobịa ya na ịga ngagharị iwe n'udo iji kwupụta nchegbu gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụwa nke YouthMundus, Earthorg, na WODI; onye nnọchianya ntorobịa maka Plastic Pollution Coalition na How Global; na onye nnọchi nke ụmụaka maka World Cleanup Day
Platt malitere na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta mgbe o biputara plastik ọ natara n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọ natara iberibe ihe mkpofu karịrị otu puku narị
A mụrụ Platt na Britain
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Netherlands mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
N'afọ 2015, Platt na nna nna ya nọ na-agagharị n'ogige ntụrụndụ dị na Netherlands mgbe ọ hụrụ plastik gbasasịrị n'ala
O kpebiri ịgụta ha ka ha na-eme Dutch ya
Ha chịkọtara iberibe plastik iri itoolu na otu n'ime nkeji iri
Nna nna ya gara n'ihu gwa ya otú ihe mkpofu ahụ si eme ka ofe plastik
Ihe omume ahụ mere ka ọ malite atụmatụ gburugburu ebe obibi ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ malitere Lilly's Plastic Pickup
Site na Lilly's Plastic Pickup, ọ na-eburu ihe mkpofu ma na-ahazi ha nke ọma
Ọ na-etinye ha na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta iji mee ka a mara banyere okwu ahụ
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, Platt ewerela iberibe ihe mkpofu karịrị otu narị puku, site na karama, ngwugwu sịga, katọn ihe ọṅụṅụ wdg
Site na Lilly's Plastic Cleanup, Platt na-ekerịta mmetụta nke plastik na anụ ọhịa na gburugburu ebe obibi
Kemgbe ọ na-agbasa, atụmatụ ya enwetawo otuto mba ụwa
Kemgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, Platt egosila mmasị n'ebe ụmụ anụmanụ nọ, ọkachasị ndị a na-ewere dị ka ndị na-adịghị mma
A na-emegbu ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ihi nke a, ọ bụ naanị otu n'ime ndị ọgbọ ya gosipụtara mmasị n'ọrụ nhicha ya
Platt wee kwaga The King's School ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ klas ya sonyere na mgbalị nhicha ya
Na ntuli aka Dutch nke afọ 2019, nna nna Platt tụụrụ ya vootu, ka ọ na-eme mkpọsa maka mmachibido iwu nke plastik
Platt weere vidiyo ma gbaa ndị ọzọ ume ime otu ihe ahụ
Na Septemba 2018, Platt hụrụ mkpesa Greta Thunberg n'èzí ụlọ omebe iwu Sweden gbasara itinye nkwekọrịta Paris n'ọrụ
O sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ wee kpebie ịga ngagharị iwe
Mgbe izu ole na ole gasịrị, Greta Thunberg sonyeere Platt na Netherlands, na-atụle na Netherlands bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị na-ewepụta gas na European Union
A kpọrọ ha abụọ na Brussels ebe ha gara nzukọ ihu igwe na mpụga European Parliament
Kwa Fraịdee, Platt na-eme ngagharị iwe n'èzí ụlọ gọọmentị iji mee ngagharị iwe maka nsogbu ihu igwe, na ma ọ bụ na-enweghị ụlọ ọrụ
Lily-Rose Melody Depp (amuru 27 Mee 1999) bu onye omere na ihe nlere nke French-American
Ada nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Johnny Depp na onye na-agụ egwú Vanessa Paradis, Na 2014, Depp mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na obere ọrụ na Tusk
Ọ gara n'ihu mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri oge The Dancer (2016), nke ọ na-egwuri Isadora Duncan, Planetarium (2016), na Okwu Eze (2017), n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ (2019)
Onye na-agba egwu na nwoke kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi nwetara Depp nhọpụta maka César Awards maka ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, a họpụtara ya maka abụọ n'ime ha (2018)
Kemgbe 2015, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchianya nke Chanel maka ụlọ ejiji
Lily-Rose Melody Depp mụrụ na May 27, 1999, na Neuilly-sur-Seine, France, nke dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Paris
Ọ bụ ada Johnny Depp, onye omere America, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-agụ egwu, yana Vanessa Paradis, onye ọbụ abụ French, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya bụkwa nwa nwanyị Johnny Depp
Depp nwere nwanne nwoke nke tọrọ aha ya bụ John 'Jack' Christopher Depp III, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwanne nne ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Alysson Paradis, onye si France
Depp bụ onye sitere na Elizabeth Key Grinstead, onye na-alụ ọgụ nnwere onwe nke Africa na Amerịka bụ onye lụrụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe na United States
Depp na-ekwu na ya sitere na ndị nna nna America site na nna ya
Mgbe afọ 14 gachara, nne na nna Depp gbara alụkwaghịm na 2012 wee kwenye ijikọ Depp, bụ onye kewara oge ya ugbu a n'etiti Los Angeles, Paris na New York City
Depp mere ihe ngosi mpụta mbụ ya na Tusk, nke malitere na Toronto International Film Festival na Septemba 2014
Ya na enyi ya Harley Quinn Smith, nna ya, na onye isi ihe nkiri, Kevin Smith rụkọrọ ọrụ na fim ahụ
Depp jikọrọ aka na vidiyo egwu 'All Around the World' nke onye na-agụ egwú Irish Rejjie Snow, nke ewepụtara na Ọktoba 2015
Ewezuga ọrụ ihe nkiri, Depp apụtawo na mkpuchi nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Chanel ika kemgbe 2015
Karl Lagerfeld họọrọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 15
Lagerfeld kwupụtara Depp dị ka ihu nke Chanel na-esi ísì ụtọ, Chanel No
5 L'Eau, na 2016
Depp zaghachiri agwa Tusk ya na Yoga Hosers, ntụgharị gbadoro ụkwụ na agwa ya na Harley Quinn Smith
Na Jenụwarị 2016, ihe nkiri ahụ malitere na Sundance Film Festival
The Dancer, nke Depp na-egwuri Isadora Duncan, premiered na Un Certain Regard Atiya na Cannes Film Festival na May 2016
Stéphanie Di Giusto na-eme directorial mpụta mbụ na ihe nkiri
A họpụtara Depp ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-ekwe nkwa na 42nd César Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
na 22nd Lumières Awards, yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha ekwe nkwa
Depp na Natalie Portman jikọrọ aka na Rebecca Zlotowski's Planetarium dị ka ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ji mmụọ nsọ na 1930s France n'otu afọ ahụ
Portman ji aka họrọ Depp ka ọ kpọọ nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere na fim ahụ

Ọ malitere na United States na New York Film Festival na July 2019 wee wepụta ya na New York na Los Angeles
Na 44th César Awards, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka oge nke abụọ

ya na Priyanka Chopra, na-akọwa ka Pad Project si nyere ụmụ nwanyị Delhi aka ịmalite azụmahịa n'ichepụta ihe ọcha nke onwe ha
Na 91st Academy Awards, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ meriri akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma (Ihe dị mkpirikpi)

N'ọnwa Jun, Depp rụkọrọ ọrụ na obere ihe nkiri French nọọrọ onwe ya Quel Joli Temps Pour Jouer Ses Vingt-ans (My Last Lullaby), nke ya na nwanne nne ya Alysson Paradis dere
Depp na-egwuri Paloma, nwa agbọghọ nke na-ewute ọnwụ nke nna nna ya
Enyere ihe onyonyo kacha mma na 2019 New York Film Awards na Short Short Short na 2019 Los Angeles Film Awards, ihe nkiri a dị ugbu a na ihe nkiri
Mor Cohen nke New York Film Awards dere na ntụle ya nke na ọ siri ike icheta na ndị a bụ akụkọ ifo na ọ bụghị ezigbo mmadụ,' ka Lily-Rose Depp na-eduzi
ihe nkiri ahụ

Les Brandt dere maka ihe nkiri Los Angeles Film Awards, 'Depp na-egosipụta ebili mmiri sonic nke ngosipụta nka na anya ya na ọrụ dị n'ime nke dị aghụghọ ma dị oke ike, na mgbe ọ dị obere bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ikiri'

onye omume ụwa siri ike dabara na Henry,' na The Film Stage's Rory O'Connor kpọrọ ya 'ezigbo cameo'

Ihe omume Depp na-esote gụnyere Wolf Nathalie Biancheri, nke ya na George MacKay ga-emekọ ihe, yana Silent Night, ihe nkiri ekeresimesi na-atọ ọchị bụ Keira Knightley na Roman Griffin Davis

Kemgbe a mụrụ ya, Depp bụ isiokwu nke tabloid na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, nke gụnyere mkpuchi ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya, ịga na mmemme mmekọrịta ọha na eze, na nkatọ nke nhọrọ ejiji ya

Lily Banda (a mụrụ na 16 Ọgọst 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-ede uri nke amụrụ na Malawi

Limbum bụ asụsụ Grassfields nke Cameroon, nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị na-asụ ya na Naịjirịa
Ụfọdụ na-eji ya dị ka asụsụ azụmahịa, mana ọ bụ asụsụ nne nke ndị Wimbum, ndị bi na mpaghara Donga-Mantung nke Northwest Region, n'elu okporo uzo mgbanaka
Wimbum nwere agbụrụ atọ agbụrụ agha nwere isi na Mbot, agbụrụ Tang na Tallah, na agbụrụ Wiya na Ndu
Obodo Wimbum ndị ọzọ gbasara gburugburu ebe ahụ, nke ọ bụla jikọtara ya na otu n'ime agbụrụ atọ ahụ
Obodo ọ bụla nwere onye isi, nke a makwaara dị ka fon, bu onye nweere onwe ya, yana ndi isi ala ma o bu ndi isi ano n'okpuru ya
Agburu atọ a na-ejikota onu na mpaghara, na-ekerịta asụsụ ahu
Ndị mmadụ bi na Nkambe Plateau, ala ahịhịa dị egwu nke nwere ugwu osisi, ihe dị ka otu kilomita n'elu oke osimiri
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo, na-akụ ọka, agwa, poteto, yam, akwụkwọ nri, tomato, unere, yana plantain na kọfị n'ebe dị ala, ebe okpomọkụ
Ụfọdụ na-azụ ahịa, ọkachasị n'obodo Nkambé na Ndu
Ụfọdụ na-arụ ọrụ maka gọọmentị, ọkachasị na Nkambe
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-ewere Limbum dị ka olumba atọ asụsụ ugwu, nke etiti, na nke ndịda
Ndị na-asụ otu olumba nwere ike ịghọta ndị na-asụrụ nke ọ bụla ọzọ
Olumba atọ ahụ gafere agbụrụ atọ ahụ, ma nwee ike ịpụta site na mmetụta nke asụsụ ndị agbata obi n'ebe ugwu na ndịda
Limbum nwere njikọ chiri anya na ụfọdụ asụsụ ndị agbata obi dị ka Yamba na ndị ọzọ dị anya dị ka Bamum, Ngemba na Bamileke
Ọ dị nnọọ iche na ufodu asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị nso dị ka Bebe na Noni
Asụsụ Limbum yiri Bekee n'ụzọ ụfọdụ, gụnyere
Mana Limbum dị iche na Bekee n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ
Nkea bụ ole na ole
