Lin Sampson bụ onye nta akụkọ si mba South Africa but onye amụrụ na mba Sri Lanka ma gụọ akwụkwọ na England
Ọ ebiela n'ụwa niile ma bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Athens
Ọ bụru na nso nso a onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbe niile maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times LifeStyle
E bipụtakwara Sampson site na akwụkwọ akụkọ na aha obodo na mpụga South Africa dị ka The Independent, The Sunday Times na Tatler
N'afọ 2005, o bipụtara Ugbu a, ị na-aga ma gbuo m, nchịkọta ogidi ndị malitere n'afọ 1982 na okwu mmalite nke Rian Malan dere
Sampson dabeere na Cape Town
Lina Bennani (amụrụ na 4 Julaị, na afọ 1991) bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu tennis
A mụrụ ya na Casablanca, Bennani sonyere na egwuregwu Fed Cup isii maka Morocco n'etiti afọ 2008 na afọ 2011, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị ka onye na-egwu egwuregwu abụọ
O meriri naanị rubber ya, karịa Elaine Genovese nke Malta na afọ 2010
Bennani, onye meriri atọ ITF okpukpu abụọ, sonyere na isi draw nke ụlọ ya WTA Tour tournament, Morocco Open, otu ugboro na otu na ugboro anọ na okpukpu abụọ
Na afọ 2011 Pan Arab Games na Doha, Bennani ritere ọla nchara na otu na otu egwuregwu maka Morocco

Lina Chabane (Arabic; amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1997) bụ onye na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ dị ka onye na eme egwuregwu n'etiti nke Nkewa 1 Féminine klọb FC Fleury 91 na ndị otu mba Algeria
A mụrụ ya na France, Chabane nọchitere anya Morocco na Algeria na mba ụwa
Chabane bụ ngwaahịa Le Mans FC
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka FC Tremblay En France, Stade Brestois 29, RC Saint-Denis, Montauban FC na Fleury na France
N'afọ 2016, a kpọrọ Chabane na nke mbụ ya na ndị otu mba Algeria n'oge a na-akwadebe maka ndị CAN iru eru
Chabane mere nke mbụ ya na Morocco na 10 June 2021 dị ka onye nnọchi anya na 3-0 mmeri enyi na enyi n'ụlọ na Mali
Lincon Muteta (amụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 1975) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ Muteta n'afọ 1975 na mpaghara Highfield nke Harare, ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ n'ime ezinụlọ sitere na Mutoko
Ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe n'afọ 1989 mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Harare, ma mesịa bụrụ onye enyemaka Danny Kanyemba
Moses Masaya gbara ya ume ịmalite ọrụ nke onwe ya dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe
Muteta bụ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park na 1996-97
N'oge 2004–08, ọ gara ma gosipụta na ngosi otu na South Africa, Bahrain, Dubai, England, na Canada na Zimsculpt
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na Spain, Germany, Holland, United States, Switzerland, Ireland, Belgium na Italy
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụaka nwanyị abụọ
Linda agnes Auma bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda, ọ na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Lira dị ka nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda, nke ọ banyere na tiketi onwe ya
Auma bụ minista steeti maka Mmekọahụ na ọdịbendị na osote onyeisi oche nke kansụl ụmụ nwanyị nke mba
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi mpaghara Resident (RDC) nke mpaghara Amuru
Auma bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi agha David Oyite Ojok, onye isi ndị ọrụ nke Uganda National Liberation Army (UNLA) n'oge ọchịchị nke abụọ nke Dr Apollo Milton Obote
Auma nwụnahụrụ nna ya mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ

Oyite Ojok nwụrụ n'ihe mberede helikopta n'afọ 1983 na-aga njem iji nyochaa oganihu nke ndị nnupụisi, National Liberation Army (NRA) nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni duziri, onye mechara weghara ọchịchị n'afọ 1986
Auma nwụkwara nne ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, nke hapụrụ ya nwa mgbei kpamkpam na nwata ya na ndụ ya bụ ịda ogbenye na nhụsianya
Auma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ site n'enyemaka nke ndị na-atụ anya ihe ọma, ọ mụkwara nwa mbụ ya nwanyị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii
Auma dị ka nne nke ụmụ abụọ laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mezue agụmakwụkwọ O'level ya na ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya bụ onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni, onye bụbu onye iro nna ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o mere asambodo na ndekọ ego wee debanye aha maka diplọma na nchịkwa azụmaahịa ma mesịa nweta nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa azụmahịa

Auma banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na ịsọ mpi ma bụrụ onye isi oche ndị ntorobịa nke obodo Lira n'okpuru kansụl ndị ntorobịa mba, e mechara họpụta ya na afo 2006 dịka onye kansụl ntorobịa maka ngalaba etiti na kansụl obodo Lira
Na afọ 2016, ọ chọrọ oche nwanyị MP nke obodo Lira na tiketi National Resistance Movement mana ọ dara na primaries
Joyce Ongom nke Uganda People's Congress (UPC) ga-emeri oche MP
Mgbe ntuli aka afo 2016 nke Uganda gasịrị, onye isi ala Museveni họpụtara Auma dị ka RDC nke mpaghara Amuru
N'ịgba ọsọ na ntuli aka nke afo 2021 Uganda, Auma meriri Florence Angina na ntuliaka nke NRM, mana e wepụrụ mmeri ya mgbe a gụgharịrị vootu
A mara Florence Angina dị ka onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ NRM maka nwanyị Lira so n'oche ndị omeiwu, nke a kpaliri Auma ịgba ọsọ dị ka onye nwere onwe ya ma bụrụ onye mmeri na ntuli aka n'ozuzu
Na nzuko omeiwu nke Uganda, Auma na-eje ozi na kọmitii na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ihe onwunwe okike
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Aumas firstborn daughter Shakila Among Meenyi was crowned Miss Lira in 2017
She was also the face of Lango Cultural Heritage and was crowned Miss Tourism Northern Region in 2020
Shakila Among also represents the youth of Lira at Lira city council

Linda Day Clark bụ onye na-ese foto, prọfesọ, na onye nlekọta a ma ama maka ijide ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'ime ime obodo na obodo ukwu ndị Afrịka-Amerịka, ọkachasị na Gee's Bend E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Philadelphia Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum of Art
Day Clark kwagara Maryland mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ọ natara Associate of Arts ya na Howard Community College, Bachelor of Fine Arts na Maryland Institute College of Art n'afọ 1994, na Masters of Fine Art na Mahadum Delaware n'afọ 1996
Day Clark bụ onye na-eme mmemme na Baltimore Museum of Art ruo afọ 1998, mgbe ọ hapụrụ ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ nke foto na Mahadum Coppin State

N'afọ 2002, akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times nyere Linda Day Clark ọrụ iji see foto ụmụ nwanyị na-ese akwa nke Gee's Bend, obere obodo dị n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Selma, Alabama, 'na-ejide ala ụrọ na-acha ọbara ọbara, na-acha ọcha n'okporo ụzọ ruru unyi, nke bara ọgaranya na-acha nke na o yiri ka ọ dị mma ma jikọta ya na agba ndị bara ọgarị na akwa akwa
Linda Ejiofor (amuru Linda Ihuoma Ejiofor; 17 Julaị 1986) bu onye omere na ihe nlere nke Naijiria sitere na steeti Abia amara maka oru ya dika Bimpe Adekoya na usoro onyonyo M-Net nke Tinsel
A họpụtara ya maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ nkwado na 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Meeting (2012)
Tony Ogaga Erhariefe nke The Sun Nigeria depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị àmà amaNollywood nke 2013 Ọ mụrụ nwa mbụ ya, nwoke
Nwa afọ Isuikwuato, Ejiofor mụrụ na Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ise
Ejiofor gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Ilabor dị na Surulere wee debanye aha ya na kọleji gọọmentị etiti nke ụmụ nwanyị dị n'Ọnịcha
Ọ gụrụ sociology na mahadum Port Harcourt
Na 4 Nọvemba 2018, o kwuputara nkwa ya na onye omee Tinsel Ibrahim Suleiman wee lụọ ya ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị
Ejiofor na mbụ chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
N'ajụjụ ọnụ e bipụtara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ The Nation, o kwuru na ya gbanwere obi ya banyere ịchụso ọrụ mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri
O kwukwara na ya nwere olile anya ime ihe nkiri n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 2018, o tinyere Jemima Osunde na usoro webụsaịtị Ndani TV Rumor Has It
Has It
Linda Ikeji, amụrụ na 1980, bụ nwanyi Igbo si Naigeria, ọ bu onye akukọ edemede, na afo 2005 ọ bidoro aka oru
Malite n'afọ 2010, ọ malitere inweta nkwado ya na aha maka blog ya
Linda Nellie Moss bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress

Linda Maserame Motlhalo (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na South Afrika nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu maka klọb Swedish Djurgardens na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa
A makwaara ya dị ka 'Randfontein Ronaldinho'
A mụrụ Linda Motlhalo na Brandvlei, Northern Cape, na Jenụwarị 7, 1998
Ezinụlọ ya nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke bọọlụ, nna ya Johannes Motlhalo na-anwa ịghọ onye egwuregwu ọkachamara
Ọ bụ ezie na o meghị otú ahụ, nwanne ya nwoke Joseph Motlhalo ghọrọ onye na-edebe goolu maka Kaizer Chiefs FC n'etiti afọ 1970 na 1985
Motlhalo gara TuksSport High School, n'oge ahụ ọ bụ akụkụ nke South African High Performance Centre dị na Pretoria
Na 1 Febụwarị 2018 Motlhalo bịanyere aka na Houston Dash na National Women's Soccer League
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa Dash Vera Pauw bụ onye zụrụ ndị otu mba South Afrika site na 2014 ruo 2016
Motlhalo mere ngosipụta21 NWSL maka Dash ma gbaa 1 goolu
[[citation needed]
Houston Dash hapụrụ Motlhalo na 6 Febụwarị 2019
Na 22 Febụwarị 2019 a kpughere Motlhalo dị ka onye egwuregwu nke Beijing BG Phoenix FC
na Chinese Women's Super League, sonyeere ya na South Afrika na onye bụbu onye otu Houston Dash Thembi Kgatlana onye kwagara China
Na 18 Jenụwarị 2020 a mara ọkwa na Motlhalo sonyeere ndị Swedish Djurgardens IF na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ, dabere na ịnata visa ọrụ ya
Motlhalo mere nke mbụ ya na 22 Febụwarị 2020, na-agba bọọlụ ugboro abụọ mgbe ọ bịarutere dị ka onye nnọchi anya na mmeri Stockholm derby na AIK
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2021, ndị otu Djurgardens kpọrọ ya onye ọhụrụ nke Afọ maka arụmọrụ ya n'ofe oge 2020
Na Jenụwarị 2022 a mara ọkwa na Motlhalo bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ọhụrụ iji nọrọ na klọb ahụ
Mgbe ọ na-aga High Performance Centre, Motlhalo gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị South Afrika na-erubeghị afọ 20 dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu
Nke a gụnyere na egwuregwu dị ka akụkụ nke 2015 African U-20 Women's World Cup Qualifying Tournament
Motlhalo gara 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup na South Afrika mana ọ batara na asọmpi ahụ na-alụ ọgụ na mmerụ ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere egwuregwu mmeghe nke otu ahụ na Spain, ihe fọdụrụ na asọmpi ya bụ naanị n'oge na-adịghị anya na China
Na Septemba 2021, Motlhalo gbara South Afrika na mmeri 4-2 na Naịjirịa ka Banyana Banyana meriri Aisha Buhari Cup na Lagos

Motlhalo mechara bụrụ onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ na South Afrika na iru eru maka 2022 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-agba goolu ise n'ime egwuregwu anọ ya na Mozambique na Algeria iji nyere Banyana Banyana BANA aka idebe ebe na ngwụcha
Mkpụrụ na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ South Afrika nke mbụ
Linda Mvusi (c
1955 na Bloemfontein- ) bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Mvusi nwetara ihe nrite màkà onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 1988 Cannes Film Festival màkà ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri A World Apart nke Chris Menges duziri
Mvusi bụ ónyé South Africa mbụ nwetara ihe nrite ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Cannes
Mvusi nwetakwara ihe nrite màkà ịdị mma màkà ihe owuwu ya na Museum Apartheid
A mụrụ Linda Mvusi na Free State na (ihe dị ka) 1955 ma zụlite ya na Northern Rhodesia, Ghana na Kenya
Ọ zụrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma na-arụ ọrụ ya na Harare mgbè ọ zutere Chris Menges ónyé na-anwa ịchọta ebe maka ihe nkiri ya, A World Apart, nso Bulawayo
Mvusi na mbụ na-akpachara ányá màkà ihe nkiri a n'ihi na ọ na-eche na ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke ndị si n'èzí ji ego mba ọzọ mee màkà ndị na-ege ntị mba ọzọ
Mvusi chere na ọtụtụ nde ego mbà ọzọ na-egbochi ndị Afrịka ịkọ akụkọ nke ha
O kwuru na 'ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ọcha na-egbochi uto nke anyị, echiche nke anyị banyéré akụkọ ihe mere eme [na] eziokwu nke anyị'
Otú ọ dị Menges masịrị ya mgbè ọ malitere itinye ndị ọbọdọ na ndị otu ANC n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ màkà ndụ nné ya Ruth First
Nne ahụ na-etinye aka n'ịlụ ọgụ megide mmegbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa, mana nrụgide nke ezinụlọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị zutere ma mee ka ezinụlọ kewaa
E debere ya n'oge ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Joe Slovo bụ ónyé isi nke pati Kọmunist na South Africa n'oge ahụ
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, a gbanwere aha ndị nne na nna ka ọ bụrụ Gus na Diana Roth ma gbanwee aha nwa ha nwanyị ka ọ bụrụ Molly
Na ndụ n'ezie na ihe nkiri ahụ, ha were odibo n'ọrụ iji lekọta nwa ha
Onye a, Elsie, bụ ónyé Mvusi mere na fim ahụ
Menges kwuru na ọ họọrọ iso ndị na-abụghị ndị ọkachamara na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Mvusi na Jodhi May rụọ ọrụ (ọ mere Molly na ihe nkiri ahụ)
Echiche a nwèrè ike igosipụta mmekọrịta ọjọọ dị n'etiti Menges na Barbara Hershey, ónyé rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpà nke nne ahụ
Mvusi kọrọ na enwere ọtụtụ arụmụka n'oge a na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime esemokwu ahụ bụ n'ihi na ọ chọghị ịhapụ 'akụkọ ojii', mana Mvusi chere na arụmụka ahụ bara uru dịka ihe nkiri ahụ bụ eziokwu na ozi ya
Ọ na-eto Menges màkà ijide n'aka na ha 'na-enwe ọmịiko nke ukwuu, n'ihi na ha bụ eziokwu'
A raara ihe nkiri ahụ nye Ruth First ónyé bọmbụ ndị uwe ojii South Africa zitere gburu n'afọ 1982
Magazin Newsweek chere na arụmọrụ ya bụ ihe a ga-enye otuto
Mvusi laghachiri n'ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie nke Akpa ókè agbụrụ na Johannesburg
ebe ụlọ ọrụ South African Institute of Architects kpọrọ aha ya na ònyìnyé màkà ịdị mma
N'afọ 2004, Mvusi na-arụ ọrụ n'ọbọdọ mepere emepe a na-akpọ Fort West na Tshwane
1988 Cannes Film Festival
Ụlọ Ọrụ Ndị Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-ese Ihe na South Africa
Linda Ogugua (amụrụ ya na 12 Eprel afọ 1978) bụ onye Naijiria na atu basketball so na otu ndi Nigerian women's basketball Center
Ogugua gara Mahadum Biola na California, United Steeti
O sonyere na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyi basketball mba Naijiria na 2004 Summer Olimpik
Ndi muru ogugua bụ Caroline Chinwe na John Brown Ogugua na Anambra Steeti,Naijiria na Eprel afọ 1978
Linda Osifo (amụrụ ya na Ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaá na ọnwa asaa Julaị n'afọ1991) ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Miss Nigeria Entertainment Canada 2011 na onye nke abụọ n'asọmpi ịma mma Miss AfriCanada n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Linda maka onyinye ELOY maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri TV Desperate Housewives Africa nke Ebonylife TV An adaptation nke ABC Studio franchise
Linda Sokhulu bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa
Na 2014, ọ nwetara nhọpụta na nhọpụta ịnye awọdụ agba nke iri dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Malite na 2004, Sokhulu gosipụtara agwa ka'Cleo Khuzwayo' na Generations
N'afọ 2013, Sokhulu mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ, Felix, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka nne nke onye na-eto eto bu onye na-akpọ Sasofon
A họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na SAFTA na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Na 2007, o gosipụtara agwa dị ka 'Nomathemba' na Soap bụ Ubizo The Calling
Na 2008, o gosipụtara ka 'Pamela' na Sokhulu & Partners
A mụrụ Sokhulu na Septemba 13, 1976 na Durban, mana ọ nọrọ afọ ntolite ya na Umlazi
Ọ gara St
Anne's Diocesan College na Hilton, KwaZulu-Natal nso Pietermaritzburg (1990 ruo 1993) tupu ọ gaa Cambridge College na 1994 wee mụọ ejiji na Technikon Natal
Linda Rose Tripp ( née Carotenuto ; Nọvemba 24, 1949 - Eprel 8, 2020) bụ onye ọrụ obodo America nke rụrụ ọrụ ama ama na mkpesa Clinton –Lewinsky nke 1998
Omume Trip na nzuzo na-edekọ oku ekwentị nzuzo Monica Lewinsky gbasara mmekọrịta ya na Onye isi ala Bill Clinton mere ka ha nwee mmetụta na njikọ ha na Clinton v mbụ
Jones ikpe yana na mkpughe nke nkọwa chiri anya
Trip kwuru na ebumnobi ya bụ naanị ịhụ mba n'anya, na ọ gbanarịrị ụgwọ ekwentị site na ikwere inyefe teepu ndị ahụ
O mechara kwuo na mwepụrụ ya na Pentagon na njedebe nke ọchịchị Clinton bụ nkwụghachi ụgwọ, mana nchịkwa ahụ kpọrọ ya usoro ọkọlọtọ maka onye nhọpụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Site na 2004, Tripp na di ya, Dieter Rausch, nwere ma na-agba ọsọ ụlọ ahịa ezumike kwa afọ, The Christmas Sleigh, na Middleburg, Virginia
A mụrụ Tripp Linda Rose Carotenuto na Jersey City, New Jersey
Ọ bụ ada Albert Carotenuto, onye nkụzi mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na nwunye ya, Inge, bụ nwanyị German nke ọ zutere mgbe ọ bụ onye agha America nọ na Germany
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1968, mgbe ya na onye nkụzi ibe ya nwee mmekọrịta
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hanover Park High School na East Hanover, New Jersey na 1968 wee rụọ ọrụ dịka odeakwụkwọ na ọgụgụ isi ndị agha na Fort Meade, Maryland
Na 1971, ọ lụrụ Bruce Trip, onye ọrụ agha nke ya na ya nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1990
Onye ọrụ White House na ọchịchị George HW Bush, ọ debere ọrụ ya mgbe Bill Clinton ghọrọ onye isi ala na 1993

N'oge okpomọkụ nke 1994, ndị isi na-enyere aka na White House chọrọ ka a wepụ Trip na White House ma nyefee ya n'ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọha na eze na Pentagon, bụ nke welitere ụgwọ ọrụ ya site na $ 20,000
Tripp ghọrọ onye na-akpachi anya Monica Lewinsky, onye ọzọ bụbu onye ọrụ White House, mgbe ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọha na eze Pentagon
Dị ka Trip si kwuo, bụ onye dị ihe dị ka afọ 24 ka Lewinsky, ha amatala onwe ha otu afọ na ọkara tupu asịrị ahụ amalite iru n'ọkwa ya dị oke egwu

Mgbe Lewinsky kpugheere Tripp na ya na Clinton na-enwe mmekọrịta anụ ahụ, Tripp, na-eme ihe na ndụmọdụ nke onye na-ede akwụkwọ bụ Lucianne Goldberg, malitere na nzuzo na-edekọ mkparịta ụka ekwentị na Lewinsky ma na-agba Lewinsky ume ka ọ dee nkọwa banyere mmekọrịta ya na onyeisi oche

N'August 1997, Michael Isikoff sitere na Newsweek kọrọ na Trip kwuru na ya zutere Kathleen Willey na-apụta na Office Oval 'gbarụrụ' na 'ihu ya na-acha uhie uhie na lipstick ya gbapụrụ' Willey boro ya ebubo na Clinton kpagburu ya
Onye ọka iwu Clinton bụ Robert S
Bennett kwuru na akụkọ Newsweek, 'Linda Trip ekwesịghị ikwere'
Na Jenụwarị 1998, Tripp nyere onye ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya Kenneth Starr teepu maka mgbanwe maka mgbochi site na ikpe
Tripp kpughere Starr na ya maara mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Lewinsky na Clinton, na Lewinsky debere akwụkwọ ikike ụgha na-agọnahụ mmekọrịta ahụ na ụlọ ikpe gọọmenti etiti na Arkansas na Clinton v
Ikpe Jones, na na Lewinsky nwara ime ka Trip gbagha ụgha na uwe ahụ iji zoo ihe ọ maara banyere mmekọrịta Clinton-Lewinsky na nke Kathleen Willey n'ụlọ ikpe gọọmenti etiti
Dị ka Trip kọwara, a na-arịọ ya ka o mee mpụ iji zoo ihe akaebe na ikpe ikike obodo Jones
Ikpe Jones, gbara akwụkwọ na mbụ n'April 1994 site n'aka ndị ọka iwu ya Joseph Cammarata na Gilbert K
Davis, mechara rụpụta na mkpebi Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States na Clinton v
Jones kwuru na ndị isi ala US enweghị ihe mgbochi megide akwụkwọ ikpe obodo maka omume emere tupu ha ewee ọkwa na-enweghị njikọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Tripp gwakwara Starr maka ịdị adị nke uwe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke ndị agha mmiri Lewinsky nwere nke semen Clinton metọọ
N'oge ọbụbụenyi ha, Lewinsky egosila Trip uwe ma kwuo na ya bu n'obi ime ka ọ dị ọcha
Trip mere ka o kwenye ka ọ ghara ihicha ya

Dabere na teepu Tripp, Starr nwetara nkwado site n'aka Attorney General Janet Reno na ụlọ ikpe pụrụ iche na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya iji gbasaa nyocha Starr na mmekọrịta Clinton-Lewinsky, chọọ ihe ndị nwere ike ịgbagha ụgha, wee nyochaa Lewinsky maka ịgba akaebe ụgha na ịgbagha ụgha dị ka onye akaebe
n'okwu ikpe Paula Jones wetara megide Clinton
N'ikpeazụ, ma Clinton na Lewinsky ga-apụta n'ihu nnukwu ndị juri iji zaa ajụjụ, mana Clinton pụtara site na telivishọn mechiri emechi
Na mmechi nke ajụjụ Lewinsky, ndị jurors nyere Lewinsky ohere inye okwu ikpeazụ ọ bụla
Ọ sịrị, 'Akpọrọ m Linda Trip asị'

Tripp bụ onye bi na Hickory Ridge, Columbia, Maryland, mgbe ọ na-edekọ ihe ndekọ nke nzuzo nke mkparịta ụka ya na Lewinsky, na ndị Democrats 49 na Maryland Legislature bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi nye onye ọka iwu steeti ka ọ rịọ ka a kpee Tripp n'okpuru iwu wayatap Maryland

Tupu ikpe a, ụlọ ikpe steeti kpebiri na n'ihi nkwekọrịta mgbochi nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ha tinyere Tripp, Lewinsky na ndị ọzọ, nnukwu ihe akaebe na-egosi na ndị gbara akwụkwọ zubere iji mee ihe agaghị ekwe omume
N'okwu ikpe tupu ikpe, ndị ọka iwu kpọrọ Lewinsky dị ka onye akaebe ka ha nwaa igosipụta ma ọ bụrụ na enyochaghị akaebe ya megide Trip site na nyocha onye ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya

Agbanyeghị, ụlọ ikpe steeti Maryland kpebiri na Lewinsky, onye “kwetara na ọ ghaara iyi ụgha na usoro gọọmentị etiti wee kwuo na ịgha ụgha bụ akụkụ nke ndụ ya,” abụghị ihe a pụrụ ịdabere na ya yana na akaebe Lewinsky tụrụ aro megide Trip bụ “na-asachapụ na ya
ihe na-adịghị mma' N’ihi ya, a kagburu ebubo nile e boro Trip na May 26, 2000, mgbe ndị gbara akwụkwọ kpebiri na ha agaghị aga n’ihu n’ikpe ikpe ahụ
E jidere Trip na 1969 mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 na Greenwood Lake, New York, maka ebubo izu ohi $263 na ego yana otu elekere aka nke ruru ihe dị ka $600
A kagburu ebubo ndị ahụ tupu ha enwee ike ịbịa ikpe
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, Trip zara 'ee e' na ajụjụ a 'Ọ dịtụla mgbe e boro gị ebubo ma ọ bụ jide gị maka mpụ?' n'ụdị ya maka nchekwa nchekwa nke Ngalaba Nchebe US

Na Maachị 1998, obere oge tupu e mee Trip ka ọ pụta n'ihu ndị juri ukwu na nyocha Lewinsky, onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ nchekwa maka ọhaneze Kenneth Bacon na osote ya, Clifford Bernath, gbapụtara ka Trip si zaa ajụjụ ahụ nye Jane Mayer nke New Yorker
Ngalaba nchekwa wee wepụta ozi nzuzo ndị ọzọ sitere na ndị ọrụ Tripp na faịlụ nchekwa na mgbasa ozi akụkọ
Onye na-ahụ maka nchekwa na ngalaba nchekwa nyocha nyocha nke ntanye ahụ wee chọpụta na Bacon na Bernath emebiela Iwu Nzuzo nke 1974
Onye nyocha izugbe nke Ngalaba Nchebe US kwubiri na ma Bacon na Bernath kwesịrị ịma na mwepụta ozi sitere na faịlụ nchekwa Tripp ezighi ezi
Na Jenụwarị 19, 2001, ụbọchị ikpeazụ zuru oke nke nchịkwa Clinton, a chụrụ Trip n'ọrụ ya na Pentagon
O kwuru na nchụpụ ahụ bụ ịbọ ọbọ, mana gọọmentị Clinton kwuru na a na-agwa ndị niile na-ahọpụta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dịka Trip ka ha nyefee arụkwaghịm ha mgbe ọchịchị ọhụrụ ga-achị
Enwere ike ịchụpụ ndị jụrụ ime otú ahụ
Trip gbara Ngalaba Nchebe US na Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke US akwụkwọ maka ịhapụ ozi sitere na faịlụ nchekwa ya na faịlụ ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi megidere iwu nzuzo nke 1974
Na Nọvemba 3, 2003, Trip ruru nkwekọrịta na gọọmentị etiti
Nkwekọrịta ahụ gụnyere ịkwụ ụgwọ otu oge karịa $595,000; nkwalite na-eweghachi azụ; na ịkwụghachi ụgwọ n'ụgwọ kacha elu maka 1998, 1999 na 2000
O nwetakwara ụgwọ ezumike nka ma wepụta ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na gọọmentị etiti ọzọ
E chebere ikike ya ịnọ n'otu akụkụ nke mkpesa megide gọọmentị
Trip lụrụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ German Dieter Rausch na 2004
Di na nwunye ahụ bi na Middleburg, Virginia, ebe ha nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ahịa ezumike oyi nke German, nke a na-akpọ Christmas Sleigh
N'ọhụụ ya na Larry King na Larry King Live na Disemba 1, 2003, Trip kwuru banyere ibi na ọrịa ara ara
N'okwu gbasara mbuso agha nzuzo ya megide gọọmentị etiti, Trip kwuru na ọ pụtara n'azụ ego n'ihi ụgwọ ndị ọka iwu na mmebi nke ọrụ gọọmentị ya
O kwukwara na mmebi nke nzuzo Lewinsky na mmejọ nchịkwa nke Clinton nke nzuzo ya abụghị otu, n'ihi na nchịkwa nchịkwa nke Clinton gbasara akụkọ ọrụ ya bụ iwu na-akwadoghị
O kwuru na n'agbanyeghị na ntanye ekwentị ya bụkwa nke iwu na-akwadoghị, o nwere ike ịzenarị ikpe maka nke a site n'ịnara ihe mgbochi iji gbanwere akaebe ya
Na 2018, Trip kwuru na 'ọ bụ onye 'ezigbo teknụzụ dị elu (na-ezo aka nkwupụta Clarence Thomas kwuru na 1991)
Trip nwụrụ ka ọ nwesịrị ọgụ dị mkpirikpi nke ọrịa kansa pancreatic mgbe ọ dị afọ 70 na Eprel 8, 2020
John Goodman gosipụtara Tripp na eserese Saturday Night Live na-emegharị ugboro ugboro
Trip nwere mmetụta dị iche iche banyere mmetụta ahụ, na-ekwu na ọ masịrị ya ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ahụ, ma na-ekwu na ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye merụrụ mmetụta ya
Sarah Paulson gosipụtara Tripp na usoro telivishọn Impeachment American Crime Story nke ewepụtara na Septemba 7, 2021, na FX
Lindani Nkosi (amuru 5 Maachị 1968) bu onye omekorita South Africa nke gosiputara na otutu ihe onyonyo
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Lincoln Sibeko na opera ncha telivishọn Isidingo
Drum, ihe nkiri 2004 nke o mere Nelson Mandela, bụụrụ ya ọrụ ọzọ
Lindiwe Christabola Bebee bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide na National Council of Provinces kemgbe Mee na afọ 2019
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị nnọchi anya mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal
Site na Mee na afọ 2009 ruo Mee na afọ 2019, Bebee jere ozi dị ka onye otu KwaZulu-Natal Legislature
Site na afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2019, Bebee jere ozi dị ka onye otu KwaZulu-Natal Legislature maka African National Congress
A họpụtara Bebee ka ọ bụrụ onye National Council of Provinces mgbe ntuli aka nke 8 Mee 2019 gasịrị
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na 23 Mee, na afọ 2019
A họpụtara Bebee ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị nnọchi anya mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal
Na 24 Junn, e nyere ya ọrụ kọmitii ya
A họpụtara ya na Joint Standing Committee on Intelligence na Nọvemba na afọ 2019
Lindiwe Chibi (1976–2007), bụ onye mba South Africa bu nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri
N'ịbụ onye a na-ele anya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bu nwanyi gbaputara ihe na telivishọn South Africa, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya 'Doobsie' na usoro a ma ama Muvhango
Na 30 Eprel 2005, enyi ya nwoke Dan Mokoena, gbara ya egbe n'ihu mgbe Chibi nọ n'ụlọ nne ya
Mgbọ ahụ nke a no nso wee gbaa, banyere na ntì ya wee pụta n'azụ isi ya
E bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Garden City Clinic ma o nọrọ n'ụra ruo izu atọ
Mgbe o biliri n'ụra, ọ kpọnwụrụ n'akụkụ aka nri nke ahụ ya
N'oge ọ na-agbake site na mmerụ ahụ na-egbu egbu, ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa oyi otutu na Chris Hani-Baragwanath Hospital na Soweto n'afọ 2007 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ato n' otu
N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara na ihe nkiri Ekuseni nke emere na Civic Theatre
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ na egwuregwu ejije na Windybrow Theatre, ebe ọ natara onyinye maka Best Actress

Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke 'Stella Kowalski' na egwuregwu oge ochie, A Street Car Named Desire yana na The Pen na Molora O mere ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ 'Doobsie' na usoro telivishọn Muvhango Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, a mara ọkwa na onodu ya n' ejije alaala ezumike nká
N'ụbọchị nke ato n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ Market Theatre Foundation ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'elu iji kwanyere Chibi ùgwù
Lindiwe Mabuza (13 Ọgọst 1938 - 6 Disemba 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-ede uri, agụmakwụkwọ, onye nta akụkọ, na onye na-akwado ọdịbendị
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke gara n'ihu na-ejere obodo ya ozi dịka onye so na ndị omeiwu mbụ a họpụtara n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke South Africa
Ọ gara n'ihu ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya mba ụwa
O jere ozi na Board ndụmọdụ ndị okenye nke ntọala ifa Lethu nke na-eweghachite ihe osise South Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado mkpa Dramatic, ọrụ ebere sitere na United Kingdom na-akwalite nka okike maka ụmụaka, bụrụkwa onye otu Council ndụmọdụ nke ntọala Thabo Mbeki
Ọ jere ozi dịka onye isi oche nke Nelson Mandela Children's Fund UK
A mụrụ Mabuza na Newcastle, KwaZulu-Natal, na South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St Louis Betrand Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Newcastle
Ọ gara n'ihu ịga kọleji Roma dị na Lesotho wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke Arts
N'ihi mgba ọ na-agba iji nweta ọrụ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa, Mabuza kwagara Swaziland wee ghọọ onye nkuzi Bekee na Zulu
N'afọ 1964 ọ kwagara United States wee debanye aha na mahadum Stanford ebe ọ gụchara nzere masta na bekee
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta akara ugo mmụta nna ukwu ya nke abụọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Ọmụmụ America na Mahadum Minnesota
N'afọ 1968 ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Ngalaba Sociology na Mahadum Minnesota
N'afọ 1969 ọ sonyeere Mahadum Ohio dị ka onye enyemaka prọfesọ nke akwụkwọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mgbe e mesịrị na 1993 ọ nwetara diplọma na diplomacy na Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Ahụmahụ onwe ya banyere ikewapụ agbụrụ na South Africa, nke mere ka ọ hapụ South Africa, na ikpughe ya na ọnọdụ nke ndị Africa America na Civil Rights Movement kpaliri Mabuza ịbanye na mgba maka mgbapụta nke ndị ya na South Africa na Africa dị ka
otu dum
N'afọ 1975 ọ sonyeere African National Congress (ANC) wee kwaga Lusaka na Zambia
N'afọ 1977 ọ ghọrọ Editor nke Voice of Women, akwụkwọ akụkọ nwanyị maka ụmụ nwanyị na ANC
Ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ redio na onye mgbasa ozi na Radio Freedom, bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio ANC, na-esi na Zambia na-agbasa ruo ọtụtụ mba Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche kọmitii omenala ANC
N'afọ 1979 onye isi ANC mgbe ahụ Oliver Reginald Tambo kenyere Mabuza ka ọ mepee ụlọ ọrụ ANC na Scandinavia wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ANC na mba Scandinavian, bi na Stockholm, Sweden

Tambo gosipụtara n'okwu ya na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị ANC n'afọ na Angola na 'Comrade Lindiwe Mabuza kwara ákwá na akwa wee daa n'elu onwe ya mgbe ọ matara na a họpụtara ya onye isi oche ANC na mba Scandinavian

Ma, n'ileba anya na ndekọ ahụ, mmadụ ọ bụla nwere ike ime nke ọma?' N'oge ọ nọ na Sweden, ọ chịkọtara nkwado maka ANC ma wepụta ego maka ọrụ ANC n'ofe ụwa, karịsịa maka ndị South Africa a chụpụrụ na Zambia
Ọ durukwa mkpọsa ma na-agba mbọ maka ikewapụ South Africa site na mmachibido ahia ahia na nchụpụ
O mebere mmekọrịta siri ike na ndị Scandinavian ma dị nso na Prime Minister nke Sweden, Olof Palme, bụ onye bụ isi na-akwado ANC na iguzogide ọchịchị apartheid
Ọ ghọwo nnukwu ike megide ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na na Mọnde, 8 Septemba 1986, a tụrụ bọmbụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ANC nwere olileanya igbu ya na imebi ọrụ ọ na-arụ
Ka ọ na-erule oge Mabuza hapụrụ Scandinavia, ọ na-enwe ihe ịga nke ọma nke na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa nke ANC bụ́ nke o jisiri ike amụbawo gụnyere Finland, Denmark, na Norway
N'afọ 1986, e bufere Mabuza site na Sweden gaa United States ebe ọ jere ozi dịka onye isi nnọchi anya ANC
Site n'enyemaka nke ndị Swedes, Mabuza jisiri ike mepee ma rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ dabere na Washington, DC
Ọ bịarutere Amerịka obere oge ka gọọmentị Amerịka machibidoro Apartheid South Africa iwu
Ọ gara n'ihu na-abanye n'ụlọ nzukọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ America dị ka Jesse Jackson, Harry Belafonte, Jane Fonda na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
O nyere aka n'ọtụtụ mwepu, ngagharị iwe na mbọ ndị ọzọ iji mebie ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Mgbalị ya, site n'enyemaka nke òtù ndị ọzọ na kọleji America n'ofe America, dugara na Coca-Cola na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ewepụ ego ha na South Africa
Mgbe e mesịrị, mgbe a tọhapụrụ ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si Robben Island, gụnyere Nelson Mandela, Mabuza bụ isi n'ịhazi nleta mbụ Mandela na Amerika mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Lindiwe Mabuza nọrọla ọtụtụ afọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a họpụtara ya na nzuko omeiwu mbụ onye kwuo uche nke South Africa na-eje ozi n'okpuru Onyeisi Mandela
Ọchịchọ ya ka bụ diplomacy na otu ya, ugbu a ọchịchị ọhụrụ ANC, maara nke a
A họpụtara ya onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Germany na 1995
Ọ bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama na Jamanị n'ihi mbọ ya na-agba n'ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
E mere oriri na nkwari maka nsọpụrụ ya iji bịanye aka na Goldenes Buch [ de ] na Bremen City Hall, nsọpụrụ edoro naanị maka ndị isi ala
O sokwara onye isi ọchịchị German Helmut Kohl na nleta azụmahịa buru ibu na South Africa
N'afọ 1999, ọ ghọrọ South Africa High Commissioner na Malaysia na Brunei na Philippines
N'afọ 2001, ọ weghaara Cheryl Carolus dị ka onye isi South Africa High Commissioner na United Kingdom na Republic of Ireland, ozi o jidere ruo afọ 2009
N'ịkwado nkwa ya n'ịkwado njikọ dị n'etiti UK na South Africa, ọ natara 'Diplomat of the year from Africa award' site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Diplomat n'afọ 2009
Mabuza nwụrụ na 6 Disemba 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na atọ, na-arịa ọrịa kansa
Mabuza malitere ide abụ mgbe ọ tinyere aka na 'The Way Project' na United States na-agbalị ịmepụta mmemme nke nwere ike isi na ya ahapụ ụmụaka n'okporo ámá
Mgbe ọ bịarutere Zambia, ọ chọpụtara n'oge na-adịghị anya na ụmụ nwanyị ANC enweghị olu, ya mere ọ depụtara akwụkwọ uri ụmụ nwanyị ANC akpọrọ Malibongwe! Ụmụ nwanyị ANC Abụ bụ ngwa agha ha na 1978

Nhọrọ nke uri ya pụtakwara na Anta Sudan Katara Mberi na Cosmo Pieterse 's anthology Speak Easy, Speak Free (1977) na uri ya gụnyere na Barry Feinberg's anthology Poets to the People South African Freedom Poem (1980) na na Heinemann Akwụkwọ uri ụmụ nwanyị Africa (1995)

Nchịkọta nke ya bụ Akwụkwọ ozi Letta, 1991, nke ọ kpọrọ aha mgbe enyi ya hụrụ n'anya bụ onye na-agụ egwú Letta Mbulu, Voices That Lead Poems 1976-1996, Akpụkpọ ụkwụ na mkpịsị aka, nke e bipụtara na 2008, na Iji Sweden sitere na ANC, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1987
N'afọ 2007, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ụmụaka akpọrọ South African Animals nwere ihe atụ nke Alan Baker
Mabuza mekwara (ya na Pallo Jordan ) akwụkwọ Oliver Tambo Cheta, iji sọpụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ya na enyi ya Oliver Tambo
Akwụkwọ a bụ nchịkọta edemede nke ndị enyi Tambo na ndị ibe ya
O chekwara echiche iji chịkọta nchịkọta edemede na onye isi ala South Africa mbụ Thabo Mbeki, echiche na-eduga na onye na-ere ahịa kacha mma aha ya bụ Thabo Mbeki m maara

N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke narị ncheta ọmụmụ Tambo, o deziri olu Mkparịta ụka na Uncle OR Tambo Ncheta nwata na Mpụga, akwụkwọ ozi nke ndị edemede bụ ụmụaka n'oge Tambo bụ onyeisi oche nke ANC
Onye Ọkachamara Lindiwe Sibanda Majele Onye nduzi na Onye isi oche ARUA Centre of Excellence in Sustainable Food Systems (ARUA-SFS) Mahadum Pretoria South Africa
Onye Ọkachamara Lindiwe Majele Sibanda bụ onye sayensị na-ahụ maka usoro nri, onye na-akwado iwu na onye a tụkwasịrị obi na usoro nri

O nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ise nke ọrụ trans-disciplinary na ọrụ ugbo na mmepe ime obodo, mgbanwe na njikwa iwu ọha na eze na nke onwe, iri na ise n'ime ha nọ na ọkwa dị elu na ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ, sayensị, nke onwe na nke ọha
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na-ahụ maka teknụzụ na onye na-ahụkarị na mba ọzọ
N'ụwa niile, Onye Ọkachamara Lindiwe Majele Sibanda bụ onye ndú a ma ama ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta na onye ndụmọdụ maka ọtụtụ atụmatụ gbasara nchekwa nri mba ụwa

Ọ bụ onye na-eje ozi na SDG Target site na afo 2030 Champions 123, onye isi oche nke Global Alliance of Climate-Smart Agriculture, onye otu World Vegetable Board, na onye kọmishọna maka akụkọ EAT-Lancet na Sustainable Healthy Food Systems

N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu United Nations (UN) Committee for Policy Development (CDP), na African Union Commission (AUC) Leadership Council; prọfesọ mahadum na ọrụ ugbo, sayensị anụmanụ na sayensị ụmụ anụmanụ ma bụrụ onye nkuzi ọbịa na ọtụtụ mahadum

Ọ bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye maka enyemaka ya maka ọrụ ugbo na nchekwa nri n'Africa; gụnyere, Science Diplomacy Award site na Gọọmentị South Africa (2015); FARA Award for Exemplary leadership (2014); na Yara 2013 Prize Laureate; (2013)
O nwere BSc Degree Animal Production First Class Honours site na Mahadum Alexandria na Egypt na MSc na PhD, Mahadum Reading, UK
Ọ bụ onye nduzi na onye isi oche ugbu a, African Research Universities Alliance Centre of Excellence in Sustainable Food Systems (ARUA-SFS)
Ọrụ ugbo/Ọdịdị anụmanụ
1988 - Mahadum nke Reading, UK 1988, M
Sc Ọrụ ugbo/ Sayensị ahịhịa
1986 - Mahadum Alexandria, Egypt 1986 B
Ọrụ ugbo
Bekee, French, Arabic, Zulu, Shona

Lindiwe Nonceba Sisulu (amụrụ na 10 Mee 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye otu ndị omeiwu kemgbe 1994, na onye otu National Executive Committee nke African National Congress na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Njem kemgbe Ọgọst 2021
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ụlọ (2004 ruo 2009), Minista nke Nchebe na Ndị Agha (2009 ruo 2012), Minista na-ahụ maka Ọrụ Ọha na Nchịkwa site na 2012 ruo 2014
na Minista nke Ebe obibi mmadụ, Mmiri na Ahụike site na 2014 ruo 2021
A mụrụ Sisulu n'aka ndị isi mgbanwe Walter na Albertina Sisulu na Johannesburg
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye nta akụkọ Zwelakhe Sisulu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Max Sisulu
Site na 1975 ruo 1976, e jidere Sisulu maka ọrụ ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ ndụ site na 1977 ruo 1979 ọ sonyeere ngalaba agha nke ANC, Umkhonto we Sizwe, ọkachamara na Intelligence
N'afọ 1973, Lindiwe Sisulu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Waterford Kamhlaba United World College of Southern Africa na Mbabane, Swaziland
N'afọ 1980, Sisulu nwetara nzere BA na Diploma na Education, na 1981 natara BA Hons na History na Mahadum Swaziland
O nwetakwara MA na akụkọ ihe mere eme, na 1989 MPhil site na Centre for Southern African Studies na Mahadum York na UK
N'etiti afọ 1980, Sisulu rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Manzini Teachers Training College
N'afọ otu puku , narị itoolu na iri itoolu ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-enyere Jacob Zuma aka na ọrụ nzuzo nke ANC
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ, 'The Times of Swaziland', Mbabane, Swaziland (1983)
Chief Examiner, History for Junior Certificate Examinations Syndicate na Botswana, Lesotho na Swaziland (1985 - 1987)
Onye ndụmọdụ nke National Children's Rights Committee, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO) (1992)
O guzobere Ọmụmụ Nchịkwa Ndị Uwe Ojii na PDM, Mahadum nke Witwatersrand (1993)
A họpụtara Sisulu na gọọmentị dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ n'afọ 1996, na-eje ozi ruo n'afọ 2001
Mgbe ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa, ọ họpụtara Tony Yengeni na Kọmitii Nnyocha Nchebe

Ọ dịla anya a na-ewere Sisulu dị ka onye nwere ike ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na 2007 na 2012, ọ kwupụtara mkpọsa onye isi ala ya na July 21 na Walter Sisulu square na Kliptown, ebe a nabatara Charter Freedom
Sisulu nakweere okwu 'Ọ ga-abụrịrị' ebe ọ kpọrọ ndị na-akwado ya ka ha sonyere ya na mkpọsa 'ga-eme'
Mgbe ọ kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala, o kwuru, sị 'Ihe anyị ga-eme bụ ime ka ANC dị ọcha ma weghachite ụkpụrụ mbụ ya'
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2017, Sisulu si n'asọmpi onye isi ala pụọ, na-ahọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye osote onye isi ala
David Mabuza meriri ya

Mgbe Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa kwupụtara kansụl ya gbanwere agbanwe, a kpọpụrụ Sisulu na Ngalaba nke Human Settlements gaa na Ngalaba Mmekọrịta na Mmekọrịta Mba Nile, na-anọchi Maite Nkoana-Mashabane
Ọrụ ụlọ Lindiwe Sisulu nke a na-akpọ N2 Gateway etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ esemokwu
Ndị bi na Joe Slovo Informal Settlement jụrụ ka a kpọga ha na Delft, Cape Town, iji mee ka ụgwọ gọọmentị na ụlọ n'efu

Mgbe ndị bi na Joe Slovo mere ngagharị iwe, Sisulu nwetara nkatọ dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị otu obodo maka ịsị 'ọ bụrụ na ha ahọrọ ịghara imekọ ihe ọnụ na gọọmentị, a ga-ewepụ ha kpamkpam na ndepụta ụlọ niile na-echere'
Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ozi ndị Sisulu na UWC Prọfesọ Martin Legassick na-agbanwerịta nlebara anya n'ihi na Legassick jụrụ Sisulu izute ndị bi na Joe Slovo
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007, N2 Gateway bụkwa ebe obibi kachasị n'ụlọ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ ịkwaga ọtụtụ puku ezinụlọ n'ime Mpaghara Mpaghara Na-agafe Oge na n'okporo ụzọ Symphony Way
Na Septemba 2009, ọ họpụtara Paul Ngobeni dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu ya
Sisulu banyere n'ime esemokwu na Nọvemba 2012 mgbe ndị omeiwu boro ya ebubo na ọ na-eji ụgbọ elu ụgbọ elu ndị isi mee ihe n'oge ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa na ndị agha
E boro ya ebubo na ya na ndị agha ụgbọelu South African na-agbazite ụgbọelu Gulfstream na-eme njem 203 ma n'ihi ọdịda nchịkwa, ọnụ ọgụgụ a ezighi ezi ma rịọ mgbaghara mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
O mere naanị njem iri atọ na ise n'ezie
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ , ọ họpụtara Menzi Simelane dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu ya

N'ikpe (n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2012) nke na-achọpụta na ọ gaghị eru ka a họpụta ya dị ka onye isi nke National Prosecuting Authority, Onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe iwu Zac Jacoob kwuru '[Anyị] kwubiri na ihe akaebe ahụ na-emegiderịta onwe ya na ihu ya na-egosi ịkwụwa aka ọtọ Maazị Simelane
Ọ na-ewelite ajụjụ siri ike banyere akọ na uche Maazị Simelane, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe, na ntụkwasị obi
Lindiwe Daphney Zulu (amụrụ na 21 Eprel 1958) bụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Onye isi ala na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nkwukọrịta maka nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị Africa PAN na Angola na 1988
N'afọ 1989, ọ kwagara Lusaka, Zambia ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa onye isi nkwukọrịta na ngalaba ANC nke Religious Affairs
N'afọ 1990, ọ kwagara Uganda ebe ọ bụ onye isi nkwukọrịta na onye nchịkwa n'ọfịs ANC
N'afọ 1991, ọ laghachiri South Africa wee bụrụ onye isi nkwurịta okwu na ANC Women's League
A họpụtara ya na Ngalaba Ozi na Mgbasa Ozi nke ANC dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya mbụ
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Gauteng Legislature na 1995 a họpụtara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke Gauteng Legeslature
N'afọ 1999 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi
N'afọ 2001, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa maka Western na Central Africa ruo n'afọ 2003 ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịk nke gọọmentị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa, Vodacom group
N'afọ 2004, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Brazil
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmitii nke mba ANC
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Ms Zulu ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu dị ka onye omeiwu na National Assembly
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Mmepe Ọha
A mụrụ Zulu na 21 Eprel 1958 n'obodo nta Nhlazatshe, Eastern Transvaal (nke bụzi Mpumalanga); Otú ọ dị, e bibiri obodo ahụ n'ala n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
A manyere ndị obodo ahụ iguzobe ụlọ ọhụrụ na Madadeni, Newcastle nke dị na bantustan KwaZulu
Otú ọ dị, nne na nna Zulu, kwagara ezinụlọ ha na Swaziland ebe nne ya bụ onye Swazi si Gege
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Theresa na Mjingo tupu ọ gaa Swaziland Cooperative Development College na Ezulwini
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere African National Congress wee gaa mba ọzọ na Mozambique
Zulu gara Solomon Mahlangu Freedom College, SOMAFCO, na Mazimbu, Tanzania tupu ọ nweta agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ akwụkwọ akụkọ na USSR
Ọ nọrọ afọ asaa na Moscow, nweta nzere masta na Journalism na asụsụ Russian
N'afọ 1987, ọ gara Angola maka ọzụzụ agha zuru oke na Pan Africanist Women's Organisation
Zulu si mba ọzọ lọta n'afọ 1992 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nkwukọrịta na ANC Women's League
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu kọmitii na 1993
N'afọ 1993, a kwadoro ya na ngalaba ozi na mgbasa ozi nke ANC dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ntuli aka ahụ
N'afọ 1994, ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu Gauteng Provincial Legislature ma họpụta ya dịka osote onye isi oche n'afọ 1995
Site na 1999 ruo 2001 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Site na 2001 ruo 2003 ọ bụ Chief Director maka ọdịda anyanwụ na etiti Africa na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ
N'afọ 2004, e zigara ya na Brazil dị ka onye nnọchi anya South Africa ruo afọ anọ na ọkara
Kemgbe afọ 2009 ọ bụ onye omeiwu ANC
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya na Kọmitii Ọrụ Mba nke ANC
Kemgbe afọ 2014 ọ nọ n'ọkwa Minista nke Mmepe Obere Azụmaahịa
N'afọ 2018, e wepụrụ ya n'ịgha ụgha banyere ịzụta ụgbọala ndị minista nke a na-ebo ebubo na ọ furu R31m, mana n'ezie ọ furu R18m
Zulu nwere ụmụ anọ ụmụ nwanyị Nokuthula na Phindile, na ụmụ nwoke Sipho na Boitumelo
Zulu lụrụ Kgosietsile Itholeng, onye South Africa ibe ya nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya, onye ọ zutere na Angola
A na-akpọ nwa ya nwoke, Sipho, aha nna ya
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye otu Pan African Congress
Àtụ Jacob Zuma cabinet 2Àtụ Ramaphosa first cabinetÀtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Lindsay Lindley (amụrụ na 10 June 1989) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ nke amụrụ na America bụ onye ọkachamara na 100m hurdles
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijirịa na 2015 World Championships in Athletics mgbe Athletics Federation of Nigeria họpụtara ya
N'afọ 2015, o kwuru na ọ bụ ọla nchara na 100 mita hurdles na 2015 All-Africa Games
Lindsay Lohan's Indian Journey bụ ihe nkiri British nke afọ 2010 nke Maninderpal Sahota duziri ma mepụta
Ọ bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri Lindsay Lohan gosipụtara ma kọọ ya
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ dị otu awa, Lohan na-agwa ndị na-azụ ahịa mmadụ na Delhi, Kolkata na obodo nta dị na West Bengal okwu
Ọ na-agwakwa onye bụbu onye na-azụ ahịa mmadụ, ndị nne na nna nke ụmụaka a na-azụ ahịa ma na-eleta ebe obibi ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka Sanlaap na Kolkata
E mere ihe nkiri a na India n'ime otu izu na Disemba 2009
Lohan tinyere aka na ọrụ ahụ mgbe ọ zutere Sahota na mmemme mmekọrịta ma gosipụta mmasị isonye
Lindsay Lohan's Indian Journey nwetara ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na-adịghị mma kemgbe ọ malitere
Mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi ahụ asụgharịghị ọkwa dị elu
Ndị nkatọ jara ihe nkiri ahụ mma maka nyocha nke ọma ma na-akpali akpali, mana ha chọpụtara na ọnụnọ Lohan bụ ihe ijuanya ma na-adọpụ uche
Na Lindsay Lohan's Indian Journey, Lohan zutere ma gbaa ndị na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ajụjụ ọnụ na Delhi, Kolkata na obodo nta dị na West Bengal
Ha na-ekwu banyere mmegbu na mmegbu ha nwetara, na-akọwa ịgba ohu mmekọahụ, mmetọ anụ ahụ na ihe isi ike n'ime ka ndị na-azụ ahịa ha nweta ikpe ziri ezi
Ọ na-agwakwa onye bụbu onye na-azụ ahịa na ndị nne na nna nke ụmụaka na-azụ ahịa okwu
Otu nwata nwoke a na-azụ ahịa na-ekwu na ọ pụghị ịlaghachi n'ụlọ n'ihi na nne ya na-arịa ọrịa
Otu nne nke na-azụ ahịa nwa ya nwanyị na-akọwa otú ezinụlọ ya si ghara inwe nri zuru ezu, na otú ọ bụ ezie na ha enwetaghị ụgwọ e kwere ná nkwa maka ọrụ nwa ya nwanyị, ọ dịkarịa ala, a na-enye ya nri
Lohan gara ụlọ ọrụ Sanlaap, ebe obibi ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na Kolkata
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ọgwụgwọ ịgba egwu dị ka akụkụ nke ọgwụgwọ ha na otu ụmụ agbọghọ na-agba egwu ha rụgharịrị
Ọ na-agwa ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ejidere n'ụlọ akwụna okwu ma ha na-akọwa na e dinara ha n'ike ma nye ha ọgwụ ọjọọ
Onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ Sanlaap na-akọwa otú Lohan si nwee mmasị na ịzụ ahịa nwere ike isi kpalie ndị na-eto eto ndị ọzọ itinye aka na imegide mmegbu
Bharti Ali, onye nduzi nke Non-governmental organization Centre for Child Rights, na-akatọ gọọmentị maka ịghara ibute nchedo ụmụaka ụzọ
N'ịlaghachi n'ụlọ, ndị na-ese foto paparazzi na-achụ Lohan na ndị ọrụ ihe nkiri ahụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu

Mgbe ọnwa abụọ gasịrị, Lohan nọ na London, England na-agwa Kate Redman, si Save the Children UK, onye na-akọwa otú otu n'ime nsogbu na ntinye aka gọọmentị bụ na ọ bụ naanị mmekọahụ na ịzụ ahịa ọgwụ ọjọọ bụ iwu na-akwadoghị
Ọ na-akwadokwa ime ka a mara nsogbu ndị metụtara ịzụ ahịa
'Ịchọta onye a ma ama nke na-eche banyere okwu ahụ n'ezie na-enyere aka ịdọta ìgwè mmadụ na-agaghị agbanwe agbanwe
Mana ị ga-akpachara anya
Ọ bụrụ na ị nweta mgbazinye-a-celeb, ndị na-ege ntị nwere ike ịhụ ya otu maịl
Ajụla m akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ama ama na-eduzi karịa ka m tinyegoro na ọwa'
Danny Cohen na-ekwu maka ihe kpatara eji họrọ Lohan iweta akwụkwọ akụkọ
Lohan tinyere aka na ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe ọ zutere Sahota na mmemme mmekọrịta ma gosipụta mmasị ya ime ya
Sahota kwuru na ọ na-eche na Lohan họọrọ isonye na ihe nkiri ahụ 'n'ihi ịrụ ọrụ n'ụwa okenye kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ na-eche na nwata dị oké ọnụ ahịa, mgbe ị tụfuru otu ị gaghị anọchi afọ ndị ahụ
' O kwukwara na ndị ha zutere n'ime ime obodo India amachaghị Lohan na mbụ
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ nke ịme ihe nkiri ahụ, Lohan dere ozi na akaụntụ Twitter ya na-ekwu, sị 'Ihe karịrị ụmụaka iri anọ zọpụtara ruo ugbu a
N'ime ọrụ otu ụbọchị
' Òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị India, Bachpan Bachao Andolan, kwuru na ọ bụghị akụkụ nke mwakpo ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha ma na-eyi egwu ime ihe iwu kwadoro maka ọkwa ahụ
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Lohan dere ọzọ na Twitter na-eto ọrụ Bachpan Bachao Andolan
E bu ụzọ mee atụmatụ na ọ ga-anọ maka mwakpo ahụ, mana n'ihi mmegharị oge rutere mba ahụ n'oge
E mekwara ndokwa ka Lohan gbaa onye nnọchi anya UNICEF ajụjụ ọnụ maka ihe nkiri ahụ, mana ọ bịaghị

Banyere ahụmịhe ya na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ, Lohan kwuru, sị 'ike nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ agbọghọ m zutere na-eweda onwe m ala n'ezie' na 'Enwere m olileanya na ọnụnọ m na India ga-eme ka a mara ihe ndị dị mkpa e welitere n'ime ihe nkiri a
Mana esemokwu nke Lindsay Lohan's Indian Journey kpatara
adabaghị na ọkwa ya
O nwere òkè 09% nke ndị na-ege ntị n'etiti 9pm na 10pm
Ndị nkatọ jara Lindsay Lohan's Indian Journey mma maka nyocha nke ọma na ịmanye, mana ha chọpụtakwara na ọnụnọ Lohan bụ ihe ijuanya
Na kọlụm Lost in Showbiz ya na The Guardian, Marina Hyde katọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ ugboro ugboro, ọkachasị nhọrọ itinye Lohan, kemgbe ọ malitere
Ọ na-ekwu banyere ikpe Lohan n'oge na-adịbeghị anya maka 'ịkwọ ụgbọala na-aṅụ mmanya na ịnwe ọgwụ ọjọọ', na-akọwa ya dị ka 'kpakpando ụgbọ okporo ígwè' nke nwere '[ọrụ]

Amelia Gentleman nke The Guardian kọwara Lohan dị ka 'onye a maara nke ọma maka ihe a na-akpọ euphemistically ndụ nnọkọ' ma kwuo na ọ bụ ezie na òkè ya wetara mgbasa ozi na ọrụ ahụ, nlebara anya ahụ adịghị mma na banyere onye ya, ọ bụghị nsogbu
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, o kwuru na 'ihe ndị ahụ dị ike ma na-eme ka mmadụ kwenye,' mana na Lohan bụ 'onye na-adọpụ uche mgbe niile'
Sam Wollaston nke The Guardian dere akwụkwọ ozi na-atọ ọchị, na-akwa emo site n'echiche nke Lohan 'A na-eziga ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụaka ndị a ịrụ ọrụ mgbe ha dị obere
Nke m nwere ike ịkọ n'ihi na amalitere m ịrụ ọrụ dị ka nwa nlereanya mgbe m dị afọ atọ, wee banye na ihe nkiri mgbe m dị afọ iri na otu
Enwere m ike, dị ka, ịghọta ebe ndị a si abịa
Andrew Billen nke The Times kọwara ihe nkiri a dị ka 'agụmakwụkwọ mmetụta uche' na 'ọrụ ngwa ngwa'
O kwuru na kama igosipụta mpụ nke ịzụ ahịa, 'a tụgharịrị anya n'ụzọ dị irè na Lohan ma n'okpuru ya, ọ kwụsịrị'
Na nyocha na The Times, Caitlin Moran dere na juxtaposition nke Lohan na nhụjuanya mmadụ nke ịzụ ahịa mere maka 'usoro ihe omume na-enweghị atụ, nke na-agbagwoju anya'
Alice-Azania Jarvis nke The Independent chọpụtara na ihe nkiri ahụ 'nke a chịkọtara nke ọma, nke a nyochara nke ọma, ma na-akpali akpali' ma kwuo na itinye Lohan 'n'ezie ọ bụghị nhọrọ dị egwu
Naanị nke na-enweghị atụ
Lindsey Chukwufumnanya Abudei, onye a maara dịka Lindsey Abudei, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye n'ede egwu na Naijiria
Ọ malitere idekọ ma nwee jam sessions na MI Abaga nakwa Jesse Jagz mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ iwu n'afọ 2014
Abudei ewepụtala ọrụ abụọ n'onwe ya; Brown The EP (2013) nakwaBass bụkwa Eze Nwanyị [Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji]
Onye nke mpaghara Delta Steeti, Naijiria ndị na-asụ Igbo, a mụrụ Abudei ma zụlite ya na Jos
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'iwu na Mahadum Jos mana o kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ n'egwu mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Abudei n'aka ndị nne na nna n'etinye aka n'egwu n'oge ha bụ nwata
Ọ họọrọ ime egwu neo-soul na R&B mgbe ọ nụsịrị ndị na-agụ egwu dịka Stevie Wonder, Roberta Flack, Sade, Prince, Nat King Cole, REM
Skeeter Davis, Andy Williams, The Beach Boys nakwa Omar Lye-Fook
N'afọ 2004, Abudei malitere idekọ egwu ya na MI, Jesse Jagz nakwa Ruby Gyang (ndị nọ n'okpuru Loopy Records n'oge ahụ) mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Jos
N'afọ 2010, ọ gara nyocha maka oge nke atọ nke Project Fame West Africa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ ikpo okwu ahụ dị ka onye a chụpụrụ n'oge mbụ, o jisiri ike dọta ndị na-akwado ya
Abudei nwere oge dị mkpirikpi na The Jazzcats, otu egwu jazz
Ọ gbazinyere olu ya nye MI's 'Jehovah', egwu sitere na album studio mbụ ya Talk About It
Ọ gbazinyekwara olu ya nyekwa DJinee's 'Thank You' nakwa Jesse Jagz's 'This Jagged Life'
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, Abudei wepụtara egwu asatọ ya bụ EP Brown n'onwe ya
Stylized dị ka Brown The EP, EP nwere egwu bonus atọ ma Atta Lenell, Jesse Jagz nakwa IBK mepụtara ya
Brown nwetara nkwado site n'egwu ndị a na-akpọ 'Drift Away,The 90s Song' nakwa 'Out the Magazine'
O nwekwara nsụgharị mkpuchi nke 'Jailer' nke Aṣa nakwa 'Trouble Sleep, Yanga Go Wake Am' nke Fela Kuti
Abudei malitere idekọ afere egwu studio mbụ yaBass bụkwa Eze Nwanyị n'afọ 2014
Ọ gbara vidiyo egwu maka 'Out the Magazine' ya na Kemi Adetiba n'afọ 2015
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, ọ kpughere afere egwu ahụ na Twitter ma kwupụta n'ọga agụnye egwu iri na abụọ
N'afọ 2017, Abudei banyere n'ụlọ egwu na New York wee ghọọ onye Art OMI Music Fellow
Abudei dekọrọ 'Abụ Ya', solo acoustic nke pụtara n'afere egwu studio nke asaa nke Brymo Yellow (2020)
Tupu idekọ 'Abụ Ya', ọ wepụtara egwu abụọ n'ime afọ anọ
N'Aprel 3, 2020, Abudei wepụtara 'One on the Outside', egwu ọzọ sitere na egwuregwu ya n'abịanụ Kaleidoscope
Egwú Abudei bụ ngwakọta nke mkpụrụ obi ọhụrụ na egwu ọzọ
A kọwaala ụda ya [onye?] dị ka ihe niile site na 'nnụnụ na-abụ abụ ruo onye na-abụ egwu, na-atọ ụtọ ruo ụda, mmetụta na-akpali ọbụna na-agagharị n'ụwa n'enweghị mgbalị'
Ọ na-ekwu na Stevie Wonder, Norah Jones, Sade, Eva Cassidy, Roberta Flack dị ka ụfọdụ n'ime mmetụta egwu ya
Àtụ Project Fame West Africa
Lindsey Collen (amuru 1948 Mqaduli, Umtata, Transkei, South Africa) bu onye ode akwukwo Mauritius, na onye na-akwado ya
Ọ meriri 1994 na 2005 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, Best Book, Africa
Ọrụ ya apụtala na New Internationalist
Ọ bụ onye otu Lalit de Klas
Ọ lụrụ Ram Seegobin
O bi na Mauritius
Lindy Wilson bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa sitere na Democratic Alliance
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly nke South Africa kemgbe afọ 2014
Wilson bụ ugbu a osote minista ahụike, onye nnọchi anya Siviwe Gwarube
Àtụ South African Shadow CabinetÀtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Linet Chepkwemoi Masai (amụrụ na 5 Disemba 1989) bụ onye Kenya ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na track na cross country running events
O meriri n'asọmpi ụwa mbụ ya na 10,000 mita na 2009 World Championships in Athletics
Masai ghọrọ onye mmeri ụwa nke ụmụ okorobịa na-agafe mba na 2007 ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ụwa maka mita 10,000 na 2008 Summer Olympics, na-etinye nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ

N'afọ 2017, e nyere ya ihe nrite ọla nchara nke Olimpik mgbe onye mbụ nwetara ọlaọcha Elvan Abeylegesse nwalere ihe na-egosi steroid a machibidoro iwu na nyocha nke doping ya na 2007, ya mere Masai ghọrọ nwanyị Kenya mbụ nwetara ihe nrite na ihe omume Olimpik 10,000m
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na IAAF World Cross Country Championships ugboro atọ n'usoro site na 2009 ruo 2011
Na 2011 World Championships in Athletics, ọ meriri nrite nke abụọ ya n'ụwa, na-ewere nke atọ na 10,000 m
A mụrụ Masai n'obodo Kapsokwony, Mount Elgon District, a zụlitere ya n'obodo Bugaa, nke dị kilomita anọ
A mụrụ ya na John Barasa Masai na Leonida Cherop, ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ iri
Ọ gara Kapsagom Primary School na Bishop Okiring Secondary school ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ na afọ 2005, mgbe nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Moses Ndiema Masai meriri mita 5000 na 10,000 na African Junior Championships, na-enwe olileanya na ọ ga-eṅomi ihe ịga nke ọma ya
Ụmụnne ya ndị obere Dennis, Ndiema na Magdaline bụkwa ndị na-agba ọsọ
Nna ha John Barasa Masai bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ, ebe Ben Jipcho bụ nwanne nna ha dị anya
Ọ nọ na ogige ọzụzụ PACE Sports Management na Kaptagat
O meriri n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2007 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke emere na Mombasa, Kenya
Ọ mechara nke anọ na ule Kenya maka afo 2007 World Championships 5000 mita ọsọ, na-efu tiketi Osaka
Otú ọ dị, o meriri na afọ 2007 IAAF World Athletics Final, nweta ebe nke anọ abụọ (3000 na 5000 mita)
Afọ ọganihu ya bịara n'afọ 2008
N'oge opupu ihe ubi, o ritere ọla nchara na asọmpi ndị okenye na afo 2008 World Cross Country Championships
N'oge okpomọkụ, ọ gara asọmpi n'egwuregwu Olimpik, na-emecha nke atọ na mita 10,000 na ndekọ ọhụrụ nke ụwa nke 30 2650 nkeji
Huina Xing nke China setịpụrụ ndekọ gara aga (30 3155) na 2003
Ọ bụkwa ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Kenya, ihe ndekọ gara aga (30 3026) bụ nke Edith Masai nwere ma setịpụ ya na 2005
Ihe ndekọ mba Masai guzo ihe na-erughị otu afọ, ebe ọ bụ na onwa nke isii, na afọ 2009 Florence Kiplagat biputere 30 1153 na Utrecht, Netherlands
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2009, Masai meriri Meselech Melkamu nke Etiopia na ngwụcha nke mita 10,000 na 2009 IAAF World Championships in Athletics nke emere na Berlin, Germany
Onye na-achị 10,000 mita Olympic na onye mmeri ụwa Tirunesh Dibaba bụ onye a chụpụrụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
E nyekwara ya onyinye Race Results Weekly Female Runner of the Year na onyinye Kenyan Sportswoman of the Year n'afọ 2009

Ọ malitere ịhazi mkpọsa ya na afọ 2010 World Cross Country site na mmeri na Cross Internacional Valle de Llodio na Cross Internacional de Soria, na-emeri ndị ọzọ n'ọhịa site n'ebe dị anya n'oge abụọ ahụ
Mmeri na Cross Internacional de Itálica n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe o gosipụtara ikike ya na mpaghara Spanish n'afọ ahụ
Na afọ 2010 World Cross Country Championships, ọ malitere n'ụzọ siri ike wee malite iwulite ụzọ na agba ikpeazụ
Otú ọ dị, Emily Chebet meriri ya site na ịgba ọsọ ọsọ, na-ahapụ Masai dị ka onye nke abụọ na nke abụọ n'ime ọtụtụ afọ
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, o mere nke mbụ ya na NYRR New York Mini 10K esusu asọmpi mbụ ya n'ala America
Masai meriri Emily Chebet na ihe omume ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ iji nweta mmeri n'oge nke 30 48
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ debanyere aha maka Women's 5K Challenge na London ma merie Sylvia Kibet iji merie asọmpi ahụ, na-agbanwe ọnọdụ ha site na asọmpi nke afọ gara aga
Ọ banyere 10,000m na 2010 African Championships in Athletics mana Tirunesh Dibaba gbachitere aha ya mgbe onye Kenya ahụ ji ọla nchara pụọ
Na Memorial van Damme (nke ikpeazụ maka afọ 2010 IAAF Diamond League) ọ mechara nke atọ dị ka onye obodo ya Vivian Cheruiyot weghaara aha ihe omume mmeghe
Ọ meghere oge ya na mmeri na Cross de l'Acier na Nọvemba
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ụmụ nwanyị na Great Edinburgh Cross Country na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 2011, mana ọ ghaghị ịghọ onye nke abụọ na Cross de Itálica n'azụ Cheruiyot
O meriri Cheruiyot iji merie na Kenyan Cross Country Championships ma tinye anya ya n'aha ụwa, na-ekwu na ọ nọgidere na-ewe iwe maka ịghara imeri na asọmpi abụọ gara aga
Ọ laghachiri dị ka onye mmeri New York Mini na June na ọkara nkeji iji hapụ onye nke abụọ Aheza Kiros
Na afọ 2011 IAAF Diamond League circuit ọ nọ n'elu atọ na Shanghai, Eugene, na nke ikpeazụ na Zürich, mana ọ nọ n-esote Vivian Cheruiyot, onye gbachitere aha 5000m ya
Na afọ 2011 World Championships in Athletics, Masai banyere na 5000 m na 10,000 m
Cheruiyot gbochiri mgbalị ya ịgbachitere n'ebe dị anya a kụrụ Masai n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na njedebe ọsọ, ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ akụkụ nke otu ndị Kenya na-achịkwa nke were ebe anọ kachasị elu
Ọ nọ n'etiti ndị na-ebute ụzọ na ọsọ 5000m, mana e meriri ya ọzọ na njedebe ikpeazụ, na-ahapụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke isii
Oge ya na-agafe mba malitere nke ọma ka ọ meriri Cross de Atapuerca na Cross de Itálica site na nnukwu mmeri
Ọ gwụchara n'azụ Cheruiyot na Joyce Chepkirui na World's Best 10K na Febụwarị
O nwere mmeri dị mma na Great Manchester Run na Mee
O nweghị ike ịmecha asọmpi ule 10,000m nke Kenya na June, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ oge mbụ kemgbe afọ 2008 na ọ gaghị asọmpi mba ụwa na ihe omume ahụ
Ọnọdụ nke asaa na 5000m na ule Olympic nke Kenya pụtara na ọ gaghị asọmpi na Olympic n'ihe omume ọ bụla
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ na London Grand Prix na Julaị na ọ bụ naanị 5000m ọzọ n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Cross de Atapuerca na San Silvestre Vallecana

Lingala (Ngala) (Lingala Lingála) bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Democratic Republic of the Congo, ọkara ugwu nke Republic of the Kongo, n'isi obodo ha, Kinshasa na Brazzaville, yana n'ókè dị ala na Angola, Central African Republic na ndịda South Sudan

Lingala nwere nde mmadụ iri na ise na iri abụọ na-asụ asụsụ nke abụọ na ihe dị ka nde mmadụ iri abụọ na ise na-asụrụ asụsụ nke abụọ, maka ngụkọta nke nde mmadụ iri anọ wee rue na ise na ise na na-asọpụta asụsụ
Tupu 1880, Bobangi bụ asụsụ azụmahịa dị mkpa na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke osimiri Congo, kpọmkwem n'etiti Stanley Pool (Kinshasa) na njikọ nke osimiri Congo na Ubangi
Mgbe na mbido afọ 1880, ndị Europe mbụ na ndị agha ha nke West na East Africa malitere ịtọ ntọala steeti maka eze Belgium n'akụkụ osimiri a, ha chọpụtara ojiji na ùgwù nke Bobangi

Ha gbalịrị ịmụta ya, mana naanị ha na-eche banyere inweta ihe ọmụma na-ezughị oke banyere ya, usoro nke mere ka e nwee ụdị ọhụrụ, nke a gbanwere nke ọma, nke a na-akpọ 'asụsụ azụmahịa', 'asụsụ nke osimiri', 'Bobangi-pidgin' na ndị ọzọ

N'afọ 1884, ndị Europe na ndị agha ha webatara ụdị Bobangi a gbanwere agbanwe na Bangala Station dị mkpa, ya bụ, iji soro ndị Congo nọ n'ógbè ahụ kwurịta okwu, ụfọdụ n'ime ha nwere ihe ọmụma asụsụ nke abụọ nke Bobangi mbụ, yana ọtụtụ ndị Congo si n'ókè ndị ozi ala ọzọ na ndị na-achị ala ọzọ na-ebugharị na ọdụ ahụ site n'ike

N'ihi ya, n'oge na-adịghị anya, a gbanwere aha asụsụ osimiri ahụ ka ọ bụrụ 'Bangala', akara ndị Europe ejirila kemgbe 1876 dị ka aha dị mma, mana nke na-ezighị ezi na nke na-abụghị nke mbụ na mbụ, iji mee ka ndị Congo niile nọ n'ógbè ahụ jikọta ọnụ n'agbụrụ

N'ihe dị ka 1901-2, ndị ozi ala ọzọ CICM malitere ọrụ iji 'sachaa' asụsụ Bangala iji mee ka ọ dị ọcha site na 'ihe na-adịghị ọcha', ihe ndị yiri pidgin ọ nwetara mgbe ọ pụtara na Bobangi na mbido afọ 1880
Meeuwis (2020 24-25) dere, sị

N'ihe dị ka na n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe 1901, ọtụtụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ Katọlik na ndị Protestant na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na n'ebe ugwu Congo Free State, n'enweghị ibe ha mana n'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, kpebiri na Bangala dị ka ọ mepụtara site na Bobangi bụ asụsụ dị ka ihe kwesịrị ekwesị maka agụmakwụkwọ na izisa ozi ọma

Onye ọ bụla n'ime ha malitere usoro ihe omume nke nnukwu atụmatụ, nke ebumnuche ya bụ iji mee ka Bangala gbasaa site n'elu [[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Otu n'ime ha bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ Katọlik Egide De Boeck nke Congregatio Immaculati Cordis Mariae (CICM, nke a na-akpọkarị ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Scheutī ma ọ bụ bụ Scheutī), onye rutere na Bangala Station Nouvelle Anvers na 1901
Onye ọzọ bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ Protestant Walter H

Stapleton [], na nke atọ bụ onye ụka Katọlik Léon Derikx nke ndị nna Premonstratensian [[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Ka ọ na-erule 1915, mgbalị De Boeckz egosila na ọ nwere mmetụta karịa Stapleton, onye aro okike asụsụ ya, dị ka nzukọ ndị ozi ala ọzọ Protestant nke 1911 kwetara, emezubeghị ya n'ezie [[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] N'okpuru nchịkwa nke ọrụ De Boeckī, Derikxi kwụsịrị nke ya mgbe ihe na-erughị afọ iri gasịrị
Mkpa Lingala dị ka asụsụ obodo etolitela na nha na mkpa nke isi ebe eji ya eme ihe, Kinshasa na Brazzaville; na ojiji ya dị ka asụsụ nke ndị agha; na ewu ewu nke egwu soukous
Na mbụ, a na-akpọ asụsụ ndị ọsụ ụzọ Europe na ndị agha Africa ha mepụtara na Bobangi 'asụsụ osimiri' ma ọ bụ 'asụsụ azụmahịa' na akara ndị ọzọ na-agbanwe agbanwe
Malite na 1884 gaa n'ihu a na-akpọ ya 'Bangala', n'ihi iwebata ya na Bangala Station

Mgbe 1901, ndị ozi ala ọzọ ụka Katọlik nke CICM, nke a na-akpọkwa 'Congregation of Scheutists', tụrụ aro ka a gbanwee aha asụsụ ahụ 'Lingala', atụmatụ nke were ọtụtụ iri afọ iji nabata ya n'ozuzu ya, ma site n'aka ndị na-achị ala na ndị Congo
Aha Lingala pụtara na mbụ n'akwụkwọ n'akwụkwọ nke onye ozi ala ọzọ CICM bụ Égide De Boeck (1901-2)

A nabatara mgbanwe aha a na ọdịda anyanwụ na n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Congo (yana na mba ndị ọzọ ebe a na-asụ asụsụ ahụ), mana ọ bụghị n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Congo ebe a ka na-akpọ ụdị asụsụ a na-ekwu n'ógbè ahụ Bangala
Lingala bụ asụsụ creole nke sitere na Bantu nke Central Africa nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ n'asụsụ Bobangi, asụsụ nke nyere ọtụtụ okwu na ụtọ asụsụ ya
N'okwu ya bụ isi, Lingala nwekwara ọtụtụ ihe a gbazitere site na asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, dị ka Swahili, Kikongo varieties, French, Portuguese, na Bekee
N'omume, oke ịgbazinye ego dịgasị iche iche na ndị na-asụ asụsụ nke mpaghara dị iche iche (nke a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị na-eto eto), na n'oge mmemme dị iche iche
French
Spanish
Portuguese
Bekee
Enwere ike kewaa asụsụ Lingala n'ọtụtụ regiolects na sociolects
Ụdị mpaghara kachasị dị iche iche bụ Lingala nke ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ, Kinshasa Lingala na Brazzaville Lingala

Literary Lingala (lingala littéraire ma ọ bụ lingala classique na olu French) bụ ụdị a na-ejikarị eme ihe na agụmakwụkwọ na mgbasa ozi akụkọ na redio ma ọ bụ telivishọn nke gọọmentị, na ozi okpukpe na Chọọchị Roman Katọlik ma bụrụ asụsụ a na-akụzi dị ka isiokwu na ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ ụfọdụ
A na-ejikọta ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọrụ nke Chọọchị Katọlik, ndị ozi ala ọzọ CICM nke Belgium karịsịa
Ọ nwere usoro ụdaume asaa (/a/ /e/ /ɛ/ /i/ /o/ /ɔ/ /u/) na nkwekọrịta ụdaume dị mkpa
O nwekwara ọnụọgụ zuru oke nke aha aha ọdịdị na usoro nkwekọrịta ụtọ asụsụ na isiokwu, ma ọ bụ aha maka nke ọ bụla
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe n'ọrụ iwu na n'ụdị edemede ụfọdụ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Lingala na Kinshasa Lingala na-ele ya anya dị ka ihe a na-apụghị ịghọta aghọta
Northwestern (ma ọ bụ Equateur) Lingala bụ ngwaahịa nke (ezughị ezu) internalization site na Congolese nke iwu iwu iwu ndị ozi ala ọzọ CICM bu n'obi mgbe ha na-emepụta Literary Lingala
Ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ bụ mpaghara ebe ndị ozi ala ọzọ CICM kwadoro netwọk nke ụlọ akwụkwọ
Lingala a na-asụ asụ (nke a na-akpọ lingala parlé na French) bụ ụdị dị iche iche a na-ejikarị eme ihe na ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke ndị Lingalaphones
Ọ nwere usoro prefix aha zuru oke, mana usoro nkwekọrịta na ahịrịokwu aha dị ala karịa nke dị n'ụdị edemede
Banyere phonology, enwere usoro ụdaume ise ma ọ nweghị nkwekọrịta ụdaume
A na-ejikarị Lingala a na-asụ n'ọrụ ndị na-abụghị nke a na-ejighị n'aka, ọtụtụ n'ime abụ Lingala na-eji Lingala a ma na-asụrụ karịa ọdịiche ndị ọzọ

French na-emetụta Lingala nke oge a; French ngwaa, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwere ike ịbụ 'lingalized' na-agbakwunye prefixes na suffixes nke Lingala 'acomprenaki te' ma ọ bụ 'acomprendraki te' (ọ ghọtaghị, na-eji okwu French comprendre) kama Lingala ochie 'asímbaki ntína te' (n'ụzọ nkịtị s / ọ jidere / jidere mgbọrọgwụ / ihe kpatara ya)
Mmetụta French ndị a jupụtara na Kinshasa ma na-egosi mmebi nke asụsụ ka agụmakwụkwọ, na French, na-aghọ nke ọtụtụ ndị bi na ya
E nwere ọdịiche dị n'etiti 'Lingala Katọlik' na 'Lingala Protestant' - dịka ọmụmaatụ nzala/njala (agụụ)
Okwu Lingala na-egosi nkwekọrịta ụdaume ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ
Mkpụrụ/e/demede dị n'etiti /e/ na //o// anaghị agwakọta na ụdaume dị n'agbata //ɛ// na //ɔ// n'okwu
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-ahụ okwu ndɔbɔ 'nkịta azụ' na ndobo 'ọnyà òké', mana ọ bụghị *ndɔbo ma ọ bụ *ndobɔ
Lingala a na-asụ na Kinshasa na-egosi mgbanwe ụdaume site na /ɔ/ gaa na //o//, na-eduga na enweghị ụdaume //ɔ// maka /o/
Otu ihe ahụ na-/e/me na //ɛ// na /e/, na-eduga na /e / naanị
Ya mere na Kinshasa, onye na-asụ asụsụ ga-ekwu mbóte dị ka /mbóte/, ma e jiri ya tụnyere otú a na-akpọ //ᵐbɔ́tɛ//
(1) [ᶮʒ] bụ allophonic na [ʒ] dabere na olu
Ihe nkwụsị ndị e ji imi mee na-esote ụda olu na-enweghị olu na-agbaso na-enweghị ụda na-enweghị okwu naanị ya na ụfọdụ ọdịiche nke Lingala
Okwu mkpirisi, /mb/, /nd/, /ŋɡ/, /nz/ adịghị agbanwe
Lingala bụ asụsụ ụda olu, ụda bụ ihe dị iche na obere abụọ, dịka mutu (mmadụ) na mutú (isi), ma ọ bụ kokoma (ide) na kokóma (ịbịaru)
Enwere ụda abụọ nwere ike, nke nkịtị dị ala na nke abụọ dị elu
E nwere ụda nke atọ, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke na-amalite n'elu, na-agbadata n'ala ma na-agwụcha n'elu n'ime otu ụdaume, dịka bôngó (ya mere)
Ụdị ụdaolu na-ebu ụdaolu
Dị ka asụsụ Bantu niile, Lingala nwere usoro klas aha nke a na-ekewa aha dị ka prefixes ha na-ebu na dị ka mgbakwunye nke ihu ha na-akpali na ahịrịokwu
Tebụl dị n'okpuru na-egosi klas aha nke Lingala, nke a haziri dịka usoro nọmba nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe na nkọwa nke asụsụ Bantu
Klasị nke ọ bụla na-ejikọta ibe ya iji mepụta otu / ọtụtụ abụọ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ 'ndị nwoke na nwanyị'
E nwere ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị asaa n'ozuzu
Otu klas 1, 3, 5, 7, na 9 na-ewere ụdị ọtụtụ ha site na klas 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, n'otu n'otu
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọtụtụ ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ a na-ahụ na klas nke 9 na-ewere akara nke 2 (ba) n'ọtụtụ lutu → balutu 'spoon', mesa → bamesa 'table', sani → basani 'plate'
Okwu dị na klas 11 na-ejikarị klas 10 dị n'ọtụtụ
Ọtụtụ okwu sitere na klas 14 (aha ndị na-enweghị atụ) enweghị ọtụtụ
Klasị 9 na 10 nwere prefix imi, nke na-ejikọta na ụdaume na-esonụ
Ya mere, prefix na-egosi dị ka 'n' na okwu ndị na-amalite na t ma ọ bụ d, dịka ntaba 'goat', mana dị ka 'm' na okwu na-amalite site na b ma ọ bụ p (dịka mbisi 'azụ̀')
Enwekwara klas na-enweghị prefix 9a na 10a, nke sánzá → sánzá 'moon(s) ma ọ bụ ọnwa(s gosipụtara
A na-edozi mgbagwoju anya ndị nwere ike ịbụ site na ihe gbara ya gburugburu
Ntinye aha klasị anaghị apụta naanị na aha ahụ n'onwe ya, kama ọ na-eje ozi dị ka akara n'ime ahịrịokwu ahụ dum
N'ime ahịrịokwu ndị dị n'okpuru ebe a, a na-egosipụta prefixes klas
(E nwere ụdị okwu pụrụ iche 'a' nke prefix maka aha klas 1)
Naanị ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ, a na-achịkwa nkwekọrịta klasị aha
Klasị 1/2, dị ka n'asụsụ Bantu niile, nwere okwu maka ụmụ mmadụ; n'otu aka ahụ, klas 9/10 nwere ọtụtụ okwu maka ụmụ anụmanụ
Na klas ndị ọzọ, usoro okwu na-adịghị adịkarị ma ọ bụ ọtụtụ ihe na-ekpuchi ya
E nwere mofims anọ na-agbanwe ngwaa
A na-agbakwunye ha na mgbọrọgwụ ngwaa ụfọdụ n'usoro ndị a
Akụkụ ụda nke mbụ na-emetụta akụkụ isiokwu nke ngwaa, akụkụ ụda nke abụọ na-ejikọta na mofim nke semantic ejikọtara na mgbọrọgwụ nke ngwaa
Lingala bụ asụsụ a na-asụ karịa asụsụ e dere ede, ma nwee ọtụtụ usoro edemede dị iche iche, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ad hoc
Dị ka ịgụ na ide na Lingala na-adịkarị ala, orthography ya na-ewu ewu na-agbanwe agbanwe ma dịgasị iche n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ

Ụfọdụ orthographies nwere mmetụta siri ike site na nke French; mmetụta gụnyere S, ss, iji transcribe [s] abụọ (na Republic of the Congo); ou maka [u] (na Republic nke Congo); i na trema, aï, iji transcript [ay] ma ọ bụ [áí]; e na ụda olu, é, iji transcription [e]; e iji transcribe[ɛ], o na ụda olu dị nkọ, ó, iji transcri [ɔ] ma ọbụ mgbe ụfọdụ [o] ma ọ na-emegide o transcri [o] na-emegider [o] [o] A na-ahụkwa allophones dị ka ụdị na-agbanwe agbanwe na orthography a ma ama; sango bụ ihe ọzọ na nsango (ozi ma ọ bụ akụkọ); nyonso, nyoso, nionso, nioso (onye ọ bụla) bụ ntụgharị niile nke N'Onye

N'afọ 1976, ndị Société Zaïroise des Linguistes (Zairian Linguists Society) nakweere usoro ederede maka Lingala, na-eji e (ɛ) na o (ɔ) mepere emepe dee ụdaume [ɛ] na [ɔ], na iji ụda olu mee ihe mgbe ụf(ɔ)dụ iji akara ụda olu, ɛ ezie na njedebe nke usoro ntinye na-egbochi ndị edemede Lingala iji ɛ na ɔ na ụda olu mee ka ọ dị mfe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume ịdepụta Lingala dịka nkwekọrịta ahụ si dị na keyboard Bekee ma ọ bụ French
Nzukọ nke 1976 belatara orthography ọzọ nke ihe odide mana emeghị ka akara ụda
Enweghị nkwuwa okwu na-agbanwe agbanwe na-ebelata site na disambiguation n'ihi ihe gbara ya gburugburu
Ọtọgrafi a ma ama yiri ka ọ bụ nzọụkwụ n'ihu orthography ọ bụla dabeere na agụmakwụkwọ

Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ Lingala, akwụkwọ, ọbụnadị nsụgharị nke Universal Declaration of Human Rights na n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, forums ịntanetị, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ndị dị mkpa, dị ka Lingala nke Google, anaghị eji mkpụrụedemede Lingala bụ ɛ na ɔ

Digraphs nke ọ bụla nwere usoro a kapịrị ọnụ na mkpụrụ akwụkwọ okwu; dịka ọmụmaatụ, a ga-atụ anya ka a nye mza iwu tupu mba, n'ihi na digraph mb na-eso mkpụrụ akwụkwọ okwu m

Linus Williams (amụrụ 14 Maachị 1998) nke a na-akpọkarị B-lord bụ onye ọchụnta ego amụrụ na Naịjirịa, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-azụ ahịa cryptocurrencyna onye na-etinye ego
Linus bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Blord Group
Amụrụ na March 14, 1998, Linus Williams si Umuji Ebenebe na Awka North Local Government, Anambra State, Nigeria
N'agbanyeghị na amuru ya na steeti Delta, ọ nọrọ afọ ntolite ya na steeti Delta
Linus gụchara akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Anambra State University Uli, bụ ebe ọ gụrụ akara ugo mmụta sayensị na Kọmputa
Na 2017, Linus malitere njem ọkachamara ya site n'iche ọrụ nke onye nchịkwa azụmahịa na Instagram
Isi ihe ya lekwasịrị anya bụ ịkekọrịta nghọta azụmaahịa bara uru, ọkachasị na mpaghara azụmaahịa cryptocurrency
N'ịdabere na nka ya, o nyere ndụmọdụ na nduzi bara uru nye ndị na-eso ụzọ ya, na-enyere ha aka ịnyagharịa mgbagwoju anya nke mpaghara azụmahịa
N'ịbụ onye agụụ ya nwere maka ụlọ ọrụ cryptocurrency kpalitere, Linus guzobere ikpo okwu mgbanwe cryptocurrency nke ya na Onitsha, steeti Anambra
Akpọrọ aha azụmaahịa ahụ nke ọma B-Lord Group of Company, yana ọhụụ nke ime mgbanwe ka ndị mmadụ si etinye ego dijitalụ

Na 2022, Linus tọrọ ntọala Fin-tech App, BillPoint VTU & Payment Payment nke o kwuru na ngwa ahụ bụ maka ịkekọrịta ihe ọmụma na ịkwado ike ego site na ikpo okwu ya na-egosi nkwa ya n'ịkwalite mgbanwe dị mma n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na Septemba 1, 2020, ndị Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) nwụchiri Linus Williams Ifejika na steeti Enugu
Mgbe ọ nọrọ ụbọchị iri n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ikpeazụ
Otú ọ dị, n'ịbụ ndị na-enweghị afọ ojuju na ahụmahụ ya, Linus kpebiri ime ihe n'iwu megide EFCC, na-ebo ha ebubo na ha na-emebi ikike ya na ijikwa ihe onwunwe ya n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi
na-ewelitekwa nchegbu banyere izi ezi nke omume ndị e mere megide ya
Ọ lụrụ Linus Francisca, ma ha nwere otu nwa aha ya bụ Elliot, onye a mụrụ na 2020

Odúm bu ánúmanù àlà nke umunna ologobo úkwú na genus ha kpòrò Panthera
