Leonel Levy Lopes Bastos, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Lionel Bastos, amụrụ n'abalị nke 16 Ọgọst 1956 na Maputo, Mozambique) ma bụrụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta egwu nke na-arụ ọrụ na South Africa
N'afọ ndị 1990 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu egwu a na-akpọ Be Like Water, bụ ndị nwere egwu redio a na- woowe Don't Go On n'afọ 1996
Ìgwè ahụ kewara ma ha mere ihe ngosi nke nnọkọ na 2013
O weputara abọm ise n'onwe ya niile bụ ndị a họpụtara maka South African Music Awards ('SAMAs')
Abọm ya nke abụọ, Simple, meriri Best Adult Contemporary Album na 1999
E wepụtara abọm nke atọ nke Bastos, Rising Above The Madness, n'afọ 2001
Ma abọm ahụ na otu n'ime egwu ya, 'Thank You,' bụ nke pụtara dịka onye nke mbụ na chaatị nke ọnwa June 2001, abụ ahụ maka izu abụọ n'usoro
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2010, Bastos na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na redio Doug Anderson haziri egwu egwu nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà South Africa ama ama (gụnyere
Farryl Purkiss, Merseystate, na Wendy Oldfield) rụrụ ọrụ iji baara ndị ala ọma jijiji mere na Haiti nke afọ 2010, na Baxter Concert Hall na Cape Town
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, o wepụtara abọm nke isii ya, Songs From My Phone
A na-achịkwa abọm ahụ dum kpọmkwem site na ederede olu edere na ihe ndekọ olu nke iPhone, n'ihe a kwenyere na ọ bụ nke mbụ n'ụwa
Lionheart bu ihe nkiri ejije nke Naijiria nke 2018 nke Chinny Onwugbenu mebere ma Genevieve Nnaji duziri ya
Ndi so n'ejije a bụ Pete Edochie, Genevieve Nnaji na Nkem Owoh
Netflix nwetara ya na 7 Septemba 2018, eme ya ihe nkiri Netflix mbụ emere na Naịjirịa
Lionheart malitere na 2018 Toronto International Film Festival na Canada
Emepụtara fim ahụ na ụwa niile na 4 Jenụwarị 2019 na Netflix
A họpụtara Lionheart dika ihe nkiri si Nigerian maka Best International Feature Film na 92nd Academy Awards
Ọ bụ mbụ Nigeria na ewega ihe nkiri na Oscars
N'abali anọ n'ọnwa Novemba 2019, Academy a gụpụrụ ihe nkiri a maka asụsụ ejiri mee ya kariri na Bekee nani nkeji iri ka asụrụ Igbo na ya
Lionheart na- akọ akụkọ Adaeze Obiagu (nke Nnaji gosipụtara), onye chọrọ ịnọchi nna ya, Chief Ernest Obiagu ( Pete Edochie ), mgbe ọ na-enweghịzi ike ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ihi nsogbu ahụike

Otú ọ dị, nna ya na-arịọ nwanne ya nwoke bụ Godswill ( Nkem Owoh ) ka o were ọnọdụ ya, na Godswill na Adaeze ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji chekwaa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ụgwọ nakwa iyi egwu iwepụ nke onye ọchụnta ego Igwe Pascal ( Kanayo O
Kanayo )
E mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ site n'aka Chinny Onwugbenu maka MPM Premium na mkpakọrịta The Entertainment Network
Netflix nwetara ikike ikesa ihe nkiri a na mba ụwa na 7 Septemba 2018, otu ụbọchị tupu amalite izi ya na 2018 Toronto International Film Festival
E mepụtara usoro na atụmatụ ihe nkiri ana 24 August 2018
Na 4 Jenụwarị 2019, ewepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ ka mba ụwa nwee ike ile ya na Netflix
Lionheart anatawo nlebara anya dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ dị iche iche
Na nyochaa mkpokọta Rotten Tomatoes , ihe nkiri a nwere nkwenye nnabata 100% yana akara ngosi nke 633 / 10 dabere na nyocha asaa
Nollywood Reinvented kpọtụrụ aha na nyocha ha banyere ihe nkiri a na ọ 'na-arụ ọrụ n'ihi na o bara ha n'obi', na ọnụego ihe nkiri a dị na 61%
Womentainment lebara anya na onye kachasi ipụta ihe na onye nduzi, Genevieve Nnaji, na-atụ aro ka ndị mmadụ lelee ya 'maka nwanyị dị egwu nke bụ onye kachasi ipụta ihe ma bụkwa onye na-eduzi'
Nollywood Post gara n’ihu na-aja Genevieve Nnaji mma na nyocha ya “Lionheart bụ akụkọ na-enye afọ ojuju ịkọ maka ịkwado ụmụnwaanyị n’enweghị oke isiokwu”
Ka ọ dịgodị, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetakwara nyocha ole na ole na-adịghị mma n'ihi ihe ụfọdụ ndị chere dị ka atụmatụ 'enweghị ezi uche'
Ntụleghachi na Nairametrics kwuru na ndị dere / ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ emeghị nchọpụta nke ọma na usoro ụlọ ọrụ tupu ha emee ihe nkiri a
N'ihi ya, e mere ụfọdụ iberiibe
Israel-Isaac Lipshitz, ónyé a maara dị ka Lippy Lipshitz (ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Mee 1903 rụo ụbọchị irí na asaa n'ọnwa Mee 1980) bụ ónyé South Africa na-akpụ ihe, ónyé na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-akpụ ihe na South Africa kachasị mkpa, ya na Moses Kottler na Anton van Wouw
A mụrụ Israel-Isaac Lipshitz n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Mee 1903 dị ka nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke Shlomeh Josef Lipshitz nke Dvinsk na Chayah Meray Faktor nke Plungė, Lithuania
Nné na nná nnà ya bụ ndị òtù Chassidic nke ndị Juu, ebe nné na nná nnà nna ya sitere na òtù Misnaged na Febụwarị 1904, nna Israel gawara Cape Town na-achọ atụmanya ka mma karịa ka ọ dị na Plungė
Ọ hapụrụ nwunye ya na nwa ọhụrụ ahụ na nna nna ya Yankeh Fivah Faktor maka afọ anọ na ọkara sochirinụ
N'okpuru nlekọta ya, a kụziiri Israel na-eto eto ise ihe, ịkpụ osisi na ihe nlereanya na ntụ ọka na mmanụ kandụl
Nna nna ya wuru ụlọ nzukọ na Plungian, ọ bụkwa na nka ịchọ mma nke ụlọ nzukọ ka Israel nwèrè mmetụta mbụ màkà ngosipụta nka
N'afọ 1908, Israel na nné ya gara ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Bremen, ebe ha si rute Cape Town n'ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1908

N'afọ 1909, Israel malitere ịga klas ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na Constitution Street Public School, ebe ọ natara ntụziaka ise ihe site n'aka ónyé na-ese ihe Ruth Prowse, ma site na 1911 ruo 1914 gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Constitution na De Villiers Streets
Site na 1915 ruo 1917 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hope Mill School ma banyé na 1920 na Normal College na Buitenkant Street
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gbasoro ma hapụ ọchịchọ ya dị mkpirikpi ịghọ ónyé édémédé wee debanye aha, n'ọnwa Eprel 1922, na Cape Town Art School na Stal Plein
Lipshitz biri na Montparnasse, Paris
Ọ debanyere aha na Académie de la Grande Chaumière ébé ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Antoine Bourdelle, ónyé na-enyere Rodin aka n'oge gárá àga
Na Paris, a malitere ya na Modern Movement
N'ebe a, ọ zutere echiche nke Cubism, Futurism, Expressionism, Dadaism, Surrealism na Constructivism
Ọ laghachiri Cape Town na Machị 1932, biri na Barnett Street dị nso na Ogige Ụlọ Ọrụ ahụ

O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ya na Castle Street, ya na ónyé na-ese ihe Christopher Williams wee malite ịhazi ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke ihe ọkpụkpụ na eserese, nke ga-ewere ọnọdụ na Martin Melck House na 16 Mee 1932
Ọ chọtara mmegide siri ike megide Modern Movement na ndị nkatọ, dị ka Bernard Lewis na-ede màkà The Cape, na-eleghara ihe niile ọ mepụtara anya
Lipshitz hapụrụ South Africa na Mee 1947, na-eburu ụlọ ọrụ nke Lady Nicholson (nwa Sir Lionel Phillips) na Glebe Place, Chelsea, London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ izu isii ma sonye na Gimpel Fils Summer Exhibition
Mgbè nke a gasịrị, ọ kwagara na 18 Ellersdale Road, Hampstead iji kwadebe màkà mmalite mbụ na London, ihe ngosi ga-emeghe na Galerie Apollinaire na Litchfield Street na 12 Eprel 1948
Lipshitz gosipụtara ihe osise iri abụọ na ise n'oge a

N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ ihe ngosi mbụ ya nye ndị tozuru etozu, ndị maara ihe, Maurice Collis nabatara ọrụ ahụ nke ọma na-ede màkà Time and Tide, Colin MacInnes na The Observer na ónyé na-ese ihe Vorticist Colin MacInne
Ónyé mba ụwa na-achọsi ike na nka South Africa ga-ejedebe na nguzobe alaka South Africa nke International Art Club nke Rome, na Maurice van Essche dị ka onyeisi óche
A kpọrọ Van Essche, Lipshitz, Cecil Higgs, John Dronsfield, Irma Stern, Jean Welz, Alexis Preller na Walter Battiss ka ha sonye na ngosi Art Club na Turin na Rome na mbido 1949
Rupert Shepard, onye nduzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Michaelis, nyèrè Lipshitz ọkwa, nkè ọ malitere na 1950
N'afọ 1952, ọ bụ ónyé isi ndụmọdụ na SANG màkà ihe ngosi The Meaning of Sculpture

Ọrụ ya nwetara site na nnukwu nchịkọta ndị ọzọ na Southern Africa, na June 1964, e nyere ya ihe nrite màkà ihe ọkpụkpụ site na Suid-Afrikaanse Akademie vir Wetenskap en Kuns, ónyé osote prọfesọ na Michaelis sochiri n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1964
Lipshitz kwagara Israel na 1978, ébé ọ nwụrụ na 1980
Roseline Omokhoa Afije (amụrụ 31 Maachị 1995), onye ama ama dị ka Liquorose, bụ onye okike ọdịnaya Naịjirịa, onye na -eme ihe nkiri, onye ama ama n'ezie nke TV na onye ịgba egwu ọkachamara
Ọ bụ onye n'esote onye mbụ na Big Big Naija (oge 6)
Liquorose bụ onye Edo Steeti, Naịjirịa, mana amụrụ ya na Surulere, Lagos Steeti, ebe o toro
Ọ gara Itire Nursery na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị wee mechaa Del International College, Ijeshatedo, Surulere maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Na 2012, e gosipụtara Liquorose na usoro ihe nkiri TV a ma ama na -atọ ọchị The Johnson's ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọrụ ebere
Na 2015, Liquorose pụtara na ihe nkiri, 'The OAP', na obere ihe nkiri, 'HEX' na 2016
Liquorose nwetara ebe mbụ ya dị ka onye na -agba egwu na vidiyo egwu nwere 2face na egwu ya 'ọgwụgwọ ime mmụọ'

O mekwara otu egwu akpọrọ GGB (Girls Got Bold) ya na Odiley Emmanuella na Efiowu Ifeoma, ma soro ndị egwu Naịjirịa rụkọọ ọrụ dịka; Davido, Wizkid, Olamide, Tiwa Savage, Yemi Alade, flavor, Mr Eazi, Seyi Shay, Timaya, Ycee, Iyanya, Kcee, 2Face, Psquare, Dbanj, Don Jazzy, Phyno, P Square, Yung6ix, Wande Cole Teni, Runtown, Lynx, Skiibii, Aramide, Dija, Dr Sid, D'prince, Mc Galaxy, CDQ, Iceprince, Orezi, Chidinma, lil Kesh, Patoranking, Harrysong, Humble Smith na ndị ọzọ na -ese ihe na Naịjirịa
Liquorose banyere n'ime oge nke isii nke ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka nwanyị nke asaa n'ụlọ mbikota na 25 Julaị 2021
Ọ bu onye mbụ na ụlọ mbikota na ihe nkiri a gafere 1 nde na Instagram
Ọ bu onye mbụ na esota Whitemoney onye mmeri
Usoro TV
Lisa Alborghetti (amụrụ n'abali iri na itoolu nke onwa June afo 1993) bụ onye Ịtali na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye boolu na-agba ọsọ n'etiti na achi isi na Inter Milan
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuri egwu nke otu mba Ịtaly
Alborghetti malitere ịgbara otu ACF Brescia mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, mgbe otu ahụ na-agba bọọlụ na ngalaba nke abụọ (Serie B) n'afọ 2008
Klọb ahụ ruru Serie A na nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2009 nke Alborghetti gbaranyere goolu mbụ nke klọb ahụ na ngalaba kachasị elu

Site na utu aha abụọ nke Serie A, utu aha atọ nke Italian Women's Cup na utu aha atọ Italian Women't Super Cup, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ egwuregwu narị abụọ agbara na asọmpi niile n'ime afọ asatọ na klọb ahụ, a mara ọkwa n'abali iri na ato nke ọnwa June afo 2016 na ọ na-esonyere Apollon Limassol nke Saịprọs
Ọ laghachiri Ịtali na ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017 wee gbaa bọọlụ nye Atalanta Mozzanica Ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ otu oge ọzọ
N'afọ 2018 ọ gbaara bọọlụ nye otu ọhụrụ e guzobere AC
Milan Women

Alborghetti nọchitere anya mba ya n'òtù ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na ndị na-erubeghi afọ iri na itoolu, ebe o nyere goolu abụọ na 2011 UEFA Women's Under-19 Championship megide Russia na Belgium
O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba n'abali asato nke onwa Machị afọ 2013 megide New Zealand

Lisa Read Bloom ( née Bray ; amụrụ Septemba 20, 1961) bụ onye ọka iwu America ama ama maka inye Harvey Weinstein ndụmọdụ n'agbanyeghị ebubo mmetọ mmekọahụ dị iche iche, nakwa ịnọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọ bụ ebubo iyi egwu mmekọahụ ha kpalitere nchụpụ nke Bill O'Reilly pụọ na Fox News
Bloom tọrọ ntọala ma nwee Bloom Firm, ụlọọrụ iwu nke nọchitere anya ndị mmadụ gụnyere Kathy Griffin na Mischa Barton

Bloom bụkwa onye nhazi nke Lisa Bloom Ụlọ ikpe mepere emepe (nke bụbu Bloom na Politan Ụlọ ikpe mepere emepe ), mmemme akụkọ gbasara iwu nke a na-eme awa abụọ na truTV 's In Session, site na 2006 ruo 2009
Bloom bụ naanị nwa nke onye ọka iwu ikike obodo Gloria Allred na Peyton Huddleston Bray Jr
A mụrụ Bloom dika Lisa Read Bray, ada Gloria Bloom (mgbe e mesịrị, Allred) na nna ya bu Peyton Huddleston Bray Jr
Nne ya bụ onye Juu
Alụmdi na nwunye nne na nna ya adịteghị aka—ha lụrụ di na nwunye ma gbaa alụkwaghịm mgbe ha nọ na mahadum
Peyton Bray, onye nwere ọrịa bipolar, mechara gbuo onwe ya, Bloom mechara were aha nne ya zara mgbe ọ dị n'agbọghọ
Mgbe Bloom dị afọ asaa, nne ya lụrụ William C
Allred
Bloom nwetara nzere bachelọ site na UCLA, ebe ọ gụsịrị Phi Beta Kappa ma bụrụ onye mmeri arụmụka kọleji nke mba
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta JD ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Yale na 1986

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Bloom malitere ọrụ ya na New York, site na 1991, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nne ya, Allred, Maroko & Goldberg, na-enyere aka n'ịgba akwụkwọ nke na-ahaghi nke ọma a gbara Boy Scouts nke America maka ịkpa ókè mmekọahụ n'aha Katrina Yeaw, otu nwa agbọghọ chọrọ ịbanye n'ọgbakọ ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ nne ya, Bloom gbakwara akwụkwọ mkpesa mmetọ ụmụaka megide Ụka Roman Katọlik wee gbaa ndị LAPD akwụkwọ

Na 2001, Bloom hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ nne ya, ebe ọ bụ onye a zụlitere ọrụ n'ihe gbasara akụkọ ụwa n'ihe onyonyo, o mechara jee ozi dị ka onye nyocha iwu na CBS News, CNN, HLN na MSNBC, wee pụta na The Early Show, Insider, Dr
Phil
, Dr
Drew, The Situation Room, Reliable Sources, The Joy Behar Show, Issues with Jane Velez-Mitchell, and The Stephanie Miller Show
Bloom laghachiri n'ime ihe gbasara iwu na 2010 mgbe ọ tọrọ ntọala Bloom Firm, obere ụlọ ọrụ iwu na-ahụ maka ezinụlọ, obodo na mpụ
E nyere ya ikike ime iwu na New York na California

Na Bloom Firm, Bloom nọchitere anya ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ a ma ama, gụnyere ihe nlereanya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Janice Dickinson n'okwu nkwutọ ya megide onye na-akpa ọchị Bill Cosby, yana onye nlereanya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Mischa Barton na ikpe porn ya
Blac Chyna mechara goro Bloom ka ọ nweta iwu mgbochi nwa oge megide onye na-elekọta mmadụ Rob Kardashian, onye Chyna na-ekerịta nwa nwanyị, Dream

N'ime ọtụtụ ebubo mmetọ mmekọahụ megide ndị ikom dị ike na ntụrụndụ na mgbasa ozi, yana ịgbaso akụkọ BuzzFeed na-akọwapụta mmezi mmekpa ahụ mmekọahụ nke a na-akwụ ụgwọ site na mmefu ego ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya John Conyers, Bloom nọchitere Marion Brown, onye gwara BuzzFeed okwu na ndekọ
ma emesịa bịa n'ihu ọha na-ebo ebubo iyi egwu Conyers
Na 2017 Bloom nọchiri anya ụmụ nwanyị atọ na-ebo Bill O'Reilly - onye ọrụ na God News - ebubo maka iyi egwu mmekọahụ
Jehmu Greene, onye na-ekwu okwu telivishọn bụ onye pụtara na Fox News, bịakwutere Bloom na-ebo ebubo iyi egwu mmekọahụ megide O'Reilly, ọ bụ ezie na o mesịrị jụ ọrụ Bloom

Otu n'ime ndị ahịa Bloom, Wendy Walsh, gbara akwụkwọ mkpesa nke dugara isi ụlọọrụ Fox News' a kpọrọ 21st Century Fox, ka ha malite nnyocha nke mere ka a chụọ O'Reilly n'ọrụ ma weta usoro ihe omume ya na njedebe
N'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala US na 2016, Bloom kwere nkwa ịnọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị anọ boro ebubo mmekọahụ rụrụ arụ nke onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi onye isi ala Donald Trump mere

Abụọ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị a bịara n'ihu ọha n'ihi ebubo ha, gụnyere Jill Harth na Lisa Boyne, mmadụ abụọ ndị na-emeghị, gụnyere otu nwanyị si Virginia na nwanyị ọzọ nke kwuru na Trump dinara ya n'ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Na Nọvemba 2, 2016, Bloom kagburu ogbako ndị nta akụkọ na onye ahịa a na-akpọghị aha, na-ekwu na onye ahịa ahụ na-atụ egwu n'ihi egwu ọnwụ
Dị ka Bloom si kwuo, mgbe ogbako ndị nta akụkọ a gasịrị, ọtụtụ ndị na-enye onyinye kpọtụụrụ ya iji bugharịa ma chekwaa ndị eboro ebubo
Bloom chere na ọ dịịrị ya ibugara ndị ahịa ya onyinye ahụ
Nwanyị Virginia ahụ kwuru na ndị nyere ya nyere ya ihe ruru $750,000, mana na ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ

Na akụkọ 2017, The New York Times chọpụtara ndị na-enye onyinye bụ ndị kpọtụrụ Bloom dị ka David Brock 's American Bridge 21st Century, nke nyere $ 200,000, na Susie Tompkins Buell, onye nyere $ 500,000
Bloom nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi pụtara ìhè mgbe e boro onye na-eme ihe nkiri Harvey Weinstein ebubo mmejọ mmekọahụ na Ọktoba 2017

Dika ọ na-ekwu na Weinstein 'gọrọ agọ ọtụtụ ebubo ndị ahụ dị ka ụgha ụgha,' Bloom kwetara na-adụ ọdụ Weinstein maka ike na iyi egwu, na-akpọ ya 'dinosaur ochie na-amụta ụzọ ọhụrụ' Ọrụ ndụmọdụ Bloom, nke ọ malitere na njedebe nke afọ 2016, bụ onye a na-atụ anya ya maka nhụsianya ya na nnochite anya mbụ nke ndị e mere ihe ike n'ụzọ mmekọahụ, ebe ụfọdụ na mgbasa ozi na-akpọ nkwekọrịta mmegharị akwụkwọ ya na The Weinstein Company, bịnyeere aka na ya n'oge Weinstein na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ dika onyeisi oche, esemokwu nke mmasị

Na October 7, 2017, ụbọchị abụọ mgbe isiokwu mbụ gbasara omume mmekọahụ rụrụ arụ na The New York Times, Bloom kwụsịrị ọrụ ndụmọdụ ya n'agbanyeghi mkpesa na esemokwu dị n'etiti ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ Weinstein Company
Dị ka ozi ịntanetị nwetara site na The New York Times, Bloom tụrụ aro ịjị 'foto nke ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ebo ebubo na Harvey sere mgbe e bosiri ya ebubo ya rụrụ arụ' wee zaghachi ebubo megide Weinstein
Bloom gọrọ agọ na ọ na-akpa nkata ịrụ ọrụ megide ndị ebubo ahụ
Daily Beast mechara kọọ na Bloom enyela onye nta akụkọ Ronan Farrow nyocha mmegide na otu n'ime ndị ebubo Weinstein, Rose McGowan, n'oge akụkọ nke ya na Weinstein
N'akwụkwọ Farrow 2019, ọ gara n'ihu na-ekwu na Bloom ga-akọ ozi ọ bụla enwetara banyere nyocha ya nye Weinstein, na ọ kwetara na ọ bụ 'ndị ya'
Akwụkwọ 2019 nke ndị nta akụkọ Jodi Kantor na Megan Twohey nwere ndetu 2016 sitere na Bloom, yana nkwupụta ịgba ụgwọ 2017 maka ọrụ emere n'aha Weinstein
Akwụkwọ ndị a na-egosi etu Bloom ga-esi nyere Weinstein aka iji wee rụọ ọrụ megide ndị na-ebo ya ebubo
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gbasịrị arụkwaghịm pụọ na ndị otu Weinstein, Bloom dabara na 'onye na-eme ihe ikpa ọchị na email' James Linton na-eme ka Weinstein

N'ịzaghachi onye na-eme ihe ọchị ahụ, Bloom dere na 'agba ọhụrụ nke ebubo ndị ka dị njọ bụ ndị emeghị ka m mara' Ụdị dị iche iche mechara kọọ na Bloom 'maara nani ebubo nke okwu ọnụ, omume, na iwe iwe' mgbe ọ malitere inye Weinstein ndụmọdụ, na ọ maghị maka ebubo dị njọ nke mmeko nwoke na nwanyị na mmekọahụ
N'ime izu nke akụkọ mbụ na New York Times, Bloom rịọrọ mgbaghara n'ihu ọha maka ọrụ ya nke bu inye Weinstein ndụmọdụ
Bloom nọchitere anya onye bụbu onye isi oche ụlọ ọrụ Amazon Studios
aha ya bu Roy Price n'agbanyeghị ebubo iyi egwu mmekọahụ, mana o kwuru na nnọchite anya ọnụahịa ya kwubiri tupu onye na-ebo Price ebubo Isa Hackett emee ka o wusaa n'ihu ọha mmadu
Bloom boro Masters ebubo esemokwu nke mmasị maka ikpali Price ka o wee kpọsaa na ihe nkiri KCRW ya, ebubo ndị Masters gọnarịrị

N'ịgbaso eserese foto 2017 nke butere ọtụtụ esemokwu ebe onye na-eme ihe mkpaọchi a kpọrọ Kathy Griffin kpuchiri ihe mkpuchi nke gbawara agbawa na ọbara nke yiri ihu nke President Donald Trump, Bloom nwere nnọkọ mkparịta ụka ya na Griffin, mgbe ahụ ọ bu onye ahịa ya, iji dozie esemokwu ahụ
Ọdịiche ha juru ebe niile na mgbasa ozi maka njide onwe ya na enweghị elekwasị anya
N'agbanyeghi agaghi n'ihia banyere ọrụ Bloom n'inye Harvey Weinstein ndụmọdụ, Griffin biputere ihe nkiri na Facebook na-akatọ Bloom na di ya, Braden Pollock, maka 'I na-eme ka ọnọdụ m ka njọ'
Griffin mechara rịọ Bloom n'ihu ọha ka ọ kwụsị ịkpọ ya wee katọọ Bloom maka 'ịkwa akwụna a ma ama,' nkatọ nke aro Bloom tutara maka njem mgbasa ozi na-esochi nnọkọ mgbasa ozi ha

Dika Griffin si kwuo, Bloom gbakwara ụgwọ iwu dị oke egwu, nke Griffin mere atụmatụ na ọ bụ $40,000 maka nnọchi anya ụbọchị abụọ, gụnyere onye ọka iwu na-agbachitere Dmitry Gorin, onye e boro Bloom ebubo na ọ goro ọrụ na-enweghị ikike Griffin
Na nzaghachi na nkwupụta Griffin, Bloom kwuru na ya 'amaghị na enwere nsogbu' wee wepụta nkwupụta na-akatọ Griffin maka ikwu okwu n'echeghị echiche na nnọkọ mgbasa ozi ha
Otú ọ dị Bloom chọrọ nnọọ ọdịmma Griffin
N'ịgbaso okwu Griffin kwụrụ gbasara Bloom, Tamara Holder, onye bụbu onye ahịa Bloom, na Jehmu Greene, bụ onye tụlere igo Bloom ọrụ, bịara n'ihu na nkatọ ha
Holder jigidere Bloom ka o boro Fox News Latino osote onye isi ala Francisco Cortes maka mwakpo mmekọahụ
Dika Holder si kwuo, Bloom tụpụtara nkwekọrịta njide mbụ na-enye onwe ya 40% nke mmezi ọ bụla, yana ego njigide $10,000 na nkwụghachi maka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ọ bụla dị mkpa na mmefu njem
Agbanyeghi na Holder mechara kpakọrịta nkwekọrịta ka mma, ọ katọrọ Bloom maka ịnara puku kwuru puku dollar na ụgwọ ndị ọzọ, yana ịkwanye Holder ịnakwere iwu imezi ya na Fox News
N'akụkụ ya, Greene kpọrọ Bloom 'onye na-aghọ aghụghọ' maka ịnye ya nkwekọrịta maka nnọchite mgbasa ozi mgbe nzukọ lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ iwu
Bloom zara ebubo abụọ ahụ site n'ịzọrọ na 'ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ahịa [Bloom Firm] nwere obi ụtọ na ọrụ anyị'

N'October 2014, Carol Swanson Chitwood (n/k/a Carol Swanson Smith) jigidere Lisa Bloom na Bloom Firm ịchụso ebubo ime ihe ike n'ụlọ megide di ya mgbe ahụ, Martin Chitwood, onye ọka iwu ama ama n'Atlanta, onye gbara ya akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm na Atlanta ọnwa abụọ tupu mgbe ahụ
Mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ ka na-eche, Bloom gbara akwụkwọ megide Martin Chitwood na California na-ekwupụta ebubo ime ihe ike n'ụlọ n'aha Carol Chitwood
Martin Chitwood gọrọ agọ ebubo ahụ, na-ekwu na ha bụ ụzọ aghụghọ iji gbochie mmanye nkwekọrịta nke ndị otu ahụ tupu alụmdi na nwunye na ịmanye mmezi
Martin Chitwood jụrụ imezi, na August 31, 2017, mgbe e kpesiri ikpe obodo rụrụ ịzụ ise, otu ndi ọka iwu mmadụ iri na abụọ hụrụ na ọ nweghị ihe nkwupụta Bloom wetara iji megide ya
Bloom enweghị mkpesa
Bloom na ụlọ ọrụ ya na-anọchite anya nwoke nlereanya Jason Boyce na akwụkwọ ikpe ya megide onye na-ese foto ejiji Bruce Weber nakwa ndị ọzọ na New York State Supreme Court na December 2017
Na Mee 1, 2020, Bloom biputere na Twitter na agbanyeghị na ọ kwenyere na osote onye isi ala Joe Biden wakporo Tara Reade, ọ ka ga-akwado Biden
Bloom lụrụ di ya ugbu a, Braden Pollock, na Disemba 5, 2014
Pollock bụ onye tọrọ ntọala nke Legal Brand Marketing ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa Bloom Firm
Ọ nọbu na bọọdụ nke ụlọ ọrụ weebụ Epik
Bloom na di ya na nwa ya bi na Los Angeles
Bloom nwere ụmụaka abụọ toro eto, ada ya bu Sarah Wong Bloom na nwa nwoke ya bu Samuel 'Sam/Sammy' Wong, ya na di ya bụbu Jim Wong, onye nkuzi LAUSD
Onye anaghị eri anụ kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Bloom bụ onye anaghị eri anụ kemgbe afọ 2009
Bloom bụ onye Juu

Bloom edeela akwụkwọ atọ, nke gụnyere Think Straight Talk for Women to Stay Smart in a Dumbed-Down World, n'afọ 2011, na Swagger 10 Urgent Rules for Raising Boys in an Era of Failing Schools, Mass Joblessness, nakwa Thug Culture, site n'afọ 2012

Na mbido afọ 2017, The Weinstein Company na Jay-Z kwupụtara atụmatụ imeghari akwụkwọ Bloom's 2014, Suspicion Nation The Inside Story of the Trayvon Martin Injustice and Why We Continue to Repeat It, n'ime usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere akụkụ isii
Amaghi ọkwa nke ọrụ ngo a na-eso ọgbaghara na ụlọ ọrụ Weinstein
Lisa Boattin (amụrụ n'abali atọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1997) bụ onye Ịtali na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere ndị otu Serie A Juventus na ndị otu mba Ịtali
Boattin gbara bọọlụ klọb mbụ ya n'afọ 2011 na Venezia [it]
na nke agba ọzọ ya a kpọfere ya na Graphistudio Pordenone [it]
Na Julaị 2014, Boattin bịanyere aka na Brescia
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Juventus, penalty megide Res Roma
Ọ pụtara ugboro abụọ maka Juventus na 2018-19 UEFA Women's Champions League Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Juventus na asọmpi ikpeazụ nke iko ụmụ nwanyị nke Ịtali nke afọ 2018
Juventus meriri Fiorentina ọkpụ goolu abụọ asatara otu
Na Mee 2019, Boattin gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya na Juventus ruo 2021
Ọ malitere egwuregwu ọ bụla nke Juventus na-emeri n'asọmpi Serie A nke afọ 2020 na afọ 21, a họpụtakwara ya dịka onye egwuregwu nke oge ahụ
N'abali iri na ise nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, ọ gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya ruo 2023
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2022, Boattin gbara goolu ozugbo site na nkuku na nkeji nke atọ nke oge nkwụsịtụ iji nweta otu akara na egwuregwu Coppa Italia megide Inter

Boattin bụ onyeisi ndị U17 Ịtali na asọmpi UEFA nke ụmụ nwanyị n'erubeghi ogo afọ iri na asaa nke afọ 2014 na asọmpi iko mba ụwa ụmụ nwanyị n'erubeghi ogo afọ iri na asaa nke 2014 FIFA hiwereU-17 Ịtali gbara ndị nke atọ na ihe omume abụọ ahụ, Boattin wee gbaa bọọlụ nke mgbapụ penariti na iko mba ụwa, ka Ịtali meriri Venezuela U-17
Ọ gbara bọọlụ nye Ịtali n'egwuregwu abụọ na iru ogo nke iko mba ụwa ụmụ nwanyị afọ 2019 FIFA Hiwere
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu naonye na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke afọ 2019 nke FIFA na akwado na France
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu Juventus asatọ nọ na ndị otu ahụ
A mụrụ Boattin na Portogruaro, Veneto, Ịtali
Boattin na onye na-agba bọọlụ Sweden bụ Linda Sembrant bi ,na mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Brescia

Lisa Brice (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye South Afrịka na-ese ihe na onye Omenkà si Cape Town Ọ bi na London ma na-ezo aka na ụfọdụ mmetụta ya dị ka ahụmịhe ya na-etolite na South Afrịka n'oge ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na site na oge ọ nọrọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Trinidad
A mụrụ Brice ma zụlite ya na Cape Town, South Afrịka ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Cape Town, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1990
Site na 1988 - 1991 Brice rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na-ebi akwụkwọ nke onye na-ese ihe Sue Williamson
Ọ bịara London n'afọ 1998 iji nweta ebe obibi na Gasworks Gallery ma mesịa biri na isi obodo
Ihe osise ya sitere na mmalite ndụ ya na South Afrịka yana ndụ ya na London na oge ọ nọrọ na Trinidad n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga
Brice malitere ịrụ ọrụ na mbipụta, foto, vidiyo na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ agwakọta
Mgbe ọ kwagara UK, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na mmanụ na akwa ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ma a maara ya ugbu a dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Nakwa na ngwụsị afọ 1990 Brice malitere itinye oge na-arụ ọrụ ma na-ebi na Port of Spain, Trinidad, ebe ọ zutere ma soro ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe dịka Peter Doig na Chris Ofili
Ha guzobere CCA7 (Caribbean Contemporary Arts)
Duro Olowu akọwaala ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị ọkachamara dị jụụ nke nhazi na usoro'
Kemgbe afọ 1993, Brice enweela ihe ngosi iri abụọ na South Afrịka na gburugburu Europe, na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu narị ihe ngosi otu gburugburu ụwa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ihe ngosi mbụ nke Brice gosipụtara ihe oyiyi sitere na akara ngosi ụlọ ọrụ mmekọahụ nke Thailand, nke Frank Hanel Gallery na Germany weghaara ma gosipụta na Europe
Ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi ndị sochirinụ gosipụtara isiokwu ndị dị ka esemokwu agbụrụ, ime ihe ike na mpụ na South Afrịka
N'afọ 2016 Duro Olowu gụnyere Brice na Making and Unmaking ngosi na Camden Arts Centre na London
N'afọ sochirinụ Salon 94 gallery na New York gosipụtara Boundary Girl, ihe ngosi nke nnukwu akwa na obere gouaches, obere ọrụ ndị e gosipụtara na mbido afọ ahụ na London
Na 2018 Brice gosipụtara na Tate Britain dị ka akụkụ nke Art Now, ihe ngosi maka ndị na-ese ihe ọhụrụ na ndị na-apụta
Ọrụ ahụ gosipụtara 'ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị site na eserese akụkọ ihe mere eme, foto na mgbasa ozi n'ime gburugburu ebe obibi ọhụrụ, na-eme ka ha nwee mmetụta ọhụrụ nke inwe onwe ha

' Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ndị ahụ na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị a sụgharịrị na eserese na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke na-ekwughachi ahụmahụ Brice nke Trinidadian nke carnival, nke ndị na-aṅụrị ọṅụ a maara dị ka 'ndị mmụọ ọjọọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ' na-ese onwe ha acha anụnụ anụnụ maka amaghị aha

Art Now gụnyere ihe osise ọhụrụ abụọ a na-egosipụtabeghị na mbụ, otu dabere na John Everett Millais 'Ophelia (ihe osise) na Ophelia guzo ọtọ na-ejide sịga, nke ọzọ dabere na Parting at Morning nke William Rothenstein na ihe nlereanya ahụ na-adịghị mma nke a rụgharịrị, jupụta, na-ese siga
Ndị nta akụkọ Britain nabatara ihe ngosi ahụ nke ọma bụ ndị toro Brice maka 'nweghachi ahụ nwanyị dị mkpa'
E tinyere ọrụ Brice na ihe ngosi 2022 Women Painting Women na Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere Smithsonian National Museum of African Art, Johannesburg Art Gallery, High Commission of South Africa, London na nchịkọta onwe nke Sindika Dokolo
Lisa Corinne Davis bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí nke a maara màkà ihe osise na ọrụ na akwụkwọ nke na-atụ aro map na ụdị ihe ọmụma ndị ọzọ

Ọ na-eji abstraction dị ka ụzọ isi sụgharịa mgbagwoju anya nke ahụmịhe nke ógè a gụnyere nke ya dị ka nwanyị Africa-America na-ajụkarị echiche ndị e chepụtara echepụta banyéré njirimara, nkewa, na ezi uche na njirimara

Ọrụ ya jupụtara, nke márá mma na-ejikọta atụmatụ dị iche iche, ihe ndị a na-ahụ anya na asụsụ ndị a haziri ahazi, ọdịiche dị n'etiti ihe oyiyi na abstraction, ezigbo oghere na echiche efu, na microcosmic ma ọ bụ macrocosmic reference
Onye na-enyocha ụgbọ okporo ígwè Brooklyn Joan Waltemath dere, 'ahụmahụ ọbọdọ nke ohere na ógè nke Davis gosipụtara bụ mgbagwoju anya nke oge na nkwekọrịta
Mgbalị ya ime map nke ala mebiri emebi nke ndụ nke ógè a na-egosi ma ịmara ógè ndị ọzọ na nkwenye na ịnya ụgbọ mmiri nke ugbu a
N'afọ 2022, e nyèrè Davis Guggenheim Fellowship
Ọ natawokwa onyinye site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere American Academy of Arts and Letters, Pollock-Krasner na Louis Comfort Tiffany foundations, na National Endowment for the Arts
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta ọha na eze nke Museum of Modern Art, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Fine Arts Museums nke San Francisco, na Victoria na Albert Museum (London), n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn na Hudson, New York ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ nke nka na Hunter College
A mụrụ Davis na Baltimore, Maryland
Nne ha zụlitere ya na nwanne ya nwoke mgbè nnà ha nwụrụ mgbè Davis dị afọ anọ
Nné yá rụrụ ọrụ abụọ iji zipụ ụmụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Quaker nke onwé ya, ma ọ bụghị ya ndị ọcha; ọ nwetakwara PhD na JD, na-aghọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa America mbụ na Maryland ime otú ahụ
Davis gara Mahadum Cornell afọ abụọ tupu ọ banye n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Pratt Institute na 1978 wee nweta BFA na 1980
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hunter College, na-amụ ihe na Lynda Benglis, Ron Gorchov na Rosalind Krauss, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, n'ụzọ inweta MFA na 1983
Davis malitere ịnata nkwado na 1990s, màkà ngosi na Art in General, Bronx Museum of The Arts, na Aljira, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ malitekwara ịkụzi ihe n'oge ahụ, na-eje ozi na Parsons School of Design, Cooper Union, Mahadum Yale, na malite na 2002, Hunter College, ébé ọ na-eduzi mmemme MFA Studio Art

Onye nkatọ Karen Wilkin dere na Davis 'na-eme ka mgbagwoju anya na njikọ dị iche iche' site na 'asụsụ na-enweghị atụ' nke ahụmahụ onwe ónyé, nyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka

Ihe osise ya yiri map n'otu oge na-eme ka ma na-emebi usoro nke koodu na ịhazi agbụrụ, njirimara na ihe ọmụma, na-eme ihe mgbagwoju anya, ihe mberede na ịdị mkpa nke nghọta na nghọta n'otu n'otu karịa usoro nchịkọta, mgbé mgbè
Ọ na-eme nke a site na ịmegharị ihe dị iche iche na ụdị nka iji gaa n'etiti echiche nke ezi uche na usoro na ụzọ nke ngosipụta, subjectivity na ọgba aghara

Ime akara ya na-ejikọta ụdị asụsụ abụọ na-enweghị atụ ahịrị a na-eji eme ihe n'ụzọ ziri ezi na geometry, mgbakọ na mwepụ na mmegharị aka, nke a na-elekarị anya n'ihe gbásárá ngosipụta mmetụta uche (dịka, na Abstract Expressionism)
N'ụzọ yiri nke ahụ, ọ na-eji ma ebumnuche, 'okike' agba na ngosipụta, mgbé ụfọdụ, agba aka, na-agagharị n'etiti nkọwa na usoro uche

Ụdị juxtapositions dị otú ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ na utu aha nke ọrụ ya, nke na-ejikọkarị okwu ndị dabeere na 'eziokwu' (ókèala, atlas, mgbakọ, ọnọdụ) na okwu ndị dị n'ime, nke na'echiche (nke a na-ekwu, nke na ọ bụ nke uche, nke metaphysical, nke impersonation)

Davis enwetala Guggenheim Fellowship (2022) na onyinye site na Pollock-Krasner Foundation, New York Foundation for the Arts, Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation, Bronx Museum of the Arts, National Endowment for the Arts
A kpọrọ ya onye otu American Academy of Arts and Letters na 2021 na ónyé academician nkè National Academy of Design na 2017
E nyela ya ebe obibi ndị na-ese ihe na Yaddo, Dora Maar House (Brown Foundation / Museum of Fine Arts, Houston), Siena Arts Institute (Italy), na MacDowell
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta ọha na eze nké Museum of Modern Art, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco, J
Paul Getty Museum, Montclair Art Museum, National Museum of Women in the Arts, New York Public Library, Rose Art Museum, Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Sheldon Museum of Art
Victoria and Albert Museum, na US Department of State, yana nchịkọta ụlọ ọrụ, mahadum na kọleji
Lisa Folawiyo bụ onye nrụpụta ejiji na Naijiria bụ onye amaara nke ọma maka ijikọ ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ nke Afrịka na textile yana usoro ịkwa akwa ọgbara ọhụrụ na-ekwusi ike na beading na sequin trim
Lisa Folawiyo nwere nzụlite iwu, nke ọ mụtara na Mahadum Lagos
Lisa Folawiyo bidoro akara ya 'Jewel by Lisa' n'afọ 2005 site n'ụlọ ya
Lisa Folawiyo nwere ụlọ ngosi na Naịjirịa yana New York
Ndị ama ama dịka Issa Rae eyiela efe ya
Rae yiri uwe cummerbund na BET Presents American Black Film Festival Honors
A na-egosiputa nchịkọta ya na US, UK, Naijiria na South Afrịka
N'afọ 2012 O so na atụmatụ nke Vogue Italia
Folawiyo lụrụ di na nwunye ruo afọ iri na anọ
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ abụọ
Ọgọ nna ya bụ onye nrụpụta ihe Wahab Iyanda Folawiyo
Lisa Fugard bụ onye odee na omee ihe nkiri South Afrika
A mụrụ ya na Port Elizabeth, South Afrika, ọ bụ naanị nwa onye na-ede egwuregwu Athol Fugard na onye edemede bụ Sheila Meiring Fugard

Fugard kwagara New York City na afo 1980 ịchụso ọrụ ime ihe, wee nweta ọtụtụ ọkwa na ọrụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Isabel Dyson na mmepụta mbụ nke ụmụ m nna nna ya! Africa m! Ya, di ya, na nwa nwoke (amụrụ 2004) ebiwo n'ọzara Southern California kemgbe mmalite na afo 2002, na Borrego Springs na Encinitas, n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'ebe ugwu San Diego
Kemgbe afo 1992, Fugard edeela ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirisi maka akwụkwọ akụkọ edemede, yana akụkọ maka ngalaba njem New York Times
Na Jenụwarị na afo 2006, o dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Skinner's Drift , , gbasara ọgbaghara n'otu ugbo South Africa na afo 1997
Fugard bụ ọkà okwu ọbịa na afo 2007 Literary Guild of Orange County Festival of Women Authors
Lisa Harrow ONZM (amụrụ ya na abalị ise na onwa nke asatọ, na afọ 1943) bụ on azụrụ azụ na ihie nkiri nke New Zealand RADA, ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Britain, ihe nkiri na ihie onyonyo
A mụrụ Harrow na mpaghara Auckland nke Ugwu Eden na 25 Ọgọst 1943, ada Kennedy Mayo Harrow na Eleanor Joan Harrow (née Stacpoole)

Ọrụ ogbo Harrow malitere na Royal Shakespeare Company ; Ọrụ ebe ahụ gụnyere Olivia na mmepụta nke abalị iri na abụọ nke John Barton na-emegide Judi Dench, yana Portia na The Merchant nke Venice megide Patrick Stewart

Ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-eduga na ihe nkiri UK gụnyere Juliet na-emegide John Hurt 's Romeo na Belgrade Theatre na Coventry, na Ann Whitfield na Man na Superman megidere Peter O'Toole na Theater Royal, Haymarket
Harrow emeela na ogbo na America niile
Ọ weghaara ọrụ etiti Vivian Bearing na Pulitzer Prize na-emeri egwuregwu Wit na mmepụta ya na- apụ apụ-Broadway na New York City
Akpọrọ ya aha 2001 Performer of the Year na Pittsburgh maka Medea
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Raynevsky na The Cherry Orchard na Yale Rep na Chautauqua Theatre Company, ebe ọ na-egwuri Kate Keller na All My Sons
Ọ gbara Creusa na Washington Shakespeare Theater Company 's 3 October 2009–4/12/2009 mmepụta nke Euripides 's Ion
Ọ gbara na United States na usoro PBS Masterpiece Theatre
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Italiantali The Devil Is a Woman (1974) nke Glenda Jackson gbara
Ọzọkwa na 1976, ọ pụtara na ihe omume nke Space 1999 dị ka Anna Davies na ' The Testament of Arkadia '
Harrow gbara Helen Alderson na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke akwụkwọ James Herriot All Creatures Great and Small (1975), na-esote Simon Ward na Anthony Hopkins
Ọ kwughachiri ọrụ ahụ n'afọ na-esote na usoro nke a ekwesịghị ime onye na-ahụ maka anụ ọkụ ọkụ, oge a na-emegide John Alderton na Colin Blakely
Harrow ọbịa-kpakpando na The Professionals dị ka onye ndụmọdụ dị egwu na-arụ ụka na Ụlọikpe nke Ajụjụ maka mgbasa nke CI5 na nkebi nke abụọ 'The Rack' (1978), nke Brian Clemens dere

Harrow gbara onye nta akụkọ Kate Reynolds na ihe nkiri egwu egwu Omen III The Final Conflict (1981) nke na-eme Sam Neill, wee soro Neill rụkọọ ọrụ ọzọ na ihe nkiri Krzysztof Zanussi From a Far Country [ya]
Ọ meriri ma nweta ihe nrite ihe nkiri Australia maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu maka arụmọrụ ya na Thebọchị Ikpeazụ nke Chez Nous (1992)

Na 1990, Harrow gbara nwunye tart, gbachie nwunye ya nkiti n'ime ezinụlọ aghụghọ nke ndị na-emepụta ihe bara ọgaranya na Sins nke Nna, Episode 13 nke usoro Inspector Morse maka ITV, nke John Thaw na-eme
Na afọ ahụ, ọ gbakwara ama na mmegharị ABC-TV obere ihie omume nke biara na Spinner, wee rụọ ọrụ Imogen Donahue na Agatha Christie's Poirot 'The Kidnapped Prime Minister'
Ihe omume onyonyo ya kacha ọhụrụ na Britain bụ nwunye Kavanagh Lizzie na usoro Kavanagh QC, na-egosikwa Thaw
Ọ hapụrụ mmemme ahụ mgbe usoro nke atọ gasịrị (ebufere na afo1997) ịkwaga America
ụkọ Kate Reynolds na ihe nkiri e u Omen III The Final Conflict (1981) nke na-eme Sam Neill, wee soro Neill r ụọ ọrụ ọzọ na ihe nkiri Krzysztof Zanussi From a Far Country [ ya ]
Na 1990, Harrow na-egwuri egwu tart, na-eleghara nwunye anya na ezinụlọ aghụghọ nke ndị na-emepụta ọgaranya na Sins of the Father, Episode 13 nke Inspector Morse series for ITV, starring John Thaw
N'afọ ahụ, o nwekwara starred na ABC-TV miniseries mmegharị nke Bịa na Spinner, na-egwuri ọrụ nke Imogen Donahue na Agatha Christie's Poirot ' The Kidnapped Prime Minister '
Ihe omume telivishọn ya kacha ọhụrụ na Britain bụ nwunye Kavanagh Lizzie na usoro Kavanagh QC, na-egosikwa Thaw
Ọ hapụrụ mmemme ahụ mgbe usoro nke atọ gasịrị (ebufere na 1997) ịkwaga America
Na afọ 2014, ọ gbara Marion na usoro igwe onyonyo nkiri New Zealand Step Dave
Na afọ 2015 Nkwanye Ùgwù afọ Ọhụrụ, a họpụtara Harrow ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke New Zealand Order of Merit maka ọrụ na nkà dị egwu
Harrow na Sam Neill nwere mmekọrịta na afọ 1980s
A mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Tim na afọ1983
Ugbu a ọ lụrụ onye ọkà mmụta ihe banyere whale Roger Payne, ma biri na Vermont, US
Payne bụ onye nchoputa na Onye isi oche nke Ocean Alliance

Ya na Scott McVay chọpụtara ogologo, mgbagwoju anya na o doro anya na ụda enweghị usoro nke nwoke humpback whales na-emepụta bụ n'ezie rhythmic, usoro ugboro ugboro, ya mere, a na-akpọ ya nke ọma ' abụ whale '
Di na nwunye a emepụtala nkuzi/mmebe ihe omume akpọrọ 'SeaChange Reversing the Tide'
Harrow bụ onye dere akwụkwọ ntuziaka gburugburu ebe obibi Gịnị ka m ga-eme?, nke e bipụtara na mbipụta dị iche iche maka Australia, New Zealand, UK na United States
O nwere weebụsaịtị iji kwalite akwụkwọ ahụ
Mbipụta US
Na afọ 2015 nkwanye ukwu afọ ọhụrụ, a họpụtara Harrow dika onye ọrụ nke New Zealand Order of Merit, maka ọrụ na nkà dị egwu
Lisa Nkosinathi Mangcu bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị oboro South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka otu African National Congress
Na 6 Machị n’afo 2023, a họpụtara Mangcu dịka osote minista na-ahụ maka njem
Lisa McVey Noland (amuru ya na onwa atọ na afọ 1967) bu onye uwe ojii America, onye oru enyemaka ulo akwukwo, na onye na-ekwu okwu mkpali sitere na Tampa, Florida
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 17, Bobby Joe Long tọọrọ ya, onye na-egbu ọchụ na onye n'ike n'ike nke wakporo ma gbuo ụmụ nwanyị 10 na Tampa Bay Area na 1984
McVey bụ otu n'ime ndị Long's ikpeazụ metụtara na ozi ọ nyere ndị uwe ojii mere ka ejide ya
Afọ ole na ole ka ihe mgbu ya gasịrị, McVey malitere ịchụso ọrụ na mmanye iwu
McVey akọpụtala n'ezoghị ọnụ ahụmahụ ya dị ka onye e merụrụ emerụ, ọbụna tupu a tọọrọ ya
“A na-emetọ m n'ụlọ
Enyi nne nne m na-atụnye m égbè n’isi mgbe ọ bụla ọ mejọrọ m afọ atọ
Ọ bụghị ihe ọhụrụ nye m
Otu ọnọdụ ọjọọ mere ka m banye n'ọnọdụ ọjọọ ọzọ bụ ihe zọpụtara ndụ m
N’ihi na n’abalị bọtara [n’ịbụ ndị a tọọrọ], m na-eme ihe banyere igbu onwe m, n’abalị ọzọkwa, m na-alụ ọgụ maka ndụ m”
Nne ya riri ahụ́ na-aṅụ ọgwụ ike manyere ya ibi na ilekọta nne nne ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 14
N'oge gara aga, ọ nọbu na nlekọta nkuchi
Na Nọvemba 3, 1984, a napụrụ McVey n'ịnyịnya igwe ya ka ọ na-agbaga n'ụlọ nne nne ya ka ọ rụchara ọrụ
E kpuchiri ya anya, jide ya na égbè, dinaa ya n'ike, ma taa ya ahụhụ ruo awa iri abụọ na isii
Ọ ga-emecha mara na onye mere ya bụ Long, bụ onye kpatara opekata mpe igbu mmadụ iri na ihe karịrị iri ise n'ike
N'oge a dọọrọ ya n'agha, McVey rịọrọ ka uche dị ka nwata nke onye tọọrọ ya wee chee na ọ ga-abụ enyi nwanyị nzuzo ya
Ọ kpalitere ọmịiko site na Long site n'ikwu na ya bụ naanị nwa nke nne na nna na-arịa ọrịa
Ọ d d d d d d d kpugide ya, kpugide ya, dogide ya, kpukpu ya, kpukpu ya, kpupu ya, pupu kwa ya
Mgbe o rutere n'ụlọ, a tiri ya ihe ma gbaa ya ajụjụ ruo awa ise banyere ebe ọ nọ
Akaụntụ ya nọgidere na-agbanwe agbanwe na n'ikpeazụ a kpọrọ ndị uwe ojii na ekwentị
McVey etinyela aka n'icheta ọtụtụ nkọwa gbasara ntọrọ ya na ụma hapụ mkpịsị aka ya n'ọtụtụ elu n'ime ụlọ ịsa ahụ Long iji nyere ndị uwe ojii aka ịmata ya ma ọ bụrụ ọnwụ ya
Site na nkọwa ya nke onye jidere ya, ụgbọ ala ya, ụzọ ha si were, na nkọwa ndị ọzọ, ndị uwe ojii nwere ike ịchọta Long wee jikọọ ya na mpụ ndị ọzọ
Ndị uwe ojii malitere ọrụ onyunyo wee jide Long na Nọvemba 16, 1984, maka mwakpo mmekọahụ na ịtọrọ mmadụ McVey
Na Septemba 23, 1985, Long rịọrọ mpụ ya megide McVey yana mgbakwunye asatọ ọzọ nke igbu ọchụ nke mbụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ asatọ nke ịtọrọ mmadụ, na ọnụ ọgụgụ asaa nke batrị mmekọahụ
Ọ nwetara ikpe ndụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọ bụla na Hillsborough County
Na mgbakwunye, ọ natara ikpe ọnwụ abụọ maka igbu ọchụ nke Michelle Denise Simms na Virginia Johnson
Mgbe e gburu Long na Mee 23, 2019, McVey na onye ọzọ lanarịrịnụ, Linda Nuttall, nọ ya
Na 1994, McVey malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ngalaba ogige ntụrụndụ na ogige ntụrụndụ nke Hillsborough County
Mgbe ọ kọrọ banyere nkwụsịtụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, onye osote onye bịara ebe ahụ kwuru, 'Ị nwere àgwà ịbụ onye uwe ojii
Ọ dịtụla mgbe ị chere nke ahụ?' Na 1999, a kpọgara ya n'ọfịs Hillsborough County Sheriff's Office dị ka onye na-ezipụ ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya idobere
O tinyere onwe ya site na ulo akwukwo ndi uwe ojii ma tinye ya na 2004
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ngalaba ahụ chọtara ma jide onye jichiri ya bụ ọkachamara n'ịlụso mpụ mmekọahụ ọgụ na ịrụ ọrụ iji chebe ụmụaka
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ enyemaka ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti ma na-eji akụkọ ya kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ ka ha ga-esi edozi ọnọdụ ndị nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ
Lisa Song bụ onye odeakụkọ America na onye edemede
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka ProPublica, na-akọ banyere gburugburu ebe obibi, ike na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Song gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Massachusetts Institute of Technology, nata nzere bachelọ ya na sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi na afọ 2008, yana Master ya na ide sayensị na afọ 2009
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka InsideClimate News, na-elekwasị anya na mmanụ na mmanụ gas, ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi, na sayensị ihu igwe site na January 2011 ruo February 2017

N'ime oge ya na InsideClimate, o nyere aka na usoro mmeri nke 'Dilbit Disaster' Pulitzer na 2013, akụkọ 'Big Oil', na usoro Exxon, nke a họpụtara dị ka onye ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite Pulitzer maka ọrụ ọha
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite atọ ọzọ, gụnyere Edgar A
Poe Award
Song hapụrụ InsideClimate na 2017 iji kọọ akụkọ maka ProPublica, na-ekpuchi ike, gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ nweere onwe ya, na-ede maka akwụkwọ akụkọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere, , Scientific American , New Scientist na Living on E arth
Usoro nke 3-akụkụ, na akụkọ ndị na-esote, bụ ihe nyocha nke ọnwa 15 na nchekwa pipeline na Dilbit , ụdị mmanụ na-ese okwu

N'akwụkwọ ozi mkpuchi maka ịbanye na ihe nrite, a kọwara dilbit dị ka 'hydrocarbon Canada siri ike nke a na-akpọ bitumen nke a na-agbaze na kemịkalụ mmiri mmiri ka ọ na-esi na ọkpọkọ' Pipeline enweelarị nsogbu corrosion na ọ bụ ihe karịrị otu izu tupu EPA mara na ha na-emekọ ihe na dilbit, n'ihi na ndị na-arụ ọrụ pipeline adịghị achọ ka ha gwa ndị na-aza ajụjụ mbụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-adaba; dilbit dị iche na mmanụ nkịtị, n'ihi na kemịkalụ na-ekupụ na oke, ụdị mmanụ dị iche iche, na-adaba na ala ma na-esi ike ihicha
A na-edepụta usoro na akụkọ nleba anya n'okpuru

Mgbe 2013 Pulitzer meriri nturu ugo mara ọkwa, InsideClimate News, bụ otu n'ime ndị kacha mara amara nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dijitalụ; Isi akụkọ Politico kọwara mmeri ahụ n'isi akụkọ ha, 'Maka mmalite mgbasa ozi gburugburu ebe obibi na-adịghị mma, ihe nrite kachasị mma nke akwụkwọ akụkọ' Naanị ihe nrite dijitalụ ka enyere kemgbe 2009 ma ole na ole meriri
Dị ka akwụkwọ ozi mkpuchi ahụ si kwuo, na ntinye maka ihe nrite, nchọpụta ndị ahụ sitere na nyocha nke Lisa Song malitere na mbụ, McGowan na Hasemyer sonyekwaara n'oge na-adịghị anya
Song dị naanị afọ 26, mgbe ọ meriri Pulitzer
Edepụtara ihe nrite ndị ọzọ n'okpuru

Na 2014 Song na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na InsideClimate, Jim Morris na David Hasemyer, natara Philip Meyer Journalism Award for Social Science for 'Big Oil, Bad Air Fracking the Eagle Ford Shale of South Texas' Ha nwetakwara onyinye Thomas L
Stokes maka ike kacha mma na ederede gburugburu ebe obibi, site na National Press Foundation maka otu akụkọ ahụ
Ugo Ford bụ otu n'ime ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na America
Edepụtara ihe nrite ndị ọzọ maka usoro Big Mmanụ, Ikuku ọjọọ na akụkọ sochirinụ n'okpuru
Na 2016, Song, na ndị nta akụkọ ibe ya bụ ndị ikpeazụ maka Pulitzer Prize for Public Service
Usoro akụkọ a sitere na nyocha ọnwa 8 maka mgbanwe ihu igwe nke Exxon

Mgbe emechara ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ na nyochaa memos ụlọ ọrụ site na azụ azụ dị ka 1970s, na ọtụtụ narị akwụkwọ dị n'ime, InsideCimate bipụtara usoro akụkọ 9, 'Exxon The Road Not Taken' Mbipụta nke usoro ahụ rụpụtara na Attorney General nke New York, na-enye akwụkwọ ikike na Exxon, iji lelee ohere nke wayo

N'ebe ụfọdụ na United States na Canada, ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala nwere ike ịbụ ndị na-eto eto dị ka iri na anọ (na nlekọta nne na nna)

Ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri China na -eme ka enwe njem nke unyi, igbe ngwa ahịa, ígwè na-ebubata, na ọka ya na mpịakọta ọrụ n'etiti ala na agwaetiti; ma na enye aka ime ka enwe ụzọ ibanye n'oké osimiri

N'ịrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, China ewusila usoro ụgbọ njem nkwe igbe na ebu ngwa ahịa ike, ma lekwasị anya n'iwu otu nnukwu otu akpa ụgbọ mmiri nke dị na Dalian, Tianjin, Qingdao, Shanghai, Ningbo, Xiamen na Shenzhen
Obodo China ji nke a, si otú a tọọ ntọala maka ebe nnukwu igbe nke ngwa ahịa ga na abata na apụ
E mepere ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ọhụrụ miri emi na Yangshan na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ obodo Shanghai
Ewusikwura usoro njem kol ike site n'ịrụ ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri maka ibu kolNa ntụkwasị na nke ahụ, arụgharịala ma ọ bụ gbasaa ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na -ebubata mmanụ na ihe ndị ọzọ
Na ngwụcha afọ 2004, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri China nwere ihe karịrị akwa puku abụọ na narị ise nke nha ma ọ bụ karịa, nke narị isii na iri ise n'ime ha dị puku iri
Akwa ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nwere ikike ijikwa igbe ngwa ahịa ruru nde iri isii na otu na ọkara maka otu afọ ahụ
Nke a mere obodo China ịbụ nke mbụ n'ọkwa n'ụwa na ihe gbasara nke a
Mpịakọta ibu nke ụfọdụ nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na enwe na afọ karịrị narị nde tọn
Edepụtara Shanghai, Shenzhen, Qingdao, Tianjin, Guangzhou, Xiamen, Ningbo na Dalian dị ka obodo iri ise sonyere ndị ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ha kacha elu n'ụwa
Otu narị na iri atọ n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri puku abụọ nke China ghe oghe maka ụgbọ mmiri si mba ọzọ

Nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, gụnyere ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke ụgbọ mmiri na -aga n'oké osimiri, nwere ike iga na ya bụ Beihai, Dalian, Dandong, Fuzhou, Guangzhou, Haikou, Hankou, Huangpu, Jiujiang, Lianyungang, Nanjing, Nantong, Ningbo, Qingdao, Qinhuangdao, Rizhao, Sanya, Shanghai, Shantou, Shenzhen, Tianjin, Weihai, Wenzhou, Xiamen, Yangzhou, Yantai, na Zhanjiang
Ihe ndị a bụ ndepụta usoro ahịrị ụzọ ụgbọ oloko si aga na okporo ígwè na China
Maka ụgbọ oloko nke nwere ike iga ọsọ ọsọ, lee Ndepụta nke ahịrị ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị elu na China

Iwu banyere nne na nna ịgbakota aka zụọ ụmụaka bụ mgbalị na mgbanwe ụlọ ikpe ezinụlọ iji mee ka nne na nna ịgbakota aka zụọ Ụmụaka na-ahụkarị na mmefu nke naanị ikike, ka ụmụ nke ndị nne na nna gbara alụkwaghịm wee nwee mmekọrịta chiri anya kwa ụbọchị na nne ha ma nna ha

Dabere na ọmụmụ nke sayensị na-egosi na ụmụaka na-eme nke ọma na ịkekọrịta ya na naanị ya, e nwere ọtụtụ òtù na-akwado iwu nne na nna, dị ka ndị mba America maka Ịdị nhata nke Nne na Nna, National Parents Organization, Ndị America maka Equal Shared Parenting the Children's Rights Council, Families Need Fathers, International Council on Shared Parenting, WISCONSIN for Children and Families (WFCF), na Leading Women for Shared Parenting
Ihe na-esonụ bụ ndepụta nke atụmatụ iwu nne na nna site na steeti na afọ tinyere ozi sitere na ụgwọ ọ bụla metụtara nne na nna na ọnọdụ ya ugbu a
Ụlọ ikpe ezinụlọ na-enyekarị iwu ka otu nne ma ọ bụ nna nwere ikike ileta onye nke ọzọ
Iwu dị iche iche nke nne na nna nwere ọdịiche ụfọdụ na echiche ole na ole nke a ga-akọwa ebe a
Mba Alabama Senate Bill 186 (2017) chọrọ ịmepụta echiche iwu na njigide nkwonkwo bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwatakịrị ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na akọwaghị ụdị oge ịkekọrịta oge a ga-atụle maka njide ọnụ, ọ wepụrụ asụsụ ahụ kpọmkwem na-ekwu 'nchekwa ọnụ apụtaghị na njide anụ ahụ nhata,' Iwu a nwụrụ n'ụlọ omeiwu ma enwetaghị votu n'ala

Mba Alaska House Bill 368 (2018) gbalịrị ịmepụta na echiche a na-agbagha agbagha nke ikerịta nlekọta anụ ahụ bụ maka ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwa ahụ, ma kọwaa ya dị ka nwa ya na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla bi maka pasentị iri ise (50%) nke afọ
Ibu ọrụ a chọrọ iji merie echiche ahụ bụ ọtụtụ ihe akaebe
Iwu a nwụrụ na kọmitii ma enwetaghị votu n'ala
N'afọ 2012, e webatara Arizona Senate Bill 1127

Ọ gbanwere ọtụtụ asụsụ gbasara iwu nlekọta ụmụaka nke, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ wepụrụ mkpa ọ dị ka ụlọ ikpe tụlee ọchịchọ nke ndị nne na nna ma ọ bụ ụmụaka na-erubeghị afọ na ntozu okè kwesịrị ekwesị, chọrọ ka ụlọ ikpe tụlee ma ọ bụrụ na otu nne ma ọ bụ nna kpachaara anya duhie ụlọ ikpe ma ọ bụ na-egbu oge usoro ahụ, gbaa ụlọ ikpe ume ka ha mepụta atụmatụ nne na nna nke na-eme ka oge dị ukwuu na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla, ma nye ụlọ ikpe ntụziaka ka ọ ghara ịtụle nwoke na nwanyị nke nne na nna ma ọ bụ ụmụ
N'adịghị ka ụgwọ ndị ọzọ a kpọtụrụ aha ebe a, ụgwọ a mepụtara echiche a na-agbagha megide njide ọnụ ma ọ bụrụ na ime ihe ike n'ụlọ mere
Iwu a gafere Senate nke Arizona site na otu olu na ụlọ Arizona site na votu nke 46 - 9
Gọvanọ Jan Brewer bịanyere aka na ya n'ụbọchị 9 n'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2012
N'afọ 2017, e webatara Arizona House Bill 2296
Iwu a gaara abanye n'echiche a na-agbagha agbagha na ime mkpebi iwu na oge nne na nna nhata bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwatakịrị ahụ
Iwu a nwụrụ n'ime ụlọ tupu ịnata votu n'ala
Connecticut depụtara ụgwọ abụọ n'afọ 2017 na-achọ ịzụlite nne na nna

House Bill 6638 (2017) gaara eme ọtụtụ mgbanwe gụnyere ịmepụta asụsụ gburugburu nkewa nke ndị nne na nna, ịgbanwe akụkụ ụfọdụ nke otú onye nlekọta ad litem si arụ ọrụ, ịmepụta echiche nke njide ọnụ na ibu akaebe doro anya na nkwenye, ma chọọ ka ụlọ ikpe banye n'ime nchọpụta ederede mgbe ọ na-enyeghị ikike nkwonkwo
House Bill 6645 chọrọ igosi na nne na nna na-ekerịta ohere nhata maka nwa ahụ bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwa ahụ, ọ gwụla ma ụlọ ikpe na-enye ihe akaebe dị ukwuu na-emegide ya
Iwu abụọ a nwụrụ na kọmitii ma enwetaghị votu n'ala
Florida Senate Bill 668 (2016) kwuru banyere ma nne na nna na alimony
Ọ gaara achọ ka ụlọ ikpe, mgbe ọ na-eme atụmatụ nne na nna, malite na echiche na obere nwa kwesịrị ịnọ ihe dịka oge nhata na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla
O wepụrụkwa asụsụ na-ekwu na ọ dịghị echiche maka atụmatụ nne na nna ọ bụla
Ọ chọkwara ịtọ oke ma na ego na oge nke alimony, na-etinye oge kachasị nke otu ọkara ogologo alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
Iwu a gafere Florida House na votu nke 74-38 na Florida Senate na votu nke 24-14
Ka ọ na-echere ntinye aka ma ọ bụ veto site n'aka Gọvanọ Rick Scott, ụlọ ọrụ ya natara ihe karịrị oku 11,000 gbasara ya; pasent 80 n'ime ha na-akwado
Scott nụkwara kpọmkwem site n'aka ọtụtụ òtù gụnyere National Organization for Women, Florida League of Women Voters, na ọtụtụ ndị nnọchi anya si Florida Bar bụ ndị megidere iwu ahụ
Scott mechara kpebie igbochi iwu ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel 15, 2016

Na nnọkọ omebe iwu nke afọ 2019-2020, onye nnọchi anya Jasmine Clark (D-108) webatara House Bill 1140, nke ga-emepụta echiche a na-agbagha agbagha na ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwatakịrị na-arụ ọrụ site na oge nne na nna nhata ma ọ bụ ihe dịka nhata na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla
E webatara iwu ahụ ma zigara kọmitii ikpe n'ọnwa Machị 9, 2020
A kwụsịrị ndị omebe iwu na Machị 13, 2020 n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 ma depụta iwu ahụ mgbe ndị omebe iwu gbakọtara ọzọ

Iwu a ga-eche ma na nwa ahụ kwesịrị inwe oge nhata na nne na nna ya nakwa na nne na nna abụọ ruru eru, ọ gwụla ma e nyere ụlọ ikpe ihe akaebe doro anya na nke doro anya ma ọ bụghị

Iwu a chọrọ ịmepụta echiche a na-agbagha agbagha na ọ bụrụ na e nyere ikike nchekwa iwu, a ga-enyekwa ikike nchekwa anụ ahụ
Ọ chọkwara ka ụlọ ikpe tinye ihe akaebe doro anya na nke doro anya mgbe ha na-enyeghị ikike nchekwa anụ ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, o wepụrụ asụsụ na-egosi na ụlọ ikpe kwesịrị ịtụle ma ọ bụrụ na otu nne ma ọ bụ nna na-emegide njigide ọnụ
Iwu a nwụrụ na kọmitii tupu ntuli aka n'ala
N'afọ 2019, e webatara House Bill 1276 na Oklahoma
Iwu a na-ekwu maka iwu nlekọta nwa oge na-achọ ka ụlọ ikpe nye oge nne na nna n'otu aka ahụ na arịrịọ nke otu nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ gwụla ma ọ chọpụtara na ọ bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwatakịrị ahụ ka ọ ghara

Ndị a bụ akwụkwọ ozi ndị yiri ya

Ha gaara ewebata echiche abụọ a pụrụ ịgbagha agbagha na atụmatụ nne na nna ọ bụla nne na nna abụọ kwenyere na ya bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwa ahụ, nakwa na ọ bụrụ na ndị nne na nna ekwenyeghị, ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwa ahụ bụ inwe oge hà nhata ma ọ bụ ihe dịka oge na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla
Echiche abụọ a chọrọ ihe akaebe doro anya na nke doro anya

Maka nnọkọ 2019-2020, Kansas webatara Senate Bill 157
Iwu a na-ekwu maka naanị iwu nchekwa nwa oge
Ọ na-eme ka a na-eche na ụlọ ikpe na-enye oge nne na nna nhata na iwu nwa oge
A gbakwunyere mgbanwe na-ewepụ echiche ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na e nyere ozi nke ga-akwado nchọpụta nke ụlọ ikpe na mmetọ n'ụlọ emeela

N'afọ 2017 Kentucky depụtara House Bill 492 , nke lebara iwu nchekwa nwa oge anya

Iwu a mere ka ọ bụrụ na nne na nna abụọ kwenyere na iwu nwa oge, ụlọ ikpe ga-eche na nke ahụ bụ ndokwa kachasị mma maka nwa ahụ nakwa na ọ bụrụ na ha ekwenyeghị, ụlọ ikpe ga-eche na nne na nna ga-ekerịta ikike nwa oge n'otu aka ahụ
Ibu ọrụ a chọrọ iji kwughachi echiche a bụ oke ihe akaebe, ụlọ ikpe ga-abanye eziokwu na nchọpụta mgbe ọ na-agbagha ya
Iwu a gafere Kentucky Senate na Kentucky House na-enweghị votu na-emegide ya ma Gọvanọ Matt Bevin bịanyere aka na iwu n'ụbọchị 10 Eprel 2017
N'afọ 2018 Kentucky webatara House Bill 528
Iwu a yiri House Bill 492 mana ọ na-ekwu maka iwu nchekwa na-adịgide adịgide

O mepụtara echiche a na-agbagha site n'ọtụtụ ihe akaebe na ma nlekọta nkwonkwo na oge nne na nna na-ekerịta n'otu aka ahụ bụ maka ọdịmma nke nwa ahụ ma chọọ ka ụlọ ikpe banye eziokwu na nchọpụta mgbe ọ na-apụ na nne na nna
N'adịghị ka House Bill 492, iwu a gbakwunyere, n'etiti ihe ndị a ga-atụle, ihe gbasara ma ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ikpe ahụ achọpụta na otu n'ime ndị otu ahụ mere ihe ike n'ụlọ
House Bill 528 gafere Kentucky Senate site na otu votu na Kentucky House site na votu 81-2
Gọvanọ Matt Bevin bịanyere aka na ya na 26 Eprel 2018
N'afọ 2011 Minnesota webatara House Bill 322
Tupu e webata ya, Minnesota nwere echiche na a ga-enye ndị nne na nna ma ọ dịkarịa ala 25% nke oge nne na nna
Iwu a na mbụ chọrọ ịbawanye ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ ruo 45%, mana emegharịrị ya iji mee ka oge nne na nna dị elu naanị ruo 35%
Iwu a gafere Minnesota House site na votu 86 - 42, ma gafere Minnesota Senate site na votu 46 - 19

Mgbe ọ nụsịrị site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya dịka Center for Parental Responsibility, na ndị mmegide gụnyere Ngalaba Iwu Ezinụlọ nke Minnesota Bar na ndị na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, Gọvanọ Mark Dayton kpebiri ịghara ịbụ abụ iwu ahụ, si otú a na-akpata veto n'akpa uwe
E webatara House Bill 2699 na Minnesota n'afọ 2017
Iwu a bu n'obi ịbawanye oge nne na nna kacha nta ruo 40%, ọ gwụla ma nne na nna abụọ kwenyere na nke ọzọ
Iwu a mere n'ime ụlọ
Minnesota depụtara House Bill 46 n'afọ 2019
Iwu a ga-achọ na, site na arịrịọ nke nne ma ọ bụ nna, enwere echiche a na-agbagha agbagha nke nkwonkwo iwu na nkwonkwo anụ ahụ ọ gwụla ma mmetọ n'ụlọ mere n'etiti ndị otu ahụ
Ọ ga-egosipụtakwa na nlekọta nkwonkwo pụtara na nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla na-enweta pasent 50 nke oge nne na nna
Iwu a na-ekwukwa na ụlọ ikpe nwere ike ikpebi otu esi agụta ihe pasent 50 nke oge nne na nna pụtara, ma na-atụ aro usoro ịgụta abalị

N'afọ 2016 Missouri webatara House Bill 1550
Iwu a chọrọ ka ụlọ ikpe tinye nchọpụta ederede n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla ebe ndị nne na nna ekwenyeghị na ndokwa nchekwa
O gosikwara na ụlọ ikpe nwere ike ọ gaghị eche na otu nne ma ọ bụ nna ruru eru karịa dabere na mmekọahụ ha
O guzobere usoro nke nne ma ọ bụ nna nke a na-agọnahụ oge nne na nna ha nwere ike iweta ya n'ụlọ ikpe
Ọ hụrụ na usoro ụlọ ikpe ezinụlọ agaghị anabata iwu obodo ọ bụla maka ịhazi ma ọ bụ ịmepụta atụmatụ nne na nna na-emezughị
N'ikpeazụ, ọ chọrọ ka ụlọ ikpe mepụta akwụkwọ ntuziaka na-akọwapụta ụkpụrụ nduzi banyere otu esi emepụta atụmatụ nne na nna a ga-ekesa nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla
Iwu a gafere Missouri House n'otu olu na Missouri Senate site na votu nke 149 - 2
Gọvanọ Jay Nixon bịanyere aka na ya

N'afọ 2018 Missouri webatara House Bill 1667, nke ga-eme ka echiche, nke a na-agbagha site n'ọtụtụ ihe akaebe, na oge nne na nna hà nhata ma ọ bụ ihe dịka hà nhata bụ maka ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwa ahụ
Iwu a gafere Missouri House site na votu nke 137 - 7, mana enwetaghị votu na Missouri Senate n'ihi Senator Schupp na-eyi egwu na ọ ga-egbochi ya

Ha na-achọ ịmepụta echiche, nke a na-agbagha site na ọtụtụ ihe akaebe, na oge nne na nna hà nhata ma ọ bụ ihe dịka nhata bụ maka ọdịmma kachasị mma nke nwa ahụ

House Bill 229 enweela mgbanwe iji dokwuo anya na ụlọ ikpe nwere ike ịnakwere ndokwa nne na nna ha kwenyere na ya n'emebighị echiche ahụ yana mmezigharị nke a na-emeri echiche ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na ụlọ ikpe ahụ achọpụta na usoro ime ihe ike n'ụlọ emeela
House Bill 229 si otú a bụrụ iwu mbụ ma nwụọ n'enweghị votu site na Missouri Senate floor
E webatara House Bill 236 na New Hampshire n'afọ 2017

Ọ gbakwara ụlọ ikpe ume, mgbe ọ na-eme atụmatụ nne na nna, iji hụ na ọdịiche dị n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ụbọchị a na-enye nne ma ọ bụ nna ọ bụla kwa afọ agafeghị ise

N'afọ 2018 Virginia depụtara House Bill 1351
Iwu a gosiri na ụlọ ikpe kwesịrị ịtụle inye ikike nchekwa ọnụ mana o guzobere na e kwesịghị inwe echiche maka ụdị nchekwa ọ bụla

N'afọ 2000 mba Wisconsin gbakwunyere mgbanwe iwu abụọ dị mkpa site na mmefu ego (ACT 9)
Echiche na nlekọta nkwonkwo bụ maka ọdịmma nwatakịrị
Na ntụziaka iji mee ka oge e nyere nne na nna ha abụọ
A gwara ụlọ ikpe dị na WI tupu nke a ka ha ghara ịtụle nwoke na nwanyị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma ọ bụ mkpebi itinye ya
Site na ọmụmụ ntinye n'ezie nke UW IRP mere na WI, itinye òkè okpukpu abụọ na 90s (site na ihe dị ka 15% ruo 30% na ikpe ịgba alụkwaghịm)
N'ime afọ iri mbụ nke afọ 2000 n'ihi mgbanwe iwu nke ACT 9, itinye òkè na ikpe ịgba alụkwaghịm mụbara ruo 50% (2010)
Ndị nne na nna na-alụbeghị di na nwunye mere nke ka njọ n'ihe gbasara nsonaazụ nne na nna ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị nne na nna na-agba alụkwaghịm (naanị 15% kesara n'afọ 2008)
E webatara ụgwọ mbụ nke Presumption of Equal Placement ọtụtụ ugboro n'ime afọ iri nke abụọ nke afọ 2000, mana enwetaghị nnukwu traction

Nnyocha na-adịbeghị anya (2019) nke UW-IRP mere ọzọ na-egosi na Wisconsin na Maine ekerela nsonaazụ nne na nna maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke ịgba alụkwaghịm, ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkezi nke 25% òkè na steeti ndị ọzọ
Wyoming webatara [https //legiscancom/WY/bill/HB0114/2019 House Bill 114 n'afọ 2019
E nyeghị iwu a
E nwere ìgwè ole na ole na-arụ ọrụ iji gbanwee iwu ndị ahụ ka ọ bụrụ echiche a na-agbagha agbagha nke nne na nna
Kids Deserve Dads na onye guzobere ya, Zac Martin na-eduga na ebubo iji weta ụmụ Wyoming nne na nna
A ga-enwe ụgwọ ọzọ n'ọdịnihu dị nso ma ọ bụ n'afọ 2022 ma ọ bụ 2023 nnọkọ
Listening to Prozac A Psychiatrist Explores Antidepressant Drugs and the Remaking of the Self bụ akwụkwọ nke onye isi mgbaka nke Peter D
Kramer dere
Edere ya na afọ 1993, akwụkwọ ahụ na-atụle otu ọganihu nke ọgwụ mgbochi ịda mbà n'obi Prozac nwere ike isi gbanwee ụzọ anyị si ele àgwà, na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti neurology na àgwà
Kramer chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'cosmetic pharmacology', ma n'akwụkwọ a ọ na-atụle ihe ọmụma, ụkpụrụ omume na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke iji psychopharmacology gbanwee otú mmadụ si akpa àgwà
Ọ na-ajụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ ihe a ga-agbachitere iji gwọọ onye nwere ahụike, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nyere ya aka ịrịgo ụlọ orụ, maọbụ n'aka nke ọzọ, ọ ga na a na'agbachite ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi ịjụ ya ohere ahụ
Ịge ntị na Prozac nọrọ ọnwa anọ na ndepụta ndị na-ere ahịa kacha mma na mba New York Times na mmetụta ya kpaliri ndị nkatọ ide akwụkwọ nwere aha yiri ya dịka Peter Breggin's Talking Back to Prozaak

The Fort Lauderdale Sun Sentinel kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'otu n'ime akwụkwọ sayensị kachasị ewu ewu e bipụtara n'ime afọ 1993', na-ekwu na 'Kramer na ikike zuru oke nke ihe ọmụma - site na mkpụrụ ndụ ndụ ihe nketa na ọmụmụ anụmanụ na akwụkwọ - nke ọ na'iji tinye mmetụta nke ndị na - antidepressants n' n-eche
N'aka ya, echiche ochie na mberede yiri ka ọ dị mkpa ọzọ, nke Prozac mere ka ọ dị ka ihe ọhụrụ ma na-enye nsogbu
N'ime nyocha nke New York Review of Books, Sherwin B
Nuland kwuru na Kramer 'jirila ngwa ngwa na iwu kachasị mkpa nke ndị dọkịta na-enyocha ahụmịhe ahụike ma na'atụ aro ụzọ ọhụrụ iji kọwaa ma ọ bụ gwọọ ọrịa dị iche iche

Ụkpụrụ ndị ahụ chọrọ (1) nyocha nke ọma na nke onwe onye ọrịa ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ na-adịghị mma; (2) nyocha aka nke akwụkwọ niile dị mkpa nke na'ihe gbasara nsogbu ahụ; (3) nlebara anya nke ukwuu na akụkụ ọ bụla nke ihe akaebe ahụike, ma na ọ na - ọ kwadoro echiche na na ya na na (4) mkpebi ịghara ịkọ nkọ karịa ihe ziri ezi site na data a chịkọtara na ihe ọ pụtara
' Nuland kwuru na Kramer ejirila ihe mbụ ọ chọpụtara iji bulie nkwupụta na-enweghị isi na akwụkwọ azụmahịa na ihe ngosi TV, nke ndị mgbasa ozi ọkachamara haziri nke ọma
Kramer zaghachiri na nyocha a, na-ekwu na Nuland 'na-aga n'ihu na ịtọ ntọala ya dị ka dọkịnta ochie (nke Dr
Bean, onye maara akụkọ serotonin, wdg, zụrụ) wee ghara iji otu ihe ngosi nke mwakpo ya
The Kirkus Reviews kọwara Listening to Prozac dị ka 'ajụjụ ọnụ a na-eche echiche na akụkọ ihe mere eme na anụ na nyocha ndị n'oge na nso a kwadoro akwado
Nnyocha amamihe na nke na-adịghị agwụ agbagọ nke mmetụta maka ọha mmadụ - na maka onye ọ bụla - mgbe capsule n'onọdụ sofa
Daniel X

Freedman, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke American Psychiatric Association, dere na Listening to Prozac sị anaghị enye ntụziaka a pụrụ ịdabere na ya maka ndị na-achọ onwe ha ma ọ bụ ndị chọrọ mmeghe doro anya na sayensị ụbụrụ na nkà mmụta ọgwụ

Listia bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko n'ezinụlọ Fabaceae na agbụrụ Crotalarieae
A na-ahụkarị ndị otu a n'ebe ndịda Afrịka mana enwere ike ịchọta ụdị ụfọdụ n'etiti Afrịka
E kewapụrụ ya na nso nso a na ụdị Lotononis
N'adịghị ka ndị ọzọ so na otu Crotalarieae, ndị so na ụdị Listia nwere mgbọrọgwụ nke lupinoid
Aha ụdị nke Listia bụ na sọpụrụ Friedrich Ludwig List (1779-1837), onye bụ onye mụrụ banyere ọkụkụ osisi nke si German na onye nkuzi
Ernst Heinrich Friedrich Meyer depụtara ụdị ahụ na Comm
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Ọktoba (Meyer) peeji nke iri asatọ na afọ 1835
Dị ka Kew kwetara

Akwụkwọ ahụ n'ihu na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka 'ihe ndekọ ziri ezi na nke eziokwu (site na akwụkwọ akụkọ) nke omume dị iche iche nke mmụọ ime mmụọ ma ọ bụ (Devils Incarnate) Witches ma ọ bụ abụọ na nnukwu nsogbu na ihe ijuanya ha nyere ezinụlọ George Walton n'otu ebe A na-akpọ Great Island na mpaghara New Hampshire na New England, nke kachasị na-atụba ihe (site n'aka anaghị ahụ anya) Nkume, brik na brik-Bats nke nha niile, yana ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka Hammers, Mauls, Iron-Crows, Spits , na arịa ndị ọzọ, dị ka batara n'uche ha Hellish, na nke a maka ohere nke otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke otu afọ'Lithobolia ma ọ bụ, Ekwensu na-atụ nkume bụ akụkọ akụkọ mmadụ 7,000 nke Richard Chamberlayne bipụtara na mbụ na London na 1698
A na-ewere ya dị ka ihe atụ mbụ nke akwụkwọ esoteric na ide egwu egwu karịrị nke mmadụ, ma e jiriwo ya tụnyere akụkọ poltergeist ọgbara ọhụrụ
'Stone-Throwing Devil' mere ka ọ dị egwu na Great Island (New Castle nke oge a, New Hampshire) na 1682
Ọtụtụ narị nkume zoro n'ụzọ dị omimi n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ George Walton, yana ya, nwa ya nwoke Shadrach na ndị ọzọ nọ nʼógbè ahụ noge ọkọchị dum
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ dịghị onye bịara n'ihu hụrụ onye ọ bụla na-atụ nkume
Ọtụtụ ihe omume ndị ọzọ a na-akọwaghị akọwa mekwara n'oge ahụ
A nụrụ olu ndị mmụọ ọjọọ, a tụkwara ihe n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Walton
Minista a ma ama na Boston Increase Mather kọwara ihe ndị dị ịtụnanya n'akwụkwọ ya bụ Illustrious Providences
George Walton, onye ya na onye agbata obi ya nọ na esemokwu maka ala, boro ya ebubo amoosu
Ya onwe ya, n'aka nke ya، boro ya ebubo na ọ bụ onye dibịa afa
Ndị ọzọ nọ n'ógbè ahụ nwekwara ike ịnwe ihe mere ha ji atụ nkume na Walton
Ọ bụ onye Quaker
Ndị Puritan na-enyo ndị Quakers enyo nke ukwuu, naanị ịbụ onye Quaker bụ mpụ
Walton bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, onye ahịa, na onye ọrụ osisi, ma ghọọ onye nwe ala kachasị ukwuu n'àgwàetiti ahụ
Ndị agbata obi ya na-adịchaghị arụsi ọrụ ike na Walton na ya gbara ya anyaụfụ
E nwekwara ọtụtụ ikpe maka esemokwu azụmahịa na ihe onwunwe
O nwekwara ndị ọrụ American Indian abụọ, nke gaara akpata nnukwu nchegbu n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe agha na ndị India gasịrị (King Philip's War) na n'ihi udo na'enweghị isi dị
Ndị ahịa ya na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị na-eme mkpọtụ, gụnyere ndị ọkụ azụ 'na-enweghị chi', ndị ndị ọzọ nọ n'àgwàetiti ahụ weere dị ka ndị a na'achọghị
N'agbanyeghi ihe mere Walton na ụlọ oriri ya ji bụrụ ndị mmiri ozuzo nkume na-ezo ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, ọ bụ nnukwu ntiwapụ mbụ nke amoosu doro anya na America
N'ime afọ ole na ole, ebubo nke amoosu ga-eme n'obodo ndị ọzọ dị na New England, na-agwụcha na ikpe ndị amoogo a ma ama na Salem, Massachusetts
Lithunia (asụsụ lithuanian Lietuvos Respublika), nke ana-kpo kwa, Republic of Lithuania bụ otu obodo no na Obodo Békè

Little Miss Geek bụ mkpọsa nke na-ezube ịkpali ụmụ agbọghọ ịtụle ọrụ na teknụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu vidio
Little Miss Geek bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị maka uru nke Lady Geek, ụlọ ọrụ na'ime mkpọsa nke na-achọ ime ka teknụzụ dịkwuo mfe ma na-adọrọ mmasị ụmụ nwanyị
Belinda Parmar na ndị otu ya na Lady Geek malitere mkpọsa ahụ na 3 Ọktoba nke afo 2012 na Ụlọ Ahịa Apple na Regent Street
Maka afo 2013 Ada Lovelace Day, Little Miss Geek mepụtara mkpọsa iji tinye 'Her In Hero'

N'ikwu na 'ụmụ nwanyị nwere ọganihu na teknụzụ dị, mana anaghị eme emume ha n'otu ụzọ ahụ ụmụ nwoke ibe ha dị', mkpọsa ahụ gbara ụlọ akwụkwọ na ndị omeiwu ume ime emume nnukwu ụmụ nwanyị teknụzụ, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị na-emepụta ihe iji kpalie ụmụ agbọghọ na ihe nlereanya dị mma

Mgbasa ozi ahụ mere n'ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ 15 gafee UK, ruru ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 10,000 ma nweta nkwado nke ihe karịrị ndị omeiwu 40 gụnyere Ms Jo Swinson MP, Hon Ed Vaizey MP, na Rt Hon Theresa May MP
Mgbasa ozi ahụ nwetara mgbasa ozi na Metro na Guardian
E mere ihe omume n'ụtụtụ Ada Lovelace Day na Highgate Wood School, na-egosi okwu sitere n'aka Siobhan Reddy nke Media Molecule banyere ahụmịhe ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu na otu o si banye na ya

Na 8 Machị nke afo 2013 (Ụbọchị Ụmụ nwanyị nke Mba Nile) Little Miss Geek gbara ọsọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Miss Geek ICT Takeover na ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ dị na London Queen Elizabeth's School for Girls na St Saviour's na St Olave's Church of England School
Onye omeiwu Simon Hughes gara nnọkọ ahụ na Boris Johnson onye kwuru okwu n'ụbọchị ahụ
Ihe omume ahụ jiri kọmputa Raspberry Pi mee ihe iji nye ụmụ agbọghọ ahụmịhe mmepe ngwanrọ n'ezie, ma dozie enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ
Dị ka Parmar si kwuo, ebumnuche ihe omume Takeover bụ iji dozie nsogbu onyinyo 'ụmụ agbọghọ na-eche na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na teknụzụ bụ ndị na-ahụ pizza n'anya na-enweghị ike inweta ndị enyi nwanyị
Eziokwu bụ na teknụzụ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-emepụta ihe n'ebe ahụ
'[Ụmụ agbọghọ na-arọ nrọ iji iPad mini na smart-phone kachasị ọhụrụ, mana ha anaghị arọ nrọ ịmepụta ya
Parmar bụ onye nkatọ nke agụmakwụkwọ teknụzụ nke Britain

Ọ na-ekwu, sị 'Ụzọ agụmakwụkwọ kwesịrị ịbụ ebe anyị ga-agbanwe ahụmịhe nwata na teknụzụ ka ọ bụrụ nghọta banyere kọmputa, ebe anyị na-atọ ntọala maka nwatakịrị ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'oge okenye ọ bụghị naanị na ọ nwere mmasị na teknụgbọ, kamakwa nkà iji malite ịsọ mpi na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, dị ka ọ dị, anyị na-ada ụmụ anyị
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013 Little Miss Geek mere ihe omume Wearable Tech na ememe nke International Girls na ICT Day na St Saviour's na St Olave's Church of England School
Justin Tomlinson MP gwara ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ ihe mere British Economy ji chọọ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na teknụzụ

Ihe omume ahụ gosipụtara onyinye sitere n'aka onye na-emepụta ejiji Francesca Rosella, ndị ọkachamara na teknụzụ ejiji Cute Circuit, Microsoft na ndị ọkà okwu sitere na British Fashion Council ma e mere ya iji mebie 'akụkọ ifo na teknụgbọala bụ klọb ụmụ nwoke'
British Vogue kọwara ihe omume ahụ dị ka 'Nkwekọrịta nke Fashion na Technology', agbanyeghị Metro jụrụ ma enwere ike iji ejiji mee ihe iji mee ka ụmụ agbọghọ mara teknụzụ
Imeju nke anụ na-enye nwa ara, nnụnụ, na azụ na-erikarị dị ka nri ụmụ mmadụ (lee offal)
Anụ ezì, nwa atụrụ, nwa ehi, anụ ehi, ọkụkọ, goose, na afọ cod dị n'ọtụtụ ebe site na ebe a na-egbu anụ na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa ebe afọ stingray na burbot bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na mba ụfọdụ na Europe
Imeju anụmanụ bara ọgaranya na iron, ọla kọpa, vitamin B na vitamin A
Ọ maghị ma iri imeju kwa ụbọchị nwere ike imerụ ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na ọ nweghị nchọpụta doro anya e mere na nsị nke vitamin A sitere na nri
Otu inye imeju anụ ehi karịrị ọkwa dị elu nke vitamin A
100 g imeju cod nwere 5 mg nke vitamin A na 100 μg nke vitamin D
Imeju bụ otu n'ime ihe kpatara ịchọpụta vitamin B12, nke e mechara chọpụta na o nwere nnukwu ya

The livers of polar bears, walruses, bearded seals, moose, and huskies can contain very high levels of preformed vitamin A, and their consumption has led to vitamin A poisoning (hypervitaminosis A) according to several anecdotal reports
The Inuit will not eat the liver of polar bears or bearded seals
It has been estimated that consumption of 500 grams of polar bear liver would result in a toxic dose for a human
Russian sailor Alexander Konrad, who accompanied explorer Valerian Albanov in a tragic ordeal over the Arctic ice in 1912, wrote about the awful effects of consuming polar bear liver

Also, in 1913, Antarctic explorers on the Far Eastern Party Douglas Mawson and Xavier Mertz were believed to have been poisoned, the latter fatally, from eating husky liver, though this has been contested recently

From Middle English liver, from Old English lifer, from Proto-Germanic *librō, from Proto-Indo-European *leyp- “to smear, smudge, stick”, from Proto-Indo-European *ley- “to be slimy, be sticky, glide”

Cognate with Saterland Frisian Lieuwer “liver”, West Frisian lever “liver”, Dutch lever “liver”, German Leber “liver”, Danish , Norwegian and Swedish language lever “liver” the last three from Old Norse lifr “liver”

N'asụsụ Romance, okwu anatomical maka 'agụ' (French foie, Italian fegato, Spanish hígado, wdg) sitere na okwu anatomikal Latin, jecur, kama site na okwu nri ficatum, n'ụzọ nkịtị 'jupụtara na fig,' na-ezo aka na eriri afọ nke geese nke e gburu na fig (foie gras)
Enwere ike isi imeju, náa ya n' oku, sie, ghe ya eghe, hụo ya ahụ ọ, ma ọ bụ rie ya na-esighị ya n' ọkụ (dị ka nayeh ma ọ bụ sawda naye na nri Lebanọn, sashimi imeju)
N'ọtụtụ nkwadebe, a na-ejikọta akụkụ imeju na akụkụ anụ ma ọ bụ akụrụ, dịka n'ụdị dị iche iche nke Middle East mixed grill (dịka meurav Yerushalmi)
Spreads ma ọ bụ pâtés e ji imeju mee nwere aha dị iche iche, gụnyere imeju pâté, pâté de foie gras, imeju a pịrị apị, liverwurst, imeju gbasaa, na Braunschweiger
Sosage imeju ndị ọzọ gụnyere mazzafegato ma ọ bụ salsiccia matta
A na-eji imeju nwa atụrụ a pịrị apị nke e ji netvet (mkpụrụ abụba) sie nri ọdịnala South Africa, nke a na-akpọ skilpadjies, ma sie ya n'elu ọkụ
Some fish livers are valued as food, especially the stingray liver
It is used to prepare delicacies, such as poached skate liver on toast in England, as well as the beignets de foie de raie and foie de raie en croute in French cuisine
Cod liver (usually tinned in its oil and served seasoned) is a popular spread for bread or toast in several European countries
In Russia, it is served with potatoes
Cod liver oil is commonly used as a dietary supplement
Liver of burbot is eaten in Finland it is common for fish vendors and supermarket fish aisles to sell these fish with liver and roe sacks still attached
These parts are often eaten boiled or added to burbot soup
Burbot and its liver are a traditional winter food

The Inuit will not eat the liver of polar bears or bearded seals
It has been estimated that consumption of 500 grams of polar bear liver would result in a toxic dose for a human
