Livespot X Festival bụ egwu egwu nke malitere na 2019 na mbipụta mbụ ya na Lagos, Nigeria na Accra, Ghana nke Livespot360 haziri
Livespot X Festival gosipụtara ngwakọta nke ihe ngosi ọha; egwu, ọkụ, ihe omume pụrụ iche, na ahụmịhe dị egwu ha niile n'otu ihe omume dị elu
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara usoro ihe omume ndị Afrịka nke sitere n'ọtụtụ mbanke gụnyere Naịjirịa, US

Ememe afọ 2019 nke Livespot X Festival kpughere ndị na-agụ egwu nke gụnyere Cardi B, Teni, Burnaboy, Tiwa Savage, Seyi Shay, Joeboy, Ice Prince, DJ Cuppy, Reekado Banks, na Patoranking nke emere na Lagos na Ghana

Ememe afọ 2020 kpughere ndị na-agụ egwu dị iche iche nke gụnyere Darey, Yemi Alade, Simi, DJ Cuppy, Joeboy, Mayorkun na kọntaktị mbụ na Naịjirịa na Disemba 19 na 20 ma setịpụ ya iji gosipụta Burna Boy na Wizkid dị ka oge mbụ ha ga-anọ n'elu ikpo okwu
Na Disemba 15, 2020 ndị njikwa mara ọkwa na-agaghi eme mmemme ahụ n'ihi mmụba nke ọrịa COVID-19 na Lagos, Naịjirịa

A mara ọkwa mbipụta 2021 na Nọvemba 13, 2021, site na Disemba 16 ruo 21 2021 na Livespot360 ultra-innovative arena nke ga-egosipụta ihe ngosi dị iche iche ndị a haziri ahazi na ahụmịhe mmetụta dị iche iche maka ndị bịara nke gụnyere ihe ngosi site n'aka ndị omenkà dị iche iche na ihe omume pụrụ iche
Living in Bondage na asụsụ bekee ma ọ bụ ibi ndu na nkekọ bụ ihe nkiri ndi Nigerian emere n'afọ 1992/93 nke nwere akụkụ abụọ
Kenneth Nnebue na Okechukwu Ogunjifor bụ ndi dere ihe ejije thriller nkea ebe Chris Obi Rapu haziri ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri Jafac Wine nyere nkwado maka ime pụta ihe nkiri nkea
E mere ihe nkiri nkea ozigbo na vidio, Kenneth Okonkwo na Nnenna Nwabueze bu ndi obụ ụzo egwu na ihe nkiri Living in Bondage
Na Ọgọstụ 2015, Charles Okpaleke nwetara ikike maka ihe nkiri Living in Bondage ruo afọ iri n’okpuru ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, Play Entertainment Network
Na Nọvemba 2 2019, akụkụ abụọ ihe nkiri a nke a na-atụ anya ya nke ukwuu, Living In Bondage Breaking free, pụtara na Lagos

Andy Okeke ( Kenneth Okonkwo ) na nwunye ya Merit (Nnenna Nwabueze) nwere ọtụtụ nsogbu nke chere ha n'ihụ - enweghị ọrụ, enweghị ego, itinye aka na ịchụ ego adịgboroja, yana atụmatụ adịghị mma nke ụmụ nwoke na enwe ebe Merit nọ gụnyere onye isi na ihụ ọrụ ya nke bụ Ichie Million (Francis Agu) na Chief Omego ( Kanayo O
Kanayo )
Andy na-atụnyere enweghị akụ na uba ya na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị ọgbọ ya, ọkachasị enyi ochie ya Paul (Okechukwu Ogunjiofor)
N'agbanyeghị nkwado na ndidi Merit, Andy daba na ịda mbà n'obi, ma kpebisie ike inweta akụ na ụba n'ụzọ ọ bụla ọnwere ike

Paul, onye na-ekwu okwu nzuzu kpughe ihe nzuzo ya - òtù nzuzo nke ekwensu, ebe ndị otu na ekwe nkwa iguzosi ike n'ihe ha n'nye Lucifer nke bụ ịgbuo ndị ha hụrụ n'anya na emume ịchụ àjà, ka ha were nweta akụ na ụba dị ukwuu na nloghachi
Mgbe o nwechara obi abụọ, Andy kwenyesiri ike ịjị onye ọ kacha hụ n'anya - Merit wee chụ àjà
Merit nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụbọchị ole na ole ememe ahụ gasịrị, mana tupu nke ahụ ọ bụrụ Andy ọnụ maka arụ ahụ
Ọganihu na aku na uba Andy na mberede na ịlụgharị nwunye ọzọ na ọnwa atọ ka Merit nwụsịrị mee ka ndị ọgọ ya malite ebubo na ọ ma ihe mee nwa ha nwanyị

O nwekwara nsogbu ndị ọzọ - ndi nta akụkọ na-enyocha ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị, nwunye ọhụrụ ya bụ Ego ( Ngozi Nwosu ) buru ego ya gba ọsọ mgbe ọ daa na agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnala ha, mmụọ Merit na-apụta na eyi ya ụjọ ma na-atụ ya egwu mgbe ọ na-atụghị anya ya
Andy mecha kpọrọ nwanyi ọzọ, Chinyere (Jennifer Okere), onye nke enyi nwanyị Merit na mbụ bụ Caro (Ngozi Nwaneto) kpọbatara ya
Chinyere zuuru di ya ohi
Mana ọ ezute ọnwụ ya mgbe Caro nyere ya nsị
Caro gbalịsie kwa ike iji ego nwanyi ahụ zuru na ohi n'aka Andy wee gbapụ na mba ọzọ mana ụgbọ ala gburu ya na mberede ka ọ na eje ebe ana banye ụgbọ elụ
Paul mecha bụrụ onye egburu mgbe Andy chere eche maka ndụ ya wee kpebie na Paul dụfere ya uzo
Andy nwere nnukwu nkụda mmụọ ma rịọ ndị òtù nzuzo nke ekwensu ahụ maka enyemaka

Onye Isi Nchụaja (Daniel Oluigbo) siri ọnwụ na nanị ihe ọ nwere ike ime ka mmụọ nwunye dajuọ bụ ime ka ọ kpuo ìsì na ihe ndị ọzọ, ọ jụrụ ma bụrụ zia onye isi na-adịghị mma, na-ebi ndụ dị na n'okporo ụzọ n'obodo Lagos wee ruo mgbe Tina (Rita Nzelu) - onye akwụna Andy kpọtara na mbụ nye ndị òtù nzuzo dị ka onye nnọchite anya maka Merit nke ha chọpụta aghụghọ ahụ wee kwechiri na ọ bụ ka ha ga egbu
Tina kpọgara Andy n’ụlọ ofufe ya ebe ọ mechara kwupụta na ogburu Merit
Nne Andy (Grace Ayozie) bere akwa n'ili Merit nrịọ ya mgbaghara
Na ihe ikpeazụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ, Andy, nke a gwọrọ ara, soro na-efe ofufe ndị Kraịst ndị kwenyere na a gbagharala ya mmehie ya
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Kanayo, Agu, Udokwu, Molugbe, na Osu bụ ndị bụbu ndị na eme ihe nkiri na onyonyo nke ak pọrọCheckmate, ebe Okere so na ihe nkiri Ripples
Ndia nyeere aka ime ka ọha mmadụ mara ihe nkiri Living in Bondage
Nwabueze, Nwosu na Ogunjiofor bụ naanị ndị na apụtaghị na akụkụ ihe nkiri ahụ nke abụọ
N'afọ 2015, onye omee ihe aka ochie Ramsey Nouah nwetara ikike maka Living in Bondage n'aka Kenneth Nnebue maka ịmegharị ya ọhụụ a
Emechara gosiputa ozi a na Instagram, mana ihe nkiri nke nsochie a pụtaghị ruo afọ atọ
Na 2018, Nouah kwuputara na ihe nkiri nsochi ahụ nke akpọrọ ugbu a Living in Bondage Breaking Free, enwela isi
Ọ wepụtara ya na Nọvemba 8, 2019
Ngwangwa, ihe nkiri nke ahụ bụrụ onye nkiri 11 nke kachasị na Naijiria
Nouah, onye pụtara dịka onye isi ụkọchukwu ọhụụ ndi otu nzuzo bu kwa onye haziri ihe nkiri,a nke bụ fem mbụ ọ na-eduzi
Ndị mbido ihe nkiri Living in Bondage - Okonkwo, Udokwu, na Kanayo so kwa na nkea
Rapper, na Muna Abii na Swanky JKA so kwa na ihe nkiri nke a
Liya Kebede (Amharic ሊያ ከበደ; amụrụ na 1 Maachị 1978) bụ onye Etiopia, onye na-eme ihe nlereanya, onye na-akwado ahụike nne, onye na-emepụta uwe, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara n'ihu akwukwọ Vogue ugboro atọ
Kebede jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya WHO maka ahụike nne, nwa ọhụrụ na nwa kemgbe afọ 2005
A mụrụ Kebede ma zụlite ya na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Amhara
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị n'ezinụlọ ahụ nke nwere ụmụnne anọ
Onye nduzi ihe nkiri hụrụ ya mgbe ọ na-aga Lycée Guebre-Mariam, ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ọ mụtara French nke ọma, wee kọwaara ya nye onye na-eme ihe ngosi French
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ kwagara France iji chụsoo ọrụ site na ụlọ ọrụ Paris
Kebede mechara kwaga US, na mbụ na Chicago ma mesịa na New York City
Nnukwu iwu ewu Kebede bịara mgbe Tom Ford gwara ya maka nkwekọrịta pụrụ iche maka ihe ngosi ejiji Gucci n'oge Fall/Winter afọ 2000
Mgbe ahụ na Mee 2002 ọ nọ n'ihu Paris Vogue, nke raara mbipụta ahụ dum nye ya
A hụla Kebede na mkpuchi nke Italian, Japanese, American, French na Spanish Vogue, V, i-D na Time's Style & Design
E gosipụtara ya na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi gụnyere ndị nke Shiatzy Chen, Gap, Yves Saint-Laurent, Victoria's Secret, Emanuel Ungaro, Tommy Hilfiger, Revlon, Dolce & Gabbana, Escada na Louis Vuitton
N'afọ 2003, a kpọrọ Kebede ihu kachasị ọhụrụ nke ihe ntecha Estée Lauder, naanị onye Etiopia jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ha na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A na-ekwu na nkwekọrịta ya ruru nde dọla atọ
N'oge a n'ọrụ Kebede, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke mbụ na modelscom
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007, ebe Kebede nwetara nde dọla abụọ na pụkụ narị dọla ise n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ gara aga, Forbes kpọrọ ya nke iri na otu na ndepụta nke World's 15 Top-Earning Supermodels
N'afọ sochirinụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri James Scully jiri ya tụnyere 'onye Grace Kelly dị iche'
N'afọ 2009, Kebede pụtara na ihe nkiri nke Desert Flower nke onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Waris Dirie
E gosipụtara ya na Venice Film Festival ma nweta otuto kwụ ọtọ
Kebede nwekwara obere ọrụ na The Good Shepherd (2006) na Lord of War (2005)
O gosipụtara dị ka 'Face of the Moment' na May 2009 US Vogue

N'afọ 2011, Kebede so n'ime ndị nlereanya gosipụtara na mkpọsa 'ọdịdị ọhụrụ' nke Lacoste na Jenụwarị, na mgbasa ozi nke Mert na Marcus gbasara, na-egosi ndị nlereanya na-eyi uwe elu Lacoste polo ọcha na-eyi n'elu uwe mgbede ojii
Kebede so Jake Gyllenhaal mee ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi Calvin Klein
Kebede nọ ugbu a na ndepụta nke 'New Supers' site na modelscom
Kebede malitere Lemlem, akara ejiji, na 2007
Lemlem, nke pụtara 'ịfụli' (to bloom) n'asụsụ Amharic, na-egosipụta uwe ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka eji aka, nke a na-akpa akwa ma na-achọ mma
Kebede guzobere akara ahụ iji nyere aka chekwaa nka nke ịkpa ákwà ọdịnala na Etiopia, na inye ndị omenkà mpaghara ohere ọrụ
A na-ere akara ahụ na ụlọ ahịa otu narị na iri ise
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara Kebede dị ka onye nnọchi anya WHO Goodwill maka ahụike nne, nwa ọhụrụ na nwa
O guzobere Liya Kebede Foundation, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ibelata ọnwụ nne, nwa ọhụrụ na ụmụaka na Etiopia na gburugburu ụwa
Nzukọ ahụ na-akwado nkwado na ọrụ mmata yana inye nkwado kpọmkwem maka teknụzụ dị ọnụ ala, agụmakwụkwọ obodo, na ọzụzụ na mmemme ahụike
N'otu ụlọ ọgwụ nke ntọala ahụ na-arụ ọrụ, nnyefe ụlọ ọgwụ jiri ihe karịrị pasent ịrị ise rịa elu n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ
Kebede agaala Etiopia iji kwado ọrụ ahụike nne n'ọtụtụ oge
N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation dị ka akụkụ nke Living Proof Project
Kebede jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ dị elu maka akụkọ Center for Global Development nke afọ 2009 'Bido na nwa agbọghọ Agenda ọhụrụ maka ahụike ụwa'

Kebede na-ede ihe na The Huffington Post banyere ahụike nne na nwa, a gosikwara ya na Vogue na The Daily Beast Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mmeri maka ọgbọ na-enweghị nje HIV, otu ndị isi Afrịka nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Botswana Festus Mogae duziri
N'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ Kebede otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Glamour nke Afọ maka ọrụ ebere ya site na Liya Kebede Foundation
N'afọ 2000, Kebede lụrụ onye njikwa ego nke Ethiopia bụ Kassy Kebede
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ nwa nwoke Suhul (September 2000) na nwa nwanyị Raee (August 2005)
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007, ezinụlọ ahụ biri na New York City
Di na nwunye ahụ kewara na 2013, ma gbaa alụkwaghịm na 2015
Elizabeth Aishat Anjorin bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, karịsịa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Anjorin na Badagry na Lagos Steeti, na mpaghara ndị Yoruba na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
Nna ya bụ Onye Kraịst mana nne ya bụ onye Alakụba
O kwuru na ya na nne ya tolitere na ịda ogbenye
Ha bụbu onye na-ere nri, egwu nke ịbụ onye dara ogbenye kpaliri ya ịga nke ọma

Ọ banyere Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo n'afọ 2003, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na-eme ihe ike, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2017 wee nweta nzere BSc na Transport Planning and Management mgbe ọ hapụrụ ịga chụsoo ime ihe nkiri
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara nkuzi ime ihe nkiri, n'oge ahụ ọ zutere Idowu Ogungbe na Ahmed Alasari, bụ ndị nyeere ya aka n'ọrụ ya
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Anjorin ghọrọ onye a ma ama na ngwụcha afọ iri mbụ nke senchiri nke iri abụọ na otu; ihe nkiri eji mara ya gụnyere Ise Onise na Arewa Ejo na 2009 na Owowunmi na 2010
Anjorin na-emepụta ihe nkiri ndị ọ na-apụta na ya ugbu a
Emere ya na 2017 ma wepụta ya na 2018
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kacha baa ọgaranya na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ejiji ma na-ere uwe na ngwa
Anjorin meriri Best Actress Award na Young Achievers Awards na 2012 maka Kofo Tinubu, na City Pride Achievers Award maka Best Actress na 2013 na 2014, oge nke abụọ maka KofoTinubu
Na 2014 City People Entertainment Awards, a họpụtara ya maka Best Actress of the Year (Yoruba) ma nye ya Yoruba Movie Personality of the Year
Na 2017 City People Entertainment Awards, ọ meriri Yoruba Movie Personality of the Year (Nwanyị) na Special Recognition Award maka Owo Naira Bet
Anjorin bụ nne, mana o nweghi di
Ọ gbanwere site na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst gaa na Islam ma nabata aha Aishat
Na Septemba 2019, ya na Toyin Abraham sonyere na esemokwu na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ọ boro Abraham ebubo ụgha na ọ na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ na na-ere cocaine, nke mere ka a nyochaa ya n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu, nakwa na ọ mụrụ nwa ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ onye na-agwọ ọrịa kama ịbụ ụlọ ọgwụ ka o wee zoo ya
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ yiri egwu ịma ikpe, Anjorin boro Abraham ebubo na ọ na-eji cocaine eme ihe ma rịọ National Drug Law Enforcement Agency ka ọ nwalee ha abụọ maka ọgwụ ọjọọ
Bolaji Amusan, onye isi oche nke Theatre Arts and Movie Practitioners Association of Nigeria kwụsịrị esemokwu ahụ
Liz Baffoe (amụrụ na 6 Julaị 1969) bụ onye Ghana na Germany na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ mba Ghana bụ Anthony Baffoe onye bụzi osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke CAF
A mụrụ Baffoe dị ka nwa nwanyị nke ikpeazụ nke onye nnọchi anya mba Ghana ma too na mpaghara nnọchi anya na Bonn-Bad Godesberg
Nwanne ya nwoke bụbu onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ, onye nchịkwa bọọlụ na onye ọkachamara Anthony Baffoe
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Rosalind BaffoE bụkwa nwanne ya nwanyị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1992, o nwetara ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-emepụta mgbasa ozi
Site na 1996 ruo 1999 ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri nke Theater der Keller na Cologne na 2001 na Herbert Berghof Studio na New York

Baffoe rụrụ ọrụ nke Mary nke Naijiria na usoro telivishọn Lindenstrasse site na ihe omume nke narị ise na ịrị na asatọ, nke a na-agbasa na 5 Nọvemba 1995, ruo ihe omume otu puku otu narị na iri na abụọ nke 25 Machị 2007
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nkwado na ụfọdụ usoro ihe nkiri na telivishọn German
Ọrụ ogologo oge ya na Lindenstrasse karịsịa nyere echiche na Baffoe na-asụ naanị German mebiri emebi, nke, agbanyeghị, ekwekọghị na eziokwu
Baffoe na-abụ abụ n'otu òtù na-eme ihe nkiri ma site na 1992, ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú n'azụ Rudi Carrell show Let yourself be surprise for two years
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006, ya na Hendryk Schamberger sonyere na ihe ngosi RTL Dancing on Ice
Kemgbe Septemba 2007 ọ na-anọ n'ihu igwefoto dịka onye nkuzi Changa Miesbach maka oge nke iri nke Schloss Einstein
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ kiosk Hadiya Wedekind na usoro Die Anrheiner site na 2008 ruo 2013
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ a na usoro na-esote Ein Fall für die Anrheiner (site na 2011), na Hadiya Wedekind na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye na-ese foto
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na VOX telivishọn Perfect Celebrity Dinner
Kemgbe Disemba 2013, ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa ONEeins Management si Odenthal na-anọchite anya Baffoe
Baffoe na-akwado Respekt! Enweghị ebe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Kemgbe afọ 2013, Baffoe bụ onye nkwado nke Gye Nyame Kids eV
Njikọ ahụ na-akwado ụmụ mgbei na ọkara ụmụ mgbei yana ndị nne na-alụbeghị di na Ghana
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014, Baffoe sonyere na Sat1 show Promi Big Brother wee bịa n'ọnọdụ nke itoolu
Na 1 Septemba 2015, Baffoe meghere akara ejiji Atinka Ashenso ya na onye ọchụnta ego Alexander Leon Diaz
Kemgbe 6 Eprel 2018, Liz Baffoe anọwo na-ere ọla nke ya na ọwa QVC
Kemgbe 2021, Liz Baffoe bụ onye nnọchi anya WW
Baffoe lụrụ Jens Krieger na 1 June 2012
Ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na obere obodo dị nso na Kaiserslautern na Palatinate, mana n'afọ 2014 ọ laghachiri Cologne
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2015, Baffoe gbara dị ya alụkwaghim
Elizabeth Benson (amụrụ na 5 Eprel 1966) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na televishọn na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ ise
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe ọ gosipụtara na Fortunes, ihe nkiri soap opera televishọn na 1993
Benson keere òkè nke Oriakụ
Agnes Johnson n' ihe nkiri ahụ, nke gbara ihe dị ka afọ abụọ na netwọkụ Nigerian Television Authority
Na 1994, ọrụ ya na Glamor Girls, ihe nkiri vidio ụlọ mere nke ọma nke lekwasịrị anya n'okwu banyere ịgba akwụna, gbanwere akụ na ụba ya mgbe Fortunes gasịrị
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri na-ahụ ya n'anya na Nigeria ma hụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nke Nollywood
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, mgbe ọkwa ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri amalitela ịrị elu karịa ihe a tụrụ anya ya, Benson kwụsịrị ime ihe nkiri na 1996
Kemgbe ọ laghachịrị na Nollywood, e mere ka ọ mata na ọ bụ onye Kristian a mụrụ ọzọ na ọ na-ekwusa ozioma oge niile
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ kọwara na ọ ga-eme naanị na fim nke o kwenyere na ya kwekọrọ na okwukwe ya
Di Benson mbụ nwụrụ (Samuel Gabriel Etim) mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ
O kwuru na ya nwetara ike n'ezie site n'àgwà ya na nke ahụ mere ka ya nwee ike ibu ụmụ ya gafere ọnwụ ahụ
Nwa Efik a na-eme ihe nkiri, lụrụ di ọzọ mgbe ọ gbanwere
N’emume ụlọ ikpe dị jụụ na Abuja, ọ lụrụ Bishọp Great Ameye nke Freedom Family Assembly na 2009 na Rainbow Christian Assembly na Warri, Delta State
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nnukwu ọrụ na Oziọma Ndị Kraịst
Ebe Benson bụ onye ozi ọma, di ya bụ Ameye bụ ụkọchukwu na Warri, Delta Steeti
Benson bu onye nkwusa ozioma ma bi na Delta State ya na di ya
Ha na-ejekọ ozi ọnụ na Freedom Family Assembly
Ụfọdụ ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu gụnyere ọrụ ya dị ka Titubi na Femi Osofisan 's Morountodun na dị ka Oriakụ
Agnes Johnson na Fortunes, opera nke gbara ihe dịka afọ abụọ na Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) Channel 10

Elizabeth Omowunmi Tekovi Da-Silva (amuru na June 10, 1978) bu onye omumu Naijiria na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ndi Togo nke gosiputara nke oma na ulo oru ihe nkiri ndi Yoruba na Naijiria

Na 2016 a họpụtara Da-Silva maka City People Movie Award nke Onye nkiri kacha na-akwado na afọ (Yoruba) na City People Entertainment Awards na 2018 ọ meriri nturu ugo maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ nkwado na Best of Nollywood Awards
A mụrụ Da-Silva nye ndị nne na nna Togo bi na Nigeria
Amụrụ ya nke ọma na mpaghara ala akpọrọ Obalende na Lagos Steeti ebe nne na nna ya bi na ebe ọ nọrọ oge ọ bụ nwata
Site na ọmụmụ ya ọ na -erite uru niile nwa amaala Naịjirịa kwesịrị

N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ụlọ mgbasa ozi na -ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa The Punch ọ kọwara Lagos dị ka ebe obibi ya wee kwupụta n'ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ na ya si na ụlọ ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị Da-Silva gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ireti Grammar maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na iji nweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum Lagos State wee mechaa were BSc
nzere sitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu
Da-Silva na N'ajụjụ ọnụ kpughere na mmasị ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria malitere mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma mesịa malite itinye aka na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ
Da-Silva N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nta akụkọ mgbasa ozi The Punch kwuru na o tinyere aka n'akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Yoruba nke Naijiria n'afọ 2004 site n'enyemaka nke Iyabo Ojo

Ọrụ Da-Silva dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwetara nkwado mgbe o gosipụtara na ihe nkiri nke ndị ama ama na fim abụọ; nke mbụ akpọrọ Wakati Meta nke Wale Lawal na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Omidan nke Iyabo Ojo dere
Da-Silva na 2012, bidoro ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nwere ihe nkiri akpọrọ Mama Insurance nke gosipụtara Ayo Mogaji, Lanre Hassan, Iyabo Ojo, Ronke Ojo, na Doris Simeon
Da-Silva bụ onye Naijiria site n'ọmụmụ na onye Togo n'ihi na nne na nna ya bụ ụmụ amaala Togo
Da-Silva akọwala steeti Lagos dị ka ụlọ ya mana ọ na-ekwusi ike na ọ ga n'emezi njikọ ndị ikwu ya na Togo
Da-Silva Na 2013 tụgharịrị site na Iso uzọ Kraịst gaa Alakụba
Liza Brönner bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwuỌ na- akụ egwu ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans na Bekee
Brönner bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Onderstebo N'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2009 site n'aka EMI
E degharịrị abọm a n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2010 na abụ ọhụrụ anọ dị ka Asemloos ma EMI ewepụta ya
Abọm nke atọ ya, Vir eers is dit net ek
Ka ewepụtara n'abali mbụ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2011 site na HIT Records

N'onwa Mee afọ 2013, Liza ritere ihe nrite usoro ihe omume nke eziokwu na-achọ onye na-anọchi onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka mmepụta ihe nkiri (egwu) Liefling Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ndu n'ofe Bobby van Jaarsveld na-ọkụkụ egwu Jan

Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ nke arụmọrụ na ọrụ nkwado na CD ya gara aga 'Vir eers is dit net ek' bụ ihe omume ntụrụndụ nke ụmụnne abụọ bu 2Brothers Entertainment nwere mmetụta obi ụtọ ịgwa onye ọ bụla banyere CD ọhụrụ Liza Bronner 'Jy het my gevind'
'Jy het my gevind' abụghị naanị aha CD ọhụrụ ya, kama ọ pụtara ọtụtụ ihe nye Liza
Ọ bụ mmalite ọhụrụ, oge ọhụrụ na ọrụ ya
Ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014 - oge mmepụta 'Liefling'mmepụta nke si ụlọ ihe nkiri na Teatro, Montecasino
Ọkụkụ Egwú asụsụ'Afrikaans' mbụ na Teatro
Liza na-arụ ọrụ dị ka'Liefling' ọzọ megide Bobby van Jaarsveld
Liza esonyela na Hanna Charity and Empowerment Foundation ebe ọrụ ha bụ inyere ndị ogbenye na ndị a na-eleghara anya na South Africa

Ha na-enye ụmụaka, ndị ntorobịa, ndị agadi na ezinụlọ ha nlebara anya onwe ha na uru kpọmkwem ka ha wee nwee ike ibi ndụ n'ebube,ma nweta ikike ha chọrọ ma sonye n'ụzọ zuru ezu na ihe gbasara ọha mmadụ

Liza Essers bụ ónyé nwé nà ónyé nduzi nkè Goodman Gallery nà South Africa, nkè e guzobere nà 1966

Mgbè ọ natachara Bachelor of Commerce in Economics, Esers rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ atụmatụ màkà ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọkachamara zuru ụwa ọnụ Accenture nakwa dị ka nà private equity ebe o tolitere na ngalaba azụmahịa na ego nke South Africa
Tupu ọ zụta Goodman Gallery na 2008, Essers bụ ónyé ndụmọdụ nka onwé ya na onye nlekọta ọkachamara na echiche, mmepe na mmepụta nke nka anya na ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri South Africa, (2005), ihe nkiri Africa mbụ meriri Academy Award (Best Foreign Language Picture, 2006)
O mepụtara ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ya na Catherine Meyburgh nke akpọrọ Kentridge na Dumas na Conversation nke na-ekwu màkà akụkọ ndụ nke ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a William Kentridge na Marlene Dumas
Na mbido afọ irí àtó, Essers rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe nkiri na ónyé na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Mmasị ya n'ime ihe nkiri ihe nkiri sitere na ịdị nso ya na nka nke oge a
Mmasị ya màkà nka nke ógè a sitere na ikike ya ime mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, Essers kwuru na ahụmịhe ya bụ ihe kpaliri ọchịchọ ya 'ịrụ ọrụ n'ụwa nka nke ógè a na ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ nke nwere ike ịmanye mgbanwe n'echiche
Essen weghaara Goodman Gallery na 2008

Kemgbe ọ nwetara gallery ahụ, Essers gbanwere site na igosi ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa gaa na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri si na kọntinent ndị ọzọ, na-eweta ndị na-emepụta mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya bụ 'ịnakwere akụkọ ihe méré eme na akụkọ South Africa na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke kọntinent na ụwa'
N'okpuru nduzi ya, ndị omenkà ọhụrụ iri abụọ na isii, mà ndị guzosiri ike mà ndị na-apụta, sitere n'akụkụ dị íchè íchè nke Africa na karịa sonyeere Goodman Gallery
Ndị a gụnyere Ghada Amer, Candice Breitz, Kudzanai Chiurai, Mounir Fatmi, Alfredo Jaar, Liza Lou, Hank Willis Thomas, Adam Broomberg & Oliver Chanarin
Ihe mgbakwunye kachasị ọhụrụ na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe bụ Shirin Neshat, Kiluanji Kia Henda na ndị na-emepụta mgbanwe na South Africa The Brother Moves On
Liza Grobler (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South African Mixed Media nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town, South Africa
Grobler na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi dị ichè íchè, na-anabata agba na-egbuke egbuke ma na-ejikarị usoro ọrụ aka ọdịnala iji mepụta ọrụ pụrụ íchè

Grobler nwetara nzere masta ya na Fine Art na ọdịiche site na Mahadum Stellenbosch na 1999, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mepụta ihe màrà mmá nke gụnyere agba na-egbuke egbuke na mgbasa ozi dị ichè íchè
Ọrụ Grobler na-ejikarị usoro ọrụ aka ọdịnala dịka beadwork ma ya na The Quebeka Bead Studio rụkọọ ọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ beaded

O sonyere na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu narị ihe ngosi na South Africa na mba ofesi - na Ịtali, Brazil, Germany, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Switzerland, Australia, Spain, United States na Finland
Ọ gàrà ébé óbíbí na ogbako na US, Norway, Finland na Switzerland
Ọrụ ya dị n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ama ama gụnyere Jeanetta Blignaut Art Consultancy Collection

Grobler abụwokwa ónyé na-enyocha nka na ónyé na-enye ònyìnyé mgbè niile màkà akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrikaans kwa ụbọchị Die Burger Grobler bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town na di ya na-ese ihe Norman O São Flynn na nwa ya nwoke, Storm
N'afọ 2012, Grobler kpughere 'White Termite' na BRUNDYN + GONSALVES

A gụnyekwara ọrụ Grobler na 'ALPTRAUM!', ihe ngosi na-ese ihe n'afọ 2011 nké gárá n'etiti Cell Project Space, London; Deutscher Künstlerbund Projektraum, Berlin; The Company, Los Angeles na 'Blank Projects', Cape Town
Lizwi Vilakazi (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1969), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Mandela Long Walk to Freedom na Five Fingers for Marseilles
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'obere ọrụ na usoro telivishọn dị ka ihe nkiri Zone 14 na SABC1 na ihe nkiri etv 4Play Sex Tips for Girls
Na telivishọn South Africa, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dị ka 'Teddy' na usoro ihe nkiri Vuzu Amp aYeYe
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọrụ a, ọ gara n'ihu na-achịkwa na telivishọn South Africa na ọtụtụ usoro dị ka Isithembiso, Jacob's Cross, The Road na Umlilo
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya maka obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Mandela Long Walk to Freedom Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'onye na-eme ntụli aka'
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali nke South African Western Five Fingers for Marseilles nke Michael Matthews duziri
Elizabeth Anne Achieng' Njagah (amụrụ 26 Disemba) nke a maara dị ka Lizz Njagah, bụ onye omere Kenya, onye nduzi nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe
Amụrụ ma zụlite na Nairobi, Lizz bụ onye nke asaa a mụrụ n'etiti ụmụnne iri
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gachara, nwanne mama ya weghaara ọrụ dịka onye nlekọta ha
Lizz lụrụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Alex Konstantaras na 10 Junu 2012 na Ụlọ uka St
Alexander na Greece
Na 10 Febrụwarị 2016, di na nwunye ahụ nabatara nwa mbụ ha, Georgios Apolo Konstantaras
Ọrụ Lizz malitere n'afọ 1998 ka ọ sonyechara na Kenya National Theatre
Ọ rụrụ egwuregwu dị iche iche otu afọ, tupu e nye ya ọzụzụ afọ abụọ na Phoenix Players, ebe ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ ma mekwaa okpukpu abụọ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ndị otu
Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi TV maka ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere Lux Beauty Soap, Telkom Kenya na nkwalite Fungua Fanaka nke EABL
Ọ gara South Africa, Mozambique na Kenya na egwu Seok Ho Lee 'Sara Baartman na nke anọ Karma'
O nwekwara ọrụ bụ isi na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri agụụ mmekọahụ Fundi-Mentals
Ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama dị ka Gerald Langiri na- egwuri egwu

Lizzie Wilkerson (1895-1984) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí nke a maara màkà ihe osise nke gosipụtara ndụ ya n'ugbo
A mụrụ ya Lizzie Henderson na nso Covington, Georgia, nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ irí abụọ na otu
N'afọ 1919, ọ lụrụ Dewey Wilkerson, ónyé na-arụzi ụgbọala, wee kwaga Atlanta
Ọ nataghị ọzụzụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ma malite ime ihe osise n'oge ndụ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmiri na mkpịsị akwụkwọ, na-emepụta ihe oyiyi zuru ezu na nké sárá mbárá nke ihe ndị dị ndụ ugbo jupụtara na ibe ahụ, na-emekarị ka mmetụta niile na-echetara usoro akwa
O mekwara ụmụ bebi ụfọdụ
A maghị ọrụ Wilkerson ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1970, mgbè ọ pụtara site na mmemme mgbasa ozi ọbọdọ nke Mahadum Georgia State

Wilkerson nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na Atlanta na ébé ndị ọzọ, ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Museum of American Folk Art (New York), National Museum of American Art (Washington, DC), na High Museum of Art (Atlanta, GaỌ dị iche iche
Architect Earnest Hooks Jr
dere akwụkwọ nke na-elekwasị ányà na ndụ Wilkerson na ugbo ezinụlọ ya ma jiri ihe osise ya dị ka ihe osise
Let's Go See Mother Wilkerson's Farm (2007) bụ màkà ụmụaka na-amaghị omenala ugbo America
Mpịakọta nké abụọ pụtara na 2011

Llorenzo Vidal Vidal, Onye na-ede uri nke Majorcan, onye nkụzi na onye na-eme udo, guzobere n'afọ 1964 Ụbọchị Ụlọ Akwụkwọ nke Non-violence na Peace (DENIP) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ, onye na'abụghị steeti, onye na na-abụghị gọọmentị, onye nweere onwe ya, n'efu na afọ ofufo nke Non-eme ihe ike na Pacifying Education, nke a na-eme ugbu a n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gburugburu ụwa na ebe a na-akpọ ndị nkuzi, ndị nkuzi na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke ọkwa niile na ndị si mba niile ka ha sonye
N'afọ 2010, Cercle Universel des Ambassadeurs de la Paix, Geneva (Switzerland), họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya udo
A mụrụ ya na Santanyi, Majorca, n'afọ 1936, onye nkuzi si Ecole Normale de Palma, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na PhD na Mahadum Barcelona, na onye nyocha agụmakwụkwọ na Cadiz, Ceuta na Balearic Islands
Onye guzobere Ụbọchị Ụlọ Akwụkwọ nke Non-violence na Peace (DENIP), na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite ọdịbendị na agụmakwụkwọ onwe ya, n'efu na nke afọ ofufo maka enweghị ime ihe ike na udo site n'afọ 1964

Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Lobna Abdel Aziz, aka Lobna Abdelaziz ma ọ bụ Lobna Abd-el-aziz (amụrụ n'ọgọst 1, 1935) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Nna ya bụ onye edemede Ijipt bụ Hamed Abdelaziz

N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ lụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe n'Ijipt a ma ama bụ Ramsis NagibO mechara gbaa ya alụkwaghịm n'Ijipt megide ọchịchọ ya na ọchịchọ ya ọ bụ ezie na ha hụrụ ibe ha n'anya ma nwee obi ụtọ ọnụỌ gụrụ akụkọ gbasara ịgba alụkwaghịm ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ tupu ịgba alụkwaghim ya

Ramsis Nagib nọgidere na-ekpe okpukpe Ndị Kraịst ya n'oge alụmdi na nwunye nke Lobna Abdelaziz site n'ịlụ ya n'èzí Ijipt iji merie iwu Ijipt nke machibidoro alụmdi na ụba dị otú ahụ, nke a gosipụtara site na ikpe ụlọ ikpe
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ lụrụ Ismael Barrada onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Ismael nwụrụ mgbe ihe karịrị afọ irí anọ nke alụmdi na nwunye ha gasịrị
Locardia Ndandarika (a mụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa amaala Bindura, dị ka nwa agbọghọ Ndandarika mere ihe nlereanya na ụrọ site na iji usoro ọdịnala
N'afọ 1964, ọ lụrụ Joseph Ndandarika, gbaa ya alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1978
N'oge alụmdi na nwunye ha, ọ mụtakwu banyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, ma mesịa tụgharịa gaa na ya oge niile
N'afọ 1986, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Workshop Gallery; a kpọkwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Chapungu Sculpture Park
N'afọ 1990, a kpọrọ ya isonye na Commonwealth Games na New Zealand
Ndandarika egosipụtala ma nwee ọmụmụ ihe na United States, Netherlands, South Africa, na New Zealand kemgbe 1997
Ọ bụ nne Ronnie Dongo na Virginia Ndandarika

Logan February (a mụrụ 1999) bụ onye na -ede uri, onye edemede, onye nkatọ egwu, onye na -eme ihe, onye na -ede abụ, na onye na -akwado LGBTQ si Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Logan February na Eprel 23, 1999, na steeti Anambra nke Nigeria, wee tolite na Ibadan
Logan nwetara nzere bachelọ na akparamaagwa na mahadum Ibadan
Ha abụghị ọnụọgụ abụọ ma jiri nnọchiaha ha/ha
Logan bụ onye dere In Nude, nke Ouida Poetry bipụtara na Nigeria na 2019 yana PANK Books dị ka Mannequin na ịgba ọtọ
Ha bụkwa ndị mepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Painted Blue with Saltwater na (Indolent Books, 2018)
Otu esi akwadebe mmụọ (Glass Poetry Press, 2017)
Logan bụ Pushcart na Best of the Net nominee, na nchịkọta abụ ha, Mannequin in Nude, bụ onye ikpeazụ maka 2018 African Poetry Book Fund, yana otu n'ime akwụkwọ mbụ iri na ise Brittle Paper na Nigeria
Logan na -ede nyocha egwu maka akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ịntanetị
Agụnyere ha na Eri Ife's THE EP na 2017
Logan rụrụ abụ na mbido EP, Logan bụrụkwa egwu n'akụkụ Eri Ife na egwu Ọ dịghị onye
Logan, onye na -akwado LGBTQ na Naịjirịa, bụ onye editọ ọbịa nke kọlụm Ynaija na -abụghị nke nwere 'Enwere Olileanya' n'oge ọnwa mpako 2020
Ǹzù (ya bụ Logic nà okwu bàkê, okwu siri ekwu λογική logikē na asụsụ Greurikì) bu iụe ịhẹmú maka Í che ihe
Ha ne jí ómárí na ihe mmemmé ómúmú ihe échichè, mànà ha na mú ya na oge imérímé na ílúnílú, nzuógügü, na ọbià komputa
Ómárí ne lé ahú okwú na óka gi ji, ahú nke di ọma, na nke bu ngò
O bu ótu échichè
Na ólúnólú, ómúmú ómárí dàrà na ámá ómáríómá, nke na jü 'Otù ólé ka anyị shi má ihe ányị mà?' Na nzuógügü, ọ bu ómúmú ihe ji òfọ
Ómárí shì ébé iche iche; nke bú kwá Ndia, China na Greece
Ómárí di na mgbe Aristotle, onye kéré ya na imerime na ámá ílúnílú
Ómúmú ómárí so mgbe mbu trivium nke iche mkpà
Averroes si ómárí 'bu ihe orürü hé jì a ma ihe di iche na ezíokwu na okwu ngò'; Richard Whately, 'Ọbia, na Nká Í chéfụtá ihe'; na Frege, 'Ọbia nílé nke gbasara íwú eziokwu nke dakotara na ihe níle'
Ómárí kéfù na nkeji abụọ, échichè oganiru na échichè nke nwéfụ
Nke mbu dọrọ ómámma nke nílé shi atụ nke di ímé ímé ihe ha ne lé, na nke échichè nke nwéfu dọrọ ómámma nke i léfụ ihe shí íshí ihe na ihe madu si bu eziokwu
Nke díkà di íchè, búrú nke Aristotle jì, bu nlè na nlé ime ihe na ihe kpákótárá
Ngá nke mbu nwèrè ótụ ihe ọmúmú na ọ lèlè òtú o kèrè
Nke gbárá abụọ chèkòtàrà otù nkeji gi jikodo Í ké nke ótụ
Ha na mu ómári na ómúmú ajüjü okwúnókwú

E guzobere ya na Septemba 1999
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere aka abụọ, ya bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
A na-ekewa ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị mbu ruo nke isii, Junior na Senior Secondary School
Dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, a na-akwadebe ụmụ akwụkwọ ma debanye aha maka WASSCE nke West African Examinations Council (WAEC) duziri

Lois Auta (a mụrụ 29 April 1980) bụ onye guzobere na onyeisi ndị isi nke Cedar Seed Foundation
Ọ natara onyinye maka ọrụ ya n'ịkwalite ọrụ nkwarụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na United States
Ọ bụ onye isi ala nke Naijiria president Mohammadu Buhari kwadoro ya maka nkà na ụzụ dị iche iche na mmepụta ihe
Auta nwere diplọma na nchịkwa ọha na eze site na Mahadum nke Abuja ma ugbu a ọ na-eme Bachelor of Science (nwa akwụkwọ afọ ikpeazụ) na Public Administration n'otu mahadum a
Auta bụ onye nchoputa na Executive Director nke Cedar Seed Foundation, na onye na-akwado ndị ọrụ na Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC)
N'ihe kariri afọ ise, Auta a kwadola maka mmelite nke ndị nwere nkwarụ na Nigeria
Ọnọdụ ya na ọrụ ya gụnyere
Ya na ndi gbagotara n'ọkwa enwela nzụkọ dika John Kerry , Linda Thomas-Greenfield , onye odeakwụkwọ nke United States na-enyere aka na Afrika
Onye nnochite anya Rice, ndị Senatọ nke United States, onyeisi oche nke ala Naijiria, ndị nnọchiteanya Naijiria, ndị ozi, na ndị isi nke mba di iche iche di n'ụwa na ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama
Ọ bụ Mandela Washington Fellow, na onye isi oche nke Mandela Washington Fellowship Alumni Association, Nigeria
Lekan Osifeso Jnr
(amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1996) nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Lojay, bụ onye egwu Naijiria, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O rutere n'ọkwa nke asatọ na bọọdụ mgbasa ozi US
afrobeats songs chart maka egwu ya bụ Monalisa, nke o gosipụtara Chris Brown na Sarz
Abụ ya bụkwa abụ afrobeats a na-akpọkarị na Shazam dị ka Cool FM Nigeria na NotJustOk si kwuo
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye The Headies maka onye na-agụ egwu nke na-etolite etolite maka afọ 2022
A zụlitere Lojay na steeti Lagos, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye si Ogun steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Portsmouth, UK na 2018
Ezinụlọ ya biri na Ikorodu na Victoria Island
Ebe ọ bụ na nne ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu, Osifeso gara ụka mgbe niile, dị ka usoro ezinụlọ n'oge ọ malitere
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Chris Brown bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú kachasị amasị ya
Aha egwu Lojay bụ ndebiri nke mkpụrụedemede mbụ nke aha ya zuru ezu 'Lekan Osifeso Junior' (LO-J)
Ọ nwere mmasị na egwu na ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ọ gbasoro ihe na-atọ ya ụtọ n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ọ na-agbanwe ụdị egwu ọ na-eme ma na-agbanwere site n'otu gnere gaa na nke ọzọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nataal, o kwuru
Ọ malitere egwu n'ụzọ ọkachamara na 2016 na oge ezumike mgbe ọ ka na-agụ akwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu wee gaa n'ihu na-elekwasị anya naanị na egwu mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ugo mmụta ya
Na Disemba 2017, Lojay wepụtara EP mbụ ya, Midnight Vibes, nke nwere egwu ise
Aha egwu sitere na EP bụ Atarodo, Alomo, Kele, 10K Splaw na Whine & Bubble
N'afọ 2019, ọ wepụtara egwu Ariel ma n'afọ 2020, o wepụtara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ Ogogoro
N'etiti njem mbụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ egwu na 2016 na ntọhapụ nke egwu ya na 2021, Lojay wepụrụ ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere Along, Kuli Kuli, Over the Bar na ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, a tọhapụrụ EP nke abụọ ya nke akpọrọ LV N ATTN (nke sitere na Love and Attention), nke bụ EP duet n'akụkụ onye na-emepụta Sarz
Ọ bụ egwu ise nke EP nke nwere egwu ya nke ọ wepụtara na mbido afọ ahụ nke akpọrọ Tonongo na Monalisa, abụ ọ gara n'ihu na-agwakọta ya na Chris Brown
Tinyere LV N ATTN, egwu nwere otu aha ahụ dị ka EP, nke o gosipụtara Wizkid
A na-akpọ egwu abụọ ndị ọzọ Panty! na Park O X3
Ọrụ ahụ nwetara nhọpụta maka onyinye The Headies maka onye na-ese ihe ọzọ maka afọ 2021/2022
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021, DJ Neptune gosipụtara ya na Zlatan Ibile na egwu akpọrọ Only fan
N'afọ 2022, o sonyere na njem mmeri Heineken UEFA Champions League na Naịjirịa
Àtụ Infobox settlementLokoja bụ obodo na Naijiria
Ọ dabere na njikọ nke osimiri Niger na Benue ma bụrụ isi obodo Kogi State
Ebe ndị Yoruba (Oworo), Bassa Nge na Nupe bụ ndị obodo ahụ, agbụrụ ndị ọzọ nke Nigeria, gụnyere Kupa-Nupe, Hausa, Ebira, Igala, Igbo, Bini/Edo, na Tiv nwere
na-adịbeghị anya guzobe onwe ha
Atụmatụ ịbụ obodo kọntinent Africa nke atọ na-eto ngwa ngwa n'etiti 2020 na 2025, na-enwe uto 593%
Edepụtara ya obodo klaasị nke abụọ site na iwu obodo 1917 nke nchịkwa colonial
Nke a gosiri na Lokoja bụ obodo ochie
Agbụrụ dị iche iche na-azọrọ na ha nyere obodo ahụ aha
Ndị mmadụ si n'agbụrụ dị iche iche ebiela n'ógbè ahụ nke ga-aghọ Lokoja ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ tupu ndị Europe abịarute
Mgbanwe nke ìgwè ndị a na mpaghara ahụ nwere ike ịbụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ n'ihi ịdị nso ya n'akụkụ osimiri Niger na Benue
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị mbụ biri na Lokoja bụ ndị Oworo / Yoruba si Ile-Ife, Hausa na Nupe
A na-ekwu na ha si Baro na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke steeti Niger nke oge a kwaga n'ebe osimiri Niger na Benue na-agakọ
Mpaghara a mesịrị ghọọ ebe azụmahịa
Ihe atụ bụ Kupas na ụfọdụ Kakandas
Ndị Bassa-Nges kwenyere na ha biri n'ala ala ugwu Patti mgbe ha batara na Lokoja, tupu ha akwaga ọzọ ma kwaga ebe obibi n'ofe Benue, dị nnọọ n'ebe ugwu nke Igalas
Ihe ọ bụla ọ bụ, ọ na-esiri ike ikwupụta n'usoro nke ọ bụla ma ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a bịara mgbe ndị Oworo biri n'obodo Lokoja
Ìgwè ndị a dị iche iche bi n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke obodo ahụ mana ha nwere njikọ chiri anya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ha na-emekọrịta ihe n'enweghị ihe mgbochi ma na-anabata ibe ha

Ọ bụ Maigari (onye isi) nke Lokoja na-achịkwa Lokoja taa, na ndị Hakimi ya iri na abụọ (ndị isi) Ọ dị mkpa iburu n'uche na otu ọ bụla nwere ụkpụrụ mpaghara nke ha dịka ọmụmaatụ, Maigari enweghị ikike n'elu Olu nke Oworo, mana o nwere ikike n'ebe Ganaja, Kwak, Sarkin Numa, Adankoloware, A ward to ward E na obodo nta ndị ọzọ nke Lokoja Holland bụ ndị Salkawa
Lokoja nwere nnukwu ahịa atọ New Market (International Market); Old Market; na Kpata Market
Ahịa Kpata na Ahịa Ọhụrụ nwere ụbọchị ahịa ha kwa ụbọchị ise
Ngwaahịa ndị dị mkpa a na-ere n'ahịa ndị a bụ ọka, akwụkwọ nri na ihe ndị dị n'ụlọ
