Lokua Kanza (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1958) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Democratic Republic of the Congo
A maara ya maka ụda ya dị egwu, folksy [nkọwa dị mkpa]
A mụrụ Lokua Kanza Pascal Lokua Kança na Bukavu na mpaghara Sud-Kivu, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Democratic Republic of Congo
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asatọ, nna ya bụ Mongo na nne ya bụ Tutsi si Rwanda
N'afọ 1964, ezinụlọ ahụ gara biri na Kinshasa n'ógbè dị n'etiti, ruo ụbọchị nna Pascal, onye isi ụgbọ mmiri, nwụrụ
Nne ya kwagara n'ógbè dara ogbenye nke obodo ahụ, Pascal ga-arụkwa ọrụ iji nye ezinụlọ ahụ nri
Tinyere ịbụ abụ na ụka [nkọwa dị mkpa]
Lokua Kanza na-abụ abụ na French, Swahili, Lingala, Portuguese, na Bekee
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na The Voice Afrique Francophone n'afọ 2016 nakwa n'afọ 2017
Lola magazin bụ akwụkwọ ihe osise Toronto nke gbara afọ asaa n’etiti 1997 na 2003
Onye na-ese ihe / onye edemede Sally McKay, onye nlekọta
John Massier na onye edemede nka na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Catherine Osborne malitere Lola
Ebumnuche ha bụ iweghachite ihe ngosi nka nke obodo ahụ site na ịmepụta nnọkọ mepere emepe maka ndị edemede, ndị na-ese ihe na ọha na eze iji kwuo ma katọọ ihe ngosi na ihe omume nka n'ime obodo ahụ
Akụkụ kachasị ewu ewu na magazin ahụ bụ ngalaba nyocha a na-akpọ Shotguns, ebe a kpọrọ onye ọ bụla ka o dee nyocha nke ihe ngosi ma ọ bụ ihe omume na nso nso a
Ọtụtụ narị ndị edemede na 'ndị na-abụghị ndị edemede' nyere aka na ngalaba ahụ, na-emepụta nnọkọ dị egwu maka mkparịta ụka na nkọwa
Ihe mere Lola dị iche na magazin nka ndị ọzọ nke oge a bụ enweghị mmasị ya maka jargon nka na ọgụgụ isi
A gbara ndị edemede ume ka ha kwuo okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ, na-eme ihe n'eziokwu, na-emeghe ma doo anya n'echiche na echiche ha

E kesara ya n'efu na ụlọ ngosi dị na Toronto ma ree ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Canada niile, a na-ewere Lola dị ka ngwakọta n'etiti magazin na zine (n'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, a na-enweta ego ya niile site na mgbasa ozi na ndebanye aha, na-eme ka ọ dị iche na ọtụtụ zines, nke n'ozuzu enweghị isi iyi nke ego)
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ magazin nka na Canada, nke na-adabere naanị na ego gọọmentị, Lola nwetara obere nkwado gọọmentị
N'ime afọ asaa ya, Lola natara otu onyinye site n'aka Gọọmentị Canada iji kwado uto ya na ahịa na ndebanye aha
Mgbe e bipụtara mbipụta nke abụọ na 1998, John Massier hapụrụ magazin ahụ
Catherine Osborne ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Sally McKay ghọrọ onye nduzi nka, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ rụrụ ọrụ nhata na mmepe nke ọdịnaya nchịkọta akụkọ
Mmepụta nke magazin ahụ na-ewere ọnọdụ na ụlọ McKay nke abụọ na Parkdale, na nzukọ nchịkọta akụkọ na-enwe otu ugboro n'izu na Lakeview Diner, ihe a na-ewu ewu na Dundas Street na Toronto
Na mbụ, a na-ebipụta Lola ugboro abụọ n'afọ
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya, e bipụtara magazin ahụ kwa ọnwa
N'agbanyeghi mmalite nke magazin ahụ, ndị guzobere ya nwere mmasị ime ka magazin ahụ ghọọ magazin bara uru ma nwee ego
N'afọ 2002, Sharon Salson (onye mechara bụrụ Sharon Gregg) sonyeere ndị ọrụ dị ka onye nkwusa na onye nduzi mgbasa ozi
Site na ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ, ndị guzobere Lola nwere olileanya inweta onye na-etinye ego iji gbanwee magazin ahụ ka ọ bụrụ mbipụta akwụ ụgwọ nke ga-adọta ọtụtụ ndị mgbasa ozi na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ
Achọpụtaghị onye nkwado ego, nke mere ka magazin ahụ nwụọ mgbe ewepụtara mbipụta nke iri na isii na Septemba 2003
N'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ, ndị nta akụkọ na-ekpuchi Lola ugboro ugboro, na isiokwu ndị pụtara The Globe and Mail, Toronto Star, NOW, Shift, CBC n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
A họpụtara Lola ka ọ bụrụ magazin nke afọ site na National Magazine Awards Foundation na 2001 na 2002
N'afọ 2000, Lola natara nsọpụrụ na ngalaba 'Magazine of the Year' na Canadian National Magazine Awards

N'afọ 2001, Gerald Hannon ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha na ngalaba 'Arts & Entertainment' na Canadian National Magazine Awards maka isiokwu ya Monk-y Business for Lola magazine, Mpịakọta nke iri, Fall 2001
Lola Akinmade Åkerström bụ onye Naijirịa na-ese foto na onye na-ede njem nke bi na Stockholm, Sweden
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ maka Slow Travel Stockholm
Ọ gụrụ Geography Information System (GIS) na Mahadum Maryland
Ọ malitere ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Lagos n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijirịa, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'oge mbụ ya tupu ọ kwaga United States mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
O nwetara nzere masta na Information System na Mahadum Maryland Mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Oxford dị na England mana ọ nweghị ike ịchụso ya n'ihi ego
N'afọ 2006, Åkerström na di ya kwagara Sweden
Åkerström malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Eco-Challenge Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na abụọ dị ka onye mmepe GIS tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-ese foto
N'etiti afọ 2006 na 2007, ọ sonyeere Matador Network ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009 ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya na GIS ụwa iji chụsoo mmasị ya
Na Juunị 2011, Åkerström sonyere na mmemme nhọpụta nke Quark Expeditions haziri iji họrọ onye edemede ga-aga North Pole maka ọrụ nke idepụta gburugburu ebe obibi ya
N'afọ 2012 o sonyere na asọmpi njem na Fiji, ebe ọ malitere ijikọta njem ya, foto na nkà edemede
N'afọ 2016, ọ gara Ịtali ịga Unesco World Heritage Sites nke Sabbioneta na Mantua maka nyocha

Oyelola Yisa Ashiru (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1955) bụ onye Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke a họpụtara dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Kwara South Senatorial District na ụlọ omeiwu Sineti nke itoolu
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Capital Projects Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ala na ụlọ nwere alaka na Lagos, Abuja na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
A mụrụ Ashiru na 14 June 1955 na Offa na Kwara State Nigeria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Iyeru okin, Offa tupu ọ gaa Esie Iludun Anglican grammar school na 1968
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na kọleji gọọmentị etiti dị na Sokoto n'afọ 1974, wee mụọ atụmatụ gburugburu ebe obibi na ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1980

Mgbe ọ zọrọ ọkwa ọchịchị ọtụtụ oge, n'afọ 2018, Ashiru kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa Sinetọ nke Kwara South senatorial district na ntuli aka nke Naijiria n'afọ 2019 na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke People's Democratic Party (PDP)

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2018, ndị otu PDP na Kwara Steeti gụnyere Lola Ashiru gara All Progressives Congress (APC) iji mee mkpọsa megide usoro ndị eze nke Bukola Saraki bụ ndị ọ boro ebubo na ha achikwaghi Kwara Steeti nke ọma kemgbe afọ iri na isii gara aga
Na ntuli aka praịmarị nke APC, Ashiru meriri tiketi Senatorial mgbe o meriri Suleiman Ajadi na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Na 23 Febụwarị 2019, Ashiru meriri na ntuli aka maka ọkwa Sinetọ mgbe o nwetara votu pụkụ iri asatọ na itoolu, narị asaa na anọ wee merie onye nọ n'ọkwa Adebayo Rafiu Ibrahim nke PDP onye nwetara votu pụkụ iri anọ na ise na otu narị na iri asaa na ise

Mgbe e timyesiri ya na sineti nke itoolu na 11 June 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche kọmitii sineti na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụlọ ebe obibi na osote onye isi oche kọmitii sineti na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa ọha na eze na 29 July 2019
N'oge njem mgbasa ozi na Ojoku na mpaghara Oyun nke Kwara Steeti na 20 Febụwarị 2019, a wakporo Ashiru na ndị na-akwado ya, ebe APC boro ebubo na ndị otu ha mmadụ abụọ bu ndi na-ememina mmadụ gburu
Ha kwuru na ndị mere ihe ọjọọ ahụ bu ndị na-akwado ndị otu PDP
Ojoku bụ obodo Adebayo Rafiu Ibrahim bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu nke Kwara n'ebe ndịda na ntuli aka 2019 nke Naijiria
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, e jidere Adebayo Rafiu Ibrahim, onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa nke Kwara ndịda n'ihe gbasara mwakpo Ashiru na ndị na-akwado ya
Lola Flash (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, LGBT na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị
Onye na-ekere òkè na ACT UP n'oge ọrịa AIDS na New York City, e gosipụtara Flash na posta 'Kissing Doesn't Kill' poster n'afọ 1989
Nkà Flash, nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na nkwado obodo, dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Museum of Modern Art, Brooklyn Museum na Victoria na Albert Museum
A mụrụ Flash ma zụlite ya na Montclair, New Jersey, bụ nwa nwanyị nke ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka na ndị Amerịka ma bụrụ ọgbọ nke anọ n'akụkụ nne ya toro na Montclair
Nna nna ya, Charles H
Bullock, yana nne nne ya, kụziri na Jefferson School African American Heritage Center
Bullock guzobekwara YMCA ojii mbụ na Montclair, yana ndị ọzọ na Brooklyn, Virginia, na Kentucky
Aha e nyere ya bụ iji sọpụrụ nne nne nna ya
Flash malitere ise foto dị ka nwa agbọghọ, mesịa mee foto ụmụ akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ afọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, yana ise foto ndị ọzọ
Flash gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Montclair High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara kọleji ịmụ sayensị na foto na-enwe olileanya ịbụ onye na-ese foto sayensị, mana o kpebiri ịnyefe ụlọ akwụkwọ iji lekwasị anya na nka
N'afọ 1981, ọ nwetara BA
na Maryland Institute College of Art, ebe ya na Leslie King-Hammond gụrụ akwụkwọ
Flash mechara nweta MA na London College of Printing
Mgbe ọ gachara Maryland Institute College of Art, Flash jiri negatives na atụmatụ agba na foto ya
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese foto, o jiri ihe nkiri slide mee ihe ma mepụta foto ya na akwụkwọ na-adịghị mma
Nke a gbanwere agba dị na foto ndị ahụ, iji gosi onye na-ekiri ya na a kụziiri ha ile ụwa anya n'ụzọ ụfọdụ
Ọrụ mbụ ya lekwasịrị anya na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke gụnyere ọrụ ndị metụtara ọrịa AIDS
Malite n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1987, Flash na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ACT UP na New York City
N'afọ 1989, Flash na Julie Tolentino pụtara na ọtụtụ di na nwunye ndị ọzọ na 'Kissing Doesn't Kill' nke Gran Fury
Ihe ngosi a, nke pụtara na bọọdụ mgbasa ozi, bọs, na ikpo okwu ụgbọ oloko n'ọtụtụ obodo, jiri ụdị mkpọsa Benneton's United Colors kpọọ nkwenye na enweghị obi ụtọ gbasara HIV / AIDS
Flash malitere iji Minox na-ese foto wee malite iji 35mm Yashica na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
A maara Flash na mbụ maka iji usoro cross-color nke foto, nke na-agbanwe agba
Flash na-eji igwefoto Toyo-view ugbu a na-eji usoro ihe nkiri 4×5
Flash bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City
Na mgbakwunye na foto, Flash na-akụzi nka anya na nka asụsụ Bekee na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Brooklyn

Lola (Dolores) Iturbe (Barcelona, 1 August 1902 - Gijón, 5 January 1990) bụ onye ama ama na Spanish anarcho-syndicalist, trade unionist, activist, na onye nta akụkọ n'oge nke abụọ Spanish Republic, na onye otu French Resistance n'oge Agha nke France O so guzobe òtù anarcho-feminist, Mujeres Libres, na nke Comité de Milicias Antifascistas n'oge Agha Obodo Spain
Na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odibo site na nwata, ọ bụ onye nkuzi onwe ya
Iturbe bụ onye otu Confederación Nacional del Trabajo (CNT)
N'afọ 1921, onye anarchist, Juan Manuel Molina Mateo ('Juanel') sonyeere ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere òtù anarcho-feminist, Mujeres Libres na nke Comité de Milicias Antifascistas n'oge Agha Obodo Spain
Ọ zutere Émilienne Morin na Brussels na 1928
O dere akụkọ banyere agha maka Tierra y Libertad site n'ihu Aragon
Na njedebe nke esemokwu ahụ, a chụgara ya na Juanel, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Federación Anarquista Ibérica, na France
Ha abụọ bụ akụkụ nke French Resistance
Lola Maja (amuru Omolola Maja ; 26 Jenuarị 1978), nke a makwaara dika Lola Maja-Okojevoh, bu onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ịchọ mma; ọpụrụiche ya gụnyere mmetụta pụrụ iche, nku anya na iku anya
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke 'Sacred Beauty' na 'Ụlọ ahịa SFX'; A maara ya maka ịrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe omume ejiji na isi ihe nkiri dị ka The Figurine na October 1, yana ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu
O meela etemeete maka ndị ama ama dịka Genevieve Nnaji na Tiwa Savage
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na isi akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji, dị ka Style Mania na FAB, yana ụdị dị ka Iman na Tyson Beckford
N'afọ 2015, ọ ritere ihe nrite 'onye etemeete kachasị mma' nkr Africa Magic Viewers Choice Award for October 1
A mụrụ Maja na Nigeria, nye nna sitere na agbụrụ Yoruba na nne nwere nna nna Itsekiri, Lebanese, Italian, India na ndị Scotland
Ọ bụ nwa nwa onye soro tọọ ntọala Naijiria aha ya bu Akinola Maja na nwunye ya Comfort, bụ onye eze Naijiria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United Kingdom ebe o tolitere
Ọ laghachiri Nigeria na 2010, ka ọ lụchara dị
Maja malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe etemeete mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ; mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, na mahadum

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, o mere nhọrọ ma ọ ga-aga n'ihu na inweta nzere ya ma ọ bụ pụọ ma were ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe etemeete nke ndị otu mbụ iji malite Iman Cosmetics na London; ọ gbasoro obi ya wee malite Iman Cosmetics na 1997
O mepere oke akara nke ya, 'Sacred Lashes', na 2010 na Ụlọ Ahịa SFX na 2016
Maja laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iji nweta iru eru na 'Beauty Therapy'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na London College of Beauty Therapy, wee gaa na St Mary's University College, Twickenham
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara diploma nkuzi, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu ịmalite Ụlọ Akwụkwọ ịchọ Mma na 2013
Maja nwere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche na ntinye aka ya n'ihe gbasara ịchọ mma, site na mmetụta pụrụ iche na agbamakwụkwọ, site na ịma mma na ejiji
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na vidiyo egwu nke My Darlin nke Tiwa Savage, bụ onye ọ gbanwere ka ọ ghọrọ agadi nwanyị na vidiyo ahụ
O mere Genevieve Nnaji ihe etemete maka ise foto make ụlọ ahịa nke uwe ya StGenevieve
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Mma maka isi akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji dị ka Style Mania, FAB na Noir
Ọrụ ya na-eme ka ọ pụta ìhè na magazin ndị a ma ama, dị ka TW, Genevieve Magazine, Ezi Ịhụnanya, Elan, Black Hair & Mma, Agba, Nganga, Sideview, na Trendsetter
Ya na ndị àmà ama dị ka Iman na Tyson Beckford arụkọgo ọrụ

Ndị ọzọ a ma ama nke ya na ha rụkọrọ ọrụ gụnyere Alek Wek, Ernie Hudson, Joe Estevez, Joe, Dru Hill, Ojy Okpe, Fifi Ejindu, Genevieve Nnaji, Omotola Jalade, Rita Dominic, Kate Henshaw, Tiwa Savage, Omawumi, Waje, Toke Tool Makinwa, Eku Edewor na ndị ọzọ

Maja mere etemeete maka ihe nkiri ise nke Kunle Afolayan nke gụnyere The Figurine (2009) na October 1 (2014); nke ikpeazụ mere ka o rite ihe nrite 2015 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Award maka 'Onye etemete kacha Mma'
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka oge nke atọ na nke anọ nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Shuga

Maja arụwokwa ọrụ na vidiyo egwu dị iche iche, dịka egwu Wizkid a kpọrọ ' Tease Me ', na nke Banky W a kpọrọ 'Lagos Party', na kwa nke Omawumi a kpọrọ 'Today na Today' na nke Dr SID a kpọrọ 'Something about You'
Maja bụkwa onye ọbịa oge niile na ihe ngosi ụdị ndụ telivishọn na redio, na-ekwu maka ịma mma, ejiji na ndụmọdụ etemeete, ebe ọ na-ekwu ụdị ejiji kachasị ọhụrụ
Maja zutere di ya, Tonio Okojevoh n'agbamakwụkwọ nke nwa nwanne nna ya, mgbe ọ ka na-alụ onye ọzọ; njikọ aka nke na-emezughị
Ya na Tonio ghọrọ enyi na mgbe afọ isii gachara, ọ tụrụ aro, na-enweghị iyi ọyị ọ bụla Maja ekwuola na ya na di ya alụbeghị di tupu ha alụọ, bụ́ mkpebi di ya mere, dị ka nkwa o kwere Chineke
Tonio na Lola lụrụ na 2010; ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Tega na Tallulah, a mụrụ na 2011 na 2013 n'otu
O nwere mgbe ya na nwa mbụ ya na-eme ime, na-ege ntị ' Bumper to Bumper ' nke Wande Coal kwuru nyere aka mee ka ihe mgbu nke ime ya kwụsị
O mewokwa ka a mara na ya agaghị amụkwa ụmụ ọzọ
Lola Margaret (onye amụrụ Lola Margaret Oladipupo bụNigerian actress, film producer na director
Aka ọrụ ya pụtara ihe mgbe ọ kpara agwa n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Bisola Alanu ebe ọ bụ onye isi agwa
A mụrụ Lola na Ilesa, obodo dị na Osun State na Nigeria ebe ọ nọ gụcha Sekọndiri
Ọ nwere akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke Arts na History na mmekọrịta mba na mba mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lagos State University

Ọrụ Lola Margaret dịka onye mmeputa ihe nkiri malitere mgbe ọ zutere , , bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu ntọọchi ọ bụ ya kpọbatara ya n'otu ndị na-eme egwuregwu na Nigeria, Ọrụ ya pụtara ìhè mgbe ọ kpara agwa dika onye isi agwa n' ihe nkiri Bisola Alanu
Lola esonyekwara na fim dị iche iche, gụnyere Eyin Akuko na Omo Oloro, ihe nkiri nke ọ kwador ebe mmadụ dika Fathia Balogun na Mercy Aigbeso kpaa agwa na ya
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị otu narị fim
Lola Omolola a muru ya n'ụbọchi nke mbụ nke ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1976
Ọ bụbu onye nta akụkọ nke Nigeria mechara guzobe otu a kpọrọ 'Female IN'(FIN) na Fesibuku
Lola bụ nwaanyị Nigeria nke mbụ wepụtara ebe ụmụ nwaanyị nwere ike ikwupụta ihe bụ nsogbu ha tụmadi nke gbasara mmetọ nke ahụ akpọrọ 'sexual abuse'
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na nzukọ nke Facebook F8 emere n'afọ 2018
Omolola gụrụ akwụkwọ praimarị na sekọndiri ya na Nigeria tupu ọ gaa mba America ebe ọ nọrọ nweta digiri na Broadcast journalism site na Columbia College dị na Chicago
Omolola rụburu ọrụ nta akụkọ na Nigeria ma nwekwaa ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ọ hụrụ maka ya bụ nke ya n'ọnyonyo
Ka ọ gụchara Mahadum ma nweta digiri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na 'Community Counseling Centers di na Chikago, ebe ọ nọ enyere ndi na-aria ọria isi mgbaka maọbụ ndị uche ha ezughaghị oke
Ọzọkwa Omolara rụrụ ndị ụlọ ọrụ 'apartmentscom' mana kpebie na ya agaghị arụ ọzọ mgbe o bidoro mụwa ụmụaka
Nke a mere oji bido ụlọ ọrụ nke ya ọ kpọrọ spicebabycom ebe ọ na-egosipụta akọrọngwa di iche iche eji esi nri ndi Nigeria na Nigeria
O guzobere otu a kpọrọ FIN (Female in Nigeria) na Fesibuku ebe ụmụ nwaanyị ga-ekwuputa mmekpa ahụ ha na-enwe na-emeghị ihere ọbụla
O mechara gbanwe aha ya ka ọbụrụ 'Female IN ij wee nabata ụmụ nwaanyị ndi ọzọ na abụghị ndi Nigeria
Otu a ka ọdị ugbu a nwere ndị otu kariri otu nde ụmụ nwaanyị n'ọnụ ọgụ
ọ naanị ndi otu a nwere ike ima ihe na-eme ebe ahụ
Ebumnuche Omolola bụ inyere ụmụ nwaanyị obibi ndụ na-ara ahụ mana ha ahụghị onye ga-enyere ha aka maọbụ onye ha ga-agwa n'ihi na Omenaala machibidoro nke a
N'obodo Nigeria nakwa ọtụtụ obodo ụmụ nwaanyị enweghị ọnụ okwu
Ya mere otu FIN bụ ebe ha nwere ike ikwu okwu ma nweta enyemaka
Mgbe o guzobechara otu FIN, Omolola na Odogwu nwoke nwe Fesibuku bụ Mark Zuckerberg nwere nzukọ
Ha tụkọtara alo ka ụmụ nwaanyị si enweta nkwado site n'otu FIN
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị CNN, gbara Maazị Mark kelere Omolara ma jaa ya ike ka osi akwado ụmụ nwaanyị na enweghị ọnụ okwu ha nwee ọnụ okwu na Fsibuku
Ugbu a Lola na-akwado ịrụpụta ebe di iche iche ụmụ nwaanyi nwere ike iga kwuputa nsogbu ha na enweghi onye ga enye ha nsogbu
Lola Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1941) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting, ya na nné ya, Allie Pettway
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Frist Art Museum, ma tinye ya na nchịkọta nkè Metropolitan Museum of Art
Site n'ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ákwà, nné Lola bụ Henrietta Pettway na nne ya bụ Allie Pettway
Nnà ya bụ John the Baptist Pettway
A zụlitere ya na ụmụnne nwanyị itoolu na ụmụnne nwoke anọ
Ọ malitere ibu ọrụ ezinụlọ mgbè ọ dị obérè
Ọ malitere isi nri mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu, na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa mgbè ọ dị iri, ma na-akpa ákwà n'otu afọ ahụ
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Ebenezer, na-asọ mpi nke ukwuu 'ọ bụrụ na ọ wepụtara narị pound abụọ, ọ wepụtara otu narị abụọ, kwa
Lola lụrụ di ma zụlite ụmụ iri na abụọ
Àtụ Infobox musical artist
Rachel Akosua Funmilola Garton (nke a maara dị ka Lola Rae; amụrụ na 20 Jenụwarị 1991) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria

Ọ nwetara nkwadọ̀ mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu izizi ya 'Watch My Ting Go', nke nwetara otuto dị egwu ma si otú a mee ka a họpụta ya maka Most Promising Female Act to Watch na 2013 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
A mụrụ Lola Rae n'aka nna onye Britain na nne onye Ghana na Obalende, mpaghara Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na St
Saviour's School, Ikoyi; na Lekki British International High School, Lagos, n'otu n'otu
Otú ọ dị, ọ hapụrụ Naịjirịa gaa England mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise iji mezue agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya na Central Saint Martins, ebe ọ gụrụ akwá ejiji
Ọrụ ntụrụndụ Lola Rae malitere dị ka onye na-agba egwú mgbe ọ bụ onye otu egwu egwu 'Mystikal' n'afọ 2010
Ndị na-agba egwú Mystikal nyochara maka Britain's Got Talent ebe Rae bụrụ abụ na asọmpi ahụ ma onye ọka ikpe Simon Cowell họpụtara ndị na-agba egwu Mystikal na ọkara ikpeazụ nkè asọmpi ahụ
Na ngwụcha asọmpi ahụ, a bịanyere aka na Syco maka otu afọ
Rae jụrụ oku ọ kpọrọ The X Factor iji chụsoo ọrụ onwe ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2012, Rae wepụtara egwu izizi ya bụ Watch My Ting Go na egwu ọzọ akpọrọ High
A họpụtara ya dị ka 'Most Promising Female Act to Watch' na 2013 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
Vidio ya na 'Watch My Ting Go' gosipụtara na Soundcity TV na 8 Jenụwarị 2013 na ngosipụta cameo site na Iyanya na Emma Nyra
A họpụtara vidiyo ahụ na 10th Channel O Music Video Awards
N'ịgbaso 'Watch My Ting Go', Rae gosipụtara Iyanya na egwú akpọrọ Fi Mi Le nke mere ka a họpụta ya ọzọ na 2014 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
O mere ihe ngosi dị ka mmasị ịhụnanya Ice Prince na vidiyo egwu ya 'More'
Na Mee 2018, Rae mụrụ nwa nwanyị
Lola Shoneyin (26 Febrụwarị 1974 - ) bụ onye Naigeria bụ onye édémédé akwụkwọ
Shoneyin a mụrụ n'afọ 1977 n'Ibadan, Ȯra Ọyọ nke dị n'ala Naigiria
Ọ bụ onye Yoruba
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Edinburgh, Obodoézè Nà Ofú, na Ibadan, gakwaa mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo na Ago Iwoye, Ȯra Ogun, n'ikeazu n'ime Obodoézè Nà Ofú na London
Shoneyin bi na Lagos na Naigeria
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Abuja
Lolita Files bụ onye edemede, onye edemede ihe nkiri, na onye na-emepụta ihe

N'etiti akwụkwọ akụkọ isii kachasị ere bụ akwụkwọ klọb akwụkwọ kachasị amasị Scenes from a Sistah na Child of God Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke isii, sexliesmurderfame ka Carolyn Folks họọrọ maka ihe nkiri maka Entertainment Studios na Files na-agbanwe ihe nkiri ahụ
Akwụkwọ Once Upon A Time In Compton, nke onye bụbu Compton Gang Unit Detectives Timothy M

Brennan na Robert Ladd, tinyere Files, banyere afọ Brennan na Ladd n'òtù ndị omempụ, ịrị elu nke Gangsta rap, agha ndị omempụrụ aka, ọgba aghara LA, nyocha nke ogbugbu nke ndị rapper Tupac Shakur na The Notorious BIG, na ọdịda nke Ngalaba Ndị Uwe Ojii Compton bipụtara na Eprel 25, 2017
Files nwere nzere na Broadcast Journalism site na Mahadum Florida ma bụrụ onye otu Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority
Files bi na Los Angeles, ebe ọ na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, nonfiction, ma na-ede ma na-emepụta ọrụ maka telivishọn, ihe nkiri, na mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ
A mụrụ Lolita Files na Fort Lauderdale, FL, nke Lillie (née Brackett) (nwụrụ n'afọ 2008) na Arthur James Files, Sr
(nwụrụ na afọ 1999), nne ya nyere ya aha mgbe ihe nkiri Stanley Kubrick gasịrị
O nwere otu nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya, Arthur James Files, Jr
Onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma site na nwata, ọ mikpuru onwe ya n'akụkọ ifo (akụkọ ifo ndị Gris, akụkọ ifo ndị Rom, akụkọ ifo Norse, akụkọ ifo Arthurian), Dante's Divine Comedy, na ọrụ J
Tolkien

Ịhụnanya ya maka Shakespeare, Toni Morrison, Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Zora Neale Hurston, Louise Meriwether, Vladimir Nabokov, Chinua Achebe, Claude Brown, Richard Wright, Gustav Flaubert, na ndị edemede egwuregwu Gris Sophocles, Aeschylus, Euripides, na Aristophanes ga-agwa ma metụta ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya
Files gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Dillard High School na agụmakwụkwọ asaa wee gaa Mahadum Florida na Gainesville

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụ akwụkwọ, The Independent Florida Alligator, bụ onye otu Mahadum Florida Gospel Choir, ma kwe nkwa Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority (isi Iota Lambda)
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya, ọ bụ Senator na-anọchite anya College of Journalism and Communications na UF's Student Senate

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na Broadcast Journalism, Files laghachiri Fort Lauderdale, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na dị ka onye nhazi ihe onwunwe mpaghara maka Great Atlantic Property Management, ụlọ ọrụ na'ụlọ nke sitere na Newport News, VA na ụlọ ahịa na ebe obibi nke gafere Eastern Seaboard na akụkụ nke Midwest
Ahụmahụ ya na ụwa nke njikwa ihe onwunwe ga-emecha gwa ya akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ mbụ ya, Scenes from a Sistah (1997), na ihe na-eso ya, Getting To The Good Part (1999)

Site na afọ 1992 ruo n'afọ 1996, Files bụ National Communications Manager maka ngalaba Facilities Management nke KinderCare Learning Centers, mba kachasị enye nlekọta ụmụaka maka uru na agụmakwụkwọ nwata, mgbe ahụ na-adabere na Montgomery, AL

N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1994, Files dere akụkọ mkpirikpi abụọ na peeji iri ise nke Child of God, akwụkwọ akụkọ dị egwu ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ya ruo afọ ise, na ụlọ ọrụ edemede Jay Garon-Brooke Associates, Inc, ụlọ ọrụ na-anọchite anya onye edemede kacha ere ahịa John Grisham
N'akwụkwọ ozi ajụjụ ya, Files kwuru na ya nwere akụkọ mkpirikpi asatọ ọzọ nke ya na abụọ o zitere
Nancy Coffey, onye ọrụ si Garon-Brooke, kpọrọ oku n'ụtụtụ echi ya na-arịọ ka ọ hụ ihe ndị ọzọ
Otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bịanyere aka na Files
Mgbe ya na Garon-Brooke bịanyere aka, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji mezue Child of God, Files malitere ide akwụkwọ akụkọ ọzọ, Scenes from a Sistah, mezue edemede mbụ n'ime ụbọchị asaa
Na Febụwarị 1996, Warner Books zụrụ Scenes maka ego $ 50,000
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1996, Files hapụrụ Corporate America maka ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye edemede
E bipụtara 'Child of God' na Septemba, na afọ 2001, mgbe ewepụtara Scenes sequel Getting to the Good Part na afọ 1999 na Blind Ambitions, na afo 2000
Ruo ugbu a, Files ahọrọbeghị ibipụta akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 1998, Files pụtara n'egwuregwu 'Sisters Who Get Everything Without Giving Up Anything' na Homefront Theatre, na-eme ihe nkiri Rea Montgomery
SUNY Empire State College na-enye ọmụmụ izu asatọ, 'Nnyocha The Disciplines Literature (EDU-232072),' nke dabeere na nyocha nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Shakespeare Hamlet na Lolita Files, Child of God

Files mepụtara ma gosipụta dị ka onye nchọpụta maka usoro isii nke A&E bụ Who Killed Tupac? N'usoro ihe omume ahụ, onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Benjamin Crump na-eduzi nyocha miri emi banyere ogbugbu a na-edozighị edozi nke onye na-ese egwu hip-hop Tupac Shakur
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, Files mere nyocha DNA sitere na ụlọ ọrụ na-achọpụta agbụrụ African Ancestry
Nsonaazụ laghachiri na-ekpughe njikọ kpọmkwem nke nna nna Files na ndị Brame na Balanta nke Guinea-Bissau na West Africa
Once Upon A Time In Compton (Tim Brennan & Robert Ladd na Lolita Files) - Amazon, Eprel na afọ 2017
Onye lolo bụ nwunye onye eze mgbe ụfọdụ
Oge ụfọdụ, ha nwere ike bụrụ onye ga-ekwu ihe ndi mmadụ ga-eme kama kama eze
Omotunde Adebowale David, onye a maara dị ka Lolo1, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na Naijiria
Ọ kwadoro mmemme redio, 'Oga Madam' na Wazobia FM 941, ruo afo 2019 mgbe ọ hapụrụ ma sonye na Lasgidi FM dị ka onye isi njikwa na onye na-ahụ maka ikuku
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Ijebu-Ode Anglịkan Girls ebe ọ nọrọkwa akụkụ nke ụbọchị akwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ nkwari akụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Iwu na Mahadum Lagos Steeti ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka iwu mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu na afo 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba iwu tupu ọ hapụ ya maka mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na afo 2004
A makwaara ya maka ime ihe nkiri, na ihe nkiri Yoruba na Bekee
O gosipụtara na usoro TV ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Adaku
Ọ ghọrọ na ikuku mmadụ na nke mbụ ya mgbe ọ banyere Metro FM
O mechara sonye na Wazobia FM, wee pụọ na afo 2019 mgbe ya na ha karịrị afọ iri na otu
O nwetara aha njirimara Lolo1 n'oge ihe ngosi redio mgbe ọ rịọrọ ndị mmadụ aha njirimara ma mesịa họrọ lolo
O gosipụtara na peeji mkpuchi nke La Mode Magazine maka mbipụta July na afo 2017
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Ms
Wilson na ihe nkiri nke afo 2018 We Don't Live Here Anymore nke Tope Oshin mere
N'afọ 2020, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya akpọrọ mgbe ihunanya ezughi oke
Okiki Afolayan duziri ihe nkiri a
Ọ bụ nne naanị ya nke nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ na nwa nwanyị
Lomasontfo Martha Dludlu (nwụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 2011) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Swazi
N'afọ 1993, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na mba ahụ
Dludlu tolitere n'ime ime obodo enwetaghị agụm akwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpali obodo ma na-elekọta ndị bi na ya nwere nkwarụ na ụmụ mgbei
N'agbanyeghị na ọ maghị akwụkwọ, ọ sonyeere na ntulị aka nke 1993 na Maphalaleni ma họpụta ya na House of Assembly, merie ụmụ nwoke asatọ na otu nwanyị ọzọ, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na House
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye otu ruo n'afọ 1998
Ọ rịara ọrịa strok n'afọ 2008 wee nwụọ n'ụlọ ya n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2011 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na anọ
Okwu Lombard na-ezo aka na ndị mmadụ ma ọ bụ ihe ndị metụtara Lombardy, mpaghara dị n'ebe ugwu nke obodo Ịtali
Lombe Phyllis Chibesakunda (amụrụ na 5 Mee, na afọ 1944) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye nnọchi anya mba Zambia

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Human Rights Commission nke Zambia, Solicitor General, Deputy Minister na Ministry of Legal Affairs, na-anọchite anya Chief Justice nke Zambia, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Japan, United Kingdom, Vatican, na Netherlands
Chibesakunda bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe COMESA, na Khartoum, Sudan
A mụrụ Lombe Phyllis Chibesakunda na Zambia na 5 Mee, na afọ 1944
Ọ si n'ezinụlọ eze Chibesakunda
Chibesakunda bụ onye isi na Muchinga Province nke agbụrụ Bisa, otu n'ime ọtụtụ olumba nke ugwu Zambia
Ọ gara Chibesakunda na Pandala praịmarị na Northern Zambia
O mechara gaa na Chipembi Girls ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Head Girl, mgbe e mesịrị ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na National Institute of Public Administration na Lusaka nakwa na Gray's Inn na England
Chibesakunda bụ nwanyị nke obodo ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka iwu na Zambia na onye na-ahụ anya steeti na Ministry of Legal Affairs
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Matero, na Solicitor-General nke Republic of Zambia na afọ 1973

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nke ọma na Law, Social Action na Politics, ọ sonyeere ndị nnọchi anya mba na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na Japan (1975), Kọmishọna Ukwu Zambia na United Kingdom (UK), Netherlands, na Holy See (1978[[81)
Chibesakunda sonyere na mkparịta ụka Lancaster House nke dugara na nnwere onwe nke Zimbabwe, ma mee mkpọsa megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa
A họpụtara Chibesakunda ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ na 1986 ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe nke ụlọ akụ mmepe nke Africa
A họpụtara Chibesakunda ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ nke Zambia n'afọ 1997
Kemgbe afọ 1981 ọ lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ikpe dị ka onye ọka ikpe na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, Ụlọikpe Kasụ Elu ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi ikpe nke Zambia site na afọ 2012 ruo na afọ 2015
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Chibesakunda ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Common Market màkà Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) Court of Justice, nke dị na Khartoum, Sudan, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ a
Ọ nọchiri Nzamba Kitonga nke Kenya n'ọrụ ahụ
Onye isi ala ikpeazụ nwunye ya ṅụrụ iyi n'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa bụ onye isi ala Edgar Chagwa Lungu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015
Ewezuga ọrụ ikpe, Justice Lombe Chibesakunda bụ prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum Kansai na Japan
Chibesakunda bụ Chancellor na Mahadum Rockview na Lusaka, no na Zambia
O nwere nwa nwoke, Chita Chibesakunda
Lombe na-ede akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ My Trodden Path An Autobiography
Asụsụ Lomwe (Lowe), Elomwe, nke a makwaara dị ka Western Makua, bụ asụsụ nke anọ kachasị na Mozambique

Ọ bụ ya na Makua n'ime otu asụsụ Bantu pụrụ iche na mpaghara ugwu nke mba ahụ Makhuwa na-eji mpaghara kwesịrị ekwesị (Nampula, wdg) kewapụrụ ebe buru ibu na-asụ Lomwe site na eChuwabo metụtara, ọ bụ ezie na eMakhuwa agbata obi eChuwabo na mpaghara oke osimiri ọzọ
N'ebe ndịda, a ga-ekenye Sena (ChiSena) nwere njikọ chiri anya n'otu ndị nwere Nyanja na Chewa, ebe ndị dị iche nke gụnyere Yao, Makonde na Mwera dị n'ebe ugwu

Ewezuga mgbanwe mpaghara dị n'ime eMakhuwa kwesịrị ekwesị, eLomwe na-eji ch ebe tt pụtara na eMakhuwa orthography dịka ọmụmaatụ eMakhuwa mirette ('ọgwụgwọ') kwekọrọ na eLomwe mirecce, eMakhuwa murruthu ('anụ ahụ nwụrụ anwụ') na eLomwe miruchu, eMakhuwa otthapa (' ọṅụ') to eLomwe ochapa
Ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'etiti asụsụ Bantu bụ infinitive nke ngwaa nwere o- kama nke a na-ahụkarị Bantu ku- prefix omala (eMakhuwa) bụ 'ịmecha', omeeela (nke bụkwa ụdị eMakhuwa) bụ ịkekọrịta'
Londeka Mchunu (amụrụ n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994), bu onye ome ihe nkiri na ome ejiji nlereanya South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri Soap opera dịka, Isithembiso, Isibaya na Ụlọ Zwide
A mụrụ Mchunu n'abalị́ iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994 na Msinga n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne iri
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ O mechara tolite na Clermont, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, mgbe ya na nne ya kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ isi
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Nelisa Mchunu bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara nkwukọrịta na Varsity College
N'afo 2016, n'oge ọnụnọ ya na Varsity College, o mere ihe ngosi maka telenovela ọhụrụ nke Bomb Productions mepụtara
Mgbe ihe omere masiri masịrị ndị na-emepụta ihe, ọ nwetara ohere ịrụ ọrụ ndu dị ka'Snegugu Magwaza' na Mzansi Magic msa emesịa bụrụ Mzansi Wethu Soap opera bu Isithembiso na 2017
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha ọhụrụ na TV na onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV maka ihe nkiri Simon Sabela na ihe nkiri Television yana maka ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ nke oge asatọ nke Mzansi Magic soap opera Isibaya wee mee ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke 'Londiwe'
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyere na etv soap opera House of Zwide wee rụọ ọrụ nkwado nke 'Zanele Zwide'
London bu íshí ochie England na Njikota Ochíchìézè
O bu ámá ukwu karírí na nke ukwu na NO na nke kárírí madu na o bu nnokota nke ukwu
ọ bụ ámá gbáasàrà kárírí madu na Britain
Ébé ya bu ébé mádu bìrì nke ukwu shí afọr puku abụọ, na mbu ya na gá mgbe ndi Mpaghara Rome kèrè ya, kpó ya Londinium
Ímé London bu ébé di ichié nke City of London, ma ha na kpo ya 'square mile' (mile gbùrù gbúrù) nke ámá íjè orü áhiá
Ngé nwèkwàrà nkeji ya nke shí ógè mediaeval
Shí mgbe ichié 19, áhà nke bu 'London' bu ihe mádu na kpo ámá sáará nke gbárá etítì ya gbùrù gbúrù
Na ógè nso, ébé á bu ébé bu ama London na nke ama nléfu ányá nke Greater London, nke nwéré íshí ya na ọtú ochíchì nke mádu tìrì nke yá
London Air Quality Network (LAQN) bụ nchịkọta nkè ụlọ ọrụ na-enyocha mmetọ ikuku na London na South East England

N'ịbụ nke ndị na-eme nchọpụta na King's College, London malitere n'afọ 1993, ọ bụ Environmental Research Group nke Imperial College na-achịkwa ya ugbu a na ego sitere n'aka ndị ọchịchị mpaghara, mpaghara mmelite azụmaahịa, Transport for London, na Defra, ma too ghọọ 'usoro nyocha ikuku kachasị ukwuu n'ụdị ya n'ụwa'

Ụlọ nyocha ọ bụla nwèrè ngwá ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwé ya n'ime ụlọ kwụ ọtọ, nkè a na-ejikarị n'akụkụ ụzọ ma ọ bụ mpaghara obodo ndị ọzọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike, nké na-ewe ihe atụ mmetọ dị íchè íchè ihe dịka nkeji iri na ise ọ bụla, ya mèrè na-enye ohere nyocha dị mkpirikpi na ogologo ógè nke ikuku
A na-eji data nke netwọk ahụ mepụtara mee ihe iji mee ka nyocha sayensị na ahụike màrà, iwu ọha na eze, na nghọta ọha na eze banyéré nsogbu mmetọ ikuku ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ

A na-ejikwa ya emepụta ihe nyocha ikuku dị nso n'ogè, map mmetọ, ọnụ ọgụgụ, na ịdọ áká ná ntị site na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ a raara nyé (londonairorguk), ngwa ekwentị ('London Air'), na nri Twitter (@londonaire), ya na akara bọs na ọdụ ụgbọ oloko 'ị'
London Tyler Holmes (amụrụ na Machị 27, 1991), nke a maara dị ka London on da Track, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-eti egwu, na ónyé na-ede egwu

Ọ bụ ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na onye na-eti egwu Atlanta Young Thug ma soro Birdman, Lil Wayne, Lil Baby, Rich Homie Quan, Gucci Mane, Giggs, Drake, Post Malone, TI, 21 Savage, 50 Cent, Sfera Ebbasta, Summer Walker na Ariana Grande, rụọ ọrụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Holmes na Machị 27, 1991 na Memphis, Tennessee, mana ọ kwagara Atlanta mgbè ọ dị afọ 10
Ọ mụtara ịkpọ piano na keyboard n'oge ụka
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Holmes gara Mahadum Full Sail na Florida, ọ bụ ezie na ọ gụsịrịbeghị akwụkwọ
London malitere rap mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii na otu Dem Guyz
Ndị otu ahụ na-ebudata beats na SoundClick maka cents 99, ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime beats na-efu $ 100 màkà ikike pụrụ iche
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Dị ka ụzọ isi chekwaa ego, London jiri ahụmahụ ya na-akpọ piano na chọọchị wee malite ime beats màkà ndị na-eti egwu
Site n'enyemaka nke ngwanrọ n'ịntanetị, o nwere ike imeziwanye ọrụ ya
Ọ nwetara otuto n'ógbè ahụ mgbe ọ malitere imepụta ihe maka Rich Kidz
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ndị ọzọ [onye?] malitere ịrịọ màkà ihe ndị o dere
Na mbido ọrụ ya, London ga-enyefe ọkpụkpụ ya n'efu dị ka ụzọ isi wuo njikọ ma nwetakwuo mgbasa ozi
Abụ mbụ o mepụtara nke nwetara egwu redio bụ 'Pieon' nke Rich Kidz
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke 'Pieon' kpaliri London ịga n'ihu na-emepụta
N'afọ 2011, o dekọrọ nke mbụ ya n'ime ọtụtụ mmekọrịta ya na Young Thug, 'Curtains'
London gàrà n'ihu na-enye ya ọkpụkpụ n'efu tupu ya abịanye aka na nkwekọrịta akara mbụ ya na Cash Money Records
Holmes nwere ụmụ anọ; nwa nwanyị na onye na-agụ egwu Summer Walker amụrụ na 2021, yana nwa nwanyị ọzọ na ụmụ nwoke abụọ site na mmekọrịta gárá aga
Lonestar Cell bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke dị na Monrovia, Liberia
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ netwọk mgbasa ozi ikuku kachasị na Liberia, yana 48% nke ahịa ahịa n'afo 2011
Tọrọ ntọala na 2000 site na Beirut dabeere na Investcom, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ onye enyemaka nke South Africa conglomerate MTN Group na-eso MTN nweta Investcom na'afọ 2006
Onye ọchụnta ego Liberia Benoni Urey bụ oche nke Lonestar Communication Corporation ma nwee akụkụ dị ịrịba ama nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na PLC Investments Group ya
Longford International School bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-agụkọ akwụkwọ ọnụ na Ebute Metta, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye ma Senior School na Junior School Certificate Examinations
E hiwere ya na 24 Jenụwarị 1962; a maara ya dị ka Nigeria People's College (NIGERPECO) n'etiti 1962 na 1986, na Ago-Egba High School n'etiti 1986 n'afọ 2006
Longitude bu oluwa bekee ana mata mgbe he no na Owuwu n'uwa, ma mgbe ono na Odida
Adi mata longitude-u wo mgbe elewa ma ono n'aka iri m'ono na aka-ikpa ihe ana-kpo Prime Meridian, line eji kawasi uwa n'etiti, gbara ya ma elu ala ya (ebe Arctic) ru okpuru ala ya (ebe Antarctica)
Ihe no na aka-iri gi mgbe ilewa prime meridian uwa nwere longitude no na East
Ihe no na aka-ikpa gi nwere longitude no na West
OLunguda (Nʋngʋra) bụ asụsụ Niger-Congo nke Naijiria
Ha na-ebi n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Gongola tumadi na na gburugburu ugwu ugwu Lunguda Plateau Mgbawa ugwu Adamawa streeti
Joseph Greenberg gụrụ ya dị ka Ngalaba puru Iche, G10, nke ezinụlọ Adamawa
Mgbe Blench (na 2008) kewara Adamawa, e mere Lunguda ka o buru alaka upon olu nke asụsụ Bambukic
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-ekwu okwu ugbu a bụ dịka Ethnologue si kwuo ọnụ ọgụgụ SIL nke 45,000 sitere na 1973
mana nnyocha e mere na nso nso a egosila 50,000 na ngụkọ 2006
Udị dị iche iche nke aha Longuda gụnyere Languda, Longura, Nunguda, Nungura, Nungureba
Na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Adamawa Languages Project, Kleinewillinghöfer (2014) depụtara ire okwu ise na ụyọkọ ire okwu Longuda
N'otu akụkụ n'ihi omenala okwu a machibidoro iwu, enwere nnukwu ọdịiche dị iche iche n'etiti asụsụ Longuda
Ndị Lunguda bi n'akụkụ ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, karịsịa na Guyuk, Adamawa steeti na Guyuk LGA, Balanga LGA nke Gombe steeti na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Borno
Ha nwere ihe dịka 504,000 dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na 2006 si dị
N'okpuru ebe a bụ ndepụta nke aha asụsụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, na ebe sitere na Blench (2019)
Ogige kachasị ukwuu bụ ogige Chikila
Àtụ Adamawa languages
Lonnie Graham bụ onye na-ese foto, prọfesọ, onye na-etinye ihe, na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na-enyocha ụzọ a ga-esi jiri nka mee ihe iji nweta ihe a na-ahụ anya na ndụ ndị mmadụ
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Visual Art na Mahadum Pennsylvania State na University Park, nso State College, Pennsylvania
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke PhotoAlliance (San Francisco) kemgbe Ọnwa Ọgọọst afọ 2019
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, Graham kwuru okwu na TEDxPSU symposium
Okwu ya dị maka iyi site na YouTube
Lonnie Graham gụrụ ihe osise na foto azụmahịa na Ivy School of Professional Art na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

N'afọ 1976, ọ gụrụ foto na eserese na Nova Scotia College of Art and Design na Halifax, Nova Scotia ebe ọ gara nnọkọ onwe onye ya na onye na-ese foto Robert Frank na nkatọ nke onye na-enyocha nka Donald Kuspit
N'afọ 1977, ọ gara San Francisco Art Institute, ma soro Linda Connor, Jack Fulton, Regan Louie, na Henry Wessel mụọ
Ọ bụ onye na-enyere Larry Sultan aka na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị mmadụ John Collier Jr
Pirkle Jones, ezigbo enyi na onye ọrụ Ansel Adams nke na-eleta ụlọ ọrụ nka ugboro ugboro, duziri Graham na foto buru ibu
Site n'afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1997 Graham bụ onye nduzi nke foto na Manchester Craftsmen's Guild na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, otu ụlọ ọrụ nka obodo nke William Strickland, Jr
guzobere maka nka na agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị ntorobịa nọ n'ihe ize ndụ
Graham mepụtara ọrụ nnwale ọhụrụ gụnyere Arts Collaborative, nke jikọtara nka na agụmakwụkwọ
Ihe omume a dọtara uche nke First Lady Hillary Clinton onye gara ebe ahụ, ma sọpụrụ ya dị ka National Model for Arts Education
Prọfesọ Graham jere ozi dị ka onye otu panel na onye nleta saịtị na Commonwealth maka Pennsylvania Council on the Arts
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ yiri nke ahụ na ọkwa mba maka National Endowment for the Arts na Washington, DC
Site n'afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2003 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nleta nke ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na San Francisco Art Institute, na San Francisco, California
N'afọ 2002, Kimberley Camp, onye isi nchịkwa nke Barnes Foundation na Merion, Pennsylvania kpọrọ Graham ka ọ duzie akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Barnes
E mechara mee ya onye nkuzi nke mmemme pụrụ iche ma gaa n'ihu na-akụzi na Barnes ruo afọ 2007
Site na afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2009 Graham bụ onye na-anọchite anya onye nduzi nke Fabric Workshop na Museum
Malite n'afọ 2003 Graham malitere njem foto na India, Ethiopia, na Iceland na onye na-ese foto Linda Connor
Ya na Jack Fulton gara India, Nepal na Tibet n'afọ 2007

Graham malitere ọtụtụ njem ego na nke onwe ya na Afrịka na Eshia nke metụtara ọrụ nka na ọdịbendị ọ rụrụ na Philadelphia na Fairmount Park Art Association na Pittsburgh na nkwado nke Three Rivers Arts Festival
Ebumnuche ọrụ ndị a bụ iji gosipụta na enwere ike inweta mgbanwe dị ukwuu na ndụ ndị mmadụ site n'ime ka nka bụrụ ihe ngwọta dị irè maka nsogbu ndị a na-ahụkarị
Ka ọ na-erule njedebe a, e nyere Graham ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ
N'afọ 1997, site na Jeanne Pearlman na Three Rivers Arts Festival na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, nyere iwu 'African/American Garden Project'
Nke a bụ akụkụ nke usoro ngosi buru ibu a na-akpọ 'Points of Entry' nke gụnyere ntinye sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe, Ann Carlson, Group Material, Michelle Illuminato, Daniel J
Martinez, na Fred Wilson
Ọrụ African / American Garden nyere mgbanwe anụ ahụ na ọdịbendị nke ndị nne na-alụbeghị di si Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, na ndị ọrụ ugbo si obere obodo ọrụ ugbo na Muguga, Kenya
N'ihi ọrụ a, Graham wuru usoro ogige ntụrụndụ dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Loo, ma ọ bụ Shụŋọ, bụ asụsụ Adamawa nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe karịrị nari asụsụ Nari ise a na-asụ na mba ahụ
DiKa Nke 1992, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na- ekwu okwu asụsụ Loo di puku asatọ
Ndị na Ekwu Okwu ahụ bi n'akụkụ ufodu nke Gombe Steeti nakwa steeti dị n'akụkụ ndịda Taraba Steeti
Àtụ Adamawa languages
Loots bụ ma aha e nyere madu ma aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere

Lopa nwere ụzọ abụọ obere asụsụ Kainji nke Nigeria
Agbụrụ Lopa gbara agbata obi na asụsụ Busa abanyela n'asụsụ ahụ
Asụsụ abụọ ahụ bụ Rop (Ollop) na Urcibar (Shuba)
Tụkwasị na nke a, enwere aha ala maka asụsụ abụọ ahụ n'ozuzu ya Rerang, nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'asụsụ West Kainji
Blench (2019) depụtara Tsupamini dị ka ụdị dị iche iche
McGill (2012) nyekwara aha ọzọ Oleran maka Lopa
Aha Lopa nwere ike isite na aha lópár (Lapar), nke na-ezo aka na Rop na Shuba
Okwu mkpuchi na-ezo aka na ndị na-asụ Urcibar na Ollop bụ [dɔ̀ɾìɾáŋ̃ ] (otu onye), [òːɾìɾàŋ̃ ]) (ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ), na asụsụ [òlːèɾáŋ
Àtụ Platoid languages
Lopit nwere ike ịza

Laetitia Laure Nsoutou, nke a maara nke ọma dịka aha egwu ya Lor bụ onye na-eti egwu na Cameroon, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na na-eme ejije na onye na'ọtụtụ ngwá egwu

Her Extended Play (EP) Dawn, bụ dịka Samuel Lacmene, onye guzobere Stillac, si kwuo, 'otu abọm nke na-egosipụta ịdị ọhụrụ', ebe ọ 'nwere ike izipu ozi siri ike, mana karịa ihe niile iji nye mmetụta site na ụda olu ya'
A mụrụ Lor Laetitia Laure Nsoutou Meyoug na 3 Septemba
1991 na Yaoundé, Cameroon
N'ịbụ onye mikpuru onwe ya n'ihe omume nka dịka ịgba egwu, ihe nkiri na egwu site na nwata, ọ mụtara keyboard dịka onye na-amụta onwe ya
Ọ gara Lycée Général Leclerc ebe ọ sonyeere ndị egwú ụlọ akwụkwọ ma merie asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ Coca-Cola
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị elu na Takoradi, Ghana, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na IPMC Technology College na afọ 2015

Lor malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya n'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ sonyeere 'Troupe Rue 1113' ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agba egwu, onye na'agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu maka ihe nkiri egwu mbụ e mepụtara na Cameroon, 'Rendez-vous avec les morts', nke Elena Serna dere
Ruo n'afọ 2016, ọ nabatara aha 'Laelaure' ma soro ndị omenkà dị iche iche dịka Festus na Willis Beats rụkọọ ọrụ
Ya na onye na-ese ihe bụ Worlasi rụkọkwara ọrụ na egwu ya 'No Matter', ma duzie / soro mepụta vidiyo egwu ya 'Cartoon', nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime vidiyo egwu kachasị mma site na Africa
Lor sonyeere New Bell Music dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu n'afọ 2016, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta Jovi duziri ya
Dịka mmeghe, a na-egosi ya na egwu izizi nke Pascal 'Mankaʹa Remix'
A nabatara vidiyo nke Tatapong Beyala duziri nke ọma
O mekwara aka na abọm ya Work Dey 3 n'aha 'I No Kam Fine' ma mesịa pụta na egwu 'ICI' nke Tata n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ bụ ezie na e mere ọkwa na ọ na-arụ ọrụ na EP ya, ọ gaghị ewepụta ọrụ ọ bụla n'onwe ya n'okpuru New Bell Music, nke ga-akpata ajụjụ banyere ịbụ onye 'na-eleghara anya' n'okpuru akara ahụ
N'ọnwa June 2018, Lor wepụtara vidiyo Freestyle dịka onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya ugbu a
N'ịbụ nke Method J mepụtara ma Tatapong Beyala duziri, e gosipụtara vidiyo ahụ na Daymolition
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'Tourne pas le dos' nke bụ abụ nwere ụda egwu afro pop nke Sango Edi mepụtara ma Walter Enow duziri nke nwetara nyocha dị mma

N'afọ 2019, ya na onye na-ese ihe nke AFRIMA họpụtara WAZIH rụkọtara ọrụ na aha 'Fighter' nke Method J Beats mepụtara, site na Extended Play Anotic ya na Disemba 2019, ọ wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ya, 'On Connait' abụ afro pop nke Sangtum mepụtara nke ọha na eze nabatara nke ọma
Dị ka akụkụ nke Street Corner collective, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na La Case des Arts na Street Corner na l'Institut Français du Cameroun
Lorcia Cooper-Khumalo (amụrụ na 9 Nọvemba 1978), bụ onye mba South Africa buru nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agba egwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama bu Backstage, Scandal, Lockdown, agbamakwukwo Zulu na Hey Boy
A mụrụ ya n' abali itolu n' onwa Nọvemba afo 1978 na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ lụrụ Mandla Khumalo
Di na nwunye a nwere otu nwa nwanyị na otu nwa nwoke
N'afọ 2019, ọ tara ahụhụ oria nke na akwara obara na akwara olu
Maka ọgwụgwọ ahụ, ọ na-agbanye carbon dioxide maka mfuli gburugburu anya ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, nne na nna ya debara aha ya na klas ịgba egwu mgbe ha hụrụ mmasị ya maka ịgba egwu ma sọọ mpi na asọmpi ịgba egwu Latin America na Ballroom
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, o meriri asọmpi mbụ ya na asọmpi mpaghara maka ịgba egwu Ballroom na Latin America
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ gara Academy of Dance ma mụọ ịgba egwu n'okpuru onye na-ede egwu a ma ama bụ Debby Turner, onye ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ ya na onye nduzi ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere North West Arts Council's Dance Academy ebe o nwere obi ụtọ ịbụ onye nkuzi n'afọ ndị sotere nu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, o ritere FNB Vita Best Female Dancer Award
O mechara sonye na ọwa SABC2 wee bụrụ onye nta akuko Travel Xplorer
N'oge a, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ga-egosiputa onodu Cindi' na ihe nkiri Hey Boy nke Andre Odendaal doziri nke e gosipụtara na 2003
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọka ikpe na asọmpi ịgba egwu, Dans! Dans! Dans! aired on ykNET
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede egwu na onye ọka ikpe na asọmpi eziokwu, 'High School Musical Spotlight South Africa' nke a na-egosi na M-Net
N'afọ 2017, ọ gbara egwu na Mzansi Magic show, Lockdown na ọrụ 'Tyson' na oge nke anọ ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado 'Marang' na ihe nkiri agbamakwukwo Zulu N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, o ritere ihe nrite Best Supporting Actress Award na SAFTA awards maka ọrụ ya na Lockdown 2
Na Septemba 2020, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Mzansi Housekeepers na ọrụ 'Mkhonto'
Lord Kemy bụ onye French Canadian Hip Hop / Dancehall artist a mụrụ na Guinea (West Africa)
A mụrụ ya na Romania na afọ 1976 site n'aka nne Romanian na nna Guinean
Site na akara ugo mmụta iwu ya na Mahadum Sorbonne dị na Paris, o nwere ọmarịcha profaịlụ 'atypical' maka onye na-ese hip hop
Egwú ya nwere ngwakọta nke hip hop, dancehall rhythms na reggae flavor
Kemgbe abọm izizi ya (Bakouti) na afọ 1996, egwu ya anọgidewo na-agbanwe ma na-agbanye n'oge
Ọ bụ onye ndú na onye guzobere Leg Def (Legitim' Defense) nke bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Hip Hop mbụ na Guinea na afọ 1995
A họpụtala ya ugboro ugboro ma sọpụrụ ya maka ọrụ ya, ma na mba ya ma na mba ụwa
Otu n'ime ụgwọ ọrụ ya kachasị mkpa bụ Kora Award nke Best African Ragga Group, meriri na Disemba, na afọ 2005 na Durban (South Africa) dị ka onye otu Leg Def
Kemgbe afọ 2007, Lord Kemy nwekwara ọrụ n'onwe ya n'otu oge ahụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye otu Leg Def na nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere Lady Lu
Ọ na-ahụ maka rap na ịbụ abụ na French na Bekee
Ọ nwere abọm anọ ugbu a, gụnyere 3 mepụtara n'okpuru akara nke ya, LegDef Produkt
Lord Kemy nọkwa n'ọtụtụ Europe, ọkachasị na France (ebe o biri ọtụtụ afọ mgbe ọ na-amụ iwu na La Sorbonne), nakwa na London (UK), Lausanne, Biel na Geneva (Switzerland), wdg
Lordina Mahama (née Effah; amụrụ na 6 Machị 1963) bbụ onye Ghana onye bụbu First Lady nke Ghana onye jere ozi dị ka nwanyị mbụ site na 2012 ruo 2017
Ọ lụrụ onye isi ala nke anọ nke Republic of Ghana, John Dramani Mahama
Tupu ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ, ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ nke Ghana site n'afọ 2009 ruo 2012
Tupu ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke abụọ, di Lordina Mahama jere ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Ghana na-anọchite anya mpaghara Bole-Bamboi site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2008

Azụlitere na Brong-Ahafo na Tamale na mpaghara ugwu Ghana, Mahama bụ onye na-eri nri a zụrụ azụ na onye njikwa ọbịa Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration, ebe ọ nwetara ma nzere na Hospitality Management na a Masters in Governance and Leadership Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum De Montfort na United Kingdom

Mahama sonyeere di ya na mkpọsa tupu afọ 2008 mgbe ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ John Atta Mills nakwa n'afọ 2013 na 2017 mgbe ọ bụ ọkọlọtọ maka National Democratic Congress, merie n'afọ 2013 mana merie n'afọ 2017

Mgbe ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ Mahama jere ozi dị ka ihe nlereanya maka ụmụ nwanyị na Ghana ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado mmata HIV / AIDS, mmata nke Breast na Cervical Cancer, ụmụ mgbei na ndị a na-ebo ebubo amoosu
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi oche Lordina Mahama Foundation, ọrụ ebere nke ebumnuche ya bụ 'Ka anyị na-ekerịta, ka anyị na-enwekwu
A mụrụ ya Lordina Effah na Machị 6, 1963, site n'aka Maazị na Oriakụ
Effah
Lordina si Jema-Ampoma na Nkoranza District, nke dị na Brong-Ahafo Region nke Ghana
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Ọ nwetara ọzụzụ mbụ ya na Tamale, Ghana, na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Tishigu Anglican
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Ghana na Tamale, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ GCE ya
Ọ bụ na Ghana Secondary School ka Lordina zutere onye ga-abụ di ya, John Dramani Mahama
Mahama bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Flair Catering Services, ma nweta agụmakwụkwọ kọleji afọ anọ na Hospitality Management na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA)
Ọ gụrụ maka Masters of Arts na Governance and Leadership na Ghana Institute for Management and Public Management (GIMP) wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2012
Mahama gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Laws (LLM) na iwu azụmahịa / iwu azụmahịa mba ụwa na Mahadum De Montfort na United Kingdom na 2019
Oriakụ Mahama ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ mgbe di ya John Dramani Mahama, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke mba Ghana, ghọrọ osote onye isi ala Ghana nye Onye isi ala John Evans Atta-Mills na 7 Jenụarị 2009
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị nke abụọ ruo Julaị 2012, mgbe ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nke Ghana

N'ikwekọ na usoro iwu Ghana, di ya ghọrọ onye isi ala nke Ghana na 24 Julaị 2012 mgbe onye bu ya ụzọ, John Atta Mills nwụrụ ma ṅụọ iyi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na Julaị 2012, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nke Republic of Ghana

Dị ka First Lady ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado HIV/AIDS, ara na onye na-akwado ọrịa cancer cervical, nyere ụmụ nwanyị ike site na ntọala ya na site na Technical and Vocational Training (TVET) ma na-anọchite anya Ghana na nnọkọ na nnọkọ dị iche iche iji kparịta ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'oge ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ, a họpụtakwara Mahama dịka onye isi oche nke Organisation of African First Ladies Against HIV and AIDS (OAFLA) na June 2015
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche maka mpaghara West Africa nke OAFLA

Dị ka onye isi oche nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Mbụ Mbụ Afrịka Against HIV na AIDS (OAFLA), Mahama nwetara nsọpụrụ na 50th International Women Luncheon of Rainbow Push Coalition nke mere na Chicago (USA) maka ọrụ ya na ọrụ pụtara ìhè n'ịkwado ndị ogbenye na ụmụaka ndị na-adịghị ike n'Africa nakwa n'ọrụ ya dị ka onyeisi oche iji nye ụmụ nwanyị ike ka ha na-ahụ maka ikike ahụike ọmụmụ ha, yana ịkwụsị ibufe nje HIV site na nne na nwa

Site n'afọ 2013 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ, Mahama rụkọrọ ọrụ na Ghana AIDS Commission na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ iji weta dị ka nje HIV na AIDS, ahụike ịmụ nwa, ara na cervical ọrụ na mpaghara iri na Ghana mgbe ahụ
Mkpebi itinye ọrụ HIV na ọrịa AIDS n'oge mmemme mgbasa ozi ahụike dị otú ahụ bụ n'ihi ịmara na ndị na-ebute ọrịa HIV nwere ike ibute ọrịa kansa
N'ihi nke ahụ n'oge mgbasa ozi ndị ahụ, onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ ahụ jiri ohere ahụ soro ndị isi, ndị otu obodo ọ gara na-emekọrịta ihe iji kwado ka ndị ọzọ mara ọnọdụ ha ma malite ọgwụgwọ n'oge
Ọ nọgidere na-akwado okwu ndị metụtara HIV / AIDS mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka nwanyị mbụ
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, Mahama bụ onye na-akwado ọrịa kansa ara na akpa nwa
Site na ntọala ya na ọrụ ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ, ọ bịara na atụmatụ maka nyocha nchọpụta nke ụmụ nwanyị karịsịa n'ime ime obodo nke Ghana iji hụ na ọgwụgwọ kwesịrị ekwesị ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa

Site na ntọala ya na nkwado sitere n'aka gọọmentị na ndị ọzọ na-abụghị gọọmentị, ụfọdụ ụmụ agbọghọ nọ na Ghana enwetala ọgwụ mgbochi megide HPV site na GAVI vaccination initiative iji gbochie ọrịa kansa akpa nwa na ọrịa ndị ọzọ

O weere ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-enye aka na mmepe nke akụ na ụba ụwa dị ka a na-ahụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ma na-akpọ oku na-aga n'ihu na òtù ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị ka ha nyere aka dozie oghere nkwalite ahụike na nlekọta ahụike n'ihe gbasara ọrịa cancer ka ha na-enye isi mmalite ego maka atụmatụ ndị dị otú ahụ na-akwadoghị gọọmentị na-enye ego nlekọta ahụike
Ọ nọchitere anya Ghana na 8th, 9th, 10th na 11th Stop Cervical, Breast and Prostate Cancer conference

Na ogbako nke 8th, o kwuputara na Ghana ga-amalite mmejuputa atụmatụ nke National Strategy for Cancer Control afọ ise iji wepụta usoro dị iche iche ga-enyere aka ịchịkwa na ịchịkwa ọrịa ara ara na cervical, yana ọrịa cancer ndị ọzọ na mba ahụ

Na 21 Julaị 2015, ọ kpọkuru ụmụ nwanyị mbụ ndị ọzọ na ogbako 9th Stop Cervical, Breast na Prostate Cancer (SCCA) na Nairobi, Kenya, ka ha ghara ịhụ ngwa ọrụ dị ka nrọ kama ọ ga-emepe atụmatụ na mkpọsa maka ihe a ga-eme iji hụ na ọ dị mkpa nchọpụta mmalite na iduzi mkpọsa akwadoro, na-adịgide adịgide ma soro ụlọ ọrụ na òtù ndị metụtara ya na-akwado mgbochi na ịchịkwa ọrịa cancer na Africa

Mahama mere ka a mara na ihe dị ka ụmụ nwanyị 2,900 na Ghana na-arịa ọrịa kansa ara kwa afọ nakwa na dabere na nchọpụta nke World Health Organization (WHO), e mere atụmatụ na nde ụmụ nwanyị 67 nọ n'afọ 15 ma ọ bụ karịa na Ghana nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ịrịa ọrịa kansa akpa nwa na nke ara, site na atụmatụ ya na gọọmentị, 'ha na-atụ anya imeziwanye ọnọdụ ahụ na Ghana na ibelata ọnụọgụ ọnwụ nke ọrịa kansa site na pasent 30
Nlekọta maka ndị ogbenye
Mgbe ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ, Mahama duziri atụmatụ iji nye ndị ogbenye n'ime ọha mmadụ
O lekwasịrị anya n'inye ihe oriri, ihe nhicha ụlọ, uwe, na ihe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa maka ogige ụmụ mgbei na 'ogige ndị amoosu' na Ghana

Site na ntọala ya, ọ nakweere ụlọ ụmụ mgbei isii na-adịghị ike na otu ogige ndị amoosu na Ghana dị ka ebe a na-elekwasị anya maka onyinye ya ebe ọ ka na-enye onyinye n'ogige ụmụ mgbei ndị ọzọ Ebe a na-elekọta ụmụ mgbei na ogige ndị amoosu bụ mmadụ abụọ na mpaghara Greater Accra; Ụlọ ụmụaka Osu dị na Osu na Christ Faith Forster home na Frafraha, abụọ na mpaghara Brong Ahafo; Ụlọ ụmụaka FrankMay na Ụlọ ụmụaka Bethesda ma na Techiman, abụọ na Northern Region; Ụlọ ụmụaka Tamale na Ụlọ ụmụaka Anfaani ma na Tamale na ogige ndị amoosu Gambaga dị na North-East Region
N'ime oge ọ jere ozi, o nyere ọtụtụ onyinye maka ogige ụmụ mgbei ndị a na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Na May 2014, ọ gara Gambaga Witch Camp ma nye onyinye osikapa, arịa, iberibe uwe na ihe ndị ọzọ maka nchekwa ha Ọ malitere ịrụ ụlọ ebe ndị a na-ebo ebubo na ha bụ ndị amoosu n'ogige Gambaga Ọ gara n'ụlọ ụmụaka Nyohini na ụlọ mgbei Anfaani dị na Tamale, ebe ya na ụmụaka na-akpakọrịta ma nye onyinye nri gụnyere akpa osikapa, sugar, mmiri ara ehi, ụlọ mposi na ndị ọzọ maka nlekọta ụmụaka nọ n'ogige ụmụ mgbei
N'ọnwa Disemba 2016, ya na Nana Oye Lithur, Minista nke Mmekọahụ, Ụmụaka na Nchebe Ọha na Eze meghere ụlọ obibi maka ụmụaka nke ntọala ya kwadoro na Osu Children's Home
O nyekwara ihe oriri na uwe iji kwado ụmụaka n'ememe Krismas
Site na atụmatụ ya maka inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, ọ nabatara Gambaga Witch Camp nke dị na North-East Region nke Ghana dị ka ebe dị mkpa nlebara anya

Ọ malitere ọrụ iwu ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ n'ogige ahụ a na-akpọ Gambaga Training Centre iji nye ọzụzụ ọrụ aka na nkà ndị ọzọ nke ndị ọchụnta ego iji jeere ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ ozi n'ime ogige ahụ na nso obodo
Nkà ndị a bụ iji nyere ha aka mee ka ha nwee ike ma nyere aka malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ha mgbe ha mechara
Dị ka akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ọ na-edozi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ na gburugburu Gambaga ndị ga-achọ ọzụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

O nyekwara ọtụtụ onyinye nke ihe mmalite nye ndị omenkà gafee mba ahụ bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ọrụ aka iji mee ka ha banye n'ụwa azụmaahịa ma nyere ha aka guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na azụmaahịa nke ha, ndị a gụnyere onyinye iji kwado ụlọ ọrụ China na Ghana site na onye nnọchi anya ha Sun Baohong
Lordina lụrụ John Dramani Mahama ma ha nwere ụmụ ise aha ha bụ Shafik, Shahid, Sharaf, Jesse na Farida
Ọ na-asụ Bekee, Hausa, Dagbani na Twi nke ọma

Ọrụ ebere ya, The Lordina Foundation, emetụla ndụ ndị ga-erite uru na mpaghara dị iche iche nke Ghana Okwu nke ntọala bụ 'Ka anyị na-ekerịta, ka anyị na-enwekwu' A na-enye onyinye karịsịa n'oge Krismas na n'oge ndị ọzọ n'afọ
Onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ ahụ nwere ọtụtụ onyinye na aha ya na otuto ya
Ndị a gụnyere

Lorely Jane Burt, Baroness Burt nke Solihull (amụrụ 10 Septemba 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain, onye nke omeiwu Liberal Democrat nke Solihull site na 2005 ruo 2015
A họpụtara ya maka afọ ndụ ndụ na 2015 Dissolution Honors
Burt gara ụlọ akwụkwọ High Arcal Grammar, Dudley (1966-71) na Dudley Technical College (A-levels 1971-73) tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Mahadum, Swansea, ebe ọ nwetara BSc na Economics
O mechara nweta MBA na Mahadum Open
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akụnụba, Burt malitere ọrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dịka onye enyemaka Gọvanọ na HM Prison Holloway tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mba na ndị ọrụ na ọzụzụ
O mechara guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye nduzi na ngalaba ahịa na ọrụ ego
Ọ malitere ọrụ ndụmọdụ nwa oge mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Liberal Democrat maka Solihull
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Burt malitere na Dudley Metropolitan Borough Council, ebe ọ jere ozi site na 1998 ruo 2003
Ọ kwụrụ maka ntuli aka na Dudley South na ntuli aka izugbe nke afọ 2001
Ọ kwụkwara na mpaghara West Midlands na ntuli aka nzuko omeiwu Europe 2004

N'ihe na-aga n'ihu na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2005, Burt gbara mkpọsa n'okwu dị iche iche nke obodo na-emetụta Solihull, wee nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwatu 9,407 John Taylor nke nọ n'ọchịchị n'ọtụtụ 279 na nkwado ya
Na-esochi ntuli aka ya, Burt ghọrọ onye na-ekwuchitere ndị 'Liberal Democrat' na Northern Ireland, onye mmegide mmegide, wee jee ozi na kọmitii Họrọ Akụ
Na-esochi ntuli aka nke Sir Menzies Campbell na onye ndu otu pati na 2006, Burt ghọrọ onye nkwuchite ọnụ 'Liberal Democrat' na obere azụmaahịa na ụmụ nwanyị na nha anya
Na 2007 ọ kwagara ịghọ onye na-ekwuchitere maka azụmahịa, Enterprise na Regulatory Reform
N'October 2007, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nwanyị mbụ nke Liberal Democrats' Parliamentary Party, meriri John Thurso na Andrew George na ntuli aka nke MPs
Na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2010, mgbanwe oke ala emeela ka oche ya bụrụ Conservative
O ji vootu 175 jide Solihull n'ebe onye mmegide Conservative ya Maggie Throup
Na 2013 Burt ka ahọpụtara dika onye odeakwụkwọ nzuzo nke Danny Alexander, onye isi ode akwụkwọ nke Akụ
Mgbe ọ were ọrụ ọhụrụ a ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya dị ka BIS Co-Chair na Chair of Parliamentary Party
N'April 2014 a họpụtara ya dika onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ tụfuru oche ya n'aka ndị Conservative Julian Knight na ntuli aka 2015
A katọrọ Burt na ndị na-akwado ya maka ịchụpụ ndị nta akụkọ ka ọ hapụrụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ntuli aka ya ka e meriri ya
A mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye ọgbọ ọhụrụ na 2015 Dissolution Honors na n'ehihie nke 9 Ọktoba ka e kere ya Baroness Burt nke Solihull, nke Solihull na County nke West Midlands
Burt agbaala mkpọsa n'ọtụtụ okwu ma n'ime obodo na nke mba
Na mpaghara, o meela mkpọsa iji gbochie Shirley parkland ịzụlite, iji chekwaa Solihull's NHS Walk-In Center, iji chekwaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Shirley na mmechi yana maka ọrụ ụgbọ ihe mberede ka mma
Burt lụrụ Richard, onye n'onwe ya bụbu onye omeiwu Liberal Democrat ọtụtụ oge, ma nwee nwa nwanyị na nwa nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ nsọpụrụ nke National Secular Society
