A mụrụ Lorenzo Scott na 1934 na West Point, Georgia
Scott bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'oge a nke ọrụ ya nwetara ọganihu na ngwụcha afọ 1980
A mụrụ Lorenzo Scott na úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1934, na obéré obodo na-eme mkpọtụ na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke West Point, Georgia
Mgbè nne ya, ónyé na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa na-enye ihe igwe ihe owuwu mpaghara, tụfuru ọrụ ya n'oge Nsogbu, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Atlanta ịchọ ọrụ
Otu n'ime ụmụ iri na otu, Lorenzo na-akọ banyéré Ógè ọ nọ n'okorobịa mgbè mbụ ọ hụrụ nne ya ka ọ na-ese ihe osise, ma mara ọbụna mgbè ọ dị obérè na ọ chọrọ inwe ike ise ihe dị ka nke ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na Scott gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze ruo na klas nke iri, ọ kwetara na ya nwere mmasị na ise ihe karịa ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
'Anọwo m na-ese ihe n'oge ndụ m niile kemgbe m dị ihe dị ka ise,' ka o kwuru, 'Enwere m nyocha m na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ezinụlọ Lorenzo biri n'ofe okporo ámá site na chọọchị Southern Baptist ebe ha bụ ndị otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike
N'ebe a, Lorenzo na-eto eto zụlitere okwukwe Ndị Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke na-akwado ma nka ya ma ndụ ya
Ọ na-akọkarị akụkọ banyéré ihe omume ndị pụrụ iche mere na ndụ ya nke sitere na okwukwe ya siri ike

N'otu akụkọ dị otú ahụ, ọ na-atụgharị uche n'oge mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị ọ ga-ahụ ọbịbịa na ọpụpụ nke ndị na-aga chọọchị gafee okporo ámá, na otu o si hụ nnọkọ olili ozu na chọọchị, ọ jụrụ nne ya 'otú ndị mmadụ si anwụọ'
O chere na ọ bụrụ na ọ nọgide na-amụ anya, ọ gaghị anwụ, yabụ otu abalị o mèrè ka nné ya hapụ ya ka ọ hie ụra n'abalị niile
Gee akụkọ ahụ n'okwu nke ya ebe a
Ndị nchịkọta ihe osise abụọ nke Atlanta na ónyé nwe ụlọ ngosi ihe nkírí nke Atlanta dị mkpa na nchọpụta na ahịa mbụ nke ihe osise Lorenzo Scott

Mgbè ọ bi na East Point ebe ọ gbazitere ụlọ na Dill Avenue (nke Maazị Scott ji obi ụtọ na-ezo aka na ya dị ka 'Dill Avenue Gallery'), o nwere ike ịkwụnye ihe osise ya na mgbidi, ka e wee gosipụta ya ma ree ya
Ndị na-anakọta ihe na Atlanta William 'Bill' Arnett bịara n'ebe Dill Avenue wee were ọtụtụ ihe osise na mgbidi wee tinye ha n'ala ka a zụta ha
Ọ zụrụ ọmarịcha oche e sere ihe

Ọrụ ndị a ga-emesị bụrụ akụkụ nke ọrụ Soul's Grown Deep ya nke e mepụtara iji webata ọrụ nke 'ndị a na-akpọ ndị mmadụ ma ọ bụ ndị omenkà si n'èzí nke ndị isi ojii America [nke] bụ usoro ọdịbendị dị n'otu ma bụrụ isi dị mkpa na nka ụwa

Ihe osise Scott na-ekwukarị banyere okpukpe na ọhụụ, na mgbakwunye na isiokwu ndị ọzọ na-abụghị nke okpukpe ime obodo, ụmụaka ndị Africa America, na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na / ma ọ bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ na-ese ma nnukwu ma obere ọrụ na mmanụ na ákwà ma ọ bụ osisi, site na usoro ọ mepụtara onwe ya mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke nnwale gasịrị
Ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ya, ọ bụ ezie na ruo ọtụtụ afọ ọ nwere obere ụlọ ọrụ na Decatur, Georgia, ebe ọ ga-emepụta okpokoro nke ya yana ihe osise
'Ezigbo, akwụkwọ ọla edo, ụdị Renaissance' ya bụ ihe dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya, ka Lynne Browne, Senior Correspondent for the Folk Art Messenger kwuru
O nwere oge ọ kọwara usoro nke iwu ha maka ya 'Ihe osise na-ewe ogologo oge
Enwetara m ụfọdụ osisi site na Home Depot, ụfọdụ Bondo [ihe na-edozi ahụ ụgbọ ala], spray paint - Pittsburgh ngwa ngwa gold enamel
Ana m eji jigsaw a bepụ ọdịdị niile
Ana m eji osisi, pensụl ochie, obere screwdrivers na ihe ndị ọzọ eme akara na Bondo
Okpokoro ahụ bụ ọrụ nka

' Browne, n'aka nke ya, kwuru na 'ịdị nro' n'ụzọ Scott si emeso isiokwu ya 'Scott na-ekpughe nlezianya nlebara anya maka nhazi, na nhazi ya nke mmanụ na-acha uhie uhie, yana n'ịmecha ihe dị ịtụnanya e ji aka rụọ, nke a tụrụ atụ nke na-akwado nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe osise ya
Echere m banyere ndị isi Renaissance nke Ịtali mgbe m na-amụ ọrụ ya
Ihe ngosi Museum
E gosipụtara ọrụ Lorenzo Scott n'ọtụtụ ebe na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie (na oghere ọha na eze yiri ya), gụnyere otu onye, isiokwu, otu, na ihe ngosi njem gụnyere
Loretta Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1942) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme akwa nke Gee's Bend Collective si Boykin, Alabama
A maara uwe elu ya màkà ụdị obi ike na nke improvisational
N'afọ 2006, ụdị uwe elu ya 'Roman Stripes' na Medallion pụtara na stampụ ọrụ US Postal abụọ dị ka akụkụ nke usoro na-echeta ndị uwe elu Gee
Akpụkpọ ahụ ya dị na nchịkọta nké Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, Metropolitan Museum of Art, na Philadelphia Museum of Art
Ọ bụ ónyé natara 2015 National Heritage Fellowship nke National Endowment for the Arts nyèrè, nke bụ nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke gọọmentị United States na nka ọdịnala na ọdịnala
A mụrụ Pettway na Boykin, Alabama ma too n'ụlọ ndị na-enweghị njikọ na ọrụ na ibu ọrụ siri ike
Nné ya hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ mgbè Loretta dị ihe dị ka afọ asaa
Nna ya, Famous Pettway, lụrụ Plummer T
Pettway ọzọ, mana ọ bụ nne nne ya, Prissy zụlitere Loretta
Ọ bụkwa ónyé isi na-elekọta nwanne ya nwoke nwere nkwarụ
Pettway nọrọ ụfọdụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'okpuru ụlọ nwanne nne ya Candis na nwanne nna ya Tank Pettway
N'ebe ahụ, ọ tolitere n'akụkụ ụmụ nwanne ya Qunnie Pettway na Tank Jr
Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ kwagara n'ụlọ nwanne nné ọzọ, Missouri Pettway, n'akụkụ nwa nwanne ya, Arlonzia Pettway
Agụmakwụkwọ ya dịkwa obérè
Pettway na-agakarị ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge Ọktọba, Nọvemba, na Disemba, n'etiti owuwe ihe ubi
Ma ọ bụghị ya, ógè ya niile fọdụrụnụ na-ewe ihe ubi na ilekọta nwanne ya nwoke
Ọ lụrụ nwoke na-emegbu mmadụ nké na-aṅụ mmanya, na-ese siga, ma na-ekwo ekworo nke ukwuu
Ọ zụlitere ụmụ asaa, ndị malitekwara ọrụ ugbo mgbè ha dị obérè
Pettway bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-eme akwa akwa nke Souls Grown Deep Foundation gbàrà ajụjụ ọnụ bụ ndị gosipụtara nlelị màkà ịmụta akwa akwa
Ọ na-echeta, 'Ọ masịghị m ịkwa akwa
Achọghị m ime ya
Enwere m nwanne m nwoke nwere nkwarụ ma aghaghị m ịlụ ọgụ
Enwere m ọtụtụ ọrụ m ga-arụ'
Otú ọ dị, nne nne ya Prissy kwenyesiri ike na ọ na-amụta ịkpa ákwà, na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ nkà ga-aba uru n'ọdịnihu na ndụ ya
Nke a gosipụtara eziokwu mgbe Pettway kwagara n'ụlọ ya, nke nwere naanị otu ọnụ ụlọ ọkụ, dị ka okenye
'Ma mgbè m nwetara m ụlọ, ụlọ ochie na-adịghị mma, mgbe ahụ, achọrọ m ka ha na-ekpo ọkụ
Naanị okpomọkụ anyị nwere n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, mgbe ị na-apụ n'ime ebe ahụ ị chọrọ mkpuchi
Aghaghị m ibili ihe dị ka elekere anọ, elekere ise, wee nweta coal
Mee ka ọkụ gbaa
Uwe ha na-eme ka ị na-ekpo ọkụ
Loretta Pettway Bennett (amụrụ na Disemba 29, 1960) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na Freedom Quilting Bee, ébé nne ya, Qunnie Pettway, na-arụ ọrụ, yana ndị na-eme akwa akwa Gee's Bend
Akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya Sew Low na Vegetation bụ akụkụ nke Eskenazi Health Art Collection
A mụrụ Loretta Pettway Bennett n'ugbo dị na Gee's Bend, Alabama na Qunnie Pettway na Tom O
Pettway
Ya na ụmụnne ya na-arụkarị ọrụ na nnà nnà ya, Tank Pettway, ugbo na-akụ ogho, ọka, ahụekere, na poteto, n'etiti ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ezinụlọ Bennett enwetaghị mmiri pọmpụ ma ọ bụ okporo ụzọ a wụrụ awụ ruo 1975, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise
N'oge gàrà aga, ezinụlọ ahụ ga-esi n'ụlọ ndị agbata obi ma ọ bụ olulu mmiri na isi iyi dị nso na-adọkpụ bọket mmiri
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Gee's Bend gafere de-egbochi ịkpa ókè n'afọ nke asaa nke Bennett, ma mechie ya obéré oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị
Iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, a chọrọ ka Bennett buru bọs ụlọ akwụkwọ jupụtara awa abụọ n'ụtụtụ na abalị ọ bụla iji ruo ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Njem a siri ike mere ka isonye n'ihe omume ndị ọzọ bụrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume
Ka o sina dị, Bennett gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma lụọ onye ọ hụrụ n'anya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Lovett 'Bennett' Bennett na July 7, 1979
A matara Bennett omenala akwa, mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ma ọ bụ isii, ọ bụ ezie na 'N'oge ahụ, a na-ekwe ka anyị na-akpa agịga màkà ndị na-akpa akwa n'ime nne m na ndị na-eyi akwa
' N'oge okpomọkụ ọ bụla, nne ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị ga-azụ ndị ọzọ ịkwa akwa n'ime nkà ya, nke nta nke nta
Akpụkpọ ụkwụ mbụ ọ rụchara bụ blanket nwa, nke bụ ọrụ Home Economics maka nwa nwa nwa nke ónyé nkụzi Home Economic
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebu ọdịbendị, raara onwé ya nye ịgbasa ọdịnala ọbọdọ ya maka ọgbọ ndị na-abịa n'ọdịnihu
Lorna Maloney (amụrụ na 28 Febụwarị 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nwanyị ọchụnta ego si South Africa
Ọ nọchitere anya African National Congress (ANC) na National Assembly site na 1994 ruo 2009
A mụrụ Maloney na 28 Febụwarị n’afo 1961
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba na ntuli aka mbụ nke obodo South Afrika na afo 1994
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1999 na afo 2004, na-anọchite anya mpaghara North West site na afo 2004 gaa n'ihu
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ omebe iwu mgbe ntuli aka afo 2009 gasịrị
Mgbe ọ nọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, Maloney nwetara nnukwu òkè na Wesizwe Platinum, ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta platinum nke e guzobere na North West na afo 2004
N'afọ 2007, o nwere òkè nde 1225 na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, nke ruru ihe dịka R113 nde n'ozuzu ya; Destiny mere atụmatụ na nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kachasị baa ọgaranya na Obodo South Afrika
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ omebe iwu, Maloney nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na alaka nke ANC na North West
Tupu ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2021, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ndi kọmitii ndepụta mpaghara nke pati ahụ, nke họpụtara ndị a họpụtara ka ha nọchite anya pati ahụ na kansụl mpaghara
N'ọrụ a, ya na onye isi mpaghara ANC na-anọchi anya Hlomane Chauke nwere esemokwu siri ike, onye ọ boro ebubo na ọ na-akwado omume ọjọọ
Lorna Simpson (amụrụ n'ọnw Ọgọọst 13, afọ 1960) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe nkiri multimedia
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama n'afọ ndị 1980s na 1990s na ihe osise dịka Guarded Conditions na Square Deal
A maara Simpson nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na foto echiche
A gụnyere ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ma na mba ma na mba ụwa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ntinye foto-ihe odide ya, foto-collages, na ihe nkiri
Ọrụ mbụ ya welitere ajụjụ banyere ọdịdị nke nnọchiteanya, njirimara, okike, agbụrụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Simpson na-aga n'ihu na-enyocha isiokwu ndị a n'ihe gbasara ncheta na akụkọ ihe mere eme na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche gụnyere foto, ihe nkiri, vidiyo, eserese, ọdịyo, na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A mụrụ Lorna Simpson n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 13, afọ 1960 ma too na Crown Heights, agbata obi dị na Brooklyn, New York
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke nka na imewe
Nne na nna ya bụ onye Jamaica-Cuban na nne ya bụ onye Afrịkan-Amerịkan si Midwest kwaga New York ma kpọrọ ya gaa ọtụtụ egwuregwu, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, kọntaktị na ịgba egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwata
N'oge okpomọkụ, Simpson gara ọmụmụ ihe na Art Institute nke Chicago mgbe ọ na-eleta nne nne ya
Tupu ọ nata BFA ya, Simpson gara Yuropu, Afrịka, na United States ebe ọ gara n'ihu zụlite nkà ya site na foto
Mgbe ọ na-eme njem, ọ nwetara mkpali ịgbasa ọrụ ya karịa mpaghara foto iji maa onye na-ekiri ya aka ma tinye aka
Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ ka ọ gbasaa ọrụ nka ya na eserese eserese
Simpson mechara gaa School of Visual Arts na New York City ebe ọ nwetara Bachelor of Fine Arts na Painting n'afọ 1982
N'oge ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Studio Museum na Harlem, na-amata onwe ya na omume nke David Hammons, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, onye bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi
Mgbe ọ na-enweta nzere Master nke Fine Arts na nka anya, site na Mahadum California na San Diego n'afọ 1985, Simpson gbakwunyere echiche ya

Agụmakwụkwọ ya na San Diego dị n'etiti Photography na Conceptual art, ndị nkuzi ya gụnyere onye na-ese ihe Allan Kaprow, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Eleanor Antin, ndị na-eme fim Babette Mangolte, Jean-Pierre Gorin na onye na-ede uri David Antin
Ihe pụtara bụ ụdị akara ya nke 'ihe odide foto'
N'ime foto ndị a, Simpson tinyere ederede eserese n'ime ihe osise dị ka ihe osise
N'ime nke a, Simpson wetara nkọwa ọhụrụ zuru oke na ọrụ ahụ

Echiche ọhụrụ a na ụdị Simpson sitere na ọchịchọ ịmata ihe ya banyere ma foto akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ eziokwu ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị eziokwu ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ eziokwu e wuru dị ka eziokwu nke onye na-ese foto akwụkwọ akụkọ n'onwe ha mepụtara
Ọrụ ndị a na-emetụta n'ozuzu ha na nyocha na ịkatọ akụkọ ndị metụtara okike na agbụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka Amerịka n'ime ọdịbendị Amerịka
N'ọrụ ya n'afọ ndị 1980s na 1990s, ọ na-anwa igosipụta ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke na-akparị ma ọ bụ nke na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị egosiri

Ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe na-emetụta ọrụ ya gụnyere David Hammons, Adrian Piper, na Felix-Gonzalex Torres; na ọbụna ụfọdụ ndị edemede dị ka Ishmael Reed, Langston Hughes, Ntozake Shange, Alice Walker, na Toni Morrison n'ihi olu ha
E nyere ya National Endowment for the Arts Fellowship n'afọ 1985, na afọ 1990, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ gosipụtara na Venice Biennale
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ nwere ihe ngosi onwe ya na Museum of Modern Art na ihe ngosi ya Projects 23

N'afọ 1990, Simpson nwere otu ihe ngosi nwanyị n'ọtụtụ nnukwu ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Denver Art Museum, Denver, Colorado, Portland Art Museum, Portland, Oregon, na Museum of Modern Art, New York

N'otu oge ahụ, a gụnyere ọrụ ya na The Decade Show Frameworks of Identity na afọ ndị 1980s, ihe ngosi nke Museum of Contemporary Hispanic Art, The New Museum of Contemporary Art, na The Studio Museum na Harlem gosipụtara
Simpson enyochawo mgbasa ozi na usoro dị iche iche, gụnyere foto abụọ yana nyocha silk foto ya na nnukwu ogwe felt, ịmepụta nrụnye, ma ọ bụ mepụta dị ka ọrụ vidiyo dịka Call Waiting (1997)
Lornah Kiplagat (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Dutch ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
A mụrụ ya na Kabiemit, Rift Valley Province, Kenya wee bịa Netherlands na afọ 1999
O nwetara nwa amaala Dutch n'afọ 2003 ma na-asọ mpi maka Netherlands kemgbe ahụ
Ọ na-agba ọsọ ọ bụghị naanị ihe omume okporo ụzọ kamakwa na cross country na track and field

Ọ gbara ọsọ na afọ 2004, 2008 na 2012 Summer Olympics, bụ onye nwetara ọla edo na afọ 2007 na IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ma were utu aha atọ na-aga n'ihu na World Road Running Championship site na 2006 ruo 2008
Na marathon, o nwere oge kachasị mma nke 2 22 22 awa ma merie nnukwu agbụrụ na Rotterdam, Amsterdam na Osaka
Ọ na-ejide ihe ndekọ okporo ụzọ ụwa ugbu a karịa kilomita 5 na kilomita 10
Oge kachasị mma ya karịa kilomita 20 na ọkara marathon bụ ihe ndekọ ụwa site na afo 2007 ruo 2011 ma bụrụ oge nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ
Akụkụ nke ezinụlọ na-agba ọsọ nke ọma, ndị ikwu ya gụnyere Sylvia Kibet, Hilda Kibet na Susan Sirma
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ dị elu a ma ama na Iten Kenya
Ebe etiti ahụ dị mita 2400 n'elu oke osimiri
Ndị na-eme egwuregwu na ndị na-agba ọsọ ntụrụndụ si n'akụkụ ụwa niile na-eleta HATC kwa afọ maka ọzụzụ
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere akara egwuregwu nke ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ n'Afrịka nke a na-akpọ Lornah
Kiplagat na-eme nke ọma mgbe ọ gbara ọsọ maka Kenya
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ meriri Falmouth Road Race na Peachtree Road Race
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2006 ọ ka bụ naanị nwanyị mere nke a, mana o mere ya ugboro atọ n'usoro (2000, 2001 na 2002) na oge nke anọ na 2005
N'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ ọ rụzuru bụ Amsterdam Marathon, Rotterdam Marathon, Osaka Ladies Marathon na Los Angeles Marathon
N'afọ 1999, Kiplagat kwagara Netherlands; afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ nwetara nwa amaala Dutch nke nyere ya na afọ ohere ịgba ọsọ maka Netherlands site na 2003
N'otu afọ ahụ, o belatara ihe ndekọ marathon Dutch ruo 2 2343 n'oge New York City Marathon
O sonyekwara na 2004 Summer Olympics, ebe o mechara nke ise na 10,000m

Afọ 2005 bụ nke gara nke ọma maka Kiplagat ọ meriri ọlaọcha na afo 2005 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships wee were aha na afo 2005 European Cross Country Championships, ihe omume nke mere ka ọ malite ịhọrọ dị ka onye egwuregwu Dutch nke afọ
Na 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ọ mechara nke abụọ na Japan, merie ọlaọcha
O mechakwara bụrụ onye nke ise na 10,000m na 2006 European Athletics Championships
O meriri na afo 2007 World Cross Country Championship nke emere na Mombasa, Kenya
Na mbido, na Febụwarị 2007, ọ sonyere na asọmpi Kenyan Cross Country Championships dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu a kpọrọ òkù wee merie asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị, n'ihu ndị isi n'etiti ndị obodo ya

N'ịmeri asọmpi ndị a, ọ meriri ihe ịma aka niile nke Etiopia, nke onye na-agbachitere Tirunesh Dibaba, onye mmeri dị mkpirikpi Gelete Burka, na onye nwetara ọla nchara abụọ site na 2006, Meselech Melkamu
Ha mechiri Dibaba, nke abụọ, Melkamu, nke atọ, Burka, nke anọ
E wezụga ihe ndekọ Dutch maka marathon, Kiplagat nwekwara ihe ndekọ ụwa anọ
N'ọsọ okporo ụzọ 5 kilomita ọ gbara ọsọ ahụ na 14 47, ebe ọ belatara ihe ndekọ nke ya na 10 kilomita nke 5054 site na sekọnd abụọ ruo 5050 n'afọ 2006 Dam tot Damloop, nke ọ merikwara na afọ 2002
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007, Kiplagat setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ nke 1 06 25 na World Road Running Championships na Udine, Ịtali, mgbe ọ na-agbachitere aha mbụ ọ meriri na afọ 2006
O mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ya nke kilomita 20 n'ụzọ, na-agba ọsọ 1 02 57
Otú ọ dị, Paula Radcliffe agbaala ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ na Great North Run na 2003
A chụpụrụ Kiplagat n'afọ 2009 niile wee laghachi na asọmpi site na mmeri na Runner's World Zandvoort Circuit Run na Machị na afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Septemba, ọ gbara ọsọ na Dam tot Damloop ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'azụ nwa nwanne ya nwanyị Hilda Kibet, jiri oge 52 03
Ọ laghachiri na ihe omume marathon maka afo 2011 London Marathon wee mechaa ọsọ mbụ ya n'ime afọ anọ, na-abịa nke iri na asatọ na oge nke 2 27 57 awa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nọ n'ebe dị anya site na podium ma ghara inweta oge iru eru nke World Championship, o weere asọmpi ahụ dị ka ihe ịga nke ọma na-esote oge ndị merụrụ ahụ gara aga
Ọ meziwanyere na afo 2011 Amsterdam Marathon, gafere akara mgbe 2 25 52 awa gasịrị iji nweta ọnọdụ nke atọ, aha mba Dutch, na oge iru eru nke afo 2012 Summer Olympics
N'agbanyeghị na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji anọ karịa onye mmeri (Tiki Gelana), o kwuru, sị 'Abụ m nwanyị kachasị nwee obi ụtọ na Amsterdam, ma eleghị anya n'ụwa niile'
Lornah Kiplagat bụ onye guzobere akara egwuregwu sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Africa maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụsi ọrụ ike a na-akpọ 'Lornah'wwwlornahsportscom
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere High Altitude Training Centre (HATC) a ma ama na Iten Kenya, ebe ndị na-eme egwuregwu si n'akụkụ ụwa niile na-aga ọzụzụ
wwwlornahsportscom
Lorraine Juliette Botha (2 Julaị na afọ 1965 na 31 Ọgọst na afọ 2022) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu Democratic Alliance, ọ bụ onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament site na afọ 2014 ruo ọnwụ ya
Botha jere ozi dị ka onye isi nke DA caucus site na Mee na afọ 2022 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2022
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Standing Committee on Education site na afọ 2019 ruo afọ 2022
Botha bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ngalaba nke kọmitii praịm
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka ahụike na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na Mee na afọ 2019, Botha ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, a họpụtara Botha ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọhụrụ nke DA caucus na ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Ọ nọchiri Mireille Wenger, onye a họpụtara na Kọmitii Provincial
Botha nwere nkụchi obi ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dara na mberede na Wednesday, Ọgọst, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ, dị ka onye isi mpaghara DAZ Tertuis Simmers si kwuo
Di ya, Johan, nwụrụ na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2021
Lorraine Loots bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme obéré ihe na South Africa si Cape Town
O mepụtara obéré ihe osise nke gburugburu ala na ihe ndị a na-ahụ kwa ụbọchị na ndabere ọcha

Lorraine malitere ịghọ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2013 mgbè ọ malitere ọrụ a na-akpọ narị atọ na iri isii na ise Eserese maka agbúsì na mgbè e mesịrị na 2014 nà narị atọ na iri isii na ise Akwụkwọ ozi akwụkwọ ozi màkà ágbúsì ebe ọ na-ese otu ihe osise kwa ụbọchị n'afọ ma tinye ya na usoro mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ruo afọ abụọ n'usoro
Ọrụ a mere ka ọ mara ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi ebe e gosipụtara ya na CBS, CNN, Charlie Rose, Huffington Post na Colossal ịkpọ aha ole na ole
Carlos Coleman (amụrụ na Machị 23, 1982), nkè a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ King Los ma ọ bụ naanị Los bụ onye America na-eti egwu na onye na-ede abụ
Ọ bịanyere aka na Bad Boy Records n'oge 2005 na njikọ aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ Bloc Incorporated ya
Mgbè nkwekọrịta ya dàrà, ọ laghachiri ịtọhapụ egwu n'onwe ya
Los bịanyere aka na Diddy's Bad Boy Records ọzọ na Febụwarị 2012, nke Interscope Records na-ekesa ugbu a
Otú ọ dị, na Machị 19, 2014, ọ ga-ekwupụta na ọ na-ahapụ Bad Boy na Interscope ọzọ
Ọ bịanyere aka ugbu a na After Platinum, 88 Classic na RCA
Los Angeles (US /lɔːs ˈændʒələs/ (￼gee ntị) iwu AN-jəl-əs; [lower-alpha 1] Spanish Los Ángeles [los ˈaŋxeles], lit 'Ndị mmụọ ozi'), na-ezokarị ya na mkpịrịsị ya LAA
, bụ ebe azụmahịa, ego na omenala nke Southern California
Ebe ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ ruru nde 39 dị ka nke 2020[mmelite], bụkwa obodo kachasị na steeti California na obodo nke abụọ kachasị na United States na-esote New York City, yana otu n'ime ụwa
obodo megasị ndị mmadụ kacha biri
A maara Los Angeles maka ihu igwe Mediterranean ya, agbụrụ na ọdịbendị dị iche iche, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Hollywood na mpaghara mepere emepe
Obodo Los Angeles dị na ọdọ mmiri dị na Southern California n'akụkụ oke osimiri Pasifik na-agafe na ugwu Santa Monica wee banye na ndagwurugwu San Fernando
Ọ na-ekpuchi ihe dị ka square kilomita 469 (1,210 km2), na ọ bụ oche Los Angeles County, nke bụ mpaghara kacha nwee ọnụ na United States yana ihe ruru nde 986 dị ka nke 2022[mmelite]
Issa Losseny Doumbia ( ka amụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 5, 1992 na Ivory Coast ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Nigerien na Ivorian nke na-agbara Chippa United na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger bọọlụ
Losseny Doumbia malitere ọrụ ya na klọb Niger ASFAN
N'afọ 2010, ọ kwagara Motema Pembe site na Equatorial Guinea
Ugbu a, onye nche na-anọchite anya klọb Premier League South Africa Chippa United
Issa na Rabo Saminou na-asọmpi ka ọ bụrụ onye nche nke abụọ nke Niger na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations finals na Gabon na Equatorial Guinea
A kpọkwara ya na ndị otu mba Niger dị ka onye na-eche nche maka 2014 African cup of the Nation qualification (CAN)

Lotfi Abdelli (Arabic, a mụrụ na Machị 14, 1970, na Tunis) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị

Lotfi Abdelli malitere ọrụ nka ya dịka onye na-agba egwú na Tunis Conservatory, n'okpuru nduzi nke Anne-Marie Sellami, wee gaa na ballet nke National Theatre of Tunisia, n'etiti nduzi nke Mohamed Driss, kwa na ballet mba Tunisia, n'okpuru nduzi ya nke Odile Cougoule (Histoires d'elles show n'afọ 1991), Nawel Skandrani na Imed Jemâa na ụlọ ọrụ ya, Dance Theater
O sonyere dịka onye na-agba egwu na ihe ngosi nke Hadhra nke Fadhel Jaziri
N'ime ihe nkiri, ọ meriri ihe nrite nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Carthage Film Festival nke afọ 2006 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Making Of nke Nouri Bouzid

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-eme mkpesa ka ha kagbuo ihe ngosi otu onye ya 100% Hallal, bụ ndị kwuru na ha chọrọ ikpe ekpere n'ime ụlọ e debere maka ihe ngosi ahụ dịka ụzọ isi mebie ya
N'ọnwa June afọ 2015, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi Chich Bich na ụlọ ọrụ TV Attessia
O jiri ohere ahụ mee ka ya na Samir Dilou dịghachi n'otu afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, esemokwu ya na ya na ihe ngosi Sans éloge na Hannibal TV
N'afọ 2015 na 2016, Abdelli natara onyinye nke onye na-eme ihe ọchị kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na Bolice na onyinye nke kpakpando Ramadan na Romdhane Awards, nke Mosaïque FM haziri

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Farès Naânaâ Les Frontières du ciel na nke iri na abụọ Dubai International Film Festival
N'ọnwa Septemba 2017, Abdelli meghere ụlọ tii
Mgbe ahụ na Disemba, ọ malitere ihe ngosi telivishọn ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Abdelli ShowTime na-agbasa na ọwa TV Attessia
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019 ọ mara ọkwa na ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye nwere òkè na ọwa ahụ
N'afọ 2019, Lotfi mepụtara ihe ngosi otu onye ya Just Abdelli 100% Tabou
ULotfi Akalay (1943-2019), onye amụrụ na Tangier, bụ onye nte akụkọ Morocco, onye edemede na onye ọchụnta ego
A maara ya nke ọma maka isiokwu ya na Al Bayane, La Vie Économique, Charlie Hebdo na Jeune Afrique
O gosikwara mmemme redio na jazz na egwu oge ochie (Radio Mediterranee Internationale)
N'afọ 1996, o bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya Les nuits d ́Azed na 1998, Ibn Battouta, Pince des Voyageurs
Akalay gụrụ akụ na ụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Paris, soro Royal Air Maroc rụọ ọrụ ma rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ njem na Tangier
N'afọ 1990, ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin
N'afọ 2006, o bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ ihe mere eme ya n'otu akwụkwọ Les Nouvelles de Tanger
Ọ nwụrụ na abalị iri na asatọ na onwa Disemba, na afọ 2019
Lotfi Dziri (Arabic, January 6, 1946 na Carthage - May 5, 2013) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Lotfi Nezzar bụ onye ọchụnta ego Algeria, nwa Major-General Khaled Nezzar
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Smart Link Communication, onye na-ahụ maka ịntanetị

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2020, a mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ isii n'anọghị ya maka ịla n'iyi ego, ịnyefe ego n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na ịgha ụgha na iji ịgha ụgha iji nweta ihe ùgwù na-ekwesịghị ekwesị, a gbara akwụkwọ ọkwa uhie nke INTERPOL megide ya, a tọhapụrụ ya na ebubo niile na Nọvemba 2021
Lotfy El Tanbouli (13 February 1919, na Alexandria, Egypt - 11 May 1982) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Egyptologist
N'afọ 1946, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ ya na ngosi amateur na Paris
O mere ihe ngosi iri na atọ n'otu n'otu site n'afọ 1946 ruo afọ 1981 ma sonye na ihe ngosi nchịkọta site n'afọ 1964 ruo afọ 1978
Tanbouli nwetara nkwado steeti site na ozi nke ọdịbendị 1980-1981 ma bụrụ onye guzobere na Syndicate of Plastic Artists
Tanbouli bụ onye Ijipt mbụ na-elekọta ngalaba mbipụta na Center of Documentation on Ancient Egypt
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọkà mmụta ihe ochie bi na ya n'oge a na-ebufe ụlọ nsọ abụọ nke Abu Simbel n'ebe dị elu (1964–1968)
Ọ haziri mmemme Negro mbụ na Dakar, ememme nka nke Afrịka na Lagos, ihe ngosi nke Ramses II na Paris (1976) na ihe ngosi Queens na Kings nke Ijipt oge ochie na Japan (1978)
Tanbouli haziri ngalaba ndị Ijipt nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị agha na Cairo na Port Said
Mbipụta Nchịkọta mbipụta sayensị zuru ezu Obere ụlọ nsọ nke Abu Simbel (akụkụ abụọ)
Nchịkọta sayensị nke ụlọ nsọ Garf Hussein Temple, nke abụọ, nke atọ na nke anọ
Nchịkọta akwụkwọ nta sayensị uwe na Ijipt oge ochie, ụlọ nsọ Abu Simbel, ụlọ nsọ Kalabsha na ụlọ nsọ Garf Hussein
O dekwara ederede sayensị maka katalọgụ nke ngosi nke ndị eze nwanyị na ndị eze Ijipt oge ochie na Japan
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, n'ọnwa Disemba 1982, ozi nke ọdịbendị guzobere ihe ngosi nke onye na-ese ihe Lotfy El Tanbouli na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkọta nka na Zamalek
Na Mee 1983, Onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak nyere ya nrite sayensị na nka, ọkwa mbụ
Na Machị 1984, Kansụl gọọmentị Cairo kpọrọ otu okporo ámá aha ya na Nasr City

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1985, National Cinema Center gosipụtara nyocha nke ihe nkiri banyere ọrụ onye na-ese ihe Lotfy El Tanbouli nke isiokwu ya bụ 'site na Alexandria ruo El-Nuba', na International Egyptian Cinema Festival
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1992, ozi nke ọdịbendị mere ihe ngosi maka ọrụ ya n'oge ncheta ọnwụ ya nke iri na Cairo Opera House
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya dị na nchịkọta onwe ya, dịkwa na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Ijipt ole na ole gburugburu ụwa na n'ụlọ ngosi na Egypt na Poland
Nwa nwanne Lotfy El Tanbouli bụ onye na-ese ihe na Alexandria bụ Ibrahim El Tanbouli, nwa nwanne ya bụ onye na-ese ihe na London bụ Nazir Tanbouli
Lotfy Labib (Arabic, a mụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye mgbasa ozi n'otu oge
N'agbanyeghị na ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Theatrical Arts n'afọ 1970, ọrụ Labib na-egbu oge ruo afọ iri
Mbụ, e debara aha ya na ndị agha ruo afọ isii, wee gaa n'èzí Egypt ruo afọ anọ
Ọrụ ya malitere n'ezie n'afọ 1981, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu 'The Bald Singer,' nke ọ sochiri na mmepụta ihe ọzọ 'The Hostages'
Labib arụwo ọrụ nke ukwuu kemgbe ahụ, n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado ma a na-echefu echefu, na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 200 na telivishọn
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ngosi ya dị mkpirikpi, Labib emeela nke ọma ma gosipụta onwe ya ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ike nke ọgbọ ya
Ọ pụtara na 387 sequels (usoro, ihe nkiri, redio na ndị ọzọ) kemgbe afọ 1988
Loti (n'ọtụtụ Maloti) bụ ego nke Alaeze Lesotho
A na-ekewa ya na 100 lisente (sg
sente)
A na-ejikọta ya na rand South Africa na 1 1 site na Common Monetary Area, a na-anabatakwa ha abụọ dị ka ego iwu kwadoro n'ime Lesotho
E wepụtara loti nke mbụ na afọ 1966, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ ego anaghị ekesa
N'afọ 1980, Lesotho nyere mkpụrụ ego mbụ ya na loti na lisente (nke dị na 1979) iji dochie rand South Africa, mana rand ka na-adị nro
Aha ahụ sitere na ihe a na-akpọ Sesotho loti, 'ugwu,' ebe sente sitere na Bekee 'cent'
N'afọ 1985, a gbanwere koodu bụ ISO 4217 site na LSM wee bụrụ LSL
N'afọ 1980, e webatara mkpụrụ ego nke afọ 1979 na 1 sente, 2, 5, 10, 25 na 50 lisente na 1 loti
Na 1996, e webatara mkpụrụ ego maloti abuo na ise, nke sochiri 20 lisente na 1998
Mkpụrụ ego ndị a na-ekesa bụ
Na Jenụwarị nke afọ 1980, e webatara akwụkwọ ego ndị e dere n'afọ 1979 (nọmba abụọ ikpeazụ nke afọ e wepụtara bụ nọmba nọmba nọmba) na ụdị nke abụọ, ise na iri maloti
A gbakwunyere akwụkwọ ego maloti 20 na 50 n'afọ 1981, 100 na 200 maloti sochiri n'afọ1994
Charlotte 'Lottie' Wilson Jackson (1854 na Jenụwarị 16, 1914), nke a makwaara dị ka 'Lotgie Wilson,' bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe ike si Michigan
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute nke Chicago
N'afọ 1901, Wilson lekọtara ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese ihe Africa na America na Pan-American Exposition
Ọ bịanyere aka na áhà ya dị ka 'Lottie Wilson' na ihe osise ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
A mụrụ Lottie Wilson na 1854 na Niles, Michigan
Dị ka okenye, ọ bụ ónyé bi na Bay City, Michigan, ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ nka n'ebe ahụ nke meghere maka ọha na eze
N'afọ 1901, Wilson kwagara Washington, DC
iji mepee ụlọ ọrụ nka ebe o mèrè ihe ngosi nka ma kụzie klas ruo n'afọ 1905
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro atọ; nke mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 18 na James Huggart, mgbè ahụ na John Jackson, mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1906 na Daniel Moss
Ya na di mbụ ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ, ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha dị ndụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Wilson bụ ónyé na-ese mmanụ, onye na-akpụ ihe, na ónyé na-enye ohere gallery
Nnukwu ihe osise mmanụ ya 'President Lincoln with a Former Slave', 1902, gosipụtara Abraham Lincoln na onye na-ahụ màkà ikike ụmụ nwanyị, Sojourner Truth
Onye isi ala Theodore Roosevelt nabatara ihe osise ahụ n'ime nchịkọta nka na-adịgide adịgide nke White House
Wilson bụ onye na-ese ihe Africa-America nke mbụ ọrụ ya ghọrọ akụkụ nke nchịkọta White House
O sere onyinyo Booker T
Washington maka Tuskegee Institute na onyinyo Charles Sumner màkà Provident Hospital na Chicago na 1892
Wilson nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 16, 1914, na Niles
A nabatara Wilson n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Inyom nke Michigan n'afọ 2016
Lou Jones (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, bi na Boston
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na mgbasa ozi na foto ụlọ ọrụ

Ọrụ ya sitere na foto akụkọ na-ekpuchi agha na Central America na ihe ndị metụtara mmadụ, na foto egwuregwu na-edekọ egwuregwu 13 na-aga n'ihu, na foto jazz gụnyere Miles Davis, Milt Jackson, na Charles Mingus
A mụrụ Jones ma zụlite ya na Washington, DC
n'afọ 1945
Nna ya, Leon Jones, rụrụ ọrụ maka USPS na ọrụ ozi
Nne ya, Landonia Jones, rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ahụike, Mmụta, na Ahụike
Nanị nwanne ya nwanyị, nke obere Leonade Jones, bụ onye na-etinye ego n'onwe ya na onye ndụmọdụ ego n'efu na mpaghara Washington, DC
Jones gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Gonzaga High School ma nweta asambodo na sayensị na kwa fiziks na Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'oge ọkọchị na NASA dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị rọket, ọ gara Rensselaer na-achụso nzere gụsịrị akwụkwọ na fiziks
Jones malitere ọrụ foto ya n'afọ 1971
Ndị ahịa azụmahịa ya gụnyere IBM, Major League Baseball, Federal Express, Peugeot, Museum of Fine Arts, Paris Match, KLM, National Geographic, People Magazine, Nike, Price Waterhouse, na Aetna
O sere ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka ọdịda nke Mgbidi Berlin, Million Man March, na egwuregwu Olympic iri na abụọ na-esote
N'afọ ndị 1980 ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu US na Nicaragua, El Salvador, Guatemala, na Honduras na CODELs (COngressional DELegations) na-edekọ gọọmentị, ndị agha na ndị isi nnupụisi
N'afọ 1990, Museum of Afro-American History nyere Jones ọrụ ịsọpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị na 'Sojourner's Daughters'
Ọrụ a mere ka Aetna were Jones n'ọrụ iji see foto kalenda akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka-Amerịka kwa afọ site n'afọ 2011
Jones bụ onye isi oche nke New England chapter nke American Society of Media Photographers site n'afọ 1982-1986

N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, e gosipụtara Jones na ihe omume izizi nke USA Network's The Moment N'ịbụ nke Kurt Warner kwadoro, ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ndị nkịtị na-achọ ohere nke abụọ na ọrụ nrọ ha
Jones bụ onye nduzi na ihuenyo nke onye na-ese foto egwuregwu Tracey Marcum, na-enye ndụmọdụ na nkatọ nke foto ya
Lou Llobell (a mụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 1995) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na London
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Zandie na ihe nkiri Voyagers nke afọ 2021
N'afọ 2021, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Gaal Dornick, onye isi na usoro akụkọ sayensị Apple TV + Foundation
A mụrụ Lou Llobell na Zimbabwe nye nna Spanish na nne Zimbabwe
Ọ tolitere n'etiti Spain na South Africa

Ọ kwagara England n'afọ 2013 iji mụọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Birmingham ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Drama and Theatre Arts n'afọ 2016, tupu ọ banye na Drama Centre London n'afọ 2016 ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Master of Arts n'afọ 2018
Loubna Abidar (a mụrụ n'abalị 20 ọnwa Septemba afọ 1985) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Abidar na Marrakech
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Much Loved nke Nabil Ayouch duziri
A machibidoro ihe nkiri ahụ na Morocco n'ihi na a na-ewere ya dịka ihe mkparị nye Islam na Morocco
Abidar nwetara iyi egwu ọnwụ n'ihi ngosipụta ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, a wakporo ya na Casablanca ma ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ gaa France n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016, ọ natara nhọpụta maka César Award maka Best Actress maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ụdị ihe nkiri a gbatịrị agbatị gụnyere òtù na-abụghị nke simulated nke Loubna Abidar mere na Carlo Brandt
E kpochapụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ na ụdị DVD nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Louis Arnett Stuart Bellinger (b
Septemba 29, 1891 na Sumter, SC; nwụrụ
Febụwarị 3, 1946 na Pittsburgh, PA) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke na-ahụ maka imepụta ụlọ ndị dị mkpa na nso Pittsburgh
Bellinger nwetara nzere bachelọ na Architecture na Mahadum Howard n'afọ 1914
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara Philadelphia, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kụziri mgbakọ na mwepụ na Florida na Mahadum Allen na South Carolina
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị agha US na 1917, na-enweta ọzụzụ na Fort Des Moines
N'afọ 1919, Bellinger na nwunye ya Ethel kwagara Pittsburgh, onye kụziri egwu (na mbụ na nzuzo ma mesịa na Robert L
Vann Elementary School)

Na mbido na n'etiti afọ 1920, Bellinger rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs nke City Architect nke Pittsburgh, na-emepụta ụlọ gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii, ụlọ ọrụ na ogige ntụrụndụ obodo, na nke kachasị, ogige baseball a na-akpọ Central Park
N'afọ 1926, o guzobere ọrụ onwe ya, otu n'ime atụmatụ mbụ ya n'afọ ahụ bụ African Methodist Episcopal Book Concern na 716 S
19th
St, Philadelphia (nke a kwatuworo ugbu a)
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe na-erughị iri isii African-American architects
Na ngwụcha afọ 1920 na 1930, Bellinger mepụtara ọtụtụ ụlọ dị mkpa na Pittsburgh, gụnyere New Granada Theater na Hill District, nke e mere maka Knights of Pythias

Ihe owuwu a ka guzo ma gbakwunye ya na Ndepụta nke City of Pittsburgh akụkọ ihe mere eme na Ọktoba 8, 2004, Ndepụta nke Pittsburgh History and Landmarks Foundation Historic Landmarks na 2007, na National Register of Historic Places na December 27, 2010
N'afọ 1931, Bellinger mepụtara Greenlee Field maka Gus Greenlee, nke ndị otu egwuregwu baseball Negro league ji mee ihe
Atụmatụ ndị ọzọ nke Pittsburgh site na Bellinger gụnyere duplex ya na Ethel na 530 Francis St, ụlọ obibi dị na Centre Ave
na Wylie Ave, na mmezigharị nke ụka na Wilkinsburg na East Liberty
N'afọ 1932, Bellinger gbara ọsọ dị ka onye Republican maka United States Congress
Nanị onye isi ojii (nke ise) na ntuli aka nke iri atọ na abụọ nke Pennsylvania, a họpụtabeghị ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1930, Bellinger kwụsịrị ọrụ onwe ya ma rụọ ọrụ n'obodo ahụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye nyocha ụlọ
N'afọ 1945 na 1946, o mepụtara ọtụtụ atụmatụ ọhụrụ na imezigharị ụlọ ọha na eze na nke onwe
Bellinger nwụrụ n'ihi ọbara ọgbụgba n'ụbụrụ na Febụwarị 3, 1946
E liri ya na Allegheny Cemetery
Albert M
Tanner na-ekwu maka mkpa Bellinger dị 'A na-achọta ihe ndị a na-ezo aka na Louis A

Bellinger na Negro Artists An Illustrated Review of Their Achievements (New York Harmon Foundation, 1935), Theresa Dickason Cederholm, Afro-American Artists A Bio-bibliographical Directory (Boston Public Library, 1973), na Who Was Who in American Art 1564-1975 (Madison, CT Sound View Press, 1999)

Louis Jessup Delsarte nke Atọ (úbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1944 rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2020) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America nke a maara màkà ihe a na-akpọ mgbè ụfọdụ ụdị 'illusionistic' ya
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ahụ màkà mgbidi, onye na'ebi akwụkwọ, na onye na-eme ihe osise
Mgbè Delsarte na-etolite, egwu gụnyere jazz, opera, musicals, na blues gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ
Site na ahụmịhe a, yana ihe ọmụma ya banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Afrịka, o nwetara ọtụtụ ihe mkpali màkà nka ya
Delsarte bụ prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na Morehouse College na Atlanta, Georgia
N'ime afọ iri na atọ gárá aga, egosila ọrụ ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ United States
A mụrụ Louise J
Desarte nke Atọ na Brooklyn, New York, nke Louis Desarte nke Abụọ na Llewellyn (Johnston) Delsarte, ndị nkụzi abụọ

Delsarte gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mpaghara Flatbush nke Brooklyn, nwéta asambodo na Fine Arts Education na Brooklyn College, nwéta nzèrè bachelọ ya na Fine Arts na New York's Pratt Institute, wee nwéta nzèrè masta na Fine Arts

E gosipụtara ọrụ Delsarte n'ihe ngosi onwe ónyé na nke otu na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gallery, na ebe ndị ọzọ na United States, gụnyere Studio Museum na Harlem, Metropolitan Museum of Art na New York, Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture na New York، Bodley Gallery (nakwa na New York), California Afro-American Museum, Camille Hanks Cosby Museum na Spelman College na Atlanta, Georgia, na ụlọ ngosi nka nke Howard University
N'afọ 2001, a gụnyere ọrụ Delsarte dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi njem mba nke akpọrọ 'Mgbè Mmụọ na-aga African-American Dance in History and Art'
Ihe ngosi njem ahụ bụ nke Smithsonian Institution kwadoro, ebe ọ malitere dị ka ihe ngosi 1999-2000 na Spelman College (nke akpọrọ 'Mgbè Mmụọ Na-aga African American Art Inspired by Dance)

Klein na-eme njikọ dị n'etiti ihe ndị a na-eme ihe na nkà na ụzụ, na mmetụta nke egwu na ọrụ ónyé na-ese ihe 'N'ihe osise ya, mmekọrịta dị n'agbata ihe oyiyi na ala, oghere e sere n'èzí ihe oyiyi ahụ na-agbanwe ma na-agbanwere
Ọdịdị dị egwu nke oghere a na-adọta ányá anyị ma na-atụ aro ụda nke egwu
A na-akpa ihe oyiyi ahụ n'ime ikuku a dị egwu
Ọ nwụrụ na úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2020
[Isi mmalite màkà ndepụta a (1) Worldcat; na (2) African American Visual Artists Database
Louis Khehla Maqhubela (amụrụ na 1939 na Durban ma nwụọ na London na 6 Nọvemba 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
Louis Maqhubela gụrụ akwụkwọ na Polly Street Art Centre na Johannesburg
Otu n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1959 na Johannesburg, n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nke a ma ama na nkwa
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-egosi ihe ngosi, ọkachasị na London, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na gallery na nchịkọta na England (London), United States of America, na South Africa
Ya na nwunye ya na ezinụlọ ya bi na London
A pụkwara ile ọrụ ya ugbu a anya site na ibe weebụsaịtị ya
Ọrụ mbụ ya gosipụtara ndụ obodo ma melite ngwa ngwa na ụzọ ndị ọzọ na-enweghị atụ
A na-akọwa ọrụ ya site n'iji agba siri ike na ntinye aka doro anya na ihe nketa Africa ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche site na mmanụ ruo gouache
Ọrụ ya gụnyere
Official website
Sir Louis Phillip Odumegwu Ojukwu, OBE (Site n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1909 ruo n'onwa September nme afọ 1966) bụ onye ọchụ nta ego Naịjirịa sitere n'ezinụlọ Ojukwu nke Nwakanwa Obiuno Umudim Nnewi
Ojukwu, bụ onye guzobere Ojukwu Transport, Ojukwu Stores na Ojukwu Textiles
N'oge ọ kachasị elu, ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ na onye guzobere ebe mgbanwe ngwaahịa nke Naịjirịa yana onye isi oche nke The ụlọ akụ continental nke mba Afrịka

Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche ma ọ bụ rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa kachasị baa uru dịka Shell Oil Nigeria Limited, Guinness Nigeria Limited, Nigerian National Shipping Line, Nigerian Cement Factory, Nigerian Coal Corporation, Costain West Africa Ltd, John Holt plc, Nigerian Marketing Board na ndị ọzọ
O meriri oche ndị omeiwu n'oge mba mbụ nke mba ahụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Asaba na Hope Waddell Training Institute
Nwa ya nwoke Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu bụ gọvanọ ndị agha Naijiria na onye isi ala nke steeti Biafra
Ojukwu malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na ngalaba ọrụ ugbo tupu ọ pụọ isonyere John Holt dị ka onye na-ere taya
O guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ akwa na Onitsha iji gbakwunye ego ọ na-enweta n'oge a
Na John Holt, ọ chọpụtara nnukwu nsogbu nke enweghị njem zuru oke nwere na ndị na-ere akwa n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ John holt iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ njem nke ya iji melite ọnọdụ azụmaahịa maka ndị ahịa Naijiria

Ihe ịga nke ọma ya mekwara ka ọganihu akụ na ụba mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, dịka ọ na-arụ ọrụ na West African Railway Company na bọọdụ mmepụta ọhụrụ, o mere ka ụgbọ njem ya maka njem ngwaahịa baara ndị ahịa ndị ọzọ uru

Dị ka onye ọrụ njem, o nwere ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ njem nke ya bụ (Ojukwu Transport Limited) nke bụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ njem mbụ n'ebu ndị ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa Lagos site na njedebe Asaba nke osimiri Niger mgbe ha nwere ike ịgafe Onitsha site n'ụgbọ mmiri
N'ime afọ 1950, ọ gbasara mmasị ya, zụta ụlọ ọrụ mmeputa ụfọdụ, tinye ego dị ukwuu na ngalaba ahịa ụlọ ma ghọọ onye nduzi n'ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa National Shipping Line
Ọ bụ onye otu bọọdụ ụlọ ọrụ Nigerian Coal Corporation, Shell Oil, D'Archy, na African Continental Bank
N'oge tupu nnwere onwe na na Republic nke mbu, Ojukwu bụ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na onye na-enye onyinye na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, NCNC
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ndị nnochite anya otu oge
N'afọ 1958, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Eastern Region Development Corporation na Eastern Regional Marketing Board
N'ụbọchị nke mbu nke onwa Mee, afọ 1953, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke kọmitii udo nke NCNC ma nye ya ikike ịhọrọ ọtụtụ ndị otu kọmitii ahụ
E nyere kọmitii ahụ ọrụ iweghachi udo n'ụlọ nzukọ mpaghara
Echiche ya banyere iwu di ntakịrị capitalistic ma buru eziokwu nke onye nlekọta mmadu n'okpuru ala Zik

Ọ bụ onye na-edekọ akụkọ banyere ozi akụ na ụba na Europe na mpaghara North America ya na Azikiwe, akụkọ ahụ kwadoro itinye ego nke ego sitere na ụlọ ahịa mmepụta ngwaahịa na ụlọ akụ mpaghara na ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze iji kpalite mmepe akụ na ụba
N'oge Agha Ụwa na mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ụgbọala Ojukwu na-ebu ngwongwo ma na-enweta ego maka onye nwe ha
N'otu oge, Ọ bụ ụgbọala Louis n'ebu ngwa ọgụ ndị Britain - ọrụ nke Louis mechara nara ụgwọ ya; E mesịrị, Queen Elizabeth nke Abụọ mee ya knight
[citation needed]
Ka akụ na ụba ya na-eto, mmetụta ya na mmetụta ya malitere ịgbasa karịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu nnwere onwe ma bụrụ onye na-enye onyinye nke National Council of Nigeria and Cameroons (NCNC), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nwere Nnamdi Azikiwe dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu ya
N'otu oge, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ
Ka ọ na-erule oge ọnwụ ya na n'afọ 1966, akụ na ụba Louis Odumegwu Ojukwu ruru ijeri $40 site na uru dị ugbu a
Ojukwu nwụrụ n'afọ 1966, naanị otu afọ tupu agha obodo Naijiria
Nwa ya nwoke, Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu, bụ onye ndú nke steeti Biafra
Louis Vitale, OFM, bụ onye Franciscan friar, onye na-ahụ maka udo, na onye guzobere Nevada Desert Experience
Nkwenkwe okpukpe ya mere ka ọ sonye n'omume nnupụisi obodo na ngagharị iwe udo na omume nke ịgba akaebe okpukpe karịa afọ iri anọ
N'aha udo, e jidere Vitale ihe karịrị ugboro 400
Vitale kwuru na Francis nke Assisi, Mahatma Gandhi na Martin Luther King Jr
nyere ya mkpali
A mụrụ Louis Vitale na June 1, 1932, na San Gabriel, California
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1954 na Mahadum Loyola, nke bụzi Mahadum Luyola Marymount, Vitale debanyere aha na US Air Force
Ọrụ bụ isi Vitale na Air Force bụ nke onye ọrụ intercept, na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta redio
Vitale kwere nkwa ya dịka onye Franciscan friar n'afọ 1960 mgbe ọ dị afọ 28
E nyere ya PhD maka nyocha mbụ na sociology, Septemba 1972, site na Mahadum California, Los Angeles
Site n'afọ 1979 ruo 1988, Vitale jere ozi dịka onye isi mpaghara nke Franciscan Friars nke Province of St
Barbara
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka pastọ na St
Boniface Catholic Church ruo afọ iri na abụọ na Tenderloin nke San Francisco, California
Louis Vitale bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Pace e Bene, ọrụ na-enweghị ime ihe ike, n'afọ 1989
Aha ahụ pụtara Udo na ihe niile dị mma
Ndị ọzọ guzobere ya gụnyere Sr
Rosemary Lynch, Alain Richard, Peter Ediger na Julia Occhiogrosso, ndị niile bụ ndị nwere ahụmahụ na-ahụ maka udo
Pace e bene mepụtara mmemme agụmakwụkwọ maka ndụ na-enweghị ime ihe ike na-ekwusi ike na ime mmụọ
N'afọ 2005, Pace e Bene bipụtara akwụkwọ Engage, nke kọwara mmemme Pace e bene
Emere mmemme ahụ, dịka akọwapụtara n'akwụkwọ ahụ, iji gbaa ume nchọpụta, ime ka ọ dị n'ime na iji ike nke enweghị ime ihe ike maka mgbanwe onwe onye na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Pace e Bene haziri ọtụtụ narị ìgwè ọmụmụ ihe na-abụghị ime ihe ike n'etiti afọ 1989 na 2010
Louisa Akpagu (amụrụ ya na 22 Disemba afọ 1974) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naijiria gbara bọọlụ dika onye nche
O so na ndị otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa
O so na otu nke FIFA Women's World Cup 1995
Louise Barnes (a mụrụ na 26 Eprel 1974) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
Barnes nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na South Africa maka ọrụ dị iche iche na ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn ndị e mepụtara na mpaghara
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri egwu South Africa / UK nke afọ 2009, Surviving Evil, nke ya na Billy Zane, Christina Cole na Natalie Mendoza sonyere
O mekwara Miranda Barlow na 2014 American telivishọn usoro Black Sails, nke Michael Bay na Jonathan E
Steinberg mepụtara
A mụrụ Barnes na KwaZulu-Natal ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand na Honours Degree na Dramatic Art
Ya na di ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi na Johannesburg
O nwere mgbe o nwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụike mgbe ọ nwetachara ọzụzụ na United States dịka onye nkuzi nke Bikram yoga
O nwetala otuto dị egwu maka arụmọrụ ya na usoro Scandal! nke o ritere ihe nrite SAFTA maka Best Actress in a TV Soap
Barnes emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro ndị South Africa mepụtara gụnyere Egoli, 7de Laan, Binnelanders, Scandal!, Sorted, Suburban Bliss, SOS
na South African / Canadian co-production Jozi-H
Ọ pụtara na 2014 American television series Black Sails, nke o nwetara otuto dị egwu maka arụmọrụ ya
Ntụrụndụ kwa izu na-akpọ àgwà ya 'intriguing' na 'mysterious'
Ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ ya na oge nke abụọ nke e mere na Cape Town, South Africa ma gosipụta ya n'afọ 2015
Louise Carver (onye a mụrụ n'abali nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1979) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu
A mụrụ Carver na Cape Town, ma nwee ikikere amaala abụọ na South Africa na United Kingdom
Ọ malitere ịkpọ piano mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ma nweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rustenburg School for Girls, n'afọ 1996
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nkà ihe ọmụma na akụnụba na Mahadum nke Cape Town n'afọ 2002
Carver wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, It Don't Matter (1996) mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Otu egwu so nọrọ n'ogo dị elu nke chattị south Africa bụ South African National Campus Charts
Ọ nọrọ izu iri na otu na chattị ndị ogo elu iri anọ nke South African National Top 40 Charts, ebe ọ nọọ n'ọkwa nke atọ
[citation needed] Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ sonyere egwu ahụ na abọm mbụ ya, Mirrors and Windows (1998)
First for Women, ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi South Africa, kwadoro njem mkpahari ụlọ nke Carver mere n'afọ 2008
Abụọ n'ime egwu ya na ụlọ DJ Joe Bermudez - 'Sunrise' (2016) na 'Crazy Enough' (2018) - ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mbụ na chaatị Billboard Dance Club Songs
Channel24 mere nyocha dị mma gbasara Carver n'afọ 2009

N'onwa June afọ 2010, City Press kwuru na Carver's nwere nleruanya ruo ná ngwụcha abọm 'nwere ụda elektrọnik / pop na ntinye nke ụda South Africa na percussion, [ma] ga-amasị ndị South Africa na ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile
Abọm a nwere egwu iri na abụọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche ma dị iche iche
Ọ dị mfe ige ntị ma nwee ihe mmụta nye onye ọ bụla
Louise Guthrie (ubochí irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1879 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1966) bụ ónyé South Africa na-amụ banyere ihe ọkụkụ na ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ
A mụrụ Isobel Louise Sophie Guthrie na Cape Town, South Africa, na 1879, nwá nwanyị nkè ónyé Bekee a mụrụ na botanist na prọfesọ mgbakọ na mwepụ Francis Guthrie ya na nwunye ya, Isabella Grisbrook
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị nke Rustenburg
Louise Guthrie bụ ónyé enyemaka botanical na Bolus Herbarium, malite na 1918, ruo 1927

Mgbè ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ zụlitere nkà ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise botanical, nkè a maara nkè ọma màkà usoro ihe ngosi narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ nke ụdị protea a chọtara na South Africa, nke malitere na 1925, nke ikpeazụ bụ 1947
O nyere ihe nkiri ahụ na Bolus Herbarium na 1948
A na-eji mbiri nke onye ode akwụkwọ ọkọlọtọ LGuthrie gosi onye a dị ka odee mgbe ọ na-ehota aha botanical
Aha osisi guthriae na-asọpụrụ Louise Guthrie
A na-echekwa nka ya na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Hermanus Botanical Society mèrè ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise irí asaá na isii nke Guthrie na 2000, na Fernkloof Nature Reserve
A na-egosi ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise mmiri ya na South Africa House na London
Louise L
Chase (née Bond; September 2, 1840 - September 19, 1906) bụ onye America na-eme mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Women's Christian Temperance Union (WCTU) nke Middletown, Rhode Island, ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụ onye isi oche of the Woman's Foreign Missionary Society of the Methodist Episcopal Church na Newport, Rhode Islands
A mụrụ Louise L
Bond na Warren, Massachusetts, na Septemba 2, 1840
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Samuel Bond (1796-1873) na Mary (Damon) Bond (1803-?Ọpụpụ ọzọ Louise nwere ụmụnne atọ, John, Maria, na Samuel
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe amuchara ya, ndị mụrụ ya kwagara Brimfield, Massachusetts, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ, banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Hitchcock n'efu mgbe ọ dị afọ 13
Ebe obibi nwa oge na Columbia, Connecticut, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye, kwụsịrị ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ laghachiri Brimheld ma gụchaa akwụkwọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
N'afọ 1857, ọ gara biri na Lebanon, Connecticut, ma lụọ Alfred W
Chase, onye Bristol, Rhode Island, n'ebe ahụ na 1861
Maazị na Oriakụ N'oge na-adịghị anya, Chase kwagara Brooklyn, Connecticut, na 1882, Middletown, Rhode Island, ebe obibi ezinụlọ Maazị Chase
The wctu of Middletown was organized in 1882 and chase was elected one of the
Vice president

In 1885 she was elected president of wctu of Middletown and In that way became prominent in the workshe was elected state vice president of wctuand at about the same time state superintendent of the department of Sabbath observance
In 1886 she represented the state in the National convention in Minneapolis,Minnesota she was elected in 1891 state superintendent of scientific temperance instruction in school
Chase nwere njikọ na alaka New England nke Women's Foreign Missionary Society nke Methodist Episcopal Church
Obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ na Newport, Rhode Island
Louise L
Chase nwụrụ na Newport, na Septemba 19, 1906
Louise Leblanc (amụrụ ya na owa June 10, n'afọ 1942)ọ bụ onye edemede Canada bi na Quebec
A mụrụ ya na obodo Montreal ma o gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Montreal

Leblanc kụziri French na akụkọ ihe mere eme ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchọpụta na telivishọn, dị ka onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya Mera ka magazin dị iche iche ma dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 1980, o bipụtara nchịkọta ihe ọchị 'l'Homme objet; nke akwụkwọ akụkọ 371⁄2 AA sochiri n'afọ 1983 nke meriri Prix Robert-Cliche
N'afọ 1985, Leblanc dere edemede maka ihe nkiri telivishọn Radio-Canada Archimède
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede maka telivishọn, gụnyere usoro Les Enquêtes de Chlorophylle na ọtụtụ ihe omume dị iche iche maka usoro Watatatow
Leblanc ebipụtakwala ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirikpi
Louise Ozelle Martin (ụbọchị 9 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1911 - rụọ ụbọchị 15 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1995) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke natara nkwado maka foto ya nke Houston Freedom Riders, Dr
Martin Luther King Jr, na karịa
A maara ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ maka ndị inyom Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto

A mụrụ Martin na Brenham, Texas, nke bụ obere obodo German dị nso na Houston, na mpkuru ubochi 9 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 1911, nne na nna ya bụ Barbara (Harris) Martin, onye na-arụ ọrụ na Vanda Martin, onye nlekọta
nye Vanda Martin na Barbara (Harnis) Martin
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na foto mgbe ọ dị obere n'ihi ịhụnanya ya maka foto, nke nne ya gbara ume
Mgbe Martin dị afọ iri na otu, nne ya zụtara ya igwefoto mbụ ya maka $ 398
Ka ọ na-erule oge ọ bụ nwata na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Martin anọchiwo ụlọ ọrụ na-ese foto ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji ya
Nne Martin gbara ya ume ka ọ mụọ akụ na ụba ụlọ ma ọ bụ nọọsụ na mahadum ndị Ojiị dị n'ógbè ahụ, mana enyeghị ọmụmụ ihe ndị ọ nwere mmasị na ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ River Oak ruo mgbe ọ nwere ike ịdebanye aha na Mahadum Denver
Martin hapụrụ Texas ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ na Chicago n'ihi na kọleji ndị si South nwere iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke na-ekweghị ka ndị isi ojii gaa
Ọ gụrụ foto na Art Institute nke Chicago na American School of Photography
N'afọ 1946, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na foto na Mahadum Denver School of Photographic Arts and Scientists
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ bụ naanị nwanyị ojii debanyere aha
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Denver, Martin rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
Ọ na-ese foto nke ndị agha, ka Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ mere ka ọchịchọ maka foto nke ndị ọrụ
Ọrụ Martin na Denver mere ka ọ sonye na Rocky Mountain Association na mbido afọ 1950
N'afọ 1952, ọ sonyeere Southwestern Photographers Convention dị ka naanị onye isi ojii

Ihe ịga nke ọma ya na Southwestern Photographers Convention mere ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Texas Professional Photographers Association, Professional Photographists of America, Southwest Professional Photographer Association, na Business and Professional Women Association
A maara ya maka iji ọkụ na nkà ya n'ịtụgharị foto
Ka oge na-aga, ọ kwagara Houston, Texas
Na Houston, ọ lụrụ Uriete Boze, onye na-ebu ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ha lụsịrị, ha gbara alụkwaghịm, ebe ọ chọrọ ka ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ, ọ raara onwe ya nye ọrụ ya
Na Houston, Martin nwetara ọtụtụ mmata na ihe ịga nke ọma na foto
N'afọ 1946, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Louise Martin Art, nke na-eje ozi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị isi ojii nke Houston, ụlọ ụka, na ụwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke gara Houston
Martin mere atụmatụ na ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ nke ndị ahịa ya bụ ụmụ nwanyị
A maara ya dị ka 'Houston's Society Photographer'
Martin rụrụ ọrụ maka Houston Forward Times na Houston Informer, akwụkwọ akụkọ Black Houston abụọ
Martin sere foto nke ndị ama ama, ugboro ugboro ka ha na-agafe Houston gụnyere John F
Kennedy, Dwight D
Eisenhower, Richard Nixon, Coretta Scott King, Marian Anderson, na Jesse Jackson
N'afọ 1968, Foward Times na Informer zigara Marin na Funeral nke Martin Luther King Jr, ebe ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto
Foto ya na foto ya nke Coretta Scott King mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na mba
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto olili ozu ya ka ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nwetara, gụnyere International Center of Photography na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, ụfọdụ n'ime ha pụtara na Life Magazine
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1970, Martin enwetala onyinye 27 na foto
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ maka ụmụ nwanyị na-ese foto n'Afrịka
Martin nwụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị 15, afọ 1995, n'ụlọ ya nke atọ
E liri ya na Willow Grove Cemetery na Brenham
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Museum of Fine Arts Houston, na International Center of Photography
Louise Mushikiwabo (amụrụ 22 Mee 1961) bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke anọ na ugbu a internationale de la Francophonie
Ọ bụbu onye minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi na imekọ ihe ọnụ nke Rwanda site na 2009 ruo 2018
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka ọnụ na-ekwuru gọọmentị
Ọ bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ Louise Mushikiwabo na 22 Mee 1961 na Kigali, isi obodo Rwanda

Nna ya bụ Bitsindinkumi, onye Tutsi si n'agbụrụ Batsobe; Bitsindinkumi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo, na-elekọta obere ụlọ ezinụlọ ahụ yana ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka ugbo kọfị nke ndị ọchịchị
Nne ya bụ Nyulirairat, nwa nwanne nna mbụ nke onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Abiru na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Alexis Kagame
Ọ nọrọ na nwata ya na Kigali

Nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ itoolu, ụmụnne ya gụnyere Lando Ndasingwa, onye ghọrọ onye ọchụnta ego ama ama na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Rwanda tupu e gbuo ya na 1994 n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ Rwanda, na Anne-Marie Kantengwa, onye weghaara ụlọ nkwari akụ Lando Chez Lando mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ma jee ozi na nzuko omeiwu nke Rwanda site na 2003 ruo 2008
Marie Sørine Louise Nørlund (1854 ruo 1919) bụ onye Danish na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ n'udo
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Danske Kvindeforeningers Valgretsforbund ma ọ bụ DKV (Danish Women's Society's Suffrage Union) n'afọ 1898 ruo afọ 1908 1909
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye ọrụ ugbo na onye omeiwu Mikkel Hasle Christiansen (1816 ruo 83) na Ane Jacobsdatter (182088)

Ọ lụrụ onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ bụ Niels Jensen Nørlund (1854 ruo 1894) na 1881, mana di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm na 1892, mgbe ọnwụ nke di mbụ ya gasịrị, a hapụrụ ya n'ọrụ zuru oke maka naanị nwa ha, Agnes
Louise Nørlund nwere mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ebe ụlọ nne na nna ya bụ ebe etiti maka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ gara ule onye nkuzi ya na Beyer, Bohrs og Femmers Course ma were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Larslejstrædes Skole na 1878ń1910
N'ọrụ ya, o sonyere na ntọala nke Kbhs Kommunelærerindeforening (The Copenhagen Association of Female Teachers) n'afọ 1891

Ọ na-etinye aka na udo ọ bụ onye otu Dansk Fredsforening (Danish Peace Movement), ebe ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka ọkà okwu na onye edemede na onye nnọchiteanya na nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ụwa na Hague n'afọ 1915, ebe e guzobere Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Louise Parks (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
O nwèrè nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts site na Pratt Institute, na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Hunter College
A hụla ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu na nké onwé ya, gụnyere Afro-American Artists New York na Boston na Museum of the National Center of Afro- American Artists na 1970
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta, ya na Milton Brown na-arụkọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi nkè ọrụ Jacob Lawrence na Whitney Museum of American Art na 1974
Louise Smit (née Louise Sophia Bekker, amụrụ ya na 2 Jenụwarị 1940) bụ onye South Africa odee akwụkwọ ụmụaka na onye okike na onye isi mmemme na ihe omume telivishọn ụmụaka
Smit gụrụ nkuzi na Paarl Teachers College, na Drama na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Site na afọ 1964-1968 ọ rụrụ ọrụ ebere na Malawi ebe ọ rụrụ akụkọ ifo ụmụ amaala na nsonye nke ụmụaka obodo n'ime ime obodo
Nke a mere ka e nwee ihe omume redio ụmụaka na-eme kwa izu n'asụsụ Chichewa
N'ịlaghachi na South Africa, ọ sonyeere Johannesburg Civic Theatre dị ka onye na-egwu egwu tupu ọ nabata ọkwa dịka onye nduzi mmemme na onye okike na South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC)
Ihe omume mbụ ya, Haas Das se Nuuskas (nke na-egosi arịlịka ozi oke bekee na-etinye njikọ na-egbuke egbuke) na Wielie Walie, bụ mba hits
Haas Das se Nuuskas bụkwa otu n'ime mmemme izizi emere na telivishọn South Africa n'afọ 1975

Louise bụ onye okike nke Wielie Walie, (o dere akụkọ nari abụọ mbụ), Haas Das se Nouskas (150 episodes) Pumpkin Patch ( episodes narị ise), Kideo ( Ihe omume Otu puku) Mina Moo en Kie ( Otu narị na iri ịse episodes), Zap Mag na Prọfesọ
Fossilus en die Dinosourusse (ngalaba 26) n'etiti ndị ọzọ
O mepụtara ihe omume 4000 n'asụsụ asaa ma dị ka ọtụtụ ndị siri kwuo, ikekwe kere ndị kacha agwa n'ụwa
O mekwara, duzie ma mepụta mmemme na Zulu, Xhosa, Sotho, Pedi, na Tswana
Louise Smit duziri akụkụ mbụ nke ịrị abụọ na isii nke Liewe Heksie, nke Verna Vels kere
N'afọ 1980 Smit hiwere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Louise Smit Productions wee wuo ụlọ ihe onyonyo nke ya, Kinnor Studios na Johannesburg
Ọ rere ya na Red Pepper Productions n'afọ́ 1998
O nwere nwa nwanyị ma bi ugbu a na Cologne, Germany
Louise Smit bụ onye edemede a ma ama ma bipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ịrị abụọ na ịse
Ha gụnyere
Louise Smit nwetara otuto mba na mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya
Onyinye Artes asaa maka mmemme akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma na mmemme ụmụaka, SABC
Abụọ Star Tonight Awards maka Liewe Heksie (dị ka onye nduzi) na usoro na Tswana Kabarete ya Poone (Cabaret nke Mielies (Ọka))
Unima Award maka onyinye kacha mma maka nwa nkịta na South Africa
M-Net Award maka mmemme ụmụaka Eko-Boffins
Tokio International Television Prize (Japan Prize) maka Kideo - mmemme kacha ọhụrụ, 1995
ihe ọzọATKV Woordveertjie maka Bennie Boekwurm se Tonnelhuisie - NB-Ndị mbipụta
South African Literary Award (SALA) maka ọrụ mmezu ndụ ya

ỌLounès Matoub (Kabyle ; Arabic ) (January 24, 1956 意 June 25, 1998) bụ onye Algeria Kabylian na-agụ egwú, na-ede uri, onye na-eche echiche nke kpaliri mgbanwe ọgụgụ isi, na onye na-egwu mandole bụ onye na-akwado ihe Berber, ikike mmadụ, na secularism na Algeria n'oge ndụ ya niile

Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Alakụba bi na Algeria kparịrị Matoub maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na-ekweghị na Chineke ya na nkwado agha ya maka ikike ndị Berber, n'ihi ya, ọ bụghị onye a ma ama n'etiti ndị agha abụọ ahụ na-alụ ọgụ n'oge Agha Obodo Algeria
Ogbugbu ya, nke Armed Islamic Group (GIA) kwuru, n'ọnọdụ ndị a na-amaghị ama, kpatara ọgba aghara na Kabylia
A mụrụ Lounes Matoub na 24 Jenụwarị 1956 n'obodo Taourirt Moussa na Kabylia Algeria
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ 9, o ji mmanụ ụgbọ ala efu wuo ụbọ akwara mbụ ya ma dee egwụ mbụ ya dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
Ọdịdị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị ya sitere na esemokwu agha n'etiti ndị Kabylians na ndị agha gọọmentị na 1963-1964
N'afọ 1968, gọọmentị Algeria webatara ịwụ nke Arabization na ụsoro agụmakwụkwọ
Matoub meghachiri site n'ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ; ihe ncheta ya na-echeta 'Anyị ga-ahapụ Berber ma jụ French
Anọ m ee e! Emere m hooky na klas Arabic m niile
Klas ọ bụla m hapụrụ bụ omume nke nguzogide, obere nnwere onwe meriri
Ọjụjụ m jụrụ bụ nke aka ya na nke ebumnụche
' Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1975, ọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ gara France ịchọ ọrụ
Matoub malitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya n'okpuru nkwado nke onye na-agụ egwu a ma ama bụ Idir
O dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya Ay Izem (The Lion) na 1978; ọ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma dị egwu
Ọ gara n'ihu na-edekọ abọm iri atọ na isii, yana ide egwu maka ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ
O nyere nnukwu egwu egwu mbụ ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1980, n'oge ngagharị iwe 'Berber Spring' na Kabylia

Egwú ya na-agwakọta Algeria Andalucian Chaabi orchestration na okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kabyle (Berber), ma na-ekpụchi isiokwu dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ihe kpatara Berber, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nnwere onwe, okpukpe, Islamism, ịhụnanya, ịgba ọsọ ndụ, ncheta, akụkọ ihe mere eme, udo na ikike mmadụ
N'adịghị ka ndị Berber na-ede uri / ndị na-agụ egwú bu ya ụzọ, ụdị Matoub bụ nke ihu na ihu na esemokwu
Onye egwu ibe ya bụ Mohamed Alileche na-echeta
N'agbanyeghị na a machibidoro ya na redio na telivishọn Algeria n'oge ndụ ya, Matoub ghọrọ, ma nọgide na-abụ, onye na-agụ egwu Kabylian a ma ama
N'oge ọgba aghara n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1988, onye ụwe ojii gbara Matoub égbè ugboro ise ma hapụ ya ka ọ nwụọ
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ afọ abụọ, na-achọ ịwa ahụ iri na asaa, gụnyere itinye scrotum aka mkpụmkpụ ụkwụ ya site na cm ise (20 in)
Abọm ya nke afọ 1989 L'Ironie du sort na-akọwa ogologo oge ọ gbakere
N'oge agha obodo, nke malitere na 1992, Islamist Armed Islamic Group gbakwunyere aha ya na ndepụta nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị nwere ọgụgụ isi
Matoub nọgidere na Algeria
Na 25 Septemba 1994, a tọọrọ ya
E jidere ya izu abụọ n'ugwu GIA ma maa ya ikpe ọnwụ
A tọhapụrụ ya mgbe nnukwu ngagharị iwe ọha na eze gasịrị ebe ndị na-akwado ya yiri egwu 'agha zuru oke' megide ndị Alakụba
Na ọwa jun 1998, n'ihe dị ka elekere 12 30 nke ehihie n'oge mpaghara, a kwụsịrị ụgbọala Matoub n'okporo ụzọ mgbe ọ na-akwọ ụgbọala n'okpọ ụzọ ugwu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Algeria (Kabylia)
Ndị na-agba égbè kpuchiri ihu gbagburu ụgbọala ahụ, gbuo Matoub ma merụọ nwunye ya, Nadia Matoub, na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ahụ
N'ime awa ole na ole, akụkọ banyere ogbugbu Matoub agbasaala na Kabylia niile na ọtụtụ puku ndị na-eru uju na-ewe iwe gbakọtara gburugburu ụlọ ọgwụ ebe e weere ozu ya
Ìgwè mmadụ ahụ tiri mkpu 'Pouvoir, Assassin' ('Government, Assasins')
Otu izu nke ọgba aghara sochiri ọnwụ ya
Ndị na-eto eto na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị uwe ojii na-eme ọgba aghara lụrụ ọgụ ma wakpo ihe onwunwe gọọmentị
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1998, ọtụtụ iri puku mmadụ gara olili ozu ya n'ihu ụlọ ya n'obodo ya
E liri ya n'etiti osisi fig na osisi cherry, n'ihu ụlọ a mụrụ ya
Ezinụlọ Matoub kụrụ egwu na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ nke ukwe mba Algeria, nke sitere na abọm ikpeazụ Matoub bụ Lettre ouverte aux
('Meghe akwụkwọ ozi na'), wepụtara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị (Gold-Disc)
Ogbugbu Matoub mere otu izu tupu iwu na-ewepu asụsụ ndị ọzọ na-abụghị Arabic na ndụ ọha na eze amalite
Matoub bụ onye na-akatọ iwu a n'ezoghị ọnụ
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1998, GIA kwuru na ọ bụ ya kpatara ogbugbu Matoub
N'ụbọchị ncheta mbụ nke ọnwụ ya, e mere ngagharị iwe n'obodo Kabylian nke Tizi-Ouzou na ọtụtụ puku mmadụ mere ngagharịiwe n'okporo ámá
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe banyere n'ụlọ ikpe obodo ahụ ma kwatuo ihe ikpe ziri ezi ya
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 20,000 mere ngagharị na Tizi-Ouzou iji mee emume ncheta nke atọ nke ogbugbu Matoub
Ezinụlọ ya emeela ntọala n'aha ya iji kwalite ncheta ya, mee ka ọnọdụ nke ogbugbu ya doo anya ma kwalite ụkpụrụ ọ gbachitere
A gụrụ okporo ámá abụọ na France aha Matoub, otu na Grenoble na otu na Lyon
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011, a mara ndị ikom abụọ, Malik Madjnoun na Abdelhakim Chenoui, ikpe maka igbu Matoub, ma maa ha ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri na abụọ
A kwụsịtụrụ ikpe otu ụbọchị ugboro abụọ mgbe ezinụlọ Matoub kwụsịrị iji kwado na ndị a na-enyo enyo enweghị ihe ha mere
Dị ka Madjnoun na Chenoui nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na-echere ikpe kemgbe 1999, a tọhapụrụ ha na 2012, ebe ha nọrọ n'oge ha
Matoub kwuru okwu na-akwado gọọmentị etiti, nke ụwa, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nnwere onwe ikwu okwu, nkwenye nke Berber dị ka asụsụ mba na nke gọọmentị, na ikerịta ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Algeria
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ọ bụ onye otu Rally for Culture and Democracy, otu ndị mmegide na Algeria, ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ n'oge ọnwụ ya

Lounis Aït Menguellet bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu amụrụ na Jenụwarị 17, 1950 na Ighil Bouammas, Tizi Ouzou Province na mpaghara Kabylie
Lounis Aït Menguellet na-abụ abụ n'asụsụ Berber (ụdị Kabyle) ma bụrụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ewu ewu na ndị na-agu egwu na-adọrọ mmasị nke egwu Kabyle nke oge a
Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri na onye na-agụ egwú nke ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke kabyle chọrọ maka mmata
Kabylie abụwo ebe ọtụtụ esemokwu kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ

Ọ bụ ezie na abụ Lounis na-ekwukarị banyere Kabylie na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na ahụhụ na nhụjuanya ya ugbu a, ọ na-eme ngwa ngwa ikwu na ọ bụghị onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nakwa na ọ naghị etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otú ọ dị, mmadụ ole na ole nwere ike ịgọnahụ mmetụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke abụ ya ma ọ bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha na mgbe ụfọdụ ozi na-akatọ akatọ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-akatọ ọrụ Lounis Aït Menguellet na-achọ ịhụ ya dị ka akụkụ abụọ dị iche iche na n'ihi na nke ahụ bụ echiche a nabatara n'ozuzu ya ọ ga-abụ nke a na-enye ebe a
A na-ahụ akụkụ nke mbụ dị ka nke na-elekwasị anya na mmepụta nke abụ ịhụnanya
A na-ekwukarị maka ịhụnanya furu efu
Abụ ndị ahụ na-adịkarị mkpụmkpụ karịa ka ọ na-emepụta taa
Egwú ndị a ma ama n'oge a bụ Thalt Ayam (Ụbọchị Atọ) na Tayri (Ịhụnanya)
Akụkụ nke abụọ nke ọrụ ya bụ abụ ndị dị ogologo

Ani-d Umghar (The Wise Man Has Spoken) bụ nke egwú dị mgbagwoju anya na ngosipụta ọma nke okwu na Kabyle, French na Arabic na nchịkọta dị mkpirikpi na Bekee
Lounis nke Yenna-d Umghar dị anya site na Lounis nke ọrụ mbụ nke siri ike ugbu a
Lounis nke Yenna-d Umghar nwere ike ịnweta ntị ndị Europe, n'otu oge ndị mba ọzọ na ndị maara
Ọ bụ n'ezie ọrụ mara mma, nke mere ka ọ dịkwuo irè ozugbo a ghọtara uri ahụ

Mgbe o gosipụtara Yenna-d Umghar na 16 Jenụwarị 2005 na Maison de la Culture, Tizi Ouzou, n'oge ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri ise na ise, o kwuru na onye na-ese ihe nwere ike ịdọrọ uche ndị mmadụ na ndụ ha ma rịọ akọ na uche ha
Ọ gbakwụnyere na ọ ka bụ ọrụ ma o weere onwe ya dị ka onye nwere ike iweta ngwọta maka nsogbu ndị ahụ
Abọm kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Tawriqt tacebhant - (The Blank Sheet) ma wepụta ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010

Aha ahụ akpatawo mkparịta ụka ụfọdụ na gburugburu Kabyle n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ka Kabyle ghọrọ asụsụ a na-ede ede ọzọ na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị okenye anaghị agụ ma dee Kabyle ọ bụ ezie na ha na-agụ ma na-ede na French
Abụ ahụ na-ekwu maka ọgụ nke ide uri ahụ na otu onye na-ede uri si chee ihu na mpempe akwụkwọ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, ọ na-atụ egwu na mkpali (nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ) agaghị ezute ya na ibe ahụ
N'ịbụ onye kwenyesiri ike na ọdịda, ọ na-apụ n'èzí ma hụ onwe ya na-eche banyere ọdịdị nke ọrụ ya ma ọ ghọtara na n'ezie ihe ọ chọrọ ikwu dị ebe ahụ, ọ ga-eme ya
Ọ laghachiri na peeji efu ma dee uri nke ọ hapụrụ dị ka ihe na-akpali onye ọ bụla ọzọ
Mgbe ọ bụla anyị malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ nke anyị hụrụ na ọ na-emenye egwu, uri ahụ ga-adị ebe ahụ dị ka ihe mkpali na nduzi

Ịhụnanya na-agụnye ọtụtụ ọnọdụ mmetụta uche na nke uche siri ike ma dị mma, site na omume ọma kachasị elu ma ọ bụ omume ọma, mmetụta ịhụnanya kachasị omimi, na obi ụtọ kachasị mfe
Ihe atụ nke ihe ndị a dị iche iche bụ na ịhụnanya nke nne dị iche na ịhụnanya nke di, nke dị iche na ịhụ nri n'anya
N'ozuzu, ịhụnanya na-ezo aka na mmetụta nke mmasị siri ike na njikọ mmetụta uche

A na-ewere ịhụnanya dị ka ihe dị mma na ihe na-adịghị mma, na omume ọma ya na-anọchite anya obiọma mmadụ, ọmịiko, na mmetụta ịhụnanya, dị ka 'nchegbu na-adịghị achọ ọdịmma nke onye ọzọ' na omume ọjọọ ya na-egosi adịghị mma nke mmadụ, dị ka efu, ịchọ ọdịmma onwe onye, ịhụnanya, na ịchọ ọdịmma, dị ka nke nwere ike iduga ndị mmadụ n'ụdị ara, nchekasị ma ọ bụ ịdabere na ibe ha
Ọ pụkwara ịkọwa omume ọmịiko na ịhụnanya n'ebe ụmụ mmadụ ndị ọzọ nọ, onwe onye, ma ọ bụ ụmụ anụmanụ nọ
N'ụdị ya dị iche iche, ịhụnanya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-eme ka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya dị mfe, n'ihi mkpa uche ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime isiokwu ndị a na-ahụkarị na nka okike
A na-ekwu na ịhụnanya bụ ọrụ na-eme ka ụmụ mmadụ dị n'otu megide egwu na iji mee ka ọ dịrị ụdị ahụ mfe ịga n'ihu

Ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris oge ochie chọpụtara ụdị ịhụnanya isii n'ụzọ bụ́ isi, ịhụnanya ezinụlọ (na Grik, Storge), ịhụnanya enyi ma ọ bụ ịhụnanya platonic (Philia), ịhụnanya ịhụnanya (Eros), ịhụ onwe onye (Philautia), ịhụnanya ndị ọbịa (Xenia), na Chineke
ma ọ bụ ịhụnanya na-enweghị atụ (Agape)
Ndị na-ede akwụkwọ n'oge a akọwapụtala ụdị ịhụnanya ndị ọzọ ịhụnanya na-enweghị isi, ịhụnanya efu, ịhụnanya enyi, ịhụnanya zuru oke, ịhụnanya ịhụnanya, ịhụnanya onwe onye, ​​na ịhụnanya nke ụlọ
