Loyce Biira Bwambale bụbu onye otu Pan-African Parliament si Uganda
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka mmekọahụ site na afọ 1992 ruo na afọ 1994 na onye otu National Assembly of Uganda site na afọ 1996 ruo na afọ 2001

Ọ bụ onye na-anọchite anya praịm minista maka alaeze Rwenzururu na onye omeiwu maka Kasese District site na afọ 1989 ruo na afọ 2006 tupu ọ sonye n'alaeze Rwenzovuru dị ka osote praịm Minista mbụ na afo 2010
A mụrụ Loyce Biira Bwambale na Kasese District na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda na afọ 1952
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Bwera Primary School, na Bwera n'afọ 1967
N'afọ 1968 ruo na afọ 1971, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Kyebambe site na S1 ruo S4
Site na afọ 1972 ruo na afọ 1974, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka S5 na S6 na Nabumali High School
Site na afọ 1974 ruo na afọ 1977, ọ gara Mahadum Makerere, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya, BSC [Botany & Zoology] (Hon) na Diploma na Education (nke mbụ)

Lozi, nke a makwaara dị ka siLozi na Rozi, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Niger Congo n'ime alaka Sothooooo Tswana nke mpaghara S (S30), nke ndị Lozi na-asụ, karịsịa na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Zambia na mba ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Asụsụ a nwere njikọ chiri anya na Northern Sotho (Sesotho sa Leboa), Tswana (Setswana), Kgalagari (SheKgalagari) na Sotho ( Sesotho / Southern Sotho)
Lozi, mgbe ụfọdụ edere dị ka Rotse, na asụsụ ya na-asụ ma ghọta ya site na ihe dịka pasent isii nke ndị bi na Zambia
Silozi bụ endonym (aha asụsụ nke ndị na-asụ ya) dịka United Nations si kọwaa ya
Lozi bụ exonym
Asụsụ Lozi malitere site na ngwakọta nke asụsụ abụọ Luyana na Kololo
Ndị Luyana si n'alaeze Luba na ala eze Lunda kwaga na ndịda na mpaghara Katanga nke oke osimiri Congo, na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 17 ma ọ bụ mmalite narị afọ nke 18
Ya mere, asụsụ ha na-asụ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Luba na Lunda
Ha biri na mmiri mmiri nke Zambezi elu nke dị ugbu a n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Zambia wee mepụta alaeze, Barotseland, ma nyekwa aha ha Barotse Floodplain ma ọ bụ Bulozi

Luísa Dias Diogo (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mozambik nke jere ozi dị ka praịm minista nke Mozambique site n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2004 ruo Jenụwarị n'afọ 2010
Ọ nọchiri Pascoal Mocumbi, onye bụ praịm minista afọ itoolu gara aga
Tupu ọ bụrụ praịm minista, ọ bụ minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ na ego, ọ nọgidekwara na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2005
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ praịm minista nke Mozambique
Diogo na-anọchite anya otu FRELIMO, nke na-achịkwa mba ahụ kemgbe nnwere onwe na 1975
Diogo gụrụ akụ na ụba na Mahadum Eduardo Mondlane na Maputo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ n'afọ 1983
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere masta na akụ na ụba ego na School of Oriental and African Studies, Mahadum London na afọ 1992
Diogo malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Finance nke Mozambique na afọ 1980 mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ kọleji
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ngalaba na afọ 1986 na onye nduzi mmefu ego mba na afọ 1989
Ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na World Bank, dị ka onye ọrụ mmemme na Mozambique
N'afọ 1994, ọ sonyeere gọọmentị FRELIMO dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ego n'okpuru onye isi ala Mozambik Joaquim Chissano

N'afọ 2003, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations Kofi Annan họpụtara Diogo na United Nations Commission on the Private Sector and Development, nke Praịm Minista Paul Martin nke Canada na Onye isi ala Ernesto Zedillo nke Mexico so bụrụ onye isi oche
A họpụtara Diogo ka ọ bụrụ praịm minista na Febụwarị, na afọ 2004, na-anọchi Pascoal Mocumbi
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọkwa ya dị ka minista ego ruo n'afọ 2005
Na Septemba afọ 2005, Diogo bụ onye ọbịa mba ụwa na-ekwu okwu na British Labour Party Conference

N'afọ 2006, Annan họpụtara Diogo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche ya na Shaukat Aziz na Jens Stoltenberg bụ ndị otu dị elu na United Nations Systemwide Coherence, nke e guzobere iji chọpụta otú usoro United Nations ga-esi rụọ ọrụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi ma dị irè n'ofe ụwa na mpaghara mmepe, enyemaka enyemaka enyemaka na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Commission on Effective Development Cooperation with Africa nke Praịm Minista Anders Fogh Rasmussen nke Denmark guzobere ma nwee nzukọ n'etiti Eprel na Ọktoba, na afọ 2008
Mgbe akụkọ na ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-ajụ ịhapụ anụ ụlọ ha n'ógbè ndị idei mmiri Mozambican nke afọ 2007 na-eyi egwu, Diogo nyere iwu ka a chụpụ ụmụ amaala n'ebe dị ala nke ndagwurugwu Zambezi
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, Diogo gbara ndị minista ahụike Afrịka ume ka ha nye ọrụ ahụike ọmụmụ na mmekọahụ n'efu na kọntinent ahụ dum
Ọrụ ndị a nwere ike belata ọnwụ ụmụaka site na ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ, belata ọnwụ nne site na ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ, gbanwee mgbasa nke ọrịa AIDS, ma kwalite nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Ebumnuche UN setịpụrụ bụ iji mezuo ebumnuche ndị a site na afọ 2015
Diogo lekwasịrị anya na nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike site na 'Network of Women Ministers and Parliamentarians' (MUNIPA) nke e wepụtara na nso nso a
Netwọk MUNIPA na-ezube ime ka ọrụ nkwado na lobbying sie ike ka a nabata iwu na iwu na-akwado ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Ịkwalite ịha nhata n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị bụ nchegbu dị mkpa nke gọọmentị Mozambik, nke na-eji ngwá ọrụ iji kwalite ike ụmụ nwanyị na ọkwa niile [nke gọọmentị]

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN Ban Ki-moon họpụtara Diogo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ukwu na Global Sustainability, nke ndị isi ala Tarja Halonen nke Finland na Jacob Zuma nke South Africa so bụrụ onye isi
N'afọ 2014, Diogo bịara nke abụọ na Filipe Nyusi na ntuli aka FRELIMO[[s maka onye na-azọ ọkwa na ntuliaka n'afọ ahụ
N'oge ahụ, otu pati nke Chissano duziri kwadoro ya
N'afọ 2016, Erik Solheim, onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Enyemaka Mmepe, họpụtara Diogo ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Nkwado dị elu na Ọdịnihu nke Kọmiti Enyemaka Mmepụta n'okpuru nduzi nke Mary Robinson
N'akwụkwọ afọ 2010 na The New York Times, onye egwu Irish na onye na-eme ihe ike Bono kọwara Diogo dị ka onye nwere 'ike ọdụm nke Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala ma ọ bụ Graça Machel'
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1720 nye Abonyo Wuod Omolo na nne ya Nyabera
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe a mụrụ ya n'ihi ya' nne nne ya Rapondi lekọtara ya
Nna ya nwụrụ n'otu n'ime ọtụtụ agha ya na ndị agbata obi ha Nandi mgbe Magere bụ onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
Ọ bụ onye ezinụlọ Sidho na Kano, n'ikperé mmiri nke Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria
Ezinụlọ Sidho bi na belt shuga dị ugbu a n'okpuru ugwu Nandi
O nwere mmụọ na-abụghị nke ụwa, e jikwa nkume mee anụ ahụ ya
Akụ́, ube na mkpara adịghị aba ya na ahụ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye a na-apụghị imeri emeri n'oge agha
A maara ya nke ọma maka ikike ya ịdọwa ndị agha niile naanị ya
Ndị iro ọdịnala Luo n'oge ahụ bụ jo Lang'o (aha Luo maka obodo Kalenjin)
Ike gwụrụ ndị Lang'o n'ihi mmeri ndị Luo meriri ha n'agha
Ndị okenye Nandi nọdụrụ iji kwurịta okwu ahụ wee ruo nkwubi okwu ebe ha ga-enye Luanda Magere nwanyị Maryann ka ọ lụọ, na-ekwu na ọ bụ ngosipụta nke udo
Ọrụ Maryann bụ ịchọpụta otu esi emeri ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị okenye Luo dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ ghara ịlụ ya, Luanda Magere agbasoghị ndụmọdụ ha
Mgbe ọ bụla Luanda na-arịa ọrịa, nwunye mbụ ya ga-elekọta ya
Otu ụbọchị ọ dara ọrịa mgbe nwunye mbụ ya pụrụ apụ
Ya mere, ọ kpọrọ nwunye Lang'o ya ka o wetara ya ọgwụ
Luanda nyere ya iwu ka o jiri mma bepụ onyinyo ya ma tinye ọgwụ ahụ
O juru ya anya mgbe ọ hụrụ onyinyo ya na-agba ọbara
N'abalị ahụ, ọ gbapụrụ n'ụlọ Lwanda wee laghachi n'ụlọ ndị ya ma gwa ha adịghị ike di ya
Ha wee wakpo ndị Luo
Ndị Luo lụrụ ọgụ siri ike ma Luanda gburu ọtụtụ ndị agha Nandi nke mere na ha kpebiri ịlaghachi
Ka ha na-agba ọsọ, otu onye agha Nandi chetara na ike Luanda dị na onyinyo ya
O guzoro n'elu ugwu wee tụba ube ya na onyinyo Luanda
Luanda Magere dara ma nwụọ
Ahụ ya ghọrọ nkume
Anthropology sitere na Gabriel Mboche Obute (nwa nke ala; site na Kano Kobura, West Kochieng,, Migingo obodo)

A ka na-asọpụrụ otu ebe dị na Sidho nke nwere nkume dịka ebe Luanda Magere nwụrụ na ndị mmadụ na ya si ebe ndị dị anya na ebe niile iji chụọ aja ma kpee ekpere na ebe ahụA ka na-eme emume Luanda Magere n'etiti ndị Luo site na abụ na ịgba egwu
Lubandji Ochumba Oseke (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Zambia
O sonyere Zambia na afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu otu egwuregwu
Lubila, ma ọ bu Kabila, bụ asụsụ Upper Cross River nke Naijiria
Àtụ Cross River languages
Lucas Fotsing Takou (amụrụ n'afọ 1980), nke a maara dị ka LucFosther Diop, bụ onye Cameroon na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, a maara ya nke ọma maka eserese ya, collages, arụmọrụ na ihe nkiri na-enyocha mmetụta na-aga n'ihu nke ọdịda anyanwụ neocolonialism na imperialism n'ime ọnọdụ nke oge a nke ụwa
A mụrụ LucFosther Diop na 1980 na Douala

Mgbe ọ dị obere na-enwe mmekọrịta siri ike karịsịa ya na nna ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, o si n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ya dị na Douala kwaga n'ụlọ nwanne nna ya nọ na Bafoussam (mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cameroon) ebe o nwetara diplọma ya nke sekọndrị na 2000
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara mụọ nka na Yaoundé ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na Mahadum Yaounde 1 na 2003
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị onyinye site na Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs na 2009, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ abụọ na Rijksakademie van beeldende kunsten na Amsterdam, Netherlands

Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na-erite uru site na onyinye obibi na ArtBakery (Bonendale, Douala, Cameroon) na 2003, na MTN Cameroon Foundation (Douala) na 2007 na nyocha nka dijitalụ na mmepụta Unesco-Aschberg award maka French Africa na 2013

Diop gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'oge 3rd OK Video International Festival, National Gallery of Indonesia na Jakarta (2007), World One Minute Video, Today Art Museum na Beijing (2008), 2nd Thessaloniki Biennial (2009), International Symposium on Electronic Arts (ISEA) 2010, PHotoEspaña (2011), Havana biennial (2012) na 18th International Contemporary Art Festival SESC_Videobrasil, 2013
LucFosther Diop malitere ime eserese na oghere nke akwụkwọ ya n'efu na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ
Ọnọdụ ezinụlọ ya siri ike na-etolite n'ime ya àgwà ịnọ naanị ya siri ike
Ọ naghị enwe mmetụta nke igwu egwu dị ka ụmụaka ndị ọzọ ma na-etinye oge ya n'ịgbalị imepụtagharị ihe oyiyi ndị dị gburugburu
Mgbe o nwetasịrị nkwado ego nke onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na 1993, ọ zụtara agba, brushes na ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ maka ndị mbido
Mgbe ahụ malite ime eserese, ifuru na odida obodo n'ụzọ ezi uche dị na ya
LucFosther nọchitere anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na mahadum ọtụtụ oge na asọmpi nka n'etiti 1995 na 2003
Ọ malitere n'ezie ịbịakwute ngwá ọrụ ihe nkiri
na ArtBakery ebe ọ mụtara ọtụtụ ihe banyere nka nke oge a wee malite ịzụlite usoro ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe

Taa, na-akwado echiche uri, LucFosther Diop na-emepe ọrụ nyocha banyere ọchịchị na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọdịbendị, akụkọ ihe mere eme, mpaghara, akụ na ụba na obodo mepere emepe

Nnyocha a dabere na nnwale dijitalụ na mgbasa ozi site na foto, collage, eserese, vidiyo, ntinye aka na-adịghị adịte aka, arụmọrụ vidiyo, akwụkwọ emegharị na faịlụ ndị a hụrụ na weebụ na ntụgharị nke ihe ọdịnaya ha pụtara

Ọ na-akpọ ọrụ ndị a 'virtual made' ma ọ bụ 'neo ready made' ma nwee obi ụtọ n'ezie na ọrụ Marcel Duchamp, Alfredo Jaar, Olga Kisseleva, William Kentridge, Mona Hatoum, Pascal Kenfack, Goddy Leye, Bob Marley, Fela Kuti, Youssou Ndour na Richard Bona
LucFosther Diop bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na ihe nkiri 'OF AMSTERDAM' nke Catarina Neves Ricci duziri n'afọ 2012
Lucas nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Lucas Kimeli Rotich (amụrụ na 16 Eprel na afọ 1990), Kapsoiyo Village, Elgeyo Marakwet County bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke maara nke ọma na mita 5000

O meriri nrite ọlaọcha na mita 3000 na 2007 World Youth Championships, ọla nchara na asọmupi ụmụaka na 2008 World Cross Country Championships ma mechie nke isii na mita 5000 na 2009 World Athletics Final
Ọ gbara ọsọ na asọmupi ụmụ nwoke na 2010 World Cross Country Championships, mana ọ gwụchara asọmupi ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na abụọ na mmerụ ahụ
Mgbe ọ gbakere, o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke onwe ya karịa 3000 m, 5000 m na 10,000 m na circuit Europe
O meriri na Tuskys Cross Country na Nọvemba na afọ 2010 ma lekwasị anya n'ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma na 2011 World Cross Country Championships
O nwere akara atọ kachasị elu na Cross Internacional Zornotza na Jenụwarị
O rughị eru maka ihe omume ụwa ma gbanwee uche ya na ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ, mezue ọkara marathon mbụ na City-Pier-City Loop na oge nke 59 44 nkeji maka ebe nke ise
Ọ gara United States wee mechie n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Beach to Beacon 10K na oge nke 27 56 nkeji
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2011 nke Falmouth Road Race ma mechie dị ka onye nke abụọ na Portugal Half Marathon na Septemba
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Lisbon Half Marathon (ọsọ ọzọ dị mkpa n'obodo ahụ) na Machị wee ruo nke atọ na podium

Oge kachasị mma ya bụ nkeji 3 4364 na mita 1,500, nke o nwetara na Mee 2008 na Rehlingen; nkeji 7 3557 na mita 3000, nke o mere na Mee 2011 na Doha; nkeji 12 5506 na mita 5000 site na 2010 Bislett Games; na nkeji 26 4398 na mita 10,000, nke o ruru na Septemba 2011 na nzukọ Brussels Diamond League
Lucas Sithole (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke irí atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1986) bụ onye South Africa na-egwu tenis
Ọ na-egwuri egwu na ngalaba Quad nke egwuregwu ahụ
Sithole bụ US Open wheelchair tennis quad champion n'afọ 2013
O ritekwara Australian Open Grand Slam nke afọ 2016 na okpukpu abụọ, ya na David Wagner
N'ihi na ọ na-efu ọtụtụ ule mgbochi ọgwụ ọjọọ, a kwụsịrị Sithole asọmpi n'etiti ụbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Septemba 2019 na ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2021
Lucas Sithole malitere ịsọ mpi n'ihe omume tenis oche nkwagharị mba ụwa n'afọ 2006
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, o meriri na British Open wheelchair tennis tournament (Super Series) na Nottingham, Great Britain
N'afọ 2013, Sithole meriri US Open Grand Slam
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gbara megide World No 1 David Wagner, ma merie 3–6, 6–4, 6–4
N'afọ 2017 UNIQLO Wheelchair Doubles Masters, Lucas Sithole na Heath Davidson mechara n'ọkwa nke atọ
Sithole bụ onye egwuregwu Afrịka izizi meriri Super Series Event ma ọ bụ Grand Slam
N'afọ 2018, Sithole bụ onye na-esote Dylan Alcott na ihe omume mbụ nke ụmụ nwoke abụọ n'oge 2018 Wimbledon Championship
Sithole bụ onye KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ ghọrọ onye e gbupụrụ ụkwụ ugboro atọ n'afọ 1998 màkà ihe mberede ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Luchy Donalds (amụrụ 1991) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa nke gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
na ndostriri ihe nkiri nke Nigeria
A mụrụ ya na Mee 28, 1991, na Emi Owerri, isi obodo Imo steeti
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ Maazị na Oriakụ Donald Nwocha
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị na nke mbụ n'ime ụmụaka atọ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ ụmụ nwoke
N'ihi myirịta ha, ndị na-akwado ya kọwara Luchy Donalds dịka nwanne nwanyị onye omee Ghana Jackie Appiah a mụrụ na Canada
Luchy Donalds gara Mount Camel Premier School maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara mahadum Tansian, Umunya, Anambra Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na microbiology
Luchy Donalds sonyeere Nollywood na 2006 wee gosipụta na fim dị iche iche
Na -esote, ya na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood mere ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ndostri ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ulọ ọrụ Univasal Services bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nnọchi anya ya na Luchy Donalds na Mee 17, 2021
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ika mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ a
Lucian Wiina Msamati (a mụrụ na 5 Machị 1976) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain na TanzaniaỌ natara ọtụtụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ Prince Edwards dị na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ọ rụrụ Salladhor Saan na usoro HBO Game of Thrones ma bụrụ onye isi ojii mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme Iago na mmepụta afọ 2015 nke Othello nke Royal Shakespeare Company
A mụrụ Msamati na London ma zụlite ya na Zimbabwe site n'aka nne na nna ya bụ ndị Tanzania, dọkịta na onye nọọsụ; ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụnne anọ
Agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya malitere na Olympio Primary School na Dar-es-Salaam, Tanzania, wee gaa n'ihu na Avondale Primary School dị na Harare, Zimbabwe
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Prince Edward School na Harare, ọ gụrụ maka nzere BA na French na Portuguese na Mahadum Zimbabwe site n'afọ 1995 ruo 1997
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ụbọchị dịka onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio n'onwe ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye na-ese okwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ekwu okwu mgbe nri abalị gasịrị

N'afọ 1994, Msamati na ndị enyi ụlọ akwụkwọ Shaheen Jassat (nwụrụ anwụ), Craig na Gavin Peter, Kevin Hanssen, Roy Chizivano, Sarah Norman guzobere ihe ga-aghọ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Zimbabwe a ma ama na Harare, mgbe e mesịrị, Erica Glyn-Jones, Zane E
Lucas, Chipo Chung, Karin Alexander, Rob Hollands na Michael Pearce sonyeere
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mere emume ncheta afọ 10 ya n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2004, ebe ọ na-efefe ọkọlọtọ Zimbabwe gafee Europe, United States na South Africa
Afọ ole na ole gara aga ahụla ndị otu n'otu na-achụso ọdịmma ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na a naghị agbasa ya n'ụzọ iwu, ọ nweghị atụmatụ ozugbo maka nnọkọ Over the Edge
Site n'afọ 1998 ruo 2001, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rụrụ ọrụ na Edinburgh Festival Fringe na Edinburgh, Scotland; Msamati dere ụfọdụ egwuregwu
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010, a họpụtara Msamati ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nka nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri British-African Tiata Fahodzi, ruo mgbe Natalie Ibu nọchiri ya n'afọ 2014
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Tiata Fahodzi, na-eduzi Boi Boi is Dead n'ọnwa February na March 2015
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2015, Msamati ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri Iago na mmepụta nke Royal Shakespeare Company nke Othello (ya na Hugh Quarshie na ọrụ aha)

Site n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016 ruo n'ọnwa Maachị 2017 nakwa site n'ọnwụrụ Febụwarị ruo n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwe Eprel 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Antonio Salieri na egwuregwu Peter Shaffer bụ Amadeus na National Theatre, ihe Michael Billington, na nyocha kpakpando anọ maka The Guardian, kọwara dịka 'dị mma'
N'afọ 2019 ọ pụtara dịka Sam na Master Harold and the Boys na Royal National Theatre
Msamati apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na London, UK, gụnyere
Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn, gụnyere ihe omume nke usoro telivisheneng Ultimate Force na Spooks
1 Ladies' Detective Agency
Msamati pụtara na ihe nkiri The International (2009)
Msamati kwagara na UK n'afọ 2003, ma ugbu a ọ bi na London
Lucie Memba Bos (a mụrụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ onye gosipụtara na usoro na ihe nkiri na asụsụ French na Bekee
A na-asọpụrụ ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Cinema nke Cameroon maka onye na na-eme egwuregwu na-asụ French na Cameroon Movies Merit Award (CMMA) nke afọ 2013
O mere nke mbụ ya na ndị Nollywood na ihe nkiri Pink Poison nke gosipụtara Jim Iyke na Far na-eme ihe nkiri n'akụkụ onye Naijiria Dakore Akande
N'afọ 2014 ọ malitere mmepụta LMB site na aha ya [Lucie Memba Bos]N'ịmepụta ihe nkiri Cameroon Paradise, ka na-eme n'afọ 2014
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na La patrie dabord, ihe nkiri agha mbụ iji kwanyere ndị agha Cameroon n'okpuru mmepụta ya ùgwù
Na Septemba, 2017 a họpụtara ya dịka onye Cameroon nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka TROPHEES FRANCOPHONES DU CINEMA na ihe nkiri La Patrie D'abord

A mụrụ Lucie na Dschang West Region (Cameroon) ma too na Bafoussam ebe ọ malitere ime ihe ngosi ma gbanwee gaa n'ime ihe nkiri, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara ugo mmụta na Baccalauréat philosophique, ọ kwagara Douala maka ohere ndị ọzọ
Enweghị ozi gbasara ezigbo ụbọchị a mụrụ ya, ụfọdụ akwụkwọ na-ekwu; a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1987

Lucie pụtara na mbụ na 'Emoin A Seduire' n'afọ 1999 mgbe Cinema nke Cameroon ka na-emepe emepeỌ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2008 wee merie Cameroon Movies Merit Award (CMMA) dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na French n'afọ 2013, ọ malitere mmepụta nke ya Lucie Memba Bos (LMB)

Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Cameroon Paradise, a matara ọrụ ya dịka onye ndu na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ maka ihe nkiri La patrie d Xiaabord, ihe nkiri agha mbụ iji kwanyere ndị agha Cameroon ùgwù ma ka na-erule n'afọ 2014, ọ rụkọtara ọrụ 'Ntah Napi' nke meriri ihe nrite Ecrans Noirs n'afọ 2014 maka ihe nkiri French kacha mma Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Cameroonian nke ụlọ ọrụ ya mara mma, ọ so na ndị na ndị na-ahụ maka ịmekọrịta ihe nkiri Ama Munaison n'afọ 2013

N'afọ 2016, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Cameroonian a ma ama Le Film Camerounais Lucie matara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma, a makwaara ya maka ihe nkiri Fast Life na onye na-ese ihe nkiri French Thomas Nguijol
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na (Tribe Africa Media) iji kwado ma gosipụta ịhụnanya maka Albinism na Cameroon dịka ncheta nke ememe ụbọchị World Albino
Na Septemba 2017, Lucie zutere Samuel Eto'o na Douala
Lucienne Claudine Berthieu-Poiraud (amuru March 31, 1978 na Douala) bu onye egwuregwu basketball nke French-Cameroonian
Ọ gbara na WNBA na United States site na 2002 – 2004 ya na Cleveland Rockers na Houston Comets
N'ime egwuregwu 43, ọ nwetara isi 3 na nkwụghachi 17 kwa egwuregwu
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Old Dominion yana ya na France na mba ụwa
Ọ bi na Rennes
Àtụ 2002 WNBA Draft
Lucina Hagman (5 June 1853, Kälviä ń 6 September 1946) bụ onye Finland na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri n'ụwa n'ihi ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Finland nke 1907
Hagman bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi ndị uwe ojii Nils Johan Erik Hagman na Margareta Sofia Nordman, onye isi ndị Uwe Ojii n'ime ime obodo Kälviä
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị onye nkuzi Sofia Hagman na onye edemede Tycho Hagman
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Jean Sibelius nwere ike ịbụ ndị a ma ama na-amụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-eje ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu site n'afọ 1907 ruo afọ 1917
N'ime ndị omeiwu 200 a họpụtara n'afọ 1907 naanị 19 bụ ụmụ nwanyị

Ụmụ nwanyị ndị nwere ihe ịga nke ọma gụnyere Hagman, Miina Sillanpää, Anni Huotari, Hilja Pärssinen, Hedvig Gebhard, Ida Aalle, Mimmi Kanervo, Eveliina Ala-Kulju, Hilda Käkikoski, Liisi Kivioja, Sandra Lehtinen, Dagmar Neovius, Maria Raunio, Alexandra Gripenberg, Iida Vemmelpuu, Maria Laine, Jenny Nuotio na Hilma Räsänen
Lucina Hagman guzobekwara òtù Martha, jere ozi dị ka onyeisi oche mbụ nke Unioni, The League of Finnish Feminists, ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na udo
O dekwara akụkọ ndụ Fredrika Bremer
Lucinda Toomer (February 5, 1888 na September 1, 1983) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na omenala ndị Africa na America nke ime akwa
A maara akwa ya màkà ihe ha siri ike, ụda ányá, na ụdị improvisational
Ha nọ n'ihu nke mmụba nke mmata mba màkà ụdị nka n'oge afọ 1990
A mụrụ Lucinda Toomer Lucinda Hodrick na Stewart County, Georgia
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asaá Orange na Sophie Stokes Hodrick mụrụ, bụ ndị na-ebi ndụ dị ka ndị ọrụ ugbo ogho na ahụekere
Ọ lụrụ Jim Toomer na 1908, wee soro ya kwaga n'ugbo dị nso na Dawson, Georgia
Toomer malitere ịkpa ákwà mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, n'okpuru nkuzi nne ya
A na-arụ ọrụ ahụ n'ihi mkpa, n'ime mmụọ nke akụ na ụba na iji ya eme ihe ọzọ, mana Toomer chọpụtakwara ngosipụta nka ogologo ógè na akwa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na akwa ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kwa ụbọchị, na-emecha ihe dị ka 20 kwa afọ, ma nwee usoro nhazi na ịkpụpụta iberibe n'ụtụtụ ma na-ekpuchi ha ọnụ n'abalị
Iji jikọta elu akwa, o jiri ihe ndị si n'ihe owuwu nke ya yana ákwà zụrụ n'ụba site na ụlọ ọrụ akwa dị nso
Toomer's quiltmaking bịara n'uche mbà mgbè e gosipụtara ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme akwa, gụnyere Martha Jane Pettway na Sarah Mary Taylor, na ihe ngosi njem 1983 'Ten Afro-American Quiltmakers,' nke Dr
Maude Southwell Wahlman haziri
A na-edebe akwa ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka, gụnyere Museum of International Folk Art na Santa Fe, New Mexico
Abụọ n'ime akwa ya dị na nchịkọta nké American Folk Art Museum na New York
Otu n'ime ndị a, Diamond Strip Quilt (zụrụ na 1990) bụ ihe mbụ nwetara màkà nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka
Lucinda Toomer natara 1983 National Heritage Fellowship site na National Endowment for the Arts
Lucki Camel Jr
(amụrụ na Mee 30, 1996), nke a maara dịka Lucki (nke a maara dị ka Lucki Eck$ na Luc), bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Chicago, Illinois
Ọ bịara n'ihu ọha n'afọ 2013, mgbè ọ natara nkwado màkà ọrụ izizi ya, Alternative Trap
Lucki na ndị egwu ama ama na-arụ ọrụ kemgbe ahụ, na-ewepụta egwu na Chance the Rapper, FKA Twigs, Danny Brown, Earl Sweatshirt, na Lil Yachty
Ọ bịanyere aka ugbu a na akara ndekọ Empire
Lucki tolitere na West Side nke Chicago, Illinois ma gee Lil Wayne, Prince, na The Notorious BIG
ntị na-etolite; ọ na-ekwu Chief Keef, Future, na BabyFace Ray dị ka ụfọdụ n'ime ihe mkpali ya ugbu a
Lucki malitere ịgba egwu rap n'afọ mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ezigbo ndị enyi ya toro ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii iji chụsoo egwu oge niile
Ọkpụkpọ egwu mbụ nke Lucki na vidiyo egwu 'Untouchable Lucki' bụ nke blog egwu ELEVATOR mepụtara ma gosipụta
Egwú Lucki bu ụzọ wetara ónyé guzobere ELEVATOR Bryan Zawlocki n'aka ndị enyi Lucki bụ Antoinne Bryant na Kevin Wright Jr, bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ màkà ELEVATOL n'oge ahụ
ELEVATOR mechara mepụta vidiyo egwu abụọ mbụ nke Lucki 'Untouchable' na 'Everything Outside', nke Bryan Zawlocki duziri, ya na Antoinne Bryant na Kevin Wright Jr
Lucky Eluonye Onyenuchea Irabor (amuru n'abali ise n'ọnwa Oktoba, afo 1965) bu onye Ọchiagha ndi agha nke obodo Naijiria na onye isi ndi nchekwa nke ndi ọrụ nchekwa Naijiria n’oge a
Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya n'abali iri abụọ n'isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, afo 2021
A mụrụ Irabor n'abali ise nke ọnwa Oktoba afo 1965 na Aliokpu Agbor, Ika South Local Government Area nke Delta Steeti, Naijiria

O nwetara nnabata na Nigerian Defence Academy (NDA) Kaduna dị ka onye otu nke 34 Regular Course n'afo 1983 e duru ya n'iyi ọrụ dika Onye Lieutenant nke abụọ n'abali iri abụọ na-asatọ n'ọnwa June afo 1986 na Signals Corps nke ndị agha Naijiria
Irabor gara ọzụzụ ndị agha na nke ndị obodo na ala naijiria ma ná mba ndị ọzọ

Ọ gara Ụlọ akwụkwọ Ọchịagha na ndị ọrụ agha, Jaji (AFCSC) maka ọmụmụ ihe ndị Ọrụagha Junior Staff ya na afo 1995 na Ghana Armed Forces Staff College, Teshi, Accra, Ghana maka Agụmakwụkwọ Ndị Ọrụagha Senior Staff n'afo 2000/2001 na ndị ọzọ
Ya onwe ya gakwara National Defence College di na Bangladesh n'afo 2010 ma gaakwa Harvard Kennedy Schools of Government and Executive Education, USA n'afo 2012 na 2017 n'otu n'otu
Irabor nwetara nzere bachelọ na nka na mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ma nwee nzere abụọ masters si na mahadum Ghana na Mahadum Bangladesh nke ndi okachamara nke di na Dhaka
Lucky Office (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa amaala mpaghara Hurungwe, Office malitere ịkpụ ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu mgbe ọ zutere Moses Masaya
Ndị ikom abụọ ahụ rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ ruo afọ abụọ tupu Office amalite n'onwe ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ya sitere na ahụmịhe ezinụlọ, ọkachasị ọdachi na mmetụta uche ọ na-enwe n'oge ọnọdụ siri ike
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ụlọ ngosi na Harare, kamakwa mba ụwa na mba ndị dị ka United States, UK, Netherlands, Belgium na Germany
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ 'Serious Thoughts', ihe ọkpụkpụ a kpụrụ akpụ nke nwere ihu dị sentimita iri ise site na sentimita itoolu
Lucrécia Paco (a mụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1969) bụ onye Mozambik na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na Mozambique
Paco tolitere na Maputo
Dịka nwatakịrị, ọ na-enwe mmasị ịbụ abụ na ịgba egwú na egwu ọdịnala, nke a na-egbochi nke ukwuu n'oge tupu nnwere onwe Mozambique n'afọ 1975
A kụrụ Paco ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka iji asụsụ ọdịnala
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, gọọmentị ndị Socialist gbara ndị otu nka ume, ọ sonyere site n'ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwu, na ịgụ abụ
N'oge Agha Obodo Mozambik, Paco tụgharịrị uche ya n'ihe nkiri dịka ụdị ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
E gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi 1984 Maputo Mulher N'afọ 1986, Paco bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere otu egwu Mutumbela Gogo, otu egwuregwu ihe nkiri mbụ na Mozambique nke ka na-aga n'ihu taa
Ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Soviet ọ na-ekiri nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ya, ma mepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere ihe ọ dịka ịbụ Mozambican
Iji kwado otu ihe nkiri ahụ, Paco na ndị otu ndị ọzọ guzobere ụlọ achịcha
Paco were ezumike afọ ise site n'ọkwa n'ihi ike ọgwụgwụ
Instituto Itaú Cultural kpọrọ Paco ka ọ gaa Brazil n'afọ 2009
O sonyere na ọrụ Antidote na International Seminar on Cultural Actions in Conflict Zones, na-eji egwuregwu Mulher Asfalto
N'afọ 2010, a tụbara Paco na ihe nkiri Quero Ser uma Estrela
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na Nineteens, telenovela mbụ nke Mozambique
Lucy bụ aha nwanyị Bekee e nyere aha sitere na Latin nwoke e nyere aha Lucius nke pụtara ìhè (amụrụ n'isi ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ n'ehihie, ikekwe na-egbu maramara, ma ọ bụ nke ìhè)
Ntụgharị asụsụ ọzọ bụ Luci, Luce, Lucie, Lucia na Luzia￼
Aha nna Lucy nke Bekee sitere na asụsụ Norman nke sitere na Latin wee nweta aha ebe na Normandy dabere na aha nwoke Latin Lucius
Ebufere ya na England ka Norman meriri na narị afọ nke 11 (leekwa De Lucy)

Lucy Akello bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda, onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Amuru District Women's Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
A họpụtara ya ka ọ laghachi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Amuru n'okpuru òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị FDC
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị mmegide Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka minista onyinyo maka ọrụ, okike na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A mụrụ Akello na 9 Ọktoba 1980, na mpaghara Lamogi, Amuru District, na Northern Region nke Uganda
Nna ya bụ John Obina, onye nkuzi na Mahadum Kyambogo
Akello gara Olwal Ocaja Primary School, mgbe e mesịrị ọ gara Lacor Primary School
Ọ gara Iganga Secondary School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya wee gaa Uganda Martyrs' Secondary School Namugongo, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ A-Level
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, na Kampala, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004, na Bachelor of Arts na Social Science
Ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 2011, ọ nwetara Master of Arts in Development studies, site na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs na Nkozi, Wakiso District
N'afọ 2005, Justice & Peace Commission (JPC) were ya n'ọrụ, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị n'ime Chọọchị Katọlik nke na-akwalite udo na ime udo na Northern Uganda nke agha mebiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ afọ iri, malite dị ka onye isi mmemme, mgbe ahụ dị ka onye njikwa mmemme na site na 2006 ruo 2014, dị ka onye nduzi
O lekwasịrị anya na ikike mmadụ, ikike ala, ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ụmụaka
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, Betty Bigombe, onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Amuru District Women gbara arụkwaghịm iji nweta nhọpụta na World Bank, na Washington, DC
A haziri ntuli aka pụrụ iche iji mejupụta oche ya na Disemba 2014
Akello, na-agba ọsọ na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị FDC na-emegide ya, meriri mmadụ asaa ndị ọzọ wee merie
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ nke ọma, ọzọ na tiketi FDC
O kwuru okwu ugboro iri atọ n'ime afọ mbụ nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri
Akello bụ nne lụrụ di
Lucy Blake bụ onye Amerika na-echekwa ihe, Onye isi oche nke Northern Sierra Partnership
Ọ bụ onye otu MacArthur Fellow nke afọ 2000
O guzobere Sierra Business Council ma merie Pat Brown Award
Blake na-arụ ọrụ maka Ngalaba Ike na ike na ihe ndị sitere n'okike
Àtụ Infobox sportsperson
Lucy Ogechukwu Ejike (amụrụ na ọnwa
16 Ọktoba nke afọ 1977) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na egwuregwu Paralympic isii na-esochi site na 2000 na Sydney ruo 2021 na Tokyo
Ọ nwetala ihe nrite na nke ọ bụla, ọla edo atọ, ọlaọcha abụọ na otu ọla kọpa
Ọ meriri nrite ọla ọcha ọzọ na Gold Coast 2018 Commonwealth egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị dị fechaa nke mmemme Para Powerlifting n'azụ onye ibe Esther Oyema
A mụrụ Ejike na Enugu, Nigeria, na afọr 1977
Ejike na-eji oche nkwagharị n'ihi ọrịa polio Ejike lụọla nwaanyị, mụọkwa ụmụ nwoke abụọ
O bi na steeti Enugwu ebe, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye nchịkwa egwuregwu
Ejike malitere ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-ebu ike obere oge tupu emee Paralympics Summer 2000 na Sydney, Australia
Na egwuregwu Sydney ọ gbara asọmpi na 44 Klas ịdị arọ nke kilogram na-ewere nrite ọla ọcha na mbuli 1025 kg, n'azụ Fatma Omar nke Egypt
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị na egwuregwu Athens, ka ọ na-asọ mpi n'otu klaasị ịdị arọ ahụ, ọ mebiri ndekọ ụwa nke Paralympic powerlifting ugboro abụọ n'ụzọ iji nweta nrite ọla edo na mbuli 1275 n'arọ
N'egwuregwu Beijing 2008, Ejike kwalitere otu klaasị arọ wee were ọla edo na 48 kg omume
Ọ jiri mbọ mbụ ya mebie ndekọ ụwa, wee bulie 125 n'arọ
Ọ gbajie ndekọ ahụ ọzọ site na mbuli nke abụọ nke 130 n'arọ, mana dara ada mgbe ọ na-agbalị ibuli 1375 kg na mgbalị nke atọ ya
Mgbe o nwesịrị mmeri na Beijing, Ejike kwuru na o nwere ebumnuche ibuli ibu ọzọ iji tọọ ndekọ ụwa ọhụrụ na klas nke atọ
Nke a butere ngosi ngosi na 2012 Summer Paralympics na London ya na onye mgba ya si Athens, na ugbu a 56 kg onye njide ndekọ ụwa, Fatma Omar
Ejike jiri ọtụ otu narị na iri atọ na ise bute ụzọ na agba nke mbụ kg mana ọ nweghị ike ime ka mbọ a ka mma, ebe Omar kwalitere ndekọ ya na Beijing site na mbuli ikpeazụ nke 142 n'arọ
N'agbanyeghị na ha emerieghị Omar, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ a bụ klas karịa ndị ọzọ, ma Ejike were ọlaọcha, 17 n'arọ n'elu ọla nchara Özlem Becerikli nke Turkey

Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị Ejike na Omar zutere nke ugboro atọ na Paralympic Games, mgbe gị abụọ banyere 2016 Games na Riomgbe London gachara, kọmitii Paralympic mba ụwa gbanwere ụdị ibu dị ike maka ma ndị nwoke ma ndị nwanyị, ha abụọ sokwa na asọmpi 61 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'arọ nkewa
N'afọ gara aga, Amalia Perez nke Mexico debere ndekọ ụwa na 61 n'arọ nke 133 kg n'arọ, nke Ejike jiri mbuli mbụ ya karịrị 135 n'arọ
Omar dara na 133 kg na mbuli elu mbụ ya, mana ọ gara nke ọma n'otu ịdị arọ ahụ na mbọ ya nke abụọ
Ejike jiri ebuli ya nke abụọ kwalite ọkwa ya, wee debe ndekọ ụwa nke abụọ ya n'ụbọchị ahụ site n'ịdị arọ 138 n'arọ
Omar zara ya site na mbuli ikpeazụ nke 140 kg, na-etinye Ejike n'ebe nrite ọlaọcha
Na mbọ ikpeazụ ya Ejike nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na ndekọ ụwa nke atọ ya n'ụbọchị ahụ, na nrite ọla edo mgbe ọ gbachara 142 n'arọ iji mee ka ọ nweta ihe nrite ọla edo ugboro atọ
Na mgbakwunye na ihe nrite ọla edo ya, Ejike nyekwara ugwu na Rio site n'ịbụ ndị obodo ya họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye na -ebu ọkọlọtọ na mmemme mmeghe
N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, ọ ga-anọrịrị n'ụlọ ma ọ kọwapụtara na nke a metụtara ikike ọzụzụ ya
O were ọla edo ọzọ na asọmpi ụwa na 2021 na Manchester ebe anabataghị ndị na-eme egwuregwu ka ha rie nri n'otu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ n'ihi mmachi ọrịa
A họpụtara Ejike ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Naijiria maka asọmpi Paralympics Summer Paralympic nke afọ 2020 na Tokyo bụ ebe o mere atụmatụ inweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite ọla edo na imebi ndekọ ụwa nke ya
Ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị dị kilogram 61 na asọmpi Summer Paralympics nke 2020 nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme ya na 2021 World Para Powerlifting Championship nke emere na Tbilisi, Georgia
Lucy Gilbert bụ onye America na-eme mmemme kọmputa na onye na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Atari, Inc
site na General Computer Corporation ma mepụta ngwanrọ eserese kọmputa maka Autographix
Gilbert gara MIT wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere abụọ
Thesis nke nna ya ukwu bụ maka kọmputa a na-ekesa site na iji Ada
General Computer Corporation (GCC) were Gilbert n'ọrụ ozugbo ọ gụsịrị kọleji n'afọ 1983
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na eserese kọmputa
A hapụrụ ya ka ọ gaa otu afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ma were ya n'ọrụ site na Autographix, ebe ọ gara n'ịsụgharị mkpụrụedemede, yana usoro ngosi buru ibu maka ọtụtụ ihuenyo
N'afọ 1986, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Autographix, Gilbert so dee akwụkwọ Limitations of Synchronous Communication with Static Process Structure in Languages for Distributed Computing
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha echiche nke asụsụ mmemme maka mmemme a na-ekesa, na-eji njikọta ụfọdụ nke ụkpụrụ nkwurịta okwu na usoro usoro
Ọ na-atụ aro iji ma ọ bụ nkwurịta okwu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ma ọ bụ usoro usoro kwụ otu ebe, mana ọ bụghị ha abụọ, iji melite nkwekọrịta
A chụrụ Gilbert n'ọrụ mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa ya nke abụọ, mana ọ laghachiri ọrụ na 2008 na ụlọ ọrụ imewe weebụ nke ya
Gilbert nwere ụmụ isii, ha niile na-arụ ọrụ ma ọ bụ na-agụ akwụkwọ na isiokwu ndị metụtara STEM

Lucy Jumeyi Ogbadu (amụrụ ya na 25 Septemba na-afo 1953) bụ onye Naijiria microbiologist ma jee ozi dị ka Director General / CEO nke National Biotechnology Development Agency (NABDA), ụlọ ọrụ nyocha n'okpuru Ministry of Science & Technology nke Naijiria ruo mgbe ọ gwụchara n'afọ 2018

Tupu ọ malite ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi nke NABDA na Nọvemba 2013, Ogbadu akụziwo na Alma mater ya Mahadum Ahmadu Bello di Na Zaria, ruo afọ iri abụọ ma mesịa na Benue State University, Makurdi, ruo afọ isii ọzọ
N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke nyocha na mmepe na NABDA ma mesịa bụrụ onye nduji nke Bioentrepreneurship site n'afọ 2004 ruo 2005
Ogbadu rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi nke NABDA ọnwa atọ n'afọ 2005, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba nri na ụlọ ọrụ Biotechnology na NABDA site n'afọ 2005 ruo afo 2011
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nyocha site na 2011 ruo 2013, mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ya ugbu a
Ogbadu malitere mbufe teknụzụ na 'Temporary Immersion Bioreactor System' site na AZUTECNIA nke Cuba gaa na Naịjirịa maka mmepụta buru ibu nke osisi ndị a ma ama

[nkọwa dị mkpa] Ọ kwadokwara ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nghọta banyere mmepụta ọgwụ mgbochi n'etiti Finlay nke Cuba na Naịjirịa (FMST, Federal University of Technology, Minna na CDC jikọrọ aka) na 2013
[nkọwarị dị mkpa]
N'oge ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Ogbadu weghachiri ndị otu Naịjirịa nke International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology
A malitere ọrụ nkà na ụzụ ndị ọzọ site na mmekorita ya na Food and Agriculture Organization nke United Nations n'okpuru mmekorita South South n'oge a
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
Na mbido ọrịa Ebola virus nke West Africa na 2014, NABDA n'okpuru idu ndú ya mepụtara nyocha na primers maka ịchọpụta ọrịa Ebola virus
Ngwongwo ahụ nwere ike ịchọpụta n'ime awa 24 nke ịkpọtụrụ nje ahụ, ọbụna tupu mgbaàmà amalite igosipụta, si otú a gbochie mgbasa nke ọrịa ahụ
E nwetara nke a na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ biotechnology nke South Korea Bioneer
N'okpuru afọ abụọ nke idu ndú ya dị ka Director General, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba mbọ ka a gafee Biosafety Bill nke Naịjirịa, nke nọ na limbo kemgbe e bidoro ya na 2002, n'ime iwu
N'otu aka ahụ, Biotechnology Bill enwetala nkwado nke Federal Executive Council n'otu oge ahụ ma ugbu a n'ihu National Assembly
E mepụtara atụmatụ atụmatụ atụmatụ afọ ise nke biotechnology maka oge mbụ ma na- Ana emejuputa ya ugbu a
Ogbadu ebipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ / akwụkwọ 40 nke nchọpụta nchọpụta ya, pasent 87 nke dị na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa a ma ama na ndị ọzọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ / akwụkwọ dị elu
Ogbadu enyewo isi na Elsevier Encyclopedia of Food Microbiology
O gosipụtara karịrị 22 Seminar na Conference Papers na nzukọ sayensị dị iche iche
[citation needed]
Lucy Lameck (1934 ruo ụbọchị 21 Machị 1993) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania, onye bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa Minista na gọọmentị
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo, ọ zụrụ dị ka nọọsụ tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma gaa Ruskin College, Oxford, site na agụmakwụkwọ
O bu ụzọ banye na Tanganyika National Assembly n'afọ 1960, tupu a họpụta ya na Tanzania National Assembly n'afọ 1965
Ewezuga 1975 ruo 1980, ọ nọgidere na-enwe oche n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1992
A na-ahụ ya dị ka ihe nlereanya, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'oge ndụ ya niile iji melite ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị n'ime mba ahụ
A mụrụ Lucy Selina Lameck Somi, nke e mechara mara dị ka Lucy Lameck, na 1934 na nso mpaghara Kilimanjaro na mpaghara Britain nke Tanganyika (Tanzania nke oge a)
O sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma na-anabata onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Julius Nyerere
Ọ gara Kilema Catholic Mission School, nke Missionary Sisters of Our Lady of Africa na-elekọta
Mgbe ọ zụchara ọzụzụ dị ka onye nọọsụ na 1950, ọ chọghị isonye na usoro ahụike nke ndị Britain na-achị, ya mere ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ kama
N'agbata afọ 1955 na 1957, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Kilimanjaro Native Cooperative Union, wee malite itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-arụ ọrụ na Tanganyika African National Union
Ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke TANU ma mepụta uwe mba maka Tanganyika
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ bịara mgbe TANU meghere alaka na Moshi
Lucy Mooney (ihe dị ka 1880 na 1969) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na Gee's Bend quilting collective ma rụọ ọrụ màkà Freedom Quilting Bee
N'agbanyeghị na ọ tụfuru aka tupu ọ malite ịrụ ọrụ na Bee, ọ bụ ónyé na-emepụta akwa
Pete Seeger nwere otu n'ime uwe elu ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Frist Art Museum
Mooney na di ya Needom rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ Sandy Hill, nke bụbu ubi Van de Graaff na Gee's Bend
Travis bụ ónyé wéré ha n'ọrụ n'oge ahụ
Lucy Buyaphi Mvubelo (1920 – 30 Ọktoba 2000) bụ onye otu azụmaahịa South Africa
Amụrụ Lucy Twala na Johannesburg, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Inanda Seminary School tupu ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi
Ọ lụrụ McKenzie Mvubelo, mana na 1942 ọ hapụrụ nkuzi iji nweta ụgwọ ọrụ dị elu na ụlọ ọrụ akwa
Ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-arụ ọrụ uwe nke ụmụ nwanyị Afrika wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu ha n'oge na-adịghị anya
Na 1947, ọ bụụru onye na-akpọkọta Federation of South African Women, na bụrụkwa onye guzobere South African Congress of Trade Unions (SACTU), na-eje ozi dịka osote onye isi ala site na 1955
Mvubelo jụrụ na mkpebi SACTU mere ijikọ na African National Congress
Òtù ndị Garment Workers maka ọrụ kwụsịrị na 1956, na 1959 ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke Federation of Free African Trade Union (FOFATUSA)
N'afọ 1962, otu ndị na-arụ ọrụ uwe jikọtara ọnụ na National Union of Clothing Workers (NUCW), na Mvubelo gara n'ihu dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu
O kpebiri igbari FOFATUSA na 1966, ebe ọ nwere ndị mmekọ ole na ole fọdụrụnụ
Kama, NUCW sonyeere Trade Union Council of South Africa (TUCSA), na Mvubelo ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ojii mbụ jere ozi na onye isi ya
Ndị TUCSA chụpụrụ ndị otu na-anọchite anya ndị ọrụ ojii na 1969

Mvubelo rụrụ ụka na NUCW kwesịrị ịga n'ihu dị ka otu nọọrọ onwe ya, na-echekwa ya nnọchiteanya na International Textile, Uwe na Akpụkpọ anụ Federation, na n'onwe ya kwuru okwu na International Labour Organisation
Ọ nwere ike ịbanye na TUCSA na 1972, mana n'afọ ahụ, Mvubelo nwetara nkatọ dị egwu maka ịghara idebe ndekọ ego doro anya
N'afọ ndị 1980, Mvubelo pụrụ iche na mmegide mwepu akụ na ụba nke South Afrika
N'afọ 1984, ndị na-emegide ya gbara bọmbụ n'ụlọ ya
Ọ jere ozi na kọmitii njikwa nke United States-South Africa Leader Exchange Programme, ma chịkwaa Women for Peace
NUCW jikọtara ọnụ na National Union of Garment Workers na 1985, na Mvubelo lara ezumike nká n'afọ na-esote
Lucy Quist, née Afriyie, (amụrụ c
1974) bụ onye Ghana nke a mụrụ na Briten onye isi azụmaahịa na teknụzụ
Ọ bụ onye isi njikwa maka Morgan Stanley
A mụrụ ya na London Nyendu Ghana, Peter na Mary Afriyie, Lucy Quist nọrọ afọ ntolite ya na Europe na Africa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Wesley Girls na Cape Coast wee gaa kọleji ụdị nke isii na Presbyterian Boys' Senior High School
Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na mahadum East London, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta nke mbụ na Electrical and Electronic Engineering
O nwetara MBA na INSEAD na France
N'ime ndụ ọrụ mbụ ya, ọ bụ onye Injinia Eletriki na Eletrọnịkị na ụlọ ọrụ Ford Motor, wee nweta asambodo nke Chartered Injinia ya

O sonyeere Royal Bank of Scotland dị ka onye njikwa mgbanwe tupu ọ gbanwee gaa n'ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na 2008 na Millicom International Cellular, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe azụmahịa, ahịa, nkesa, na ịzụ ahịa
A họpụtara Lucy Quist onye isi nke atụmatụ Strategy na Planning na ụlọọrụ Vodafone nke Ghana
Na mgbakwunye nke a, ọ na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa nke ụlọọrụ ahu na azụmaahịa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka CEO nke Airtel Ghana
N'ọrụ onye ndu ya, ọ kwadoro ka ndị ntorobịa STEM sonye na Ghana site na atụmatụ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke ụlọ ọrụ ya
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Quist Blue Diamond
Ọ soro tọọ ntọala ma kwadokwa usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ FreshPay na Democratic Republic of Congo na Executive Women Network
Na Septemba 2018, FIFA họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke kọmitii Normalisation ka ọ hazie bọọlụ na Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi njikwa ugbu a na Morgan Stanley n'ụlọ ọrụ London ya

O tinyekwala aka na sekit na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha na mmemme ndị dị ka Mobile World Congress, Hogan Lovells African Forum 2017, Pan African Women Forum, TEDxEuston, Wharton Africa Business Forum, Sanford C
Bernstein Center for Leadership and Ethics Conference na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Azụmahịa Colombia na Mgbakọ Mmepe Africa
Quist na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ bọọdụ mba ụwa na mpaghara gụnyere
Quist anatawo ihe nrite ndị a

Lucy Caroline Smith (née Dahl; 12 Ọktoba n'afọ 1934 - 27 Ọgụstụ n'afọ 2013) bụ onye ọkà mmụta iwu Norway na prọfesọ nke iwu na Mahadum nke Oslo Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi mahadum site n'afo1993 ruo 1998
Ọ bụ onye otu Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters Na 1987, obukwara nwanyị mbụ (zuru ezu) prọfesọ iwu na Norway
O bipụtara akwụkwọ Foreldremyndighet og barnerett
Smith bụ onye otu Kọmitii UN na-ahụ maka ikike nke nwatakịrị
N'afọ ndị 1980, Smith ghọrọ onye ọha na eze maara nke ọma dị ka onye isi ikpe nke ihe ngosi ajụjụ a ma ama Kvitt eller dobbelt
Smith bụ nwunye Carsten Smith, onye bụbu Chief Justice nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Norway
Tupu emee nhọpụta ahụ, ọ bụkwa prọfesọ iwu na Mahadum nke Oslo
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Oslo Cathedral School, Smith gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu, gusia akwụkwọ n'afọ 1959
Àtụ Sandbox
Lucy Thoumaian ma ọ bụ Rossier de Visme (1890-1940) bụ onye Armenia na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na udo
A chụpụrụ ya na Armenia, o nyere aka mepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ na Chigwell maka ndị Armenia na-enweghị nne na nna
O bipụtara nkwupụta maka udo tupu ya agaa nzukọ Women at the Hague na afọ 1915
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Njikọ Mba
Thoumaian bụ onye amụrụ na Switzerland n'aha Rossier de Visme
A chụpụrụ ya na di ya Reverend Prọfesọ Garabed Thoumanian na Armenia ma ha ghọrọ ndị a chụgara na Britain
N'ebe ahụ, ha haziri ogige ụmụ mgbei na ụlọ akwụkwọ na Oakhurst na Chigwell maka ndị Armenia na 1906
N'afọ 1911, ọ gara First Universal Races Congress na London nke bụ mgbalị mbụ maka imegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye a chụgara n'alaeze Ottoman, ọ nabatara ndị nnọchi anya Turkey dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke mkpa ọ dị ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
N'afọ 1914, o bipụtara akwụkwọ maka udo nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Agha bụ nke mmadụ mere, ọ ga-abụrịrị nwanyị ka e wepụrụ'
Ọ tụrụ aro na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị inwe nzukọ kwa izu ruo mgbe esemokwu kpatara agha ahụ ga-edozi
N'afọ 1915, Thoumaian gara The Hague ebe ọ nọchitere anya Armenia na nzukọ Women at the Hague
Ọ bịarutere na nnọkọ ahụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1915
Ụbọchị tupu mgbukpọ agbụrụ nke Armenia amalite mgbe e jidere ọtụtụ narị ndị ụbụrụ na Armenia
Thomanian nọ na kọmitii isi na nnọkọ ahụ
Mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, ọ nọrọ na Netherlands ruo n'ọnwa Nọvemba
Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na-ekesa ihe, ọ chọkwara inweta ozi gbasara ndị ikwu na ibe iri atọ ọ hụrụ na Marsovan na Armenia
Mgbe agha ahụ biri, WILPF kwalitere ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ maka kọmitii Njikọ Mba
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị ọka ikpe maka ndị e gburu na Armenia
Thoumaian nwụrụ na United States of America na afọ 1940
Àtụ MedalTableTop
Lucy Wangui Kabuu (amụrụ na 24 Machị 1984) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-ahụ maka ihe omume mita 5000 na 10,000
Ọ nọchitere anya Kenya ugboro abụọ na Summer Olympics, na-emecha n'elu iri nke 10,000m na 2004 na 2008
Ihe kacha mma ya nke 14 3349 nkeji maka 5000 m na 30 3996 nkeji maka 10,000 m mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Kenya na-agba ọsọ na ihe omume ahụ
Ọ nọ na Japan maka ọrụ mbụ ya

Na mba ụwa, ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na IAAF World Cross Country Championships na 2005 ma bụrụ onye nwetara ọla abụọ dị anya na 2006 Commonwealth Games (ebe ọ bụ onye mmeri 10,000 m na onye nwetara ọla nchara 5000 m)
Kemgbe afọ 2011 ọ na-asọ mpi n'okporo ụzọ ma merie na Great North Run na Delhi Half Marathon
O mere marathon mbụ ya na afọ 2012 wee bụrụ nwanyị nke asatọ kachasị ọsọ na oge nke 2 19 34 awa maka ọnọdụ nke abụọ na Dubai Marathon
A mụrụ ya na afọ 1984 na Ichamara na mpaghara Mukurweini / Nyeri nke etiti Kenya
A chọpụtara ikike ya maka ịgba ọsọ ogologo oge mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
John Kanyi, onye na-agba ọsọ n'ógbè ahụ nke bi na Japan, gbara ya ume ịnwale agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu iji mee ka ọ mụọ ma zụọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na asọmpi nhọpụta agụmakwụkwọ ma, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, merie ebe na Aomori Yamada High School
Mgbe ọ nọ na Japan, ọ meriri 1500 mita na asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afor 2002, ọ malitere ọzụzụ na Suzuki Track and Field Club
Ọ bịanyere aka na PACE Sports Management ma Ricky Simms na-azụ ya
Wangui setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ nke Kenya maka 10,000m na Septemba na afo 2003
Ọ meriri All-Japan Corporate Half Marathon title na Yamaguchi na March na-esote
Ọ bịara nke mbụ na mita 5000 n'afọ 2004 Japanese Athletics Championships, na-asọmpi dị ka onye ọbịa
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na ule Olympic nke Kenya karịa 10,000 m
Nnukwu ihe ngosi mba ụwa mbụ ya bịara na afọ 2004 Olympics na Athens, ebe ọ mechara nke itoolu na ihe omume mita 10,000
Ọ gbara ọsọ gafere ebe ahụ na Hyogo Relays zutere ma nwee mmeri atọ n'usoro site na afọ 2005 ruo 2007
Ọ bụ onye nke iri na mita 5000 na afo 2005 World Athletics Final

Wangui mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na ahịhịa n'afọ ahụ na afo 2005 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke ise na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi mere ka ndị otu Kenya bụrụ ndị nke abụọ na Ethiopia na ọkwa ndị otu
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2006, ọ meriri asọmpi mita 10,000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2006 Commonwealth Games na oge nke nkeji 31, 2966 sekọnd
O mechikwara nke atọ na mita 5000
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye nke iri na mita 3000 na World Athletics Final
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, a họpụtara ya maka otu ụmụ nwanyị Kenya na International Chiba Ekiden
Ọ dị nwayọ karịa Maria Konovalova na ụkwụ ikpeazụ, mana ọ nọgidere na-ebute ụzọ Kenya iji merie aha ụmụ nwanyị
Oge ndị otu ahụ nke awa 2 13 35 ka e mesịrị kwado dị ka ndekọ Afrịka maka ekiden marathon relay

Wangui malitere afọ 2008 ya site na mmeri na Chiba International Cross Country Na afọ 2008 African Championships in Athletics ọ mechara nke anọ na 10,000 m n'azụ atọ nke ndị Etiopia nke Tirunesh Dibaba duziri
Na ule Olimpik nke mba ọ meriri 10,000m wee bụrụ nke abụọ n'elu 5000m
N'agbanyeghị ọchịchọ ya ịsọ mpi na ihe omume abụọ ahụ, ndị Kenya na-ahọrọ ya họọrọ ya naanị maka 10,000 m, na-ahọpụta Vivian Cheruiyot maka ebe dị mkpirikpi kama
N'oge nke abụọ ọ gara n'egwuregwu Olympic na afọ 2008 Beijing Games, ọ bụ onye nke asaa na 10,000 mita, na-agba ọsọ oge kachasị mma nke 30 3996 nkeji
Mgbe ezumike asọmpi na afo 2009 na afọ 2010, n'ihi mmerụ ahụ Achilles tendon mgbe ahụ ime ime, ọ laghachiri n'ọrụ na ụzọ na-agba ọsọ
O nwere mmeri na Great North Run half marathon na Great Edinburgh Run 10K na onwa Septemba na Ọktoba
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara Delhi Half Marathon wee merie na 1 07 04 awa n'ihu onye Kenya ibe ya Sharon Cherop
O mere nke mbụ ya n'elu ọsọ marathon na ọnwa Jenụwarị na afọ 2012 na Dubai Marathon
N'otu n'ime agbụrụ kachasị ọsọ n'oge ahụ, ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ n'ime awa 2 19 34 iji nweta ọnọdụ nke abụọ naanị sekọnd atọ n'azụ onye na-agbachitere Aselefech Mergia
Nke a bụ otu n'ime oge izizi kachasị ọsọ nke nwanyị ma bụrụ nke asatọ na ndepụta oge niile
O weputara nke ise na afo 2012 London Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel, mana ọ hapụrụ na 2012 London Olympics n'ihi na o mechiri na 10,000 m trial race na Prefontaine Classic
Na marathon nke atọ ya n'afọ ahụ, ọ rutere n'elu ikpo okwu site na njedebe nke atọ na 2012 Chicago Marathon
O meriri na 2013 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon na ihe ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke 1 06 09, naanị 19 sekọnd site na ndekọ ụwa nke Mary Keitany
Kabuu gbara ọsọ nke atọ kachasị ọsọ karịa kilomita 25 iji merie BIG 25 Berlin na Mee, gafee akara ahụ na awa 1 21 37
A họpụtara ya maka ndị otu marathon nke Kenya na afọ 2013 World Championships in Athletics mana ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na Moscow, na-emecha nke 24 n'ime awa 2 44 06
Oge ikpeazụ ọ pụtara n'afọ ahụ bụ nke atọ na Delhi Half Marathon
Ludwig Bauer (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1876, Vienna) bụ onye nta akụkọ Austro-Swiss, onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye edemede
Bauer ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ na Vienna, na-ede nkatọ ihe nkiri, ederede njem na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 1915, n'ịkpọ Agha Ụwa Mbụ asị, ọ kwagara Switzerland

Site na Wiener Cafe dị na Bern, 'onye dike nwere omume enyi nke na-eri nri n'ebe a na-anọdụ ala maka ndị ikom anọ nkịtị ma jiri biya dị egwu saa ya', o dere ndị isi maka Basle National Zeitung, nweta aha - na nkatọ sitere n'aka ndị na-akwado ya n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla - dị ka 'naanị onye na-anọpụ iche na Switzerland'
Morgen Wieder Krieg (1931), nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka War Again Tomorrow, dọrọ aka ná ntị banyere ihe ize ndụ nke agha ụwa ọzọ

Akwụkwọ ahụ, nke otu onye nyochara dị ka 'echiche na-adịghị mma nke onye na-eme udo banyere Njikọ, ebe obibi Versailles, Sovietism, Fascism, Americanism na ihe ndị ọzọ', bụ nke Albert Einstein tụrụ aro na The World As I See It
Ludwig van Beethoven (15 Disemba 1770 - 26 Maachị 1826) ka a na-ahụta dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ede egwú kachasị na nke kacha nwee mmetụta na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwu ọdịda anyanwụ
Beethoven bụ onye bụ isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọdịda anyanwụ na omenala ụwa a na-enwe mmasị n'egwú ya n'ụwa nile maka ike ya, mmalite ya, mmeri, na dike
Beethoven dere ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ya mgbe ntị chiri na ahụike siri ike; nke a mere ọtụtụ ndị ji ewere ya dị ka dike na nnukwu mmadụ
A maara Beethoven dị ka onye nnọchianya nke European Romanticism
Ọ na-etolite akwa mmiri n'etiti Classicism nke Mozart na Haydn na Romanticism nke Wagner na Liszt
Egwu ya nwere mmetụta siri ike na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị na-ede egwú na ndị na-egwu egwu narị afọ nke 19 na nke 20, ma na-aga n'ihu ruo taa
A maara ya karịsịa maka egwu egwu itoolu ya (nke atọ, nke ise na nke itoolu bụ ndị a ma ama), 32 piano sonatas, 16 string quartets, na Missa Solemnis
Luis Ortiz Rosales (nwụrụ n'afọ 1937) bụ onye Spanish na-egosi, onye na-ese ihe,
onye na-ese ihe na ihe osise
Amụrụ na Canary Islands, o kere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ mmado na eserese mere ka ọ bụrụ aha obodo
O kere eserese maka ihe nkiri surrealist Luis Buñuel L'Âge d'Or (1930)
Mgbe ntiwapụ nke Agha Obodo Spanish, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye Falangist, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ wee gbaa ya egbe n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Nationalist na 1937
Ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị mmadụ juru eju bụbu ụlọ nkwakọba ihe nke Fyffes ebe a na-echekwa unere
Luisa Moreno (August 30, 1907 - November 4, 1992) bụ onye ndú na United States ọrụ movement na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ọ jikọtara ndị ọrụ, duzie ọgbaghara, dee akwụkwọ nta n'asụsụ Bekee na Spanish, ma kpọkọta Congreso de Pueblos de Habla Española nke 1939, 'mgbakọ mbụ nke ikike obodo Latino', tupu ọ laghachi Guatemala na 1950
A mụrụ Moreno dị ka Blanca Rosa López Rodríguez n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya na Guatemala City, Guatemala
N'ịbụ onye enweghị obi ụtọ na mgbochi nwoke na nwanyị na agụmakwụkwọ, ọ haziri ndị ọgbọ ya, ndị bara ọgaranya n'ime La Sociedad Gabriela Mistral
Ìgwè a jiri mkpesa mkpesa na lobbying na-abụghị nke iwu kwadoro iji kwado ka ụmụ nwanyị nabata na mahadum Guatemala
N'ịjụ ọnọdụ ya dị elu, ọ gara Mexico City mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu iji chụsoo ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, o dekwara uri
Ọ lụrụ Angel De León, onye na-ese ihe, na 1927 ma ha abụọ kwagara New York City n'afọ sochirinụ
N'ebe ahụ, a mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Mytyl
Mgbe ọ nọ na New York, ihe nkiri Warner Bros
Under a Texas Moon (1930) mere mkpesa dị ka onye na-emegide ndị Mexico site n'aka otu ndị Latino nke Gonzalo González duziri
Ndị uwe ojii kpagburu ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe, na-egbu González
Ogbugbu ahụ kpaliri ngagharị iwe Pan-Latino, nke Moreno sonyere na ya
O mechara gwa Bert Corona na ahụmịhe ahụ 'kpaliri ya ịrụ ọrụ maka ijikọ obodo ndị na-asụ Spanish'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum ụmụ nwanyị Katọlik College of the Holy Names na Oakland, California
Oké Ndakpọ Akụ̀ na Ụba dara na 1929, iji kwado nwa ya nwanyị na di ya na-enweghị ọrụ, Moreno rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa na Spanish Harlem
Ọ haziri ndị ọrụ ibe ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ Latinas, n'ime otu ndị ọrụ uwe
N'afọ 1935, American Federation of Labor (AFL) were Moreno n'ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ọkachamara
Ọ hapụrụ di ya, onye ghọrọ onye mmegbu, wee soro nwa ya nwanyị biri na Florida, ebe ọ jikọtara ndị na-emepụta sịga na Africa America na Latina

Ọ sonyeere Congress of Industrial Organizations (CIO) wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya United Cannery, Agricultural, Packing, and Allied Workers of America (UCAPAWA), na-aghọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Spanish ya na 1940
Dị ka onye nnọchi anya UCAPAWA, o nyere aka ịhazi ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ pecan-shelling na San Antonio, Texas, na ndị ọrụ cannery na Los Angeles
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gbara ndị ọrụ nọ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche ume ka ha jikọọ aka
Nduzi ya bụ nke na-enye ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ ike, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị, ọ gbakwara ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha bụrụ ndị ndu n'òtù ndị otu
N'afọ 1937, ọ gara biri n'ógbè Encanto nke San Diego, nke o ji mee ihe dị ka isi maka ọrụ ya na mba niile
N'afọ 1939, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-ahazi, ya na Josefina Fierro de Bright na Eduardo Quevedo, nke El Congreso de Pueblos de Habla Española (Spanish-asụ People's Congress)
O wepụrụ otu afọ na UCAPAWA iji gaa na US, na-eleta ndị ọrụ Latino na East Coast, na Southwest, ma na-akwado ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ nke Agha Obodo Spain na ebumnuche ya
N'afọ 1940, a gwara ya ka ọ kwuo okwu n'ihu Kọmitii America maka Nchebe nke Ndị A mụrụ Mba Ọzọ (ACPFB)
Okwu ya, nke a maara dị ka okwu 'Caravan of Sorrow', kọwara ndụ ndị ọrụ Mexico na-akwaga mba ọzọ
E bipụtaghachiri akụkụ ya na mpempe akwụkwọ Kọmitii, na-emepụta ihe nketa nke were ogologo oge karịa oge nke okwu ahụ n'onwe ya
N'ime ya, o kwuru,
N'otu afọ ahụ, ya na enyi ya Robert Galván guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ na San Diego
Ọ hazikwara ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ite na San Diego ma mee ka ndị were ha n'ọrụ ghara iwe ndị ọrụ scab n'ọrụ
Site na mmalite nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ghọrọ onye isi ọrụ na United States, ọkachasị na San Diego
Otú ọ dị, a machibidoro ndị Mexico ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ, ebe a na-arụ ụgbọ mmiri, na mpaghara ndị ọzọ metụtara agha, a tụkwara ha n'ọrụ ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala
Moreno katọrọ ịkpa ókè ahụ, na-ekwu na 'California enwetala ọganihu site na ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ọsụsọ nke ndị Mexico na-aga ụlọ ọrụ ya, ọrụ ugbo
Ugbu a, ha enweela ezigbo ịhụ mba n'anya na mba ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke jụrụ inye ha ụmụ amaala ma ọ bụ ọbụna ikike obodo
N'afọ 1942, Moreno tinyere aka na ikpe igbu ọchụ nke Sleepy Lagoon, ihe a ma ama maka ndị America aka ekpe na ndị Mexico-America na-ahụ maka ikike obodo
Ya na enyi ogologo oge Bert Corona na onye ọka iwu Carey McWilliams, ha haziri Kọmitii Nchebe Sleepy Lagoon iji wepụ ndị ntorobịa a na-ebo ebubo

Na mgbakwunye na ịmepụta nkwado iwu, Kọmitii ahụ gbalịrị iwepụ asịrị banyere 'ìgwè ndị na-eme ihe ike' nke Pachucos na igbochi akụkọ na-akpali akpali banyere 'agha ndị agha' n'etiti Pachucos da ndị agha
(Ndị nta akụkọ kpọrọ mwakpo nke Pachucos na 1943 'Zoot Suit Riots') Ọ chọpụtakwara mmegbu nke ndị agha na San Diego, na-adụ onye kansụl obodo Charles C
Dail ọdụ n'okwu ahụ
Ọ kpọrọ Admiral David W
Bagley, onye isi nke Eleventh Naval District na San Diego, maka nzukọ nke obodo San Diego na ndị isi ọrụ
Bagley azaghachighị ọkpụkpọ òkù ahụ
N'ịga n'ihu na-agbasi mbọ ike maka nyocha, Moreno sooro McWilliams rụkọọ ọrụ iji chịkọta ihe akaebe
Nnyocha ahụ kpasuru Senator nke California State Jack B
Tenney iwe, onye wakporo Moreno, na-ebo ya ebubo n'ihu ọha na ọ na-etinye aka na 'nkwekọrịta na-emegide America'
N'oge mkpọsa Zoot Suit ya, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ
N'obodo El Monte, ọ nọchitere anya ndị na-anakọta walnut, na-enweta enyemaka nke California Walnut Growers Association
Otu onye nnọchi anya Association ' bịara nwee nkwanye ùgwù dị elu maka àgwà ya, ikike na ịkwụwa aka ọtọ'
N'afọ 1947, ọ lụrụ Gray Bemis, onye agha mmiri si Nebraska bụ onye nnọchiteanya na mgbakọ mba nke Socialist Party of America nke 1932
Bemis nwekọrọ mmasị Moreno na ikike obodo nke ndị Mexico America, ma see foto ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1940, Moreno guzobere ngalaba San Diego nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Mexico

N'okwu ọ na-ekwu n'isi nke Young Progressives of America, ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị na esemokwu agbụrụ na ọgba aghara nke ndị Kọmunist kpaliri ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịkpa ókè na obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii megide ndị Mexico America na ndị agbụrụ ndị ọzọ
N'ime afọ 1950, Immigration and Naturalization Service (INS) duziri Operation Wetback iji chụpụ ndị Mexico na ndị Mexico America
Ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya na ndị isi ọrụ karịsịa
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-akwanyere ùgwù na onye na-agbaso iwu, ọrụ ya mere ka ndị iro ya
Ya na di ya malitere ịnata akwụkwọ ozi iyi egwu maka ọrụ ha megide obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii
Tenney, onye kpọrọ ya 'onye mba ọzọ dị ize ndụ', nyere aka n'ịchụpụ ya
A na-enye ya nwa amaala iji gbaa akaebe megide Harry Bridges, mana ọ jụrụ ịbụ 'nwaanyị nweere onwe ya nwere mkpụrụ obi'
Na Nọvemba 30, 1950, Moreno na di ya nke abụọ, Gary Bemis nke Nebraska, hapụrụ United States site na Ciudad Juárez, jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ na-aga Mexico City
E nyere ya akwụkwọ ikike nchụpụ n'ihi na ọ bụbu onye otu Communist Party
N'ikpeazụ, di na nwunye ahụ biri na Guatemala, mana a manyere ha ịgbapụ mgbe nnupụisi nke CIA kwadoro na 1954 chụpụrụ onye isi ala na-aga n'ihu Jacobo Arbenz Guzmán
Mgbe mmeri nke 1959 Cuban Revolution gasịrị, Moreno nọrọ oge na-akụzi n'àgwàetiti ahụ
O mechara laghachi Guatemala, ebe ọtụtụ ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ tupu ya anwụọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Luisa Moreno bụ onye isi na Pre-Chicano Movement na American labour movement, a na-elegharakarị ọrụ ya anya
Kemgbe afọ 1970, ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme agbalịwo ịmegharị ọrụ ya na mmegharị ahụ ma nye ya otuto kwesịrị ekwesị
Otu n'ime ha bụ onye na-ese ihe na prọfesọ Judy Baca, onye chetara nzukọ nke ndị ọrụ Cal San na Great Wall nke Los Angeles
Mgbidi ahụ, ihe ngosi nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Los Angeles, na-asọpụrụ Moreno site na itinye onyinyo ihu ya gbara onyinyo nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe gburugburu
E gosipụtara akụkọ Moreno na National Museum of American History's 'American Enterprise' installation
Luix Virgil Overbea (nwụrụ n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Julaị, 2010) bụ ónyé nta akụkọ America bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Association of Black Journalists

Luix Overbea bụ nwá afọ Chicago; ma nweta nzere bachelọ na nkà ihe ọmụma na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Northwestern Ọ kwagara North Carolina ịrụ ọrụ màkà Winston-Salem Journal site na 1955 rụo 1968, ebe ọ bụ naanị ónyé nta akụkọ ojii

Ọ chọghị ka a na-ekpuchi naanị 'akụkọ ojii' ma na-ekpu ihe niile site na ihe omume ọkachamara na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ruo egwuregwu; n'oge ahụ, a na-akparị ndị ọcha ọbọdọ mgbè ọ ga-apụta iji kpuchie ihe dịka nzukọ ndị aldermen, ma mee ka ọ màrà
Overbea bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ gbara Jesse Jackson ajụjụ ọnụ na 1964 dị ka Jackson na-eduzi ndị na-eri nri ehihie na Mahadum North Carolina A&T
N'afọ ndị 1960 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke St
Louis Sentinel nke Black nwere na mgbè ahụ màkà Globe-Democrat
Overbea gàrà rụọ ọrụ màkà Christian Science Monitor na 1971, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ 21

N'ọrụ ya na Monitor, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV maka ụlọ ọrụ TV Monitor, ónyé nta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche màkà mmekọrịta ọbọdọ màkà ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Monitor
A maara ya màkà mkpuchi ya banyéré mkpuchi ụlọ akwụkwọ Boston na 1970s
Ọ bụkwa ónyé nyere aka na Boston Globe, Bay State Banner, na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Overbea rụrụ ọrụ iji nyéré ndị nta akụkọ ojii ndị ọzọ aka ịchọta ụzọ ha na azụmaahịa ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Association of Black Journalists
na 1993 natara Lifetime Achievement Award site na nzukọ ahụ
Overbea lara ezumike nká na 1992
Ọ nwụrụ na Julaị 10, 2010 na Boston mgbè ọ dị afọ 87
Mgbè ọ nwụrụ, Ónyé isi oche NABJ Kathy Y
Times kwuru na 'na-enweghị ndị isi dị ka Luix Overbea, ọ gaghị enwe NABJ
O meghere ụzọ màkà ọtụtụ ndị nta akụkọ ojii ịgbaso nzọụkwụ ya
Overbea lụrụ Elexie (Culp) Overbea wee mụọ otu nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Adgirene
A maara ya màkà ịkpa ọchị ya, na maka ịbụ onye 'na-enweghị obi ilu' site na ịkpa oke chere ihu na mmalite ọrụ ya
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ odeakụkọ ya, Overbea bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na onye na-ede uri
E dere uri ya 'Hometown' na ihe ncheta na Roxbury Crossing Boston Orange line train stop
Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (Caetés, Ọktoba 27, 1945) Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Brazil, onye otu pati ndị ọrụ (PT)
Lula bụ onye isi ala Brazil site na 2003 ruo 2010 wee malite na 2023 ruo 2027
Oziọma Luk, Oziọma Ndị Kraịst

Luka Lazarević (Serbian Cyrillic Лука Лазаревић; 1774[]), nke a maara dị ka Pop-Luka (Поп-Лука), bụ onye ụkọchukwu Ọtọdọks nke Serbia na vojvoda (ọchịagha) nke sonyere na Nnupụisi Serbia Mbụ (1804[[13) nke Mgbanwe Serbia megide Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman

N'ịbụ onye a họpụtara dị ka onye ụkọchukwu mgbe ọ dị obere, a kọwara Lazarević dị ka onye na-agba ịnyịnya na-agba ọsọ, nke na-eyi égbè nke sonyeere ndị nnupụisi Serbia n'ọgụ ha megide ndị Janissaries (Dahije) na-enupụ isi iji bọọ nwa nwanne ya ọbọ
O gosipụtara ike ngwa ngwa na n'oge nnupụisi megide ndị Ottoman malitere, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nke otu na ọdịda anyanwụ Serbia
N'ị sonye n'agha niile a ma ama na mpaghara ahụ, mmegide Ottoman manyere ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ ịgbapụ na mba ahụ
Ọ laghachiri Serbia na 1832 mgbe ọtụtụ afọ gachara na Russia, ma rụọ ọrụ maka gọọmentị Serbia (nke na-achị onwe ya ugbu a) n'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya
A mụrụ Lazarević na Svileuva, na Šabac nahiya nke Sanjak nke Smederevo (nke bụ Serbia ugbu a)
Aha nna ya bụ Todor, aha nne ya bụ Jevrosima
A nabatara aha nna ya site n'aka nwanne nna ya Lazar
Dị ka nwatakịrị, e zigara ya Syrmia, n'oge ahụ akụkụ nke ndị eze Habsburg, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ atọ na ọkara
Mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ ma lụọ di, bishọp Danilo nke Valjevo họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ụkọchukwu na 1796 ma nye ya nlekọta nke obodo Ljutice na Koceljeva
Nwunye ya nwụrụ mgbe afọ asaa nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, a hapụrụ ya ka ọ na-elekọta ụmụ ha nwoke abụọ, Mihailo na Kuzman
N'ịbụ onye a kọwara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Lazarević na-eyi égbè ma bụrụ nnukwu onye na-agba ịnyịnya
Nwa nwanne nna Lazarević bụ Ranko, nwa Lazar, bụ knez (onye isi obodo Ndị Kraịst) na mpaghara Tamnava
Mgbe ndị Janissary nọ na sanjak na ndị Turks nọ n'ógbè ahụ na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye Sultan, Ranko kwadoro nke ikpeazụ
Ndị Serbia kwadoro Alaeze Ukwu ahụ bụ ndị Janissaries wakporo; Bego Novljanin onye nọ na Šabac gburu Ranko na mbido 1800
Luka Lazarević na-echere oge maka ịbọ ọbọ
A sịrị na Lazarevick bụ onye agha karịa onye ụkọchukwu
Mgbe nnupụisi megide Dahije na Šumadija malitere na mbido 1804, Lazarević sonyeere ndị nnupụise
Nnupụisi ahụ gbasara na Kolubara, na Jakov Nenadović si Valjevo ruo Šabac
N'oge dị mkpirikpi, Lazarević ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi agha n'òtù ahụ, ma mesịa bụrụ onye ndú nke Tamnavci na Posavci nke Šabac (ndị nnupụisi si n'ógbè Tamnava na Posavina na Šabac nahiya)

Mgbe a ga-ahọpụta onye ndú nkịtị nke ndị nnupụisi Šabac, n'oge Mateja Nenadović chụpụrụ ọkwa ahụ (nwanne nna ya Jakov nyere iwu n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Valjevo nahiya), onye ndú nnupụnụ kachasị elu Karađorđe jụrụ Tamnavci na Posavci onye ọ ga-ahọrọ
N'otu, ha họọrọ Lazarević
Petar Moler gburu afụ ọnụ ya, ya na Jakov na ndị ọzọ gara Užice
Mgbe ahụ ọ lụrụ Danojla si Jadar, na bishọp Antim nke Valjevo lụrụ ha dị ka kum ya
Site na 1805, mgbe ndị nnu pụ isi lụrụ ọgụ maka nnwere onwe, megide Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman, Lazarević nwere ọtụtụ mmeri dị mkpa nke o ji obi ike lụọ ọgụ na vojvoda akọ na ikike
Na 18 Jenụwarị [OS

6 Jenụwar' Jakov Nenadović na Luka Lazarevick malitere nnọ chibido nke Šabac, ebe Karađorđe hapụrụ Belgrade iji sonyere ha; n'ụzọ Karađordje mụtara na ndị agha Ottoman Bosnian na-agafe Drina ma si otú ahụ na-alụ ọgụ ozugbo na Jenụwar Lazarevics na Jenụl 29

Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka e gbuo ya n'Agha nke Mišar (Ọgọst 1806), mana o nyere aka na mmeri ahụ; Karađorđe nyere Lazarević iwu ka o zoo n'ime ọhịa na ndị agha ịnyịnya, na ụda nke egbe ya, banye n'azụ ndị agha Ottoman

N'etiti agha ahụ, Lazarević mara ọchịagha Ottoman Bosnian Mehmed-beg Kulenović aka ka ọ lụọ ọgụ nke pụtara dị ka onye mmeri, Mehmed- Beg Kulenovick ka ndị nnu pụ ịsị Serbia gburu site na ndị na-agba ọsọ na-eso Lazarevick bụ ndị jisiri ike gbalaga n'ime ọhịa
Ndị agha Ottoman e bibiri lara n'iyi laghachiri na Šabac, ebe e zigara Lazarević na Provačka Ada maka ọgwụgwọ
Mgbe ndị Ottoman nyefere Šabac n'aka ndị nnupụisi Serbia na 2 February [OS
January] , Karađorđe hapụrụ Lazarević dị ka ọchịagha na 1,000 ndị agha
Dị ka onye nlekọta nke Šabac, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'imezu iwu n'obodo na distrikti, mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-ekpe ikpe na onye majie ma tinye ikpe n'ime usoro ahụ
Lazarević duziri agha n'etiti Šabac na Loznica, na Užice ọ bọrọ ọbọ maka nwa nwanne ya nwoke Ranko
Ọ lụkwara ọgụ n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Drina, na Glavice n'elu Bijeljina (ebe Meho Orugdžić dara), n'etiti Zvornik na Srebrenica, ma bibie ndị agha Ottoman na-agafe Sarajevo
Mmeri e meriri na Čegar (May 1809) kwụsịrị mmeri ahụ

Onye na-ede uri na onye guslar Filip Višnjić (1767ń1834) de pụtara agha Lazarević kachasị ama dị ka Loznica (Ọktoba 1810), ebe ọ we ghaara ikike nke obodo ahụ n'aka ndị Ottoman, na Novo Selo na Krstovdan, ebe ọ gburu Pejzo Mehmed-Aga
Abụ uri nke onye nke ikpeazụ ahụ na-eto obi ike ya, ma kọwaa ya dị ka ezigbo onye na-eme atụmatụ
Mgbe e meriri ya na Ravnje (August 1813) na mgbochi nke nnu pụ isi ahụ, Lazarević, dị ka ọtụtụ ndị isi ndị ọzọ, hapụrụ Serbia

Ndị Austria duuru ya gaa Judenburg na Styria, ebe o si gaa Alaeze Ukwu Russia, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo 1832 mgbe ọ lagha chiri n'ihe ghọrọ Principality of Serbia mgbe Uprising nke Abụọ nke Serbia (1815), nke Miloš Obrenović (onye ọchịagha mgbanwe ibe ya, onye nyere iwu ka e gbuo Karađorđe) chịrị
Prince Miloš kwadoro ezumike nká nke 250 thalers na 6 Machị [OS
, ma were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye otu onye majie Šabac
N'afọ 1842 ọ ghọrọ onye otu Council nke steeti
N'ihi ịka nká na adịghị ike site na ọnyá iri na anọ ya, ọ lara ezumike nká ma biri n'ụlọ ya na Šabac
Lazarević nwụrụ na 5 Mee [OS
, e lie ya na nsọpụrụ kachasị elu n'echi ya n'akụkụ Chọọchị Šabac [sr]
Nkume ili ya gụnyere amaokwu nke onye na-ede uri Jovan Ilić (1824 Tian1901)
Lazarević nwere ntutu isi ojii, ọkpụkpụ na-enweghị isi, ọ dị ngwa, okwu ole na ole; ọ dị ndụ, dị ike, dị n'usoro, dị nkọ; naanị n'ebe ndị na-eto eto nọ ma na-ege ndị agadi ntị
N'ime ndị ọchịagha niile, ọ kacha kwanyere Petar Dobrnjac na Milenko Stojković ùgwù
Ọ kpọrọ 'Turks' (Ndị Alakụba) nke Bosnia asị, mana ọ kpọrọ ha ndị dike ka ukwuu karịa ezigbo ndị Turkey
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye a ma ama na onye a na-asọpụrụ, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-eme ụdị ọchịchị aka ike ọ bụla, ọ chọghịkwa akụ na ụba
Ọbụna n'oge agadi, o bu égbè, mma agha, na égbè abụọ
E nwere uri epic nke gụnyere Luka Lazarević dị ka isi na akụkọ ahụ (dị ka Luka Lazarewić i Pejzo nke Višnjić)
E nwere okporo ámá ndị a gụrụ aha ya na Belgrade, Novi Sad, Niš, Knjaževac, Koceljeva, Vladimirci, na ndị ọzọ
Okporo ámá dị na Belgrade nwere ihe ncheta ncheta
A gụnyere àgwà ya na ihe nkiri TV nke akụkọ ihe mere eme Vuk Karadžić (1987)

Air Commodore (la ezumike nká) Luke Chijiuba Ochulor jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa agha mbụ nke Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa, nke a họpụtara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1991 mgbe e guzobere steeti ahụ site na akụkụ Bendel Steeti n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke onye isii Ibrahim Babangida
O nyefere onye gọvanọ a họpụtara ahọpụta Felix Ibru na Jenụwarị n'afọ 1992 na mmalite mba nke atọ nke Naịjirịa
Ochulor bụ onye Igbo
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara ọchịchị obodo nke Okpofe Ezinihitte na Mbaise Imo Steeti Naịjirịa
Dị ka gọvanọ steeti, e nyere ya ọrụ iguzobe usoro nchịkwa maka steeti ọhụrụ ahụ ka ọ na-akwadebe maka ntuli aka na ịkwaga na ọchịchị ndị nkịtị

O mepụtara Mahadum Delta Steeti site na ogige Abraka nke Mahadum Bendel Steeti, wee guzobe kọmitii iji chọpụta ma a ga-ebugharị mahadum ọhụrụ ahụ na Anwai, Asaba, mkpebi nke nwere ike ịkpata ọgba aghara agbụrụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2003, Ochulor kpọrọ ndị isi agbụrụ Ijaw, Itsekiri na Urhobo na Delta Steeti ka ha rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mepụta udo na mpaghara Warri nwere nsogbu
Dị ka onye otu Imeobi (nke dị n'ime) ọgbakọ ndị okenye nke Imo Steeti , na afọ 2009 ọ gọnahụrụ asịrị na gọvanọ steeti, Ikedi Ohakim na-akwụ ndị okenye ụgwọ iji gbochie nkatọ
Luke Leon Taitoa Wihone (onye a mụrụ Wijohn; amụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 2002) bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na New Zealand na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Wihone na 25 Febụwarị 2002
Ọ bụ onye Maori
Ndị iwi ya bụ Ngāpuhi, Ngāi Tūhoe, na Te Rarawa
Ọ gara klas immersion Māori na Richmond Road School ma mesịa gaa Western Springs College, ebe ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu hockey
N'afọ 2017, Wihone wepụtara onwe ya maka ije ozi na mkpọsa ntuli aka Julie Anne Genter
N'afọ 2019, o nyere aka iduzi School Strike for Climate na Auckland, na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 80,000
Ọ nabatara onyinye Ambassador of Conscience maka nnọchiteanya nke òtù ahụ
Chlöe Swarbrick họpụtara Wihone maka 2019 New Zealand Youth Parliament
N'oge arụmụka n'ozuzu, ọ gara n'ụlọ omebe iwu ndị ntorobịa iji kwupụta ọnọdụ ihu igwe
A gafere mkpebi ahụ n'ime nkeji abụọ
Wihone na ndị omeiwu ndị ntorobịa ịrị asaá na asatọ ndị ọzọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi ghere oghe nye ndị okenye ibe ha na-agba ha ume ka ha kwupụta ọnọdụ ihu igwe

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, Wihone na ndị ọzọ nọ n'afọ iri na atọ natara mmachibido iwu otu afọ site n'aka onye isi oche Trevor Mallard maka ịbụ abụ 'Tūtira Mai Ngā Iwi' na ife ọkọlọtọ Tino Rangatiratanga na gallery ọha na eze iji kwado ngagharị iwe na Ihumātao
A họpụtara Wihone na Febụwarị 2020 iji sọọ mpi Mount Albert na ntuli aka New Zealand nke afọ 2020
N'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto, ọ bụ onye kachasị nta, na-eme afọ irí na asatọ n'ihe na-erughị ọnwa 8 site na ntuli aka
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị Green Party, ọ na-eme mkpọsa maka ntuli aka nke pati
E debere ya na nke iri na asatọ na ndepụta nke otu
Na ntuli aka ahụ, ọ bịara nke atọ na 556% nke votu, na ndepụta ya adịghị elu iji banye na ndị omeiwu
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, mgbe ọ nọ n'okpuru mkpọchi COVID-19, Wihone hụrụ ndị uwe ojii nọ na Wellington na-ejide otu nwoke ma mee vidiyo ya
Ndị uwe ojii yiri egwu ijide ya
Wihone gbara Swarbrick ume ka ọ maa onye isi otu James Shaw aka na ntuli aka Green Party of Aotearoa New Zealand nke afọ 2022, mana ọ jụrụ
Wihone na-akwado ibelata afọ ịtụ vootu na imeziwanye agụmakwụkwọ obodo n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ na-akwado ụtụ isi akụ na ụba na iwu cannabis
Lukia Isanga Nakadama, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ede ya Rukia Isanga Nakudama, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ugandan, onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ osote praịm minista nke atọ nke Uganda ugbu a na Minista na-enweghị ọfịs, malite na 9 June 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị na Kọmitii Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'afọ 2006
Na mgbanwe nke 16 Febụwarị 2009, na nke 27 Mee 2011, ọ nọgidere na ọkwa a
Ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara dịka onye omeiwu (MP) maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Mayuge District
A na-ahọpụta ya ọzọ n'ọkwa ahụ kemgbe afọ 2001
A mụrụ Isanga Nakadama na 2 Febụwarị 1970
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị, nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke nne ya
Nna ya nwere ndị nwunye abụọ ọzọ
Ọ gara Nabisunsa Girls School, ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọha na eze, nke dị na Nakawa Division na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Kampala, isi obodo Uganda

O nwetara asambodo na nkuzi, tupu 1999, site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo (ITEK), nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo, otu n'ime mahadum asatọ nke Uganda, ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2015
O nwekwara diplọma na Customs Clearing & Forwarding, nke ọ nwetara n'afọ 2000
E nwetara diplọma ya na agụmakwụkwọ na 2004, site na Mahadum Alakụba na Uganda (IUIU)
O nwekwara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Public Administration site na IUIU
Tupu afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọchụnta ego onwe ya na dị ka onye nkuzi na Hassantourabi Education Centre na Mayuge District
A họpụtara ya na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2001, dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara obodo ya nke Mayuge
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii , a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-anọchite anya otu mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ya ugbu a n'afọ 2006
Rukia Nakadama bụ onye okpukpe Alakụba
Ọ lụrụ Hajji Daudi Isanga
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Lukman Alade Fakeye (amụrụ na June 25, 1983, na Ibadan ) bụ onye Naijiria na-akpụ ihe na onye jị osisi akpu ihe, onye si mpaghara Yoruba
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne Lamidi Olonade Fakeye, onye pịrị ọnụ ụzọ nke African Room na Kennedy Center na Washington, DC Lukman malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na nna ya, Akin Fakeye, mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
Lukman Alade Fakeye gụrụ nka na imewe ihe na The Polytechnic, Ibadan, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Best Student in Sculpture ugboro abụọ
A pụrụ ịhụ ọrụ Fakeye na nchịkọta ọha na nke onwe na Nigeria, United States, na United Kingdom
Lukman Olaonipekun nke a maara dị ka Lukesh bụ onye na-ese foto na Naijiria a mụrụ na Disemba 7, 1975 na Itesiwaju Ọchịchị Obodo, Oyo Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ malitere ọrụ foto ya n'afọ 1998
Olaonipekun bụ onye na-ese foto nke onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti Babatunde Fashola SAN onye ghọrọ Mịnịsta Ike, Ọrụ na Ụlọ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'okpuru ọchịchị ọhụrụ

N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto nke Honourable Idowu Obasa, onye isi oche ọchịchị ime obodo Onigbongbo na Ikeja, Lagos na naanị afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto nke Gọvanọ nke Steeti, Onye isi Babatunde Fashola
Taa, ọ ka nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ma ọrụ ya eburula ya gburugburu ụwa
Lukman bụ onye dere BRF A Story in Photographs, akwụkwọ nke na-edekọ ndụ gọvanọ na-eje ozi na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2009, ọ gụrụ obere ọmụmụ na London School of Photography, site na 2006 ruo 2009, ọ bụ onye sonyere na World Press Photo Award
Lukman bụkwa onye otu Photojournalists Association of Nigeria na World Photography Organisation
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ya na nso nso a 'The Fashola Years' na 2015 site na Quramo Publishing n'okpuru akara Qbooks
2009 - Then and Now at City Hall, Lagos Island
2013 - My Contract with Lagos and Blue Roof, Lagos
2013 - Lagos Being and Becoming at City Hall, Lagos
