Lukwata (Luganda maka agwọ mmiri', ụdị aha nke kukwata, lit
'iji jide') bụ ihe e kere eke bi na mmiri n'akụkọ ọdịnala Baganda, nke a na-ekwu na a hụrụ ya na Ọdọ mmiri Victoria nke obodo Uganda
A kọwago ya dịka mita 20 ruo 30 n'ogologo, nwere akpụkpọ anụ ahụ na-egbuke egbuke na isi gbara gburugburu, a makwaara ya na ọ na-awakpo ndị ọkụ azụ na ụgbọ mmiri
A na-eche na akụkụ Lukwata nwere ikike anwansi ma na-asọpụrụ ha dịka ihe ncheta n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka
N'agbanyeghị ọdịdị nke akụkọ ifo ahụ, ọ nweghị ihe akaebe sayensị iji kwadoo ịdị adị nke Lukwata maọbụ ihe ọ bụla ọzọ yiri ya na Lake Victoria
N'agbanyeghị nke a, Lukwata ka bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọdịbendị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Uganda na ọdịdị ọdịnala nke ndị Baganda
Onye nchịkwa nke ndị Britain C
Hobley dere, n'afọ 1913, na ndị bi n'akụkụ abụọ (ọwụwa anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ) nke Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria kọrọ akụkọ banyere Lukwata

Ọ kọwakwara na ndị 'Ja Luo' kọrọ akụkọ banyere mwakpo ụgbọ mmiri ịkụ azụ, na Echiche na Lukwata nwere ike ịnọchite anya anụmanụ a na-amaghị ama nọgidere na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ site na mmalite ruo n'etiti narị afọ nke 20 ọ pụtara na edemede afọ 1937 nke akpọrọ 'African Mystery Beasts', ọ bụ ezie na akwụkwọ ndị oge nso a họọrọ ilekwasị anya na Lukwata na akụkọ gbara ya gburugburu dịka ihe omume ọdịbendị

Lulama 'Lulu' Marytheresa Xingwana (amụrụ na 23 Septemba 1955) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka Minista maka ụmụ nwanyị, ụmụaka na ndị nwere nkwarụ site na Nọvemba 2010 ruo Mee 2014
N'oge gara aga, ọ nọ n'ọkwa osote minista nke mineral na ike site na 2004 ruo 2006 ma bụrụ minista nke ọrụ ugbo na ala site na 2006 ruo 2009, na-anọchi Thoko Didiza

Xingwana nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mahadum Witwatersrand na 1985 na diplọma atọ, otu na Economic Principles na Mahadim Limpopo na 2002, na abụọ ndị ọzọ na Development and Leadership Studies, na Rural Development na Mahadam Zimbabwe na Zimbabwe
Xingwana ghọrọ onye omeiwu mgbe ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 1994 gasịrị
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Southern African Development Community's Regional Women's Caucus na onye nduzi nke South African Council of Churches' Women's Development Programmes (1987)

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nlekọta Jikọrọ Aka maka Improvement of Quality of Life and Status of Women (2002ī 2004), Caucus nke Ụmụ nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu (1999ī 2004), Malibongwe Rural Development Project for Women (1998ī 2000) na National Assembly Portfolio Committee for Sports and Recreation (1994ī1999)
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke Klas maka ndị ọrụ ụlọ n'ime ime obodo na mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Johannesburg, yana maka Ịmụta na Ịkụzi, kemgbe afọ 1985
Site na 1999 ruo 2004, ọ nọ na National Assembly Portfolio Committee for Defence

Ọ nọkwa na Kansụl Nchịkwa nke ANC maka Gauteng (1998ī2001) na Kọmitii Nchịkọta Mba Ihe Ndị Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Njem (1996ī2004), Onye isi mmepe maka Njikọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC (1991ī1994) na onye otu FEDSWA (1981ī1991)
Ọ bụ onye otu United Democratic Front site na 1983 ruo 1991, ọ bụkwa onye otu ANC Women's League kemgbe 1993
Xingwana ekwuola banyere mmegide ya megide nloghachi nke ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ na South Africa na-ekwu na 'ọ na-emegide ụkpụrụ anyị nke ikike mmadụ' na ụkpụrụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke mba ahụ
N'oge a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na ala, Xingwana kpatara esemokwu na 2007 mgbe ọ boro ndị ọrụ ugbo ọcha ebubo na ha bụ ndị obi ọjọọ na ndị na-enweghị mmadụ n'ebe ndị ọrụ ha nọ
O kwuru na ndị ọrụ ugbo na-edina ndị ọrụ ha n'ike mgbe niile
Okwu ndị a were ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ugbo iwe, na ndị ọrụ ugbe abụọ, AgriSA na Transvaal Agricultural Union, mara ya aka inye ihe akaebe ga-akwado ebubo ya
Minista ahụ kpọrọ oku ka ya na ndị otu ahụ nwee nzukọ, mana ndị ọrụ ugbo ahụ hapụrụ iji mee mkpesa
A kpọrọ onye bụbu onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki iji dozie esemokwu ahụ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009, akụkọ dị na akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrikaans Rapport kwughachiri nkọwa zuru ezu nke otu n'ime ndị na-agụ ya chọtara na akwụkwọ Land Affairs dị peeji atọ nke ụlọ mposi mkpanaka pụrụ iche, nke a na-ebubata na R500,000, maka iji Xingwana mee ihe mgbe ọ na-enyefe ala n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ

A na-ekwu na nkọwa ya gụnyere ọla edo, mana ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Xingwana gọnahụrụ nkwupụta ahụ, na-ekwupụta na, ọ bụ ezie na Xingwana nwere ụlọ mposi pụrụ iche, ọ dịghị iche na ndị na-anabata hoi polloi
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2010, Lulu Xingwana si n'ihe ngosi nka nke ọ na-aga na ya dị ka minista nke nka na ọdịbendị, na-akpọ ọrụ ahụ 'omume rụrụ arụ'

Otu onye na-amaghị aha ya kwuru na Xingwana jụrụ ngosipụta nke di na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị, mana ihe kpatara ya nyere site n'aka onye na-ekwuchitere ya bụ na ọ bụ 'Ọ bụ omume rụrụ arụ, mkparị ma na-emegide iwu mba'
Na mbido Febụwarị 2013 a kọrọ na Xingwana mefuru R21 nde n'ịmegharị isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị, ụmụaka na ndị nwere nkwarụ na oche ọhụrụ
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke ego ahụ ka a na-emefu na oche ndị a na-emepụta maka ọfịs nke ya

Ndị otu mmegide boro Xingwana ebubo na ọ na-eji ihe onwunwe ọha na eze eme ihe iji tinye onwe ya n'ihe onwunwe ya na njem mba ofesi kama ịgbachitere ikike nke ndị South Africa na-adịghị ike, nke ngalaba ya na-ahụ maka ya

N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, Xingwana kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Australia bụ ABC News, sị 'A zụlitere ụmụ nwoke Afrikaner na okpukpe Calvinist na ha nwere nwanyị, ha nwere nwa, ha nwere ihe niile ya mere ha nwere ike iwere ndụ ahụ n'ihi na ha nwere ya

Mgbe o kwusịrị okwu ndị a, ndị otu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'Afrịka bụ AfriForum boro ya ebubo ịkpa ókè 'na-adabere na agbụrụ, okwukwe na okike', nakwa na nke a bụ 'nnukwu mkpagbu okwu megide iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke ndị Afrikaners'
Ndị Christian Democratic Party kpọrọ onye isi ala ka ọ chụọ ya n'ọrụ

Afrikanerbond kwuru na ihe ọ na-ekwu bụ 'nnukwu mkparị okwu megide iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke ndị Afrikaners' ma kwuo na o mere nkwupụta ahụ na mgbalị ịdọrọ uche pụọ na akụkọ na-akọwapụta njikwa ọjọọ n'ime ngalaba ya
N'ụbọchị na-esote, Xingwana wepụrụ okwu ya ma rịọ mgbaghara n'ihu ọha 'n'enweghị ihe mgbochi'

Lungisa Dikana, (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1978 ruo abali ato nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014), bụ onye South Africa na-edekọ egwu na onye na-eti egwu
Ọrụ egwu ya pụtara ìhè n'afọ 2008 mgbe ewepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ My Diary, My Thoughts
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014 mgbe ọ rịachara obere ọrịa
A mụrụ ya n'ime ezinụlọ egwu na Kwazakhele, obere obodo dị na Eastern Cape, Port Elizabeth, Lulu malitere ịbụ abụ dị ka onye ukwe na chọọchị ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Nna ya, Vuyiselie Dikana bụ onye na-akụ egwu maka otu egwu a maara dị ka 'Black Slave and the Flamingo'

Ọ bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara Iwu, Lulu wepụtara abọm mbụ ya nke akpọrọ My Diary, My Thoughts n'afọ 2008 nke onye na-emepụta egwu amụrụ na Naijiria bụ Wilson Joel mepụtara Abọm ahụ nwere egwu kporo ọkụ bụ dịka 'Real Love' na 'Life and Death'
N'osusu ihe ịga nke ọma nke abọm mbụ ya, Lulu malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm nke abụọ ya This Is the Life
E wepụtara abọm ahụ n'afọ 2011 wee gaa n'ihu ịhọpụta ya na ngalaba atọ n'agọ 2013 Metro FM Music Awards na 'Best R&B / Soul / Reggae Album' na 19th South African Music Awards
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2014, ọ wepụtara I Came To Love, abọm studio ya nke atọ nke mere ka ọ nweta ọkwa nhọpụta atọ na 21st South African Music Awards
N'afọ 2009, a chọpụtara na Lulu nwere perforation oesophageal ma mee ịwa ahụ oesophagus ugboro ise
N'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na South Africa mgbe ọ rịachara obere ọrịa
Ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Lulu bụ Onye maara Kraịst mere ncheghari ma raara onwe ya nye Chineke
Ọ na-etinye aka n'ọrụ Chineke ma were ịga ụka dị ka ihe dị mkpa
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị tọrọ Zonke, onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
O nwere nwa nwoke tupu ọnwụ ya
Lumbala nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Alaeze Afrịka LUMI bụ ego ọhụrụ nwere nkwenye dị nta

E guzobere ya dị ka ego iwu kwadoro n'ime afọ 2014 Bank Act of Accompong, obodo nweere onwe ya na Jamaica, ma nye ya ọha na eze site na Central Solar Reserve Bank of Accompog dị ka ego nke Sovereign Maroon State of Accompongo na ego akwụkwọ ụlọ akụ ya e bipụtara na Canada
Onye guzobere LUMI bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ego n'oge ahụ na Gọvanọ nke Ụlọ Akụ̀ nke Accompong, HH
Chief Timothy McPherson, onye bụ injinia ego zuru ụwa ọnụ nke sitere n'ókèala Maroon nke Queen Nanny nke Maroons na Island nke Jamaica

Ọ bụ ezie na e bipụtara AKL Lumi mbụ n'afọ 2016 maka iji ya mee ihe n'ime Accompong, kemgbe afọ 2020 ndị otu gọọmentị anabatala LUMI dị ka ego gọọmentị, ha gụnyere Economic Community of the States, Nations, Territories and Realms of the African Diaspora 6th Region (ECO-6), State of the African Baaspora, the African Kingdoms Federation, the United Kingdoms of Africa, na African Diaspor Central Bank

Otú ọ si la dị, Ụlọ Akụ̀ nke Jamaica dọrọ aka ná ntị megide ego ahụ, na-ekwu na 'Onye ọ bụla na-ekwu maka inye ego nke agwaetiti Jamaica site n'aka mmadụ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ na-abụghị Ụlọ Akùụ̀ nke Jamaican na-eme otu a na-enweghi nkwado nke ụlọ akụ Jamaica ma na-emegide kwa iwu usoro ụlọ akụ ahi'
enweghị ikike ma mebie Iwu Ụlọ Akùnd nke Jamaica'
N'ịbụ nke ike anyanwụ kwadoro site na nkwekọrịta ịzụta ịke, ego ahụ ruru 100Kwh nke ike anyanwụ, yana ọnụahịa na-akwụsi na 4 grains nke ọlaedo (02592 gram) maka 1 AKL
A naghịzi eji lumi eme ihe dị ka ego Accompong
Kama nke ahụ, ọ bụ African Diaspora Central Bank na-enye ya ugbu a
Colonel Richard Currie kpochapụrụ Central Solar Reserve Bank mgbe ọ nọchiri Colonel Ferron Williams dị ka onye isi ala ọhụrụ a họpụtara maka Accompong
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e nwere naanị 1 ego akwụkwọ, nke na-anọchite anya 1 lumi

N'afọ 2021, African Diaspora Central Bank (ADCB) kọrọ ngụkọta nke US $ 11 puku ijeri na azụmahịa n'etiti Afrịka na mbà zuru ụwa ọnụ site na iji LUMI; nke a bụ ihe karịrị otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ngụkọta GDP maka kọntinent Afrịka na US $ 27 puku ijeri n'afọ 2021
Ememe afọ ọhụrụ nke ọnwa na-esote dabere na kalenda lunisolar ọdịnala nke ndi China, mana pụrụ iche na omenala nke ha
N'agbanyeghị ịkekọrịta otu kalenda ọdịnala ndị China, ememme ọ bụla nwere ike ịnwe nkọwa dị iche iche na nke pụrụ iche, zodiac ma ọ bụ ọdịnala

Ọ bụ ezie na China na Korea ka na-eme ememe afọ ọhụrụ nke ọnwa na mgbakwunye na Afọ Ọhụrụ nke anyanwụ, Japan, ewezuga Okinawa, ugbu a na-eme ememe afọ ọhụrụ nke anyanwụ na ihe fọdụrụ nke ememme ọnwa a na-akpọ Little New Year eme na afọ ọhụrụ
Ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa mbụ na lunar
Tupu e hiwe emume afọ ọhụrụ, ndị China oge na ochie gbakọtara ma mee ememe na njedebe owuwe ihe ubi n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ
Otú ọ dị, ememe ahụ abụghị Ememe Mgbụsị akwụkwọ, n'oge ndị China na-ezukọ na ezinụlọ ma na-efe ọnwa

Na Classic of Poetry, uri e dere n'oge Western Zhou (1045 BC - 771 BC), nke onye ọrụ ugbo na-amaghị aha, kọwara otú ndị mmadụ si ehichapụ ebe nchịkọta millet, toasted ka ọbịa na mijiu, gbuo ụmụ atụrụ ma sie anụ, gaa N'ụlọ nna ha ukwu, toasted na nna ukwu, na-enwe obi ụtọ maka ogologo ndụ ọnụ, na 10th ọnwa nke oge ochie kalenda anyanwụ, nke bụ n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ
Ekwenyere na ememe a bụ otu n'ime ihe atụ nke afọ ọhụrụ ndị China
The Lunch Time Heroes bụ ihe nkiri ntọchị nke ezinụlọ Nigeria na 2015 site nduzi Seyi Babatope, ma gosipụta Dakore Akande, Omoni Oboli, Diana Yekinni, Tina Mba na Tope Tedela
Emere Lunch time heroes na Lagos ụbọchị iri na isii
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụaka ndị eji mee ihe nkiri bụ ndị e ji mee ihe nkiri ahụ sitere na chọọchị dị n'ógbè ahụ, ọ dịghịkwa nke ọ bụla nwere ahụmahụ n'ịrụ ọrụ mbụ

Tupu mmalite nke isi foto, onye nduzi, Babatope nwetara ụmụaka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na fim ka ha na-egwu egwu gburugburu, iji mee ka ha ghara ịdị na-etinye uche na foto, dollis, kable, na ọdiiche ogige ihe ngosi a
Eweputara Foto mmalite maka Lunch Time Heroes n'igwe ọha na eze na ntanetị n'ọnwa Maachị 2015
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Julaị 2015
Ọ malitere na FilmHouse Cinema, Surulere, Na Lagos n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015; na mwepụta ihe nkiri izugbe na 28 Ọgọst 2015
Ụda ụd isiokwu maka ihe nkiri ahụ, akpọrọ 'I Believe' nke Capital Femi, wepụtara na intanetị na 28 Ọgọstụ 2015, yana vidiyo egwu ya, nke gosipụtara ndị Sonyere mee ihe nkiri ahụ
ihe nkiri a nwere nnabata dị egwu
Amarachukwu Iwuala nke 360Nobs toro ihe nkiri onyonyo, mmepe agwa na ụda egwu, mana ọ na-akatọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka inwe ọtụtụ ekwekọghị ekwekọ na akụkọ ya
O kwubiri, sị 'Ọtụtụ akụkọ banyere Lunch Time Heroes bụ nke a na-ahụ anya, n'ihi aha ihe nkiri ahụ na ozi gbasara ihe nkwado, otu na-enwe mmasị na njem na-eduga na njedebe ikpeazụ'
Yvonne Anoruo na-eto ụda egwu ahụ, mana ọ na-ekwu na enweghị mmalite, yana ọtụtụ ekwekọghị ekwekọ
Ọ na-ekwu, sị ' Lunch Time Heroes nwere akụkọ dị mfe, yana ntụgharị na ntụgharị dị na arahi ahụ nghọta
Ọ na-elekwasị anya n'ịnọgide na-eguzosi ike n' isiokwu ya yana mkparịta ụka siri ike nke na ọ siri ike kpamkpam
Na njedebe nke ya, na ụfọdụ omee bụ ndị mfe ma agụcha omee ole na ole
Enwere ọtụtụ usoro mmehari ndewepụ ihe nkiri ahụ

Ngwaahịa ikpeazụ anaghị ewepụta mmetụta ọ bụla karịaN'ikpeazụ, maka ihe ọ na-enweghị n'ebe ọ bụla ọzọ, ihe nkiri a na-akwado ụmụaka na-eme ihe nkiri ' Jite Efemuaye na-ekwu, sị ' Lunch Time Heroes bụ ezigbo mbọ nke obere nlebara anya na nkọwa zuru ezu n'akụkụ onye isi nduzi

N'agbanyeghị ihe ịma aka ya niile, ọ bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ụtọ, nke ndị ezinụlọ niile nwere ike ịnụ ụtọ ya, mana ọ na-adị mfe ichefu' Yvonne Williams nke Nollywood Observer na- ekwu, sị 'Ọ bụ ezie na Lunch Time Heroes na-enye obi ụtọ site n'akụkọ akụkọ ya na-adịghị ahụkebe na ọmarịcha ihe ngosi sitere n'aka Dakore Akande na Tina Mba, ma rie mmeri na ikpa ọchị n'ike, ịdị mkpa nke atụmatụ ahụ, imebiga ihe ókè na ihe ndị ọzọ
Otú ọ dị, obi abụọ adịghị ya na ọ ga-abụ ihe obi ụtọ nye ndị ntorobịa na ndị na-eto eto n'obi'
Lung bụ asụsụ ekpochapubeghi nke oma nke yiri ka ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Ajumbu, asụsụ Southern Bantoid nke Cameroon
Àtụ Beboid languages
Lungiswa Gqunta (a mụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe

E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na ihe ngosi tinyekwara Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Kunsthal Zurich na Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University, University of Cape Town
A mụrụ Gqunta n'afọ 1990 na Port Elizabeth, South Africa
Ọ gara Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2012 na nzere bachelọ
N'afọ 2017, ọ natara MFA na Michaelis School of Fine Arts na Cape Town
Gqunta bụ onye guzobere iQhiya Collective, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Cape Town na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ala ndị ọchịchị na ihe nketa mbara igwe nke sitere na ha

Ọ na-eji ihe ndị a chọtara tinyekwara karama biya efu, mmanụ ụgbọala, akwa àkwà dọwara adọwa na akwa àkwà osisi na-eyi iji mepụta atụmatụ nke na-egosipụta ụdị ime ihe ike dị iche iche na enweghị nhata na South Africa
O gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na South Africa gụnyere Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa na Johannesburg Art Gallery (JAG)
O gosipụtala ọrụ ya na mpaghara na mba ụwa
Ọtutu n'ime ihe ngosi nke naanị ya na nke otu o sonyere gụnyere
Gqunta bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town
Asụsụ Luo bụ asụsụ a na-amaghị aha ya nke a na-asụ n'otu akụkụ na mpaghara Atta nke Cameroon
Ọ bụ asụsụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, ma ọ bụ ikekwe o ga-apu n'anya, nke nwere naanị otu onye na-ekwu okwu fọdụrụ na 1995
Àtụ Languages of Cameroon
Lurdes de Maria Lima Pires dos Santos bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ìgwè mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị so na National Assembly n'afọ 1975
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1975, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị inyom isii mbụ nọ na ndị omeiwu
Lushomo Mweemba (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agbachitere ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Zambia
O sonyere Zambia na afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu egwuregwu atọ
Ọchịchọ bụ ike nke uche na-emepụta ọchịchọ siri ike maka ihe, ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ mgbe ọ nwere nnukwu ihe achọrọ
Ọchịchọ nwere ike iwere ụdị ọ bụla dịka agụụ mmekọahụ (lee agụụ mmekọahụ), ego, ma ọ bụ ike
Ọ nwere ike iwere ụdị ụwa dị ka agụụ maka nri (lee agụụ) dị iche na mkpa maka nri ma ọ bụ agụụ maka redolence, mgbe mmadụ na-achọ otu ísì nke na-eweta ncheta
Ọ yiri ma dị iche na agụụ mmekọahụ, n'ihi na agụụ mmekọahụ na-akpali ndị mmadụ iru ihe mgbaru ọsọ dị mma ebe agụụ mmekọahụ anaghị eme
Okpukpe na-emekarị ka ọdịiche dị na etiti agụụ mmekọahụ na agụụ mmekọahụ site na ịga na ihu na-akọwa agụụ mmekọahụ dị ka ọchịchọ rụrụ arụ na agụụ mmekọahụ dị iche iche dị ka omume nabatara

A na-akọwa agụụ mmekọahụ dị ka omume rụrụ arụ na ihi na a na-ahazi ihe ma ọ bụ omume ịhụnanya ya n'ụzọ na-ekwesịghị ekwesị dịka iwu okike na / ma ọ bụ agụụ maka otu ihe ahụ (dịka agụụ mmekọahụ) na-achịkwa ọgụgụ isi na uche mmadụ karịa ọgụgụ isi ma na-achị achị agụụ maka ihe ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na agụụ, na agbanyeghị ike ya, ka a na-ejigide ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe Chineke nyere na omume ọma, na ihi na ebumnuche, omume na ebumnucha dị na azụ ya dị mma ma nye iwu maka ihe okike, ebe ọgụgụ isi na uche onye ahụ na-achịkwa ya
Otu ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ isi nke echiche banyere nke a bụ Thomism, nke na-ekwu maka ọgụgụ isi, ọchịchọ na agụụ, ma na-adabere na ụkpụrụ Aristotle kọwara
Otú ọ dị, nkọwa ziri ezi e nyere ihe doro anya na omume ọma ma nye iwu maka okike dabere na okpukpe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọdịiche dị n'etiti okpukpe ndị dabeere na pantheism na theism ga-adị iche n'ihe bụ omume ọma dabere na ọdịdị nke 'Chineke' kwetara ma ọ bụ sọpụrụ
Na okpukpe ndị Juu, a na-eji Yetzer hara (Hibru, י הרצרע, ajọ ọchịchọ) mara ihe niile na agụụ nke anụ ahụ
Yetzer hara abụghị ike mmụọ ọjọọ; kama, ọ bụ iji ihe ndị ahụ chọrọ iji dịrị ndụ mee ihe na uzọ na-ezighị ezi, a na-ejikarị ya tụnyere yetzer hatov (Hibru, יצרדה, ọchịchọ dị mma)
A na-ejikarị Yetzer HaRa tụnyere Setan na mmụọ ozi nke ọnwụ, mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-enwekarị ọchịchọ inye yetzer àgwà na ọrụ dị iche
Na ihi na yetzer, dị ka Setan, na-eduhie mmadụ n'ụwa a, ma na-agba akaebe megide ya n'ụwa na-abịa
Otú ọ dị, a na-eme ka yetzer dị iche na Setan, na n'oge ndị ọzọ a na-emekwa ka ọ bụrụ mmehie
A na-ewere Torah dị ka nnukwu ọgwụ mgbochi megide ike a

Ọ bụ ezie na, dị ka ihe niile Chineke mere, a pụrụ ịchịkwa yetzer hara (ajọ ọchịchọ) ka ọ mee ihe ọma na ihi na na na-enweghị ya, mmadụ agaghị alụ di ma ọ bụ nwunye, mụọ nwa, wuo ụlọ, ma ọ bụ tinye onwe ya n'ọrụ
Na otụtụ nsụgharị nke Agba Ọhụrụ, okwu ahụ bụ 'ọchịchọ' sụgharịrị okwu Grik Koine ἐπιθυμέω (epithūméō), ọkachasị na Matiu 5 27-28
Na mba ndị na-asụ Bekee, a na-ejikọkarị okwu ahụ bụ 'ọchịchọ' na agụụ mmekọahụ, ma eleghị anya n'ihi amaokwu a
Otú ọ dị, dịka okwu Bekee bụ okwu n'ozuzu maka 'ọchịchọ', okwu Grik ἐπιθυμέω bụkwa okwu n'ógbè maka ọchịchọ
Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu LSJ na-atụ aro 'ịtọ obi mmadụ n'elu ihe, ọ dị mkpa, agụụ, ọchịchọ' dị ka nkọwa maka ἐπιθυμέω, nke a na-eji na amaokwu ndị doro anya na-enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na agụụ mmekọahụ
Na Septuagint, ἐπιθυμέω bụ okwu e ji mee ihe n'iwu ka ị ghara ịchọ agụụ
Ọ bụ ezie na agụụ mmekọahụ nwunye onye agbata obi gị nwere ike ịgụnye agụụ mmekọahụ, o yighị ka agụụ mmekọahụ ụlọ ma ọ bụ ubi onye agbata obi bụ mmekọahụ na ụdị
Na ọtụtụ ihe Agba Ọhụrụ, otu okwu Grik ahụ, ἐπιθυμέω, enweghị ihe doro anya gbasara mmekọahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, site na American Standard Version, a na-eji otu okwu ahụ eme ihe na èzí ihe ọ bụla gbasara mmekọahụ
Luster Willis (1913), bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe si Terry, Mississippi nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise na ihe osise ya
O jiri ụdị ihe osise dị iche iche na collage mee ihe iji dọta uche na adịghị ike nke mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
A mụrụ Luster Willis n'ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1913
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ ruo na klas nke asatọ, wee malite ọrụ ugbo ógè niile mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
N'oge opupu ihe ubi na ógè okpomọkụ ọ nyeere nnà ya aka n'ilekọta ugbo ha dị hekta iri isii
N'oge oyi, ọ gburu osisi ma mee njikọ màkà Illinois Central Railroad
Ọ lụrụ Louvennia Bozman n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1934, ọ bụ ezie na ha enweghị ụmụ nke ha, ha zụlitere ụmụ nwanne nné abụọ
N'afọ 1943, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye n'agha America n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ nọrọ na Europe ruo afọ atọ, ọ bụkwa na Germany, France, na Austria ebe mbụ ọ hụrụ ezigbo nka
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ọrụ agha n'afọ 1947
Ọ laghachiri Egypt Hill, Mississippi wee gaa Magnolia Trade School na Jackson, Mississippi màkà asambodo onye na-akpụ isi ya
Nná Willis nwụrụ na 1963 ma Willis ketara ugbo ya, ebe o bìrì ndụ ya fọdụrụ
Mgbè ọ dara ọrịa strok na mberede na 1986, Willis enweghị ike ịmepụta ọrụ nka ndị ọzọ
Ọ nwụrụ nanị afọ ole na ole mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na 1991
Willis gosipụtara mmasị na nkà màkà nka n'oge ọ dị obéré
Otú ọ dị, ndị nkụzi ya kụdara mmasị nka ya, na-eleghara ha anya dị ka ndị na-abaghị uru na ndị na-enweghị isi
Ka o sina dị, Willis gara n'ihu na-ese ma na-eme ihe okike ya
N'oge Great Depression, ọ tụrụ osisi ije maka ndị agbata obi ya na Mississippi, na-ekwe nkwa 'ịtinye mkpara n'aka onye agadi ọ bụla nọ na obéré ọbọdọ ya'
Ogwe osisi ya, nke gosipụtara mmadụ n'onwe ya n'isi osisi ahụ, nwere ihe ịga nke ọma nke na ha bụ isi ihe ọ na-enweta n'oge Nsogbu, na-akwụ ụgwọ n'etiti cents irí asaá na isé na dollar ise nke ọ bụla
Mgbe Willis ketara ugbo nna ya na 1963, o nwere ohere na nnwere onwe ka ukwuu iji mepụta n'ụzọ nke ya, ya mere ọ malitere ise ihe na ise ihe na nke mbụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, William Ferris, onye nduzi nke Center for the Study of Southern Culture na Mahadum Mississippi chọpụtara ọrụ ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ Willis na ihe ngosi ndị a
Ọrụ Willis dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị a
Luther Aholo (ihe dị ka na March 16, 1888) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi n'ọtụtụ ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Alaeze nke Hawaii
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge dị ka onye omeiwu si Maui na Minista nke Interior site na 1886 ruo 1887
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Hawaiian na-eduga n'ọgbọ ya, e jiri nkà ya dị ka ọkà okwu tụnyere nke onye ọchịchị Gris oge ochie Solon
A mụrụ Aholo na 1833, n'àgwàetiti Maui
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Lahainaluna Seminary ma mesịa ghọọ onye ọka iwu na onye ọka ikpe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha ụtụ isi maka agwaetiti Maui
A na-ele ya anya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nwoke nwere 'ụbụrụ na ikike', o nwere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ogologo ma dị iche
A hoputara Aholo otutu oge dika onye otu ulo omebe iwu, ulo omebe iwu nke ala eze, maka mpaghara Lahaina, n'agwaetiti Maui
Ọ nọdụrụ ala dịka onye nnọchi anya n'oge ọgbakọ ndị omebe iwu nke 1860, 1866, 1867 na nnọkọ niile sitere na 1870 ruo 1886
Site na 1876 ruo 1886, ọ nọkwasịrị dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ọgbakọ omebe iwu ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'October 13, 1886 iji sonye na kabinet nke 1870 ruo 1886
Eze Kalākaua
N'ihe gbasara onye na-ekwu okwu na ndị omebe iwu nke ukwuu, ụfọdụ na-akpọ ya 'Solon of the House', mgbe onye ọchịchị Gris oge ochie bụ Solon gasịrị
Dị ka akaebe e mesịrị nke Charles T
n'ime ụlọ '
Aholo bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu isii na nnọkọ iwu ọzọ nke 1874, bụ ndị họpụtara Queen Emma kama onye mmeri Kalākaua, ọ bụ ezie na ọ ga-emecha mee ka ya na eze dịghachi n'otu
Site na Nọvemba 1874 ruo Febụwarị 1875, Aholo jere ozi dị ka Gọvanọ na-anọchite anya Maui mgbe Gọvanor John Mākini Kapena so Kalākaua gaa na nleta steeti ya na United States
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ, odeakwụkwọ onwe onye na osote gọvanọ nke Maui n'okpuru John Owen Dominis mgbe Dominis bụ Gọvanọ nkeMaui site na 1878 ruo 1886
Ọ ghọrọ enyi nwunye Dominis, Princess Liliʻuokalani, onye kuchiri nwa ya nwanyị Lydia Kaʻonohiponiponiokalani Aholo
Luthuli bụ aha madu sitere na ndịda Afrịka
Lutisha Pettway (1925-2001) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke jikọtara ya na otu Gee's Bend nkè ndị na-ese akwa
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nké Museum of Fine Arts Houston
N'elu nsogbụ akụ na ụba nke ọtụtụ ndị otu Gee's Bend na-eche ihu, Lutisha Pettway nwèrè nsogbụ onwe ónyé nke méré ka ọgụ ya sie ike
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere ma hapụ nna ya ka ọ lekọta ya na ụmụnne ya
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị na-enweghị mmasị n'ilekọta ụmụ ya, ya mere ọtụtụ ọrụ ụlọ dakwasịrị Lutisha
Pettway alụghị di
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugbo n'akụkụ nna ya ruo mgbè ndị otu Rentz Realty & Investments weghaara ala nna ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Lutisha kwagara Mobile, Alabama ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ezinụlọ ndị ọcha
Nnukwu mmụba a na ụgwọ ọrụ nyèrè ohere iziga nna ya ego na Gee's Bend iji gbochie ụgwọ nlekọta ụmụaka maka ụmụ ya itoolu, gụnyere nwa ya nwoke nwere Down Syndrome
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Mobile ruo afọ isii na ọkara, ọ laghachikwara Gee's Bend mgbe nna ya dara ọrịa
Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, ọ hapụrụ ala ya nye nwanne Lutisha Yancy
Lutisha nwụrụ na 2001 mgbè ọ dị afọ 76
N'ịbụ ónyé maara nke ọma n'ọtụtụ nkà akwa, Lutisha bụ ónyé na-emepụta ákwà, onye na-akpa ákwà na ónyé na-akwa ákwà
Ọ mụtara ịkpa ákwà n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kụziere onwe ya ịkpa ábụ́bà na ịkpa ákwá
Akpụkpọ ahụ ya bụ ihe dị mkpa iji mee ka ụmụ ya na-ekpo ọkụ n'oge oyi ma na-ejikarị uwe ọrụ a rụgharịrị arụgharị eme ya
Ọ na-adabere na igwe ịkwa akwa iji kpụọ akwa ya mgbè ọ na-arịa ọrịa ogbu na nkwonkwo, mana ọ na-eji aka rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ ya tupu nke ahụ
Luvenia C
Miller (Ọnwa Septemba 14, afọ 1909 - rụọ ọnwa Septemba 6, afọ 1997) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Biological Photographers Association
Miller nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Science na Home Economics site na Hampton Institute n'afọ 1934, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ kụziri ihe ruo afọ asatọ na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke North Carolina
N'afọ 1943, ọ debanyere aha na Women's Army Corps (WAC)
Miller bụ onye na-ese foto nwere ahụmahụ, ọ ghọkwara nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ gafere ule State Board of Photographers, yana nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka nke mbụ jere ozi na ngalaba foto nke WAC
Miller hapụrụ ndị agha dị ka onye isi
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, e liri ya na Arlington National Cemetery

Luxor (Arabic , , lit
'obí eze') bụ obodo nke oge a na Upper (n'ebe ndịda) Ijipt nke gụnyere ebe obodo Ijipt oge ochie nke dị
A na-akọwakarị Luxor dị ka 'ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi ikuku ikuku kachasị n'ụwa', ebe mkpọmkpọ ebe ụlọ nsọ Egypt dị na Karnak na Luxor guzoro n'ime obodo ọgbara ọhụrụ
Ozugbo chere ihu, n'ofe Osimiri Naịl, ka ihe ncheta, ụlọ arụsị na ili dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ Theban Necropolis, nke gụnyere Ndagwurugwu Ndị Eze na Ndagwurugwu Queens
Ọtụtụ puku ndị njem nlegharị anya si gburugburu ụwa na-abịa kwa afọ ịga leta ihe ncheta Luxor, na-atụnye ụtụ dị ukwuu na akụ na ụba nke obodo ọgbara ọhụrụ
Ndị bi na Luxor bụ 422,407 (2021), na mpaghara ihe dịka 417 km2 ( mi)
Ọ bụ isi obodo Luxor Governorate
Ọ bụ otu n'ime obodo ndị mmadụ kacha ochie n'ụwa
Aha Luxor (Arabic , , lit
, a na-akpọ /ˈlʌksɔːr, ˈlʊk-/, Egyptian Arabic pronunciation [ˈloʔsːoɾ], Upper Egyptian [ˈ loɡsːor]) sitere na Arabic qasr (قصر), nke pụtara 'obí eze')
Aha Sahidic Coptic Pape (Coptic), sitere na Demotic 'adyton', nke, n'aka nke ya, sitere na Ijipt
Ụdị Grik bụ Ōnʹnʹn na Ōn·φιεῖον sitere n'otu isi iyi
Obodo nta Ijipt Aba al-Waqf (Arabic, Ancient Greek) nwere otu okwu ahụ
Aha Grik bụ Thebes (Grik oge ochie) ma ọ bụ Diospolis
Aha ndị Ijipt nke obodo ahụ bụ Waset, nke a makwaara dị ka Nut (Coptic)
Luxor bụ obodo oge ochie nke Thebes, isi obodo nke Upper Egypt n'oge Alaeze Ọhụrụ, na obodo Amun, nke mesịrị ghọọ chi Amun-Ra

A na-ewere obodo ahụ n'ihe odide ndị Ijipt oge ochie dị ka wAst (nke a na-akpọ 'Waset'), nke pụtara 'obodo nke mkpanaka', ma mesịa na Demotic Egyptian dị ka tapt (nke a kpọrọ 't A ipt' ma ọ pụtara 'ụlọ nsọ / ụlọ nsọ', nke ndị Gris maara ugbu a dị ka 'nakets'

A makwaara Thebes dị ka 'obodo nke ọnụ ụzọ ámá 100', mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'Heliopolis nke ndịda' ('Iunu-shemaa' na Ijipt oge ochie), iji mee ka ọ dị iche na obodo Iunu ma ọ bụ Heliopolis, isi ebe ofufe maka chi Ra n'ebe ugwu

A na-akpọkarị ya niwt, nke pụtara 'obodo', ọ bụkwa otu n'ime naanị obodo atọ dị n'Ijipt nke e ji aha a mee ihe (abụọ ndị ọzọ bụ Memphis na Heliopolis); a na-akpọkwa ya niw, 'obodo ndịda', dịka ndịda ha
Luzmila Nicolalde Cordero (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1957) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi ihe onyonyo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ecuador, ọ bụ onye Kansụl nke Obodo Guayaquil ugbu a
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nwere ahụmahụ na telivishọn Ecuadorian, nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ na isii na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Luzmila Nicolalde, onye amụrụ na 1 June 1957 na Guayaquil, banyere ụwa telivishọn mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, na-apụta na TC Televisión's Panorama infantil ka ọ bụrụ abụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ ga-apụtakwa na La discoteca de Pepe Parra, mgbe ahụ na Chispazos, na-agba ọsọ kemgbe afọ 1987

Nicolalde mere njem mbụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Congress of Ecuador na ntuli aka omebe iwu nke afọ 2006 [es], na-anọchite anya Patriotic Society Party Ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu na-ahụ maka ntuli aka chụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya n'oge ọgba aghara omebe iwu nke afọ 2007 na arịrịọ nke Onye isi ala Rafael Correa iji guzobe ọgbakọ omebe iwu Ecuadorian
N'afọ 2009, Nicolalde pụtara dị ka onye isi na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo Guayaquil maka Patriotic Society Party, ọ kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa
Otú ọ dị, PSP gọnahụrụ nkwado ọ bụla maka Nicolalde, kama ịkwado Jaime Nebot maka nhọpụta ọzọ
Lweendo Chisamu (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba n'etiti ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Zambia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afo 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Chibolya Queens na Zambia
Lycée Français Louis Pasteur de Lagos bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mba France dị na Victoria Island, Lagos, Naijiria
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ọkwa praịmarị na sekọndrị
E hiwere French School of Lagos n'afọ 1958 site na Association Française du Nigeria (AFN)
Tupu e wuo ụlọ akwụkwọ dị ugbu a na 1987 site n'enyemaka nke French Ministry of Foreign Affairs, ọ kwagara ọtụtụ ebe na Ikoyi na Victoria Island
AFN bụ òtù na-enweghị uru, otu ndị nlekọta nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye a
Ndị nne na nna bụ ndị otu ahụ ma họpụta ndị nne na nna n'etiti ha ka ha guzobe kọmitii njikwa

Site na nkwekọrịta a bịanyere aka na 2002 na Agency for French Education Abroad (AEFE; French Agence pour l'enseignement français à l'étranger), ụlọ ọrụ nke French Ministry of the Foreign Affairs, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ jikọtara ya na ndị ọchịchị France nke na-enye ya nkwado ego
Dabere na nkwekọrịta ahụ, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye akara na diplọma French na-enye ohere maka ọmụmụ post-gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum French na mahadum ndị ọzọ dị na Europe yana Quebec, Canada
(Lycee Francais nke Lagos bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ 494 dabere na AEFE n'ụwa)
N'afọ 1997, ụlọ akwụkwọ French ghọrọ 'Lycee Français'
E mere mgbatị nke ụlọ dị ugbu a na 1998 na 2004
Lycée Français Louis Pasteur nwere ụlọ atọ, ogige abụọ, na ebe egwuregwu atọ
Otu isi ụlọ nwere klas, ụlọ nyocha, CDI na BCD (ọbá akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ), nchịkwa, ụlọ nzukọ

Otu ụlọ nwere 'Salle des Droits de l São Hum' nke bụ ụlọ nzukọ eji eme ihe ngosi niile (ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi, nnukwu nzukọ, wdg) na maka ụfọdụ asọmpi egwuregwu ma ọ bụ ọzụzụ (egwuregwu mmega ahụ, karate, fencing, wdgỌ dị iche iche Ikike ya bụ ihe dị ka oche narị abụọ
N'akụkụ, e nwere ụlọ oriri ọhụrụ, ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị nkuzi nwere ike ịzụta nri ma ọ bụ ihe oriri
Otu ụlọ nwere klas ụfọdụ maka mgbakọ na mwepụ na nkuzi asụsụ, na ọfịs nke CPE na 'Vie Scolaire' nke na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
E nwere ogige egwuregwu dị n'ime ụlọ nke a na-ejikarị eme basketball, handball, na volleyball
Ogige ahịhịa dị n'èzí dị mma maka bọọlụ ma ọ bụ ịgba ọsọ
N'afọ 2017, e wuru ọdọ mmiri
Lydia Ankrah (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-agbachitere
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup na afọ 2007 FIFA Women'S World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Post Ladies na Ghana

Lydia Chekwel (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi nke Uganda na-anọchite anya Kween District dị ka nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu nke itoolu na nke iri nke Uganda
O guzoro dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya na 10th Parliament of Uganda
Otú ọ dị, na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu, ọ sonyeere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
N'afọ 1976, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examinations na Moyok Primary School
N'afọ 1981, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda Advanced na St Elizabeth Senior Secondary School, Kidetok

N'afọ 1988, e nyere ya asambodo ndị nkuzi praịmarị site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo ma mesịa laghachi na Institute of Professor Education Kyambog maka diplọma na nkuzi ndị nkuzi n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2008, e nyere ya nzere bachelọ na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Kyambogo
Site na afo 1988 ruo na afor 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Chemwania Primary School ma mesịa sonye na Kapchorwa Primary Teachers College dị ka onye nduzi site na afo 2000 ruo na afo 2011
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye omeiwu na ụlọ omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị ọkachamara dị ka onye otu Red Cross na onye otu zuru oke nke Teachers Association
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ndị ọzọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Kọmiti na-ahụkarị maka agụmakwụkwọ na egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye otu UWOPA nke 10th Parliament

Lydia Chekwel, onye nọ n'ọkwa nwanyị MP, kemgbe afọ 2011 na-alụ ọgụ na nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Rose Emma Cherukut, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Pakalast, onye bụbu Kapchorwa Resident District Commissioner (RDC)
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, Chekwel kpebiri ịgba ọsọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya ọzọ mgbe Cherukut meriri ya na ntuli aka pati
Cherukut nwetara vootu 19,004 ebe Chekwel nwetara vootu 15,041
Ọ lụrụ Alfred Barteka, nwanne Andrew Yesho, onye bụ nna Ms Cherukut
Ihe ntụrụndụ Lydia na-arụ ọrụ na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, ịgụ akwụkwọ na njem
O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na nduzi na ndụmọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ntorobịa, ịhazi na inyere ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ okorobịa aka, ịkwado obodo na-ewu ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ ụka / ụlọ alakụba
Lydia Cheromei (amụrụ na 15 na onwa Mee na afọ 1977, na Baringo District) bụ onye Kenya na-eme egwuregwu nke amụrụ n'ezinụlọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na ịgba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ site na mmeri na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto na IAAF World Cross Country Championships
O wepụrụ afọ ole na ole n'asọmpi, na-ekwu maka ike ọgwụgwụ, wee laghachi n'etiti afọ iri itoolu, na-apụta na afo 1996 Atlanta Olympics
Cheromei nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'okporo ụzọ, na-enweta mmeri na Saint Silvester Road Race wee bịa nke isii n'okpọ ụzọ na 2000 Summer Olympics
O sonyeghị na asọmpi site na afo 2001 ruo 2004 n'ihi nsogbu onwe onye, ọ tụfuru afọ abụọ ọzọ nke asọmpi mgbe nyocha doping dị mma na afọ 2006
Cheromei laghachiri na afọ 2008 wee malite ịsọ mpi na marathons, onye nkuzi Ịtali Gabriele Nicola sochiri, na-enweta mmeri mbụ na Amsterdam Marathon
Lydia Cheromei bụ nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ asaa
Ya na nne na nna ya na ụmụnne ya Joseph, Jeremiah na David na-akọrọ mmasị ya maka ịgba ọsọ
Nne ya na-agba ọsọ nkeji isii, ebe nna ya na afọ 2010 ka na-agba kilomita asaa mgbe ọ dị afọ 72
Ụmụnne ya nwoke Joseph na Jeremiah nọchitere anya Kenya na Olimpik
David Cheromei na-ekwu na ọ bụ mmụọ nsọ kpaliri ya iwere ịgba ọsọ n'ụzọ siri ike ka ihere wee ghara ime ya maka nwanne ya nwanyị na-eti ya ihe
Onye na-eme egwuregwu ibe ya na onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa Paul Tergat bụ nwa nwanne ya
Na Septemba na afọ 2006 Lydia mụrụ nwa nwanyị, Faith Chelagat
Cheromei bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara na World Junior Championships ma merie na Junior category nke World Cross Country Championships na afọ 1991 mgbe ọ dị afọ 13
O meriri ule Kenya maka afọ 1991 World Championships, mana a na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-eto eto iji sọọ mpi na Tokyo
Ọ bụ Sister Christine Heverin nke Singore Girls Secondary School zụrụ ya n'oge ahụ
Ọ naghị arụ ọrụ n'etiti afọ 1994 na 1997, ebe ọ bụ na a na-ekwu na onye na-agba ọsọ ahụ gbara ọkụ
Ọ laghachiri mana o nwere ezumike afọ atọ ọzọ ruo 2004 n'ihi nsogbu onwe onye
Cheromei nwere mmeri atọ (afọ 1999, 2000 na 2004) na Saint Silvester Road Race nke a na-eme kwa afọ na Brazil
O meriri na afọ 2004 Zevenheuvelenloop site na ịgba ọsọ 47 02, oge nke abụọ kachasị mma 15K
N'afọ 2006, a mara Cheromei ikpe maka ọgwụ clomiphene doping
E nyere ihe nnwale ahụ na 24 Febụwarị, na afọ 2005 na ule na-abụghị asọmpi na Eldoret
A kwụsịtụrụ ya na IAAF site na Mee na afọ 2005 ruo Mee 2007
O kwuru na ọ na-aṅụ ọgwụ ahụ n'okpuru ọgwụ nke dọkịta ya ka ọ na-enweta ọgwụgwọ ọmụmụ n'oge ule
Mmachibido iwu ahụ nọgidere n'ihi na ọ gwaghị ndị isi dị mkpa banyere ozi ahụ
Cheromei meriri na afọ 2008 Rotterdam Half Marathon na ndekọ nke 68 35; ndekọ gara aga (69 13) bụ nke ya onwe ya setịpụrụ na afọ 2004 mgbe ọ merikwara ihe omume ahụ
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na marathon mbụ site na mmeri na 2008 Amsterdam Marathon na oge 22527
Na afọ 2009 Rotterdam Marathon ọ mechara nke abụọ n'azụ Nailya Yulamanova nke Russia
Ọ gbara ọsọ na 2011 Dubai Marathon wee nweta ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Aselefech Mergia na oge ya nke 2 23 01 gosipụtara ọganihu karịa ihe kachasị mma ya karịa nkeji atọ
Ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ nke Prague Half Marathon n'ọnwa Eprel na oge mmeri ya nke 1 07 33 gosipụtara ọganihu ọrụ maka anya nke ihe karịrị otu nkeji
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, ọ laghachiri n'obodo ahụ n'ụzọ gara nke ọma, merie Prague Marathon na oge ndekọ nke 2 22 34, ọzọ bụ nke kachasị mma
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ meriri Marseille-Cassis Classic na ndekọ ndekọ nke 1 08 23 awa, mana ọ bụ naanị nke ise na Delhi Half Marathon n'ọnwa na-esote
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasị tupu asọmpi na afọ 2012 Dubai Marathon na Jenụwarị, mana ọ gwụchara n'ọnọdụ nke isii
Otú ọ dị, ọ ka na-emeziwanye ihe kachasị mma ya site na ihe karịrị otu nkeji site na ọsọ nke awa 2 21 30 n'ọhịa ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye ọkacha mmasị iji chebe aha ya na 2012 Prague Half Marathon ma mepụta ihe kachasị mma nke 1 07 26 awa, mana Joyce Chepkirui meriri ya
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Prague Marathon, ọ banyere dị ka onye ọkacha mmasị ma nọgide na-agba ọsọ ọsọ ruo 30K, mana o mechara hapụ kilomita ole na ole site na njedebe na-ata ahụhụ site na mmerụ ahụ ụkwụ
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke anọ na Lille Half Marathon na 2012 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships, nke bụ mpụta mba ụwa mbụ ya n'ime afọ asatọ
Ọ gbara ọsọ nke 2 23 07 iji merie Yokohama Women's Marathon na Nọvemba
Ọ banyere na afọ 2013 Prague Marathon na olile anya nke iṅomi mmeri ya afọ abụọ gara aga, mana nsogbu ọkpụkpụ hapụrụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke isii

Àtụ S-end
Daphine Lydia Mirembe (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị distrikti maka mpaghara Butambala na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
O meriri oche na ndị omeiwu na 2016 na tiketi onwe ya mgbe o meriri Aisha Kabanda nke National resistance movement (NRM) na ntuli aka 2016 nke Uganda
Mirembe gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kibibi maka ọkwa 'O' na agụmakwụkwọ 'A'
O nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda na 2002 na asambodo agụmụ nke Uganda Advanced na 2004
O mechara sonye na Makerere University Business School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor na Leisure and Hospitality Management na 2009
Mirembe bụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Butambala ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya kemgbe 2016
Na omeiwu, ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ọrịa HIV / AIDS na kọmiti na-ahụ Maka ahụike
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association ebe ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mmebi iwu mmekọahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Buganda caucus na ndị omeiwu
Tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ omebe iwu, Mirembe na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Mirembe Foundation site na 2013 ruo 2016
Na mbido ọrụ ya ọ bụ onye na-echekwa ego na Orient Bank n'etiti afọ 2011 na 2012
Lydia Forson (amụrụ 24 Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Ghana, onye edemede, na onye na -emepụta ihe
N'afọ 2010, o meriri nturu ugo ihe nkiri 'African Movie Academy Award' maka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ịkwalite ọrụ
A mụrụ Forson na 24 Ọktoba 1984 na Mankessim, Ghana
Ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya na Wilmore Elementary School na Kentucky
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Ghana, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na -agụ akwụkwọ na Akosombo International School
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Louis, Kumasi, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Forson gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ghana, nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor na Asụsụ Bekee na Ọmụmụ Ozi
Ọrụ Forson malitere site na ọrụ bịara na nkwari akụ St
James (2005), Run Baby Run (2006), Different shaded of Blue (2007) na ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi n'ezie The Next Movie Star na Nigeria (2007)
Shirley Frimpong Manso, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Sparrow Productions, onye ya na ya rụburu ọrụ na usoro telivishọn Ghana Different Shaded of Blue, kpọghachite Forson na enyo site na ihe nkiri Scorned
Ọrụ a mere ka ọ bụrụ nhọpụta nke mbụ African Movie Academy Awards (AMAA) dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
Na 2009, Forson gosiputara na inwe-emeri Perfect Picture site na Shirley Frimpong-Manso
Ọ nọrọla na A Sting in a Tale, phone swap, Masquerades, Keteke na Sidechic Gang
(In The Cupboard)
Lydia Casey Jele (née Mashila; amụrụ na 22 June 1990) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na Botswana na-asọ mpi na mita 400
O sonyere na relay na 2013 World Championships na-enweghị iru eru maka nke ikpeazụ
Ọ gbara ọsọ mita 400 na 2016 Summer Olympics
O ruru eru site na mmeri na Botswana Athletics Association Championships
Ihe kachasị mma ya bụ 1151 na mita 100, 2455 na mita 200 (-01 m / s, Shenzhen 2011) na 5265 na mita 400 (Porto Novo 2012)
Jele bụ onye nsọ nke ụbọchị ikpeazụ
Lydia Katjita (amụrụ na 15 Ọktoba na afo 1953 na Omatjete, Erongo Region, Namibia) bụ onye bụbu onye otu National Assembly of Namibia na Pan-African Parliament
A mụrụ Lydia Katjita na 15 na onwa Ọktoba na afo 1953 na Omatjete na mpaghara Erongo nke etiti Namibia
N'afọ 1989, ọ natara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị dị elu (HPEC) na Mahadum Namibia
Ọ nwetara BA
na Mahadum nke South Africa na afo 1996 wee debanye aha na Master of Educational Management and Administration program na Mahadim nke Namibia n'afọ sochirinụ
Site na afo 1980 ruo mmalite nke ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ya na afo 1999, Katjita bụ onye nkuzi

N'oge a, o nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa ndị ọzọ, gụnyere onye isi ngalaba maka sayensị, mgbakọ na mwepụ, Bekee, na Afrikaans na Ministry of Education na Grootfontein (na afo 1993 wee ruo 1999), onye otu ụlọ akwụkwọ na kọmitii njikwa na Kalenga English Primary School (na afo 1993 wee ruo 1995), onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke ụka Evangelical Lutheran na Grootfonstein (1994-n'oge na-adịbeghị anya), onyeisi oche nke Grootfontein Town Council (1995-1996), onye nkuzi oge na Namibia College of Open Learning (NAMCOL) na Grootfontain (1995-1999), na Grootfon protein (1997)
Katjita ghọrọ onye otu nke atọ National Assembly of Namibia na afo 2000 (na-anọchite anya SWAPO) ma nọgide n'ọkwa ruo mgbe ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Namibia gasịrị na onwa Nọvemba na afo 2004
N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii ndị omeiwu iji nabata nhọpụta maka Nobel Peace Prize na Namibia

Katjita bụkwa onye otu alaka Namibia nke Commonwealth Parliamentary Association na Pan-African Parliament, ebe ọ nọ na Kọmitii Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Pan-Africa Parliamentary Women Caucus
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ maka nchịkwa na ego nke nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị Pan African
Lydia Koyonda (amụrụ ya na 29 Mee afọ 1974) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naịjirịa gbara bọọlụ dika onye nche nke otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
O so na ndị otu egwuregwu na 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Ufuoma Babes na Naijiria

Lydia Mokgokoloshi (a mụrụ na 27 Septemba 1939) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Koko Mantsha na nne Charity Ramabu na nne nne Katlego (Kat) na Joseph(Jojo) na ncha SABC 1, Skeem Saam
Ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ dịka Mma Nkwesheng na ihe nkiri 1980s, Bophelo ke Semphekgo
A mụrụ ya na obere obodo dị na mpụga Polokwane nke a na-akpọ BOTLOKWA
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi tupu ya enweta ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ime ihe dịka Mma Nkwesheng, ajọ nne di na ihe nkiri Pedi TV a ma ama, Bophelo ke semphekgo
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri TV dịka Ngwanaka Okae, Muvhango, na ugbu a na Skeem Saam
Lydia Oulmou (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa 2, Febụwarị 1986) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa, na egwuri egwu dị ka onye na egbochi etiti
Ọ nọ na ndị otu Algeria nke gara 2008 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu Algeria na 2012 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Lydia Ourahmane (amụrụ n'afọ 1992, Saïda, Algeria) bụ onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na Algiers
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa na ebe nke gụnyere Ca' Pesaro, Louisiana Museum of Modern Art, Manifesta, Kunstverien München

Ebe ngosi nka ọhụrụ, Chisenhale Gallery, Istanbul Modern the Centro per l'Arte Contemporanea Luigi Pecci, Zachęta National Gallery of Art, Institute of Contemporary Arts, World Museum na Wattis Institute for Contemporary Arts
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Goldsmiths nke London n'afọ 2014
Lyès Salem (Arabic) (Algiers, 1973) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Lynda Chuba-Ikpeazu, onye a makwa nke oma dika Lynda Chuba (a mụru ya n'ubochi iri abuo na abuo n'onwa nke isii, n'aro otu puku, nari iteghete, iri isii na isii)
Nwa onye bugoro onye isi nke NFA ugboro abuo nke a na-akpo Chuba Ikpeazu, Lynda Chuba-Ikpeazu jere akwukwo na obodo Nigeria, England, na America, ebe o ruru oru dika onye nǹomi
N'afo 1986, Chuba-Ikpeazu meriri iso mpi omalicha umu ada Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria nke mbu
Nke a malitere ochichi umu ada Igbo n'udi iso mpi a n'odinihu
N'afò 1987 o bukwa onye mbu na obodo Nigeria nke jere iso mpi Miss Universe mgbe nwa ada Edna Park jechara na 1964
O turu ugo n'iso mpi ndi nnomi mgbe o meriri iso mpi nke Miss Africa n'afò 1964
Oge ochichi ya gachara, Chuba-Ikpeazu ghoro onye oji ego achu ego n'obodo Lagos, ebe o kacha mara n'ihe gbasara oru mmanu

O nwere nzere bachelor's degree na nzirita ozi, nwee nzere master's degree na Nlekota Azumahia, ma nweekwa nzere bachelor's degree n'ihe gbasara Iwu, Chuba-Ikpeazu nokwa n'ulo oka-iwu House of Representatives bido na 1999 ruo na afo 2003
N'afo 2004, Chuba-Ikpeazu meriri iso mpi ndi oka iwu National Assembly, ebe o na anochi anya ndi Onitsha North-South na ochichi etiti dika onye otu ndoro ndoro ochichi People's Democratic Party
Ugbua, o bukwa ofu n'ime ndi ntuzi aka Anambra United
Lynda Marlène Gauzé (amụrụ na 11 June 1990) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Ivorian nke na-agbachitere Juventus de Yopougon na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ivory Coast
Gauzé emeela ka ya na Ivory Coast nwee ọganihu na ọkwa dị elu
Lyndall Gordon (amụrụ ya na 4 Nọvemba 1941) bụ onye akụkọ ndụ nke Britain na onye bụbu onye ode akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, nke ama ama maka akụkọ ndụ ya
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nyocha dị elu na St Hilda's College, Oxford
Amụrụ na Cape Town, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum Cape Town na doktorat ya na Mahadum Columbia na obodo New York Ọ lụrụ onye ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ bụ Siamon Gordon ; ha nwere umu-ndinyom abuọ

Mbipụta ya kacha nso nso a bụ Ndụ Dị Egbe Ebube Emily Dickinson and His Family's Feuds (2010), bụ nke agbaghawo echiche guzosiri ike banyere ndụ onye na-ede uri; Ndụ Kekọrịtara Na-etolite na 50s Cape Town (D
Philip Publishers, 1992); Ndụ Kewara Nrọ nke Nne na Nwa nwanyị (London Virago, 2014); na ndị nọ n'èzí Ụmụ nwanyị ise ndị edemede bụ ndị gbanwere ụwa (London Virago, 2017)
Lyndall Jarvis bụ onye nlereanya na onye na-egosi telivishọn na South Africa
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Cape Town, ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke nne Bekee na nna South Africa
Ọ malitere ịme ihe ngosi mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Na 2009, FHM South Africa kpọrọ ya dịka nwanyị kachasị nwee mmekọahụ nke afọ
O nyere ihe oyiyi nke onye iro Laughing Octopus na egwuregwu vidio 2008 Metal Gear Solid 4 Guns of the Patriots
Na 2014, Jarvis lụrụ onye ọkachamara na South Africa bụ Jordy Smith
Lynette Long bụ ọkà mmụta'akparamàgwà mmadụ bụ̀ onye nwere ikike na onye bụbu prọfesọ mahadum
O bipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri abụọ na ise na ọtụtụ akụkọ wee dee ihe omume abụọ nwetara ihe nrite
Ọkachamara mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ, ọ nwere mmasị karịsịa na mmezu mgbakọ na mwepụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ

Long chepụtara nkebi ahịrịokwu ahụ 'ụmụ latchkey' ya na di ya Thomas Long wee dee akwụkwọ kacha mma ' Akwụkwọ ntuziaka maka ụmụaka Latchkey na nne na nna ha na-arụ ọrụ' Ọ bụ Onye isi ala na onye nchoputa nke anaghị akwụ ụgwọ Equal Visibility Everywhere
N'ime 2016 Democratic Presidential Primary, Long jere ozi dị ka onye nhazi Florida State Volunteer nke Hillary Clinton
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ukwu na Mgbakọ Mba Demokratik
Long bụ onye nkwuchite ọnụ ihe gbasara nwanyị nke Amerika na onye nyere aka na mmegharị nwanyị na United States
Ogologo oge gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1969 na Mahadum Illinois na nzere nke Bachelọ nke sayensị na mmụta gbasara anumanu bụ Zoology na Chemistry
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Lynette gara n'ihu nweta nzere masta na mgbakọ na mwepụ na PhD
na nkuzi na ndụmọdụ Saikọlọji

Long bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke 'Equal Visibility Everywhere' (EVE), ogbakọ n'abụghị maka uru nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịchọpụta ihe nnọchianya nke ụmụ nwanyị na akara nke mba anyị ego, stampụ, ihe oyiyi, Google Doodles, ncheta na ihe ọkpụkpụ̀ ncheta, aha okporo ámá, na ezumike mba
Long bụ onye mbụ wetara uche mba na eziokwu bụ na ọ nweghị otu nwanyị nọchiri anya na akwụkwọ ego obodo anyị
N'ihi ọrụ ya wetara mgbanwe na mbọ ndị otu umu nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-agba, Ngalaba Akụ ga-egosi ụmụ nwanyị na akwụkwọ ego United States
Nchọpụta ya emewo ka mba ahụ lebara anya na ọ bụ nanị itoolu n'ime otu narị ihe oyiyi dị na National Statuary Hall na United States Capitol na- asọpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị
Long enyerela aka n'inweta ikike maka ihe oyiyi Amelia Earhart na United States Capitol
Long lekwasịrị anya na mmata gburugburu obodo ahụ maka enweghị ihe oyiyi ụmụ nwanyị n'ozuzu nke butere mmụba n'ọnụọgụgụ nke ihe oyiyi ụmụ nwanyị enyere ọrụ
Long na-ebutekwa mbọ iji bulie ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Florida State Historical Markers na-asọpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge nyocha mbụ ya na 2017, naanị isii n'ime akara 950 na steeti Florida na-akwanyere ụmụ nwanyị ugwu

Kemgbe 2017, Long etinyela akwụkwọ nke ọma wee chọta ego maka ọtụtụ akara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke steeti Florida na-asọpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị gụnyere, Miami Beach Preservationist Barbara Baer Capitman, Onye edemede Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings, Aviatrix Amelia Earhart, Dọkịta Eleanor Galt Simmons, na Seminole Chief Betty Mae Tiger jumper
Long bụ onye na-ekwu okwu ọha na eze na-ekwurịtakarị nyocha ya banyere enweghị ihe nnọchianya nke ụmụ nwanyị na mmetụta uche ya nye ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ
Long bụ onye hiwere otu ma chịkọta aha dị ka latchkey Kid na iweta nlebara anya obodo ọnọdụ zoro ezo nke ụmụaka latchkey
Onye bụbu onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na ogo ka elu, Long hụrụ ka ụmụ akwụkwọ ya yi igodo ụlọ n'agbụ n'olu
Ọ gbara ụmụ akwụkwọ a ajụjụ ọnụ wee chọpụta na owu na-amakarị ha ma ọ bụ ụjọ n’ime awa abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ ha nọrọ naanị ha n’ụlọ ma ha gụchaa akwụkwọ
Mkparịta ụka mbụ ndị a dugara n'ime nyocha na-agwụ ike, ọtụtụ narị ajụjụ ọnụ nke ụmụaka latchkey, nne na nna ha, na ụmụ mbụ latchkey
E bipụtara njedebe nke ọrụ ya na The Handbook for Latchkey Children and their Working Parents (ya na Thomas J
Long) na On My Own The Kids Self Care Book yana n'ọtụtụ akụkọ
A kọwapụtala nyocha Long site na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọ bụla yana n'ọtụtụ narị akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Long apụtala na narị narị mmemme redio na telivishọn dị ka ọkachamara n'ịzụlite ụmụaka gụnyere, Ihe ngosi Taa, Good Morning America, Ihe ngosi Phil Donahue , Geraldo, na ihe ngosi Merv Griffin
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ekwuchitere mba nke Thomas J
Lipton na Ụlọ ọrụ na anụ ụlọ dị ebube
Long bụ onye ọbịa nke one on one gụnyere DR
LYNETTE LONG ihe omume mkpọbata na redio na Okinawa, Japan
Ndị otu ndị agha na-ahụ maka mmemme a bụ nke e bu n'obi nyere ndị otu na-eje ozi US aka ikwurịta nsogbu ndị metụtara nrụgide nke ọrụ mba ofesi
Long bụ onye prọfesọ kọleji na Mahadum Loyola na Baltimore, Mahadum America dị na Washington, DC na na Mahadum Maryland –koleji Mahadum
Long kuziri Nkuzi ihe karịrị iri atọ dị iche iche ọmụmụ na akụkụ nke akparamaagwa, agụmakwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Long edewo ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America nke e bipụtara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ gburugburu obodo ahụ
Long nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nkwusa ihe ọma ọchịchị nke 2008 na 2016 Hillary Clinton nke ndị isi ala
Na 2008 Long bụ onye na-ede blọgụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike nyere Hillary wee dee mpempe akwụkwọ doro anya na mmetụta nke caucuses na nsonaazụ nke isi
Na 2016 Long bụ HRC Super Volunteers Florida State Captain
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ si n'isi ruo ala na-ahazi ebe niile site na Panama City ruo Key West

Otu onye otu Hillary maka America Florida Leadership Committee maka Mgbasa Ozi Onye isi ala nke 2016, Long bụkwa onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya steeti Florida na Mgbakọ Mba Democratic nke 2016
Long na-elekwasị anya na isiokwu ndị metụtara okwu ụmụ nwanyị na ihe gbasara nwanyị
Na 2020, Dr
Long chepụtara ihe ngosi na mmemme ncheta afọ 100 nke ịta ụmụ nwanyị na United States
Ihe ngosi a akpọrọ, 'Azụmahịa a na-emechabeghị' kọwapụtara mgba afọ iri asaa na abụọ nke otu suffrag
Long mepụtara ọdịnaya nke ihe ngosi nke gụnyere onyinye nke ndị na-eme ihe ike na steeti Florida
Lynn Davis (amụrụ n'ubochí iri na abụọ n'ime ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 1958) bụ onye America na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-eti egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ banyere na George Duke Band n'afọ 1977
N'oge ya na ndị otu ahụ, ọ bụrụ abụ olu na ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ha kachasị egwu 'I Want You for Myself', 'Party Down', na 'Reach Out'

N'okpuru nduzi nke onye egwu Epic Records na onye ndụmọdụ George Duke, Davis gara n'ihu na-edebanye ihe ịga nke ọma site n'inye aka na ụda olu na ide egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị na-abụ abụ gụnyere Tracie Spencer, La Toya Jackson, Patrice Rushen, Anita Baker, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-abụ abụ
Ụdị egwu Davis dịgasị iche n'oge ọrụ ya gụnyere R&B, funk, mkpụrụ obi, okenye nke oge a, skool ochie, psychedelia, na pop
Mmetụta nka ya tinyekwara George Duke, Chaka Khan, Marvin Gaye, na Earth, Wind, and Fire
A mụrụ Lynn Blythe Davis na Jamestown, California, nke Adeline Davis (née Livingston) na Thomas Davis, onye ozi Baptist na ụka obodo
Lynn gara Narbonne High School na Los Angeles, California, ebe ọ debara aha na klas ịgba egwu
Achọpụtara talenti ịbụ abụ ya ógè ọ bidoro ime ihe ngosi nka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mmasị Lynn nwere n'egwú na ime ihe nkiri gara n'ihu mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya meriri ihe ngosi nka ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
N'afọ 1975, Davis na Elaine Norwood banyere n'asọmpi Battle of the Bands Hollywood Bowl n'okpuru aha otu 'Shades of Love'
Ha abụọ meriri n'asọmpi ahụ, bụrụ ndị mbụ na-eti egwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asọmpi ahụ iji merie
Ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ natara ozi site n'aka enyi ya ka ọ gaa nyocha banyere The George Duke Band
Ógè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Lynn bidoro ọrụ ọbụ abụ ọkachamara ógè ọ sonyeere onye na-agụ egwu / onye egwu George Duke na ndị otu ya banyere njem ya
N'oge a, The George Duke Band nwere George Duke, Josie James, Sheila E, Napoleon Murphy Brock, Charles Foster Johnson, Byron Miller, na Leon 'Ndugu' Chancler
N'afọ 1978, Lynn nyere ụda olu na abọm akpọrọ 'No One Home' nke onye Argentina na-ede egwu / onye na-eti egwu Lalo Schifrin
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nyere ụda olu ya na The George Duke Band na abọm Flora Purim Carry On
N'afọ 1979, Lynn nyere ụda olu na egwu 'Summer Breezin' na 'I Need You Now', nke gosipụtara na abọm George Duke A Brazilian Love Affair

N'etiti afọ 1979, Lynn ghọrọ onye na-eti egwu na otu 'I Want You for Myself', nke ewepụtara na abọm George Duke Master of the Game Egwu a dị na nọmba irí abụọ na atọ na chaatị Billboard Hot R&B na chaatị Hot Dance Club Songs
N'otu afọ ahụ, Lynn malitere inye ụda olu maka onye na-agụ egwú Patrice Rushen, onye ọ zutere n'oge ndekọ ya na Lalo Schifrin
E gosipụtara egwu ndị ahụ na abọm Rushen bụ Pizzazz
N'afọ 1996 na 1997, o nyere ụda olu banyere abọm nke Eros Ramazzotti, Celine Dion, Vonda Shepard, na Puff Johnson ga-ewepụta
N'afọ 1998, e nyere ya ụda olu n'ihe banyere egwu Whitney Houston na Mariah Carey 'When You Believe'
N'afọ 2000, ya na Elton John na Tim Rice dekọrọ maka abọm mmekorita ha, The Road to El Dorado
Màkà ụdị olu ya, Davis bụ soprano lyric
Davis nwere ụda olu ise-octave, ma nwee ikike iru ihe odide karịa octave nke isii
N'oge ya na George Duke Band, ọ na-arụkarị ọrụ nke ịbụ abụ olu dị elu nke abụ ndị ahụ dịka 'Funkin' for the Thrill' na 'Stand With Your Man'
Duke kwuru, 'Mgbakwunye nke Lynn Davis mere nnukwu ọdịiche na ihe m nwere ike ide
Edere m na ndị otu ahụ n'uche, na-eji ike egwu nke ọ bụla ha
Lynn Freed bụ onye odee mara maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye edemede, onye edemede na onye edemede nke obere akụkọ
A mụrụ Lynn Freed ma otolitere na Durban, South Africa
Ọ bịara New York City dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, nata MA na PhD
na akwụkwọ Bekee sitere na Mahadum Columbia
Mgbe ọ kwagara na obodo San Francisco, o dere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Mgbanwe Obi (nke e bipụtara dị ka ndị enyi nke ezinụlọ )
Kemgbe ahụ, o bipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ isii ọzọ Ground Home, The Bungalow, The Mirror, House of Women, The Servants Quarters and The Last Laugh
O nwere nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, Akọcha nke Nwoke Kwesịrị Ekwesị na nchịkọta edemede abụọ Ịgụ, Ide & Ịhapụ Ụlọ Ndụ na Peeji na Romance nke Ebe Ọzọ
A n'asụgharị ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe, ma tinye ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbe ochie
Na 2011, Freed meriri O
Henry Award maka obere akụkọ ya, 'Sunshine' (gụnyere na The O
Henry Prize Stories 2011), na, na 2015, ọzọ maka 'Ụzọ Ihe Na-aga' (gụnyere na The O
N'afọ 2012, edemede ya, 'Idebe nche', gụnyere n'ime ederede njem njem America kacha mma
O nwetala onyinye nturu ugo nke Bay Area Book Reviewers for Fiction ( Home Ground ), ma emesia enweela akwụkwọ anọ ahọpụtara maka otu onyinye ahụ

Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya apụtala na New York Times 'Akwụkwọ ndị a ma ama nke Afọ' yana na ndepụta 'New & Noteworthy Paperback', dị ka ha nwere na ndepụta nke Washington Post, Times Literary Supplement na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Na 2002, e nyere Freed onyinye mmalite Katherine Anne Porter Award na akụkọ ifo site na American Academy of Arts and Letters

Ọ natara onyinye na mkpakọrịta site na National Endowment for Arts na Guggenheim Foundation, ma nyekwa ya ụlọ obibi na mkpakọrịta nke Rockefeller Foundation kwadoro, Camargo Foundation, Foundation Lannan, John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation, na Bogliasco Foundation, Civitella Ranieri, Corporation nke Yaddo, na MacDowell Colony, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Freed bụ Prọfesọ Emerita nke Bekee na Mahadum California, Davis (UC Davis)
Na 2002, Lynn Freed nwetara onyinye izizi Katherine Anne Porter maka akụkọ ifo site na American Academy of Arts and Letters

Ọ natakwara mkpakọrịta, onyinye na nkwado site na National Endowment for Arts, The Guggenheim Foundation, The Camargo Foundation, The Rockefeller Foundation, na Lannan Foundation, na Bogliasco Foundation
Na 2011 ọ meriri PEN/O
Henry Prize maka obere akụkọ ya 'Sunshine,' nke e bipụtara na mbụ na magazin akụkọ, na, na 2015 ọ meriri PEN/O
Henry Prize maka obere akụkọ ya, 'Ụzọ Ihe Na-aga,' nke e bipụtara na Harper's Magazine
Lynne Brown (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 26 Septemba 1961) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọha na onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Western Cape Province
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town ma too na Mitchell's Plain
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala nke Western Cape mgbe Ebrahim Rasool gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọnwa Julia 2008
N'oge gara aga, ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe akụ na ụba na njem nleta
Ọ bụ onye otu African National Congress ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara dịka onye otu National Executive Committee n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2012

Ọ si n'ezinụlọ na-acha ọbara ọbara ma bụrụ onye isi nke anọ na-acha odo odo nke Western Cape, onye nke abụọ site na African National Congress, na onye mbụ na-eme ka nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya bụrụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na gọọmentị Afrịka ọ bụla
Brown bụ onye isi oche nke Mitchell's Plain Youth Congress n'afọ 1979 na onye otu United Women's Organisation site n'afọ 1979 ruo 1985
Ọ bụ onye otu United Women's Congress site n'afọ 1985 ruo 1990, na-eje ozi mbụ dị ka onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ma mesịa bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mpaghara
O sonyere na United Democratic Front site na mmalite ya n'afọ 1983 ruo mgbe ọ gbasara, na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Ego ya
Brown sonyeere ANC n'afọ 1987 ma họpụta ya na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Provincial na Kọmiti Ọrụ Provincial n'afọ 1999
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ mpaghara Western Cape nke ANC Women's League kemgbe afọ 1990
Mmekọrịta ya na agụmakwụkwọ gara n'ihu mgbe afọ nkuzi ya gasịrị
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke National Literacy Project ma bụrụkwa onye otu ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Extramural Education Project ugbu a
Ọ malitere ma bụrụ onye nduzi nke Women's College n'afọ 1990
N'afọ 1994 na ọzọ n'afọ 1999 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ANC nke Western Cape Provincial Legislature
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-anọgide na Community Services na na Health and Welfare, ma jee ozi dị ka onye ANC Whip na Chief Whip na ndị omeiwu

O guzoro dị ka onye ANC na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo nke Cape Town na 1999 ma jee ozi dị ka Minista mpaghara (MEC) maka ego, mmepe akụ na ụba na njem nleta ruo mgbe e buliri ya n'ọfịs onye isi ala na 2008
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro a ma ama bụ Egoli Place of Gold na Isidingo
A mụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Novemba n'afọ 1983 na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ngosipụta ya na soap TV EGOLI & Isidingo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ jiri DPhil, doctorate na Philosophy na Human behavioral Psychology na UCLA
Ewezuga nkà mmụta uche, ọ mụọla mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ahịa, nakwa njikwa azụmahịa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri n'okpuru Libbe Ferreira na Blaise Koch nwụrụ anwụ na Sesani Studios na Johannesburg
Ya na Johan van der Merwe mụrụ nkuzi olu na ime ihe na studio Katinka Heyns 'Sonneblom na Honeydew
Mgbe usoro Ka ọmụmụ ahụ gasịrị, ọ wetara ọ́zụzụ̀ n'okpuru W
Morgan Sheppard na ụlọ ọrụ Vincent Chase na Hollywood
Ihe omume telivishọn ya site na M-Net soapie n'ewu ewu bụ Egoli Place of Gold
Na Oghere Usoro, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Zita'
Mgbe ahụ na 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Elize' na telivishọn serial Isidingo
Ewezuga kwa ime ihe, ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ na onye na-akọ akụkọ banyere ụmụaka ọkụ
Mgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye na-eweta ihe ngosi njem bụ Show traveling Africa tinyerekwara ihe omume redio bụ Rippel nke Pretoria
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ama ama na ihe omume na n'akwụkwọ akuko ndị The Citizen newspaper
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ FHM, n'okpuru pseudonym 'MissHouston'
Ọ bụkwa ihe nlere anya na Stark Raving Management na-anọchi anya ya mgbe ọ pụtachara nwa oge na serial telivishọn Big Brother

Lynne Muthoni Wanyeki (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Kenya, onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ, onye nta akụkọ, na onye isi mpaghara nke Open Society Foundation's Ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara Africa
Wanyeki bụbu onye isi mpaghara nke Ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara Amnesty International maka East Africa, Horn, na Great Lakes
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Kenya Human Rights Commission na African Women's Development and Communication Network (FEMNET)
A mụrụ Wanyeki n'afọ 1972 nyere onye nne Canada na ónyé nna Kenya (Kikuyu), ma tolite na Kenya
Nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1991
O nwere BA na Political Science (mmekọrịta mba ụwa) na French (akwụkwọ) na Mahadum New Brunswick na Mahadum Simon Fraser n'otu n'otu

Wanyeki nwekwara MPA (cum laude) n'ihe banyere ọha na eze site na L'Institut d'études politiques na Paris ma na-agụ akwụkwọ doctoral ya ugbu a na Ngalaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọmụmụ mba ụwa na School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS)
Ihe odide PhD nke Wanyeki na SOAS akpọrọ ' 'Ngwọta Africa maka nsogbu Africa' ajụjụ nke mba ndị otu' nrube isi na African Union na-eji Kenya dị ka ihe ọmụmụ'
Wanyeki malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike lekwasịrị anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 1988, ógè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ banyere nzere bachelọ ya na Canada
Na Canada, ọ malitekwara na mgbasa ozi, na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo na ụlọ ọrụ redio na nsogbu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị mbịarambịa na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ

Ógè ọ laghachiri Kenya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ Wanyeki gụnyere ọrụ mmepe na ime obodo Ukambani, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ ofufo n'ihe banyere Oxfam na United Nations Environmental Programme
Na ngwụcha afọ 1990, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nairobi maka Inter Press Services, otu ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nkwado, na maka ECO News Africa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na ụma, ọ nọchiri Njoki Wainaina dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke FEMNET
Na mbụ, ọ na-ele nzukọ ahụ anya dị ka nke ndị otu ndị inyom meworo agadi na-achịkwa
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ chọpụtara na ọnọdụ ya nyere ya ntụkwasị obi dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu a na-achọsi ike na ikike mmadụ, nha nwoke na nwanyị na mmepe
Ọ malitekwara ide kọlụm kwa izu na akwụkwọ akụkọ East Africa
N'afọ 2007, a kpọrọ Wanyeki onye isi oche nke Kenya Human Rights Commission, ọkwa ọ nọrọ ruo ọnwa Juun afọ 2011
A họpụtara ya mgbe ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mbido afọ 2008, ọ natara iyi egwu ọnwụ n'ihi nkwupụta o kwuru màkà ntuli aka ahụ, na-akọwa ya dị ka onye sabo nye ndị Kikuyu
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Wanyeki jere ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii nke Kenya Human Rights Commission ruo n'etiti afọ 2017
N'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye otu Netwọk Ndụmọdụ Mba Nile Maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Azụmaahịa & Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye otu bọọdụ nke Open Society Justice Initiative
Wanyeki jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche na African Women's Development and Communication Network (FEMNET)
N'ọnwa Machị 2018, Wanyeki bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede asatọ hapụrụ Nation Media Group na mkpesa màkà ihe ha weere na ọ bụ mmụba ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Kenyon na imebi nnwere onwe mgbasa ozi
Chukie Edozien (amụrụ na Nọvemba 24, 1967), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Lynxxx, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu hip-hop na onye ọchụnta ego na Naijiria
N'afọ 2010, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ This is Lynxxx wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke Pepsi zuru ụwa ọnụ kwadoro
Ọ bụ onye malitere Jollof Musik ụdị ọ kọwara dị ka 'ngwakọta egwu iji mepụta egwu dị egwu'
Lynxxx bụ naanị nwa nwoke nke Chief John D
Edozien, onye bụbu osote gọvanọ nke Bendel Steeti ochie na Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Corona Primary School Ikoyi, Lagos, wee gaa n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Kings College Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Hull na United Kingdom, ebe ọ nwetara nzere na Business, Economics na Marketing

Mgbe afọ iri nke ọrụ n'azụ ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, Lynxxx mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu na Disemba 2009, na ntọhapụ nke egwu mbụ ya, 'Change your Parade', nke Syndik8 na-emepụta ihe na onye mmekọ 'IKON' mepụtara
Otu a nwetara ọtụtụ redio ma bụrụ nke a ma ama na ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị, nke nyeere Lynxxx aka ịzụlite nnukwu ndị na-akwado ya site na mgbasa ozi n'ịntanetị
Na Disemba 2010 Lynxxx wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ This Is Lynxxx
Abọm ahụ nwere ngwakọta nke ụdị egwu, gụnyere hip hop obodo, R & B nke oge a, na ntinye nke funky house
Lynxxx na-akpọ ngwakọta a nke ụdị dị iche iche 'Jollof Musik' - okwu nke na-ezo aka na nka nke ịgwakọta ụdị dị iche iche iji mee egwu dị mma
N'otu afọ ahụ, Lynxxx ghọrọ onye mbụ na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke Pepsi kwadoro
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ egwu ya, Lynxxx bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego

O guzobere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma tupu ọrụ egwu ya, nke gụnyere akara uwe a na-akpọ Syndik8 Denim, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ dijitalụ a na-akpọ Red Room Studio, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi a na-akpọ Happy Teddy Media (HTM), na Syndik8 Films

Opeyemi Babatunde Rahim, onye ama ama dịka Lyta (akpọrọ L-Y-T-A), bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na YBNL Nation na 2018 mana hapụ labeelụ ahụ na Mee 2019 mgbe ya na onyenwe labeelu ahụ nwesịrị esemokwu bụ Olamide
O wepụtara egwu ise izizi nke izizi EP Id na 2019
Nwaafọ Kwara Steeti, Lyta tolitere na Ajegunle ma bụrụ onye otu 'Ile Kewu', otu egwu na ụlọ egwu alakụba ha
Ndekọ egwu ya na YBNL Nation pụtara ihe na 3 February 2018
Ihe ịtunanya nke Lyta na otu YBNL Nation, nke akpọrọ 'Time', nke gụnyere Olamide pụtara na 14 Febuwarị 2018
Na 2019, Lyta hapụrụ YBNL Nation n'ihi nkwekọrịta na nsogbu onwe onye
Ka ọpụpụsịrị YBNL, ya na Doro Musik Gang bịanyere aka wee wepụta egwu egwu Killer Tunes mepụtara 'Monalisa' na 12 Julaị 2019
Ihe onyonyo a na-egosi maka 'Monalisa', nke onye isi nduzi K nyere, chịkọtara ihe karịrị echiche 500,000 n'ime otu ọnwa ewepụtara ya
Izu ole na ole ha wepụtasịrị 'Monalisa', Davido ruru Lyta banyere ịdekọ ngụgharị egwu ya
Site na nkwekọrịta ha, Davido na Lyta gbagara Dakar maka ngụgharị na imee vidiyo
Emepụtara ngụgharị egwu nke 'Monalisa' na 30 Ọgọstụ 2019
Akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Elias Light of Rolling Stone' kọwara egwu a dị ka 'mmegwara mara mma, yana okwu iwe na-agụ agụụ'
Egwú vidiyo na-eso ngụharị egwu bụ Director K duziri
Lyta nwetara ngosipụta nke ọma ya na Davido gụkọrụ egwu ya
Lyta weputara egwu nke Afurobiiti 'Worry' na 6 Disemba 2019; ọ bụ Killer Tunes mepụtara ya
Ngosipụta maka 'Worry' bụ ndị nduzi 'Simplicity Visual Studios' na London
Na Mee 2019, Lyta kwetara ọ na-apụ na 'YNBL Nation' na Naijaloaded TV
O kwuru na agbanyeghị na a na-akwụ ya n’agbata iri puku ise na iri asatọ maka ihe ngosi na o nweghi nkwekọrịta na lebeelụ ahụ
Olamide nyere nkwupụta na Guardian Life, na-ekwu YBNL nwere kalenda nkwalite nke Lyta jụrụ ịgbaso
Lyta nọ n'okpuru ndekọ egwu Marlian nke Naira Marley nwere
Ọ wepụtara mbụ ya n’okpuru ndekọ a, akpọrọ “Hold me Down (Omo Gidi)”
Vidio ahụ bụ 'Hold Me Down' nke sitere nkwalite mmụọ Kpop Korean boy band GOT7 na BTS duziri TG Omori
Aimee Françoise M'Pongo Langu (27 na ọnwa August nke afọ 1956 ̊ ruo 15 ọnwa January nke afọ 1990), nke a maara dị ka M'Pong Love, bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Congo
Mbụ ịmalite ịbụ abụ na ndị ukwe chọọchị, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu iji chụsoo ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú
Malite site na nkwado sitere n'aka ndị egwu ndị ọzọ a ma ama, M'Pongo mechara malite ide egwu nke ya, na-ejikarị isiokwu ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Aimee Françoise M'Pongo Langu na 27 na ọnwa August nke afọ 1956 na Boma, Belgian Congo, nwa nwanyị nke abụọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asaa
Nna ya, Gilbert Pongo, bụ onye agha, ebe nne ya bụ onye nduzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, M'Pongo butere ọrịa polio ma kpọnwụọ ya site na penicillin
Ọ na-agbadata ruo mgbe a zụrụ ya iji aka aka na 1962, na-enye ya ohere ịga ije
Dị ka nwatakịrị, M'Pongo gara chọọchị ebe nna ya bụ onye na-agụ egwú wee malite ịbụ abụ maka ndị ukwe
M'Pongo bụrụkwa abụ n'òtù ukwe ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara Kinshasa wee debanye aha na nkuzi ederede mkpirikpi
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu na ụlọ ọrụ
Na èzí ọrụ ya mgbe niile ọ na-achọ nkwekọrịta azụmahịa ngosi, na-ewebata onwe ya dị ka M'Pongo Love, aha nna ya na-eji ya kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Na ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1975 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, M'Pongo zutere onye na-egwu saxophon Empompo Loway, onye kpebiri inyere ya aka ịzụlite ọrụ ịbụ abụ ma mee ka ọ hapụ ọrụ odeakwụkwọ ya
Mgbe ọdịda mbụ iji nweta nkwado M'Pongo, ha abụọ zutere onye njikwa otu Ngwango Isionoma, onye kwetara inye ha ego iji malite ọrụ ya
Loway nyeere ya aka ịmepụta otu egwu, Tcheke Tcheke Love, ma dee egwu mbụ ya
M'Pongo malitere na egwu 'Pas possible Maty' ma n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o nyere egwu mbụ ya na Ciné Palladium na Kinshasa
Na afọ 1977 niile, ya na ndị ọzọ na-akwado ya, Les Ya tupaī (ya na ndị otu dị ka Ray Lema, Félix Manuaku Waku, na Alfred Nzimbi), na-abụ abụ nke Mayaula Mayoni, Simaro Lutumba, na Souzy Kaseya
Nkọwa ya nke 'Ndaya' nke Mayaula ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma na Kinshasa, ọkachasị na etiti ụmụ nwanyị obodo ahụ
Na oge na-adịghị anya, M'Pongo malitere ide ma hazie egwu nke ya
Na afọ 1980, ọ kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ọkachamara ya na Empompo iji rụọ ọrụ n'onwe ya, wee kwaga Paris
O mechara mepụta egwu na okpuru akara nke ya, 'Love Islam Music'
Ka oge na-aga, ọ butere ọrịa ụbụrụ na Gabon
Ọ nọ n'ụlọ ya na Binza, Kinshasa, na-eme atụmatụ ịlaghachi n'ọrụ mgbe ọnọdụ ya kara njọ na ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1989 a nabatara ya na ụlọ ọgwụ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye gwara ndị mgbasa ozi na ọ tara ahụhụ 'oké mwakpo', na-ekwughị ọrịa ya
Ọ nwụrụ na 15 na ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 1990 ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị atọ
M'Pongo bụrụ abụ n'olu doro anya, nke dịtụ n'imi ma jiri ụda olu ziri ezi
Na oge ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ kwadoro onwe ya na
akụkụ ihe nkiri iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka nkwarụ anụ ahụ ya
E jiri ya tụnyere ndị ọgbọ ya, M'Pongo bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị niile na-agụ egwú ma na-akatọ ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị na omume nke idebe ndị isi nwanyị na egwu ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 1989, ọ kọwara echiche ụmụ nwanyị ya
Ana m abụ banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị, ana m agbalị inye ha obi ike
na m ga-akwụsị ịbụ abụ mgbe mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị n'Africa na-enweghị nsogbu
Ma gịnị ka nwoke Afrịka na-enweghị nwanyị? Na mgbakwunye na ndụ siri ike, ụmụ nwanyị nwere ọtụtụ ihe ha ga-atachi obi

Enwere m ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị ịhụ ka ha na-alụ ọgụ, ka ha chebe onwe ha, ka ha na ya na-eweli isi ha elu, ka ha were ụmụ nwanyị nwere onwe ha dị ka ihe atụAnyị ga-ama otu esi ekwu ihe anyị bụ, anyị ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka, n'atụghị egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ niile anyị chọrọ iji mụta
M'bilia Bel (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1956) bụ onye na-agụ egwu rumba na egwu ụwa si Democratic Republic of the Congo A maara ya dị ka 'Queen of Congolese and African Rumba'

Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe Sam Manguana chọpụtara ya na Tabu Ley Rochereau mechara nyere ya aka inweta obi ike, mụta olu soprano ya dị ike, ma nweta otuto dị ka otu n'ime ndị inyom Congo kacha mma na-agụ egwú
M'bilia Bel nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na mbido afọ 1980 mgbe ọ sonyeere òtù Tabu Ley Rochereau (Afrisa International)
Ha mere ọtụtụ abọm ọnụ
N'etiti afọ 1980, ọmụmụ nwa mbụ ha mere ka ọ kwụsị ọrụ otu afọ; Otú ọ dị, mgbe album ikpeazụ ya na Tabu Ley na 1988, ọ kwagara Paris
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere iso onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Rigo Star Bamundele rụọ ọrụ ma, n'etiti afọ 1989 na AFỌ 1990, gaa United States, Europe, na West Africa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Mbilia Bel malitere ọrụ ya, na-abụ abụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwu maka Abeti Masikini, 'Queen of Perfumed Soukous,' ma mesịa soro Sam Mangwana
Dị ka onye Tabu Ley na-echebe, o jiri ọgụgụ isi ya na olu nke ya mepụta ọtụtụ egwu maka l'Orchestre Afrisa International
Abụ mbụ Mbilia Bel na Afrisa, nke e wepụtara na 1981, bụ 'Mpeve Ya Longo' ('Mụọ Nsọ' na Kikongo), abụ na-akpali akpali banyere mmetọ di
N'abụ ahụ, ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwanyị di ya gbahapụrụ ma zụlite ụmụ ya n'onwe ya
Abụ ahụ na-ewu ewu, ọkachasị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na Zaire
Abọm mbụ Mbilia Bel, nke e wepụtara na AFỌ 1982, bụ Eswi yo wapi
Abụ aha, nke na-asụgharị 'Ebee ka ọ merụrụ gị ahụ?', bụ Tabu Ley na M'bilia Bel dere ya
Abụ ahụ meriri ihe nrite maka abụ kachasị mma nke 1982 na Zaire, M'bilia Bel merikwara ihe nrite nke onye ọhụrụ kachasị mma
Egwú ndị ọzọ dị na abọm ahụ dị ka Tabu Ley's 'Lisanga ya Bambanda', 'Kelhia', na Dino Vangu's 'Quelle Mechancete' bụ nnukwu egwu maka Afrisa International
Ịbụ onye a ma ama Afrisa malitere ịsọ mpi na nke otu egwu Franco bụ TPOK Jazz, ekele maka ọbịbịa nke nwanyị a na-akpọ 'The Cleopatra of Congolese music'
M'bilia Bel ghọrọ ngwa ngwa isi ihe na-adọrọ mmasị na kọntaktị Afrisa na Congo na ebe ọ bụla ha gara, na-emekarị ka nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ na-eme mgbe ọ sonyeere Rocherettes (ndị na-agba egwú) na usoro ha
[citation] Ka ọ na-erule na afọ 1980, Mbilia lụrụ Tabu Ley ma mụọ nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Melody Tabu
Egwú Mbilia Bel nọgidere na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congolese, n'etiti ha 'Mobali na ngai wana' ('Nwoke nke m'), nke Tabu Ley na Roger Izeidi dere, nke a kwadoro n'abụ ọdịnala na Kikongo
N'abụ ahụ, M'bilia Bel na-eto di ya dị ka onye mara mma ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ma na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ ezie na o nwere ohere ịhọrọ n'etiti nwanyị mara mma nke Kinshasa, ọ họọrọ ya

Egwú ndị ọzọ na-achịkwa chaatị n'oge ọchịchị ya na Afrisa gụnyere 'Balle a terre', 'Bameli soy', 'Ba gerants ya Mabala', 'Keyna', 'Cadence Mudanda', 'Bafosami', 'Nakei Nairobi', 'Ba jeux de Coin', 'Paka Wewe', 'Boya Ye', 'Yamba Ngai', 'ShaWuri Yako' 'Beyanga', na 'La Beaute D'une Femme'
N'afọ 1987, Tabu Ley kpọtara nwanyị ọzọ na-ese ihe ka ọ soro M'bilia Bel
A maara Kishila Ngoyi dị ka 'Faya Tess'
Ọ bụ na usoro ọhụrụ a ka Afrisa malitere njem nleta nke East Africa nke gara Kenya, Tanzania na Rwanda, na-agwụcha na album Nadina, nke nwere nsụgharị Lingala na Swahili nke abụ aha
A nabatara njem ahụ nke ọma
M'bilia Bel nọ n'etiti etiti, na-ekpuchi ndị ọzọ na-ese Afrisa gụnyere Ndombe Opetum, onye si TP OK Jazz lọta
Mgbe ha laghachiri Kinshasa, asịrị malitere ịpụta banyere esemokwu dị n'etiti Tabu ley na M'bilia Bel
Ha abụọ gọnahụrụ n'ihu ọha na ha nwere nsogbu ọ bụla mgbe ndị nta akụkọ gbara ha ajụjụ ọnụ
M'bilia Bel hapụrụ òtù ahụ na ngwụcha na afọ 1988 iji malite ọrụ n'onwe ya
O jiri onye na-emepụta ihe na Gabon na Libreville mee ihe n'oge na-adịghị anya tupu ọ gawa Paris, ebe ọ sonyeere onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Rigo Star Bamundele
Abọm mbụ ya na Rigo Star, nke akpọrọ Phénomène, bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na Kinshasa nakwa na mba ofesi
Mbipụta ndị sochirinụ dị ka Desolé, 8/10 Benedicta, Yalowa, na Exploration nwere obere ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe ọpụpụ nke M'bilia Bel gasịrị, ewu ewu nke Afrisa International dị ka otu egwu belatara nke ukwuu
Tabu Ley n'onwe ya yiri ka ọ na-enweghị mkpali maka ide egwu dịka akaebe site na mbelata dị ukwuu n'ọnụ ọgụgụ albums wepụtara
[citation needed] Ewezuga album mbụ ya, Phénomène, ọrụ Mbilia Bel tụfuru ume mgbe ọ hapụrụ Afrisa
Ọ biri na Paris ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ isii iji gbasaa ọhụụ ya na Europe, mana na AFỌ 1996, M'bilia Bel kpebiri ịlaghachi n'ụlọ iji gbalịa iweghachite ọnọdụ ya na egwu egwu Congolese
N'oge a, ọ gakwuuru Maestro Suzy Kaseya, onye a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na onye ọzọ na-agụ egwu Congo, Tshala Muana
N'afọ 2001, M'bilia Bel na Suzy wepụtara CD nke egwu iri akpọrọ Welcome, nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma nke meriri ya 'Kora Award' maka Best Female Vocalist of Central Africa
Tshala Muana nwetara otu onyinye ahụ n'otu afọ ahụ kwa
N'afọ 2004, M'bilia Bel na Suzy Kaseya wepụtara mmekọrịta nke abụọ ha Belissimo, mana abọm ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Ndị nta akụkọ Congo na-ebo onye na-agụ egwú ebubo na ọ leghaara ịkwalite abọm ahụ anya site n'ịjụ izute ha n'afọ ahụ
Aha M'bilia Bel dị ka Queen of Congolese rumba na-eyi egwu site na ịrị elu nke ndị na-eto eto na-agụ egwú dịka Mj 30 na Cindy Le Coeur
Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2009, ya na Lutumaba Simaro, otu n'ime ndị isi guitar nke Congolese rumba, na-arụkọ ọrụ, iji kọwaa egwu ya 'Mobali Ya Bato', nke dị ngwa ngwa n'elu chaatị
N'afọ 2010, M'bilia Bel gara Canada na Colombia maka egwu egwu
Mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Festival Of Baranquina na Cartagena na onye na-akpọ ụbọ Lokassa Ya Mbongo, onye isi obodo nyere ya mkpịsị ugodi nke obodo

Mgbe njem a gasịrị, M'bilia Bel wepụtara CD nke afọ 2011 nke akpọrọ The Queen nke nwere egwu iri na atọ, gụnyere egwu pụrụ iche 'Immigration Fatale', abụ nke onye na-agụ egwu Nyboma banyere ọnwụ ụmụaka Afrịka na-agafe Oké Osimiri Mediterenian na-achọ ndụ ka mma na Europe
N'afọ 2020, ọ pụtara dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme ihe na Festival Amani ebe ndị bịara 36,000 nwere ekele maka ya
Ihe ndị o mere gụnyere Mpeve ya Longo na Yamba Nga site na 1980s
