M'hamed Benguettaf (ihe dịka n'afọ na Jenụwarị 5, 2014) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu
M'hamed Benguettaf nwụrụ mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 5, 2014, mgbe ọ dị afọ 75, n'obodo ya bụ Algiers
E liri ya na El Alia Cemetery
M'hamed Issiakhem (17 June 1928 - 1 December 1985) bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ihe osise Algeria nke oge a
A mụrụ M'hamed Issiakhem na 17 June 1928 na Taboudoucht, obere obodo dị nso na Azeffoun, ihe dị ka kilomita ịrị anọ na atọ site na Tizi Ouzou (Algeria)
N'afọ 1931, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Relizane ebe ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata
N'afọ 1943, o ji grenade e zuru n'ohi, site n'ogige ndị agha France, nke gbawara
Ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ na nwa nwanne ya nwụrụ
N'ịbụ onye a kpọgara n'ụlọ ọgwụ afọ abụọ, aka ekpe ya tụfuru
N'agbata afọ 1947 na 1951 ọ nọ na Student Society of Fine Arts na School of Fine Arts nke Algiers ma soro ọmụmụ nke onye na-eme obere ihe Omar Racim
N'etiti afọ 1953 na 1958 ọ gara Ecole des Beaux-Arts de Paris
Issiakhem hapụrụ France gaa Germany na 1958, wee gaa East Germany ebe e guzobere ya ruo mgbe Algeria nweere onwe ya
N'afọ 1962, Issiakhem laghachiri Algeria, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke Alger Republicain kwa ụbọchị
N'afọ 1963 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Union of Plastic Arts
Site na 1964 ruo 1966 ọ bụ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ese ihe na School of Fine Arts na Algiers, na-agụnye n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ ya Ksenia Milicevic, onye nduzi na Ecole des Beaux-Arts nke Oran
Site na 1965 ruo 1982 o mepụtara ụdị akwụkwọ ego Algeria yana ọtụtụ stampụ Algeria
Ọ gara Vietnam na 1972 ma nata ihe nrite ọla edo na International Fair of Algiers maka ọrụ ya na Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs
Site na 1973 ruo 1978 Issiakhem laghachiri n'ihe na-atọ ọchị
N'afọ 1977, o mere ihe osise na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Algiers
Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs bipụtara broshuọ na Algiers nke Kateb Yacine dere okwu mbido n'okpuru aha Issiakhem's lynx Eyes and Americans, thirty-five years of hell of a painter
Na 1980 Issiakhem natara ọdụm ọla edo mbụ nke Rome, nke UNESCO maka nka Africa
Ọ nwụrụ na 1 Disemba 1985 mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge
Na 17 June 2018, Google Doodle mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ Issiakhem nke afọ iri itoolu
M'semen, msemmen (Arabic مسمن msamman, musamman) ma ọ bụ rghaif, bụ achịcha ọdịnala dị larịị sitere na Maghreb, nke a na-ahụkarị na Algeria, Morocco, na Tunisia
A na-ejikarị mmanụ aṅụ ma ọ bụ iko nke tii mint ma ọ bụ kọfị na-esi ísì ụtọ
A pụrụ iji anụ (khlea) ma ọ bụ yabasị na tomato jupụta na M'semen
E nwere ihe dị iche iche a na-eme site na ịdọrọ ntụ ọka n'ime eriri ma mepụta diski nke a na-akpọkwa malwi na Northwest Africa
Ọ dịkwa ka Somali sabaayah
Nchịkọta ahụ na-eji ntụ ọka, semolina ọka wit, ihe iko achịcha, bọta a gbazere agbaze, nnu, shuga na obere mmiri
A na-agwakọta ihe ndị a nke ọma n'ime ngwakọta ntụ ọka dị nro
A na-ebibi ntụ ọka ahụ n'ime ọtụtụ bọọlụ, nke a na-atụgharị n'elu mmanụ ma fụkọta ya n'ime pancakes
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ bụ ịgbasa ntụ ọka ahụ n'ime square ma ọ bụ okirikiri kachasị dị arọ ma mechaa fụchie akụkụ ahụ azụ n'ime squares, na-emepụta akara ntụ ọka
Ozugbo a pịrịkọta m'semen, a na-agbasa nke ọzọ nke a na-eji ekpuchi m'semens a pịrị apị tupu ya iji mepụta ihe dị ka okpukpu 8 dị n'ime
Isi ihe bụ na mgbe mmadụ na-agbakọta, mmadụ ga-awụsa semolina na ọkwa iji gbochie ọkwa ahụ ịrapara kpamkpam ma kwe ka okpomọkụ kewa ọkwa ahụ mgbe esi nri na griddle
Mádu bu òdùdù enyï anúmanụ àlà nwẹrẹ ómárí káchárá anumanu nke níle
Na asụsụ Latin há kpòrò madu Homo Sapien bú 'onye ómárí' ma 'onye ma ihe'
Há bu ndi nọr na òdùdù nke Homo nke énwè nẹ jé na úkwú abụo na Hominidae, umunna énwè úkwú
Máná ọ di mgbe 'Human' na asụsụ bekee na kárá genus nke Homo
Madu nwèrè ọvúrù kachara a ka, nke nweríkí nwe ómárí nke nché échìchè, asụsụ, ómárí onwé, na Í nweríkí bì nsogbu
Ọ dị Í nwé íshí nka, tírí ya na ahú kwụrụ ọtọ na élú nke nyéré íke Í me ka áká rü, mèrè ka madu gáfe na ihü òdùdù enyï nke ndi ozọr na Í jí ihe ọrü a rü
DNA Mitochondrial na ánumanu ichie di nà àlà zịrị na madu ndi ohüru shì Afrika na afọr 200,000 gárá agá
Nwéré madu gbásaa na uwa nílé ma ha dighị na Antarktika, madu bu òdùdù enyï nke uwà na uwà
Na Önwa ise nke 2010, mádu rùrù nke há sí bu ijeri 68
Dí ka enwè nke íshí íshí, madu di ónór na òrà nke ná kpátá madu ndi ọzór
Mànà, madu gbàrà ọkpúkpú màkà ha nweríkí kwú màkà ihe nọr ha na óbị, Í gbanwò ómárí na Í dósé ihe
Madu ne ké òrà di na iche iche nwéré ọtú iche iche na gbálílí ndi ozor, na ndiá nẹ shí umunna rüo na mbà
Imẹ na òrà nke ndi madu ne mẹ bu ihe hé kèrè, yá nà ómárí ihe bu ihe ómá na ihe ọjọó, ihe bu ébéanọr na ñkitị, na ihe ọmemmé, iheá nílé gbakotàrà Í bu uwà mádu
Há sị madu chọrọ Í má na Í nwe àgbà na uwà há, né tú ọtù ha shi é kọwa na í rü na élú ihe àlà shí ọbià, ílúnílú, ihe mmuö na éféfé
Ihe nọr na íshí ha nke nchọnchó mèrè ka ha ganírú na Í kw ihe orü na Í rümarü, nke na da na umunna; madu bu ótụ anúmanụ nke nwéré ómárí Í fụnwu ọkụ, Í shí ihe orị, Í tí uwé, na technonzu ndi ozọr

Méchoui (Arabic) ma ọ bụ Meshwi bụ atụrụ ma ọ bụ nwa atụrụ zuru oke nke a na-asụ ọnụ na barbecue na nri Maghrebi
Okwu a sitere n'okwu Arabic šawā (شواء, 'isi, isi')
Nri a na-ewu ewu na North Afrika
Na mba Algeria na mba Morocco, okwu méchoui 'na-ezo aka n'usoro isi nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ atụrụ siri n'ozuzu ya n'elu ọnụ'
Na obodo Tunisia, Otú ọ dị, ọ na-emetụta anụ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ azụ e ji ichekwu ọkụ sie
Mgbe e gbusịrị nwa atụrụ ahụ ma gbupụ ya ọkpụkpụ, a na-ewepụ akụkụ niile nke oghere afọ, ma e wezụga akụrụ
A na-etinye oghere a mgbe a gbasịrị ya ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, ọkachasị ras el hanout
A na-etinye nwa atụrụ ahụ n'elu alaka osisi ma sie ya n'akụkụ ụyọkọ ichekwu ọkụ
A na-atụgharị spindle ahụ nke nta nke nta na n'otu n'otu iji hụ na a na-ekesa ya n'otu
A naghị etinye nwa atụrụ a kwado kpọmkwem n'elu icheku ọkụ, n'ihi na abụba na-agbaze nwere ike ịgba ọkụ ma gbaa anụ ahụ dị n'èzí ọkụ
A na-amalite isi nri n'ụzọ dị nro, nke mere na ime ụlọ na-esi nri fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị n'èzí
Mgbe a na-esi nri, a na-eji bọta ma ọ bụ mmanụ a gbazere agbaze na-agbanye anụ ahụ, iji mee ka ọ dịkwuo ụtọ
Nke nta nke nta, a na-eme ka nwa atụrụ ahụ dị nso na ọkụ ọkụ, ka anụ ahụ wee nwee ụcha amber
Oge isi nri dịgasị iche dabere na ịdị arọ nke anụmanụ ahụ, nke na-abụkarị ihe dịka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke awa kwa kilogram
Méchoui bụ nri a na-eri na mbido nri, dị ka akụkụ nke oriri ma ọ bụ diffa
Site na mkpịsị aka aka aka nri, onye ọbịa ahụ na-ewere anụ e siri esi ma nye ha ndị ọbịa
Dị ka omenala si dị, a naghị eji efere eme ihe iji nye mechoui, n'ihi na, n'oge a na-esi anụ ahụ n'egbughị oge, a ga-enwe ike iwepụ ya n'enweghị mgbalị ọ bụla

Ndị na-akwagharị akwagharị, na mgbakwunye na nnukwu ìgwè atụrụ ha nke ọtụtụ puku atụrụ mejupụtara, zụlitere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ụmụ atụrụ nwoke maka mechoui, na-enye ha cheih, ụdị mugwort ọhịa nke na-enye nwa atụrụ ọdịdị pụrụ iche
A na-akwadobe Mechoui, ọkachasị na Morocco, site n'igwu oghere kwụ ọtọ, ma ọ bụ site n'ịrụ ite ọkụ, 08 ruo 1 mita n'obosara na 15 ruo 2 mita n'omimi
A na-etinye osisi n'ime oghere a ma kpọọ ọkụ ruo awa ise ma ọ bụ isii
Mgbe ala gbara oghere ahụ gburugburu na-ese siga ma gbanwee osisi ahụ ka ọ bụrụ icheku ọkụ na ntụ, a na-ewepụ ọtụtụ n'ime ya iji zere ọkụ ọkụ

Isi nri na-ewe awa anọ ruo ise
Mgbe emechara nwa atụrụ ahụ, a na-agbaji mkpuchi ahụ siri ike iji wepụ nwa atụrụ ahụ n'ọkụ ahụ

Circular Monday bụ mmegharị nke obodo, nchekwa data na ụbọchị ịzụ ahịa maka oriri gburugburu
Ọ na-agụnye azụmaahịa nwere ụdị azụmaahịa azụmaahịa na-ere, na-akwụ ụgwọ, na-ekere òkè na nrụzi ngwaahịa ndị e ji ihe ndị a rụgharịrị arụgharị mee, gụnyere ọrụ ndị ọzọ
E hiwere ya na afọ 2017 na Malmö, Sweden, site n'aka onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ onye mba Sweden bụ Henning Gillberg, a na-akpọkwa ya White Monday na mbụ; ọ gbanwere aha ya na afọ 2020
E chepụtara ya dị ka ihe ngwọta maka Fraidee ojii, nke na-akwalite oriri na-aga n'ihu, ma na-ewere ọnọdụ na Mọnde tupu Black Friday
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2019, ihe karịrị azụmaahịa 200 na-ekere òkè
Azụmaahịa na-ekere òkè - nke kachasị na Europe - na-ebelata ngwaahịa ha iji kpughee ụzọ ndị ọzọ dị gburugburu na oriri nke Fraidee ojii na ụbọchị ịzụ ahịa ndị ọzọ
Munachi Abii (amụrụ Munachi Gail Teresa Abii Nwankwọ) bụ onye ala Naijiria na-agu egwu rap na egwu 'hip-hop', ọ nakwa ede egwu
O merịkwara na ndọrọ ndọrọ nke onye kacha nma na afọ 2007
Ọ bụkwa onye ana-ahụ n'ihe onyonyo n'eme ọtụtụ ihe dị ịche ịche
Ọ bụkwa onye mara nma nke ana-ekịrị ekịrị
Ọ n'arụ ọrụ a n'aha nke Muna
Amụrụ ya zụọkwa ya n'obodo Port Harcourt
Muna bu onye Owerri onye ezị n'ụlọ ya kwadoro k'osogido akara aka ya bu egwu and ihe osịse
Ọgụrụ ihe bekee kpọrọ International relations and Diplomacy na mahadum Benson Idahosa University mgbe omechara agụmagụ ya na secondịrị nke ndi Federal Government Girls College AbulomaÀtụ Cn

N'oge ọnọ na-afọ abụọ ya na mahadum n'afọ 2007, Muna merịrị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọkacha nma n'ụmụ nwanyị nile n'obodo Naijiria N'ọnọdụ nke eze nwayi n'achị ọchịchị orịtara ka ogịrị ọkwado izisa ozị maka orịa Polio na Sickle cell, ọnọchịtere anya ndị Naijịrịa n'obodo China n'oge ndọrọ ndọrọ okacha nma uwa nile n'afọ ahụ N'afọ 2009, Muna na onye nmerị nke MBGN nke afọ 2000 nke aha ya bụ Matilda Kerry rụkọtara ọrụ nke izisa ozị maka oria nke cervical cancer
Tutu omerie na MBGN, Muna osorola ndị Specimen A nke Port Harcourt mee ihe ngosị dị ịche ịche, sorokwa Terry da Rapman n'ihe ha kpọrọ My PH Girl

Iji kagbue ihe onye obula chere, Muna ebidoghị ọrụ egwu ya na ndi Ijaw Boyz n'agu egwu ntabi ire, n'agbanyeghi n'oso ha dika onye obịa gụọ egwu Dika onye n'agụ egwu ntabi ire nọrọ onwe ya, Muna agụọla egwu na Babyrella tutu ọgbanwe aha ya wee zawa Muna, na dika onye n'ede egwu Muna edeela ọtụtụ egwu nye ndi egwu ama ama dika J Martins na Waje, bụrụ onye ahụrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe onyonyo nke egwu di iche iche, ama ya ama n'egwu ndi P Square n'egwu ha kpọrọ 'Ifunanya'

N'ọnwa Jun n'afọ 2010 mgbe Muna na ndị egwu ọzọ kwụsịrị ịrụkọrịta ọrụ, Muna na ụlọ ọrụ Ayo Shonaiya's nke RMG banyere na nkwekọrịta ịrụ ọrụ nke ga-abụ ọtụtụ afọ were bido ịrụpụta ọrụ efere egwu ya bu nke mbụ nke ọ kpọrọ The Goddess, The Hustler, nke a ga-agunyekwa egwu ndi nke ọgụrụ na-ahịrị na-ahịrị aha ha bụ I Feel Real, ya na Killer Queen

Muna gakwara n'ihu ya na ndi egwu ọzọ ndi iche iche bekee na-akpọ hip hop na rụrikọta ọrụ; na mbido afọ 2011, Muna dere egwu sorokwa gụọ ya bụ egwu nke onye egwu aha ya bụ Waje; egwu nke ama ama ọ kpọrọ So Inspired Osokwa onye egwu ntabi ire aha ya bụ Suspect mee egwu ihe onyonyo ọkpọrọ I No Send You

Muna bụ otu n'ime ndi egwu ntabire umu nwanyị kwuchtara anya ndi obodo Naijiria n'ihe onyonyo ezịrị n'ụwa nile nke ndi BET Cypher maka ihe ngosi nke BET Awards n'afọ 2011, nakwa onwa anọ nke afọ 2012, Muna wepụtara egwu abụọ ọgụrụ n'ahịrị n'ahịrị ọkpọrọ Here To Stay na nke ọzọ ọkpọkwara Down Down Low
N'afo 2011, Muna binyere aka na-akwụkwọ ndi Unilever ịkwado ahịa Lux ha dika onye ngosi
Ọ bụkwa onye n'ezipụta n'ihe onyonyo ire ahia Lux n'isonye nzọmukwu Patti Boulaye ya na Genevieve Nnaji

N'ọnwa anọ nke afọ 2011, oge ha kwadochara ihe onyonyo nke oso mee nke Michael Word ana-akpọ Pop Sugar, osokwara mee ihe onyonyo ana ezi ngbe obụla nke ndị Malta Guinness ana-akpọ Street Dance Africa[Tinye edensibịa] Muna n'otu aka ahụ sokwara mee ndọrọ ọkacha nma nke ụmụ nwoke nke ndi Naijiria n'afọ 2012, osokwara mee Nokia Don't Break The Beat ndọrọ ndọrọ nke multi-city Rap Battle
Jude Lemfani Abaga-emepụta ihe ndekọ na Naijiria
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2006 mgbe egwu ya 'Crowd Mentality' ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Jos, Nigeria
E wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Talk About It n'afọ 2008
MI 2 The Movie (2010) nọchiri LP ahụ

Nne na nna ya, Pastọ na Oriakụ
Abaga si Takum, Taraba steeti, ha abụọ bụ ndị Jukun-Nigerian
Ọ gara Baptist High School, na obodo Jos ebe nne ya zụtara akara egwu na mgbe e mesịrị, obere piano 7 nke mere ka ọ banye n'ụwa egwu
Jude nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, Jesse Jagz, onye nọkwa na egwu Naịjirịa na Afrịka, na Jason Abaga
N'oge Jude na-eto eto, ọ na-ege egwu sitere na Lauryn Hill, Bob Marley, Sarah Maclachlan, Pablo Neruda, Jay-Z na DMX
Ọrụ Jude na ụwa hip hop malitere site na nchapụta nke ọrụ egwu sitere na DMX na Lauryn Hill n'oge afọ 1998
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Calvin College, Michigan, US, ọ banyere n'ime uri mgbe ọ na-achụso ọrụ na Business na Economics
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe mgbe niile na nnukwu ihe ngosi hip hop na egwu nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Egwu rap ya na àgwà ya mere ka ọ nweta ọkwa nke atọ na ihe ngosi Calvin College nke akpọrọ 'HipHopera' na afọ 2003, nke bụ naanị 'ihe ngosi hip hop' nke Calvin College nwere
mekwara ụfọdụ mgbalị ndị na-eme ihe ọchị, mana o kpebiri ịrapara na egwu n'ihi na ihere na-eme ya mgbe ọ dịghị onye chịrị ọchị ma e wezụga ya
Jude malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2003
N'ịchọta ọnọdụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị dị ka Modenine, Ruggedman na Eedris Abdulkareem na-achịkwa, ọ malitere ngwa ngwa mmepụta nke mixtapes ya na enyi ya Djinee
Nke a dugara n'otu egwu a ma ama 'Safe', (abụ nke ọ na-eme ka abụ ndị ama ama na Naijiria na abụ ya) nke chịkọtara egwu dị egwu site na redio na ụlọ ọrụ vidio egwu nke Afrịka dị ka MTV Vibe
Egwu a nwetakwara ya ihe nrite na Nigerian Music Video Awards, City People, NEA n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Nkwupụta gbara ntọhapụ nke Safe mere ka otuto dị egwu nye abọm studio mbụ ya nke akpọrọ Talk About It ma Oye Akideinde nke 360nobs gosiri ya 85/10 Abọm ahụ chịkọtara onyinye dịka Onye egwu nke Afọ (Modemen Awards na afo 2008), Onye egwu Hip Hop kacha mma (City People Awards)
Mixtape mbụ ya bụ PYERIBOY
O mechara gaa n'ihu wepụta mixtape akpọrọ Illegal Music na afo 2009, nke ọ na-eji ike egwu ya eme ihe n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Mixtape ahụ sochiri Illegal Music II nke ewepụtara na afọ 2012
Laa azụ na Jos, Naijiria, ya na nwanne ya nwoke, Jesse Jagz, Ice Prince, Ruby, Threadstone, Lindsay, Moses (Elbulk), na E kelly jikọrọ aka wee mepụta Loopy Music

E mechara bịanye aka na ụlọ ọrụ Chocolate City, akara egwu a ma ama na Naịjirịa, nke mere ka o si obodo Jos kwaga n'isi obodo mba ahụ, Abuja, ma metụtakwa mmalite nke ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa

Ịma ama nke MI amụbaala ngwa ngwa n'ime afọ ndị gara aga na Naịjirịa ka ọ ghọworo otu n'ime ndị egwu rap a ma ama, ma jiri ya tụnyere ndị egwu ndị ọzọ dịka Naeto C, el Dee, D'banj, 9ice na Mode 9

E depụtara ya dị ka onye egwu nke anọ kachasị nwee nkà na Naịjirịa site na saịtị egwu n'ịntanetị Notjustokcom Ọkwa ahụ adịghị mma na MI ma o jiri egwu NotJustOk / Savage (Track 5) na mixtape ya wepụtara n'afọ 2016 Illegal Music 3 iji dozie nsogbu nke iji ya tụnyere ndị ọzọ na-eti egwu rap na Naijiria

Ọ rịọrọ n'ụzọ doro anya ka ndị nkatọ hapụ aha ya na ndepụta ọ bụla ma kwụsị ọkwa, ọkwa ma ọ bụ ịkatọ egwu ha na-enyeghị aka ịmepụta naanị n'ihi na onye nkatọ ahụ chọrọ inwetakwu traction, ndị na-eso ụzọ ma kwalite ọkwa ha

MI na Vector nwere oke egwu rap na-aga n'ihu iji kwuo onye bụ Hip Hop kachasị mma na Naịjirịa, N'afọ 2019, o mere ka MI wepụta egwu diss 'The Viper', ọ na-ekwu otú o si nyere ndị na-eme egwuregwu aka ma e jiri ya tụnyere Vector
O kwuru, sị, 'Lee ka anyị bilie site n'ibuli ndị ọzọ, onye ị buliri? Ọ dịghị onye n'ime afọ ndị a niile
Nwere ike ikwu na Vector tinyere ha n'ọnọdụ wow
Vector kụrụ na MI na diss track 'Judas, òké', na-azaghachi nkwupụta ya o kwuru,
'Jesse Jagz, ị bụ enyi m, enweghị m ike ime nke a ngwa ngwa mana eziokwu banyere nwanne gị nwoke agbagwoju anya
Ya mere, n'oge ụfọdụ n'okwuchukwu a, m ga-ekwu ụfọdụ ihe na-adịghị mma iji gosi ndị na-akwado ya na GOAT ha (Greatest Of All Time) bụ n'ezie òké
Ka anyị bido nkuzi ahụ
'Ònye bụ ndị rappers m tinyere? Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ gbakwunyere abụọ n'ime atọ gị ma etinyeghị m aka n'ihe ọ bụla
Emere m ya niile n'efu ebe ọ bụ na ị na-akwọ n'elu dị ka DJ Lambo gị
Olee maka égbè ị wetara iji nyere aka ịghọ rambo?Ya mere, gịnị ka m kwesịrị ime Sign a man I wouldn't sign? Anaghị m eme egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
'Ndị Yoruba ga-asị, 'Eni dale lo bale lo' Ambode na-apụ na VisionScape'

Na ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020, Vector na Jude 'MI' Abaga yiri ka ha emeriela agha ha mgbe ha abụọ zutere na akụkụ nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ nke 'The Conversation', usoro ihe nkiri Hennessy Nigeria dabere na asọmpi dị n'etiti MI na Vector, ha abụọ zutere ihu na ihu ma kwurịta ihe mere n'etiti ha
Ndị egwu abụọ ahụ kwuru ihe kpatara anụ ehi ahụ na echiche ha n'ebe ibe ha nọ
MI kwuru na o nwere echiche na Vector adịghị amasị ya, ebe Vector kwuru na ya kwenyere na MI bụ onye aghụghọ na aghụghọ

Marmaduke Arundel 'Duke' Wetherell (1883 - 25 Febụwarị 1939) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-achụ nta nnukwu egwuregwu
N'afọ 1930, Marmaduke gara Loch Ness ịchọ anụ ọhịa Loch Ness
Wetherell kwuru na ọ chọtara akara ụkwụ, mana mgbe e zigara ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị akara ụkwụ maka nnyocha ha bịara bụrụ nke enyí mmiri; onye na-eme ihe ọchị ejirila nche anwụ nke ụkwụ enyí mmiri
A mụrụ ya na Bodmin, Cornwall, Wetherell rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ndị Britain na South Africa n'oge a na-adịghị ekwu okwu
N'afọ 1920, ọ malitere imepụta na iduzi ihe nkiri mana ha enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọ mepụtara, duzie ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmepụta ya nke Livingstone (1925) na Robinson Crusoe (1927)
Ọ bụ ya kpatara aghụghọ 'foto dọkịta na-awa ahụ' nke Loch Ness Monster
Ọ bụ nna onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ian Colin
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Onye nduzi
Onye na-emepụta
Asli Dukan (amụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta mgbasa ozi onwe ya, ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke bi na Philadelphia na-arụ ọrụ na isiokwu nke akụkọ ifo na Afrofuturism
A mụrụ M
Asli Dukan na Newark, New Jersey ma too na Harlem, New York
Dukan na-eto ezinụlọ ya na nwatakịrị màkà imetụta ya na uche ndị isi ojii na akụkọ sayensị
Asli Dukan nwere MFA nke Media and Communication Arts site na Mahadum City nke New York (CUNY) nyèrè na 1999 na mmepụta ihe nkiri BA site na Machị New Jersey City na 1997
Ónyé na-eme nkírí Ayoka Chenzira bụ otu n'ime ndị prọfesọ ya
Dukan bụ ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Pennsylvania Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum nke Arts na City College nke New York
Dukan na-ekwu na ọ 'na-anabata ọdịnihu, ihe ịtụnanya na ụdị echiche efu nke akụkọ ifo (SF) dị ka ụzọ isi nyochaa ohere nke mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọha mmadụ

' O dere, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ obéré ihe nkírí SF nke gosipụtara na mmemme ihe nkiri gafee mba ahụ, Newark International Film Festival, ImageNation Film and Music Festival, Langston Hughes Film Festival na Blackstar Film Festival
O nyela aka na mpịakọta ndị ọkà mmụta banyéré Afrofuturism na ihe ndị na-eme na ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi
O guzobere Mizan Media Productions, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ ifo Afro-diasporic na akụkọ ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, n'afọ 2000
Site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, ọ duziri ma mepụta ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi, yana vidiyo maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ayodele Heath bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye na-ekwu okwu, na onye na-ede akụkọ ifo
A mụrụ ya na Atlanta, M
Ayodele Heath gụrụ injinịa eletriki na Georgia Institute of Technology ma nwee MFA na Poetry site na New England College
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro abụọ na Southeastern Regional Poetry Slam Individual Champion (1999, 2000) na onye mmeri iri n'otu n'otu na National Poetry Slam (1999)

E bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke uri, Otherness, n'afọ 2011 na Brick Road ebe mbiputa abụ Ọ bụ onye okike nke ụdị uri na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, ozu eletrik, na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke anthology, Electronic Corpse Poems from a Digital Salon (Svaha Paradox, 2014)

Carl Holman (June 27, 1919, Minter City, Mississippi, United States – August 9, 1988, Washington, DC) bụ onye Amerika na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na-ede abụ, onye na-ede egwuregwu, na onye na-akwado ikike obodo
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ The Baptizin' (1971)
N'afọ 1968, Ebony depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime otu narị ndị isi ojii America kachasị nwee mmetụta
Holman tolitere na St
Louis, Missouri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lincoln n'afọ 1942 wee nweta nzere masta na Mahadum Chicago
O mechara nweta nzere masta ọzọ na Mahadum Yale, ebe ọ gara na agụmakwụkwọ edemede
Ọ kụziri dị ka prọfesọ Bekee na Clark College ruo afọ iri na anọ ma kụzikwara na Mahadum Hampton na Mahadum Lincoln
N'otu oge, ọ na-edezi Atlanta Inquirer, akwụkwọ akụkọ ojii kwa izu na Clark College nke na-akọ banyere nsogbu ikike obodo na ndịda
N'afọ 1962, ọ kwagara Washington, DC, ịrụ ọrụ na Civil Rights Commission, bụrụ osote onye isi ya n'afọ 1966
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Washington, DC Board of Higher Education, nke na-achị mahadum nke aha ya bụ Federal City College
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ụlọ nke onye isi obodo Washington, DC

Site n'afọ 1971 ruo afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke National Urban Coalition, otu nzukọ e guzobere mgbe ọgba aghara nke 1967, ebe ọ kwadoro maka mmemme na ụlọ, agụmakwụkwọ, ọrụ, na mmepe akụ na ụba
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala ya n'afọ 1971
N'oge ahụ, nzukọ ahụ nwere isi na obodo iri anọ na asatọ
Ọ lụrụ Mariella Ukina Ama Holman ma ha nwere ụmụ atọ, nwa nwanyị, Kinshasha Holman Conwill, na ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Kwame Holman na Kwasi Holman
Mark D
Bright bụ onye America na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ese akụkọ

Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Doc Bright (egwuregwu na mbido ya), a maara ya nke ọma maka ide akụkọ Marvel Comics Iron Man Armor Wars, Green Lantern abụọ Emerald Dawn miniseries maka DC Comics, maka ise mkpuchi nke Marvel Comics 'Transformers # 5 na maka ịmepụta Quantum na Woody na onye edemede Christopher J
Priest

Bright mechara bụrụ onye na-ese akụkọ n'onwe ya, ọ bụ ezie na ya na Priest jikọtara maka obere ihe nkiri Quantum na Woody ise nke e bipụtara site na ụdị ọhụrụ nke Valiant Comics na 2014-2015, mana e debere ya na usoro Quantum na Wood mbụ
Ọrụ ya na ihe ọchị malitere na 1978 site na akụkọ dị peeji atọ na House of Mystery #257 (Eprel 1978) Ọrụ mbụ ya na-arụ mgbe niile bụ inye nka maka Christopher J
Priest (nke na-aga site na aha ọmụmụ ya, Jim Owsley) dere Falcon mini-series na 1983
Onye na-ese ihe bụ Paul Smith dechara otu mbipụta, Bright dekwara mbipụta atọ fọdụrụnụ
Ya na Priest rụkọtara ọrụ ọzọ na mbipụta iri ikpeazụ nke Power Man na Iron Fist
Ndị na-ese ihe na-eme mgbe niile na usoro akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị gụnyere Solo Avengers, Iron Man, GI
Joe, Green Lantern, Action Comics (mgbe a na-ebipụta ya kwa izu), Milestone Comics' Icon na Acclaim Comics' Quantum na Woody
Ọ bụ ezie na Bright dere ụfọdụ n'ime mkpuchi ya, e mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na onye na-ese ihe, karịsịa Romeo Tanghal, Randy Emberlin, Greg Adams na Mike Gustovich

N'ime afọ ya dị ka onye na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị oge niile, Bright nyekwara ihe osise maka kaadị azụmaahịa yiri ya Kaadị Green Lantern Hal Jordan maka kaadị 1992 DC Cosmic nke Impel, ihe dịka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke kaadị azụma ahịa 1991 GI
Joe nke Impel na 1991, na ihe osise Green Lantern na Green Lantern Corps niile maka kaadị azụ ahịa Impel / Skybox nke 1993 DC Cosmic Teams
Mgbe afọ iri abụọ gasịrị n'akwụkwọ America na-atọ ọchị, Bright banyere n'akụkọ maka mgbasa ozi, na telivishọn na ihe nkiri, ọkachasị gụnyere M
Night Shyamalan's The Last Airbender
Ọ laghachiri na egwuregwu na-atọ ọchị mgbe ụfọdụ, gụnyere Untold Tales nke Nụ Universe otu-shot maka Marvel Comics na mbipụta Transformers Spotlight maka IDW Publishing
O mekwara usoro ihe ọchị mebiri emebi na Jason McKee nke A-10 Comics
A na-emelite ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Ndị Kraịst nke Brightụzọ dị elu, nke ọ na-ede ma na-ese, mgbe ụfọdụ na weebụsaịtị ya
Ọrụ ndị na-atọ ọchị (ihe osise pensụl dị n'ime) gụnyere
(Quantum na Woody note A kagburu usoro ahụ na 1998 na mbipụta # 17
Mgbe Acclaim Comics haziri ma maliteghachi akwụkwọ ya na-atọ ọchị n'afọ sochirinụ, Quantum na Woody maliteghachiri ibipụta

Dị ka ihe ọchị iji mee ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwa ndị gafere kemgbe mbipụta # 17, mbipụta ọhụrụ mbụ e wepụtara bụ # 32, iji kwekọọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwa usoro ahụ na-apụ n'ebe a na-anọ, dị ka a ga-asị na usoro ahụ gara n'ihu
Mbipụta #32 gosipụtara akụkọ nke na-aga n'ihu, na-enweghị ihe na-egosi ihe mere tupu, na njedebe cliffhanger nke a ga-edozi naanị ma ọ bụrụ na Quantum na Woody gara n'ihu na-ebipụta maka ọnwa 15 ọzọ
N'ọnwa na-esote ọ maliteghachiri nọmba mbụ ya na # 18, na-ewere akụkọ ahụ site na # 17
Bright dere site na mbipụta # 20, mana mbipụta # 21 bụ ihe omenkà Oscar Jimenez, na usoro ikpeazụ, ebe a kagburu ya ọzọ)
M, ma ọ bụ m, bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na atọ na mkpụrụedemede Latịn, ejiri mee ya na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ, mkpụrụedemede nke asụsụ ndị ọzọ ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile
Aha ya na bekee bu em (akpọrọ /ˈɛm/), plural ems
E nwetara mkpụrụedemede M site na Finishia Mem, site na Greek Mu (Μ, μ)
Mem Semitic nwere ike nweta site na nnabata 'Proto-Sinaitic' (Bronze Age) nke echiche 'mmiri' na ederede ndị Ijipt

Ihe ịrịba ama Ijipt nwere uru acrophonic / n/, site na okwu Ijipt maka 'mmiri', nt; Nkuchi ahụ dị ka akwụkwọ ozi Semitic maka /m/ bụ nke a na-atụ anya na ọ bụkwa na acrophonic, site na okwu Semitic maka 'mmiri', *mā(y) -a/m/a /n/
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ahụ na-anọchite anya ụda ụdaolu imi [m] na orthography nke Latin nakwa na nke ọtụtụ asụsụ nke oge a, nakwa na International Phonetic Alphabet
N'asụsụ Bekee, Oxford English Dictionary (mbipụta mbụ) na-ekwu na ọ bụ ụdaume mgbe ụfọdụ, n'okwu ndị dị ka spasm na -ism
N'okwu nke oge a, a na-akọwa nke a dị ka ụdaume syllabic (IPA [m̩])
M bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na anọ a na-ejikarị eme ihe n'asụsụ Bekee
N'asụsụ Washo, mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ndị dị ala na-anọchite anya ụda em, ebe mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ndị buru ibu na-anọchi anya ụda em na-enweghị olu

Ma, MA, ma ọ bụ nna ukwu
Stefan Corbin Burnett bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, na ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí, nke a maara nke ọma n'okpuru aha egwu ya bụ Ride
Ọ bụ ónyé isi nkè otu hip hop Death Grips
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1990, tupu ya na ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ Zach Hill na ónyé na'ịkpọ egwu Andy Morin guzobere Death Grips na 2010
Mgbè ọ nọ n'ime otu ahụ, Ride adọtawo nlebara anya màkà ụdị egwu egwu ya na okwu nzuzo ya
Stefan Corbin Burnett si Sacramento, California
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Mahadum Hampton dị na Hampton, Virginia, mana ọ kwụsịrị
Burnett malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'okpuru aha ọzọ 'Mxlplx', na-emepụta otu hip hop a na-akpọ Fyre na nwanne ya nwoke (ónyé na-eji aha Swank) na ónyé ọzọ na-eti egwu na Sacramento a na- woowe Young G
Ọrụ ahụ bịara na njedebe mgbè nwanne ya nwoke lụrụ di ma ghara ịga n'ihu na otu ahụ
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Paesano's Midtown nakwa na Pushkin's Bakery na Sacramento ma chụsoo ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
N'afọ 2010, Burnett were aha 'Ride' wee guzobe Death Grips na ónyé agbata obi ya, Zach Hill, ónyé a maara màkà ọrụ ịkụ ọkpọ ya na otu Hella na ọrụ nnọkọ ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Hill kpọtara enyi ya na ónyé na-emepụta Andy Morin n'ime otu ahụ, ha malitekwara ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Na Machị 2011, Death Grips wepụtara EP mbụ ha akpọrọ onwe ha
Otu ọnwa mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ha wepụtara mixtape Exmilitary, nke nwetara otuto na nlebara anya site na mbipụta egwu
Ndị otu ahụ bịanyere aka na Epic Records na 2012, wee wepụta abọm mbụ ha, The Money Store, n'oge na-adịghị anya
A kọwaala olu Ride dị ka '(a) ụdị rap na-atọ ụtọ, na-eyi ngwakọta nke hardcore punk na okwu a na-ekwu okwu
A kọwakwara ụdị ya dị ka 'ihe na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo na mkpu na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ'

Na nyocha ya màkà Death Grips' Exmilitary, Nate Patrin kwuru banyere olu Ride 'Ọ dị egwu ma sie ike, olu ya na-ada ụda dị ike na-eme ka ọ dị okpukpu abụọ ruo n'ókè ebe ọ na-adịghịdị ka nsogbụ mgbè ọ dị n'etiti ala na ngwakọta
' Evan Rytelewski nke The AV
Club kọwara olu Ride dị ka 'ihe ọzọ na-eme ka ọ na-eti mkpu n'olu a na-emebi emebi na nke na-emefu emebi nke na ọ ga-afụ ya ahụ'
N'adịghị ka ụdị rap ya na-eme ihe ike, Burnett na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ dị nro; n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Spin n'afọ 2012, o kwùrù, 'Abụ m ónyé nzuzo, enwere m mmadụ ole na ole m na-akpọ ndị enyi m
Anaghị m atụkwasị ụmụ mmadụ obi n'ozuzu ha; anaghị m atụkwasị mgbasa ozi obi
Enweghị m mmasị ịkekọrịta ndụ onwé m na ụwa
Ọ dịghị ihe ọ bụla'
Ónyé otu ya bụ Zach Hill akọwaala ya dị ka 'onye na-anọ naanị ya' na 'ónyé nzuzo'
Peter Jones, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ MC Shy D, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe na Bronx, New York
Ọ bịanyere aka na Luke Skyywalker Records ma wepụta abọm abụọ, Got to Be Tough na Comin' Correct na 88, site na akara ahụ site na 1987 ruo 1988
O weputara abọm nke atọ ya, Don't Sweat Me, na 1990 site na On Top Records na Benz Records, na abọm ya nké anọ, The Comeback, na 1993 site na Wrap Records
N'afọ 1996, Jones wepụtara abọm studio ya nke ise, Recordnize, nke gosipụtara DJ Smurf n'okpuru Benz Records
E wepụtara abọm ya nke isii na nke kachasị ọhụrụ, Against the Odds, na 1999 na Charlotte 'Tha Rhythum' Crooms, kwa site na Benz Records
E nyèrè MC
Shy D nde $ 16 na ụgwọ ọrụ gárá aga na mmebi ntaramahụhụ site n'aka onye na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Luther Campbell
Shy D kwuru na Campbell ji ya ụgwọ site na Gotta Be Tough and Comin' Correct na '88, abọm abụọ o dekọrọ n'okpuru ákàrà ndekọ Campbell, Luke Records, na ngwụcha afọ 1980
Abọm studio
Michael Joseph Jackson (Önwa asatọ 29, 1958 — Önwa isii 25, 2009) bụ onye Amerikạ na-agụ egwú burukwa onye na-agba egwu
N'ịbụ onye a ghọtara dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu kacha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge niile, ọ bụ onye isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke azụmahịa ngosi na otu n'ime akara ngosi omenala nke narị afọ nke 20
Nke asaa n'ime ezinụlọ nke nwere ụmụaka itoolu, ya na ụmụnne ya bụrụ abụ site na afọ isii wee malite ọrụ ọkachamara na iri na otu na Jackson nke ise, otu ìgwè ya na ụmụnne ya ndị tọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ ka bụ onye otu (rue 1984), ọ malitere ọrụ naanị ya na 1971
Ise n'ime egwu solo ya ewepụtara n'oge ndụ ya so na ọba egwu kacha ewu ewu n'ụwa Off Wall (1979), Thriller (1982), Bad (1987), Dangerous (1991) na HIStory (1995)
Na 1980s, ọ ghọrọ onye isi na egwu pop
A na-eme eserese egwu ya, nnukwu oke na ihe ọhụrụ, dị ka obere ihe nkiri, ọkachasị maka aha Beat It, Billie Jean, Thriller, Bad ma ọ bụ Mpụ dị nro
Ọ kwalitere ọtụtụ usoro ịgba egwu, gụnyere njem ọnwa, nke ghọrọ mbinye aka ya
N'ịbụ onye jikọtara mkpụrụ obi, funk, pop na ụdị egwu egwu, ụdị olu ya na ụdị egwu ya na-aga n'ihu na-emetụta ọtụtụ ndị na-ese hip-hop, pop na r'n'b nke oge a
Aha ya bụ 'Eze Pop', Michael Jackson mebiri ọtụtụ ndekọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ
N'ihe karịrị nde ndekọ 500 rere n'ụwa niileNote 2, ọ nọ n'etiti ndị na-ere ndekọ atọ kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile
N'ịre ahịa nke nde 70 nde, Thriller ka bụ ọba egwu kacha ere na akụkọ egwu wee nweta asambodo platinum ugboro 34 na United States
A maara Michael jackson n'ọhịo ụda maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe mbụ na-eji usoro ahịrị ma ọ bụ usoro nhazi ahịrị
(audio Systeme)

Ọ na-ekerekwa òkè n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere, karịsịa na ọrụ USA maka Africa na Heal The World Foundation (1992), nke e mepụtara na-esochi njem nlegharị anya ụwa dị ize ndụ, ma na-enye aka n'oge ọrụ ya n'ọgụ megide agụụ, obi ọjọọ anụmanụ na mmetọ ụmụaka

Otú ọ dị, akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ndụ onwe ya na-emebi aha ọha ya, karịsịa site n'ọtụtụ nzaghachi ya na ịwa ahụ ịchọ mma, ụdị ndụ ya weere dị ka eccentric, na ọbụna karịa site na mkpesa abụọ maka mmetọ mmekọahụ nke nwatakịrị, na 1993 na 2003, n Otú ọ dị
, na-akpata enweghị ikpe ụlọikpe
Alụmdi na nwunye ya abụọ na ụmụ ya atọ bụkwa ihe esemokwu
Ka ọ na-akwado maka usoro egwu nke a bụ nke a ga-eme na London, Michael Jackson nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 50 site na ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè
E mechara mara onye dibia bekee, bụ́ Conrad Murray ikpe maka igbu mmadụ
Ogige MKO Abiola bụ ogige ntụrụndụ ọha na eze dị na ụzọ awara awara Ikododu - Lagos/Ibadan na Ojota, Lagos
A gụrụ oghere ahịhịa ndụ ahụ aha onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nwụrụ anwụ na onye ọrụ ebere MKO Abiola
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ nwere nnukwu ala ahịhịa ndụ, ụfọdụ ihe ncheta na oche maka ezumike
Na ọnwa June afọ 2018, e debere ihe oyiyi nke MKO Abiola dị mita iri anọ na isii n'ogige ntụrụndụ iji sọpụrụ ihe kpatara ya

Ọ bụ Olurotimi Ajayi chepụtara ma guzobe ihe ọkpụkpọ nke MKO Abiola iji cheta Chief Moshood Abiola, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a na-ewere n'ọtụtụ ebe dị ka onye mmeri nke ntuli aka Naijiria na-enweghị nkwubi okwu n'afọ 1993
N'ịbụ nke guzo n'ihe dị ka mita 46 n'ogologo, a kpughere ihe oyiyi ahụ na iri na abụọ nke ọnwa June 2018 n'oge ọchịchị Gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode
Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola, onye a na-akpọkarị MKO Abiola (24 August 1937 na nke asaa July 1998) bụ onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
O sonyere na ntuli aka nke 1993 na Naịjirịa ma bụrụ onye a na-ewere dịka onye mmeri ọ bụ ezie na ewepụtaghị nsonaazụ ikpeazụ
N'afọ 1994, e jidere ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ maka ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru mgbe o kwupụtara onwe ya dị ka onye isi ala Naịjirịa
MKO Abiola nwụrụ na asaa Julaị 1998, ụbọchị a ga-ahapụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Ọnọdụ ndị a na-enyo enyo na-esochi ọnwụ ya, ebe nyocha nke ozu kwuru na Abiola nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi, Onye isi nchekwa nke General Sani Abacha kwuru na a kụrụ Abiola ihe ruo ọnwụ

N'icheta ndụ, ike na ihe nketa nke Abiola setịpụrụ, gọọmentị steeti Lagos site n'aka gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode kpughere ihe oyiyi MKO Abiola na nke iri na abụọ June 2018 kpọmkwem afọ iri abụọ na ise mgbe ọ meriri ntuli aka onye isi ala na nke iri na abụọ June 1993 na Ojota, mpaghara Lagos
Gọvanọ ahụ kwuru na ihe oyiyi ahụ ga-anọgide na-abụ ihe ncheta nke ihe nketa Abiola na ịdị ukwuu ọ nọchitere anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa
Gụọ ihe ndị ọzọ na https //wwwvanguardngrcom/2018/06/ambode-pays-tribute-abiola-unveils-statue/z

N'ịbụ nke dị n'etiti 'MKO Gardens' ma guzo nke iri atọ na asaa feet ogologo (conversion???), a na-etinye ihe oyiyi MKO Abiola na pedestal 9 feet na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe ncheta na nke iri anọ na abụọ feet elu
Ihe a tụrụ atụ nke e ji eriri ugegbe mee na-egosi Abiola na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị na-eyi agbada na-asọ asọ na aka nri ya weliri elu na-egosi ihe ịrịba ama nke udo
E bu ụzọ chepụta ihe oyiyi MKO Abiola n'afọ 2003 tupu e degharịa ya ka ọ dị ugbu a

Terrell McNeal, ónyé a maara dị ka MP808, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé na-ede egwu
A maara ya nke ọma màkà mmepụta ya dị ka akụkụ nke otu mmepụta ndekọ America 808 Mafia, yana ndị na-ese ihe Meek Mill, Future na Chief Keef
MP808 ga-ezute ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Southside, onye ga-emesị nye ya ohere na otu mmepụta ya, 808 Mafia
N'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, MP808 ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ 808 Mafia TM88
MUDI, mkpọbiri aha bụ Mudiaga, bụ ụdị ụlọ ọrụ gbasara ejiji Naijiria nke Clement Mudiaga Enajemo hiwere
Enajemo malitere azụmahịa ya n'afọ 1993 ma bụrụ onye mbụ na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria weere ngwaahịa ya gaa mba ọzọ site na imeghe ụlọ ahịa na mba ndị ọzọ

MUDI Africa bụ ụlọ ọrụ ejiji mba ụwa Afrocentric nke onye nnọchi anya ya bụ Mozez PraizNdia akpọpụtara aha eyituola uwe omepụtara di ka John Kufuor (onye bụbu onye isi ala Ghana) , Salif Keita, Youssou N’Dour, John Obi Mikel, Kolo Toure, John Fashanu, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Fred Amata, Basorge Tariah Jr, Frank Edoho, Ramsey Nouah, Desmond Elliot, Olu Jacobs, Jumobi Adegbesan (nke bụ Mofe–Damijo ugbu a), Shiek Karamotor, Kwasi Kyei Darwkah, Yves Zogbo, na Eze Mohammed V nke Morocco
N'afọ 2018, MUDI Africa kpọrọ Nhiwe ya aha onye mba Ghana nwụrụ anwụ na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN bụ Kofi Annan

MVP egwuregwu kpakpando bụ nnukwu ụmụ bebi ohiri isi nke Ace Novelty Ụlọ ọrụ wepụtara na gburugburu 1991 na 1992 Enyere egwuregwu nke ha na-egwu aha (ya bụ 'Tackling Dummies' maka Football)[Tinye edensibịa]
MVP Sports Plush Dolls

MV Iron Baron (nke bụbu MV Ocean Express na MV Irrawaddy) bụ ụgbọ mmiri 37,557 dwt nke e wuru na 1985
Ọ bụ BHP Shipping kwụrụ ya ụgwọ na 1990
Na 10 Julaị 1995 ọ na-eru nso na njedebe nke njem na-ebu 24,000 tọn manganese ore site na Groote Eylandt site na Port Kembla gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Bell Bay na ugwu Tasmania, Australia
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe n'oge ahụ bụ ugwu-ọdịda anyanwụ 37–46 km/h (20–25 knot) ifufe na oke osimiri dị mita abụọ
Ọ gbadara n'elu Hebe Reef ka ọ na-erute n'ọnụ mmiri Tamar wee malite ịgbanye mmanụ ọkụ bonka
A chụpụrụ ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ n'enweghị nsogbu
Ọrụ nzọpụta malitere ma nwetaghachi ndị mbụ nwụrụ n'ihe omume ahụ, penguin nwụrụ anwụ na cormorants atọ nwụrụ anwụ, na 13 July
N'oge ahụ, a na-elekọta 200 penguins
Na 16 Julaị, ebugharị Iron Baron ma kwaga n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị n'ikpere mmiri
Nnyocha n'okpuru mmiri gosipụtara na ọ kpatala nnukwu mmebi ihe owuwu ma na-aga n'ihu na-akawanye njọ
Site na ihu igwe ọjọọ ọzọ, BHP kpebiri ịhapụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ
A dọbara ya n'ebe a kwadoro maka ịhapụ ya nke dị kilota 85 (53 mi) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Flinders Island ebe ọ mikpuru na 30 Julaị
Ihe ruru tọn 325 nke mmanụ mmanụ bonka dị arọ ka wụfuru n'ụgbọ ahụ ka ọ na-agbada, na-atụgharị ma na-adọba n'ala a na-ekpofu ya
Ọtụtụ osimiri na agwaetiti dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Tasmania metụtara ma mee nnukwu mkpocha na nnapụta anụ ọhịa
Obere penguins nwere mmetụta dị njọ karịsịa na nnụnụ mmanụ 1894 anakọtara maka ọgwụgwọ na imezigharị
E mere atụmatụ na e gburu puku mmadụ iri abụọ na puku isii na Ninth Island naanị
N'afọ 2001, e mere atụmatụ na ọnwụ penguin dị n'etiti 10,000 na 20,000 nnụnụ
N'afọ 2005, ntụgharị uche nke afọ 10 gachara na ihe merenụ degharịrị ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ elu, na-eche na ọ ga-egbu penguin na 25,000
MV Waily bụ ụgbọ mmiri na-ebu ibu nke Saint Vincent na Grenadines nke Treasure Marine Ltd
Ụgbọ mmiri ahụ so na ụgbọ mmiri na-ebu mmanụ nke Malaysia MT Bunga Kelana 3 na 25 Mee 2010 na Singapore Strait nke mere ka a tọhapụ tọn puku abuo nke mmanụ ala
Reginald Lamar Cox (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwaa Mee, 1972), nke a maara dịka M Lamar, bụ ónyé America na-ede egwu, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri, na ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na ónyé na-akpọ piano nke ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe nkiri, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, na arụmọrụ
Lamar bụ ejima yiri nke ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí Laverne Cox, ma kpọọ àgwà nwanne ya nwanyị tupu mgbanwe na ihe omume abụọ nke ihe ngosi Netflix Orange Is the New Black
A mụrụ Reginald Lamar Cox na Mobile, Alabama, ma dị ka nwatakịrị bụrụ abụ dị ka soprano na ukwe chọọchị ya
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na San Francisco Art Institute wee gaa Yale màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ tupu ọ kwụsị iji lekwasị ányà na egwu
Ọ kwagara New York iji soro Ira Siff, ónyé guzobere ma na-eduga soprano nke La Gran Scena Opera Company, nweta ọzụzụ olu
N'afọ 2014, Lamar sonyere na mkparịta ụka ghere oghe na ndị édémédé, Marci Blackman, na Samuel R
Delany kpọrọ 'Transgressive Sexual Practice' dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ dị ka ónyé ọkà mmụta na-ebi na The New School
O depụtara ederede nke nko na Toni Morrison, yana onye na-ede egwu egwu Diamanda Galásʹs Plague Mass, dị ka ihe mkpali màkà ọrụ ya
One Archive na Mahadum nke Southern California nyere iwu Lamar's Funeral Doom Spiritual, nké gosipụtara na 2016 dị ka arụmọrụ na ntinye multimedia na ihe, vidiyo, na mbipụta

Ọrụ ahụ dabere na ndụ na ọnwụ nke Willie Francis, ónyé Black American nke a na-ebo ebubo igbu nwoke ọcha dị afọ iri isé na atọ mgbè ọ dị afọ irí na isé, ikpe Francis nwetara nlebara anya dị ukwuu mgbè ọ lanarịrị mgbalị igbu ya site na oche eletrik, mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, NAACP gwara ya okwu ma mata na ha abụọ anọwo na mmekọrịta mmekọahụ

Ihe omume a dugara na mmepe nke Funeral Doom Spiritual, nke nwéré mmalite echiche ya na ọmụmụ Lamar banyere nnọchiteanya nke ojii, nwoke ojii, ọchịchọ agbụrụ, na njikọ nke ọrụ Michel Foucaultás na panopticon na Frantzanon Fáz na edemede banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na anya ọcha
Maïga nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Maïmouna Gueye Fall, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na France na Senegal
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Climb, Payoff, Cuties, Bacon on the Side
Mgbe ọ lụchara nwoke French, ọ gara France n'afọ 1998
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọnwa olenaole gasịrị, ọ gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ na-eche ihu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na echiche echiche sitere n'aka di ya
Mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm gasịrị, ọ kwagara Paris
Gueye malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na egwuregwu ihe nkiri na Sophocles Antigone n'okpuru nlekọta nke onye edemede Haiti, Gérard Chenet
N'afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'egwuregwu ọzọ, nke French nke a ma ama Monologues du vagin nke Eve Ensler
O mechara kwaga na mmepụta ihe nkiri ma mee ihe nkiri a ma ama, Souvenirs de la dame en noir na Ọ bụ oji, mana ọ mara mma
Mgbe ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gasịrị, ọ mechara pụta na sinima na ọrụ izizi ya na ihe nkiri Payoff n'afọ 2003
O mechara bụrụ onye isi na ihe nkiri Touristes? Oh ee! nke Jean-Pierre Mocky duziri n'afọ 2004
Ọ bụ onye guzobere 'Afrokids', klọb ntụrụndụ ụmụaka nke na-enye ihe osise, ịgụ, ịgba egwú, ịkọ akụkọ, na ụlọ ọrụ DIY

Maïmouna Sourang Ndir (Amụrụ n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1952) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal nke jere ozi n'ọkwa dị iche iche nke gọọmentị nakwa ịbụ onye nnọchi anya Senegal na France site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2012
A mụrụ Ndir n'ụbọchị 3 Ọktoba 1952 na Saint-Louis, Senegal
Nne ya bụ onye edemede Fatou Niang Siga
O nwetara nzere masta na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Laval na Quebec n'afọ 1996
Ndir rụrụ ọrụ n'ime Ministry of Social Development tupu a họpụta ya dị ka Minista n'afọ 2002 na ọchịchị Idrissa Seck mbụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Obere na Obere Ụlọ Ọrụ na Microfinance na Minista nke Ebe Obibi na Ahụike Ọha n'okpuru Cheikh Hadjibou Soumaré
Ọ bụ onye otu Senegalese Democratic Party
N'afọ 2009, Onye isi ala Abdoulaye Wade họpụtara Ndir ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Senegal na France, Monaco na Andorra, nke a na-ahụ dị ka otu n'ime ọrụ kachasị mkpa na mba ahụ
Nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa a, a katọrọ nhọpụta ya n'ihi enweghị ahụmịhe mmekọrịta mba na mba
Gọọmentị ọhụrụ kpọrọ ya na Dakar n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, ya na ọtụtụ ndị nnọchi anya ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ndị ọrụ
Maïmouna Togola (amụrụ na 7 Jenụwarị , na afọ 1991) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Mali
Togola gbara Mali n'ọkwa dị elu n'oge asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2014
Małgorzata Braunek (30 January 1947 – 23 June 2014) bu onye Poland bu ọmẹka
MaPo Kinnord (amụrụ n'afọ 1960 na Cleveland, OH) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nke bi na New Orleans, Louisiana
Kinnord tolitere na Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ gụsịrị BFA ya na Massachusetts College of Art na Boston, ma nata MFA ya na Mahadum Ohio State na Columbus
N'afọ 1995, ọ kwagara New Orleans, LA ébé ọ zutere otu n'ime ndị nkụzi ya, John T
Scott
N'iji ụdị ihe a tụrụ atụ nké yiri ụlọ apịtị nke Ghana, ọrụ Kinnord bụ màkà ncheta ndị nna nna
Ọ nọrọ oge na Northern Ghana na-emepụta vidiyo nyocha banyéré ite na ihe owuwu ceramic
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe owuwu ma na-enyocha ma n'èzí ma n'ime site na ụrọ na nhazi elu
O jikwa ụzọ o si arụ ọrụ na ụrọ tụnyere jazz, improvisational ma nwee nhazi
Akụkụ nke ọrụ Kinnord dị ka ónyé nkuzi gụnyere ọgwụgwọ nka na-eji ntụgharị uche na-achịkwa ụrọ
Ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi na Penland School of Crafts, na North Carolina, Haystack Mountain School of Craft na Maine
Kinnord kụziri na MassArt na Massachusetts na Berkeley California tupu ọ kwaga New Orleans na 1995 ébé ọ ghọrọ Associate Professor of Art na Xavier University of Louisiana

E gosipụtara ọrụ Kinnord na mbà ụwa gụnyere na Arthur Roger Gallery, Mahadum Tulane, Baltimore Clayworks, Stella Jones Gallery, Swarthmore College, Contemporary Arts Center na New Orleans, Ogden Museum of Southern Art, na Imago Mundi

N'afọ 2017, e tinyere ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Congregation at Antenna Gallery N'afọ 2018, a gụnyere ọrụ Kinnord na The Whole Drum Will Sound Women in Southern Abstraction na Ogden Museum of Southern Art n'akụkụ ọrụ Lynda Benglis, Dusti Bongé, Clyde Connell, Dorothy Hood, Marie Hull, Lin Emery, Margaret Evangeline, Cynthia Brants, Jacqueline Humphries, Valerie Jaudon na Ida Kohlmeyer
1 Maachị bu ubochi nke 1st (nke mbụ) na onwa ana kpo Maachị

Maaike bụ aha nwanyị nke asụsụ Dutch, nke mbụ bụ obere aha Maria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gunyere
Maale (a n'ede kwa ka Male) bụ asụsụ Omotic nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Omo nke Etiopia
Ndị Maale na-ejigide asụsụ ha n'ụzọ siri ike, n'agbanyeghị na ha na-enweta nrụgide na asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Maalouf (spellings ndị ọzọ Maloof, Malouf, Malouff, Maluf, Malluf; Arabic معلوف المعلوف) bụ aha nna Arabụ

Ezinụlọ Maalouf so n'òtù agbụrụ ndị a maara dị ka Ghassanids nke si Yemen kwaga Houran na Siria nke oge a tupu ọdịda nke Marib Dam (Arabic سد مأرب) n'ihe dị ka 102 AD Ezinụlọ ahụ chịrị Houran na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 500 ruo mgbe ndị Alakụba meriri na 637 AD
Mgbe ọbịbịa nke Islam gasịrị, ụfọdụ ndị otu ghọrọ ndị Alakụba ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ha nọgidere bụrụ Ndị Kraịst karịsịa Antiochan Eastern-Orthodox na Melkite Greek Katọlik
A na-ekwu na ọtụtụ ndị isi a ma ama natara aha pụrụ iche nke Maayuf (معيوف) nke pụtara na a tọhapụrụ ya ma ọ bụ na-echebe ya
Mgbe gọọmentị na-achị achị mechara kagbuo aha a, ọtụtụ ndị òtù ezinụlọ jidere ya n'ụdị aha nna Maalouf, ma ọ bụ Al-Maalouf
Otú ọ dị, a na-arụ ụka banyere mmalite nke aha ezinụlọ ahụ
MaameYaa Boafo (nke a na-akpọ 'Mah-Mih-Yah Bwafoh') bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A mụrụ Boafo na Pakistan
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Ashanti nke Ghana
A zụlitere ya na Sudan, Ethiopia, Geneva na Kenya, mana ọ bụ nwa amaala Ghana
N'afọ 2001, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Boafo gara United States iji mụọ French na nkwurịta okwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hood College n'afọ 2005, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Rutgers wee nweta nzere masta ya n'afọ 2019
Boafo gụrụ akwụkwọ na mba ofesi na Mahadum Marc Bloch na Strasbourg, France

Boafo mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya dị ka Asa na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke afọ 2012 Asa, A Beautiful Girl N'afọ 2014, Boafo malitere igosipụta dịka Nana Yaa na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Nicole Amarteifio bụ An African City
Omume ya bụ onye nta akụkọ na-agba mbọ ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ na Accra, nke yitere Carrie Bradshaw na Sex and the City
Boafo chọpụtara ọrụ ahụ na ibe Facebook, n'ihi na ọ na-eme njem, o zigara Amarteifio nyocha vidio, onye kpọrọ otu izu ka e mesịrị
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na Bus Nut, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke ọ gụrụ okwu sitere na ikpe Rosa Parks
Emere ya na San Francisco Film Festival
N'afọ 2015, Boafo nwere obere ọrụ na The Family Fang
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi New York, I Love You na Olive na 2016
Site na 2017 ruo 2018, ọ pụtara dị ka Paulina na egwuregwu School Girls, nke Mean Girls kpaliri
A họpụtara Boafo maka Lucille Lortell Award na Los Angeles Drama Circle Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma, ma nata onyinye Drama Desk maka ihe ngosi ya

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrịa HIV Abena Kwemo na 2018 nke Chicago Med N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha onwe onye Briana Logan na usoro TV Bluff City Law Boafo gosipụtara Zainab na usoro TV Ramy na 2020
Boafo mere vidiyo na mmeghachi omume maka ọnwụ Freddie Gray na Baltimore nke akpọrọ 'Dị ka Nina', ebe a kọrọ na ọ na-eyi onye na-agụ egwu Nina Simone
Na mgbakwunye na Bekee, ọ na-asụ Twi
Maamoun bụ aha nna Arabic
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere kwara
Maartens bụ aha nna nke ndi Dutch na nke ndi Afrikaans
Ọ sitere na aha nwoke a na-akpọ Martin ma nwee ike ịpụta
Maati bụ aha e nyere na aha nna
Ndị ama ama ṅwere aha a gụnyere
Maatouk (Arabụ ) bụ aha nna Arabic
Ọ sitere n'okwu Arabụ maka 'nnwere onwe' (عتقَ), ma ọ pụtara 'nwere onwe pụọ n'ohu', ma ọ bụ 'onye nweere onwe ya'
Maatouk ma ọ bụ Maatouq nwekwara ike izo aka na
Mai-Mai, nke a na-asụgharịkarị Maay Maay (nke a makwaara dị ka Af-Maay, Af-Maymay, ma ọ bụ naanị Maay; a naghị ejikarị mkpụrụ okwu Mai-Mai eme ihe mana a na-asụkarị ya), so na ya
Somali nke alaka Cushitic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic
A na-asụkarị ya na Somalia na mpaghara ndị dị nso na Etiopia na Kenya
Na Somalia, a na-asụ ya na steeti South West, Jubaland steeti na Banadir
Ọ bụ otu n'ime isi olumba abụọ nkeasụsụ Somali
E kewara ụdị asụsụ Somali dị iche iche ụzọ atọ Northern, Benaadir na Maay
Northern Somali (ma ọ bụ Northern-Central Somali) bụ ntọala maka Standard Somali
Maay bụ nke ndị Digil na Mirifle (Rahanweyn) na-asụkarị na mpaghara ndịda Somalia, ọkachasị na South West
Ebe a na-asụ ya na-agbasa site n'ókè ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ ya na Etiopia ruo mpaghara dị nso n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'etiti Mogadishu na Kismayo, gụnyere obodo Baidoa
Maay na Northern Somali ma ọ bụ Benadir enweghị nghọta, ọ dịkwa iche na nhazi ahịrịokwu na phonology
A naghị ejikarị ya eme ihe na agụmakwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mgbasa ozi
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-asụ Maay na-ejikarị Standard Somali dị ka asụsụ
A na-amụta ya site na nkwukọrịta ọha na eze, mbata n'ime, na ime obodo
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị ọkà mmụta gara aga nọgidere na-eche na Maay enweghị nghọta na Northern Somali, e mere ya na-enweghị nwale ya
Nnyocha Deqa Hassan mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya nwalere nghọta n'etiti ndị na-asụ Af-Maay na Af-Maxaa (Northern Somali)
Nnyocha ahụ chọpụtara na Af-Maay nwere nghọta nke ọma na Af-Maxaa (Ndị na-ekwu okwu ugwu) yana nghọta na-abawanye na nghọta Standard Somali
Nke pụtara nghọta maka ọkọlọtọ Somali (Northern Somali) na-abawanye ohere ịghọta Af-Maay
Nke a bụ ihe kacha mkpa n'asụsụ dị iche iche jikọtara asụsụ abụọ ahụ ọnụ
Ya mere a na-ekewa Af-Maay dị ka olumba Ụdị 5 maka akụkọ ọdịnala na-agbasawanye nke ya na ndị ọkà okwu Af-Maịkọ na-akọwapụta ntakịrị nghọta ya
Consonant imi na-aga n'ihu a /n/ ụda ga-adị ka ụda [ŋ] mgbe niile
A [ɣ] ụda bụ ihe intervocalic allophone nke /ɡ/
Maay Maay na-egosipụta ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke epenthesis, na-etinye ụdaume etiti ma ọ bụ nke dị elu iji kewaa ụyọkọ ụdaume
Ogologo ụdaume dị iche; obere ụzọ abụọ dị ka bur ' ntụ ọka' na buur 'ugwu' na-agba akaebe
Maay Maay bụ ihe na-agwụ ike
O nwere ụdị ngwaa dị mgbagwoju anya, na-atụgharị ma ọ dịkarịa ala maka ihe dị egwu / akụkụ na mmadụ / ọnụọgụ nke ma isiokwu na ihe
Enwekwara nganiihu na-egosi mgbaghara
Na mgbakwunye, ngwaa na-egosipụta morphology ewepụtara, gụnyere ihe kpatara na ngwa
Ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ na-agụnye mgbakwunye mkpezi, nke ụdị ya dabere na okike nke aha isi, yana suffixes nwere
Maay Maay na-egosipụta usoro okwu SVO na SOV, o doro anya na ọ dị iche iche n'efu
Mgbe ihe ahụ bụ postverbal, prefix maay na-apụta na ngwaa
N'ime ahịrịokwu aha, aha isi bụ nke mbụ
Possessors, adjectives na ụfọdụ quantifiers siri ike na-agbaso aha isi
Nọmba na ọnụọgụ a na-amaghị ama na-ebute aha isi
Maay jigidere omenala ọnụ na uri na-akpali akpali nke dị iche na ụdị ugwu ama ama karịa
N'ebe ndịda Somalia, onye na-ede uri na onye na-agụ akwụkwọ ga-abụ otu
Ọkachamara ethnology nke Britain bụ Virginia Luling kwuru n'oge ọ gara Afgooye na a ga-atụgharị uri ma gụọ ya n'otu oge na-enweghị nkwadebe mbụ
Ndị na-ede uri ma ọ bụ Laashin dabere na amamihe ha na ebe nchekwa ha wee wuo uri mara mma ma mee ndị na-ege ntị ụtọ
Geledi Laashins n'oge Luling nọrọ na Afgooye n'afọ 1989 bụrụ abụ banyere nsogbu zuru ohi ala nke gọọmentị Somalia
A gwara Sultan n'ime uri ndị a ka o nyere obodo aka ma chetara ndị nna nna ya Gobroon nke ọtụtụ narị afọ gara aga
Egwu mgbe ahụ, iwu abụghị iwu a bụ nke onye ndu Laashins of Afgooye, Hiraabey, Muuse Cusmaan na Abukar Cali Goitow na ndị ọzọ mere, gwara onye isi ugbu a Sultan Subuge
Ọ kpalitere ncheta nke Geledi Sultanate dị ike nke afọ gara aga ma bụrụkwa ọdịiche dị ukwuu na ọnọdụ ha ugbu aHere the richest selection of the poem
Àtụ Verse translation
Ganaane gubow gaala guuriow Gooble maahinoo Geelidle ma goynin
Gembi iyo waran guraantiis aa loogu soo gayooday, Gooble
Gacalkiisa guri curad aa looga soo guuray Haddana nin walba aa
Soo gamgamohaayo, goofka beereed waa la goostay, gelgeshii
Gaashada daaqeysana waa la goostay, gunta intee la geyn doonaa?
Gobroontii soo gaartay Gobroontaan ma ahayn, gargooye Ibraahim
Cumar Xaaji goodaalka adunyada markii joogeen, Awow Gaduud Cali -
Mahinoo - Awow Gaduud Cali Abukar, Yusuf Maxamuud iyo goodaalka
Addunka markii joogeen, ganuunka ganuunkan ma ahayn, Awow
Gudgudoome Cumar Adeerow goodaalka aduunka markii joogeen
Ganuunka ganuunkan ma ahayn
Beereed waa la goostay, gelgeshii
Gaasha la la goostay, gaasha intee loola guuraa ?
Ganaane gubowow, gaala guuriow-aa
Gelgeshii la goostay go'aan maad ka gaart-aa (gaartay) ?
You who burnt Ganaane and chased away the infidels
Did you not separate from the Geelidle and come to Gooble (Afgooye)?
We endured war and the point of the spear
For the love of Gooble we left our first home
And now everyone crowds in here, they have taken our cleared farmland
They have taken the pasture where the herds grazed - where will the people be led ?
The Gobroon who first arrived here are not these Gobroon
When the giver of judgment Ibraahim Cumar Xaaji the pillar of the world was alive and Aw Gaduud Cali
Is it not so ? - Aw Gaduud Cali Abukar, and Yusuf Maxamuud the pillar of the world
While they were alive the law was not this law
When the giver of decisions Aw Cumar Adeerow was in the world the law was not this law
Now everyone crowds in, they have taken the cleared farmland,
They have taken the pasture of the herds where will we move the herds?
You who burnt Ganaane and chased away the infidels
Have you reached a decision about the stolen pastures?

Okechukwu Edwards Ukeje, onye ama aha ya bụ Mr Raw (onye bụbu Dat NIGGA Raw ), bụ onye na-agụ egwú si Abia steeti na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ Afrohighlife na Igbo rap, ụdị nke na ato ndị na-ege ntị sara mbara ugbu a
Amụrụ ya na zụlite n'Enugwu, ọ ghọrọ onye amara ofuma n'oge mmalite 2000s rapping n'asụsụ Igbo na Pidgin English
E wetara album studio mbụ nke Raw, Right & ezighi ezi, na 7 Ọgọst 2005
Album nke abụọ Ihe niile na-anọgide na-adị ndụ sochiri na 2007
E wetara album studio nke atọ ya End of Discussion na Ọktoba 2010
Album ahụ wepụtara egwu egwu egwu 'O! Chineike' onye ihe oyuyuegwu ya malitare Best Afro Hip Hop Video na NMVA Awards n onwa ahụ

N'afọ 2010, Raw kwuru na ya ga-agbanwe aha ya site na 'Dat Nigga Raw' (acronym nke 'Dat Nigerian Guy Anakpo Raw') gaa na 'Mazi Raw Nwanne', na-ekwu na nkọwa ọjọọ ndị metụtara okwu ahụ bụ ' nigga ' kpatara ya
n'aha ya ka a na-enyocha ya na mba ọzọ ma gbochie ndị mmadụ ịzụrụ egwu ya n'ịntanetị
oyuyuegwutụtụ ndị ọzọ egwu egwu tinyere Flavor N'abania, Duncan Mighty, Phyno, Illbliss, 2Face, M-Josh, Hype MC, BosaLin na Slowdog
Mabaya bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Mabel Itohanosa Erioyunvwen Evwierhoma (amụrụ na 7 Mee 1965) bụ onye nkuzi Naịjịria
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke ihe nkiri na Mahadum Abuja
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na echiche dị egwu, nkatọ, ọmụmụ okike na ọmụmụ ọdịbendị
A mụrụ Mabel Evwierhoma na Peter Omoviroro Tobrise na Theodora Tobrise, nké a mụrụ Aiwerioghene
Ọ gara Abadina Primary School site na 1970 ruo 1975;, na Federal Government Girls College, Bauchi site na 1976 ruo 1981
O nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu na 1983 na Federal School of Arts and Science, Suleja
Ọ gara Mahadum Ibadan, nweta BA na Theatre Arts na 1986 na MA na 1988
Site na 1989 ruo 1990 ọ bụ onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Ibadan tupu ọ banye Mahadum Abuja na 1990 dị ka onye enyemaka nkuchi
Ọ nwetara PhD
ya n'afọ 1996, e mekwara ya ka ọ bụrụ Prọfesọ zuru oke n'afọ 2005
E bipụtara festschrift maka Evwierhoma na 2015
O kwuru okwu nkụzi na Mahadum Abuja, 'Nne bụ ọlaedo', na 21 Jenụwarị 2016
N'afọ 2019 ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ atọ e depụtara maka ọkwa osote chancellor nke Mahadum Abuja
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, Evwierhoma kwuru okwu 'Idu n'ike dị ka Anti-culture na Naịjirịa nke oge a', na-akpọ maka nguzogịde ọdịbendị na ndokwa iwu megide ndina n'ike
Mabel Lozano (Villaluenga de la Sagra, December 28, 1967) bụ onye edemede Spanish, ihe nlereanya, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na onye na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọrụ ya, ọ katọrọ mmegbu mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị site na ịgba akwụna na ịzụ ahịa
N'afọ 2021, ọ natara Goya Award maka obere ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka Biografía del cadáver de una mujer
A mụrụ ya na Villaluenga de la Sagra, Lozano kwagara Madrid, ebe o zutere ụwa nke catwalks ejiji, biri na Japan, Paris na Milan
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Spainn, ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye na-egosi ihe omume TVE Noche de Fiesta na 1999, ya na Miguel Ángel Tobías, ruo mgbe Juncal Rivero nọchiri ya na 2000
Ọ malitekwara igosi TVE's New Year's Eve specials, nochie anya Norma Duval na 1999 ruo 2003
Ya na Ramón García, Juncal Rivero, María José Suárez, Nuria Roca, Andoni Ferreño na Juan y Medio na-arụ ọrụ ngosi
N'afọ 2007, ọ gbanwere ọrụ ya

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị mahadum iji mụọ ihe nkiri ma gụchaa nzere masta na ihe nkiri ọha na eze na ikike mmadụ na Mahadum Galway, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ikike mmadụ, na-ede ma na-eduzi ihe nkiri mbụ ya Voices against trafficking in women, nke e mepụtara na Romania, Moldova na Spain, nke ọ katọrọ ịzụta na ire ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ maka ebumnuche nke mmegbu mmekọahụ
Ejirila Voice against trafficking in women mee ihe maka ọzụzụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị mmanye iwu na ụlọ ọrụ ndi ọka iwu ọha na eze [ebee?]

Kemgbe ahụ, na mgbakwunye na obere ihe nkiri na egwuregwu, o meela ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ 2009's La teoría del espiralismo, nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic nke ise; 2010's Las sabias de la tribu dị ka ụtụ nye ọgbọ nke ụmụ nwanyị mgbe agha gasịrị bụ ndị lụrụ ọgụ maka ikike ha; 2012's Madre, ihe nkiri banyere ịbụ nne na narị afọ nke 21
N'afọ 2014, o wepụtara obere ihe nkiri Las mujeres que triunfan nke ọ na-ekwu maka ihe ịga nke ọma nke ụmụ nwanyị karịrị afọ iri anọ na ise

N'afọ 2015, o wepụtara ihe nkiri Chicas nuevas 24 horas, banyere ịzụ ahịa na mmegbu mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị; nke bụ mmepụtakọ ọnụ n'etiti Argentina, Colombia, Paraguay, Peru na Spain nke a họpụtara maka Goya Award na Platino Ibero-American Film Awards
N'afọ 2018, ọ gosipụtara El proxeneta
Paso corto, mala leche bụ ezigbo akụkọ na onye mbụ nke onye na-azụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị site na nke ọ na-egosipụta mmalite nke ịgba akwụna na ịzụ ahịa na Spain kemgbe afọ 1980
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke nwere otu akụkọ ahụ nke ritere ihe nrite Rodolfo Walsh

N'afọ 2021, o ritere Goya Award maka obere ihe nkiri maka Biografía del cadáver de una mujer N'ọnwa May afọ 2021, o gosipụtara ebe maka mkpọsa 'Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụọ ụgwọ, ị megbuo' iji mee ka ndị na-eto eto ghara ịkwụ ụgwọ maka mmekọahụ
Generalitat Valenciana kwalitere nke a na usoro nke Forum for the Abolition of Prostitution
Ọ bụ onye otu CIMA (Association of Women Filmmakers and Audiovisual Media)
N'ọnwa Eprel 19, 2020, o kwupụtara na akara nzipu ozi Instagram ya na a wara ya ahụ mberede maka ọrịa kansa ara, nke a chọpụtara na March
Mabel Catherine Malherbe (9 August, na afọ 1879 - 1 February, na afọ 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-agba mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo Pretoria site na afo 1931 ruo na afọ 1932
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ (Afrikaner) ịbụ onye otu South African Parliament na afọ 1934
Onye sitere na George Rex nke Knysna, Mable Catherine Rex biri na Pretoria, South African Republic, mgbe e mesịrị na Rustenburg, tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ ya na Rondebosch na Cape Colony
Mgbe Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer tiwapụrụ, ọ sonyeere Red Cross
Ọ bụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Red Cross ka ọ zutere Kenne Nicholaas De Kock Malherbe, onye ọ lụrụ na afọ 1903
Site n'enyemaka nke Mrs Koopmans-De Wet, ọ gara Netherlands ebe ọ nọrọ afọ atọ na-azụ onwe ya dị ka nọọsụ

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Pretoria na afọ 1904, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ebere ma ghọọ onye otu a ma ama n'ọtụtụ njikọ maka ụmụ nwanyị akfrikaner, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi maka Federation of South African Women site na afo 1917
Dị ka onye nnọchiteanya maka South African National Council of women, Mabel Malherbe gara International Woman's Conference na Geneva
N'afọ 1919, o guzobere akwụkwọ Afrikaans-Hollandse Leesunie ma mepụta magazin ụmụ nwanyị na-enwe mmetụta kwa ọnwa, Die Boerevrou, magazin ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Afrikaans
Dị ka nwanyị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu ụmụ nwanyị enwe ikike ịtụ vootu, o sonyere n'ịmepụta alaka ụmụ nwanyị nke National Party na Transvaal na afọ 1915
N'etiti Nasionale Vroueparty (National Party, alaka nwanyị), ọ mere mkpọsa maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị South Africa ọcha ka a ga-enye ikike ịtụ vootu, nke mere na afọ 1931
A họpụtara ya na Kansụl Obodo nke Pretoria ruo afọ isii, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo na South Africa (1931-1932)
Na Junn, na afọ 1933, a họpụtara ya na kansụl mpaghara nke Transvaal dị ka onye nnọchi anya National Party
Ka e mesịrị, na afọ 1934, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na ndị omeiwu South Africa, ebe ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara Wonderboom
N'ikwesị ntụkwasị obi nye James Barry Hertzog, ọ sonyeere United Party n'oge njikọta nke National Party na South African Party
N'oge ọ bụ onye omeiwu, ọ lụrụ ọgụ ọ bụghị naanị ịkwalite ikike ụmụ nwanyị, kamakwa maka ndị ọzọ a chụpụrụ n'ihi ọnọdụ akụ na ụba siri ike
N'afọ 1939, ọ hapụrụ United Party n'akụkụ Hertzog na ndị omeiwu ndị ọzọ na-emegide ịbanye n'agha

Dị ka ha, ọ laghachiri na National Party n'okpuru nduzi nke Daniel Francois Malan n'oge dị mkpirikpi, tupu ya esonye na ntọala nke Afrikaner Party n'akụkụ Nicolaas Havenga na ndị ka nọgidere na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye Hertzog
N'afọ 1953, e nyere Mabel Catherine nzere doctorate na akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Pretoria

Mabel Akomu Oboh nke amara aha ya dika Mabel Oboh (nke amụrụ n’abalị iri-na asatọ nke ọnwa April n’afọ 1964) bụ onye naijeria na ekwupụta okwu n'ihe nkiri oyoyo , onye na- emepụta ihe nkiri ma bụrụkwa onye chọpụtara Mabel Oboh Centre for Save our Stars (MOCSOS)

Ọ bụ onye izizi kwụrụ onwe ya/ma na n'ekpokoba Television film ma bụrụ kwa nwanyị izizi mepụtara Soap opera na naijeria nke kpatara na ihe nkịrị egwuregwu Ọ kpọrọ Victims mechara bụrụ egwuregwu nke egosirị na-agbata afọ '80 na Nigerian Television Authority
Mabel bụ onye Edo State Nigeria amụrụ na Lagos na April 18, 1964, n'ime ezinụlọ Major Humphrey Etafo Oboh na Mrs Comfort Oboh ndi nagoru mmụọ
Ọ jere mmụta na Buckinghamshire New University ebe O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Criminology
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'ihe Entertainment na mmalite agbata afọ 80 mgbe O gasịrị ọzụzụ na cinematograph, ọrụ nka, okwu na ihe nkiri

Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ na-emepụta ma na achịkọtakwa ndi n'eme ihe nkiri onwe ya na Nigeria nke kpatara na ihe egwuregwu a kpọrọ Victims mechara bụrụ ihe emepụtara ma gosi na Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) na-agbata afọ '80
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye izizi na akpọrọ 'Chat with Mabel' na NTA Network Service

O sonyeere ulo ọrụ NTA na agbata afọ 1990 dị ka onye na- ede akụkọ n'ulo nzukọ Lagos State , tupu Ọ rụọ na United Nation ma mesịa hapụ UN nwe bido ọrụ na British Embassy dị na Poland na ngalaba azụmahịa na Visa
Mabel nyere nwanne ya nwoke bụ John Oboh, nke eji Mighty Mouse mara ụlọ egwu izizi na Agegunle; Onye nwanne ya nwoke John oboh nwere, aka oke oke nke keputara udi egwu eji mara ndị Ajegunle n'afọ1991
Onyinye ya nyere aka ịchọpụta ma zụpụta Daddy Showkey, Daddy Fresh, Baba Fryo, African china, danfo drivers na MarvelousBenji
Ndi AJ to the world nyere ya onyinye nturu ugo na afọ 2017
Ugbu a, Mabel bụ onye na- ekwuchitere ọha na eze nke African Democratic Congress (ADC)
Ọ bụ nwanyị zọrọ ọchich na ndi otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ African Democratic Congress oge-emere 2020 Edo State gubernatorial election

O guzobere Mabel Oboh Center for Save our Stars (MOCSOS), na ebumnuche ya maka igbo mkpa ahụike nke ndị na-eme ihe egwuregwu na Naịjirịa nke ndi ritegoro elele na ya gunyere Yellow banton, Sadiq Daba, wdg
Ọ nwere ụmụ nwoke itọ ma bụrụ nwunye Michael Ini Udoh
Mabel Segun (born 1930) is a Nigerian poet, playwright and writer of short stories and children's books
She has also been a teacher, broadcaster, and a sports woman
Born in Ondo City, Nigeria, she had her secondary school education at CMS Girl's School Lagos
She attended the University of Ibadan, graduating in 1953 with a BA in English, Latin and History

She taught these subjects in Nigerian schools, and later became Head of the Department of English and Social Studies and Vice-Principal at the National Technical Teachers' College, Yaba (Now Yaba College of Technology)

Her first book, My Father's Daughter (1965), published in 1965, has been widely used as a literature text in schools all over the world, and her books have been translated into German, Danish, Norwegian and Greek
Her work is included in the anthology Daughters of Africa (1992)

Segun has championed children's literature in Nigeria through the Children's Literature Association of Nigeria, which she founded in 1978, and the Children's Documentation and Research Centre, which she set up in 1990 in Ibadan
She is also a fellow of the International Youth Library in Munich, Germany
As a broadcaster, Segun won the Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation 1977 Artiste of the Year award
In 2009, she received the Nigerian National Order of Merit Award for lifetime achievements

In 2015, the Society of Young Nigerian Writers under the leadership of Wole Adedoyin founded the Mabel Segun Literary Society (wwwmabelsegunaliterarysocietyblogspotcom), aimed at promoting and reading the works of Mabel Segun
In 2007, Segun was awarded the LNG Nigeria Prize for Literature

MabelOboh Center For Save Our stars (MOCSOS) bụ òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke nwere isi na Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ bụ Mabel Oboh guzobere ya n'afọ 2018 iji gboo mkpa nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ọnọdụ ahụike na ọrịa siri ike na-enweghị ụzọ nkwado ego, yana maka ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ na-enweghị ihe ùgwù

MOCSOS duziri mkpọsa nke webatara atụmatụ nlekọta ahụike dị ọnụ ala na nke dị mfe MOCSOS Health Insurance maka ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa iji belata ọnwụ na-enweghị isi nke ndị na-emepụta ihe ntụrụnụ na iji gbaa ume ka a na-eme nlekọta ahụike mgbochi
N'afọ 2018, nzukọ ahụ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta ahụike na Ronsberger Nigeria Limited ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta ahụike (HMO) nke National Health Insurance Scheme nyere ikike ma chịkwaa
Atụmatụ nlekọta ahụike (Mocsos health insurance) bụ maka ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na-ejikarị aka arịrịọ maka enyemaka ego mgbe ọ bụla ha nwere ọrịa siri ike
Baba Fryo jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na NGO
MOCSOS kwadoro / nakọta ego maka ndị ama ama dị ka Lord of ajasa, yellow banton, Sadiq Daba, ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala Danfo wdg site na atụmatụ ahụike ya
Mabeloboh Center For save Our stars (MOCSOS) malitekwara nkwado megide ogbugbu nke ndị ọrụ ugbo Esanland chụpụrụ na Edo Steeti, Naijiria site n'aka ndị Marauding Killer-herdsmen
Mabinty Daramy (fl
) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone
Ọ bụ osote minista na kọmitii onye isi ala Ernest Bai Koroma n'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na Republic of Guinea ugbu a
Dị ka Daramy si kwuo, ọ bụ 'onye isi na-ahụ maka ego na Sierra Leone Produce Marketing Board ruo ọtụtụ afọ', tupu ọ kwaga United States ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme atụmatụ ego, na-elekọta nde US $ 50
O mere mkpọsa maka Koroma na All People's Congress party na ntuli aka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na asaa
Mgbe a họpụtara Koroma ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala Sierra Leone, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Nọvemba 2007
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ahụ n'oge oge nke abụọ Koroma ruo Jenụwarị 2013, mgbe ọ ghọrọ osote minista na-ahụ maka ego na mmepe akụ na ụba
O mechara bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya Minista nke Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ

Ministri ahụ akwadowo obere ụlọ ọrụ na nke etiti, na Minista na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ahụ nyere ndị omeiwu iwu 'The Small and Medium Enterprise Act, 2015', nke e mere ka ọ bụrụ Iwu nke ndị omeiwu na Nọvemba 12, 2015
Na Machị 13, 2016, Onye isi ala Koroma gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ ya, a họpụtakwara Daramy ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na Republic of Guinea
O nyere onye isi ala Guinea bụ Alpha Condé asambodo ya na Septemba 8, 2016
Na Sọnde, Machị 2,puku abụọ na iri na anọ , otu nwanyị na-azọrọ na ọ bụ enyi nwanyị Alhaji Alpha Kanu, Minista nke Ozi na Mmekọrịta, wakporo ya ma yie ya egwu na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Lungi International
Daramy kwuru na ya akwụsịla ịkpa Kanu ogologo oge tupu mgbe ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu agbụrụ Mandingo
O nwere ụmụ atọ Hassan, Ibrahim, na Sahid
Ọ bụ ezie na Sierra Leone bụ ndị Alakụba, Daramy bụ onye otu ndị Kraịst pere mpe
Mabrouka Mbarek (amụrụ na 31 Mee 1980) bụ onye Tunisia agụmakwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ onye otu Constituent Assembly of Tunisia
A mụrụ Mbarek na Strasbourg na 31 Mee 1980 na nne na nna Tunisian ndị si Bir Ali Ben Khélifa kwapụ na 1970s
O nwere Masters na Economic and Social Administration site na Mahadum Strasbourg na MBA site na Reims Management School
Mbarek malitere ọrụ nkuzi na French Embassy na Sana'a
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha na Berkeley, United States, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ maka otu NGO America na etiti ọwụwa anyanwụ

Mgbe mgbanwe nke Tunisia gasịrị, Mbarek sonyeere Congress for the Republic na Montreal ma họpụta ya na National Constituent Assembly na-anọchite anya mpaghara nke Amerịka na Europe (ma e wezụga France, Ịtali na Germany)
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii na Internal Rules and Immunity, Finance, Planning and Development, na Kọmitii Iwu Iwu
Ọ nyekwara Onye isi ala Moncef Marzouki ndụmọdụ gbasara ụgwọ na nghọta
N'afọ 2012, Mbarek weputara iwu na-akpọ Tunisia ka ọ kwụọ ụgwọ ndị e ji n'okpuru ọchịchị aka ike gara aga dị ka akụkụ nke mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ịmepụta atụmatụ gọọmentị na-emeghe nke a na-akpọ CopenGovTN taskforce, nke na-akwado gọọmentị ọzọ na-ekere òkè, iwughachi ihe nlereanya ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na ikike mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ndị omeiwu n'afọ 2014, Mbarek ghọrọ onye nchọpụta na Middle East Institute, na-elekwasị anya na iwu ego na nke ụtụ isi n'oge mgbanwe
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ , a kpọrọ Mbarek otu n'ime 'Women Inspiring Change' nke Harvard Law School
N'afọ 2016, ọ kụziri ihe ọmụmụ banyere Tunisia na Arab Spring na Middlebury College
O dere echiche maka Tunisia Live, na CNN
E wuru ọwa mmiri MacGregor n'etiti 1903 na 1904 n'oge ọchịchị William MacGregon, onye dọkịta na Gọvanọ nke Colony nke Lagos n'oge owuwu ahụ
A malitere ọrụ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke mgbalị MacGregor iji belata ọrịa anwụnta site na iweghachite ala marsh na Southwest Ikoyi na Onikan, Lagos Island
E wuru ọwa mmiri ahụ dị mita iri abụọ na ise n'obosara iji wee kpochapụ mmiri n'ọzara ahụ ma na mgbakwunye na ya iji nye ala maka ọrụ mgbake ahụ
Ọwa mmiri ahụ gafere Ikoyi na akụkụ nke Onikan, Lagos Island, na-enye ókèala n'etiti Lagos Island na Ikoyi
Iji jikọta obodo abụọ ahụ, e wuru àkwà mmiri n'elu ọwa mmiri ahụ site na Obalende, ebe obibi nke bụ akụkụ nke ala mmiri ọhụrụ
N'afọ ndị 1970, akụkụ nke ọwa mmiri ahụ jupụtara n'ájá iji wuo ụzọ mgbanaka dị n'ime gburugburu Lagos Island
macOS (/ ˌmækoʊˈɛs/; OS X gara aga na mbụ Mac OS X) bụ sistemụ arụmọrụ Unix nke Apple Inc mepụtara wee zụọ ahịa kemgbe 2001
Ọ bụ sistemụ arụmọrụ Apple's Mac kọmpụta N'ime ahịa nke kọmpụta desktọpụ na laptọọpụ ọ bụ OS nke abụọ a na-ejikarị eme ihe, na-esote Microsoft Windows na n'ihu ChromeOS
Mac Jordan Amartey (1936–2018) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana a ma ama
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu na ihe nkiri Ghana
N'afọ 2017, o kwuputara na o ji ụkwụ aka mee ihe mgbe e gbupụrụ ya n'ihi ọrịa shuga
Amartey bụ onye ama ama n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ghana gụnyere usoro Idikoko TV a ma ama
Macbeth (asụsụ Bekee The Tragedy of Macbeth, 'egwu mberede Macbeth') bụ ejije ọdachi nke William Shakespeare dere n'ahọ 1606
Ejije nka bụ maka Macbeth, eze ndị Scotland
Macbeth bụbụ mmadụ̀ n'ịta na okwu mba ndị, mana Shakespeare gbanwere ya maka Eze James I nke Ala Bekee (ọ bụkwa Eze James VI nke Ala Ndị Skọtụ)
Ejije ọdachi nka na-egosi otu ịchọ ike na ọchịchị nwere ike imebì ndị mmadụụ
Macbeth bụọ onye nwere osi si ike mgbe ọ bụ onye isi ndị agha na ọ bụ Thane ǹkè Glamis (onye na-achị Glamis) mana amụosu a atọ bịara, gwa ya na ọ ga-abụ eze ndị Skọtụ
N'ime obì ya, Macbeth ma ịhe à ekwesịghị ịme maka Duncan bụ eze na-achị achị
Macbeth na nwunye ya, Lọọlọ Macbeth (Bekee Lady Macbeth), gburu Duncan ka Macbeth bụrụ eze Ndị Skọtụ
Maka ha mere ịhe à, ara ebidozi ị yàa ha, tupu Lady Macbeth gburu onwe ya naMacduff, Thane nke Fife, gburu Macbeth
Mgbe ịhe ndị à niile mechara, Malcolm, nwa izizi Duncan, bụrụ Eze Ndị Skọtụ

Machop Malual Chol (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye South Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka klọb Major League Soccer Atlanta United
A mụrụ ya na Khartoum, Chol na ezinụlọ ya si South Sudan kwaga United States n'afọ 2000
Ezinụlọ ya biri na Clarkston, Georgia, ebe ọ mụtara ịgba bọọlụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na klọb ndị ntorobịa DDYSC Wolves tupu ọ nweta ohere na Atlanta United academy na 2016
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, Chol malitere ịgba bọọlụ kọleji maka Wake Forest Demon Deacons
O mere nke mbụ ya maka Demon Deacons na 25 Ọgọstụ megide Rutgers Scarlet Knights ebe ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya
N'oge niile ọ nọ na Wake Forest, Chol gbara goolu iri na atọ na egwuregwu iri isii na ise
Na 19 Jenụwarị 2021, Chol bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta onye egwuregwu na Major League Soccer club Atlanta United
O mere nke mbụ ya na 17 Eprel 2021 megide Orlando City, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya
Chol mere nke mbụ ya na mba South Sudan na 27 Jenụwarị 2022 na mmeri enyi na enyi na Uzbekistan
