Machwene Rosina Semenya (amụrụ na 16 Nọvemba 1969) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Human Settlements kemgbe 2021

Onye otu African National Congress, ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ugbo, Ọhịa na Azụmaahịa site na 2014 ruo 2019 yana dịka Onye isi oche Kọmitii Porfolio na Human Settlements, Mmiri na Sanitation site na 2019 ruo 2021
Semenya bụ onye omeiwu kemgbe afọ 2014
Onye otu African National Congress, Semenya jere ozi dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) na gọọmentị mpaghara Limpopo
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, onye isi ala Stanley Mathabatha họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka ọrụ ugbo
A họpụtara Semenya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke South Africa na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014 site na ndepụta mba ANC
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ugbo, Ọhịa na Azụmaahịa
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na National Assembly na 2019
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation

N'ịgbaso mgbanwe nke ndị kansụl n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, nke e kewara ngalaba Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation n'ime ngalaba abụọ ọhụrụ, a mara ọkwa Semenya dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio nke e guzobere ọhụrụ na Human Settlements

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022, Semenya kwuru na e nwere 'nkwado siri ike' maka Iwu Nchedo Ndị Ahịa Ụlọ, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ichebe ndị na-azụ ahịa pụọ n'ụlọ ndị e wuru nke ọma, na mkparịta ụka ọha na eze abụọ e mere na Gauteng
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa

Mulaza Kaira (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba n'afọ 1984), nke a makwaara site na aha Macky II, Macky 2, MK Macky 2, DJ Bugar, na Flava Boy, bụ onye Zambia na-emeri ọtụtụ onyinye hip hop, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka isonye na oge nke itoolu nke Big Brother Africa, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na asọmpi ahụ
Kaira si Chingola, Zambia ma na-elekọta Macky 2 Hope Foundation, nke na-akwado ụmụ mgbei na ụmụaka na-adịghị ike
Kaira malitere igosi mmasị na egwu n'oge ọ bụ nwata mgbe ọ gachara ụka Katọlik na Ndola

N'afọ 2011, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ gaa Lusaka, ebe ọ wepụtara abọm ya Ndimupondo n'okpuru akara Digital X na Alpha Entertainment na J-Kayo Egwu abụọ sitere na abọm ahụ, 'I am The President' na 'Number 1 Fan', natara egwu redio ma ndị na-ege ntị nabatara ya nke ọma

Kaira natara Zambia Music Award maka Album nke Afọ na 2013 maka abọm ya Legendary N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya na Zambia Music Awards, na ngalaba nke Best Mainstream Artist, Best Hip Hop / Rap Album na Best Collaboration
Kaira bụ onye na-asọ mpi na oge nke itoolu nke Big Brother Africa, ụfọdụ ndị na-ekiri ya kwuru na ọ 'dị jụụ'
Ọ lanarịrị n'ụlọ ahụ n'ogologo ihe ngosi ahụ ma nweta nkwado dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya na ndị Zambia n'ozuzu
Ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ahụ ruo izu nke itoolu na nke ikpeazụ, mgbe e wepụrụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
Mulaza Kaira lụrụ Cheelo Hantiinga onye ha nwere nwa nwanyị na nwa nwoke
Macroinvertebrate Community Index (MCI) bụ ndepụta eji eme ihe na New Zealand iji tụọ ogo mmiri nke iyi mmiri dị ọcha
Ọnụnọ ma ọ bụ enweghị macroinvertebrates dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ, ikpuru na ejula na osimiri ma ọ bụ iyi nwere ike inye ihe ngosi ndu na ahụike nke mmiri ahụ
MCI na-enye ọnụ ọgụgụ maka ụdị ọ bụla nke macroinvertebrate dabere na mmetụta nke ụdị ahụ na mmetọ
Ndepụta ahụ na-agbakọzi nkezi akara
Akara dị elu na MCI n'ozuzu ya na-egosi iyi dị mma
MCI (Macroinvertebrate Community Index) na-adabere na ikenye akara maka macroinvertebrates mmiri ọhụrụ dabere na nnabata mmetọ ha
Macroinvertebrates mmiri dị ọhụrụ a na-ahụ n'ọnọdụ pristine ga-adị elu karịa nke a na-ahụ na mpaghara emetọru
Enwere ike ịgbakọ ụkpụrụ MCI site na iji data ọnụnọ-enweghị macroinvertebrate site na iji usoro a
MCI( = [site score)/(# nke akara taxa)]*20
Nnyocha mmiri dị mma n'oge gara aga dabere na nyocha kemịkal na ebe obibi, Otú ọ dị, egosila na usoro ndị a ezughi ezu n'ihi mmetọ sitere na isi mmalite ndị na-abụghị isi

Ụmụ anụmanụ ndị bi na gburugburu mmiri nwere ike ịbụ ihe ngosi kachasị mma sitere n'okike nke àgwà gburugburu ebe obibi ma na-ekpughe mmetụta nke mgbanwe ma ọ bụ mmetọ ebe obibi ọ bụla,ma gosipụtala na ọ na-azaghachi nsogbu dị iche iche dị ka sedimentation, ime obodo, ọrụ ugbo na ọhịa
mmetụta owuwe ihe ubi
Mgbanwe ọ bụla nwere ike ime na obodo macroinvertebrate nke na-eduga na mbelata nke ịdị iche iche na-abawanye mmụba nke invertebrates na-anabata mmetọ, dị ka oligochaetes na chironomids
Ya mere, enweghị ụdị dị iche iche na obere ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụ nke macroinvertebrates bi na ya nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-egosi àgwà mmiri dị ala
Ihe ize ndụ nke mmebi mmiri bụ nke kachasị ukwuu n'ebe dị ala, ebe ọrụ ugbo siri ike na mmepe obodo bụ ihe kachasị eji ala eme ihe

Obodo Macroinvertebrate bụ ihe kachasị egosi ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi n'ime mmiri n'ihi na ha dị mfe ịnakọta ma chọpụta, ma nwee ogologo ndụ dị mkpụmkpụ, si otú a na-anabata ngwa ngwa maka mgbanwe na gburugburu ebe obibi ha
Ụzọ MCI nke iji obodo macroinvertebrate iji nyochaa ahụike zuru oke nke gburugburu mmiri na-aga n'ihu ịbụ usoro a pụrụ ịdabere na ya, nke a na-etinye n'ọrụ, na nke a na'ọtụtụ ebe gburugburu ụwa
Mgbanwe na MCI
Na mgbakwunye na MCI nke akọwapụtara n'elu, e nwekwara ụdị abụọ ọzọ nke MCI
QMCI (Quantitative Macroinvertebrate Community Index) na SQMCI (Semi-Quantitative Macroinvertebrate Community Index)
Ma MCI na QMCI na-ejikarị na mba ndị dị ka New Zealand
Nchikota nke ojiji zuru ebe niile na ezigbo arụmọrụ nke MCI na QMCI n'ịchọpụta àgwà mmiri na gburugburu ebe obibi mmiri emeela ka mmasị n'ịkwalitekwu ụzọ na New Zealand
The QMCI, just like the MCI, was initially designed to evaluate the organic enrichment in aquatic ecosystems
The third index, the SQMCI, was created to reduce sampling and processing efforts required for the QMCI
The SQMCI will respond in a similar matter to the QMCI in community dominance, however, will require fewer samples to achieve the same precision
The SQMCI gives a comparative appraisal to the QMCI with under 40% of the exertion, in circumstances that macroinvertebrate densities are not required
This diminishes expenses and also enhances the logical solidness of biomonitoring projects
Both the QMCI and SQMCI are similar to the MCI in the way that they are graded on a 1 (extremely tolerant) to 10 (highly intolerant) scale
However, they differ in the way that MCI is calculated using presence-absence data whereas QMCI uses quantitative or percentage data
Having a qualitative, quantitative, and semi-quantitative version of the same index has raised some questions as to if this is a good thing or not
All three indexes have the same purpose, which is to measure the quality of an aquatic ecosystem, however, there are no clear recommendations about when each one is most appropriate to be used
In a study conducted on 88 rivers, Scarsbrook et al
(2000) concluded MCI is more useful than the QMCI for recognizing changes in stream water quality over time

Having three forms of a similar index may prompt to various conclusions and also opens the route for specific utilization of either file to give bias to a specific position or position taken by a specialist

In August 2019, the Ministry for the Environment released a draft National Policy Statement for Freshwater Management, and a report from Scientific and Technical Advisory Group that recommended including three different measures, MCI, QMCI and Average Score Per Metric (ASPM)
Enwere ike ịgbakọ ọnụọgụ QMCI site na iji QMCI = Σ_(i=1)^(i=s) {{{1}}}_i*a_i)/N
Enwere ike ịgbakọ ụkpụrụ SQMCI dịka QMCI ma ewezuga na edochiri ụbara koodu maka ọnụ ọgụgụ n'ezie
Ọmụmaatụ
Ihe Ndị na-emetụta MCI E nwere ọtụtụ ihe nke nwere ike imetụta nnweta data nke MCI mgbe ị na-enyocha ogo mmiri nke usoro okike mmiri
Ọwa siri ike na nke dị nro nwere ike ịpụta nsonaazụ dị iche iche na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme nchọpụta ga-eji ụdị abụọ dị iche iche nke MCI

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na nyocha nke Stark & Mallard (2007) ha na-atụle na ọwa ala siri ike na nke dị nro nwere nsụgharị dị iche iche nke MCI na enweghị ike ijikọta nsụgharị abụọ ahụ n'otu data setịpụrụ n'ihi ọdịiche dị na taxa na ụkpụrụ nnagide
Mgbanwe nke oghere na-adọrọ mmasị n'ihe gbasara imetụta data nwetara site na MCI
Ebe ndị na-agbadata na-emekarị ka uru MCI dị ala
Enwere ike inwe mmetụta mgbagwoju anya n'etiti riffles, runs, ma ọ bụ ọdọ mmiri nwere otu iyi

A na-ewelitekwa omimi na ọsọ dị ka nchegbu gbasara nsonaazụ nsonaazụ, agbanyeghị Stark (1993) nyochara mmetụta nke usoro nlele, omimi mmiri, ọsọ dị ugbu a na substratum na nsonaazụ ya wee chọpụta na ma MCI na QMCI nwere onwe ha na omimi miri emi
, ọsọ, na substratum sitere na nlele macroinvertebrate anakọtara site na riffles nkume
Nchọpụta a bụ uru maka nyocha nke mmetọ mmiri
E nweela ọtụtụ nnyocha e mere na mgbanwe oge, nke a na-ewere dị ka isi ihe na-emetụta nyocha nke ogo mmiri
E kwubiri na ụdị niile kwesịrị ịnwale data anakọtara n'oge ahụ dị ka data ntụaka, nke a na-eji
Enweela ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka okpomọkụ mmiri, akụkọ ndụ invertebrate na ọkwa oxygen gbazere nke a kọwapụtara dị ka ihe na-akpata mgbanwe n'oge
Oge okpomọkụ nwere akara biotic nke na-egosi ahụ ike iyi ka njọ

Oge okpomọkụ dị ka oge okpomọkụ, ga-abawanye okpomọkụ ya mere na-eme ka okpomọkụ mmiri na-abawanye ma na-ebelata oke oxygen a gbazere agbaze na mmiri na-eme na gburugburu ebe obibi na-adịchaghị mma maka macroinvertebrates mmiri
Na nzaghachi, nke a na-emetụta ọnụ ọgụgụ nke macroinvertebrate ma na-agbanwe nsonaazụ nke ihe ngosi

Macsuzy Mondon bụ onye nkuzi Seychellois na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi na Cabinet nke Seychelles dị ka Minista a họpụtara na Minista nke Gọọmentị Obodo site n'ọnwa October 2016 ruo ụbọchị 3 Nọvemba 2020
A họpụtara Mondon, onye bụbu onye nkuzi, dị ka Minista nke Ahụike n'afọ 2006 ma mesịa bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta site n'afọ 2010 ruo 2016

N'ime ụlọ ọrụ nke Onye isi ala Danny Faure, nke a họpụtara n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka Minista A họpụtara; a ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ụbọchị 28 Ọktobe, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka Minisita maka Gọọmentị Obodo na 29 Ọktoga, mgbe ọ na-ahapụ ọrụ ya dị ka Mịnịsta nke Mmụta
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, a gbakwunyere ndị ntorobịa, egwuregwu, ọdịbendị na ọdachi na ozi ya
Mactabene Amachree (onye amuru na abali iri-ato na onwa mbu n’afọ 1978 na Port Harcourt ) bubu onye na atụ basket boolụ na Naijiria
N’afọ 2001, ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ onye Naịjirịa nke gbara bọọlụ na WNBA
Amachree gbara n’egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2004 Summer Olimpik
O burukwa nwa ada Ojuka Clan nke ndi Kalabari na Naijiria
Mádu bu òdùdù enyï anúmanụ àlà nwẹrẹ ómárí káchárá anumanu nke níle
Na asụsụ Latin há kpòrò madu Homo Sapien bú 'onye ómárí' ma 'onye ma ihe'
Há bu ndi nọr na òdùdù nke Homo nke énwè nẹ jé na úkwú abụo na Hominidae, umunna énwè úkwú
Máná ọ di mgbe 'Human' na asụsụ bekee na kárá genus nke Homo
Madu nwèrè ọvúrù kachara a ka, nke nweríkí nwe ómárí nke nché échìchè, asụsụ, ómárí onwé, na Í nweríkí bì nsogbu
Ọ dị Í nwé íshí nka, tírí ya na ahú kwụrụ ọtọ na élú nke nyéré íke Í me ka áká rü, mèrè ka madu gáfe na ihü òdùdù enyï nke ndi ozọr na Í jí ihe ọrü a rü
DNA Mitochondrial na ánumanu ichie di nà àlà zịrị na madu ndi ohüru shì Afrika na afọr 200,000 gárá agá
Nwéré madu gbásaa na uwa nílé ma ha dighị na Antarktika, madu bu òdùdù enyï nke uwà na uwà
Na Önwa ise nke 2010, mádu rùrù nke há sí bu ijeri 68
Dí ka enwè nke íshí íshí, madu di ónór na òrà nke ná kpátá madu ndi ọzór
Mànà, madu gbàrà ọkpúkpú màkà ha nweríkí kwú màkà ihe nọr ha na óbị, Í gbanwò ómárí na Í dósé ihe
Madu ne ké òrà di na iche iche nwéré ọtú iche iche na gbálílí ndi ozor, na ndiá nẹ shí umunna rüo na mbà
Imẹ na òrà nke ndi madu ne mẹ bu ihe hé kèrè, yá nà ómárí ihe bu ihe ómá na ihe ọjọó, ihe bu ébéanọr na ñkitị, na ihe ọmemmé, iheá nílé gbakotàrà Í bu uwà mádu
Há sị madu chọrọ Í má na Í nwe àgbà na uwà há, né tú ọtù ha shi é kọwa na í rü na élú ihe àlà shí ọbià, ílúnílú, ihe mmuö na éféfé
Ihe nọr na íshí ha nke nchọnchó mèrè ka ha ganírú na Í kw ihe orü na Í rümarü, nke na da na umunna; madu bu ótụ anúmanụ nke nwéré ómárí Í fụnwu ọkụ, Í shí ihe orị, Í tí uwé, na technonzu ndi ozọr
Madagali ma ọ bụ Madagli bụ obodo na ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Adamawa Steeti Nijiria, n'akụkụ oke ókè ya na Cameroon
Emebere LGA n'afọ 1991 mgbe e siri na Gongola steeti kee Taraba steeti
Ọ dị n'ókè Michika n'ebe ugwu, Askira uba n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, Gwoza ime obodo na ndịda na Republic of Cameroon n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
Enwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ mana Fulani, Mafa na Margi bụ asụsụ agbụrụ bụ ndị ama ama
Obodo kachasị na Madagali bụ Gulak na Shuwa
A gọziri Madagali nke ukwuu site na ala na-eme nri nke na-eme ka ndị mmadụ na-etinye aka na ọrụ ugbo
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2012, ndị agha Naịjirịa gburu onye ọchịagha Boko Haram na Madgali, ma nwụchiri mmadụ 156 dịka akụkụ nke 'Operation Restore Sanity'
Ndị Boko Haram weghaara obodo a n'August 2014
Na Septemba 2014, ndị bi na Madagali, Gulak, na Michika gbagara n'ugwu ugwu na obodo Mubi, n'ihi mbọ ndị agha gọọmentị gbalịsiri ike iweghachi obodo ahụ n'aka ndị ọgba aghara nsogbu

Madagascar bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri kọmpụta America nke 2005 mepụtara nke DreamWorks Animation mepụtara ma kesaa ya site na DreamWorks Pictures

Madam Koi Koi (Lady Koi, Miss Koi Koi, nke a makwaara na Ghana dị ka Madam High Heel ma ọ bụ Madam Moke na Tanzania dị ka Miss Konkoko) bụ mmụọ na akụkọ ifo obodo Naijiria na Afrịka nke na-agagharị n'ụlọ ihi ụra, paseeji na ụlọ mposi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi n'abalị, ebe n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ ehihie ọ na-aga ụlọ mposi na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abịa ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ma ọ bụ hapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'azụ oge
A na-egosikarị ya ka ọ na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ na-acha ọbara ọbara ma ọ bụ na-eyi otu akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mmụọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ebi ebi kachasị ewu ewu na Nigeria, Ghana na South Africa
Aha 'Madam Koi Koi' sitere na ụda ikiri ụkwụ ya na-eme mgbe ọ bụla ọ na-abịa iri ụmụ akwụkwọ n'abalị, ebe na Ghana ewepụtara aha 'Madam Moke' na okwu Ghanaian maka elu ikiri ụkwụ
Madam Yoko ma ọ bụ Mammy Yoko (ihe dị ka 1849_1906) bụ onye ndú nke ndị Mende na Sierra Leone
N'ịgwakọta agbụrụ bara uru, nhọrọ alụmdi na nwunye dị nkọ na ike nyere ya site na ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo Sande, Yoko ghọrọ onye ndú nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu
Ọ gbasaa alaeze Mende [dubious ma n'oge ọnwụ ya, ọ bụ onye na-achị nnukwu Kpa Mende Confederacy
A mụrụ Madam Yoko, dị ka nwatakịrị a na-akpọ Soma, na 1849 na Gbo Chiefdomi
O nwere ụmụnne atọ Ali Kongo, Lamboi, na Goba
Nna ya bụ onye agha n'ala mpụga
Mgbe ọ na-eto eto, a malitere ya na Sande Society, ebe a kụziiri ya ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwú, ọgwụ, na ịmụ nwa, yana ọrụ ndị ọzọ metụtara ịbụ nwunye na nne
Mgbe ọzụzụ ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa gasịrị, a kpọghachiri ya n'ime ọha mmadụ dị ka okenye na aha Madam Yoko
Madam Yoko lụrụ di mbụ ya Gongoima, onye agha, a na-ekwukwa na ọ nwere ike ịbụ nwa nwanne ya site na nna ya
Yoko hapụrụ Gongoima n'etiti afọ 1800 n'ihi mmụba nke ekworo na enyo
Madam Yoko lụrụ di ya nke abụọ Gbenje, ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye agha Kpe Mende ọzọ na Chief of Taiamav
Yoko bụ Gbenje na-eto eto mana, n'ihi ibu ọrụ na ikike ya, Gbenje kpọgara ya na nwunye ya okenye
Gb proje dara ọrịa ma nwụọ, Yoko mekwara emume ime ka ọ dị ọcha maka ịkwadebe ịlụ di ọzọ
Yoko lụrụ onye isi agha dị ike aha ya bụ Gbanya Lango ọzọ ma n'ihi esemokwu ya na ndị Britain, e jidere Gbanya ma Yoko nwere ike ịpụta ya site n'ịkpọku gọvanọ arịrịọ onwe ya
Nke a bụ otu Yoko si malite na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ di ya, Gbanya jiri Yoko mee ihe na ndị Britain, nke nyeere ya aka inweta ma zụlite aha ya dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Gbanya buliri Yoko elu ruo n'ihi aka ya n'ime ka a tọhapụ ya ma nyere ya aka n'ịba ọgaranya site n'ọrụ ugbovii Mgbe Gbanya nwụrụ na 1878, Yoko nọchiri ya wee ghọọ Eze Nwanyị nke Sennehoo
Madam Yoko malitere ịchị na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, ọ jikọtara ma duzie otu Kpa Mende
O nwere ike ịchịkwa Kpa Mende niile (ndị isi iri na anọ dị iche iche) site n'ịgbakọta aka na iji ike amamihe
Yoko jiri ndị Sande mee ihe site n'ịmepụta Sande Bush a ma ama na Senehun iji nyere ya aka n'ime njikọ aka ya
O mere nke a site n'ịnata ụmụ agbọghọ site na mmalite ebe ọ zụrụ ha wee nye ha dị ka nwunye nye ndị isi nwoke
Yokoz Sande Bush nwetara ewu ewu nke ukwuu nke na ndị nne gbalịrị itinye ụmụ ha nwanyị n'ime Bush ya
Nke a dị nnọọ iche na ndị isi nwoke; ebe Yoko nwere ike ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị ma nye ha alụmdi na nwunye, ndị isi nwoke nwere ike ịnata nwunye site n'ezinụlọ
Yoko dịkwa iche na ndị isi nwoke n'ihi na o nwere ikike iso ụmụ nwoke na-emekọ ihe site na iji onyinye nke mmekọahụ n'onwe ya, ebe ndị isi nwoke ga-eji ụmụ nwanyị mee ka ha na nwoke ọzọ jikọọ aka
Ndị isi nwoke ga-emekwa ka ha jikọọ aka site n'iwere ụmụ nwanyị si n'otu narị ma ọ bụ karịa ezinụlọ ndị isi ma lụọ ha
Nke a bụ usoro Yoko gaara eji ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ nwoke
Madam Yoko sokwa ndị Britain jikọọ aka site na Sande Bush ya
Ọ kpọrọ ndị ọrụ Britain n'obodo ya ma mee ka ndị na-agba egwu Sande ya na-agba maka ha
O nyekwara ndị uwe ojii nke ndị uwe ojii Frontier nwunye
Yoko jikwa njikọ aka ya na ndị Britain nyere ya aka ịga n'ihu n'ike, dịka e kwuru na Women, Culture and Society na-atụ egwu Yoko n'ihi na ọ nwere ike ịkpọ ndị Britain
Ike Yokoz gakwara n'ihu site n'iji njikwa mee ihe na ndị Britain
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ gwara ndị Britain na onye isi ọzọ na asọmpi ya, Kamanda, jikọtara ya na otu ndị agha Temne na-awakpo
N'ihi ya, ndị Britain gburu Temne ma chụpụ ndị isi ha na Kamanda
Ewezuga ikike ya ime njikọ aka, a na-ekwu na Madam Yoko siri ike n'agha
A na-ekwu na ọ na-eji osimiri ndị dị nso dị ka usoro nchebe ma jiri mma agha na-echebe ndị iro ya
N'afọ otu puku narị asatọ ịrị itoolu na asatọ , ndị Britain kwupụtara na ha na-echebe ha ma tinye iwu na-enye ndị isi niile iwu ịnakọta ụtụ isi na ụlọ ọ bụla dị na ala ahụ
Yoko nyere ndị isi ya iwu ka ha kwụọ ụtụ isi ọhụrụ
Otú ọ dị, ndị mmadụ nupụrụ isi ma boo ya ụta maka ịnapụ mba ahụ n'ihi nkwado ya maka ndị Britain
Kama ịgakwuru ndị Britain iji nweta ikike nke ndị ya na ewu ewu, ọ zoro n'ogige ndị uwe ojii ka ndị ya na-anwa ịwakpo
N'ihi iguzosi ike n'ihe ya na ndị Britain, Eze Nwanyị Victoria nyere ya ihe nrite ọlaọcha
Madam Yoko chịrị dị ka Paramount Chief ruo 1906 mgbe o gburu onwe ya
Yoko enweghị ụmụ ọ bụla ya mere, nwanne ya nwoke Lamboi nọchiri ya
Marlon Grimes, ónyé a maara nkè ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Maddi Madd, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu si Akron, Ohio
Ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ ndekọ Bungalo Records na 1999 wee wepụta abọm mbụ ya, A Million Wayz n'otu afọ ahụ
Maddi esorowo ndị egwu dịka Rah Digga, C-Bo, Jodeci, Ginuwine, Bizzy Bone, Devante Swing, K-Ci & JoJo, Flo Rida, DJ Quik, Jamie Foxx na Outsidaz rụọ ọrụ
E nyela ya ònyìnyé platinum nke RIAA kwadoro màkà onyinye ya na Flo Rida's Whistle and Wild ones multiplatinum singles
Maddi malitere ọrụ ya na Ohio
Onye isi oche Grown Man Records, Ivan Jones chọpụtara ya na 1998
O dèrè ọtụtụ n'ime ụdaolu nke HBO, Pimps Up, Ho's Down, nkè Brent Owens duziri
N'afọ 1999, Maddi Madd so Grown Man Records rụọ ọrụ ma wepụta EP akpọrọ A Million Wayz nké rere ihe karịrị 100,000
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, a tọhapụrụ egwu mba ụwa mbụ ya Emotional / Ohio Thuggin n'okpuru ákàrà ndekọ 280 East Records
Maddi Madd malitere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Blimpcity records, na Chevaliee Robinson na 2002 wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa màkà Bungalo Records n'okpuru Universal Music Group Distribution na 2005
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri indie slasher 'Rhyme Slaya' ebe Maddi rụrụ ọrụ ónyé na-eti egwu na ónyé nwe klọb, 'Solomon', aka 'King Solo'

Madeleine Ayinkamiye bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'afọ 1964, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ anya na Rwanda
Ayinkamiye jere ozi n'ọfịs minista site na 6 Jenụwarị na afọ 1964 ruo 8 Nọvemba, na afọ 1965
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị minista gọọmentị na Rwanda n'etiti nnwere onwe Rwanda na afọ 1962 na Eprel, na afo 1992
Madeleine Bertine Hicklin (amụrụ na 3 Septemba na afo 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara na City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality site n'Ogost, na afọ 2016 ruo Mee, na afọ 2019
Hicklin bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance
Hicklin sonyeere Democratic Alliance ma họpụta ya dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara maka ngalaba 112 nke City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2016
A họpụtara Hicklin ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ mgbe ntuli aka nke e mere na 8 Mee, na afọ 2019
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
Na 27 Juun, na afọ 2019, e nyere ya ọrụ kọmitii ya
Na 5 Disemba, na afọ 2020, a họpụtara Hicklin dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na akụrụngwa, na-anọchi Samantha Graham, onye ghọrọ minista na'okpuru
Hicklin bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ Denis Goldberg
Ọ bụkwa onye Juu

Madeleine Michèle Ngono Mani Epse Ongueme (onye bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii nke onwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983), nke a maara dị ka Madeleine Ngono Mani, bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye n'ebe goolu na-agbachitere Albi Croix na mpaghara nke abụọ nke mba France ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu mba Cameroon, nke ọ gbaarala bọọlụ 2012 Summer Olympics, African Women's Championship, na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Ọrụ ya malitere na otu egwuregwu Lorema FC na Canon Yaoundé, ma merie iko mba nakwa league ugboro abụọ nke ọ bụla na Cameroon
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma n'obodo gasịrị, ọ sonyeere RC Saint-Étienne n'afọ 2003, mgbe ahụ na ọkwa nke anọ nke bọọlụ French
Ndị otu ahụ jikọtara ya na AS Saint-Étienne n'afọ 2009, mgbe ha dugara ha n'ọkwa kachasị elu nke bọọlụ French, n'ụzọ na adịghị nta n'ihi mgbalị Ngono Mani inye goolu
Ọ sonyeere ASJ Soyaux wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ebute goolu na nke abụọ
Ọ ghọrọ ọkachamara site na isonyere Guingamp n'afọ 2011 mgbe ọ gachara obere oge na FCF Monteux
Ọ kwagara Claix n'afọ 2013 mgbe afọ abụọ ya na Guingamp rụchara ọrụ
N'afọ 2015, ọ gafere na FC Minsk, na usoro ego
N'afọ 2016, ọ kwagara Aurillac Arpajon, na mpaghara nke abụọ nke France
N'afọ 2018 ọ gbara la ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ Albi Croix bọọlụ
Ọ malitere na World Cup qualifier megide South Africa n'afọ 2002, na mmeri goolu abụọ asatara otu
N'afọ 2012 Summer Olympics na London, United Kingdom, ọ gbara egwuregwu atọ niile nke otu nke asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị, mana ndị otu ahụ enwetaghị otu akara ma ghara iru eru maka agba na-esote
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mgbasa ozi Cameroon na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup, na-agba isi iji mezue mmeri nloghachi megide Switzerland, yana ịnye goolu ọkpụ isii asataghị̀ otu nke Ecuador
Ọ bụkwa onye kacha nye gọọlụ n'otu mba ahụ
Madeleine Selina Rees, OBE bụ onye ọka iwu Britain na odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom ugbu a
Ọ ekwuola okwu megide mmebi ikike mmadụ na Bosnia site n'aka ndị na-ahụ maka udo na ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ maka United Nations
Rees ghọrọ onye ọka iwu n'afọ 1990
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu nke Britain, wee bụrụ onye mmekọ n'afọ 1994
N'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ ọkachamara na iwu ịkpa ókè, na-etinye aka karịsịa na mpaghara ọrụ, yana ọkachamara na iwu ọha na eze na nke nchịkwa
Rees rụrụ ọrụ n'aha Commission for Racial Equality na Equal Opportunities Commission ebe o nyere aka guzobe ikike maka ndị mmadụ n'okpuru iwu obodo
A nụla ikpe ịkpa ókè nke Rees wetara na European Court of Human Rights na European Court nke Justice na Luxembourg
N'afọ 1998, Rees malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Bosnia na Herzegovina na dị ka ọkachamara nwoke na nwanyị maka Ọfịs nke Kọmishọna Ukwu maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ

O nyere aka kpughee mmegbu nke ikike mmadụ metụtara azụmahịa mmekọahụ na Bosnia site n'ịgba akaebe iji kwado Kathryn Bolkovac, onye na-ahụ maka ndị uwe ojii mba ụwa nke United Nations nke e goro iji nyere aka kwụsị mmegbu mmekọahụ na ịgba akwụna na Bosnia
Bolkovac kpughere ojiji nke ndị akwụna na itinye aka na ịzụ ahịa mmekọahụ site n'aka ndị otu United Nations Mission na Bosnia na Herzegovina
N'afọ 2009, ewepụrụ Rees n'ọkwa ya, mgbe ahụ n'ọnwa Machị 2010 a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ
Ụlọ ikpe esemokwu nchịkwa nke United Nations kpebiri ya dị ka nchụpụ na-ezighị ezi

Ọfịs nke Kọmishọna Ukwu ahụ gọnahụrụ ebubo ahụ, na-ekwu na e bu ụzọ nyeghachi Rees n'ọkwa ọhụrụ n'ihi mkpesa sitere n'aka ndị isi njikwa banyere arụmọrụ ọrụ ya, nakwa na ọ nabataghị ọkwa ọhụrụ a na-enye ya
Otú ọ dị, onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe esemokwu Coral Shaw kpebiri na ịmegharị Rees na ọkwa ọhụrụ bụ iwu na-akwadoghị
Vanessa Redgrave gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri n'afọ 2010 The Whistleblower
A họpụtara Rees dị ka onye isi nke Order of the British Empire (OBE) n'afọ 2014 Birthday Honours maka ọrụ maka ikike mmadụ, ọkachasị ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na udo na nchekwa mba ụwa
Madeleine Jane Symons (1895 - 21 Machị 1957)bụ onye nhazi otu ndị ahịa Britain
A mụrụ Symons na 28 Julaị 1895 na London
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nzuzo tupu ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Newnham College, Cambridge, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akụnụba
Ọ chọtara ọrụ ya na National Federation of Women Workers (NUWW), dị ka onye inyeaka Mary Macarthur, wee malite ibute ụzọ na mkparịta ụka gbasara ụgwọ ọrụ na ọnọdụ na injinia
Njikọ ahụ ghọrọ akụkụ nke National Union of General Workers, na Symons ghọrọ onye inyeaka na Margaret Bondfield
N'afọ 1925, Symons debere ego mgbapụta maka Robin Page Arnot, onye isi na Communist Party nke Great Britain
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ onye ama ama na Labour Party
Ọ jụrụ mgbe niile ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mba nke pati ahụ
Mgbe a họpụtara ya na 1922, ọ bụ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị otu NEC, na onye mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum
Symons hapụrụ ọrụ ya na 1926, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ na-etinye oge ya n'ọrụ afọ ofufo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ kọmitii gọọmentị, ọkachasị ndị metụtara ọrụ mmekọrịta ụmụaka na ikpe ziri ezi nke ndị ntorobịa, ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke Ụlọikpe Ndị Ntorobịa nke West London
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Howard League for Penal Reform, Magistrates' Association, ma rụọ ọrụ na ndị isi nke National Union of Societies for Equal Citizenship n'etiti afọ 1920
Madeleine Vernet (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 3 Septemba 1878 ruo ụbọchị 5 Ọktoba 1949) bụ onye nkuzi French, onye edemede, onye nnwere onwe na onye na-eme udo
Ọ wakporo mmegbu na usoro ụlọ nkuzi nke steeti, ebe a na-ejikarị ụmụaka arụ ọrụ ha
N'afọ 1906, o guzobere l'Avenir social, ogige ụmụ mgbei maka ụmụ ndị ọrụ, nke ọ na-elekọta n'agbanyeghị mmegide gọọmentị ruo 1922, mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ndị Kọmunist weghaara bọọdụ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ (1914-1918), ma nọgide na-etinye aka na òtù ndị na-ahụ udo mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị

Madhouse A Tragic Tale of Megalomania and Modern Medicine bụ akwụkwọ nke afọ 2005 nke onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Andrew Scull dere nke n'afọ 1920 nke kwuru maka ọrụ onye isi mgbaka Henry Cotton na Trenton State Hospital na New Jersey
Cotton kwenyesiri ike na isi mgbaka bụ nsogbu ndị na-egbu egbu ma wepụ akụkụ ahụ iji gbalịa imeziwanye ahụike uche
Nke a na-amalite karị site na iwepụ ezé na akpịrị

Otu nwa agbọghọ dị nanị afọ iri na asatọ nke nwere ịda mbà n'obi na-agbawa agbawa wepụrụ elu eze na ala eze ya, a tonsillectomy, sinus drainage, ọgwụgwọ maka cervix na - ebute ọrịa, wepụ eriri afọ n-enweghị imeziwanye ọnọdụ uche ya
Mgbe ahụ, e wepụrụ ezé ya fọdụrụnụ ma ziga ya n'ụlọ ya, a mara ya dị ka onye a gwọrọ
Scull na-ekwu na nchegbu Cotton banyere sepsis dị ka isi ihe kpatara ọrịa uche 'na-aga n'ihu n'agbanyeghị ihe akaebe niile na ihe na ya na ọnwụ na mmerụ ahụ sitere na ịwa ahụ ọ malitere'
Ụzọ Cotton si eme ihe dọtara ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ, mana ụlọ ọrụ ahụike nke oge ahụ ahapụghị ya ma ọ bụ nye ya ọzụzụ kwesịrị ya
Otu onye nyocha akpọrọ Madhouse 'otu akụkụ dị mma nke nyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nwere mkpa na ọgbara ọhụrụ', ma gbakwunye na 'ọ na-eme ka ọgụgụ na'ụzọ na na - siri ike'

E nyochara akwụkwọ a na Psychiatric Services, The Journal of Nervous and Mental Disease, History of Psychiatry, BMJ, The Journal of the American Medical Association, Canadian Medical Association Journal, The New England Journal of Medicine, Bulletin of the History of Medicine, Journal of the History of Medicine and Allied Sciences, Journal of Social History, Journal of American History, London Review of Books, The Times Literary Supplement, The New York Times, and other publications
Madi Phala (2 Febụwarị 1955 2 Machị 2007) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ ihe osise, na collage ma na-ekwu maka isiokwu nke nwa okorobịa Africa na-azu ehi
A mụrụ Phala na 2 Febụwarị 1955 na Kwa-Thema, Springs, South Africa

A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Phala n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka nke onwe na nke ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, nke gụnyere French Embassy; De Beers, London, yana Minista Pallo Jordan na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Barbara Lindop
Ihe osise ya SS Mendi Memorial, nke na-echeta mmikpu nke ụgbọ agha na 1917, a họpụtara ya dị ka ebe nketa mba na 2016
E gburu ya n'èzí ụlọ ya na Langa, Cape Town na 2 Machị 2007 n'oge izu ohi
Madida bụ aha nna South Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Madih Belaïd (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1974), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Tunisia
A maara ya dị ka onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri telivishọn na ihe nkiri Naouret El Hawa, Al Akaber na Allo
A mụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwarị 1974 na Sousse, Tunisia
Ọ lụrụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Rim Riahi
Dị na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Maghrebian Institute of Cinema na Tunis site na 1994 ruo 1997
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị iche iche na iduzi, ọ ghọrọ osote onye nduzi na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Tunisia na mba ofesi ma sonye na ọmụmụ ihe edemede na France, Germany na Morocco
N'afọ 1996, o dere ma duzie ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ Tout bouille rien ne bouge
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri ngụsị akwụkwọ ya, Croix X na 2006 dị ka nke abụọ dị mkpirikpi
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke mkpirikpi abụọ ahụ, o mere mkpirikpa nke atọ ya L'Ascenseur na 2007 ma mesịa mee Allô na 2008
N'afọ 2014, ọ natara ihe nrite maka mmepụta kachasị mma maka ihe nkiri Naouret El Hawa na Romdhane Awards nke Mosaïque FM nyere
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe maka mbipụta nke abụọ nke Les Nuits du court métrage Tunisien festival na Paris
N'afọ 2016, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye nduzi kacha mma maka ihe nkiri Al Akaber na Romdhane Awards
Madiha Yousri (née Hannouma Habib Khalil Ali (3 Disemba 1921 - 29 Mee 2018) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
O mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt n'oge ọrụ ya, ihe karịrị afọ irí ise
Ọrụ ya gbasara ụdị sitere na ihe nkiri ruo na ihe ọchị ruo ọdachi
A makwaara Yousri nke ọma maka nkwado ya nye onye isi ala Ijipt Abdel Fattah el-Sisi na mgbanwe nke 26 Julaị
Onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak họpụtara ya dịka onye otu kansụl Shura n'afọ 1998
A mụrụ Madiha Yousri na Disemba 3, 1921 na Cairo, Egypt dị ka 'Honouma Habib Khalil Ali', n'ezinụlọ ndị Egypt nọ n'etiti n'ime agbata obi dị ala
Onye nduzi Ijipt bụ Mohammed Karim chọpụtara ya mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya nọ n'ụlọ kọfị
Mgbe o mechara kọwaa nzukọ ahụ, ọ chetara ige ntị na Karim ka ọ na-eche na nna ya agaghị ekwe ka nwa ya nwanyị mee ihe
Ọrụ izizi ya bụ na ihe nkiri nke Karin duziri na 1940, Mamnau'a Al-Hub (en Ịhụnanya a machibidoro iwu)
Ọ gara n'ihu na-apụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, n'akụkụ ọtụtụ ndị egwu Egypt a ma ama n'oge ahụ, gụnyere Abdel-Halim Hafez, Mohamed Fawzi na Farid Al-Atrash
N'afọ 1940, magazin Time họọrọ Yousri dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri kachasị mma n'ụwa
N'afọ 1963, e nyere Yousri ihe nrite nke Egypt State Medal of Creativity
N'afọ 1969, ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe na 6th Moscow International Film Festival
A maara ya maka ọrụ ịhụnanya ya na ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt, yana isonye n'ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn ndị Ijipt na-arụ ọrụ nne ma ọ bụ nne nne
N'ihe dị ka njedebe nke ndụ ya, e nyere Yousri nzere doctorate nke nsọpụrụ site na Egyptian Arts Academy
Na 29 Mee 2018, Madiha nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị n'ógbè ahụ mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa siri ike mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na isii

Jean de Dieu Makiese (28 Mee, na afọ 1952 na 11 Ọgọst, na afọ 2007), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Madilu System, bụ onye na-agụ egwú rumba na onye na-ede egwu na Congo, amụrụ na Léopoldville, Belgian Congo
Ọ bụbu onye otu egwu TPOK Jazz nke na-achịkwa ihe nkiri Congolese site na 1960s ruo 1980s

Malite dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na 1969, Madilu sooro ọtụtụ ndị egwu bụrụ abụ 'Orchestre Symba', 'Orchestra Bamboula', nke Papa Noel duziri, 'Festival des Maquisards', nke Sam Mangwana duziri, na Fiesta Popular

N'afọ 1973, n'okpuru aha ọhụrụ Bialu n'ihi mkpọsa 'authenticité' nke Onye isi ala Mobutu, o guzobere otu egwu Bakuba Mayopi nke nwere egwu na afọ 1976 na egwu 'Pamba-Pamba', mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ hapụrụ iji guzobe otu ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Orchestre Pamba-Pamb
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị ruo mgbe Madilu sonyeere Franco, sonyeere TPOK Jazz ya n'ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 1980, ka ọ ghọrọ onye Congolese na International star
A kọwara ya dị ka 'onye nwere nkà olu kachasị mma' n'oge ọ na-eto eto n'afọ 1980
Franco bụ onye kpọrọ ya Madilu System, aha nke kwụsiri ike
Egwú mbụ Madilu na TPOK Jazz bụ 'Mamou (Tu Vois),' nke ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na afọ 1984
Ya na Franco bụrụ abụ abụọ na egwu egwu kachasị egwu, 'Mario'
N'afọ ndị 1990, mgbe ọdịda nke TPOK Jazz afọ ole na ole mgbe onye ndú ya Franco nwụsịrị na afọ 1989, Madilu malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya site n'inye abọm a na-akpọ Sans Commentaire
Na mbido Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2007, Madilu gara Kinshasa iji gbaa vidiyo maka egwu ọhụrụ ya
Ọ dara na Fraịde, 10 Ọgọst, na afọ 2007
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum dị na Kinshasa, ebe ọ nwụrụ n'ụtụtụ echi ya, Satọdee 11 Ọgọst, na afọ 2007
E wepụtara abọm ikpeazụ ya, Le Bonne Humeur, mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Madinatou Rouamba (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye na-agbachitere bọọlụ nke Burkinabé, onye na-egwu na Turkish nwanyi di oke otu egwuregwu maka Fatih Karagümrük na Istanbul
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Burkina Faso
Madinatou Rouamba dị 173 m (5 in) ogologo, ma na egwuri egwu n'ọnọdụ onye na-agbachitere
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka klọb obodo ya Etincelles de Ouagadougou
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2022, Rouamba kwagara Turkey, wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na klọb Fatih Karagümrük nke dị na Istanbul iji gbaa bọọlụ na 2022-23 nwanyi di oke otu egwuregwu
Rouamba sonyere na 2022 Iso ntozu Iko Mba Afrịka ụmụnwaanyị nke emere na Morocco
O meriri otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Burkina Faso ugboro iri na anọ ma gbaa otu goolu

Madjid Albry (amụrụ ya na 23 Julaị 1990) bụ onye Nijeria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme egwuregwu n'etiti
A mụrụ ya na Belbege, Niger, Albry malitere ọrụ ya na otu egwuregwu nke ndị German FC St
Pauli tupu ya abịanye aka na nkwekọrịta na Werder Bremen na 1 Julaị 2007
O mere nke mbụ ya maka Werder Bremen II na 15 Septemba 2009 na 3
Liga megide Kickers Offenbach
Na 21 Mee 2010, e gosipụtara na a gaghị emezigharị nkwekọrịta ya ma ọ nwere ike ịhapụ klọb ahụ na 30 June 2010
Na 23 Jenụwarị 2010, ọ kwupụtara na ya na FC Oberneuland bịnyere aka
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2011 ọ sonyeere Altona 93
Madlena Staneva (amụrụ na 1 Junnu 1963) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Madobi bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Kano State, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Madobi
Ọ nwere mpaghara narị abụọ na iri asaa na atọ km² ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị Puku narị irí atọ na isii, narị isii na iri abụo na atọ na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asaa na iri na otù
Madonna Ciccone bu onye Amerikạ nwayị na bụ abụ
Ha muru ya na ogẹ 1608, 1986 na Bay City, nor na Michigan ime ọbọdọ Amerikạ
Madrid Central bụ mpaghara na-adịghị emesi ikuku dị n'etiti Madrid
Emèrè yà n'ubochi irí atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018
E nwèrè obere ụlọ ọrụ n'etiti obodo ahụ, okporo ụzọ ụgbọala na-akpata oke ikuku n'ébé ahụ
Madrid Central abụghị mpaghara mbụ na-adịghị mmá na Spain, n'ihi na Pontevedra mepụtara mpaghara dị otú ahụ n'ụzọ dị irè site n'ime ka ọtụtụ n'ime etiti obodo ya bụrụ ndị na-agagharị agagharị
Barcelona kwupụtara mmejuputa nkè mpaghara ikuku dị ala site na mmalite afọ 2020
Tupu iwebata atụmatụ Madrid Central, a machibidoro okporo ụzọ n'obodo ahụ ma nyé ụgbọala ndị bi na yá ụzọ màkà ịdọrọ ụgbọala na Residential Priority Areas
(Spanish Área de Prioridad Residencial ma ọ bụ APR)

Madrid Central kwadoro site nà Board Governing nkè City Council of Madrid n'ubochi irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018 E bu ụzọ hazie mwepụta ya n'ubochi irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, mànà e yigharịrị ya ruo ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, n'ihi arịrịọ nke Business Confederation nke Madrid-CEOE ka mmejuputa usoro ahụ ghara ikwekọ na Black Friday

Ewezuga ndị bi na ndị ọbịa, a na-ejedebe okporo ụzọ ụgbọ ala na ụgbọ ala eletrik ma ọ bụ hybrid, na ógè na-agafe agafe ruo afọ 2020 na-enye ohere ọzọ nke ụgbọ ala diesel na gasoline na ọnọdụ nke ébé a na-adọba ụgbọala na ébé a na'adọba ụgbọ ala
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, Mahadum Nkà na ụzụ nke Madrid bipụtara ọtụtụ atụmatụ na-egosi etu ikuku gas na-emerụ ahụ (CO2, NO2) si daa na mpaghara nkè mejupụtara mpaghara Madrid Central

N'agbanyeghị ihe ịga nkè ọma nke atụmatụ ahụ n'ibelata ikuku, n'oge mkpọsa màkà ntuli aka Madrid City Council n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, Partido Popular (PP) Kwèrè nkwa ikpochapụ Madrid Central, nke jikọtara ya na otu aka ekpe Ahora Madrid
PP pụtara dị ka ndị mmeri na ntuli ákà ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha ga-achị n'otu
N'ọfịs, ónyé isi obodo ọhụrụ, José Luis Martínez-Almeida gosipụtara ụfọdụ ambivalence n'ébé Madrid Central nọ
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2019 Almeida kwupụtara atụmatụ màkà ihe ọzọ na Madrid Central, nke a na-akpọ Madrid 360
Obere ihe mgbaru ọsọ n'ihe gbásárá ibelata ikuku na etiti, Madrid 360 ga-ekpuchi mpaghara buru ibu nké obodo ahụ
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, e gbochiri njem na Madrid nkè ukwuu site na usoro iji gbochie mgbasa nke ọrịa coronavirus na Spain

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Machị, Praịm Minista nke Spain Pedro Sánchez kwupụtara nkwupụta nke ọnọdụ egwu mba niile màkà ụbọchị iri na ise, iji malite n'ụbọchị na-esote mgbè nkwado nke Council of Ministers gasịrị
Nke a mèrè ka mmetọ ikuku belata
Ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ghọrọ ihe a na-ahụkarị màkà ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ Madrid

Mpaghara nke Madrid Central, mpaghara nke hekta narị anọ na iri asaa na abụọ, bụ Alberto Aguilera Street, Carranza Street, Sagasta Street, Genoa Street, Paseo de Recoletos, Paseo del Prado, Ronda de Atocha, Ronda of Valencia, round of Toledo, Gran Vía de San Francisco, Bailén Street, Plaza de España, Princesa Street na Serrano Jover Street
Madu, nke a makwaara dị ka maru ma ọ bụ madu, bụ ngwa agha si India
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ngwa agha ejiri na Tamil Martial art Silambam
A maara nke ọma dị ka madu, a na-akpọkwa ya maan kombu mgbe mpi mgbada si na ya na-eme omenala, karịsịa ndị India ( Antilope cervicapra )
A na-emeso u dị ka mma nke nwere afọ abụọ
Ọ na-enwekarị mpi blackbuck abụọ na-atụ aka n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke crossbars abụọ jikọtara nke na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka aka
Ndị ọkachamara Silambam na-eji ngwa ọgụ a na-ebuso ndị mmegide ọgụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche, ma nchebe ma na-akpasu iwe
A na-ejikarị ígwè na-etinye ihe dị iche iche mgbe e mesịrị na mgbe ụfọdụ a na-etinye efere akpụkpọ anụ ma ọ bụ ígwè iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọta
Na Punjab, a na-ejikarị ígwè arụ madu kpamkpam
A na-eji ngwa agha yiri nke ahụ, nke nwere aka nke etinyere na mpi antelope, dị ka ihe mgbochi, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ihe nchebe onwe onye maka jogi, bụ ndi iwu ha nyere iwu ka ha buru ngwa agha
Ndị na-alụ ọgụ na-eji ngwa ọgụ a na-alụ ọgụ mgbe ndị iro ha na-eji mma agụ ogologo, mma agha, sedikuchi (ogologo mkpara) ma ọ bụ muchchaan (obere mkpara)
madu bụ isi ihe nchebe ngwá agha, na-akwado a ala stance nke wielder na-agbalịsi ike ịnọ ala karịa onye iro ha
Nke a na-enyere aka ichekwa isi ihe dị mkpa nke ahụ
Ọnọdụ dị iche iche dabere na mmegharị anụmanụ, dị ka awọ, agwọ, òké, agụ, enyị, na ụdị ugo
Arụmọrụ n'ihu ndị na-ege ntị na-amalitekarị site na mwakpo otu oge site n'aka ndị na-alụ ọgụ iji gosipụta nka nchekwa, ike, na obi ike
Ọgụ ahụ na-akwụsị mgbe otu onye so na-akpọchi ma ọ bụ wepụ onye iro ya na mmegharị ikpeazụ nke na-egbochi onye mmegide ịgbanahụ
Izi ezi, oge, na ikike nchekwa bụ isi ihe a ga-atụle mgbe a na-ekpebi nka onye agha
Mae Virginia (ma ọ bụ Valentine) Cowdery (Ọnwa Jenụwarị 10, afọ 1909 - ọnwa Nọvemba 2, afọ 1948) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ede uri nke bi na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
A na-ewere ya dị ka akụkụ nke mbọ nka dịgasị iche iche nke sitere na Harlem Renaissance na New York City
A mụrụ Cowdery n'afọ 1909 na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

Ọ bụ naanị nwa nke nne na nna na-agagharị agagharị; nne ya bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na osote onye nduzi nke Bureau for Colored Children (mgbe e mesịrị Bureau for Child Care); nna ya Lemuel Cowdery bụ onye na-ere nri na onye na-arụ ọrụ na United States
Cowdery chọpụtara nkà ya maka uri mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na prestigious Philadelphia High School for Girls wee gaa Pratt Institute na New York iji mụọ ihe ejiji mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ na-aga Pratt Institute na Brooklyn, ọ na-agakarị ebe abalị na Greenwich Village
Mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Cowdery bipụtara uri atọ n'afọ 1927 na Black Opals, akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ e guzobere n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ Arthur Fauset, onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịnala na onye nkuzi, na Nellie Rathbone Bright, onye nkuzi na onye na-ede uri nke mechara bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ anọ, guzobere ya n'afọ 1927
Ha so n'òtù ndị edemede na ndị nwere ọgụgụ isi na Philadelphia bụ ndị a makwaara dị ka Black Opals
Abụ Cowdery na mbipụta mbụ, yana otu n'ime nke Bright, so n'ime ihe ndị Countee Cullen, onye nchịkọta akụkọ ọhụrụ nke Opportunity, akwụkwọ akụkọ buru ibu nke dị na Harlem, New York
A na-eguzobe otu ndị dị ka Black Opals na obodo ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, dị ka Washington, DC na Boston
Ìgwè ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịmepụta ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, ma bipụta ya naanị na 1928
Cowdery meriri ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi uri nke afọ 1927 site na The Crisis maka uri ya 'Longings;' uri ọzọ meriri Krigwa Prize
N'ime ngwụcha afọ 1920, o guzobere aha ya site na ibipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ, magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ

O bipụtaghị nchịkọta uri nke ya ruo mgbe akwụkwọ ya bụ We Lift Our Voices And Other Poems (1936), ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka ole na ole na-ede uri na ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke 20 iji bipụta akwụkwọ nke ọrụ ya
'A nabatara ya nke ọma'
O gburu onwe ya na New York City n'afọ 1948 maka ihe a na-amaghị

Brandon Green (amụrụ na Julaị 23, 1988), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Maejor (nke bụbu Bei Maejor na mgbe e mesịrị Maejor Ali), bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-agụ egwu, na ónyé na-ede egwu si Detroit, Michigan
Green edeela ma mepụta egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị omenkà a ma ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu nke ukwuu Justin Bieberz ma bụrụ ọkara nke EDM duo Area21, n'akụkụ Dutch DJ Martin Garrix

N'afọ 2013, Green bịanyere aka na Def Jam Recordings n'oge na-adịghị ányá, wee wepụta egwu egwu ahụ dị ka onye na-ese egwu, 'Lolly', nke gosipụtara Juicy J na ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ogologo oge Justin Bieber
Abụ ahụ rutere n'ọkwa nke 19 na Hot 100
Tinyere imepụta egwu màkà mkpọsa mba gụnyere Pepsi na Boston Celtics, Maejor enwetala ihe nkiri maka Bratz The Movie (2007), The Princess and the Frog (2009) na Think Like a Man (2012)
O mepụtara egwu màkà egwuregwu vidio gụnyere NBA 2K na FIFA
A mụrụ Maejor dị ka Brandon Green na July 23, 1988
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan, Ann Arbor na 2008
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara Atlanta wee sonye na ndị otu mmepụta Ne-Yo bụ Compound Entertainment
Maejor wepụtara mixtape mbụ yá Upside Down, nke gosipụtara ngosipụta sitere na Keri Hilson, Trey Songz, Drake na T-Pain
O nyekwara ikike olu na mmepụta ya na remix nkè Ciara's 'Ride', ya na André 3000 na Ludacris
Maejor natara akara ọla edo mbụ ya maka mmepụta ya na album Trill nke Bun B nke afọ 2005, mgbè ọ ka na-aga Mahadum Michigan na Ann Arbor
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara Maejor màkà Grammy Award, maka ọrụ ya na Trey Songz's album Passion, Pain & Pleasure, na ọzọ na 2011, màkà Monica's album Still Standing
N'afọ 2012, Maejor mepụtara egwu abụọ na abọm Justin Bieber Believe yana otu 'Say Somethin' nke Austin Mahone
E ji otu egwu Maejor bụ 'Lights Down Low' mee ihe dị ka ụda olu na NBA Playoffs maka Boston Celtics
O mepụtara mkpọsa mkpọsa mba màkà Pepsi na 2010 na 2013
Ya na Justin Bieber jikọrọ aka ọzọ na 2013, na-emepụta otu egwu ya 'Heartbreaker'
N'afọ 2013, Maejor weputara otu egwu akpọrọ 'Lolly', nke gosipụtara Juicy J
'Lolry' nke ruru ọnụọgụ 19 na chaatị US Hot 100
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta ma na-ede maka ndị na-ese ihe kachasị elu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere egwu atọ na nhọpụta Grammy na album nké Justin Bieber bụ Purpose
Mafa bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke ndị Mafa na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon na Northern Nigeria
A na-ahụta okwu Matakam ka ọ na-ekwu okwu
A na-asụ Mafa n'ọtụtụ ebe na ngalaba Mayo-Tsanaga site na Mokolo ruo n'ebe ugwu
Mafa gụnyere olumba ndị a
E nwere ndị ọkà okwu 136,000 na Cameroon
Àtụ Languages of CameroonÀtụ Languages of Nigeria
A na-asụ asụsụ BiuńMandara ma ọ bụ nke etiti Chadic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asia di naNaịjirịa, Chad ya na Cameroon
Gravina atụwo aro iwughachi Andi Proto-nke do etiti Chadic (2014)
Gravina (2014) gunyere etiti Chadic dị ka ndị a, dị ka akụkụ nke nrụzigharị nke asụsụ Andi proto
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ na nọmba nke dị n'ime oghere kwekọrọ na alaka dị na ngunye ndị gara aga
nnukwu mgbanwe kachasị ukwuu bụ ịtọsa ma weghachite asụsụ nke alaka Mafa ochie (A5) na Mandage (Kotoko) (B1)
Ndị omempụ na ezo aka na mpụ a haziri ahazi n'ọhịa nke igbu osisi n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
Brazil nwere oke igbu osisi n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, na mgbukpọ ọhịa na abawanye na 2013
Ndị Mafia na emenye ndị mmegide egwu, agbanyeghị na ha nwekwara ihe gbasara ikike
Congo bụkwa onye ahịa osisi iwu na-akwadoghị metụtara

Ebe ndị a na echebe ọhịa n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke India dị ka Jammu na Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, Karnataka na Jharkhand bụ ndị na adịghị ike maka igbu osisi n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site n'aka ndị mafia osisi ndị na achịkwa ma ọ bụ na emenye ndị ọrụ ọhịa egwu, ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara, azụmaahịa na ụmụ amaala
Òtù ndị na abụghị nke steeti esonyerela njikọ ahụ na mpaghara ndị agha metụtara dịka Kashmir
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ndị ọrụ na-eme ihe ike na-ekpuchi ogbugbu doro anya na-akọ akụkọ ọkụ ọhịa na-abụghị eziokwu

Ọtụtụ nnyocha na-egosi nnukwu mfu nke oke ọhịa na enweghị isi site na ndị mafia osisi, na ihe karịrị otu nde hekta na gburugburu Chhotanagpur naanị na ebufe n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site na ngalaba ọhịa ozugbo na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, na egwupụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na egbutu osisi
E wezụga mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi, mmefu ego ọha na eze nwere ike ịdị ukwuu Otu atụmatụ 1994 nke osisi ezuru na steeti Karnataka ruru ijeri Rs
10 (ihe dị ka US $230 nde)
Veerappan bụ onye ohi a ma ama nke, ruo mgbe ndị uwe ojii steeti gburu ya na 2004, bụ ọkachamara n'ịkụ osisi sandalwood n'ụzọ iwu na akwadoghị na Karnataka na Tamil Nadu
Dị ka ọ dị na kol, e nweela ihe omume nke dochie osisi dị ala maka osisi dị elu mgbe a na enye ikike ịzụta osisi maka iji gọọmentị

N'otu ihe mere n'afọ 2005, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị kpebiri na e jiri osisi chir dị ala dochie osisi deodar dị elu maka ndị agha na ụgbọ okporo ígwè; e jidere osisi dị elu n'oge a na ebubata ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị gafee ókèala steeti na Punjab
Oké ọhịa nke Borneo echewo ogbugbu osisi iwu na akwadoghị ihu nke na eyi ndụ na gburugburu ebe obibi egwu
Ụlọ ọrụ ọhịa na Romania bụ nke ndị na-achịkwa ma ọ bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ọhịa
A na-ewepụta ọkara osisi Romanian niile n'ụzọ iwu na akwadoghị
A na elekwasị anya na ndị na-agafe ndị òtù ndị omempụ ma ọ bụ na anwa itinye iwu ọhịa nke Romania maka ịbọ ọbọ
Mafoluku Bus Terminal dị nso na Murtala Muhammed International Airport, Ikeja

Mafoluku Terminal na-enye ụzọ njikọ na Murtala Muhammed International Airport (MMIA) na ngalaba ụlọ nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ, ọdụ ụgbọ elu bụkwa ọdụ ụgbọ elu nke ga-ejere Mafoluku, Oshodi, na Ajao Estate ozi, na-enye njikọ bọs karịsịa na Oshodi Transport Interchange, Ikeja Bus Terminal, Mile 2 na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Lagos
Govano Babajide Sanwo-Olu kwuru na ma LAMATA na FAAN ga na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ njem n'ime na n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mafoluku
Ebe LAMATA ga-eji ụgbọ ala ndị njem na-aga Mile 2 na Oshodi, FAAN ga-arụ ọrụ ndị njem na ọdụ ụgbọ elu mpaghara na mba ụwa
Ụgbọ ala ụgbọ ala Mafoluku bụ otu n'ime ụgbọ ala anọ gọọmentị Lagos steeti malitere na 2017 na ebumnobi nke inye akụrụngwa ụgbọ ala dị mma nke ga-akwado atụmatụ mgbanwe ụgbọ ala gọọmentị
Arụmọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ ala bụ maka ịnye akụrụngwa njem ọha dị mma ma dịkwa mma nke dị mma na ntụkwasị obi
Ndị wuru ọdụ ụgbọ ala MafolukuLagos Metropolitan Area Transport Authority (LAMATA) na mmekorita ya na Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria (FAAN), operators of the airport
Ewubere ọdụ ụgbọ ala ahụ n'ala dị square mita 7,952, nke FAAN nyere ya
Ihe owuwu ahụ nwere tarmac nke nwere ike iburu ụgbọ ala 27 dị elu ma gbapụ na mpaghara
Ọdụ ụgbọ ahụ nwere akụrụngwa, gụnyere tiketi na ọdụ ọdụ, ụlọ njikwa, ebe a na-eri nri, ihe dị mma nke ọha, ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara azụmahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ATM na ngalaba IT
Ebe ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ nwekwara mpaghara ebe a ga-arụzi ụgbọ ala, na mgbakwunye na akụrụngwa ọkụ na akụrụngwa nchekwa okporo ụzọ
Ọ bụ Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti, Babajide Sanwo-Olu yere ọdụ ụgbọ ala Mafolukuna 26 Mee, na afo2021, onye bịakwara maka inye ọrụ ahụ bụ Managing Director nke LAMATA, Oriakụ
Abimbola Akinajo na Managing Director of FAAN, Captain Rabiu Yadudu, onye isi na-ahụ maka ego nọchitere anya ya, OriakụNike Aboderin
Maganda bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Magda Sabbahi ma ọ bụ Magda ( 6 Mee 1931 - 16 Jenụwarị 2020) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri nke ama ama maka ọrụ ya site n'afo 1949 ruo 1994
A mụrụ Afaf Ali Kamel Sabbahi na 6 Mee 1931 na Tanta, Gharbia Governorate
Ọ bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt, na-eduzi ọrụ na ihe nkiri iri isii
Maka ọrụ ihe nkiri ya, o weere aha Magda
N'afọ 1956, Magda guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri nke ya
N'afọ 1958, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri nke Youssef Chahine, Jamila al Jaza'iriya (Jamila, onye Algeria), nke dabere na akụkọ Djamila Bouhired
N'afọ 1963, ọ lụrụ onye ọrụ nzuzo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Ihab Nafe, onye ya na ya nwere naanị nwa nwanyị, Ghada, n'afọ 1965
N'afọ 1995, a họpụtara Magda dịka onye isi oche nke Egyptian Women in Film Association
Magda Sabbahi nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Dokki, Cairo, na 16 Jenụwarị 2020, mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri asatọ na asatọ
Magdalena Stoyanova Georgieva (Bulgarian) (amụrụ na 7 Disemba 1962 na Plovdiv, Bulgaria) bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri si Bulgaria
Ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri ụwa nke otu sculls na 1987 Asọmpi ịkwọ ụgbọ mmiri nke ụwa na Copenhagen, Denmark
Otu afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Bulgaria na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ nke e mere na Seoul, South Korea na otu ihe omume sculls ebe ọ mechara na nke atọ
Àtụ World champions – Women's single sculls
Magdalena Sauer (ubochí isii n'ọnwa Mee 1890 rụo ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1983) bụ nwanyị mbụ rúrú eru ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na South Africa
A mụrụ Magdalena Gertruide Sauer na Kenilworth, Cape Town, nwa nwanyị nke Jacobus Wilhelmus Sauer na Mary Cloete Sauer
Nnà ya bụ ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama, nné ya bụ ezigbo enyi ónyé édémédé Olive Schreiner
Nwanne ya nwoke, Paul Oliver Sauer, ghọkwara ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; a gụrụ ya aha Sauer Commission
A zụlitere ya na Kenilworth na ugbo ezinụlọ dị nso na Stellenbosch
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Cape Town, nweta nzere na sayensị na 1911
Ọ gàrà n'ihu na ọzụzụ na ihe owuwu dị ka ónyé a na-enye ọzụzụ na Durban, na England na Architectural Association School of Architecture na London
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya n'ihe owuwu, ọ debanyere áhà na Institute of South African Architects na 1927
O lekwasịrị ányá dị ka ụlọ obibi na mweghachi nke ụlọ ochie

Otu n'ime ọrụ ya bụ iweghachi ụlọ dị na Shortmarket, Longmarket, Rose, na Chiappini Streets na Bo-Kaap nke Cape Town (nke a na-akpọ Malay Quarter) n'afọ 1940 (ya na Reg de Smit), na ịmepụta South African Cultural History Museum site na ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu n'afọ 1960 (ụlọ ahụ nwéré ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie Slave Lodge kemgbe 1998)
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ iwu ụlọ n'afọ 1965
Kemgbe ahụ, a na-ekwupụta ọrụ abụọ ahụ dị ka ebe nchekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme
Dị ka ọrụ dị n'akụkụ, Sauer dere nkatọ nka màkà akwụkwọ akụkọ Die Burger
Ọ lụrụ otu ugboro, n'oge dị mkpirikpi, Trygve Strömsöe, ónyé injinia Norwegian nke mepụtara Table Mountain Aerial Cableway
Nwa ha nwanyị Karin Strömsöe, amụrụ na 1924, ghọrọ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ
Magdalena Sauer nwụrụ na 1983, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na atọ
Magdalene Louisa Pietersen (amụrụ na Nọvemba 1956) bụ ọnye otu South Africa nke National Assembly of South Africa site na African National Congress
Ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu na 24 Febụwarị 2022
Magdeline Moyengwa (amụrụ na 31 Machị, na afọ 2001) bụ onye na-ebu ibu na Botswana
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ebu ibu si Botswana na-anọchite anya mba ya na World Weightlifting Championships na Summer Olympics
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Botswana na African Games nke e mere na Rabat, Morocco
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbakwara asọmpi na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 59 kilogram na 2019 World Weightlifting Championships na Pattaya, Thailand
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ọla nchara n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị 59 kilogram na African Weightlifting Championships nke e mere na Nairobi, Kenya
N'ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2021, ọ nọchitere anya Botswana na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị 59 kilogram
O welitere kilogram 70 na Snatch ma o debanyeghi nsonaazụ na Clean & Jerk

Mageu (Setswana spelling), Maheu (Shona/Chewa/Nyanja spelling), mahleu (Sesotho spelling), Маgau (xau-Namibia) (Khoikhoi spelling),maHewu, amaRheu (Xhosa spelling) ma ọ bụ amaHewu (Zulu na Northern Ndebele spelling) bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ ọdịnala ndịda Afrịka na-abụghị mmanya na-aba n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị Chewa / Nyanja, Shona, Ndebele, Namaikhoi na Damara, ndị Sotho, ndị Tswana, ndị si na ndị mmadụ mee
A ka na-emepụta ihe n'ụlọ n'ọtụtụ ebe, mana a na-enweta ihe ọṅụṅụ ahụ n'ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa, a na-emepụta ya na ụlọ ọrụ
A na-enweta ụtọ ya n'ụzọ bụ isi site na lactic acid nke a na-emepụta n'oge ịgba ụka, mana a na-emekarị ka mageu azụmahịa na-atọ ụtọ ma na-atọ ya ụtọ, nke ukwuu n'ụzọ yogọt a na-ere ere
A na-emekwa ihe ọṅụṅụ yiri nke a n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Africa
A na akwadebe obere mealie pap (nri ọka), nke a na agbakwunye ntụ ọka wit, na-enye inoculum nke nje bacteria na-emepụta lactate
A na-ahapụ ngwakọta ahụ ka ọ gbasaa, na-emekarị n'ebe na-ekpo ọkụ
A na-eme pasteurization na ọrụ azụmahịa iji gbatị kwuo ndụ nchekwa
N'ihe gbasara nri, ọ dị ka nri nne na nna ya, mana glucose na-agbanwe ka ọ bụrụ lactate n'oge fermentation

A na-emekarị ka nkwadebe azụmahịa baa ọgaranya (Na South Africa, a na-ekwe ka okwu 'fortification' n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro maka mmemme nri na-edozi ahụ nke gọmentị kwadoro, dịka nke achịcha) na vitamin na mineral
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewere ya dị ka nke na-abụghị mmanya na-aba n'anya, a kọrọ obere ego (ihe na-erughị 1%) nke ethanol
Margaret Ebunoluwa Aderin-Pocock MBE ( née Aderin ; amụru ya Maachị 9968) bu onye sayensi mbara mbara Britain na onye nkuzi sayensị
Ọ bụ onye na-eme nchọpụta nsọpụrụ nke Ngalaba Physics na Astronomy University College London
Ebe ọ bụ ọnwa February 2014, ọ na-enye Chris Lintott ihe omume telivishọn nke mbara igwe na-agba ọsọ ogologo og
N'afọ e nyere ya Institute of Physics William Thomson, Lord Kelvin Medal na Nrite maka ntinye aka ọha na eze na physics
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe nrite Physics News Award
Ọ nwetakwara aha onye isi oche-ahọpụtara nke British Science Association
A mụrụ Margaret Ebunoluwa Aderin na London na 9 Maachị 1968 nye nne na nna Nigeria, Caroline Philips na Justus Adebayo Aderin, ma zụlite ya na Camden, London

Aha etiti ya bụ Ebunoluwa sitere na okwu Yoruba bu nke putara “onyinye” na Oluwa putara “Chineke” nke bu kwa ụzo di iche iche nke okwu a bu “Oluwabunmi” ma obu “Olubunmi” nke putara “onyinye Chineke” na Yoruba
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na La Sainte Union Convent na North London
O nwere dyslexia na, mgbe ọ bụ nwata, mgbe ọ gwara onye nkuzi na ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye na- enyocha mbara igwe, a tụrụ aro ka ọ gbalịa nọọsụ, 'n'ihi na nke ahụ bụkwa sayensị'
Ọ nwetara ọkwa anọ A na mgbakọ na mwepụ, physics, kemistri na bayoloji
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Imperial College London, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BSc na physics na 1990, wee gụchaa PhD na injinia n'okụru nlekọta nke Hugh Spikes na 1994
Nnyocha ya nyochara mmepe nke sistemụ nke ihe nkiri dị oke mkpa site na iji spectroscopy na interferometry ruo 25 nm ọkwa
Nke a gụnyere imeziwanye arụmọrụ ngwa anya na nhazi igwe nke sistemu ahụ, yana mmepe nke njikwa na Ngwaọrụ nhazi onyonyo
Usoro ndị ọzọ n'oge ahụ nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ naanị na ọkwa micron na mkpebi dị oke njọ
Ọrụ mmepe a mere ka ụlọ ọrụ na-agbapụ na Mahadum Imperial College, PCS Instruments na-ere ngwá ọrụ
Aderin-Pocock arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nkeonwe, agụmakwụkwọ na gọọmentị
Site na 1996 ruo 1999 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Defence Evaluation and Research Agency, ngalaba nke UK Ministry of Defence
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị sistemu na sistemu ịdọ aka ná ntị ngwa agha ụgbọ elu, site kwa na 1997 ruo 1999 ọ bụ onye njikwa ọrụ na-emepụta ngwá ọrụ eji aka achọpụta ogbunigwe

Na 1999, Aderin-Pocock laghachiri na Imperial College na mkpakọrịta sitere na Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Facilities Council ka ya na otu ahụ na-emepe emepe spectrograph dị elu maka teliskop Gemini na Chile
Igwe teliskop ahụ na-enyocha ma na-enyocha ìhè kpakpando iji kwalite nghọta nke kpakpando ndị dị anya
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-edu ndú na Astrium, bụ ebe o jisiri ike na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri na satellite, na-atụle ọsọ ifufe iji nyere aka nyocha nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ijikwa ngwá ọrụ nlele maka Aeolus satịlaịtị, nke ga-atụle ọsọ ifufe iji nyere aka nyocha nke mgbanwe ihu igwe

Ọ bụkwa onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ịgwa ndị ọha na eze okwu sayensị, ọkachasị ụmụ akwụkwọ, ma na-ahụkwa ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Science Innovation Ltd, nke na-etinye ụmụaka na ndị okenye n'ụwa niile ihe ịtụnanya sayensị mbara igwe

Aderin-Pocock na-agba mbọ ịkwalite ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-agụ mbara igwe, ndị injinia na ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ọ gwawokwa ihe dị ka ụmụaka 25,000, ọtụtụ n'ime ha n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ime ime obodo, na-agwa ha otú na ihe mere o ji ghọọ ọkà mmụta sayensị, na-ikọ akụkọ ifo banyere ọrụ, klaasị, na okike
Site na nke a Aderin-Pocock na-eduzi 'Njegharị nke Eluigwe na Ala,' bụ nke o guzobere iji tinye ụmụaka na ndị okenye gburugburu ụwa na ihe ebube nke oghere
Ọ na-enyekwa aka ịgba mbọ na-agba mbọ sayensị nke ndị na-eto eto site n'ịbụ onye ọka ikpe ama ama na National Science + Engineering Competition
A na-eme ngwụcha asọmpi a na Big Bang Fair na March kwa afọ iji kwụọ ndị na-eto eto nwetagoro ọkaibe na ọrụ sayensị, teknụzụ, injinia, ma ọ bụ mgbakọ na mwepụ
Aderin-Pocock bụ onye ndụmọdụ sayensị maka 2009 mini-usoro Paradox, ma pụtakwara na Dọkịta Onye Nzuzo

Ebe ọ bụ na 2006, Aderin-Pocock jere ozi dị ka onye nyocha na UCL Department of Science and Technology Studies, nke Sayensị na mmekọrịta ọha na eze 2010-2013 kwadoro site na Science and Technology Facilities Council (STFC)
Ọ na-enwebu mmekọrịta abụọ ọzọ metụtara nkwukọrịta sayensị, gụnyere sayensị na mmekọrịta ọha na eze 2006-08 Particle Physics na Astronomy Research Council (PPARC) na 2008-10 (STFC)
Nakwa na 2006, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị GetSET nwetara mmeri isii 'Women of External Achievement'

Na 2014, pseudonymously -written Ephraim Hardcastle kọlụm diary na Daily Mail kwuru na ahọpụtara Aderin-Pocock (tinyere Hiranya Peiris ) iji kwurịta nsonaazụ sitere na Background Imaging of Cosmic Extragalactic Polarization 2 (BICEP-2) nnwale na Newsnight n'ihi na
nke okike na agbụrụ ya

Ndị mgbasa ozi bụ isi katọrọ nkwupụta ndị a, Royal Astronomical Society na Aderin-Pocock na mahadum Pereis, University College London, na Daily Mail na kọlụm ya kwadoro n'ime ụbọchị na-ekwenye na a họọrọ ụmụ nwanyị ahụ
n'ihi na ha tozuru oke n'ugbo ha
Ọ bụ onye na-eme nchọpụta nsọpụrụ nke Ngalaba Physics na Astronomy University College London
Na 2020–21 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kọmishọna na kọmitii gọọmentị UK maka agbụrụ agbụrụ na agbụrụ (CRED)

Akuko esemokwu nke kọmitii ahụ kwubiri na 'na-ekwu na mba ahụ ka na-akpa ókè agbụrụ abụghị ihe akaebe', mana ndị ọkachamara mere mkpesa na akụkọ ahụ gosipụtara ihe akaebe na-ezighị ezi, na ndụmọdụ ndị isi azụmahịa na-eleghara anya
Ka e bipụtachara akụkọ ahụ, Aderin-Pocock kwuru na ọ bụghị ịgọnarị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ dị n'ụlọ ọrụ mana o kwuru na kọmiti ahụ achọpụtaghị ihe akaebe ya na mpaghara ndị ọ lere anya
Kemgbe Disemba 2021, Aderin-Pocock abụrụla onye na-ese ajụjụ maka ihe ngosi egwuregwu Channel 4 M n'ezie gwara gị
A họpụtara Aderin-Pocock ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Order of the British Empire na 2009 New Year Honors maka ọrụ mmụta sayensị
Enyekwara ya nzere doctorate site na Mahadum Staffordshire na 2009 maka ntinye aka na ngalaba mmụta sayensị
Ọ lụrụ Martin Pocock na 2002
Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Lauren, a mụrụ na 2010, ma biri na Guildford, Surrey
Maggie Anwer bụ onye nduzi Egypt-Italian, onye mmepụta, na onye edemede
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Faten Hamama Film Festival ma mara nke ọma maka iduzi ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-egosipụta ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dịka Al Fatenah ihe nkiri banyere onye nwụrụ anwụ Faten Hamam
Anwer gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ngalaba Mass Communication na galaba Redio na Televishọn
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mgbe ọ sonyere n'ide edemede banyere ihe nkiri Bekee na peeji extranet nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ntorobịa na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ihe nkiri

Na mgbakwunye, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum Harvard maka William Shakespeare's Merchant Of Venice N'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, o sonyere na nkwadebe mmemme telivishọn nke gụnyere Ashraf Abdel Baqi's Darak
N'afọ 2015, ya na onye omenkà Faten Hamama, guzobere Faten Hamam Film Festival, nke a na-eme ugbu a na London
Emume a gụnyere ụdị atọ nke gụnyere ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, na eserese

N'afọ 2013, Anwer nwere ogbako iji kụziere ụmụ nwanyị otu esi eme ihe nkiri na Saudi Arabia nakwa na o sonyere n'ịduzi egwuregwu Mali Sewak nke bụ egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị mbụ maka Rwaq Almadina na Saudi Arabia

Anwer na-ekere òkè dị ka onye ọka ikpe n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa, ọ bụ onye nduzi mbụ sonyere n'otu ndị ikpe na mmemme ihe nkiri Europe anọ dị ka London Film Festival, Nice International Film Festival na France na 2019, na Madrid International Film Festival n'oge nke asatọ ya n'afọ 2020
N'oge ọrụ ya, o mere ihe nkiri nke na-enyocha ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị ama ama
N'afọ 2015, o mere Al Fatenah, ihe nkiri banyere onye nwụrụ anwụ aha ya bụ Faten Hamama, ihe nkiri ahụ na-egosi ozi ikpeazụ nke Faten Hamam nye ndị na-ege ntị tupu ọnwụ ya
O mekwara Al Muntamy, ihe nkiri banyere onye na-eme ihe ọchị na onye nduzi Siria Duraid Lahham, ihe nkiri ahụ na-enyocha ihe omume nka na ndụ ya
N'afọ 2016, ọ duziri Al Gamil, ihe nkiri nkeji iri abụọ na asatọ banyere ọrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt Gamil Ratib
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ duziri ihe nkiri Abu Simbel, o mere ya na Egypt na Italy nke nyeere aka n'ịzọpụta ụlọ nsọ Abu Simbel
Anwer dere ma duzie The Distributor, ihe nkiri nke na-enyocha nkesa nke ihe nkiri mba ọzọ nke Warner Bros
na Fox n'ime afọ iri ise na Egypt, ma na-enyochaa ndụ Antwan Zend, onye na-ekesa ihe nkiri ma ya na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Egypt Hisham Selim
N'otu afọ ahụ, o dere ma mepụta Barcodia nke Shadi Al Dali na-eme, ihe nkiri ahụ bụ maka ụwa mebere emepe nke nwere ngwaọrụ nke na-ekpughe eziokwu n'ihu onye ọ bụla ma na-ejikarị ahọrọ onye ibe ndụ

N'afọ 2019, ọ rịọrọ onye Egypt na-ese ihe Farida Fahmy, nwunye onye nduzi nwụrụ anwụ na onye guzobere Reda Troupe Ali Reda, ka o nyere ya aka inye ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi nke na-enyocha ndụ onye nduzi Ali Reda
Maria Magdalena Laubser, nke ana akpọ Maggie Laubser (Ọmụmụ 14 April 1886 – Ọnwụ 17 May 1973) bụ nwa ada nke si na obodo South Africa
Ona ese kwa ihe ma na asapụtakwa ihe nke osere na ihe nkonye
Ndi imerime mmadụ kwekọtara na Laubser na onye nke ana akpọ Irma Stern, bụ ndi webatara ihe osise nke bekee na akpọ Expressionism na South Africa
Maggie Lloyd Williams (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede na Zimbabwe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn dịka Silent Witness, Secret Diary of a Call Girl, Red Cap na The Low Down
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1975 na Masvingo, Zimbabwe
Maggie Pogue Johnson (1883–1956) bụ onye narị afọ nke iri abụọ Black American na-ede egwu na onye na-ede uri
Johnson dere amaokwu n'asụsụ Bekee ma n'asụsụ na usoro okwu nke ndị isi ojii America n'oge ahụ, nke ka nọgidere na-enwe mmetụta nke okwu ha site na mgbe ha bụ ohu
A mụrụ Johnson na Fincastle, Virginia, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute na Petersburg, Virginia
Nne na nna ya, Lucie Jane Banister Pogue na Rev
Samuel Pogue mere ka ụmụ ha hụ na ụmụ ha gụrụ akwụkwọ ma gụọ akwụkwọ nke ọma, na-atụle ngalaba ya na ụmụnne ya mechara, dịka nkuzi, physics, ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ, na ọrụ ozi
Johnson kụziri ihe ruo afọ abụọ ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Literary and Debating Society na Covington, Virginia

Ọ bụ onye dere 'I Know That I Love You' na egwu ndị ọzọ, yana onye dere Virginia Dreams uri ya bụ The Story of Lovers Leap sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na ebe ntụrụndụ a ma ama na South, Greenbrier White Sulpher Springs na West Virginia

uri mbụ nke Johnson bụ akụkụ nke nnukwu mmegharị nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-ede uri iji mepụta ihe nlereanya nke nwanyị nke bụ ihe ọzọ na ihe nlereanya kachasị nke 'Ezi Nwanyị' dị ka ahụmịhe ọcha, nke etiti
A pụrụ ịhụ ihe atụ nke ụdị nwanyị ọzọ ya na Old Maid's Soliloquy na Meal Time from Virginia Dreams A raara uri ya bụ Poet of Our Race nye onye na-ede uri Paul Laurence Dunbar
Ọ lụrụ Dọkịta Walter W
Staunton nke Virginia na 1904 onye ya na ya mụrụ otu nwa - Walter W
na Dr
JW Shellcroft nke West Virginia n'afọ 1938
Johnson bu n'obi ibuso mmachi nwoke na nwanyị ihu n'ọrụ ya n'agbanyeghị mmetụta dị egwu ọ na-emetụta ndị edemede nwanyị ojii
uri Dialect bụ ọkachasị nka nke ụmụ nwoke na iji ya mee ihe n'ihe ize ndụ nwanyị ya, ebe ọ bụ na e cheworị na ụmụ nwanyị ojii agụghị akwụkwọ na ụmụ nwanyị na-erughị ụmụ nwanyị
N'ihi ya, a na-ewere iji asụsụ nke na-adịghị agbaso okwu ndị ọcha na izi ezi dị ka ihe ize ndụ ma na-eyi egwu
Johnson na-ekwusi ike na nke a na mgbanwe ya n'etiti asụsụ ọkọlọtọ na asụsụ olumba n'ọtụtụ uri ya
N'ime nke a, ọ na-egosi otú ọnọdụ o si bụrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị nwere agba ịmụta ma jiri asụsụ nkịtị iji maka inwe ike inabata ha na ọha mmadụ
Ọzọkwa, n'ọtụtụ abụ ya, ma ụmụ nwoke ma ụmụ nwanyị ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ihe atụ nke mmepe agụmakwụkwọ na ike omume, ma dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ na-akwado echiche nke ịkwalite agbụrụ

Mahadum Agriculture, Makurdi (UAM) bu ulo akwukwo di elu na Makurdi, Benue State, Naijiria
E guzobere mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1988, ịgbaso ndụmọdụ nke gọọmentị etiti n'afọ 1987 akwụkwọ ọcha na usoro ọmụmụ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na mmepe na Naijiria
Osote onye isi ala bụ Prọfesọ Anande Richard Kimbir, na onye isi Mahadum bụ Emir nke Ilorin, Alhaji Ibrahim Sulu Gambari CFR
N’abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari kwadoro akwụkwọ iwu ka-akpọ ya Mahadum Joseph Sarwuan Tarka
Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo, Makurdi nwere ngalaba iri atọ na kọleji iri

Maka ịgbasa ozi na nkwado ọrụ ọhaneze, UAM guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Na-ahụ maka mgbasawanye (CEC) na ụlọ ọrụ maka nri na ọrụ ugbo (CEFAS) nke na-elekwasị anya na nkwado mgbakwunye ọrụ ugbo na ọrụ nkwado iwu ọha na eze
Ebe Ụlọ ọrụ Mgbatị/ndọtị ahụ site na ọzụzụ ya na-arụkọ ọrụ mgbatị ya na-ejikọ mmemme Mgbasa
Ụlọ ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Nri na atụmatụ ọrụ ugbo na-achikota nkwado ọrụ ọha na eze na nri na ọrụ ugbo
UAM na-eme njikọ iji hụ na teknụzụ ọrụ ugbo na mmepụta nke nyocha ya ruru ndị ọrụ ugbo obere nke Naijiria, ndị ebu n'uche ga-erite uru na nyocha mahadum na mmemme mgbatị
Njikọ Ụlọ ọrụ ndị gọọmentị etiti na ndị Minista nke ọrụ ugbo na gọọmentị etiti na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ metụtara ya nága n'ihu iji mata mpaghara mmekorita na nkwado teknụzụ site na Mahadum a
Mahadum a etinyela aka na International Institute of Tropical Agriculture na nyocha banyere akụkụ mmekọrịta akụ na ụba nke soybean

Mahadum nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ itoolu
Ụlọ akwụkwọ a na-eme mmemme sayensị tupu ogo ogo, nkuzi obere oge na mmemme sayensị Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum nke dị elu
N'afọ 1980, otu n'ime amụma a tụbatara na agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị ndị nkịtị nke Alhaji Aliyu Shehu Shagari nọ n'isi ya bụ imepụta mahadum ọhụrụ nke teknụzụ

Ebumnuche, dị ka gọọmentị kwupụtara, dabara na amụma mba gbasara agụmakwụkwọ, gbasara ọzụzụ teknụzụ na sayensị; ya bụ, ịzụlite, n'oge ọ bụla nke usoro mmụta, a na nkà mmụta sayensị na nkà na ụzụ àgwà na nkwadebe maka mba na nkà na ụzụ na-apụ
Ya mere, steeti ndị na-enweghị mahadum gọọmenti etiti - Bauchi, Benue, Gongola, Imo, Niger, Ogun na Ondo - ghọrọ ndị na-erite uru na atụmatụ a ozugbo
N'otu afọ ahụ, a kpọrọ aha ụlọ ọrụ atọ dị otú ahụ maka Bauchi, Benue na Imo
Ndị ọzọ anọ ga-amalite na 1981
Mahadum Federal nke teknụzụ, Akure si otú a malitere na 1981
Ka ọ na-erule August, gọọmenti họpụtara onye ọsụ ụzọ Chancellor, HRH Alhaji Zulkarnaini Gambari Mohammed, Emir nke lIorin
N’oge ahụ, a mara ọkwa Kansụl Na-achị Isi nke nwere mmadụ iri na atọ, n’agbanyeghị na a kpọghị onyeisi oche ya ruo October
A họpụtara Late High Chief (Dr) Gabriel Akin-Deko ka ọ bụrụ onye ọsụ ụzọ pro-chancellor na onye isi oche nke Kansụl Ọchịchị
Na Nọvemba 19, 1981, Prọfesọ Theodore Idibiye Francis nwụrụ anwụ ka a họpụtara osote onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum ọhụrụ ahụ

Prọfesọ Francis bụbu onye prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta ọgwụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike Mahadum nke Ibadan (Mahadum Ụlọ Ọgwụ) ma mesịa kwaga na Institute of Health Sciences nke Mahadum nke Port Harcourt dị ka Onye isi ntọala
Site na Port Harcourt Francis kwagara Akure na Jenụwarị 1, 1982 ka ọ malite ọrụ inweta mahadum n'ụkwụ
Otu n'ime ihe mbụ o mere bụ iweta ndị ọrụ dị elu nke ha ga-amalite vistas nke ọrụ ntọala ahụ
Ya mere, mgbe mkparịta ụka ụfọdụ gasịrị, Francis họpụtara Maazị Ayorinde O
Ogunruku, onye mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na mahadum ọhụrụ (na-abụghị onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala ya, Maazị Etim Udoh) dị ka onye nlekọta nchịkwa mbụ, na January 12, 1982
Mahadum Federal nke Nkà na ụzụ, Akure ka ahọpụtara mahadum 8th kacha mma na Mahadum teknụzụ kacha mma na Naijiria site na Webometrics ọkwa Webometrics nke Mahadum Ụwa dị ka Jenụwarị 2020

Ọ bụ gọọmentị etiti nke Naijiria guzobere mahadum ahụ na-afọ 1975, na ebumnuche nke ịbụ otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na mba Naijiria

Ọ nwere ogige abụọ na steeti Anambra
Isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ya dị n'Awka (isi obodo Anambra Steeti) ebe ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọzọ dị na Nnewi
E nwekwara ogige ndị ọzọ dị na mahadum Nnamdị Azịkwe, Ọka
Ndị a gụnyere Agulu dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Aniocha na Ifite-Ogwuari dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ayamelum na steeti Anambra
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mahadum gọọmentị etiti nke otu a na-akpọ National Universities Commission na-ahụ maka ya ma nyekwa ikike
A kpọrọ mahadum ahụ aha Dọkịnta Nnamdi Azikiwe
Ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke Mahadum ahụ so n'otu akpọrọ Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) n'okwu bekee
A maara ndị ọrụ otu ahụ inye ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị na-enweghi ka ọ ra ha ohere agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ndị ọrụ enyemaka ndị ọzọ
Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe biara dị ka ihe mputa dika ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum steeti Anambra (ASUTECH) kwụsịrị

ASUTECH nke ehiwere site n'iwu nke asaa ka ọnwa Julaị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ na afọ otu puku na nari iteghete na iri asatọ (30 Julaị 1980) nke sitere n'aka Gọọmenti Anambra ochie, nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka mahadum nwere ọtụtụ ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ, nke nwekwara ogige dị na Abakiliki, Enugwu, Ọka na Nnewi

N'afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na otu (1991), ka e kewasịrị steeti Anambra ochie wee nwezie steeti Anambra na steeti Enugwu, ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ Ọka na Nnewi nke ASUTECH ka e hiwereziri ka ọ buru mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe site n'iwu nke ise nke Anambra Steeti ka ọnwa Nọvemba gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụo na isii n'afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na otu (26 Nọvemba 1991)

Gọọmenti etiti weghaara nhazi na nlekọta mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe site na iwu nke iri atọ na anọ ka ọnwa Julaị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise n'afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na abụọ (15 Julaị 1992)

N'afọ otu puku na nari iteghete na iri iteghete na otu (1991), ka e kewasịrị steeti Anambra ochie iji wee nwee steeti Anambra na steeti Enugwu, e jikọtara ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'Ọka na Nnewi nke mahadum steeti Anambra mbụ (ASUTECH) wee bụrụzie mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, nke gọọmentị etiti mechara weghaara
A kpọrọ mahadum ahu aha Nnamdi Azikiwe, onye isi ala Naijiria mbụ

N'afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na abụọ 1992, Gọọmenti etiti Naịjirịa weghaara mahadum n'aka Anambra steeti
Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, wee bụrụ mahadum nke ọchịchị gọọmentị etiti
Isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum ahu dị n'akụkụ ụzọ awara awara si Onicha gaba Enugu nke dị n'Oka, ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ nke abụọ dị na Nnewi (NAUTH na Okofia) na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke atọ dị na Agulu (Ngalaba nke ọgwụ)
ASUU bụ otu jikọrọ ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ niile na mahadum gọọmentị dị na Naịjirịa

Otú ọ dị, ngalaba Unizik nke otu Academic Union of Universities (ASUU) na-emetụta ndụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enweghị ka ọ ra ha iji wee hụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndi ahụ akwụsịghị akwụkwọ
N'ime afọ agụmakwụkwọ 2019/2020, ahọpụtara ụmụakwụkwọ iri atọ ndi na-enweghị ka ọ ra ha na mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe dị n'Ọka nime steeti Anambra site na ngalaba mmụta dị iche iche na mahadum ahụ

African Virtual University (AVU) bụ mgbalị pan-African iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ mmụta dị anya na-emeghe ma dị ọnụ ala iji jeere kọntinent Afrịka ozi
AVU malitere na 1997 dị ka ọrụ nke World Bank ma mesịa ghọọ ụlọ ọrụ na-achị onwe ya mgbe e nyefere ya n'aka gọọmentị Afrịka na 2003
N'oge ndụ nke mmemme ahụ, ndị nkatọ ajụla ịdị irè ya yana akụkụ ya nke ọchịchị ọhụrụ
Sub-Saharan Africa bụ mpaghara nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke HIV / AIDs, ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ịda ogbenye
Ọnọdụ ndị a emeela ka ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị dị ụkọ, ọnụ ọgụgụ na-ezughị ezu nke ndị nkụzi, na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'ihi ihe ndị a, ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-aga mahadum na-abụghị nke SSA nke na-eme ka ha gbasaa ikike nke ụlọ ọrụ agụ akwụkwọ dị elu na kọntinentị ahụ ga-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ, ndị ọzọ,

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2013, mmemme ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ 40,000 na mba 27 dị na mpaghara Sahara ma mee atụmatụ ịgbasawanye na ọdịnaya dabeere na ekwentị na 2015 n'ihi mmụba nke smartphones na kọntinent ahụ

Ọnọdụ ndị metụtara ego ụlọ akụ ụwa manyere mba Afrịka belata mmefu ego na agụmakwụkwọ ka elu, ebe ọ bụ na ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu kwụrụ ụgwọ dị ala karịa mmemme agụmakwụkwọ elementrị na nke sekọndrị
Ọnọdụ ndị a belatara ogo agụmakwụkwọ nke mahadum ndị Afrịka nyere
Tụkwasị na nke a, Ụlọ Akụ̀ Ụwa webatara mmemme ndị ọzọ dị oke ọnụ nke ndị prọfesọ ọdịda anyanwụ na-akụzi
Ihe omume ndị a, ọkachasị gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọdịbendị, na ihe gbasara mmadụ kpatara nchegbu banyere nkọwa ndị ọkà mmụta ọdịda anyanwụ na-enye
Mmalite nke ọtụtụ mahadum Africa na-alaghachi na mmetụta ọdịda anyanwụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ nke oge a emeela ka ihe nketa a nke ịdabere na ya sie ike site na mahadum ndị mmekọ ọdịda anyanwụ AVU na-enye ọdịnaya mmemme ahụ
Ihe ọmụma a na-aga n'otu ụzọ site n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ gaa n'Eshia, na-ahapụ mba Afrịka na-enweghị okwu na usoro mmụta
Àtụ Association of African Universities
Mahadum nke Ȯra Abia bụ otu n'ime mahadum steeti enwere na Naijiria

Emepụtara ụlọ ọrụ steeti agụmakwụkwọ ndị a ka ha gbasaa nnabata wee weta nka ọkachamara, nka na nyocha ọgbara ọhụrụ dị nso na obodo na ime obodo, ma nyere ndị nwere nkà ụmụ akwụkwọ aka inweta agụmakwụkwọ ka elu
Mmalite mahadum a bụ na 1981 na mbụ Ȯra Imo n'okpuru aha Mahadum nke Ȯra Imo, Etiti
Sam Mbakwe guzobere mahadum a mgbe ọ bụ Gọvanọ nke steeti Imo ochie
Ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị dị na Etiti, Imo steeti, ebe Ngalaba Iwu nọ na ogige dị iche na Aba
N'agbata 1984 na 1985 n'okpuru gọvanọ ndị agha nke General Ike Nwachukwu, mahadum a kwagara ebe ọ na-adịgide adịgide na Uturu, Okigwe
Site na okike Ȯra Abia na 1991, etinyere ogige Uturu nke Mahadum ahụ na Ȯra Abia, a na -akpọzi ya Mahadum nke Ȯra Abia Uturu, Isuikwuato Local Government Area, Ȯra Abia, Nigeria
A haziri mahadum na kọleji na ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe etolitere n'otu usoro kọleji nke Mahadum Nebraska na-arụ ọrụ
Ọmụmụ ihe na Mahadum nke Ȯra Abia gụnyere undergraduate, Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị gụchagoro mbụ na nzere doctorates
Ọ nwere ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ- ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na Uturu; na Kọleji nke Iwu, Kọleji nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Ọgwụ Anụmanụ nke ogige dị na Umuahia, isi obodo Abia Steeti, Nigeria
Mahadum nke Ȯra Abia na-enye ihe karịrị iri itoolu mmemme Undergraduate na gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ofe kọleji iri
Mahadum nke Ȯra Adamawa dị na obodo Mubi na Mpaghara Senatorialọ nke di n'Ugwu nke Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria
E guzobere ya na 2002 site na Iwu Mahadum steeti Adamawa ọnụọgụ 10 nke 2001'
Ederede aha mahadum a bụ 'Maka ịhụ na mmepe na mgbanwe steeti dị ngwa'
