Mahadum nke Ȯra Delta, Abraka nke a na-akpọ DELSU bụ mahadum nwe obodo na Naịjirịa nke nwere nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Abraka, Delta State na ogige abụọ na Asaba, Delta na Oleh, Delta
E guzobere ogige Oleh, Delta na Iwu E degharịrị 1995
Mahadum bụ otutu-kampos nwere ogige atọ n'ime anya dị ihe dị ka kilomita 200
Ugbu a, yana ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ruru 22,000 (na nnọkọ 2019/2020), Mahadum ahụ na-enye ọtụtụ mmemme site na asambodo oge niile, diplọma na mmemme nzere ruo na mgbede nwa oge na mmemme ogo izu ụka
Mahadum ahụ na-enye Akwụkwọ diplọma ọmụmụ ihe ruo ọkwa doctoral
Ebe ndị ọrụ/ebe ndụmọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ, ebe mmụta elektrọnik, ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ na akụrụngwa egwuregwu n'etiti ndị ọzọ dị maka ịkwado ọrụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mahadum steeti iri abụọ na ise nke 'Kọmitii Mahadum Mba' na-elekọta ma nabatakwa
Mahadum nke Ȯra Delta, Abraka ka edekọtara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka ebe agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ malitere dị ka kọleji Ọzụzụ Ndị Nkụzi Gọọmentị n'oge Obodo Naijiria chịrị na afọ ụfọdụ banye n'ọchịchị mgbe ọchịchị gachara
Ọ ghọrọ kọleji agụmakwụkwọ nke enyere asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Naịjirịa (NCE) site na 1971 ruo 1985
Na 1981, o jikọrọ aka na Mahadum Benin, Benin City wee nye ya mmemme nzere site na 1981 ruo 1985 mgbe ọ ghọrọ ngalaba nkuzi nke Mahadum Bendel Steeti na nnukwu ogige ya na Ekpoma

Okike Edo Steeti na Delta Steeti na Ọgọstụ 1991 na ntụgharị nke nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ Mahadum nke Ȯra Bendel, Ekpoma ka ọ bụrụ Mahadum nke Ȯra Bendel na Disemba 1991, mere ka e guzobe mahadum steeti Delta, Abraka, onye isi ọchịchị steeti ahụ n'oge ahụ, Olorogun Felix Ibru na 30 Eprel 1992
Mahadum nke Ȯra Delta, Abraka bidoro na ngalaba nkuzi ise, ya bụ
Na 1995, Gọọmentị Steeti wepụtara amụma inwe ogige atọ nke ekwesịrị ịgbasa n'ime mpaghara ndị omebe iwu atọ na steeti
N'iburu n'uche iwu a, e hiwere ogige atọ iji gụnye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Abraka, Anwai-Asaba Oleh na ogige
N'okpuru bụ ndepụta ụlọ ọrụ mmekọ nke Kọmitii Mahadum Mba (NUC) kwadoro
Mahadum nke Ȯra Ebonyi 'tọrọ ntọala na 1999 na Abakaliki, Naijiria E guzobere ngalaba ahụike mahadum ahụ na 1991 dị ka ngalaba ESUT nke Sayensị Ahụike
Emepụtara ọtụtụ akụrụngwa ya maka nzaghachi ikpuru guinea (oria ojoo); e megharịrị ụlọọgwụ ọkachamara nke Abakaliki, nke emere maka nke a ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọgwụ izizi Mahadum nke Ȯra Ebonyi
Ndị Kọmitii Ahụike na eze nke Naijiria mechara nye ya nzere maka ọzụzụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụike na ndị dọkịta bi
Kemgbe ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Mahadum Ebonyi State, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike enwetala nnukwu ego n'aka gọọmentị Ebonyi
Mahadum nke Ȯra Kwara, nke a makwaara dị ka 'KWASU' , bụ mahadum nke iri asaa na asaa nke kọleji mahadum Naijiria (NUC) ga-edebanye aha ya
Ọ bụ mahadum 95th ka amata na Naịjirịa
Ọchịchị Dr
Bukola Saraki guzobere mahadum ahụ na 2009, wee chee na ọ ga-abụ karịa mahadum a na-ahụkarị na Nigeria
E mere ya ka ọ bụrụ ebe etiti maka ọrụ obodo na ịchụ nta ego

N'ime obodo ebe ụkpụrụ nke ọrụ afọ ofufo na itinye aka na obodo ka nabatabeghị nke ọma, mahadum ahụ matara onwe ya dịka akụkụ nke obodo, ma nwee ọnọdụ nke onye ntụzi maka mmepe obodo maka ebumnuche ịkpọkọta obodo, ịtọ ntọala atụmatụ, na ịchọpụta mkpa dị n'ime obodo ka ndị nkuzi nwee ike iji nka ha metụta obodo
KWASU nwere ọgbakọ izizi ya na 1 Juun 2013 wee mepee Ndị otu Alumni KWASU

Njem ahụ iji guzobe mahadum steeti na Kwara State malitere na 11 Julaị 2007 mgbe Gọvanọ Kwara steeti Bukola Saraki hiwere kọmitii nhazi n'okpuru onye bụbu gọvanọ Kwara Steeti, Alhaji Mohammed Shaaba Lafiagi iji kwadebe ala maka ntọala ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Mahadum Kwara Steeti
Ebinyere ụgwọ maka mahadum steeti Kwara ka ọ bụrụ iwu na 24 Disemba 2008
Enwetara asambodo na akụrụngwa iji rụọ ọrụ mahadum ahụ na February 9, 2009 sitere na Kọmitii Mahadum Mba (NUC)

Onye osote onye isi ọsụ ụzọ, Prọfesọ Abdul Rasheed Na'Allah, onye ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya, bụ onye isi na ngalaba ihe ọmụmụ Afrịka nke Western Illinois University, Macomb, United States of America, wee malite ọrụ 28 Julaị 2009

Ugbu a Onye isi ndị ọrụ nke onye isi ala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari onye bu ụzọ họpụta ya onye ọkammụta ruru eru na onye nnọchi anya mba ụwa, Prọfesọ Ibrahim Gambari bụ onye isi ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, Johnson Adewunmi bụ onye gọvanọ họpụtara AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq na Mọnde, Mee 25, 2020
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma, a na-eme atụmatụ mahadum ahụ ka mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ya rụọ ọrụ site na ogige atọ dị na Malete, Ilesha-Baruba na Osi-Opin
Ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ Malete bụ ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nwee kọleji dị ọcha na nke etinyere n'ọrụ, kọleji nke ozi na teknụzụ nkwukọrịta, yana kọleji agụmakwụkwọ
Ogige Osi (ọchịchị ime obodo Ekiti) ga-enwe kọleji injinịa, kọleji ụmụ mmadụ, njikwa, na sayensị mmekọrịta
Ogige Baruba (ọchịchị ime obodo Baruten) ga-ebi kọleji ọrụ ugbo na sayensị anụmanụ
Mahadum nke Ȯra Lagos, nke a makwaara dị ka LASU , dị na Ojo, obodo dị na Lagos State, Naijiria
LASU bụ naanị mahadum steeti dịbu na mpaghara Briten

E hiwere mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1983 site n'iwu na -enye ike nke Lagos Steeti, maka ịga n'ihu n'ịmụ ihe na iguzobe oke mmụta; isiokwu ya bụ Maka Eziokwu na Ọrụ Mahadum ahụ na-akwado ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 35,000
Mahadum ahụ na-enye diplọma, nzere na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ, gụnyere mmemme MBA
A họọrọ LASU n'etiti mahadum 600 kachasị elu n'ụwa site na 'Oge agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ka elu mahadum ụwa' maka 2020
Na 23 June, 2021 Lasu pụtara dị ka mahadum kacha eto eto na Naịjirịa n'okpuru afọ 50 gara aga tinye
'Oge agụmakwụkwọ mahadum' họọrọ Mahadum nke Ȯra Lagos dị ka mahadum nke abụọ kacha mma na Naịjirịa na 2 Septemba 2020, na ọ bụ naanị mahadum steeti gụnyere na ọkwa maka 2022
Mahadum ahụ adọtala ego mba ofesi, gụnyere maka iguzobe Ụlọ akụ mba ụwa nke mba Afrịka maka ọkaibe na Sayensị, Teknụzụ, Injinịa na mgbakọ na mwepụ
A tụụrụ ime Mahadum Lagos steeti dị ka ọtụtụ mahadum, kọleji na mahadum na-abụghị ebe obibi

Taa, Mahadum Lagos steeti na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere ogige anọ nwere nke nwere nnukwu ogige ya na Ojo (n'akụkụ Okporo ụzọ Badagry) na ogige ndị ọzọ na Epe, Lagos (ebe ngalaba nke Injinịa dị yana ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọrụ ugbo), Ikeja (ebe kọleji ọgwụ dị na LASUTH)
Ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ụlọ ihe nkiri 300 bụ nke Awori Faretù Na-ahụ Maka Ọdịmma nke Naịjirịa (AWAN) na-ewu n'ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, Ojo
Ebe a na-arụ ọrụ a na-emegide Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti nke gara aga, Babatunde Raji Fashola Ụlọ Senate, nke ụlọ ọbá akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ka na-arụ ugbu a na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ dị ugbu a
Mgbe arụchara ya nke ọma, ụlọ ahụ ga-abụ ebe nkuzi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ, ọfịs na odeakwụkwọ
A chịkọtara mpaghara agụmakwụkwọ na nyocha nke ụlọ ọrụ nyere na tebụl dị n'okpuru
Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello 'Zaria' 'bụ mahadum nyocha gọọmentị etiti na Zaria, Kaduna State, Naijiria
ABU was founded on 4 October 1962, as the University of Northern Nigeria
Mahadum ahụ na-arụ ọrụ ogige abụọ Samaru (isi) na Kongo na Zaria
Enwere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Funtua kilomita ole na ole site na nnukwu ogige mahadum ahụ nwere

Ndị Samaru nwere ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa na ikike nke sayensị anụ ahụ, sayensị ndụ, sayensị mmekọrịta, nka na asụsụ, agụmakwụkwọ, imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi, injinịa, sayensị ọgwụ, sayensị ọrụ ugbo na ebe nyocha
Ogige Kongo na -akwado ikike nke Iwu na nchịkwa
Ngalaba nchịkwa gụnyere Akaụntụ, Nchịkwa Azụmaahịa, Ọchịchị Obodo na Ọmụmụ Mmepe na Ngalaba Nlekọta Ọha
Ọzọkwa, mahadum na -ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na mmemme ndị ọzọ na ebe ndị ọzọ
Akpọrọ ya aha Sardauna nke Sokoto, Alhaji Sir Ahmadu Bello, onye isi ala mbụ nke ugwu Naịjirịa
Mahadum ahụ na-eme mmemme mmụta asambodo dị iche iche na nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ (yana na -enye ogo ndị otu na mmemme aka ọrụ na mmezi)
O nwere nnukwu mmemme ahụike nwere ụlọ ọgwụ nkuzi ABU nke ya, otu n'ime ụlọ ọgwụ kacha akụzi ihe na Naịjirịa na Afrịka
Ka Naịjirịa na-abịaru nnwere onwe na Ọktoba 1, 1960, ọ nwere naanị otu mahadum Mahadum nke Ibadan, hiwere na 1948
Agbanyeghị tupu akụkọ a, gọọmentị mpaghara amalitela ịhazi mahadum
N'ọnwa Mee 1960, mpaghara mpaghara ugwu akwalitela Schoollọ Akwụkwọ Ọmụmụ Arabic na Obodo Kano ka ọ bụrụ kọleji Ahmadu Bello maka ọmụmụ Arabic na nke Alakụba
(Akpọrọ kọleji ahụ aha onye isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara ahụ, Alhaji Sir Ahmadu Bello)
Nkwupụta mkpesa nke Ashby Commission nyere nkwalite na ntụzịaka ọhụrụ
E mechara kpebie imepụta Mahadum nke Northern Nigeria na Zaria (kama Kano)

Mahadum a ga-eweghara akụrụngwa nke kọleji nka, nka na nka na teknụzụ dị na Samaru dị na mpụga Zaria, wee tinye kọleji Ahmadu Bello dị na Kano, ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ọrụ ugbo na Samaru, ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa na Zaria, na ụlọ ọgwụ anụmanụ
Ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na Vom na Jos Plateau
Iwu ụlọ ọrụ mahadum ọhụrụ ahụ bụ nke ndị ụlọ omebe iwu mpaghara Northern Region mere n'afọ 1961
E kpebiri ka a kpọọ mahadum ahụ aha Ahmadu Bello, kọleji Kano were aha Abdullahi Bayero, onye bụbu Emir Kano
Na mmeghe na 4 Ọktoba 1962, ekele n'otu akụkụ na -amata ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị adị, ABU kwuru na ikike ikike anọ gụnyere ngalaba 15
Ụmụ akwụkwọ na mmemme niile gụrụ naanị 426
Ihe ịma aka ndị ahụ buru oke ibu
Ihe karịrị afọ 60 nke ọchịchị ndị Britain na -achị, agụmakwụkwọ na mpaghara mpaghara agbadala azụ na mpaghara mpaghara ndịda abụọ ahụ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ole na ole si n'ebe ugwu nwere asambodo maka ịbata mahadum, ọ bụkwa ole na ole ka ndị ugwu nwere iru eru maka nhọpụta nkuzi
N'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ izizi, naanị 147 sitere na ugwu
Onye isi osote onye isi ABU (onye isi nchịkwa na onye ndu) bụ onye Britain, dịkwa ka ọtụtụ nhọpụta ọkachamara
Naanị ndị Naịjirịa abụọ - Dr
Iya Abubakar (Mgbakọ na mwepụ) na Adamu Baikie (Mmụta) - so na nhọpụta izizi ngalaba izizi
Ụlọ ọrụ n'ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ Samaru ezughi oke, na nchịkwa na njikọta nke ụlọ ọrụ dịbu adị iche siri ike

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 1960, kọmitii Ashby tụrụ aro mahadum ndị ọzọ (mpaghara) na mpaghara ugwu na ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria na mahadum gọọmentị etiti ọzọ na nchekwa nchekwa Lagos, mana ọ nweghị onye n'ime mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke gụrụ akwụkwọ nke nwere mmemme 'agụmakwụkwọ izizi n'efu na ụwa niile'
Otu mkpesa pere mpe nke gọọmentị nabatara tụrụ aro ka mahadum ọhụrụ dị n'ime mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ yana akụrụngwa kọleji nke nka, sayensị na teknụzụ Nigeria, Ibadan nyere mpaghara ahụ
Na 1961, ntuli aka na-eguzobe Provisional Council nke Mahadum gafere na 1961 site na Mgbakọ Mpaghara Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Ebe ikpeazụ ahọpụtara, ndị Ile-Ife nyere ala 13,000 dị ka ebe mahadum a chọrọ
The first financial grant provided for the takeoff of the university was £250,000 from the Western regional government
Na Septemba 22, 1962, e mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ọsụ ụzọ 244 n'ụlọ ọrụ nwa oge, kọleji nka na sayensị gara aga, Ibadan
Ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ahụ nọ na kọleji nka na nka na ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ si na mahadum University, Ibadan na ndị mba ọzọ
Oladele Ajose, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche mahadum ahụ na mahadum bidoro na ngalaba ise Ọrụ ugbo, nka, akụnụba na Mmụta mmekọrịta ọha, Iwu, na Sayensị
Ụdị ochichi mahadum na ngalaba ikike dị ka mahadum mahadum, Ibadan na n'oge ntọala ya, ọ malitere mmekọrịta ya na Mahadum Wisconsin
Ọnọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dị n'ime mpaghara ahụ mere ka ngagharị si Ibadan gaa Ife kwụsị

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 1966, Lt-Col Francis Adekunle Fajuyi, onye ọbịa nke Mahadum Ife na Gọvanọ ndị agha mbụ nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, họpụtara Hezekaịa Oluwasanmi ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ọhụụ, na Chief TT Solaru ka ọ bụrụ pro-chancellor wee nye
nye ha ego na iwu ngagharị, ịkwaga n'ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide ka ọ na-erule Ọktoba 1966
Egburu Fajuyi na mwakpo ndị agha nke July 1966 na Ibadan, ma ọ hụghị mmegharị ahụ ọ haziri
Fajuyi Hall, ụlọ obibi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwoke na -agụghị akwụkwọ ka akpọrọ aha iji sọpụrụ onyinye ya na -adịru ebighị ebi
Mmegharị ya na kampos ọhụrụ na ebe ọ dị ugbu a na Ile-Ife malitere na Jenụwarị 1967
Ife bidoro ngalaba izizi ahịa ọgwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka, ngalaba mbụ nke Chemical Engineering na ngalaba elektrọnik mbụ na mgbakwunye na Injinịa Eletriki

Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike ya bidoro site na usoro mmụta agbakwunyere na nhazi obodo (nke Nzukọ ahụike ụwa (WHO) nabatara) [na nzere bachelọ | baccalaureate (BSc na-asọpụrụ) tupu ịbanye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụlọ ọgwụ, mana nke a e mesịrị jettisoned
Na 1975, gọọmentị ndị agha ọhụrụ mere iwu nke mere Mahadum Ife ka ọ bụrụ mahadum etiti
Na 10 Julaị 1999 ndị otu 'Neo Black Movement of Africa' gburu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ, George Iwilade, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-akwado ụmụ akwụkwọ na ogbugbu Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ Tunde Adeniran wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekweta ihe merenụ nakwa na ministri ahụ ga-eji okwu ahụ were oke nchegbu
Mahadum nke Uyo (UNIUYO) dị na Uyo, isi obodo Ȯra Akwa Ibom, Naijiria
A na-akpọbu mahadum ahụ dị ka University of Cross River State (UNICROSS)
N'October 1, 1991 Gọọmenti etiti Naijiria hibere ya dị ka Mahadum Federal ma gbanwee aha ya gaa na Mahadum Uyo
Mahadum ahụ ketara ụmụ akwụkwọ, ndị ọrụ, mmemme agụmakwụkwọ na akụrụngwa niile nke Mahadum nke Ȯra Cross River nke Ȯra Cross River guzobere na 1983
Ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ bidoro n'oge nnọkọ agụmakwụkwọ 1991/92
UNIUYO nwere 12 Ngalaba (nkewa), ụlọ akwụkwọ postgraduate na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ịga n'ihu Education
Prọfesọ Enefiok Essien, bụ osote onye isi ala ozugbo
In 2015 the Emir of Hadejia, Adamu Maje was appointed Chancellor
N'okpuru bụ ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ mmekọ nke Mahadum Uyo, nke Ụlọ ọrụ mahadum nke Mba (NUC) kwadoro
Mahama bụ aha Africa nyere aha na aha nna
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere
Mahamane Cissé (a mụrụ Disemba 27, 1993 na Ansongo, Mali) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke na-agba FC Nouadhibou na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
A mụrụ Cissé na Mali site na nna Mali na nne Niger
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo amụrụ ya na 2013 African U-20 Championship na Algeria

Otú ọ dị, mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ họọrọ ịnọchite anya Niger na mba ụwa wee mee mpụta mbụ ya maka Ménas na September 7 na 2014 FIFA World Cup qualifier megide Congo, na-ebute ihe mgbaru ọsọ na 2-2 eserese
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, Congo gbara akwụkwọ mkpesa na FIFA gbasara ntozu Cissé ịgba egwu Niger
Agbanyeghị, FIFA kwadoro na ọ nabatara arịrịọ maka mgbanwe otu onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ, na-eme ka ọ nwee ike ịnọchite anya Niger na mba ụwa ma jụ arịrịọ Congo
Akara na rịzọlt depụtara na mbụ ọnụọgụ goolu Niger
Mahasthangarh (Àtụ Lang-bn Môhasthangôṛ) Mahasthangarh bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ mepere emepe mgbe ochie na saịtị nke mere nnọọ chọpụtara na Bangladesh
Mahder Assefa (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1987) bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Seberta, Yalteneka Amalayu, Ye Bet Lij, Shefu, FBI 2, Made In China na Triangle trilogy
Mahder dọtakwara uche ọha na eze na 2011 late night telivishọn drama series Sew le sew, ebe o gosipụtara dị ka Medhanit
A mụrụ Mahder na 5 Ọktoba 1987 na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia nke dị gburugburu Shero Meda na Rebeka Feyessa na Assefa Demelash
Ọ biri n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara na mpaghara Kera dị nso
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na Atse Zeray Yacob wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Shemeles Habte School, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2011
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ kọleji ya na Admas College, na-amụ sayensị odeakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ na-aga kọleji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa
Mahder gosipụtara mmasị n'ịgba egwú site na nwata

N'agbanyeghị ọchịchọ ndị mụrụ ya maka ya ilekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gara n'ihu na-agba egwú ruo mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị wee soro ndị enyi ya guzobe otu ịgba egwú, nke akpọrọ 'UNIQUE GIRLS'
Otu ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma ma mee ka a kpọọ Mahder na ndị na-eme ya ka ha bụrụ ndị na-agba egwú na ọtụtụ ndị egwu Etiopia, gụnyere Dawit Melesse na Tibebu Workiye
Nkọwa na telivishọn mere ka nne ya chọpụta ihe ntụrụndụ ịgba egwú ya, otu ahụ wee gbasaa iji kwe ka Mahder lekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ kọleji, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Bole International Airport, na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa na-akwụghị ụgwọ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa ruo ihe dị ka afọ anọ
N'oge a, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ma tinye akwụkwọ maka ọrụ na Tasralech
N'agbanyeghị nchegbu ya banyere enweghị ahụmịhe ime ihe nkiri, ọ nwetara akụkụ ahụ
Otu enyi ya mechara mee ka ọ sonye na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe

N'ịgbaso ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Mahder pụtara na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ dịka Seberta, Yalteneka, Amalayu, Ye Bet Lij, Shefu, FBI 2, Made In China, Triangle, Amran, 45 Ken, Linega Sil, Tsinu Kal, Body Guard, Hiwot ena Sak, Ayrak, Anelakekem
N'afọ 2011, Mahder gosipụtakwara na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Sew le sew, na-agbagharị dị ka Medi
Ọdịdị ya na ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka ọ pụta ìhè, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na bọọdụ mgbasa ozi, magazin na mgbasa ozi TV
N'ihe gbasara ihe nkiri ya, a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn, gụnyere ETV Lewtatoch na Enechewawet na EBS TV
Akwụkwọ akụkọ tabloids kọrọ na ha abụọ na-agba akwụkwọ nakwa na Mahder dị ime nwa ya
Kemgbe afọ 2012, FM 1021 na-arụ ọrụ n'inye onyinye maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe nkiri kacha mma nke afọ na Film Side
Nhọrọ ahụ dabere na nhọrọ ndị na-ege ntị na ihe nkiri ya a ma ama Amran bu nke a họọrọ dị ka ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ
A họpụtara Mahder Assefa dị ka onye mmeri kacha mma nke afọ 2013
N'afọ 2012, FM 1021 họọrọ otu n'ime ọrụ Mahder, Amran, dị ka ihe nkiri nke afọ
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eme nkiri kacha mma nke afọ
Mahdjouba (Arabic) maọbụ Mhadjeb bụ achịcha dị larịị nke sitere na Obodo Algeria
Mhadjeb bụ nri ọdịnaala nke obodo Algeria, ọ bụ ezigbo achịcha dị larịị nke yiri crepe nke a na-ejikarị ngwakọta yabasị, galik, tomato, ose na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọ na-ewu ewu na mpaghara niile nke Algeria, gụnyere mpaghara ndịda dịka Ouargla, Ghardaia, na Tamanrasset
Ọ bụ otu n'ime nri ndị dị mkpa a na-enye na nri okporo ámá n’ obodo Algeria
Mahdijouba, nke pụtara 'ekpuchi' maobụ 'ekpuchi ekpuchi' na Darja Algeria, sitere na ndịda Algeria Biskra, Touggourt
Ọ bụ ụdị akwụkwọ nri jupụtara na M'semen, achịcha ọdịnaala nke North Afrika
Mahi Binebine bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ
A mụrụ ya na Marrakech na 1959
Binebine edeela akwụkwọ akụkọ isii nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ dị iche iche
A mụrụ ya na 1959 na Marrakech
Mahi Binebine kwagara na Paris na 1980 iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ, nke ọ kụziri ruo afọ asatọ
O tinyeziri onwe ya n'ide ihe na eserese
O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ iri na abụọ
Ọ kwagara New York site na 1994 ruo 1999
Ihe osise ya bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na Guggenheim Museum na New York
Ọ laghachiri Marrakech na 2002 ebe ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
Na 'Mamaya's Last Journey' onye edemede ahụ na-esite na ihe omume sitere na akụkọ ezinụlọ ya
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Aziz bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eto eto sonyere na atụmatụ iwepu Eze Hassan nke Abụọ n'ike na 1971
Atụmatụ a dara mba
Ruo afọ iri na asatọ, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ogige ọzara nke Tazmamart, n'okpuru ọnọdụ nke obi ọjọọ a na-apụghị ichetụ n'echiche na nke a na-apụghị ịkọwa akọwa
N'ime ndị mkpọrọ iri ise na isii, naanị ọkara lanarịrị; n'etiti ha, Aziz Binebine
Onye edemede Mahi Binebine bụ Tahar Ben Jelloun weere akụkọ a dị ka ihe ndabere maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ This Blinding Absence of Light
Welcome to Paradise, nsụgharị Bekee nke Cannibales (nke Lulu Norman dere) bụ nke edepụtara maka Independent Foreign Fiction Prize na 2004
Horses of God, nke Lulu Norman sụgharịkwara (nke mbụ Les étoiles de Sidi Moumen), edepụtara ya maka onyinye akwụkwọ kacha mma a sụgharịrị na 2014

Emere ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri na Morocco n'afọ 2011, nke a na-akpọ Horses of God, nke Nabil Ayouch duziri ma họrọ ya maka ntinye akwụkwọ Morocco maka ihe nkiri asụsụ mba ọzọ kachasị mma maka 2013 Oscars
N'afọ 2020, Mahi ritere ihe nrite Mediterranean maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya 'Rue du pardon'

Mahieddine Bachtarzi (15 Disemba 1897 6 Febụwarị 1986) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu opera (tenor), onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye nduzi nke TNA (Théâtre National Algérien)
Ọ bụkwa onye dere ihe dị ka ọrụ egwu narị anọ, na ọrụ nke gafere ihe karịrị afọ iri asaa, na-enweta ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ n'oge ndụ ya niile
A mụrụ Mahieddine Bachtarzi na 15 Disemba 1897 na Casbah nke Algiers, Algeria n'ime ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya nke sitere na Turkey
N'ịga ọmụmụ ihe Alakụba na Medersa Ben Osman Sheikh, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, e nyere ya ọrụ, n'ihi ogo olu ya pụrụ iche, dị ka onye na-agụ Koran na Great Mosque nke Algiers
Otú ọ dị, na-ahọrọ ihe ngosi karịa ịdị arọ nke ụlọ ekpere, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ alakụba ahụ ngwa ngwa iji lekwasị anya naanị n'ịbụ abụ
N'afọ 1925, ndị nta akụkọ France toro ya dị ka onye yiri Caruso na North Africa, na 1926 ọ meghere ụlọ alakụba Paris ọhụrụ na oku mbụ maka ekpere
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1930, o guzobere otu egwu nke ya nke na-ahụ maka ịgwakọta egwu North Africa na ihe nkiri a ma ama
Na-agwakọta French na Arabic a na-asụ, abụ ya nwere nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị doro anya nke mere ka a machibido otu nchịkọta iwu na 1937 maka mmetụta na-emegide French

Ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, ọ nọ n'etiti ihe omume nka dị iche iche nke ọ sonyere n'ọhịa nke ịbụ abụ, egwu na ihe nkiri, ndị ntụgharị, ọnọdụ ihe onwunwe (ọnụ ụlọ, ịchọ mma na nhazi) na ịhazi njem mpaghara na mba ofesi
Bachtarzi nwụrụ na 6 Febụwarị 1986
A gbanwere aha ụlọ ihe nkiri Mahieddine Bachtazi, nke a maara dị ka Algiers Opera House, iji cheta ya
Mat Mahjong nke a makwaara ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka mat nke oge okpomọkụ bụ mat nke oge ọkọchị nke a na-eji eme ihe n'Eshia
A na-eme ya site na obere iberibe achara e kewara n'etiti onwe lekwasịrị ụmụ ndị ogbi ekewa nke na-enyere aka belata okpomọkụ ahụ ma melite ntụsara ahụ n'oge ụra
A maara mat mahjong ya n'asụsụ Chinese dị ka liangxi (凉席) nke a na-akpa n'ụzọ nkịtị, nke a na'asụgharịkarị dị ka mat ihi ụra n'oge ochie nakwa ike ọkọchị
Mahjong mat bụ aha e nyere ya site na njikọ ndị mmadụ n'ihe dika ya na tebụl Mahjong eji eme egwuregwu ọdịnala na ímé ihe nọr na ndị China nwere ike otu aha ahụ
A na-eji ọtụtụ narị obere tebụl achara eme ihe dị ka tebụl Ụbọchị ndị Nne Nna pụrụ isi dị otú ahụ ka ndị ọzọ Mahjong site na egwuregwu tebụl nke e mepụtara na narị afọ okuku n'oge nke 19 na China
Thomas Taylor Meadows kwuru banyere ihe ndina ndị a n'oge ọkọchị n'akwụkwọ njem ya n'afọ 1856
Na Korea, àkwà oge okpomọkụ bụ àkwà kachasị mma na nke kachasị mkpa nke ndị mmadụ ji mee ihe na narị afọ nke 19
A na-eji osisi pine na achara eme ya
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti na ngwụcha afọ 1990, Mahjong mats nọ n'ọkwa ha
China nwere ihe dị ka usoro mmepụta 1000 na-arụ ọrụ zuru oke n'ọtụtụ ebe na-emepụta achara na China
Bamboo summer mats bụ otu n'ime ụdị asaa nke ngwaahịa achara nke gọọmentị Kọmunist nke China depụtara iji kwalite ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1997

Otú ọ dị, na ngwụcha afọ 1990 na mmalite afọ 2000, ka ihe ndina ụfụfụ nke oge a na-emepe emepe, na ikuku oyi na-aghọ ihe a na-ahụkarị dị ka usoro ịjụ oyi, ewu ewu nke mahjong bamboo mats dara nke ukwuu
A na-eji achara dịgasị iche iche eme ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na Mahjong dabere na nnweta na mpaghara mmepụta
Na Vietnam, a na-eji Dendrocalamus barbatus eme ihe ndina
N'adịghị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, ihe na-atọ ụtọ na-ewu ewu ma n'oge mmiri ozuzo ma n'ozuzu okpomọkụ na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia n'ihi na ha anaghị amị mmiri ma nwee ike ịjụ oyi
N'ịbụ ndị a na-afụkọta n'ụzọ dị mfe maka nchekwa, nhicha ha dịkwa mfe n'ihi na enwere ike iji ákwà mmiri kpochaa ya
Na China, a na-azakarị mat mahjong na ọnụahịa dị ọnụ ala na mbido oge okpomọkụ ma tụfuo ya dị ka ihe mkpofu na ngwụcha oge okpompe ka ha na-ehi ụra ozugbo
N'ezie, a na-ewere mat mahjong dị ka ụdị mat ihi ụra nke nwere ikike okpomọkụ kachasị elu
Nnukwu ikike okpomọkụ pụtara na otu ihe nwere ike inyere aka ịmịkọrọ okpomọkụ, yabụ ọ bụrụ na okpomọkụ mbụ nke mat dị ala karịa okpomọkụ nke elu ahụ mmadụ, ihi ụra na mat bamboo ga-adị jụụ
Otú ọ dị, ihe ndina mahjong nwekwara ikuku na-adịghị mma, ike dị elu, ha na-agbaji n'ụzọ dị mfe mgbe ihe ndina na-adịghị nhata
Mkpụrụ osisi bamboo nwere usoro spray nwekwara ike ịkpata ọrịa akpụkpọ ahụ
Àtụ Bedding
Mahjoub Sharif (1 Jenụwarị 1948 2 Eprel 2014), amụrụ dị ka Mahjoub Muhammad Sharif Muhammad, bụ onye mba Sudan na-ede uri, onye nkuzi na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ

A maara ya na Sudan na mba ndị ọzọ na-asụ Arabụ maka uri mkparịta ụka ya na ntinye aka ọha na eze ya, ha abụọ na-agba mbọ ịkwalite ihe kpatara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, nnwere onwe, ọdịmma n'ozuzu na njirimara mba
Ndị egwu a ma ama, dị ka Mohammed Wardi na Mohamed Mounir, tinyere uri ya n'egwú, mana ọ mekwara ka a tụọ ya mkpọrọ ugboro ugboro n'okpuru gọọmentị Sudan dị iche iche
A mụrụ Mahjoub Sharif n'ime ime obodo n'ezinụlọ ndị na-ere ahịa ma nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Omdurman, mgbe ọ na-eleta ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'obodo Arabụ
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ezinụlọ ya wee zụọ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Maridi Instituutu fọ Tịịchasị na Khartoum; mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ọtụtụ afọ ọrụ ya
N'ihi uri ya na-akatọ ọchịchị Gaafar Nimeiry, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ na nke mbụ ya na 1971, ọtụtụ oge n'ụlọ mkpọrọ sochiri ya n'ime afọ 1970, 1980 na 1990
A na-ejikọkwa nke a na nkwụsịtụ ugboro ugboro site na ọrụ ọha na eze na ikike dị mkpirikpi iji gaa n'ihu mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Ọrụ Mahjoub Sharif bụ uri sitere na abụ ụmụaka dị mkpirikpi ruo ogologo abụ mgbanwe
O dekwara egwuregwu na akụkọ mkpirikpi maka ụmụaka, otu n'ime ha bụ nke e bipụtara n'asụsụ Dutch, French na Bekee (lee mbipụta)
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ nsụgharị na-enweghị ikike dị, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ dịghị ihe odide Mahjoub Sharif dị na Bekee ma ọ bụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ

A na-eji ngwakọta nke okwu mkparịta ụka, ihe mara mma, ihe na-atọ ọchị, ma na-ejikwa ike na-etinye aka nke mere ka a kpọọ ya 'abụ uri na-agwakọta 'ihe ndị a hụrụ na ndụ kwa ụbọchị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na abụ ịhụnanya na uri maka ụmụaka'
A na-egosikarị ụdị abụ ya na uri a na ngwaọrụ nchebe nke ọchịchị mmegbu
N'ihi ya, asụsụ uri ya nyekwara onwe ya iji kwupụta echiche karịrị okwu gọọmentị, dịka ọmụmaatụ n'oge nkewa nke ugwu na South Sudan, nke e ji ibu iro dị iche iche mara
Mahjoub Sharif kwusiri ike mmetụta nke mwute, ohere efu na nghọta nke ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na mba abụọ ahụ

Maka onye otu Rift Valley Institute Magdi El Gizouli, ojiji a nke asụsụ ya ruru n'ókè nke na 'ikike pụrụ iche iche iche iche n'echiche ọdịnihu ọzọ na akara ọkụ, nke dabara adaba ọbụna maka ntụrụndụ ụmụaka' mere 'akụkụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ nke ọgbakọ ndị mmegide mgbe ọ bụla ohere kwere'
Mkpọrọ a na-atụ Mahjoub Sharif ugboro ugboro n'okpuru Gaafar Nimeiri na mgbe ahụ n'okpuru Omar al-Bashir dọtara uche Amnesty International na mgbe e mesịrị Afrịka Watch / Human Rights Watch

Karịsịa Amnesty International anọgidewo na-enwe mmasị na ikpe ahụ ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, site na akụkọ mbụ na 1980, n'ime mkpọsa 1990 iji zigara ya kaadị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, nke ọ natara ihe dị ka 2,000, na mmemme ekele nke Mahjoub Sharif haziri na London n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, mgbe o zighachiri akwụkwọ ozi na adreesị dịnụ

Kemgbe afọ 2004, Mahjoub Sharif anọwo na-arịa ọrịa idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, nke sitere na mmebi nke oge ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ kpatara ma bụrụ nke ọrịa shuga nke ụdị 2 mere ka ọ dịkwuo mgbagwoju anya
Ọ nwụrụ na 2 Eprel 2014 n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Omdurman ma lie ya n'ebe ili ozu Ahmed Sharfi n'otu obodo ahụ
Al-Soumbulayya (Mkpụrụ ọka dị obere)
Azza Publishing House, Khartoum, 1998
(N'asụsụ Arabic)
Zeinab na osisi mango
Abd al-Karim Mirghani Cultural Center, nke e bipụtara na Cairo, 1999
(Original Arabic, bipụtara na Dutch, French na Bekee)
Mahmood Ali-Balogun bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye ọrụ omenala na onye isi njikwa Brickwall Communications Limited
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite ' Tango With Me '
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Audio Visual Rights Society (AVRS) nke Nigeria (2)
Amụrụ Mahmood Ali-Balogun n'abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Julaị , 1959 ma tolite na ugwu Nigeria
Ọ bụ Alumnus nke University of Ife, akpọrọ ugbu a Obafemi Awolowo University ebe ọ gụrụ Dramatic Arts nke ọkachamara kpọmkwem ya bụ na mmepụta fim na telivishọn

Ọrụ Mahmood etolitela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ site na ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ruo onye ntụzi aka, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye ana ajụta ese ihe gbasara ihe nkiri na onye nnọchi anya na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme fim
Syed Sultan Mahmoodullah Shah Hussaini (nwụrụ n'afọ 1894 OA), nke a makwaara dị ka 'Shah ji', bụ onye Sufi Muslim a ma ama, onye nsọ na ọkà mmụta nke Quadri, Chisti order si na mpaghara India
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Kurnool
Onye na-eso ụzọ ya a ma ama na onye nọchiri ya n'ụzọ ime mmụọ bụ Machiliwale Shah, onye n'aka nke ya ghọrọ nna ukwu ime mmụọ nke onye nsọ Sufi a ma ama n'India

Syed Sultan Mahmoodullah Shah Hussaini bụ nwa akwụkwọ ime mmụọ (murid ma ọ bụ onye na-eso ụzọ) nke onye sufi a ma ama bụ Shaikh Syed Burhanuddin Haqqani Haqnuma (onye ili ya dị na Trunk Road, Rayachoti, Kadapa district nke Andhra Pradesh)
Ọ nọrọ na Secunderabad na Hyderabad ọtụtụ afọ
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta nke obodo ejima mụtara mgbagwoju anya nke Tauheed na Tasawwuf site n'aka ya
Ọ malitere Shah Kamalullah nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Machiliwale Shah na tasawwuf ma mee ya onye nọchiri ya n'ụzọ ime mmụọ (Janasheen-e-Silisa)
Ọ nwụrụ na 6th Zilhajja, 1311 AH kwekọrọ na 1894 OA
Mazar ya (ili) dị na Takia Munnamiya, n'akụkụ Osmania General Hospital, Afzalgunj, Hyderabad
Onye nọchiri ya ugbu a bụ Moulana Ghousavi Shah (Onye odeakwụkwọ nile The Conference of World Religions & President All India Muslim Conference) na-ahazi Urs kwa afọ na 29th Rabi-us-sani kwa afọ
Mahmoud Abdel Aziz (Arabic; 4 June 1946 - 12 November 2016) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn

Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọtụtụ ọrụ a ma ama na ihe nkiri Egypt, tupu ọ bụrụ onye a ma ma ama n'ala nna ya bụ Egypt na mpaghara ahụ dum maka ọrụ ịhụ mba n'anya ya n'Ijipt na usoro ihe nkiri TV Egypt Raafat el-Hagan
Egyptian Actors Guild mara ọkwa ọnwụ ya n'abalị nke 12 Nọvemba afọ 2016
A mụrụ Mahmoud Abdel Aziz na Wardeyan, mpaghara dị na Alexandria, Ijipt n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-amụ sayensị ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum Alexandria, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ya site na ihe nkiri mahadum

Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya site n'ịrụ ọrụ na Al Dawama TV show n'etiti afọ 1970 ya na Nelly na Mahmoud Yacine, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ banyere na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na nke mbụ ya site na Al Hafeez ihe nkiri Egypt niile
Mahmoud Abdel Aziz pụtara na ihe nkiri iri abụọ na ise n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980; mgbe ewu ewu ya na-abawanye nke ukwuu, ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya n'oge ahụ bụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya
Ụzọ ime ihe nkiri ya tozuru oke mgbe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị iche iche nke kpughere nkà ya n'ezie
A maara ya dịka onye maara nke ọma na ihe ọchị na ihe nkiri

Afọ 1980 gosipụtara Mahmoud Abdel Aziz dịka onye ama ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma dịka El Aar (1982) na El Kef (1985), na usoro TV dịka Raafat El-Hagan (1987) nke bụ otu n'ime ọrụ kachasị ewu ewu nke telivishọn Ijipt dabere na ezi akụkọ nke onye nledo Ijipt a ma ama Refaat Al-Gammal onye a kụrụ n'Izrel ihe karịrị afọ 20 tupu na mgbe Agha Ụbọchị Isii gasịrị
Mahmoud Abdel Aziz emeela ihe nkiri ihe karịrị 100 ma ọ ka na-eju ndị na-ege ya ntị anya na ọrụ ndị dịka Bab El Khalk (2012) TV Series mgbe afọ 7 nke enweghị na telivishọn Ijipt
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ
Nke mbụ na Jelan na ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Mohamed Mahmoud Abdel Aziz, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, na Karim Mahmoud abdel Aziz
Mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ha gasịrị, ọ lụrụ onye Ijipt, Poussy Chalabi
Nwa nwanne ya nwoke Kato Hafez bụ onye na-emepụta egwu dịka onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu
A maara ya nke ọma n'egwuregwu egwú Arab nke Ijipt
Mahmoud Ben Mahmoud (amụrụ na 1947, Tunis) bụ onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Tunisia
A mụrụ Mahmoud na 1947 na Tunis, Tunisia, n'ezinụlọ sitere na Turkey nke biri na Tunisia na 1710
Nna ya bụ onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe na onye na-ese ihe na odee, nke, ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ, metụtara àgwà nke Mahmoud mgbe ọ na-eto eto
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri INSAS Belgian ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mpaghara ihe nkiri
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, nkà mmụta ihe ochie na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Free nke Brussels (ULB)
Ọmụmụ ihe ndị a nyere ya ọzụzụ siri ike iji chee ihu n'ọrụ ihe nkiri

O bu ụzọ gbalịa ime ya dị ka onye na-ede ihe nkiri site na isonye na edemede nke ihe nkiri abụọ The Son of Amr's death (Le Fils d'Amr est mort) nke Jean-Jacques Andrien na Kfar Kassem nke Borhane Alaoui
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Mahmoud mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya Crossings (Traversées) na 1982
A họọrọ ihe nkiri nke abụọ ya, nke e wepụtara na 1992, Chichkhan, Diamond Dust (Chichkhan, poussière de diamant) maka Directors' Fortnight na Cannes Film Festival

Mahmoud ewepụtakwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'etiti afọ 1992 na 2006, dị ka Italiani dell'altra riva (1992), Anastasia de Bizerte (1996), Albert Samama-Chikli (1996), Ennejma Ezzahra (1998), The Thousand and One Voices (2001), Fadhel Jaibi, a Theatre in Freedom (2003) na The Beys of Tunis, a colonial monarchy in turmente (Les Beys de Tunis, une monarchie dans la tourmente) 2006
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ ka na-aga n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ndị gosipụtara ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ọrụ ihe nkiri, dị ka Naps grenadines nke e wepụtara na 2003
Mahmoud Hemida (Arabic; a mụrụ na Disemba 7, 1953, na Cairo) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe

Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Mahmoud malitere site na arụmọrụ na telivishọn n'afọ 1986, ọ natara ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro TV site n'aka onye nduzi Ahmed Khadr, ebe ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ndị nwere mmasị na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Egypt masịrị arụmọrụ ya

Mgbe ahụ, o sonyere na usoro (Harat Al Shurafa) na (Al Wassiyah) na (Abyad W Eswed) n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar n'afọ 1989, arụmọrụ ya na usoro ikpeazụ ahụ nwetara otuto na otuto maka nkà ya ma gosipụta mmalite nke ịrị elu ya dịka kpakpando
Mmalite nke ọrụ ihe nkiri Mahmoud malitere site na ịrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'akụkụ Ahmed Zaki na ihe nkiri (Al Embrator) n'afọ 1990
Mahmoud guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke wepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Á Á Á Ájá Al Shayytan Ájá
Mahmoud guzobere magazin (ntụrụndụ) nke akpọrọ ŌAl Fann Al Sabeaaʹ nke bụ magazin Arabic mbụ, ihe nkiri, nke e biri ebi ka ọ bụrụ nke pụrụ iche na ụlọ ọrụ Cinema na Middle East
N'afọ 1996, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Albatrik, maka mmepụta nka na ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mepụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ha n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke ya, na ụfọdụ n'etiti ha dịka ndị isi mmepụta maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere 'El-Momthel' Studio site n'enyemaka nke ndị ọkachamara maka ọzụzụ na ịkwado nkà ọhụrụ
(Wazir el Dakhlia)
Mahmoud Kabil (Arabic , a mụrụ na Mee 19, 1946) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya UNICEF Goodwill maka Middle East na North Africa
Kabil jere ozi dịka onye isi na ndị agha nke ndị agha pụrụ iche nke Egypt tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-ekwe nkwa na ihe nkiri Ijipt n'oge afọ 1970
N'ịbụ onye e depụtara n'afọ 1980, Kabil kwagara na United States ma were afọ iri na anọ n'ime ihe nkiri

Ọ laghachiri n'ụzọ gara nke ọma mgbe ọ laghachiri Egypt n'afọ 1993, ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 50 na usoro TV n'ụzọ ọ ga-aghọ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na Egypt
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke itinye aka na United Nations gasịrị, a kpọrọ Kabil onye nnọchi anya UNICEF Goodwill n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2003
A mụrụ Mahmoud Kabil na Cairo, Egypt
Nna ya, Dr
Ibrahim Kabil, bụ onye isi nke ọrụ ego n'ime obodo na Alexandria na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ yana Minista na-ahụ maka ego na ọchịchị onyinyo nke ndị Saadi na-emegide ya tupu nnupụisi nke afọ 1952
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1959, Mahmoud dị afọ iri na abụọ
Kabil gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lycee Francais nke Alexandria tupu ọ banye n'usuu ndị agha nke Egypt n'afọ 1964 mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
N'ịbụ onye jere ozi ruo afọ 1973 dịka onye isi na onye isi na ndị agha pụrụ iche, Kabil sonyere na Agha Yemen, Agha Ụbọchị Isii, na Agha Attrition
Tupu mkpebi ya ịbanye, onye nduzi Youssef Chahine bịakwutere Kabil banyere ime otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Kabil jụrụ onyinye ahụ n'oge ahụ, ọ ga-emecha mezigharịa mmekọrịta ya na Chahine mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha
Chahine, onye a na-ekwu na ọ malitere ọrụ Omar Sharif, weere Kabil n'okpuru nku ya wee guzobe ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eto eto na-ekwe nkwa na ihe nkiri Egypt n'oge afọ 1970
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama nke Kabil n'oge a gụnyere Chahine's The Sparrow, Love Under the Rain (dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Naguib Mahfouz), na The Damned (nke King Lear)
Mahmoud Larnaout (1945-December 25, 2012) bụ onye obodo Tunisia na-eme ihe ọchị
A mụrụ ya na Tunis, Larnaout bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Bab Souika nke Tunis, ọ malitere na ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum
Ebe ọ sonyeere ndị otu El Teatro nke Taoufik Jebali, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu dịka Present by proxy, The Plank of Miracles, Al-Ghoul, yana Klem Ellil na Fhemt Ella nke Taoufica Jebali
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ndị ntorobịa na, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, Raouf Basti, RaouF Ben Amor, na Raja Farhat
O mekwara ihe nkiri dị iche iche - gụnyere Making of nke Nouri Bouzid na usoro telivishọn, gụnyere Dar Lekhlaa na Njoum Ellil
Larnaout bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Le Mondial n' obodo Tunis, na ikike a ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nhazi nke Carthage Film Festival ọtụtụ ugboro
N'akụkụ ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ya, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-echekwa ego
Mahmoud Mukhtar ( Arabic ) (Mee 10, 1891 ruo Maachị 28, 1934) bụ onye Ijipt na-akpụ ihe
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Fine Arts na Cairo mgbe Prince Yusuf Kamal meghere ya n'afọ 1908, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke 'Pioneers' mbụ nke mmegharị nka nke Ijipt
N'agbanyeghị ọnwụ ya n'oge, o nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmezu na nhazi nke nka Ijipt nke oge a
A na-ekwenye na ọrụ ya na-egosi mmalite nke mmegharị oge a nke ndị Ijipt, a na-akpọkarị ya nna nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Ijipt nke oge a
A mụrụ ya na Delta Nile n'otu obere obodo a na-akpọ Douar skouila, na mpaghara Mahalla al-Kubra, n'obodo Tanbara, ebe nna ya bụ onye isi obodo ('Omda)
Mukhtar kwagara Cairo mgbe ọ bụ nwata ya na nne ya, na 1908 sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ Egypt School of Fine Arts
N'afọ 1912, ọ sonyeere studio nke Jules Coutan na École des Beaux-Arts na Paris
Ọ nọrọ na Paris site na Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ, emesịa bụrụ onye ọrụ na Musée Grévin n'okpuru nduzi nke onye nkụzi ya mbụ bụ Guillaume Laplagne
N'ike mmụọ nsọ nke mgbanwe ndị Ijipt nke 1919 ọ kpụrụ obere maquette nke ọrụ a na-akpọ 'Nadhat Misr' ['Egypt's Awakening' ma ọ bụ 'Egypt's Renaissance' na Bekee)

N'inweta nlebara anya nke ndị na-eto eto na-eme mgbanwe n'Ijipt, a malitere mkpọsa mba iji wuo nsụgharị dị egwu, nke mere ka e nwee emume ikpughe ọrụ ahụ na Cairo's Bab al-Hadid Square n'èzí isi ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Cairo
E mechara kwaga ihe oyiyi ahụ n'otu ebe dị na mpụga Mahadum Cairo
Mukhtar Museum dị na Cairo nwere ọrụ Mahmoud Mokhtar na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
Otu Google Doodle na 10 Mee afọ 2012 mere ncheta ọmụmụ Mokhtar nke afọ 121
Mahmoud Sehili (27 Julaị 1931 - 10 Ọktoba 2015) bụ onye Tunisia na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Sehili na Tunis; nna ya bụ onye ọkụ azụ ebe nne ya bụ onye na-achọ mma
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka egwu ma mụta oud
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tunis Institute of Fine Arts site na 1949 ruo 1952, ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts site na 1953 ruo 1960
Prọfesọ ya bụ Raymond Legueult
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tunisia, ọ kwadoro ogbako ma nye nkuzi na School of Fine Arts nke Tunis site na 1960 ruo 1980
Mahmoud Shokoko (Arabic; 1 Mee 1912 -12 Febụwarị 1985) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ya 'Aragouzsho'
A mụrụ ya na Mee 1, 1912
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka ọkwá nkà na nna ya ma soro ya na-arụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ
Shokoko sonyeere ụfọdụ ndị agha na-eme ihe nkiri na Iraq nke na-eme na ụlọ ahịa kọfị na-eche ụlọ ọrụ nna ya ihu mgbe ọ nwere oge ezumike
Ihe malitere na mbụ dịka ihe ntụrụndụ ghọrọ ihe na-atọ ụtọ, na-amalite ime ihe na agbamakwụkwọ nakwa n'òtù ndị ọzọ dị ka 'Hassan 2 Al-Maghrabi' na 'Mohammed 6'
Site n'ebe ahụ gaa n'ihu, ọ malitere inweta aha ọjọọ gburugburu ụwa
E wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Al-Sabr Tayeb, na June 13, 1959 ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke Google doodle maka Google Middle East na 1 Mee 2014
Mahmoud Tounsi (13 Disemba 1944, na Menzel Temime - 12 Eprel 2001, na Menzel temime) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe na Tunisia
A mụrụ Tounsi na Disemba 13, 1944 na Menzel Temime
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'obodo ya wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tunis tupu ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Tunis Institute of Fine Arts ebe onye a ma ama na-ese ihe Abdelaziz Gorgi bụ prọfesọ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Radio Tunis na Tunis 7, ọ kụziri nka mara mma na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Menzel Temime
Mgbe ọ nwetasiri ọrụ ndị dị n'elu, Tounsi ghọrọ onye isi obodo Menzel Temime
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2001, mgbe ọ na-aga na Ministry of Culture nke Tunisia iji tụọ aro ka e mepụta ụlọ ihe nkiri, Tounsi nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na isii
Ọrụ edemede Tounsi, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịgasị iche (abụ, akụkọ mkpirikpi, isiokwu na ọmụmụ ndị ọkachamara na eserese) nwere oke
Otú ọ dị, dị ka Dictionary of Tunisian Writers si kwuo, ọrụ ya dị mkpa na akụkọ ọdịbendị Tunisia
Otu n'ime ihe odide ya a ma ama bụ Espace, nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi e bipụtara n'afọ 1973 na nke meghere ụzọ maka mmegharị avant-garde
Tounsi bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere National Council for Freedoms, nke dugara n'ịmepụta Njikọ Tunisian nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ
O mechara guzobe ọrụ ise ihe nke kpuchiri ihe odide ya n'ihe gbasara ihe ịga nke ọma
Mahmoud Yassin (Arabic; 19 Febụwarị 1941 -14 Ọktoba 2020) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe ejije na telivishọn nke Egypt, na-egosipụta ọrụ dị egwu, nke uche na nke ịhụnanya
Yassin gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Ain Shams n'afọ 1964, mgbe ahụ ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1968, ebe o mere ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 150 na ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Grandpa Habibi na 2012
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Shahira n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1970, ya na ya mụrụ Rania (b
1972) na Amro (b
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-arịa ọrịa Alzheimer ruo afọ asatọ, Yassin nwụrụ na 14 Ọktoba 2020
Mahmoud Qasdy Ahmed Mourad Zulfikar (18 Febụwarị 1914 - 22 Mee 1970) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na'ede ihe nkiri, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Egypt
A họpụtara Zulfikar maka onyinye Silver Bear maka onye nduzi kachasị mma na 14th Berlin International Film Festival
A mụrụ Mahmoud Qasdy Ahmed Mourad Zulfikar n'abalị 18 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1914 na Tanta, Egypt
Nna ya, Ahmed Mourad Bek Zulfikar, jere ozi dị ka onye isi ndị uwe ojii na Ministry of Interior na nne ya Nabila Neem Zulfikara bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ

Mahmoud Zulfikar gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba injinia ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Ngalaba Design na Ministry of Works, mana mmasị ya maka azụmahịa ihe nkiri gbara ya ume ka ọ gbanwee ọrụ ma ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na'akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Zulfikar bụ onye na-ese ihe zuru oke
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'akụkọ ihe nkiri nke Egypt
Ọ malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 1940 ma duzie ihe nkiri 44 n'etiti afọ 1947 na 1970

A họpụtara ihe nkiri Zulfikar maka ọtụtụ onyinye ma na mba ma na mba ụwa, ihe nkiri ya ama ama bụ; A Girl from Palestine (1948), Akhlaq lel-Bai (1950), The Unknown Woman (1959), El Robat el Mukadass (1960), For Men Only (1964), Dearer than my Life (1965), Al Khroug Men Al Guana (1967) na Featureless Men (1972) nke a tọhapụrụ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
A na-etinye ihe nkiri Zulfikar nke 1963 Soft Hands n'ime 14th Berlin International Film Festival ma họpụta Mahmoud Zulfikir maka Silver Bear maka Onye nduzi kacha mma
Zulfikar lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Aziza Amir, ha abụọ wee nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ọ lụrụ Mariam Fakhreddine n'afọ 1952 ma nye ya ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama n'afọ ndi 1950
Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Iman
Heş bụ nwanne nwoke nke Ezz El Dine Zulfikar, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na Salah Zulfikir, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Onye na-emepụta
Zulfikar nwụrụ na mberede site na nkụchi obi mgbe ọ dị afọ 56 na 22 Mee 1970 na Cairo, Egypt
Mahmoud el-Meliguy (Egyptian Arabic, Maḥmoūd el-Meleygī; 22 Disemba 1910 - 6 June 1983) bụ onye Egypt na-ede ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, n'ekwiǹkà nkiri, na telivishọn
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ obere ọrụ, mana ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na ngwụcha afọ 1930
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na onye na-enweta ihe nrite, ọ emeela ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ọjọọ ya
El-Meliguy bụ nwa nke ezinụlọ ndị Egypt nke natara aha ya n'obodo Egypt nke Melieg na Monufia Governorate
Ọrụ ọganihu bịara mgbe Mohamed Abdel Wahab họọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Lastu Mallak (Abụghị m mmụọ ozi)
A kwụrụ ya 900 Egyptian pound ma nweta aha ọma ngwa ngwa
Ndị mmadụ toro ya maka ọrụ ọjọọ ọ rụrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ, ndị na-enyocha ihe nkiri kọwakwara ya dịka ajọ omume nke ihe nkiri
Mahmoud el-Meliguy zutere onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri Alwiya Gamil n'afọ 1938 wee lụọ ya n'afọ 1939
Ya na ya mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere mmekọrịta obi ụtọ na nke siri ike
Ha amụghị ụmụ ọnụ mana ha zụlitere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Gamal El-Din na Morsi, na nwa nwanyị, Isis, site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ Alwiya

N'afọ 1963, mgbe afọ iri abụọ na anọ nke alụmdi na nwunye ya na Alwiya Gamil gasịrị, ọ lụrụ nwanyị ọzọ, nwa agbọghọ na-eme ihe nkiri aha ya bụ Fawziyah al-Ansari, mana alụmdi na ụba ha adịteghị aka karịa ụbọchị atọ
Alwiya kwuru na ọ manyere ya ịgba ya alụkwaghịm

Mahoor Bagheri ( Persian ماهور باقری) bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agụ egwú na onye edemede pop amụrụ na Septemba 3, 1988 na Tehran
Ọ na-akpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwú ma na-etinye oge ụfọdụ n'ịkụzi egwú
Ọpụrụiche ya bụ ụbọ akwara ma bụrụkwa nka n'ụdị flamenco

`Mai Atafo bụ onye Naijiria na-akwa ákwà ejiji, amaara maka akara ya, Mai Atafo
Ọ gara Savile Row Academy nke dị na Leeds iji nweta ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-akwa ákwà
A mụrụ Atafo na Ile-Ife, Osun Steeti n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ itoolu
Ọ lụrụ Christine Atafo
Ha nwere otu nwa
Atafo, mgbe o si United Kingdom lọta n'afọ 2002 rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa dị iche iche na ngalaba ahịa na British American Tobacco Nigeria
N'afọ 2006, ọ hapụrụ Guinness Nigeria ebe ọ nọ ọdụ dị ka Brand Manager mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2010
Tupu ọ pụọ na Guinness Nigeria, Atafo malitere aha uwe 'Mai Atafo Inspired', nke nwetara nlebara anya sndị ama ama dịka Omowunmi Akinnifesi, Banky W, IK Osakioduwa na ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọdụrụ nwa oge dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ejiji maka magazin Genevieve
N'afọ 2011, Mai Atafo Inspired malitere usoro ikwa Akwa agbamakwụkwọ a na-akpọ 'Weddings by Mai'
Atafo bụ onye nduzi ncheputa echiche nke Mai Atafo Inspired
Ọ bụ onye nduzi n'echeputa maka ụzọ nweta ezi ósisa-maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Firehouse Group, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka emcee maka Miss Nigeria Pageant n'afo 2010
Atafo bụ onye isi kọmitii na-arụ ọrụ na Future Awards Central
A mara Atafo gburugburu Afrịka maka ntinye n'ihe gbasara ejiji na ụzọ oyiyi
Mai Ezz Eldin (amụrụ na 19 Jenụwarị 1980 na Abu Dhabi) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro ihe nkiri ndị dịka Love Journey na 2001, Bent benout na 2006, Ayathon na 2006, Omar & Salma na 2007, na Kheit harir na 2020
A mụrụ ya na Abu Dhabi nye nna onye Alakụba na nne onye Kraịst
Ọ biri n'ebe ahụ afọ anọ tupu ọ gaa Ijipt
Ọ biri na Alexandria ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na sociology na Mahadum Alexandria
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ihe nkiri 2001 a kpọrọ Love Journey na Mohamed Fouad nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
O nwekwara ọtụtụ ọrụ na-atọ ọchị dịka Ayathon na 2006, Shikamara na 2007, Omar & Salma na 2007, Omar& Salma 2 na 2009, Omar & Salmaa 3 na 2012 na Game Over na 2012

O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama ma ama na usoro dị ka Where is My Heart na 2002 na Yousra, The Truth and Mirage na 2003 na Fifi Abdou na Yousuf Shaaban, Interview on Live na 2004, Bent Benout na 2006, Adam na 2011 na Tamer Hosny, The Suspicion na 2013, Dalaa Albanat na 2014 na Kinda Alloush, Letters na 2018 nke o nwetara ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri site na Der guest magazine, Princess Beesa na 2019
Ọ lụbeghị di
Ya na onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Ijipt bụ Mohamed Zidan kwekọritara mana ha kewara n'afọ 2009
O kwuru na ọ bụ ezie na nne ya bụ Onye Kraịst, a zụlitere ya ikwere na Islam
Edith Mai Padmore, nke a na-akpọ Wiles (Ọgọst 20, na afọ 1916 na Julaị 3, na afọ 1988) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Liberia
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eje ozi na Liberia mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ahụike na ọdịmma n'afọ 1972
A mụrụ Mai Wiles na Ọgọst 20, na afọ 1916, na Monrovia
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Richard Wiles, Onye isi oche nke House of Representatives of Liberia, na Mai Grimes, nwanne nwanyị Louis Arthur Grimes, Onye isi ikpe nke Liberia
Nne nna ya bụ Vai na nne na nna nna ya ndị ọzọ si West Indies
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Trinity Parish School na College of West Africa, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'elu klas ya na afọ 1934 ma ọ bụ afọ 1935
Ọ kụziri ihe otu afọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ zụchara ọzụzụ na Eugenia Simpson Cooper Secretarial School, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke Onye isi ala Edwin J
Barclay
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1939, ọ lụrụ onye ga-abụ onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ bụ George A
Padmore
Site na afọ 1940 ruo na afọ 1950 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ onye isi njikwa nke Firestone Plantation Company
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Onye isi ala Tubman site na afọ 1951 ruo afọ 1955
N'afọ 1956, ọ sonyeere di ya na United States, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya
O nyere aka hazie Nzukọ Saniquellie nke afọ 1959 na Nzukọ Monrovia nke afọ 1962 nke dugara na Organisation of African Unity
Site na afọ 1963 ruo afọ 1971 ọ bụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nke Onye isi ala Tubman
Onye isi ala William Tolbert họpụtara Padnore dị ka Minista nke Ahụike na Ahụike na Jenụwarị 11, na afọ 1972
Ọ bụ onye ozi ruo n'afọ 1973
Padmore na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Episcopal Diocese nke Liberia
Ọ nwụrụ na Julaị 3, na afọ 1988
Maiduguri bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Maiduguri bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Borno (Borno State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 1,035,000 (2015; e mere atụmatụ ịbụ)
Okpomọkụ na mmiri ozuzo nke Maiduguri
Maiha bụ obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nke Adamawa Steeti, Naịjirịa, n'akụkụ okeala ya na CameroonÀtụ LGAs and communities of Adamawa State
Maria (Maikki) Elisabeth Friberg (1861 Xi 1927) bụ onye nkuzi Finland, onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ maka udo

A na-echeta ya maka itinye aka na òtù ụmụ nwanyị Finland, ọkachasị dịka onyeisi oche nke otu na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị Finland Suomen Naisyhdistys na dịka onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị Naisten Ääni (Women's Voice)
Ọ gara ọtụtụ ebe, na-akwalite nghọta nke Finland na mba ofesi mgbe ọ na-ekere òkè na nzukọ mba ụwa ma na-enye aka na ndị nta akụkọ mba ọzọ
Amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 5 Jenụwarị 1861 na Kankaanpää, Maria Elisabeth Friberg bụ nwa nwanyị nke Karl Arvid Friberg na Fanny Adelaide Boijer
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị n'oge, nne ya na ụmụ ya kwagara Tammerfors ebe ọ mepere ụlọ ndị ọbịa
Friberg gara Swedish School for Women na Helsinki ebe ọ debara aha ya na klas ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi
N'afọ 1883, Friberg nwetara ọkwa nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị mmadụ nke Helsinki nke o nwere ruo n'afọ 1912
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Berlin na Zurich, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Bern n'afọ 1897 na thesis na iwu obodo Nordic
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara nkuzi gbasara akụ na ụba na Mahadum Brussels, na-asụ German, French na Bekee nke ọma
Ruo n'afọ 1906, ọ na-eme njem ọmụmụ ugboro ugboro gburugburu Europe, na-eme ka ahụmịhe ya nke usoro nkuzi dịkwuo mma
Ọ makwaara ndị Scandinavia ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị Denmark
Mgbe ọ na-eme njem n'afọ 1906, Friberg malitere inwe mmasị n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị, na-aga mgbakọ na mgbakọ dị iche iche, ebe ọ na-anọchite anya Kvinnosaksförbundet Unionen (Union Women's Association)
N'afọ 1906, na nzukọ International Alliance of Women na Copenhagen, a nabatara echiche ya banyere ikike ịtụ vootu dịka ụmụ nwanyị Finland nwetara ikike ịtụ voolu n'afọ ahụ
N'oge a, ọ nwere mmasị karịsịa na pacifism na temperance

Ka o sina dị, ọ gara n'ihu na-agbasa ihe ọmụma banyere Finland, na-ekwu okwu banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ Finnish na Sami na Germany, Austria na Denmark, gụnyere iwu gọọmentị Russia nke igbochi nnwere onwe Finland

Site na afọ 30 nke ahụmịhe nkuzi sara mbara, n'afọ 1912 Friberg tinyere akwụkwọ maka ọkwa osote onye nyocha nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Helsinki Folk mana e nyere Guss Mattsson nke Helsinki City Council nhọpụta ahụ, ikike na-ahazi nhọpụta ahụ
O were ya iwe nke ukwuu nke na o kpebiri ịhapụ izi ihe, na-ahọrọ itinye oge ya na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị

Onye otu Finnish Women's Association site n'afọ 1889, na-eje ozi na bọọdụ site n'afọ 1907 ruo afọ 1924, na nke Union Association, nke o guzobere na 1892 ma bụrụ onyeisi oche site n'afọ 1920 ruo afọ 1927, Friberg na-arụkwa ọrụ na njikọ udo nke Finland Finlands Fredsförbund
O nyekwara edemede na akwụkwọ akụkọ Finnish na nke mba ọzọ ma guzobe magazin nke ya Naisten 25 3ni (Women's Voice) n'afọ 1905 nke ọ dezigharịrị ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
N'afọ 1909 na Naisten 25 3ni, o bipụtara akụkọ banyere nzukọ International Alliance of Women na London
Hajiya Maimuna Usman Adaji ma ọ bụ Maimunat Adaji (c1957 2019) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
A họpụtara ya na mbụ na House of Representatives n'afọ 2003
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na afọ 2011 maka All Nigeria Peoples Party
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ ma bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Republic nke anọ nke Naịjirịa
Adaji biri na Kaduna maka akụkụ ka mma nke ndụ ya onye nọchitere anya mpaghara Baruten / Kaiama n'etiti afọ 2003 na afọ 2011
A họpụtara ya na mbụ na House of Representatives n'afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye otu All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) bụ onye meriri ntuli aka ya na mpaghara People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Adaji jere ozi dị ka osote onyeisi oche nke kọmitii nke ihie dị n'ime nke Ọdịda anyanwụ
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ
Ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a họpụtara n'afọ ahụ gụnyere Suleiman Oba Nimota, Folake Olunloyo, Martha Bodunrin, Betty Okogua-Apiafi, Rose Oko na Nkoyo Toyo
Adaji nwụrụ na afọ 2019 mgbe ọ dị afọ 62

Wangarĩ Muta Maathai (/ wænˈɡɑːri mɑːˈtaɪ/; 1 Eprel 1940 - 25 Septemba 2011) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ mmekọrịta gburugburu ebe obibi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya nke tọrọ ntọala Green Belt Movement, otu ọgbakọ gburugburu ebe obibi lekwasịrị anya n'ịkụ ihe ọkụkụ dika osisi, nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi, na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Na 2004 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Afrika mbụ nwetara ihe Nrite Nobel Peace Prize
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na United States, nweta nzere bachelọ na Mount St
Scholastica na nzere Master na Mahadum Pittsburgh
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na East na Central Africa ghọrọ Dọkịta nke Philosophy, na-enweta PhD na Mahadum Nairobi dị na Kenya
N'afọ 1984, e nyere ya onyinye ihe nrite nke ziri ezi maka 'ịtụgharị arụmụka gburugburu ebe obibi Kenya ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ọrụ maka mkpụgharị ọhịa'
Mgbanwe ihu igwe na Naịjirịa pụtara ìhè site na mmụba okpomọkụ, mgbanwe mmiri ozuzo (mmụba mmiri ozuzo na mpaghara ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mbelata mmiri ozuzo n'ógbè kọntinent)
Ọ na-egosipụtakwa ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, ọzara, ịrị elu nke oke osimiri, erosion, ide mmiri, égbè eluigwe, ọkụ nke mmanụ ala, ọkụ ọhịa, mbuze ala, na ọnwụ nke ụdị dị iche iche
Ihe ndị a niile ga-anọgide na-emetụta ndụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ezie na dabere na ọnọdụ, mpaghara na-enwe mgbanwe ihu igwe na okpomọkụ dị elu n'oge ọkọchị ebe mmiri ozuzo n'oge mmiri ozuzo na-enyere aka idebe okpomọkụ na ọkwa dị nro
E nwere akụkọ ole na ole zuru oke nke na-enye ihe akaebe bara uru nke mmetụta dị iche iche nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na Naịjirịa taa
NNỌỌ!
Ị na-agụ, na-ede, na-atụgharịkwa asụsụ igbo? Anyị chọrọ enyemaka gị!

Nicomaine Dei Capili Mendoza (amuru March 3, 1995), onye amara aha ya dika Maine Mendoza, bu onye omere Filipina na agwa onyonyo
A maara ya nke ọma maka vidiyo Dubsmash viral ya na ọrụ ya dị ka Yaya Dub na ihe ngosi eziokwu ehihie rie Bulaga! ngalaba ' Kalyeserye ', nke ebugoro na GMA Network na ụwa niile site na GMA Pinoy TV
A na-akọwakarị ịrị elu ya ịbụ ama ama dị ka ihe ịtụnanya na enweghị usoro n'ihi nhazi otu ịhụnanya AlDub edeghị ede na Eat Bulaga! na Julaị 16, 2015 ebe ejikọtara ya na Alden Richards
AlDub bụ Portmanteau nke aha mbụ Richards na agwa Mendoza na 'Kalyeserye'
Agafee rie Bulaga!, Mendoza gosipụtara na ihe nkiri 2015 My Bebe Love #KiligPaMore, nke ọ meriri onye na -akwado nkwado kacha mma na 41st Metro Manila Film Festival
Ọ bụ onye isi ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri 2016 Imagine You & Me, ebe o dekwara ma bụrụ abụ isiokwu ya
Mendoza nwere mmasị maka ide ihe, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ede blọgụ ọbụna tupu ya abanye ahịa ngosi
N'October 2017, o wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ mbụ ya akpọrọ Yup, Abụ m Nwanyị ahụ, nke bụ ụdị nke blọgụ onwe ya Pessimistic Optimist Bella na-enweghị nzacha
A mụrụ Maine Mendoza na Maachị 3, 1995 na Santa Maria, Bulacan, Philippines nye Mary Ann na Teodoro Mendoza
Mary Ann bụ onye na-edekọ ego nwere ọtụtụ ọdụ mmanụ ụgbọala na Bulacan ebe Teodoro bụ onye injinia na-agba mbọ na azụmaahịa na-ewu okporo ụzọ
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Aha niile nke ụmụnne ya na-amalitekwa na 'Nico'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St
Paul College of Bocaue na Bulacan
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa isi na nkà mmụta nri na De La Salle-College of St
Benilde
O nwetara nkuzi ya na The Sagamore na Bolton Landing, New York
N'isi mmalite nke 2015, Mendoza biputere mkpokọta Dubsmash na Facebook, nke ọ ṅomiri Kris Aquino nke mere nje na otu nde nlele n'otu abalị
Nke a nwetara aha ya bụ 'Queen of Dubsmash' na Philippines

N'ikpeazụ, a tụbara ya dị ka Yaya Dub (nke a makwaara dị ka Divina Ursula Bukbukova Smash ), onye enyemaka nke Lola Nidora (nke Wally Bayola gosipụtara), na -eri Bulaga!' s 'Juan For All, All For Juan' ngalaba na nke mbụ pụtara na Julaị 4, 2015

Ejikọtara agwa ya na ngalaba ya na onye ibe ya rie Bulaga! onye na-akwado Alden Richards nke e mere na-enweghị edemede ọ bụla, na July 16, 2015, na akụkụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya-comedy sketch nke ihe nkiri a kpọrọ ' Kalyeserye' Di na nwunye a bịara mara amara dị ka AlDub, ngwakọta nke aha mbụ Richards na àgwà Mendoza na 'Kalyeserye' Njikọ ha mere ka mkpughe ha sara mbara yana mmụba ọzọ nke ọkwa TV nke Eri Bulaga! Na Nọvemba 2015, Mendoza sonyeere ndị nkedo nke Princess na Obí dị ka Chef Elize, ọdịdị mbụ ya na n'ezie
Na December 2015, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa kpakpando na TV sitcom Vampire Ang Daddy Ko na Sunday ehihie dịgasị iche iche na-egosi Sunday PinaSaya
Mendoza na Richards gbara egwu na ntinye ihe nkiri Metro Manila 2015 (MMFF) nke akpọrọ My Bebe Love #KiligPaMore yana Vic Sotto na Ai-Ai de las Alas
Jose Javier Reyes, onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri ahụ, kwadoro ntinye Mendoza na ihe nkiri ahụ
Mendoza na-egwu Anna Carillo, nwa isi ike na onye nnupụisi nke àgwà Vic Sotto
Enyere ya ihe nrite onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma site n'aka MMFF maka ọrụ ya
Na Disemba 2015, ha pụtara na azụmahịa ID ọdụ GMA Network maka ekeresimesi
N'agbanyeghị na ọ pụtara na GMA, ọ bụghị onye so na GMA Artist Center na ọrụ ya na-achịkwa Triple A, ogwe aka njikwa talent nke Antonio P
Tuviera bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na-emepụta ihe na -eri Bulaga!
Mendoza sonyeere na ihe nkiri oge Lenten nke iri Bulaga! na Maachị 2016

Ọ kwughachiri ọrụ ya dị ka Divina/Yaya Dub na Kaputol ng Buhay wee mee ihe nkiri dị ka Dani na Chukwu nyere m gị ebe ọ nwetara ihe nrite Darling of the Screen wee họpụta ya maka Performance Most Dramatic Performance site n'aka onye ndu kpakpando na eri Bulaga!' s 3rd EB Dabarkads Awards emere na Eprel 2, 2016
Mendoza na Richards gbara n'ihe nkiri Imagine You & Me dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
A gbara ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ahụ na Como, Italy

N'afọ 2017, Mendoza na Richards gbara egwu na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ha Kaara ịbụ nke Gị ebe Mendoza rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Sinag Obispo, redio DJ na mmasị ịhụnanya nke Benjie Rosales onye bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Richards rụrụ
N'October 2017, Mendoza na Richards gbara isi n'isi na Eat Bulaga! emepụtara ihe nkiri onyonyo nke akpọrọ Ịhụnanya bụ
ya na Adolf Alix Jr dịka onye isi
Kemgbe Disemba 2017, Mendoza na-apụtakarị na-arụ ọrụ ndị ọbịa dị iche iche na Daig Kayo ng Lola Ko
Mendoza na Richards emeela ọtụtụ nkwado ngwaahịa ebe Mendoza pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi n'onwe ya
Ọ pụtara dị ka nwa agbọghọ mkpuchi maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Meg na Preview maka Nọvemba 2015
Mendoza na ihe nkedo nke ' Kalyeserye ' ka e gosiri na EE! mbipụta nke November 2015
Mendoza na Richards pụtara na mkpuchi nke Reader's Digest Asia, mbipụta pụrụ iche nke EE! magazin, na Inside Showbiz na PeopleAsia na Disemba 2015
E wezụga ịbụ na mkpuchi nke PeopleAsia, Mendoza ọnụ na Richards natara ndị mmadụ nke Year award na 2016 si na magazin
N'ịkwado ịrụ ọrụ Mendoza dị ka onye na-akwado ngwaahịa, ọ ghọrọ Trinitian Awardee maka nkwado mgbasa ozi nwanyị kachasị bara uru n'oge Platinum Stallion Awards (Awards for Advertising) na 2016
Mendoza na Richards nọ na mkpuchi ọzọ nke Jenụwarị 2016 nke EE! magazin
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, di na nwunye ahụ bụ ndị mbụ showbiz ndị mmadụ rutere na mkpuchi nke BizNews Asia
Na kalenda 2016 nke Disney Channel Asia, Mendoza pụtara dị ka Elsa site na ihe nkiri Disney Frozen
Mendoza pụtara na mbipụta February 2016 nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Cosmopolitan na Richards na Esquire Philippines na Jose Manalo, Wally Bayola na Paolo Ballesteros
Na July 2016, Mendoza ya na Richards pụtara na mkpuchi nke EE! magazin nke ugboro atọ wee duru ndepụta magazin nke Kasị Mma Stars nke 2016
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Mendoza rutere na ọkwa 21st nke FHM Philippines ' 100 Sexiest Women maka 2016 dị ka ntinye ọhụrụ mgbe na July 2017, ọ rịgoro n'ogo ole na ole dị elu wee bụrụ nwanyị nke 9th sexiest
E gosikwara ya n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ Cosmopolitan Philippines pụrụ iche nke afọ 20
Dị ka Soltero Salazar nke Association of Philippine Advertisers si kwuo na June 2017, Mendoza karịrị Kris Aquino dị ka onye na-akwado ndị ama ama na Philippines
Soltero gbakwụnyere na Aquino abụrụla onye nkwado kacha elu kemgbe 1990 mana mgbe ọ hapụrụ ABS-CBN na 2017 na-eme ka a naghị ahụ ya na telivishọn, ndị mgbasa ozi họọrọ Mendoza kama
Site na nkwado ngwaahịa 30 na 2016, Mendoza ghọrọ onye nkwado kacha elu n'ihi ewu ewu ya na onyonyo mara mma

Mendoza nọ na-edebe blọgụ nkeonwe, Pessimistic Optimist Bella, kemgbe 2012 wee kpughee n'April 2017 na ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịhapụ akwụkwọ na njedebe nke 2017 na blọọgụ ya bụ otu n'ime mkpali ya na-ede akwụkwọ
Dị ka ya si kwuo, akwụkwọ ahụ, nke ga-elekwasị anya na ndụ onwe ya, agaghị enwe ndị na- ede akwụkwọ mmụọ ka ọ ga-ede akwụkwọ n'onwe ya
N'October 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ mbụ ya akpọrọ Yup, I Am That Girl bụ Summit Media bipụtara wee malite na Ọktoba 26, 2017
Aha akwụkwọ ahụ dabere na bio akaụntụ Twitter ya yana dịka nkọwa ya dị mkpirikpi si dị, ụdị blọọgụ nke ya enweghị nzacha
Mgbe ekwuwapụtachara akwụkwọ mmalite ahụ, #YupIAmThatGirl na-ewu ewu na Twitter na ndị ode akwụkwọ Lang Leav na Michael Faudet meghachiri omume nke ọma na akwụkwọ Mendoza
E rerela akwụkwọ ya n'ime naanị awa anọ ka otu ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ kwuputara na ọ dị
Mendoza tinyere aka n'ahịa nri ngwa ngwa mgbe ọ zụtara aha aha ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ America McDonald's, nke ọ kwadoro
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ya meghere na August 11, 2017 n'obodo ya, Barangay Sta
Clara, Santa Maria, Bulacan
A na-ekwu kpọmkwem ebe azụmahịa ya dị na nso ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ụgbọala nke ezinụlọ ya

N'ịbụ onye Philippines kacha googled agwa na 2015 na ọtụtụ tweeted Filipino celebrity na ụwa na 2017, Mendoza a na-ewere na nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ịntanetị na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta dịka ndị otu na-enye onyinye ghọtara, na-enweta aha ya dị ka Social Media Queen
Akpọrọkwa ya aha dị ka Kpakpando Phenomenal
N'October 2015, akaụntụ Mendoza Twitter ghọrọ profaịlụ nke na-eto ngwa ngwa nke atọ, ndị na-eso ụzọ ya mụbara ruo 1,094,813 n'ime naanị ọnwa ole na ole
N'ihi ewu ewu ya, e mebiri akaụntụ mgbasa ozi ya ugboro abụọ
Otu n'ime mbanye anataghị ikike ahụ mere na Nọvemba 2015 ebe otu ndị omekome weghaara Twitter ya bụ ndị kọwara onwe ha dị ka Anonymous Philippines
Ha biputere usoro tweet na-akwalite Million Mask March
N'agbanyeghị na ha wakporo akaụntụ ahụ, ha kwere nkwa na ha ga-eweghachi ya onye nwe ya
N'ihe na-erughị awa 24, Mendoza nwere ike ijide akaụntụ mgbasa ozi ọha ya
Mgbe usoro tweet na-agwa ndị Fans ka ha ghara ịhapụ ozi ịkpọasị, Mendoza kwụsịrị akaụntụ Twitter ya na June 2017; akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya ndị ọzọ ka na-arụ ọrụ
Na October 22, 2017, ọ megharịrị Twitter ya
E gosipụtara Mendoza n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ akụkọ telivishọn na ihe ngosi okwu na GMA Network gụnyere Kapuso Mo, Jessica Soho, CelebriTV, na N'abalị a na Arnold Clavio

Ọ pụtakwara na Lip Sync Battle Philippines site na ihe ndekọ vidiyo n'oge ihe ngosi nke anọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na March 2016 ebe o nyere ndụmọdụ-syncing egbugbere ọnụ Alden Richards bụ onye ọbịa nke ngosi ahụ

Onye na-eme ihe nkiri pụtara na usoro vignettes na-akọwa ihe ị ga-eme na ịghara ime na 2016 Philippine nhoputa ndi ochichi, dị ka akụkụ nke GMA News na Public Affairs mkpuchi nke ntuli aka nke a na-akpọ Eleksyon 2016
N'October 2016, e kpughere na Mendoza nwere ọrụ cameo na fim Enteng Kabisote 10 na Abangers

Na December 2015, Mendoza nwetara kpakpando na Philippine Walk of Fame na Eastwood City, Libis, Quezon City tinyere ya ' Kalyeserye ' co-stars na aha ya bụ ọkacha mmasị Young Actress na 5th OFW Gawad Parangal
E nyekwara Mendoza akara Makabatang Alagad ng Telebisyon (Onye na-eme enyi enyi na Television) site n'aka Anak TV na February 2016
Mendoza nwetakwara ọtụtụ ihe nrite na Nuffnang Philippines Bloggers Awards
Ọ merikwara nwanyị TV Star nke afọ na nwanyị Breakout Star of the Year maka 2016 na PEPList Awards Year 3 nke Philippine Entertainment Portal

Aside from being given accolades for her performance as an artist, as a citizen in the Philippines, the Philippine Bureau of Internal Revenue at the regional district office in Caloocan acknowledged Mendoza in August 2017 as the top individual regional tax payer

As alumni of a De La Salle educational institution, Mendoza was given recognition during the 1st Gawad Lasallianeta in September 2017 upon receiving the Zeal for Lasallian Excellence as Media Communicators award
In December 2017, Mendoza received another Anak TV award, the Female Makabata Star award

Kemgbe e guzobere ya na afọ 1991, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe emepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria ama ama

Maithili (English /ˈmaɪtɪli/) bụ asụsụ Indo-Aryan a na-asụ n'akụkụ India na Nepal
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Mithila, nke gụnyere akụkụ nke steeti India nke Bihar na Jharkhand yana ọwụwa anyanwụ Terai nke Nepal
Ọ bụ otu n'ime asụsụ iri abụọ na abụọ a ma ama na India na asụsụ nke abụọ a na-asụkarị na mba Nepal
A na-edekarị asụsụ ahụ na Devanagari, mana enwere edemede abụọ ọzọ dị mkpa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme Tirhuta, nke nọgidere na-eji ya eme ihe ruo ugbu a, na Kaithi

Majak Mawith (amụrụ na 19 Septemba 1999) bụ onye South Sudan ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu maka Australian NPL Victoria club Port Melbourne SC na ndị otu mba South Sudan

Ndị Majangir nke Etiopia na-asụ asụsụ Majang
Agbanyeghị na ọ bụ otu n'ime ụyọkọ asụsụ Surmic, ọ bụ nke kacha dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ime otu ahụ (Fleming 1983)
Nnyocha asụsụ egosiwo na mgbanwe olumba si n'ebe ugwu ruo na ndịda dị obere ma ghara igbochi nzikọrịta ozi
Ọnụọgụ ndị Etiopia nke afọ 2007 depụtara ndị na-asụ Majang (Messengo) 6,433, mana na-akọkwa na agbụrụ ahụ nwere mmadụ 32,822 (Messengo na Mejengir)

Dika onu ogugu ndi mmadu siri gosi, o nweghi onye na-ekwu okwu na mpaghara Mezhenger nke mpaghara Gambela; A na-edepụta mkpokọta ndị ọkà okwu iri na otu maka mpaghara ahụ, mana ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 10,000 agbụrụ Mejenger ma ọ bụ ndị Messengo
Ogologo ụdaume dị iche na Majang, yabụ ụdaume niile na-abịa na ụzọ abụọ ogologo na nke dị mkpụmkpụ, dịka goopan 'ntaramahụhụ' na 'gopan' okporo ụzọ'
Ewepụtara akara ụdaume na Joswig (2012) na Getachew (2014, p
Unseth (2007) weputara sistemu vowel 9 nwere ahịrị -ATR mechiri ụdaume ɪ na ʊ
Moges na-ekwu na ụdaume nke iri ɐ, ebe Bender (1983) dị njikere naanị ịkwado ụdaume isii
Ndị ode akwụkwọ niile kwenyere na ọ nweghị ndakọrịta ụdaume ATR n'asụsụ ahụ
Bender na-ekwukwa na a ga-emeso nkwụsị glottal [ʔ] dị ka fọnịm nke Majang n'agbanyeghị Unseth na-agbagha nke a
Majang nwere ihe eji eme ihe abuo, bibial na coronal, nke Moges Yigezu muru n'umu olu na nkesa
Ụda na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'ihe ọ pụtara na Majang, ma na ọkwa okwu ma na ọkwa ụtọ asụsụ táŋ (ụda dị elu) 'ụgbọ ehi', tàŋ (ụgbọ dị ala) 'enweghị ihe ọ bụla'
Nchịkọta ụda nwere ọkwa ụda abụọ, na ụda na-ada ma na-arị elu nke nwere ike ime na njedebe nke okwu phonological, gbakwunyere nkwụsị akpaghị aka na nke na-abụghị akpaghị ọnụ
Asụsụ ahụ nwere ihe nrịbama na-egosi ogologo oge atọ dị iche iche gara aga (nso, etiti, nke gara aga) na nkeji abụọ n'ọdịnihu (nso na n'ihu)
Asụsụ ahụ nwere ihe nrịbama na-egosi ogologo oge atọ dị iche iche gara aga (nso, etiti, nke gara aga) na nkeji abụọ n'ọdịnihu (nso na n'ihu)
Usoro agụta bụ usoro vigesimal gbanwere, dabere na 5, 10, na 20
'Iri abụọ' bụ 'otu onye zuru oke' (mkpịsị aka na mkpịsị ụkwụ niile), ya mere 40 bụ 'mmadụ abụọ zuru oke', 100 bụ 'mmadụ ise zuru oke'
Otú ọ dị, taa, n'okpuru nduzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na ịba ụba nke asụsụ abụọ, ndị mmadụ na-ejikarị okwu Amharic ma ọ bụ Oromo mee ihe 100
Usoro akara onye na nọmba anaghị egosi ihe dị iche iche anyị na-agụnye ma na-ekewapụ onwe anyị, ụdị ọdịdị nke a na-ahụ n'asụsụ ndị dị nso na ndị yiri ya
Majang nwere usoro okwu VSO bụ isi, n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-enye ohere mgbanwe maka ilekwasị anya, wdg
Asụsụ ahụ na-eji nkebiokwu ikwu eme ihe nke ukwuu, gụnyere maka ọnọdụ ebe Bekee ga-eji adjectives

Nnyocha e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na-ekwu na a na-eji Majang nwere usoro nhịahụ-absolutive siri ike morphological, na ihe dị iche iche na-ejikọta ọnụ bụ nke dabere na ọnụnọ ma ọ bụ enweghị nkebiokwu aha zuru oke na-eso ngwaa ahụ ozugbo
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a dị iche bụ koodu dị iche iche ụda
Majang, na ụfọdụ asụsụ Surmic emetụtara, egosila na ọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche na amụma ụfọdụ n'ụdị syntactic maka asụsụ ndị nwere usoro okwu isiokwu–ngwaa–ihe
Majang nwere nbido na ajụjụ okwu ahịrịokwu-n'ikpeazụ, akụrụngwa abụọ e buru n'amụma agaghị eme n'asụsụ nwere usoro okwu VSO
