Malian Solidarity Bank (French La Banque malienne de solidarité ma ọ bụ BMS-SA) bụ ụlọ ọrụ Malian mepụtara na 2002 site na ntinye nke Onye isi ala Alpha Oumar Konaré
Ụlọ akụ a na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze, nke dabeere na ihe nlereanya Tunisia, nwere mgba megide ịda ogbenye na enweghị ọrụ dịka ebumnuche ya bụ isi
Ụlọ akụ ụlọ, nke e guzobere na 1996, nwere ọrụ ndị gụnyere ego, nhazi, na nkwado maka obere azụmaahịa ma ọ bụ ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, ọkachasị ndị sitere n'ìgwè ndị nwere ọdachi
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-enye ego mgbazinye ego n'ọnọdụ dị mma, na-arịọ maka obere nkwado na ọnụego ọmụrụ nwa dị ala karịa ụlọ akụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ụlọ akụ na-echekwa ego
Na Nọvemba 2021, Lanfia Coulibaly nọchiri Alioune Coulibalys n'isi ụlọ akụ Mali Solidarity Bank
Na 2004, ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka asaa na Mali, yana isi obodo nke ijeri franc anọ nke Central African
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka ụlọ ọrụ na Bamako, Segou, Kayes, Koulikoro, Kidal, Mopti, na Sikasso
Franc Mali bụ ego Mali nwere onwe n'etiti afọ 1962 na 1984
Ọ bụ ezie na e kewara ya na 100 cents, ọ dịghị nkewa e nyere
Wee ruo n'afọ 1962, Mali na-eji franc CFA nke West Africa eme ihe
E webatara franc Mali n'afọ ahụ dịka franc CFA, mana ọ dara na ya n'afọ 1967 n'ihi nnukwu ịrị elu na mba ahụ karịa ka ọ mere na mpaghara franc CFA
N'afọ 1984, Mali weghachiri franc CFA, na 2 francs Mali = 1 franc CFA
N'afọ 1962, e wepụtara ego mkpụrụ aluminum (nke e dere n'afọ 1961) n'ụdị 5, 10 na 25 francs
E wepụtara mbipụta nke abụọ nke aluminum na nickel-brass n'etiti afọ 1975 na-afọ 1977 na ụdị aluminum 10, 25, nickel-bronze 50 na 100 francs
Banque de la République du Mali (Bank of the Republic of Mali) wepụtara ego akwụkwọ na-mkpụrụ ụbọchị 22 n'ọnwa SEPTEMBA nke afọ 1960 na 1962 na ụdị 50, 100, 500, 1,000 na 5,000 francs
E wepụtara mbipụta nke abụọ nwere atụmatụ ọhụrụ n'afọ 1967 n'otu aha ahụ dị ka usoro gara aga

Mgbe a kwaturu Modibo Keita n'ụbọchị 19 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1968, e guzobere Banque Centrale du Mali (Central Bank of Mali), ma weghara mmepụta ihe edeturu n'afọ 1971 na iwebata usoro nke atọ nke 100, 500, 1000, 5000 na 10,000 francs
Malick Sidibé (1935 na 14 Eprel 2016) bụ onye Mali na-ese foto nke amaara maka ọmụmụ ojii na ọcha ya banyere ọdịbendị a ma ama n'afọ ndi 1960s na Bamako
Sidibé nwere ọrụ ogologo oge mịtara mkpụrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na Bamako, Mali, ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama na obodo ya
N'afọ 1994, o nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'obodo ọzọ n'abughi mali ma nweta otuto dị ukwuu maka foto ya nke e ji nlezianya dee
Ọrụ Sidibé abụrụla ihe a ma ama ma bụrụ nke a ma ama n'ụwa niile
Ọrụ ya bụ isiokwu nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ma bụrụ nke e gosipụtara na Europe na United States
N'afọ 2007, ọ natara onyinye Golden Lion Award maka Lifetime Achievement na Venice Biennale, na-aghọ ma onye na-ese foto mbụ na onye Afrịka mbụ e nyere onyinye a
Ihe nrite ndị ọzọ ọ natara gụnyere Hasselblad Award maka foto, International Center of Photography Infinity Award for Lifetime Achievement, na World Press Photo award
A na-enwe ọrụ Sidibé na nchịkọta nke The Contemporary African Art Collection (CAAC), J
Paul Getty Museum na Los Angeles, na Museum of Modern Art na New York
A mụrụ Sidibé n'obodo Soloba, kilomita narị atọ site na Bamako, na Mali
Nna ya, onye na-azụ anụ, onye ọrụ ugbo, na onye na-achụ nta nke ọma aha ya bụ Kolo Barry Sidibé
Nna Malick chọrọ ka ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ, mana ọ gafere tupu ya enwee ike ịga mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
N'afọ 1955, onye na-ese foto Gérard Guillat bịara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-achọ nwa akwụkwọ iji chọọ ụlọ ọrụ ya mma, n'ikpeazụ o weere Sidibé n'ọrụ
Ọrụ ya masịrị Guillat ma o weere ya dị ka onye mmụta
Ọrụ mbụ Sidibé gụnyere ịhazi ngwá ọrụ, na ịnyefe mbipụta
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ mụtara ihe gbasara foto ka o wee na-enyere Guillat aka, ma mesịa were ndị ahịa ya
N'afọ 1957, Guillat mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ya, Sidibé malitekwara ise foto nke ndụ abalị Bamako
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na foto akwụkwọ, na-elekwasị anya karịsịa na omenala ndị ntorobịa nke isi obodo Mali
Sidibé na-ese foto na egwuregwu, osimiri, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị, kọntaktị, ọbụnakwa na-etinye aka mgbe ụmụ okorobịa ahụ na-eduhie ụmụ agbọghọ
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọmụmụ ojii na ọcha ya banyere ọdịbendị a ma ama na 1960s na Bamako
N'afọ ndị 1970, Sidibé tụgharịrị gaa n'ime ihe osise studiyo
Ihe omuma ya n'ise ihe bara uru
Dị ka iwu, mgbe m na-arụ ọrụ na studiyo ahụ, emere m ọtụtụ ọnọdụ
Dị ka m nwere ntọala n'ise ihe, enwere m ike ịmepụta ọnọdụ ụfọdụ na foto m
Achọghị m ka ndị m na-achị dị ka ndị a gbasiri agbasi
Aga m enye ha ọnọdụ nke mere ka ha nwee ihe dị ndụ
N'afọ 1962, Sidibé meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na mpaghara Bagadadji ma ọ bụ Bamako
Sidibé gara n'ihu na-ese foto nke oriri na nkwari mberede na nnọkọ klọb nke obodo ahụ ruo n'afọ 1976
O kwuru na ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya n'ihi obere òtù klọb, ịrị elu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ nke igwefoto dị ọnụ ala, na uto nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ihe nkiri nke ụlọ ọrụ
Sidibé gara n'ihu na-ese foto ojii na ọcha, foto ID, ma dozie igwefoto mebiri emebi na ụlọ ọrụ Bamako ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Sidibé bụ onye a ma ama n'ógbè ahụ ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, a kpọbataghị ya n'ime ụwa nka dị mma nke ọdịda anyanwụ ruo n'afọ 1994 mgbe ya na onye nlekọta French André Magnin nwere ohere izute

Otu n'ime ọrụ ndị a maara nke ọma nke Sidibé site n'oge ahụ bụ Nuit de Noel, Happy Club (Christmas Eve, Happy Club) (1963), na-egosi di na nwunye na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị nwoke yi uwe, nwanyị yi uwe oriri ọdịda anyanwụ (ma ụkwụ ọtọ) na ha abụọ na-agba egwú, ikekwe, na egwu
Ọ bụkwa ihe oyiyi ndị dị ka ndị a kpughere otú ụdị foto Sidibé si ejikọta ya na egwu
Njikọ a bụ ihe Sidibé kwuru banyere ya n'oge ajụjụ ọnụ, kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
'Anyị nọ na-abanye n'ọgbọ ọhụrụ, ndị mmadụ chọkwara ịgba egwú
Egwu tọhapụrụ anyị
Na mberede, ụmụ okorobịa nwere ike ịbịaru ụmụ agbọghọ nso nso, jide ha n'aka ha
Tupu mgbe ahụ, anabataghị ya
Onye ọ bụla chọkwara ka e sere foto na-agba egwu nso'

Ikekwe ọ bụghị ihe ijuanya na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Mali, dị ka ndị na-eti egwu Salif Keita na Ali Farka Touré, bịakwara n'uche mba ụwa na 1990s n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ n'otu oge ahụ ka a na-amata foto Mali
Sidibé jiri ọkụ ọkụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ọhịa, mana ọ bụ naanị ọkụ tungsten n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri
O jiri igwefoto Afga 6 x 6 nwere bellows wee see agbamakwụkwọ na ihe omume ndị ọzọ, na Foca Sport 24 x 36 maka ọrụ ya
A maara ya dị ka onye mara mma nke ukwuu ma na-agwa ndị ahịa ya ihe ọchị iji mee ka ha nwee ahụ iru ala mgbe ha na-ese foto

Vidio mmeri Grammy nke egwu Janet Jackson nke afọ 1997 'Got 'til It's Gone' ji ụgwọ siri ike maka ụdị foto Sidibé, vidiyo ahụ na-akwụ ụtụ maka otu oge (n'oge 1960s na '70s) nke foto Sidibée nyere aka ide
Nke a bụ oge mgbe French Sudan (na mgbe ahụ Mali Federation) nwetara nnwere onwe ha pụọ n'ọchịchị France na 1960
Oge ọhụrụ a (mgbe 1960 gasịrị) ka ndị na-ekiri ihe dị iche iche gosipụtara dị ka post-colonial (na post-apartheid) ịmụrụ anya nke uche
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-enwe mmasị n'ọrụ Sidibé kwenyere na o jidere ọṅụ na ihe ịtụnanya nke ịmụrụ anya a, nakwa na a na-ahụ ya na ihu, ihe nkiri, na ihe oyiyi ndị o nyere aka mee ka ha dị
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, enwere ike ịhụ mmetụta Sidibé kpọmkwem site na vidiyo Inna Modjaʹs 2015 maka egwu ya 'Tombouctou,' ka a na-ese ya na ụlọ ọrụ foto Sidibé

N'afọ 2006, Tigerlily Films mere ihe ngosi akpọrọ Dolce Vita Africana banyere Sidibé, na-ese ya na ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Bamako, na-ezute ọtụtụ ndị enyi ya (na ndị na-ese foto n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ma na-agwa ya okwu banyere ọrụ ya
Sidibé ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ na onye na-ese foto mbụ e nyere Golden Lion Award maka Lifetime Achievement na Venice Biennale na 2007
Robert Storr, onye nduzi nka nke ihe ngosi ahụ, kwuru, sị

Ọ dịghị onye na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mere ihe karịrị iji kwalite ogo foto na mpaghara ahụ, tinye aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, mee ka ebe nchekwa ihe oyiyi dịkwuo mma ma ọ bụ mee ka anyị mata mgbanwe nke omenala Africa na ọkara nke senchiri afọ nke ịrị abụọ na mmalite nke senchiri nke iri abụọ na otu karịa Malick Sidibé
Sidibé nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu ọrịa shuga na Bamako
Ọ hapụrụ ụmụ iri na asaa na ndị nwunye atọ
A na-enwe ọrụ Sidibé na nchịkọta ọha na eze ndị a
Malika Al-Akkaoui (amụrụ na 25 Disemba na afo 1987, na Zaida) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics, ọ sonyere na mita 800 nke ụmụ nwanyị
Na afọ 2016 Olympics, ọ gbara ọsọ na 800 na 1500 m
Malika Al-Akkaoui (amụrụ na 25 Disemba na afo 1987, na Zaida) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics, ọ sonyere na mita 800 nke ụmụ nwanyị
Na afọ 2016 Olympics, ọ gbara ọsọ na 800 na 1500 m
Ọ mechara nke iri na 1500m afọ 2017 World Athletics Championships
Malila bụ asụsụ nke ndi Bantu nke obodo Tanzania

Na mba United States, mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ na-eme n'oge na-adịghị anya bụ mgbalị nke ndị ọkachamara na ahụike, ndị na-eme nchọpụta ụra, ndị nkụzi, ndị na'ahụ maka obodo, ndị nne na nna, ụmụ akwụkwọ, na ụmụ amaala ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ maka oge ụlọ akwụkwọ nke na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ohere ihi ụra zuru ezu n'oge kachasị mma

Ọ na-adabere na nkwupụta ya na ihe akaebe na-arịwanye elu na ịmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị n'isi ụtụtụ adịghị mma, na-adịghị arụpụta ihe, ma na-ekwekọghị na mkpa ụra na usoro ụra nke ndị na-eto eto

N'ime ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke iri abuo, ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na mba United States malitere ịgbanwe oge nkuzi tupu oge mgbịrịgba a na-ahụkarị, nke [onye?] chere na elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ
Taa, ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị America ịmalite ụbọchị nkuzi n'elekere 7 nke ụtụtụ ma kwụsị ihe dị ka awa asaa ka e mesịrị, n'ihe dị ka elekere abụọ nke ehihie
Ọtụtụ nnyocha ụra na-atụ aro na klas ụtụtụ ekwesịghị ịmalite n'oge 8 30 nke ụtụtụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na nke sekọndị

Ndị na-akwado ịlaghachi n'oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ekwu na a ga-ele ụra na oge ụlọ akwụkwọ anya dị ka nsogbu ahụike ọha na eze, na-ekwu maka ihe akaebe na-ejikọta oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge na-eto eto na enweghị ụra n'etiti ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma yana ọtụtụ nsogbu anụ ahụ, nke uche, na nke agụmakwụkwọ

Ọ bụghị naanị na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ehi ụra nke ukwuu n'abalị ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ ha na-aga n'oge mmalite, mana oge ụlọ akwụkwọ na-agafe agafe ejirila ya na arụmọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ka mma, mbelata mkpali, na nnukwu mkpali, yana ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala nke ịda mbà n'obi, igbu oge, enweghị ọrụ, na ihe mberede ụgbọala ụtụtụ

Nnyocha ndị e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya (2011) na-atụ aro na oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ na-emerụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enweghị ego ma nwedịrị ike imetụta ụmụ akwụkwọ n'ọdịnihu, na-eme ka ego ọ bụla a na-echekwa na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ na oge ndị gara aga

Na mbido afọ 1990, Mahadum nke uloakwukwo Minnesota's landmark bidoro igu akwukwo School nyochara ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị si na mpaghara abụọ nke Minneapolis - Edina, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke gbanwere oge mmeghe ya site na 7 20 ụtụtụ ruo 8 30 ụtụtụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Minneapolis, nke gbanwere mmeghe ha site na 720 ụtụtụ ruo 8 40 ụtụtụ
A chọtara ọtụtụ uru dị mma maka ụmụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere
Nnyocha na-esote nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Minneapolis mgbe afọ ise gasịrị kpughere na uru ndị a na uru ndị ọzọ dị mma anọgidewo

N'afọ 2014, ọrụ afọ atọ na-eji data sitere n'ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ ogu iteolu na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị asatọ na steeti atọ, chọpụtara na mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gbanwere na oge mmalite nke mgbe ojiri okara gafe elekere nke asato nke ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ mgbe e mesịrị, ịga, akara ule na arụmọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ka mma, na igbu oge, iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe, mgbaàmà nke ịda mbà n'obi, iri ihe ọṅụṅụ caffeinated, na ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ metụtara ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala na-eto eto belatara

Oge nloghachi nke akwukwo mbge emesiri gosiri ezigbo akaebe na ibido etiti na oke uloakwukwo tupuo owere okara gafe elekere nke asato ma obukwanu elekere nke iteolu na otutu bu ihe na adabaghi ya na nwanne elekere nke umuntakiri na ndi okenye, na afo 1993, otu ogbako nke Mary Carskadon, PhD nke mahadum Brown gisiri na mgbanwe na ezigbo circadian mgbe ntoju na edu iteta ura agwa nke umuntakiri nke na eduba ha na na iru ura ma teta ma emesia karia ndi obere na ndi okenyel

Otutu omumu ihe achoputala ihe nchoputa ndia, mehee itinye oge mbido uloakwukwo na uru na udi ura na umuntakirima gosikwa mgbanwe iru na nweputa nke melatonin na ntoju, nke putara na mgbanwe, nke putara isonye na mgbanwe nke iteta ura mgbe nile na awa na oge umuntakiri
Otu mgbanwe na igbu oge na iweputa melatonin na oge ntoju aburukwala ihe no na mmadu ndi ozo,

Mgbanwe nke circadian rhythms metụtara puberty na-eme ka o sie ike, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ gaghị ekwe omume, maka ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma - ndị nwere ike ibili n'elekere ise ma ọ bụ isii nke ụtụtụ iji kwadebe ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge maka mgbịrịgba ụlọ akwụkwọ nke elekere asaa - iji nweta ụra zuru ezu n'abalị ụlọ akwụkwọ

Ọbụna na-eleghara ihe ndọpụ uche nke ọrụ ụlọ na ihe ndị ọzọ achọrọ na ngwá electronic anya anya, ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-esiri ike ihi ụra tupu elekere iri na otu nke ehihie ma ọ bụ bilie tupu elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ
Na mgbakwunye, ha kwesịrị ihi ụra ruo elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ karịa iji nweta awa 9 ma ọ bụ koleka nke ọtụtụ nyocha ụra na-atụ aro na ha chọrọ
N'ihi ya, ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-abata n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enweghị ụra
Ihe ndekọ kachasị ọhụrụ sitere na Nnyocha Akparamàgwà Ndị Ntorobịa na-egosi na 70% nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ
A na-ejikọta mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụra dị elu maka ụmụ akwụkwọ

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 70% nke ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma anaghị ehi ụra zuru oke ma a kọrọ na mmụba nke mmetọ, ibu ibu, ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa shuga, nsogbu nke usoro ahụ ji alụso ọrịa ọgụ, mgbanwe nke ọnọdụ uche, ịda mbà n'obi, na echiche igbu onwe, yana mbelata nchịkwa mkpali
Oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ ejikọtara ya na ịkwọ ụgbọala na-ehi ụra na ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala ọhụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ihe mberede ụgbọ ala
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị na-akwụsị n'oge mgbede nwekwara ike ịbawanye ihe ize ndụ nke itinye aka n'omume na-adịghị mma, nke dị ize ndụ n'etiti ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-enweghị ụra
Idozi ụmụaka n'ụlọ akwụkwọ tupu anyanwụ apụ pụkwara ịpụta na ha ga-echere ma ọ bụ na-eje ije n'ọchịchịrị, na-adịghị ahụ anya
Enweghị ụra nwere ike ịkpata obere mkpali, ihe isi ike itinye uche, enweghị obi iru ala, oge mmeghachi omume dị ala, enweghị ume, njehie ugboro ugboro, ichefu, na ikike mkpebi na-adịghị mma

Nnyocha, ọtụtụ nke Kyla Wahlstrom na ndị otu nyocha ya na Mahadum nke Minnesota's Center for Applied Research and Educational Improvement (CAREI), ejikọtala mmetụta ndị a na oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ, nke, n'aka nke ya, ejikọwo ya ugboro ugboro na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke igbu oge, enweghị ọrụ, enweghị ọrụ na ịhapụ

N'afọ 2012, nyocha nke na-eji data sitere na Wake County, North Carolina, gosipụtara na igbu oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site na otu awa, site na ihe dịka 7 30 ruo 8 30, na-eme ka akara ule dị mma site na ọ dịkarịa ala pasent abụọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na otu pasent na ịgụ ihe
Mmetụta ahụ dị ukwuu maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere akara ule dị n'okpuru nkezi, na-atụ aro na oge mmalite ga-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'ihe ụmụ akwụkwọ rụzuru

Mmetụta nke oge mmalite mgbe e mesịrị na arụmọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ - gụnyere mbelata nke enweghị akwụkwọ, enweghị akwụkwọ, na mmụba nke ihe ọmụmụ zuru oke - bụ ihe dịka okpukpu abụọ na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-enweghị ego

Enwere ike ịkọwa ọdịiche a, ma ọ dịkarịa ala n'akụkụ ụfọdụ, site n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ihe ùgwù nwere ohere ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye (ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-amalite ntụziaka mgbe elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ gasịrị) na / ma ọ bụ chekwaa oge site na ịkwọ ụgbọala ma ọ bụ ịkwọ ụgbọala gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe naanị afọ abụọ gasịrị, nnyocha ahụ gosipụtara uru nke ijeri $ 86 na akụ na ụba US
Mgbe afọ iri gasịrị, uru a ga-abawanye na ijeri $ 83, mgbe afọ 15 gasịrị na ijeri dollar 140, nke na-eru ihe dị ka uru kwa afọ maka akụ na ụba US nke ijeri $ 93
Ndị edemede, ndị na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba bụ Brian A
Jacob na Jonah E

Rockoff, buru amụma na ịmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị otu awa mgbe e mesịrị, n'ihe dị ka elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ, ga-eme ka ihe dị ka $ 17,500 na mmụba nke ego ọ bụla ga-enweta n'ọdịnihu n'ọnụ ahịa dị ugbu a - uru ọnụego nke ọ dịkarịa ala 9 1 ọbụna mgbe ị gbanwere usoro ihe omume chọrọ itinye ego n'ihu iji gbanwee usoro bọs na / ma ọ bụ mee ihe omume mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị
HiStart School Later, aka Healthy Hours, bụ òtù na-enweghị uru na United States

Tọrọ ntọala na 2011 mgbe onye edemede sayensị nke Maryland bụ Terra Ziporyn Snider malitere mkpesa n'ịntanetị site na anyi ndi mmadu nke kpọkọtara ndị na-akwado ndị na-eme nchọpụta, ndị na-ahụ maka ụra, ndị na'ahụ maka ụmụaka, ndị ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na ndị nkụzi, njikọ ahụ na-ezube inyere obodo aka igbu oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ; hụ na oge ụlọ akwụkwọ dị nchebe, dị mma; ma nye mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ụra maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na obodo ụlọ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2013, odeakwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ US Arne Duncan tweeted nkwado ya maka oge mmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma kemgbe afọ 2014 American Academy nke Pediatrics, Centers Maka njikota na mgbochi nje, na American Medical Association, Society of Behavioral Medicine, American Academy of Sleep Medicine, na American Association of Sleep Technologists ewepụtala nkwupụta iwu na-atụ aro ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịta na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekúndrị malite n'oge 8 30 nke ụtụtụ

N'afọ 2019, ya na California State PTA kwadoro, iwu mbụ nke US steeti niile nke e mere n'ụzọ doro anya iji chebe ma mata mkpa ahụike ụra nke ndị na-eto eto dị site n'ịgwakọta oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na nnukwu ihe akaebe sayensị gbasara mkpa ụra nke ndị ntorobịa na oge

N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, mbido uloakwukwo emecha - ya na RAND Corporation, Robert Wood Johnson Foundation, na Yale uloakwukwo nkeMedicine's Department nke Pediatrics na Section n'ime Pulmonary, Critical Care, na Sleep Medicine - kwadoro nzukọ mba mbụ na ura ntorobia, ahu ike, and mbido uloakwukwo emecha

N'afọ 2019, iwu nke mbido uloakwukwo emecha na California State PTA kwadoro mere ka California bụrụ steeti mbụ na mba ahụ iji setịpụ ala na otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị nwere ike isi chọọ ịga
N'afọ 2021, mbido uloakwukwo mechara nata onyinye nmeri ura nke American Academy of Sleep Medicine Foundation
Malitel bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eweta ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka na Mali
Ọ bụ enyemaka nke Sotelma, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta mba
Siemens AG na-akwado ọrụ Malitel
Lucille Malkia Roberts (1927-2004) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Washington, DC, Roberts nwetara nzèrè bachelọ ya na Mahadum Howard na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Mahadim Michigan
Roberts kụziri màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze DC n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, gụnyere Duke Ellington School for the Arts na Shaw Junior High School, ebe ọ kụziri n'akụkụ Alma Thomas ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke nka na akụkọ ihe méré eme na DC Teachers College, State University of New York na Oswego, Washington Technical Institute na American University
Ọ gàrà ọtụtụ ébé n'oge ọrụ ya, mana ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere na isiokwu na isiokwu ndị Afrịka
Roberts mụkwara akwụkwọ na Hale Woodruff ma kụzie na Mahadum Howard site na 1976 ruo 1985
O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe, a na-egosikwa ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé na nke ọha
Reema Lamba (amụrụ na 24 Ọktoba na afo 1976), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mallika Sherawat, bụ onye India na-eme ihe nkiri nke na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri asụsụ Hindi
A maara ya maka àgwà obi ike ya na ihe nkiri dị ka Khwahish (2003) na Murder (2004), Sherawat emeela onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nnọchianya mmekọahụ na otu n'ime ndị ama ama na Bollywood
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya na-aga nke ọma Pyaar Ke Side Effects (2006) nke nwetara otuto dị ukwuu
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka Aap Ka Suroor, Welcome (ma afo 2007) - nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma azụmahịa ya ruo ugbu a - na Double Dhamaal (2011)
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Bollywood ole na ole na-agbalị ịgafe Hollywood, na ihe nkiri dị ka Hisss (2010) na Politics of Love (2011)
A mụrụ Sherawat dị ka Reema Lamba na Moth, obere obodo dị na mpaghara Hisar nke Haryana n'ezinụlọ Jat
Aha nna Mallika bụ Mukesh Kumar Lamba ma a mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Seth Chhaju Ram, onye isi Jat philanthropist
Ọ nakweere aha ihuenyo nke 'Mallika', nke pụtara 'empress', iji zere mgbagwoju anya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri aha ha bụ Reema
'Sherawat' bụ aha nne ya O kwuru na ọ na-eji aha nne ya eme ihe n'ihi nkwado nne ya nyere ya
Ọ bụ ezie na mmekọrịta ya na ezinụlọ ya nwere nsogbu mgbe ọ banyere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, ezinụlọ Sherawat anabatala nhọrọ ọrụ ya ugbu a ma ha na Sherawat dịghachi ná mma
Sherawat gara Delhi Public School, Mathura Road

O nwere nzere na nkà ihe ọmụma na Miranda House, Mahadum Delhi N'oge mbụ nke ọrụ ya, ọ na-azọrọ na ya si n'ezinaụlọ dị n'obere obodo na-echekwa echiche nakwa na ọ na-eche ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi ihu site n'aka ha n'ịchụso ọrụ ya
Otú ọ dị, ezinụlọ Sherawat agbaghawo nke a dị ka akụkọ nke o mepụtara iji nye ya ọdịdị nke nwa agbọghọ na-enweghị isi nke mere ka ọ dị ukwuu na Bollywood
Tupu ọ banye na ihe nkiri, Sherawat pụtara na mgbasa ozi Igwe onyonyo na Amitabh Bachchan maka BPL na Shah Rukh Khan maka Santro
Ọ pụtakwara na 'Maar Dala' nke Nirmal Pandey na vidiyo egwu 'Lak Tunoo' nke Surjit Bindrakhia
Ọ malitere na ihe nkiri na obere ọrụ na Jeena Sirf Merre Liye ebe a kpọrọ ya Reema Lamba
Sherawat dọtara mmasị na mpụta ya na ihe nkiri nke afo 2003, Khwahish
N'afọ 2004, ọ pụtara na Murder, ihe nkiri sitere na Hollywood's Unfaithful
A hụrụ ya maka ọrụ obi ike ya na onye nkatọ Narbir Gosal na-ede, 'ọ nwere ikike iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka nke a
O nwere obi ike ma na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ dị ka Simran ma na-ejide ihe nkiri mmetụta uche ya n'ụzọ dị ùgwù
' O nwetara nhọpụta maka 'Best Actress' na Zee Cine Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na Murder
Kemgbe ahụ, a maara Sherawat maka ikwupụta echiche ya n'ihu ọha, yana mmeghachi omume na ụfọdụ nkwupụta ya
N'afọ 2005, Sherawat mere ihe nkiri na The Myth, ihe nkiri China, ya na Jackie Chan
O mere nwa agbọghọ India nke na-azọpụta àgwà Chan n'osimiri
The Myth bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na mba ụwa
Ngosipụta ya na Cannes Film Festival iji kwalite ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ nlebara anya, na magazin Time Richard Corliss na-akpọ ya 'nnukwu ihe ọzọ'

Omume ya na ihe nkiri nke afo 2006 Pyaar Ke Side Effects, onye otu Rahul Bose, nwetara otuto ya site na gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, onye nkatọ Raja Sen na-ekwu, 'Mallika na-ezu ohi ihe ngosi ahụ site na nkwuwa okwu ya na ihe nkiri ahụ mere nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ igbe
Ntọhapụ mbụ ya n'afọ 2007 bụ Mani Ratnam's Guru, nke o mere egwu 'Mayya Mayya' Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọbịa na Himesh Reshammiya's Aap Ka Suroor - The Real Love Story ma kwuo na ọ kwụrụ Rs
nde iri na ise maka mpụta nkeji iri
Ntọhapụ ikpeazụ ya nke afọ 2007 bụ Welcome, nke mere nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ igbe
Omume ya nwetara nyocha dị mma na onye nkatọ ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Taran Adarsh dere, 'Mallika Sherawat na-enye ọkụ'
Ntọhapụ ya n'afọ 2008 bụ Ugly Aur Pagli na Maan Gaye Mughal-e-Azam
Ha abụọ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ igbe
Ntọhapụ Bollywood ọzọ nke Sherawat bụ Double Dhamaal, nke gara n'ihu bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ igbe, na-enweta ọnọdụ 'karịa nkezi' na ụlọ ọrụ igbe, site na Box Office India
Ọ pụtakwara na nọmba ihe nkiri dịka Thank You (Razia Gundon Mein Phas Gayi), Bin Bulaye Baraati (Shalu Ke Thumkey) na Osthe (Kalasala), nke bụ ihe nkiri Tamil
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara ya na nọmba ihe na Tezz (Laila)
Sherawat emepụtala na Kismat Love Paisa Dilli, nke ọ ga-egwu Haryanvi

Na 23 Ọktọba na afo 2013 Mallika na-ele ihe ngosi mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị nke a na-akpọ Bachelorette India - Mere Khayalon ki Mallika gosipụtara nke a nakweere site na The Bachelorette iji chọta bachelor zuru oke maka onwe ya
N'afọ 2009, Sherawat pụtara na ihe nkiri Hollywood aha ya bụ Hisss, onye otu Irrfan Khan na Jennifer Lynch duziri
Endeavour Independent zụtara ikike nkesa nke Hisss
Sherawat kwalitere ya na agwọ dị ndụ na Cannes Film Festival nke afo 2010
A tọhapụrụ Hisss n'asụsụ ndị India niile na 22 Ọktoba na afo 2010
Sherawat pụtara na ihe nkiri Hollywood ọzọ, Politics of Love, aka Love, Barack, nke William Dear duziri
Ọ na-egwu Aretha Gupta, onye nhazi ọrụ afọ ofufo nke Obama
Anya mbụ nke Ịhụnanya, Sherawat kpughere Barack na Cannes na afo 2010
E wepụtara ya n'afọ 2011
Sherawat meriri na afo 2008 Renaissance Artist Award na 16th Annual Diversity Awards nke emere na California
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2009, Sherawat natara nwa amaala nsọpụrụ nke Los Angeles maka nkwanye ùgwù maka ọrụ ya na ọrụ ebere ya
N'afọ 2012, Sherawat gosipụtara ya na onye egwu pop nke America bụ Bruno Mars na vidiyo ya nke Salt-n-Pepa Whatta Man maka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-atọ ọchị Funny or Die
N'oge obere oge ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ikuku, Sherawat lụrụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu na Delhi bụ Karan Singh Gill na afo 1997
O mechara gbaa ya alụkwaghịm
O mere ka alụmdi na nwunye ya bụrụ ihe nzuzo dịka ihere nke ịgba alụkwaghịm gaara egbochi ịrị elu ya na Bollywood
Ya na onye na-ahụ maka ala na ụlọ na France bụ Cyrille Auxenfans na afo 2017
Sherawat etinyela aka na ọrụ ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na-atụle nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na 65th United Nations DPI / Ogbako NGO na afo 2014
N'oge 2018 Cannes Film Festival, Sherawat kpọchiri onwe ya n'ime ụlọ maka awa iri na abụọ iji kwado Free A Girl India NGO

Malva pudding bụ iwepụta uto na-atọ ụtọ nke sitere na South Africa
O nwere jam apricot ma nwee spongy caramelised tescho
A na-awụsakarị ofe na-acha nzu nzu n'elu ya mgbe ọ na-ekpo ọkụ, a na-ejikarị ya na cusitard na / ma ọ bụ ice-cream
Ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ South Afrika na-enye ya
A na-eche na pudding ahụ bụ nke Dutch mgbe Cape Dutch sitere na Cape

Pudding ahụ bụ nke amara nke Ọma na West Coast nke US mgbe onye isi nri nke Oprah Winfrey, Art Smith, nyere ya maka nri abalị Krismas na afọ puku abụọ na isi (2006) nye ụmụ akwụkwọ nke OprahWinfrey Leadership Academy for Girls na South Africa
E nwere echiche dị iche iche banyere mmalite nke aha ahụ
Jan Ellis Pudding bụ ụdị dị iche
Malvin Gray Johnson (ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1896 rụo ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1934) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Greensboro, North Carolina
Gray Johnson malitere ise ihe mgbe ọ dị obéré mgbè nwanne ya nwanyị Maggie chọpụtara nkà ya ma nye ya nkụzi ise ihe na ihe osise mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị
Nkà mbụ ya méré ka ọ merie n'ọnọdụ mbụ màkà ọrụ nka ya na asọmpi na ngosi ọbọdọ ya kwa afọ
Ezinụlọ ya mechara kwaga New York City, ebe ọ gụrụ nka na National Academy of Design na ndị omenkà a ma ama dị ka Francis Coates Jones
Agha Ụwa Mbụ kwụsịrị ógè ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na 184th Brigade, 94th Division na France
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé a ma ama n'oge Harlem Renaissance
Ọ bụ 'ónyé kachasị nta n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Harlem Renaissance
ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara New York mgbè ọ dị obérè
ebe French Impressionism na Cubism nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ya
Malvin 'bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-agafe agafe na ndị na-eme ihe dị iche iche n'oge ya
O si n'ọtụtụ ebe ejiji mee ihe ma gosipụta mmụta a na-adọ aka ná ntị dị mkpà màkà ọkwa dị elu nke ngosipụta okike
ka ọ matara ọrụ nke ndị Impressionists na ndị Cubists ụdị nka ya gbanwere

A na-akọwa ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe 'ónyé ọrụ ya na-egosipụta mgbagwoju anya nke Harlem Renaissance na elu ya' n'agbanyeghị na ya na ndị na-ese egwu ndị ọzọ nke Africa America nọrọ obéré ógè n'oge ya na Harlem
A na-akpọkarị ọrụ ya Symbolic Abstractionist, ébé ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka America mbụ na-ese n'ụdị Cubist
Ọ jikọtara ụdị ọgbara ọhụrụ mbụ na isiokwu, isiokwu, na nchegbu ndị Africa America iji mepụta 'ezi nka ndị Africa America
Akụkụ nke nka ya yiri ka ọ sitere na ọmụmụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Africa, ndụ n'okporo ámá Harlem, na ndị mmụọ Africa
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyéré akụkụ teknụzụ nke ìhè, ihe mejupụtara, na ọdịdị, na ọchịchọ igosipụta ahụmịhe nke ndị mmụọ n'ihe gbásárá ihe nnọchianya na-enweghị atụ
A na-akọwa ụdị ihe osise ya dị ka nke ógè a nke nwere brushwork siri ike, ebe dị iche iche dị iche iche, ụdị dị larịị na nke dị n'akụkụ, na enweghị njedebe nke ihe osise
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-akatọ ya nwèrè mmasị n'otú o si jiri eziokwu na ezi obi nyochaa isiokwu ndị Africa America ebe ndị ọzọ dọrọ ya aka ná ntị màkà njikwa ya na-enweghị isi na mmetụta nke ógè a

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2010, Swann Galleries rere ihe osise Malvin Gray Johnson a ma ama Swing Low, Sweet Chariot, mmanụ n'elu ákwà, 1928 màkà dolla narị puku abụọ na iri abụọ na asatọ
Ọ bụ ógè mbụ ọrụ ọ bụla dị mkpa nke Johnson bịara na ire ere
Mama Cass Restaurants bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nri na Naịjirịa
Na Nọvemba 1983, Charis Grace Onabowale meghere ebe mbụ na Allen Avenue, Ikeja, Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ ahịa mbụ bu akara nke mbụ ya bụ nke a na-akpọ ːMama Cass Cafeteriaʹ
Mama Cass Restaurants ugbu a nwere usoro nke ihe dị ka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ngwa ngwa iri na anọ ma gbasaa ebe ọrụ ya n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba ahụ
E wezụga Lagos, ụlọ ahịa ndị ọzọ dị na steeti Naijiria ndị ọzọ gụnyere Ogun, Edo, FCT, nakwa na United Kingdom
Mama Cass bụ ọkachamara na nri ọdịnala ndị Afrịka na-esi n'ụlọ na nri mba ụwa na ihe ndị ọzọ pụrụ iche dị ka achịcha Oven Fresh, Jaydens Sliced Bread
Na mgbakwunye na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ achịcha na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na-arụkwa ọrụ
Ọ gbasaa n'ime njikwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, nri na-arụ ọrụ onwe onye na mmepụta achịcha buru ibu
Mary Kavere, nke a maara nke ọma dịka Mama Kayai, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Kenya na otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a nabatara maka ịsụ ụzọ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Kenya
Ọ nọwo na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ihe dị ka afọ iri anọ
N'afọ 2018, a kwanyeere ya ugwu na Grand Warrior Award nke bụkwa ntinye aka na Riverwood Awards Hall of Fame
Ọ bịara pụta ìhè n'ihu ọha n'afọ 1980 na-esote onye isi nke ihe ngosi ezinụlọ na-atọ ọchị, Vitimbi, n'afọ 1985 na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Kenya nke a maara dịka Voice of Kenya (VOK)
O mechara pụta na ihe nkiri ọzọ a ma ama bụ Vioja Mahakamani N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ na-eme ihe ngosi TV ọzọ Jungu Kuu nke a na-egosi na K24
Mama Kayai na-eme ihe dịka nwunye onye ọzọ a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri, Benson Wanjau nwụrụ anwụ, onye a maara dịka Mzee Ojwan'g na ha abụọ na-eme ememe dịka di na nwunye ike nke ihe nkiri Kenya
Mzee Ojwang, onye a kpọrọ nna nke ezinụlọ na-eme ihe ọchị nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa oyi n'ahụ n'afọ 2015
A na-enye ndị ọrụ Vitimbi nke Mama Kayai na Mzee Ojwan'g na-edu ohere mgbe niile iji mee ka mba ahụ nwee obi ụtọ na ezumike mba niile
Onye isi oche Kenya, Mzee Jomo Kenyatta na-akpọkarị ndị ọrụ vitimbi ka ha mee ya obi ụtọ n'ụlọ G
Gatundu ya

Onye isi ala nwụrụ anwụ bụ Daniel Moi nwekwara mmasị karịsịa na ihe nkiri Mama Kayai na Mzee Ojwan'g na ndị ọzọ karịa ka ha nwee ohere ịme ihe nkiri na ezumike mba, ọ kpọkwara ha ka ha bịa n'ụlọ gọọmentị
Onye bụbu onye isi ala bụ Mwai Kibaki na-akpọkwa Mama Kayai na ndị otu ya mgbe niile na State House
Mary Kavere lụrụ Saidiel Matano nwụrụ anwụ
Ha mụtara ụmụ nwoke ise
Ọ bụzi nne nne
Ọ malitere njem ya na ngalaba okike dịka onye na-agba egwu ọdịnala na onye na-agụ egwu na otu, nke a maara dịka The Black Golden Stars, na Majengo, Pumwani ebe o tolitere
Kavere mechara zute Mzee Ojwan'g na Lucy Wangui (onye mere onye ọka ikpe na Vioja Mahakamani), n'otu n'ime nyocha ya
Ọ na-ekwenye na ha abụọ maka inye ya ndụmọdụ na inye aka ịzụlite ọrụ ya na ime ihe nkiri
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na mmemme Darubini n'afọ 1980 tupu ọ kwaga Vitimbi na Vioja Mahakamani n'otu n'otu na-egosi na KBC

E nyere Mama Kayai Lifetime Achievement Award na 6th Annual Kalasha Awards n'afọ 2015 ma nwetakwa ntinye n'ime Riverwood Hall of Fame na Septemba afọ 2018 mgbe o meriri Grand Warrior Award na Riverwood Awards

Mamadou Loum N'Diaye (a mụrụ 30 Disemba 1996) bụ onye okacha amara nke Senegal nke na-agba egwu dika onye egwuregwu etiti maka ulo egwu Spain Deportivo Alavés, na mbinye ego sitere na klọb Portuguese FC Porto
Ọ na-agbarakwa ndị otu mba Senegal egwu
Loum mere mpụta mbụ ọkachamara ya na Segunda Liga maka SC Braga B na 15 Ọgọst 2015 na egwuregwu megide Gil Vicente FC, dị ka ihe nnọchi anya nkeji 70 nke Carlos Fortes
Akpọrọ ya otu ugboro maka SC Braga maka egwuregwu Primeira Liga ha pụọ ​​na FC
Paços de Ferreira na 23 Eprel 2017, na-ejighi ya na mfu 3–1
Otu ụbọchị tupu emume ncheta egwuregwu ahụ, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ na njedebe nke otu 2–2 sere n'ụlọ ya na Académico de Viseu FC
Na 30 Julaị 2018, agbanyere Loum n'aka ndị otu ụgbọ elu kacha elu Moreirense FC
maka oge Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na 2 Novemba na mmeri 3–1 na ndị mmeri SL
Benfica
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Loum kwagara FC Porto na nkwekọrịta mbinye ego maka oge fọdụrụnụ yana nhọrọ iji gbanwee nkwekọrịta ahụ na-adịgide adịgide
Ọ gbara egwuregwu atọ n'ime oge fọdụrụnụ wee kwụọ ụgwọ ụlọ ọrụ €775 nde maka 75% nke ikike akụ na ụba ya
Na 2 Disemba, ọ malitere mmeri ụlọ 2–0 megide Paços de Ferreira wee nweta goolu mmalite
Na 23 Julaị 2021, mgbe egosipụtara adịkarịghị maka Porto, mbinye Loum n'akụkụ La Liga Deportivo Alavés maka mkpọsa 2021–22
Loum nọchitere Senegal na 2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup
Ọ mere mpụta mbụ ya maka ndị otu agadi na 26 Maachị 2019 na enyi na enyi megide Mali, na-egwu nkeji 90 zuru oke nke mmeri 2–1 na Dakar
Akpọrọ ya maka 2021 Africa Cup of Nations, nke otu ahụ meriri na Cameroon na mmalite nke afọ na-esote; Otu ihe ọ pụtara bụ na ya na ndị agbata obi Guinea gbara n'enweghị goolu n'egwuregwu otu ikpeazụ
Dịka egwuregwu emere 9 Maachị 2021 Mpụta na ihe mgbaru ọsọ site na klọb, oge na asọmpi
Àtụ Updated
Àtụ Notelist
Dịka egwuregwu emere na Jenụwarị 14, 2022
Mpụta na ebumnuche site na otu mba na afọ
Porto
Senegal

Mamady 'Wadaba' Kourouma (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ si na obodo ana akpo Guinea
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ezinụlọ nke ndị na-akụ ọkpọ ọdịnala Malinke, ma zụlite ya n'obodo Oroko dị nso na Kouroussa, Guinea, West Africa
Ọ mụtara site na mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ egwu na ịgba egwú ọdịnala nke ndị ya dịka ọ si n'aka ndị nna nna ya
A na-akpọ ya 'The Great Panther' n'ihi ụda ya dị ike na djembe drum
N'afọ 1993, ọ ghọrọ onye isi mmụta nke onye ama ama djembe bụ Famoudou Konaté
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara Germany, Japan, na United States, na-akụzi ma na-eme ihe na Konaté na Mamady Keïta, yana otu nke ya, Annye Ben
Kourouma apụtala na CD anọ, tinyere CD nke ya, Oroko Kan
N'afọ 2003, Famoudou Konaté tọhapụrụ ya n'ọmụmụ ihe ya, ma kpọsaa ya onye na-akụ ọkpọ na onye na-ewu ọkpọ n'onwe ya
Ọ bụ onye nduzi maka òtù ọrụ ebere, Oroko Fund, ma gosipụta onye nkuzi maka African Village Drum Adventure na Guinea
Aha njirimara Mamady Kourouma, nke pụtara Great Panther, ma sitere n'aka ndị obodo ya, ndị na-ekwu na ụda ya na drum djembe nwere ike nke mkpu nwamba ọhịa
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Malinke na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ugwu Guinea, West Africa, e nyere Kourouma obere djembe mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Ya na nna ya, ụmụnne nna ya, na ụmụnne ya, malitere iso ha na-egwuri egwu na ememme obodo
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ na-agbanwere dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, na mgbe ọ dị afọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ mụtara ụda ọdịnala ha niile, ma nweta ọnọdụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwu n'obodo ya
Kourouma kwagara n'isi obodo Conakry ịrụ ọrụ, otu afọ ka e mesịrị, onye a ma ama na-akụ ọkpọ, Famoudou Konate nabatara ya dị ka onye mmụta

Konate bụ onye agha afọ iri abụọ na isii nke Les Ballets Africains de Guinee, otu mba mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri nke Guinea nke gara ụwa dị ka egwu, na-anọchite anya ọtụtụ ọdịbendị nke Guinea, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nnwere onwe site na France na afọ 1958
Ọ bụ ezie na Kourouma bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ, ibi na ịrụ ọrụ na Konate meziwanyere nkà ya
Dị ka onye na-amụta Konate, Kourouma nwetara ahụmịhe na-akụzi ndị ọbịa Europe na-aga n'ụlọ Konate kwa afọ, ma nyekwa Kourouma aka ịmụta usoro Konate maka iwu drum
Mamady Keita, onye na-akụ ọkpọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ maka Ballet Joliba, nke si Guinea, chọpụtara na Kourouma nwere nkà ịgba egwu
Na Jenụwarị, na afo 1995, Kourouma pụtara na Mamady Keita's Mogobalu CD, ma soro ya dekọ ọzọ na Febụwarị, na afọ 1996 na Keitas Hamana CD
Kourouma so Keita, Konate, na ndị ọzọ nọ na Mogobalu gaa Japan n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ ahụ, ebe e gosipụtara ya dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ

Kourouma pụtakwara na CD abụọ nke Famoudou Konate Rhythmen und Lieder aus Guinea, nke edere na Conakry na Disemba, na afọ 1995 ma mepụta na Germany, ebe a na-ese Wadaba na mkpuchi ya na ejiji ọdịnala zuru oke, yana na CD French, Guinee Percussions et Chants Malinke na Famoudou Konates maitre-djembe & länEnsemble Hamana Dan Ba, nke edobere na Febụwarị, na afọ 1998
Na mgbakwunye na Guinea, Kourouma agakwagharịla Germany na US na-akụzi ma na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ maara na ka ndị obodo na-anabata ndụ nke oge a, ememe ọdịnala ha na ụda drum na-eso ha ga-apụ n'anya, nakwa na nkuzi ụda ndị ahụ ga-enyere ha aka ibi ndụ
Ndị okenye ya, Konate na Keita, arụwo ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ iji chekwaa ọdịnala egwu Malinke
N'afọ 2001, Kourouma mere atụmatụ idekọ CD mbụ ya n'obodo ya, Oroko, iji mee òkè ya n'ichekwa egwu ọdịnala
Mana na Jenụwarị nke afọ ahụ, obodo ahụ gbara ọkụ
Mgbalị idekọ ihe ghọrọ mbọ enyemaka
Ọkụ niile gbara ọkụ

E mepụtara Oroko Fund na Febụwarị, na afọ 2002, mgbe otu afọ nke ịnakọta ego gasịrị, Kourouma, na onye America na-akụ ọkpọ, Keio Ogawa, nyere ndị Oroko ihe karịrị pound 500 nke uwe na usoro zuru ezu nke ịgbà

Kemgbe ahụ, ego Oroko Fund nwetara, kwa afọ, nyere aka maka ọrụ maka ndị ogbenye na Oroko, gụnyere nri, uwe, ọgwụ na ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ, na, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, olulu mmiri nke abụọ dị ọcha maka obodo ahụ
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2002, Kourouma wepụtara CD nke ya, The Great Panther of Guinea, Mamady ozu ozu Kan! nke nwetara nyocha dị egwu
N'afọ 2003, Kourouma na Ogawa lụrụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, nna ya ukwu, Famoudou Konate, tọhapụrụ Kourouma n'ọmụmụ ihe ya ma kwupụta Kourouma dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ na onye na-ewu ọkpọ n'onwe ya
Ya na nwunye ya na ezinụlọ ya, Kourouma ewuola ebe njem njem na Oroko African Village Drum Adventure
A na-eduzi ndị sonyere site na Guinea gaa n'etiti Malinke drumming
N'ebe ahụ, ha na-ahụ ndụ obodo Afrịka, klas ịgbà na ịgba egwú, ememe ọdịnala na ememme, wee laghachi n'ụlọ na echiche zuru ụwa ọnụ na ncheta ha ga-enwe obi ụtọ ruo mgbe ebighi ebi

N'iji akụkụ nke oge ya na Guinea, na akụkụ nke ụlọ ya na Three Rivers, Central California, Kourouma na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Konate na Keita, na-akụzi klas na ụlọ ọgwụ, na-ewu ịgbà, ma na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị otu ya Annye Ben, n'ógbè na n'ụwa niile
Wadaba nọ na ngalaba na The DrumConnection, Boston, Massachusetts
A họpụtara 'Sabari' nke Mamady 'Wadaba' Kourouma maka 8th Annual Independent Music Awards maka World Traditional Album of the year
Mamady Keïta[lower-alpha 1] (iri abụọ na na otu na ọnwa Jun 1950 ̊ 2021) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ si mba Guinea nke West Africa
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na djembe
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Tam Tam Mandingue nke ịgbà
Ọ bụ onye otu agbụrụ Manding
A mụrụ Keïta na obere obodo Balandougou, Guinea, na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Siguiri, nso ókè Mali
Keïta bụ nwa eze Sundiata Keita
Ka ọ na-erule afọ ise, ọ mepụtara usoro nke ya nke ụda, ịkụ aka, bass ma mụta ụda nke obodo ya ma na-akpọ Djembe na ememe niile, ememe na ememme
N'ụzọ nkà na ụzụ, mmalite ya na djembe malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, n'okpuru Karinkadjan Kondé, onye isi djembefola nke Balandugu, onye malitere ya na ihe nzuzo nke djembe
Keïta gụrụ akwụkwọ na omenala obodo ya, na-amụta akụkọ ihe mere eme na egwu nke ndị Malinke
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu mbụ nke mpaghara ballet nke Siguiri mgbe Balanka Sidiki, onye na-anakọta ndị otu ahụ, bịara Balandugu na-achọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri

Mamarumo Marokane (amụrụ c
1997) bụ onye onye ngosi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa
A mara ya maka ngosiputa ya na Shadow na MTV Shuga
A mụrụ Marokane n'ihe dị ka afọ 1996
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na CityVarsity School nke Media na Creative Arts
Ọ nwere ike ịsụ Bekee, Sepedi na Setswana
Marokane nwetara aha ya site na ngosipụta ya na usoro Netflix Shadow yana na MTV Shuga ebe ọ na-egwu Dineo
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, a kpọrọ Marokane otu n'ime kpakpando anọ na-ebilite site na Pearl Thusi na Cosmopolitan South Africa
Ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ ndị ama ama maka obere usoro abalị nke akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together na akọwapụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na 20 Eprel 2020
Mambila bụ usoro asụsụ na-agbasa na Naịjirịa na Cameroon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Mambiloid, alaka nke BenueʹCongo
Olumba ndị a ma ama bụ Barup, Bang, Dorofi, Gembu, Hainari, Kabri, Mayo Ndaga, Mbamnga, Tamien, Warwar (na Nigeria); Sunu Torbi (Torbi), Ju Naare (Gembu), na Cameroon, Ju Ba na Langa
Mambila nwere ọtụtụ aha, nke, ewezuga aha olumba, gụnyere Bea, Ble, Juli, Lagubi, Nor, Nor Tagbo, Tongbo, na mkpoputa Mabila, Mambere, Mambilla
Ndị na Tep na ndị na-asụ ụdị Mambila ndị ọzọ na-ewerekarị Tep dị ka olumba, mana ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-asụ Tep bụ agbụrụ Mambila, okwu ha anaghị aghọta ụdị ndị ọzọ
N'ihe gbasara nhazi asụsụ ọ nwere ike ịka mma ịkpọ ya asụsụ Mambiloid dị iche
Lee ntụaka Connell n'okpuru
Ndị na-eji ụrọ eme ihe n'etiti ndị Mambila na-asụ Somyev, asụsụ Mambiloid yiri ya, ọ bụ ezie na nke a fọrọ nke nta ka ọ kwụsị
E nwere ihe omume nke njikọta ụdaume fricativized dị nso mgbe ọtụtụ ụdaume bu ụzọ
Alveolo-palatal fricative na ụdaume /i, ɨ/ dị ka [Xi, Xi], na ụda ezé egbugbere ọnụ na /ɯ/ dị ka
Nanị ụdaume /b, f, t, d, n, l, ʃ, k/ na-anụ ụdaume fricativized [bī, ʃī, fv, tv, dv, nv, lv, kv]
Ndị Mambwe na ndị Lungu bi na njedebe ndịda nke Ọdọ Mmiri Tanganyika na Tanzania na Zambia na-asụ otu asụsụ nwere obere ọdịiche
Ikekwe ọkara nke ndị Fipa nọ n'ebe ugwu ha na-asụ ya dị ka asụsụ ala
Mgbe ndị Fipa na-asụ ya, a na-akpọ ya 'Fipa-Mambwe'; nke a bụkwa okwu maka alaka asụsụ Bantu nke gụnyere Fipa na Mambwe-Lungu
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ Mambwe na mpaghara Rukwa, n'ebe ndịda obodo Sumbawanga
Ọ bụ asụsụ nke bụ otu n'ime asụsụ atọ ndị obodo Rukwa Region na-asụ
Ndị bi n'ógbè a na-asụ Fipa, Mambwe na Kinyiha
A na-asụ asụsụ Mambwe ma eleghị anya na Fipa mana enwere ọdịiche nke a ghọtara okwu ụfọdụ n'etiti ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ abụọ a
A na-ekwukwa asụsụ Mambwe n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Zambia dị ka asụsụ nne ha ọ bụ ezie na ha dị iche n'ụzọ ha si ekwu okwu
Mame Bineta Sane (a mụrụ na 3 Febụwarị 2000), nke a makwaara dịka Mama Sané, bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dịka 'Ada' na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya karịrị nke mmadụ bụ Atlantics
Ọ tolitere na Thiaroye, mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Dakar, Senegal
Ọ nataghị agụmakwụkwọ mgbe niile n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-amụ ịkwa ákwà na Thiaroye
O mebeghị ihe nkiri ọ bụla tupu mgbe a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri afọ 2019 Atlantics nke Mati Diop duziri dịka ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Sane agaghị ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ezie mgbe Diop kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, Sane rụrụ ọrụ 'Ada', onye onye onye ọ hụrụ n'anya, Souleiman, na ụgbọ mmiri nke ụmụ okorobịa ndị ọzọ, furu efu n'oké osimiri
Maka ọrụ ya, Sane mechara nata nhọpụta César maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ 2020 César awards ma họpụta ya maka Lumières Award maka onye na na-eme egwuregwu kachasị mma n'afọ 2020
Lumières awards na maka Black Reel Award maka Female Outstanding Breakthrough Performance na Black Reel Awards nke afọ 2020
Mame Madior Boye (amụrụ n'afọ 1940) bụ onye bụbu praịm minista nke Senegal site n'afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2002
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ
A mụrụ Boye n'ezinụlọ ndị ọka iwu na Saint-Louis, dịka ụmụnne ya atọ ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye ọka iwu na Dakar na Paris
Nna ya bụ onye odeakwụkwọ, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye bailiff
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faidherbe High School n'obodo ya
N'afọ 1963, ọ debara aha ya na Faculty of Legal and Economic Sciences na Mahadum Dakar wee gaa n'ihu na ọzụzụ ya na National Center for Judicial Studies (CNEJ) na Paris ruo n'afọ 1969
Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'ọrụ ya na nchịkwa ikpe ziri ezi nke Senegal
Ọ bụ osote onye ọkàiwu ọha na eze, onye ọka ikpe na osote onye isi oche mbụ nke Ụlọikpe Mbụ nke Dakar na onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị Ikpe

Ọ bụ onye guzobere na nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Association of Senegalese Lawyers site na afọ 1975 ruo na afọ 1990, wee bụrụ onye nduzi nke Engagements maka West African Banking Company (Compagnie bancaire de l'Afrique Occidentale, CBAO) site na Septemba na afọ 1990 ruo Eprel na afọ 2000
Boye bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke International Federation of Women Lawyers site na afọ 1978 ruo na afọ 1998
A na-akwanyere ya ùgwù dị ka onye ọkachamara siri ike, onye nwere ọgụgụ isi na onye na-akwụwa aka ọtọ
Ọ bụ onye na-alụ ọgụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye Alakụba ma gbaa alụkwaghịm ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Mmekọrịta ya na ọchịchị nke Onye isi ala Abdou Diouf nwere nsogbu ma ọ nabataghị ọkwa dị elu na usoro ikpe iji chekwaa iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na nnwere onwe ya
Mgbe mmeri Abdoulaye Wade meriri na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2000, Boye ghọrọ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2000
Mana esemokwu bilitere n'etiti Onye isi ala na Praịm Minista, onye sitere na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọzọ
Moustapha Niasse gbara arụkwaghịm ma Wade họpụtara Boye dị ka praịm minista na 3 Machị na afọ 2001, ọnwa abụọ tupu ntuli aka ndị omeiwu
Wade enweghị ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị omeiwu na ihe karịrị òtù ụmụ nwanyị 30 na-abụghị nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị haziri mkpọsa tupu ntuli aka na-achọ ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị omeiwu
Boye abụghị nanị nwanyị, ọ bụkwa onye na-adịghị etinye aka, nke yiri nke ọma
Ọ nọgidere dị ka Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi na gọọmentị ọhụrụ ahụ
Nhọrọ ahụ nyere Wade ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu - 89 n'ime oche 120
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị mụbara, mana ọ bụghị ihe karịrị pasent 19

Mgbe ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Eprel, na afọ 2001 gasịrị, a họpụtara Boye ọzọ dị ka praịm minista na 10 Mee na afọ 2001; Otú ọ dị, a nọchiri ya dị ka Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi na gọọmentị a họpụtara na 12 Mee
N'ọchịchị nke abụọ nke Boye, e nwere ụmụ nwanyị ise n'ime ndị minista 25, ma e jiri ya tụnyere abụọ n'oge gara aga
Nke a bụ mmeri dị mma maka Boye
Mana gọọmentị chere nnukwu nsogbu akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ihu
E mere mgbalị iji mee ka agụmakwụkwọ na ahụike sie ike, melite ụgwọ ọrụ, belata enweghị ọrụ n'etiti ndị na-eto eto ma kwado ngalaba ọrụ ugbo
Mana ndị minista ahụ bụ ndị ọhụrụ na ndị na-enweghị ahụmahụ na echiche dị iche iche na njikọ ahụ

Dị ka Praịm Minista Boye nọ n'okpuru Onye isi ala, Wade bụkwa onye ndú na-arụ ọrụ aka na ya, onye isi ala doro anya na-achịkwa Boye na gọọmentị ya ka Onye isi ala chụpụrụ na 4 Nọvemba, na afọ 2002, a kọrọ na ọ bụ n'ihi mmeghachi omume ya na ọdachi mmiri MV na Septemba, na afọ 2002
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọdachi ụgbọ mmiri kachasị njọ n'oge niile
Ihe karịrị mmadụ 1,800 nwụrụ mgbe ụgbọ mmiri nke gọọmentị mikpuru
Boye kwuru na ihe mberede ahụ bụ n'ihi ihu igwe, si otú a wepụ ọdịda nke ụgbọ mmiri na ndị ọrụ
Mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, e nwere ebubo nke njehie dị elu
A chụpụrụ onye isi ndị agha mmiri na ndị minista abụọ gbara arụkwaghịm
Ka e mesịrị, na Septemba, na afọ 2004, Alpha Oumar Konaré họpụtara Boye dị ka onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke African Union maka ịkwalite nchebe nke ndị nkịtị na agha
Na 12 Septemba, na afọ 2008, otu onye ọka ikpe na France nyere ikike ijide Boye, tinyere ndị ọzọ asatọ, n'ihe metụtara ọdachi
Gọọmentị Senegal jụrụ nke a ma, na nzaghachi, kpebie ikpe ikpe onye ọka ikpe nyere akwụkwọ ikike ahụ
Ụlọikpe mkpegharị ikpe nke Paris kagburu ikike njide Boye n'etiti ọnwa Juun afọ 2009
