Manuela Solís Sager (1912-1996) bụ onye isi ọrụ nke Mexico America, onye nhazi otu na onye nkuzi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ụmụ nwanyị Mexico na-ahazi na Texas n'oge afọ 1930, ebe 40% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Mexico na-arụ ọrụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala, ọrụ dị ala
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Manuela malitere na 1932 na 1933, mgbe ọ malitere ịhazi ya na ndị ọrụ Tejano na-arụ ọrụ n'ubi yabasị na uwe na Laredo
N'afọ 1934, La Asociación de Jornaleros nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ otu afọ iji gaa Universidad Obrera de México, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka ekpe na Mexico City
N'oge a, o nyere aka guzobe Texas Workers Alliance na San Antonio n'akụkụ Emma Tenayuca
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Laredo na 1935, Manuela na di ya, James Sager, malitere ijikọ mbọ ha na-agba n'etiti ndị ọrụ Mexico n'ime otu steeti

Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Manuela na James dị ka ndị na-ahazi Ndagwurugwu Rio Grande na nzukọ Corpus Christi nke guzobere South Texas Agricultural Worker's Union (STAWU), nke na-anọchite anya ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-etinye ihe na Mexico
N'afọ 1937, ọ ghọrọ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ Alliance of America, otu mba nke ndị ọrụ na-enweghị ọrụ

N'afọ 1938, Manuela Solis Sager na James Sager kwagara San Antonio iji kwado ndị ọrụ Mexicana na Chicana na-etinye aka na 1938 Pecan Shellers strike megide Southern Pecan Shelling Company, nke Emma Tenayuca duziri
N'oge ọgbaghara ahụ, ọtụtụ puku ndị ọrụ nọ n'ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ 130 mere mkpesa maka mbelata ụgwọ ọrụ nke otu cents kwa pound nke shelled pecans
A na-egbu ndị ọrụ na-eme ngagharị iwe, jide ha, ma tụọ ha mkpọrọ
Ọgbaghara ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ụbọchị iri atọ na asaa gasịrị mgbe ndị ọrụ pecan nke obodo ahụ kwetara na ha ga-eme mkpebi
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ ahụ, Iwu Mmekọrịta Ọrụ Mba buliri ụgwọ ọrụ ruo cents iri abụọ na ise n'otu awa, ọ bụ ezie na n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Southern mepụtara usoro ịgba égbè

Mgbe ọgbaghara ahụ gasịrị, Manuela Solis Sager nọgidere bụrụ onye otu Communist Party na San Antonio, ma gaa n'ihu na-eme mkpọsa ma na-ahazi gburugburu usoro chicano, usoro ụmụ nwanyị, ikike ndị mbịarambịa, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka, na megide iwu mba ọzọ
N'ime afọ ndị 1970, Manuela bụ onye na-akwado Raza Unida Party
Ọ nwụrụ na California na 1996, mgbe ọ na-eleta nwa ya nwoke
Manuelita Brown bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na San Diego, California

Brown malitere na 1961, site na 1990s; Fine Art - Sculpture na Bruno Lucchesi, Scottsdale Artists, Nigel Konstam, Verrocchio Art Centre, Casole d'Elsa, Tuscany, Italy, ọmụmụ na internship na Fire Arts Foundry, Layne Campbell, nwetakwara BS
na Mathematics na Mahadum Oregon State na 1962, asambodo nkụzi na mgbakọ na mwepụ nke sekọndrị na 1966, na MS na Psychology na Mahaduma California, San Diego na 1976

N'ịkpụ ihe n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, o mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise nke ndị Africa America a ma ama, na ọtụtụ ihe osisa ọdịbendị dị ichè ichè na ihe omimi, ihe atụ na atụmatụ màkà nnukwu ọla nchara nke ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya site na ụrọ na armatures na usoro wax furu efu
Ọ lara ezumike nká na nkụzi n'afọ 2000 iji chụsoo ihe ọkpụkpụ ógè niile, dịka e kwuru n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ dịka edepụtara
N'afọ 2018, a na-egosi ọrụ Brown na 'Legacy in Black' na San Diego History Center na Balboa Park
A tụwo aro aha Brown dị ka ónyé nwèrè ike ịbụ onye na-ese ihe màkà ihe oyiyi nke Shirley Chisholm, nwanyị ojii mbụ a họpụtara na Congress
Manuwa ma ọ bụ Manuva bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Manyika bụ asụsụ Shona nke ebo Manyika na-asụ n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Zimbabwe na n'ofe oke na Mozambique
Ọ gụnyere olumba ChiBocha, ChiUngwe, na ChiManyika, nke a na-esi na ya nweta aha ọtụtụ asụsụ Manyika
Manza (Mānzā, Mandja) bụ asụsụ Ubangian nke ndị Mandja nke Central African Republic na-asụ
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Ngbaka na ọ nwere ike bụrụ nke a na-aghọta nke ọma
Phonology nwere ihe ndị a
A na-egosi ụda na mkpụrụedemede site na iji akara ngosi
Manzur (Arabụ ; nke a na-akpọkwa Manzoor ma ọ bụ Manzour) bụ aha nwoke Arabic nke pụtara 'kwetara' ma ọ bụ 'anabata'
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na South na Southeast Asia
Manzur bụkwa aha nna Spanish

Mao Arukwe Ohuabunwa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'obodo Naijiria, Onye na-azụ ahịa ma ugbu a na-eje ozi dika Onye Sinetọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Abia North n'ụlọ nzukọ omeiwu ala Naijiria nke asatọ O jebuola ozi a mbu n'ụlọ nzukọ ọmeiwu nke anọ na nke ise dị ka Onye nnọchite anya Ọgbọ nta vootụ Arọchukwu / Ohafia nke Steeti Abia n’okpuru otu ndi Peolple's Democratic Party site n'afo 1999 rue 2007

A mụrụ Mao Arukwe Ohuabunwa na Port Harcourt, Steeti Rivers n'abali iri abụọ n'anọ nke ọnwa Mee afo 1957 nye nne na nna ya ndị bụ ndị na-azụ ahịa na Atani obodo dị na mpaghara okpuru ọchichi Arochukwu nke Steeti Abia
Ọ gara Orevo State School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementrị ya na Enitona High School, Borokiri ebe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara n'ihu inweta nzere HND na BTech na Applied Biology na Microbiology n'otu n'otu site na Rivers State University of Science and Technology
Ọ gara n'ihu ịga Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ nke Steeti Enugu ebe ọ nwetara asambodo PGD na nchịkwa ọha na MSc na ndị ọrụ nchịkwa mmadụ

N'afo 1998, Ebe ọbụ na onwetela nnukwu ọganịhu na azụmahịa ya n'ime afọ ndị ọ tinyegoro ọ banyezie na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Sinetọ Mao zọrọ oche n'ụlọ nzukọ omeiwu nke nta nke ala Naijria n'okpuru nchedo nke otu United Nigeria Congress Party wee merie, tupu emebisia usoro ahụ

Ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Ọgbọ nta vootụ Arochukwu/Ohafia mgbe ọ zọrọ ọzọ ma merie na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 1999 n’oge a n’okpuru otu ndoro-ndoro ochichi nke People's Democratic Party ma emesịa họpụta ya dika onye nnọchi anya Onye isi nke Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya

Ọ gara n'ihu ịzọ oche maka ịnọchite Abia North na Ụlọ nzukọ omeiwu ukwu nke Naịjirịa na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke afo 2007 n'okpuru otu People's Democratic Party (PDP) ma omerigi, ma na-enweghị nkụda mmụọ, ọ gara n'ihu wee zoo na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke afo 2015 nke o meriri ma meriekwa na nke emeghariri n'abali isii nke ọnwa Machị, afo 2016 ka Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị kagburu mmeri ya na mbụ
Chief Orji Uzor Kalu meriri Mao na Ntuliaka Ọchịchị Naịjirịa nke afo 2019, Onye nara ya oche ahụ
Mao lụrụ Lady Barr
Nimi Faith Ohuabunwa onye ya na ya nwere umu
Ọ bụkwa onye nwe ma guzobere Mao Ohuabunwa Foundation Ọ bụ nwanne Mazi Sam Ohuabunwa nke nta
Asụsụ Mao bụ ngalaba nke asụsụ Omotic a na-asụ na yaEtiopia
Otu ahụ nwere ụdị ndị a
A na-eme atụmatụ na e nwere ndị ọkà okwu Bambasi 5,000, ndị ọkà okwu 3,000 nke ọ bụla Hozo na Seze na narị ole na ole Ganza na-asụ asụsụ (Bender, 2000)
N'oge ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nso nso a, puku mmadụ ole na ole ndị ọkà okwu Bambassi guzobe onwe ha na ndagwurugwu nke Osimiri Didessa na mpaghara Belo Jegonfoy
Ọtụtụ n'ime mpaghara Mirab Welega bụbu ebe obibi nke asụsụ Mao, mana ndị na-asụ asụsụ furu efu n'ihi mmetụta Oromo na-abawanye
Asụsụ Mao nwere mmekọrịta chiri anya na asụsụ Koman
Ụfọdụ ndị na-asụ Koman na Etiopia na-ewere onwe ha dị ka agbụrụ Mao
Ntụnyere nke ọnụọgụ n'asụsụ ọ bụla
Àtụ Omotic languages
Map (Timap), ana akpokwa ya Amo (Among), bụ asụsụ ndị Kainji dị iche iche nke ala Naijiria
Mapaseka Koetle (amụrụ 23 Maachị 1989) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye na-ede blọgụ
Ọ pụtara na 2018 Forbes Africa na ndepụta mmadụ iri atọ nọ agbata afọ iri atọ
Amụrụ Koetle-Nyokong ma zụlite ya na Bloemfontein, Free State
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na AFDA mana mechaa gụchaa akwụkwọ na CityVarsity
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Koetle-Nyokong nwetara ọrụ onye ndu na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri a maara dị ka second Chances, nke Andile Ncube mere
Na 2012, ọ gosipụtara na ihe omume Show Off, nke bụ Arts Alive Festival
Ọ n'eme ihe omume Dintle ugbu a na usoro Scandal! nke na-eme na etv
Ya na di ya meghere wee rụọ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ franchise a na-akpọ Gorge Grab n Go Café, nke dị na mpụga ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Sandton Gautrain na Johannesburg
Ọ na-achikọtakwa ihe omume na-ahụ maka ịdị ọcha nke ụmụ agbọghọ na Bloemfontein, nke ọ na-esi na ya na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ nọ ná mkpa ihe mgbochi ịdị ọcha
Ọ na-ede blọgụ gbasara ahụmịhe ya dịka nne ma na-akwado mmemme ndị gbadoro anya n'ihe ọ bụla gbasara ịbụ nne
Ọ lụrụ Nelson Nyokong
Ha nwere otu nwa, Nema
Mapula Motlanthe (née Mopate) bụ onye bụbu First Lady nke South Africa na onye bụbu nwunye onye bụbu onye isi ala nke South Africa nakwa onye mkpọrọ Robben Island Kgalema Motlanthe
Mapula Mopate si Sophiatown bịa ma kwuo Tswana
Mapula malitere mmekọrịta ha na Kgalema Motlanthe n'oge afọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma ha lụrụ na 1977
Ụmụ ha bụ Kagiso na Kgomotso
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na Leratong Hospital na Mogale City
A mụrụ nwa mbụ ha n'afọ 1972
Mgbe ha lụsịrị, ya na ezinụlọ di ya na nwa ha nke abụọ biri, e jidere di ya ma zigara ya Robben Island
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị, Ntabiseng
A gwaghị Ntabiseng na o nwere nna dị iche ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 21
N'afọ 2008, onye isi oche ANC na onye isi ala South Africa, Thabo Mbeki gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi ala nke South Africa
NEC họpụtara Kgalema Motlante ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala nke anọ na nke atọ na-esote ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke South Africa
A ṅụrụ Motlanthe iyi dị ka onye isi oche na Union Buildings na Pretoria, Mapula ghọkwara nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ
N'afọ 2009, onye bụbu osote onye isi ala South Africa bụ Jacob Zuma nọchiri Kgalema Motlante, dịka onye isi ala ọhụrụ South Africa, a họpụtara Kgalema ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisiala mba ahụ
Mapula na Kgalema malitere ịgba alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2011, na 2014 ha bịara na nkwekọrịta enyi na enyi
Ọ natara ego ọnwa na ụlọ abụọ
Ya na di ya kewara ọtụtụ afọ
Maqbul Mohammed (a mụrụ na 7 Machị 1981) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-egosi redio
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya (Donavan) na Auntie Boss na Vashita, usoro ihe nkiri mbụ nke Kenya nke Moonbeam productions mepụtara

O gosikwara na mpụ na ihe nkiri iwu mbụ nke Kenya bụ Crime and Justice Ama ama Maqbul dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri rịrị elu mgbe ọ gosipụtara na Kenya'sMakutano Junction, nke bụ otu n'ime usoro TV nke obodo kachasị ogologo site n'afọ̀ 2005 ruo 2009
Ọrụ ihe nkiri kachasị ọhụrụ nke Maqbul bụ mpụ na ikpe ziri ezi nke e gosipụtara na Showmax
O meela ihe na ọrụ ndị ọzọ dịka ụgha nke na-ejikọta [nkọwa dị mkpa]
A mụrụ ya na Mombasa na 7 Machị 1981, Maqbul bụ nwanne onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Shadya Delgush
Ọ lụrụ nwunye ma bụrụ nna ụmụ atọ

Maqbul sonyeere ụlọ ihe nkiri ozugbo ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ ihe nkiri phoenix n'afọ̀ 1999 Horning nkà ya n'elu ngwago maka afọ 4 sochirinụ na-egosi n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu nke ga-eme ka ọ nweta oku TV na Kenya Broadcasting Corporation
Maqbul gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Nnukwu ọganihu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ bụ n'afọ̀ 2006 maka ọrụ ya dịka Karis na usoro Makutano Junction

Ọ ga-emesị pụta ma gosipụta na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn dịka Auntie Boss, Vashita na Crime and Justice O mechara pụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka; Behind Closed Doors, Kwani Readings Weakness, All Girls Together,
O bu ụzọ pụta na TV mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na ihe nkiri KBC TV Reflections
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị isi na ihe nkiri soap opera Lies that Bind
Ya na Ruth Maingi, Maureen Koech, Justine Mirichii na Florence Nduta nwere ihe nrite
N'ihi nnukwu arụmọrụ ya na ọrụ ahụ, a họpụtara ya na 2013 Kalasha Awards
N'afọ 2015, o nwere ọrụ na-eduga na ihe ọchị Auntie Boss! n'akụkụ Eve D'Souza
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, Maqbul bụ onye na-egosi redio na Capital FM na nso nso a Onye isi redio na Nation Fm
2021 Ọrụ nkwado mpụ na ikpe ziri ezi
Maqbul Mohammed na IMDb
Maqdisi (Arabụ ) bụ Arabic nisba na-ezo aka na onye Jerusalemite
O sitere na Bayt al-Maqdis, aha Arabic maka Jerusalem, site na Hibru Beit HaMikdash, Ụlọ Nsọ dị na Jerusalem
Taa, aha Arabic a na-akpọ Jerusalem bụ al-Quds
María Bruguera Pérez (6 Nọvemba 1913 - 26 Disemba 1992) bụ onye anarcho-syndicalist nke nwụrụ na Madrid na 1992
Bruguera sitere na ezinụlọ nwere nkwenye siri ike nke anarchist na obodo PSOE na-achị na mpaghara Confederación Nacional del Trabajo (CNT)
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ọ na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na isonyere Juventudes Libertarias
Ọ sonyekwara n'òtù ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị bụ Ni Dios Ni Amo

Burguera zere ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ, e nyekwara ya afọ iri atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke e belatara n'ihi ọrụ ụlọ mkpọrọEkewapụrụ ya na nwa ya nwoke, ndị ọchịchị na-agbanwe aha ya ịbụ nke onye senti n'ihi mgbanwe e mere n'iwu nke chọrọ ka a kpọọ ụmụaka aha ndị senti Katọlik
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị ihe karịrị afọ asatọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, a tọhapụrụ Bruguera n'ụlọ ikpe Madrid na 1946
Ezinụlọ ya nwere nkwenye siri ike nke anarchist n'ihi nna ya nwere kọntaktị na mgbasa ozi anarchist mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-amụ akwụkwọ na Seville na ụlọ ọrụ cork
N'oge a mụrụ Bruguera, obodo ya na-abụkarị ndị na-elekọta mmadụ nwere nhazi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ ezie na nna ya na-ekerịta echiche anarcho-syndicalism ya n'etiti ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ na-ewe oge na ndị obodo aghaghị ịkụziri onwe ha ihe gbasara nkuzi nke mmegharị ahụ

Confederación Nacional del Trabajo (CNT) ahazila ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọrụ na mpaghara Badajoz na njedebe nke 1920sNna ya jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Casa del Pueblo de Jerez de los Caballeros
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, enweghi CNT na njikọ jikọtara ya na Jerez maka nna ya ka ọ sonye n'oge ahụ
Mgbagha ọchịchị nke malitere Agha Obodo nke Spain malitere na July 1936
Burguera dị afọ iri abụọ na otu n'oge ahụ, ọ dịkwa ime Antonio n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na Francisco Torrado
Antonio ga-abụ naanị nwa ya
Bruguera na ezinụlọ ya gbapụrụ na ogbugbu nke ndị Fascist nke Jerez's Republican left
Nna ya gbagara n'ógbè Republican dị nso na Badajoz
Bruguera na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ gbalịrị ịgafe ókèala gaa Portugal
Ndị si Huelva na Badajoz niile gara n'okporo ụzọ iji mee otu ihe ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha chọtara onwe ha n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Coitadinha dị nso na Noudar n'akụkụ Portugal nke ókèala
Ndị ọzọ hụrụ onwe ha n'ogige dị nso na Mourão
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị Spain, a hụghị Portugal dị ka ihe dị nchebe kpamkpam dịka a na-ele Portugal anya dị ka onye na-elekọta ọdịmma ndị Nationalists
E chebere ndụ Bruguera, e wee kpọga ya na Jerez ebe ya, ụbọchị asatọ n'akụkụ nwa ya nwoke, a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ tupu a kpọga ya n'Ụlọ mkpọrọ dị na Badajoz ruo otu afọ
Ọ bụ ezie na a hapụrụ nwa ya nwoke ka ya na ya nọrọ ọnwa itoolu mbụ nke ụlọ mkpọrọ ya ka o wee nwee ike ilekọta ya, Antonio mechara kewapụ ya
E zigara ya ka ya na nne na nna Torrado biri
Iwu ọhụrụ sitere n'aka gọọmentị Spain abịala na a ga-akpọ ụmụaka niile aha ndị senti
Nke a bụ n'ihi na a na-eweta Katọlik n'ime gọọmentị dị ka ike nke mba
Ihe si na ya pụta bụ na Antonio gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Francisco, mgbanwe nke ya na nkewa a manyere ya bụ nnukwu ihe na-akụ Bruguera
A tọhapụrụ Bruguera n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Madrid na 1946, mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ asatọ na otu ọnwa n'ụlọ ikpe

Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, ọ nwetaghachiri ikike ilekọta nwa ya nwoke ma nwee ike ịgakwuru nwanne ya nwoke, Antonio, onye, dị ka Bruguera na nna ha, e jidere n'otu oge na ihe omume nke hụrụ nne Bruguera ya na onye mmekọ ya nwụrụ
A tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'onwe ya, ọnwa ole na ole tupu nwanne ya nwanyị
Nwanne nwoke na nwanne nwanyị ahụ gbazitere obere ụlọ na Madrid
Bruguera gbalịrị ịmalite ndụ ọhụrụ maka onwe ya, mana ọ nọgidekwara na-etinye aka na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya gara aga
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 26 Disemba 1992 n'ihi ihe ndị sitere n'okike, a kpọrọ ozu ya ọkụ ma debe ntụ ya na ili ozu La Almudena de Madrid
N'emume na-emetụ n'ahụ nke ndị ezinụlọ na ndị obodo ya gara, a na-ele mbọ ndụ ya na-agba inyere ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ aka dị ka akụkụ nke mmesapụ aka ya nye ndị ọzọ
Marabe bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Marah Louw, nke a makwaara dị ka Marah Louw Thompson ma ọ bụ Mara Louw, bụ onye South Africa na-abụ abụ, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya n'abali iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1952 na mpaghara Mzimhlophe na Soweto, South Africa
Ọ malitere isonye otu ukwe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri n'oge ọ gara Japan, Hong Kong, Philippines, South Africa na United Kingdom
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ gara Zambia, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Lesotho, Swaziland na Namibia dị ka onye na-eti egwu
Louw gụrụ egwu ncheta ọmụmụ nke Nelson Mandela na 1988 bụ Nelson Mandela 70th Birthday Tribute concert na Wembley Stadium, London iji kwado ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn nke South Africa bụ The Queen ebe omere ngosi agwa ihe nkiri dị ka Boi Maake ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ na 2017
Ọ bụkwa onye ọka ikpe na oge nke abụọ nke Idols South Africa
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021 Louw gosipụtara Kọmitii ndị omeiwu South Africa na-ahụ maka ahia na ụlọ ọrụ iji kwado mgbanwe nwebisiinka na ikike ichi isi nke ndị na-eme ihe omume
Marais ma ọ bụ Groupe Marais, nke e guzobere na afo 1962 na obodo France, bụ onye na-emepụta trenchers
Isi ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị na mpaghara Durtal kemgbe afọ 2001
Marais Society site na onye guzobere ya, Jacques Marais nọ na 1962 n'azụ wiil trenching na ntinye nke eriri ma ọ bụ usoro ọkpọkọ na-agbanwe agbanwe
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, akara MARAIS na-agụnye ndị na-agba trenchers, ndị na-aga trenchers chain, na ndị na-eme trenchers micro
N'ịbụ onye e kere na afo 1962, Maazị Marais, onye ọrụ ngo dị na ngalaba Sarthe French, nwetara ikike maka wiil na-ebibi ihe maka usoro drainage (ọrụ ugbo) nke ahụ bụ mmalite nke trencher wheel
1974, nchịkwa nke Postes et Télécommunications họọrọ ili 40,000 kilomita nke netwọk
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ntụgharị akụkụ nke wiil ahụ na igbe na-adọba iji mee ka ọrụ dị n'akụkụ ụzọ dị mfe
N'agbata afọ 1974 na afọ 1993, e wuru ọtụtụ trenchers ma nye ụlọ ọrụ injinia obodo ụgwọ iji lie eriri na netwọk Telecommunications, ọkụ eletrik, gas na mmiri
1995, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyochara ahịa ọhụrụ na mba ofesi Morocco, Algeria, Senegal, Colombia, Mexico, United States, Canada, nke ga-anọchite anya 30% nke ahịa ya n'oge na-adịghị anya
2000, Marais mepụtara micro-trencher nke aha ya bụ CLEANFAST maka eriri eriri anya na-etinye n'ime obodo ukwu
62001, site n'iwu netwọk LDCOM nke dị kilomita 12 000, ugbu a 9 telecom, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara nkà na ahụmịhe nke onye na-emepụta ngwọta netwọk
2005, ụlọ ọrụ Marais guzobere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka mbụ ya na Morocco 'Marais Morocco'
2006, ọ bụ onye ndu Europe nke igwe na-etinye n'ọhịa nke netwọk ike, nkwukọrịta na ili mmiri na gas
2008, iwu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ịmepụta igwe ọhụrụ n'ọhịa nke micro trenching na Side Cut maka ahịa FTTx
2009, okike nke njikọ aka Marais-Lucas Technologies na Sydney (Australia)

2009, nnweta nke ụlọ ọrụ Marais site na Qualium Inverstissement (Caisse des dépôts et consignations) na Ouest Croissance (Groupe Banque Populaire), na Etienne Dugas nọchiri Daniel Rivard dị ka onye isi oche nke Marais Group
Marais ma ọ bụ Groupe Marais na-emepụta trenchers maka ime obodo na obodo ukwu
Marais Group nwere ụlọ ọrụ ise
Maram Ben Aziza (Arabic, a mụrụ na Disemba 25, 1986), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe , ihe nlereanya, na onye ọchụnta ego, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya nke Selima na usoro Tunisian Maktoub
A mụrụ Maram Ben Aziza n'ọnwa Disemba 25, 1986, na Carthage, Tunisia
Ọ na-enwe mmasị na ịgba egwu na ejiji site na nwata
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe ngosi kemgbe afọ 2000, ọ nọchitere anya ọtụtụ ụdị ịma mma ma gosipụta maka ụfọdụ mkpuchi magazin
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ pụtara nke ọma na usoro Tunisian Maktoub n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2011, Maram pụtara na ihe nkiri Tunisian Histoires tunisiennes nke Nada Mezni Hafaiedh, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dịka onye ọbịa na onye na-ede akụkọ na telivishọn n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ ghọrọ onye nwere mmetụta na instagram ngwa ngwa, nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ na-eso ụzọ ka ọ na-erule afọ 2019
Onye guzobere ụlọ ahịa ejiji na ngwa ngwa mara mma, Maramode, o nwekwara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, Omek Houria na Tunis
Maram lụrụ di n'afọ 2018
Maravene Sheppard Loeschke (Jenuari 28, 1947 ̊ Juun 25, 2015) bụ onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ Amerika nke jere ozi dịka onye isi oche nke Mahadum Towson site na 2012 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2014
Ọ kụziri na Towson site na 1970 ruo 2002 tupu ọ hapụ Maryland gaa Pennsylvania, ịghọ onye isi nke Mahadum Wilkes, mgbe ahụ onye isi oche nke Mahadụm Mansfield
A mụrụ Loeschke na Jenụwarị 28, 1947, na Baltimore na Joseph Sheppard na Aumelia Shriner
Nna ya rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba njem Baltimore County
A mụrụ nne ya na ihe ghọrọ Tides Inn na Northern Neck nke Virginia ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka Towson Elementary School
Maravene Sheppard gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Parkville High School na 1965 wee gaa Towson State College, ebe ọ gụrụ Bekee na ihe nkiri n'okpuru nduzi nke C
Richard Gillespie
Ọ bụ ezie na o mere atụmatụ ịkwaga New York iji malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1969, Gillespie mere ka o kwenye isonyere ngalaba Towson kama
Loeschke nwetara nzere masta na agụmakwụkwọ na Towson n'afọ 1972
O mechara nweta PhD na Union Institute na Mahadum
Loeschke malitere izi ihe na Towson n'afọ 1970 ma jee ozi dịka onye isi oche nke ngalaba nka ihe nkiri tupu a kpọọ ya Dean nke College of Fine Arts and Communication n'afọ 1997
Ọ hapụrụ Towson na 2002 maka ọkwa onye isi na Mahadum Wilkes Mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ anọ n'ebe ahụ, Loeschke rụchara afọ anọ dịka onye isi oche nke Mahadum Mansfield, site na 2006 ruo 2010
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mansfield, Loeschke malitere ọtụtụ mmemme nke baara ụmụ akwụkwọ na-agagharị agagharị uru, ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ laghachiri na alma mata ya na Jenụwarị 2012, nọchiri Robert L
Caret dị ka onye isi ala
N'afọ 2013, Loeschke kpebiri ịkwụsị egwuregwu baseball na egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke na Towson, na-eme ka onye nchịkwa Maryland Peter Franchot kpọọ ya ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm
Site na mgbalị ndị ọzọ maka ịnakọta ego, mmụba ego, na nkwekọrịta ego sitere na steeti Maryland, e mechara weghachi mmemme baseball
A chọpụtara na Loeschke nwere ọrịa kansa adrenal n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, wee gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa onye isi ala na Disemba nke afọ ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Richard Loeschke, onye o mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Loeschke lụrụ C
Richard Gillespie na 1981, onye ya na ya biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2015 site na ọrịa kansa adrenal na Gilchrist Hospice Care
Towson mere emume ncheta iji sọpụrụ Loeschke na Septemba 18, 2015
Marc Bouwer bụ onye South Africa ma bụrụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na New York City
Na mmeri o meriri na South African Vogue Young Designers Award, Marc Bouwer kwagara New York City
N'oge na-adịghị anya nke a gasịrị, onye na-emepụta ihe bụ Halston hụrụ pọtụfoliyo Bouwer
Bouwer kuziri Halston ọrụ, ma kpalie nkà ya, ọkachasị nka mpịají
'Obube akwa' Bouwer na ntunye ichu n'ụdị akwa ọbara ọhụrụ n'adọ adọ,dịka Jesi na spandes, dị ka ejiji mgbede ka enyere aha dị ka 'bathing suit gown' ma tụgharịa bụrụ 'athletic glamour'
Mmeghe ụlọ n'afọ 1990 ya na onye mmekọ azụmahịa, Paul Margolin, Marc Bouwer Couture ekesala na mkpuchi na peeji nke mbipụta gụnyere Harper's Bazaar, Cosmopolitan, Vanity Fair, Glamour, na InStyle
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Angelina Jolie biara n'afọ 2004 Academy Awards ma yiri uwe ọcha satin Marc Bouwer, nke André Leon Talley mechara kpọọ otu n'ime uwe Oscar kachasị mma n'oge niile

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, Patti Stanger bụ otu n'ime otu ndị ama ama nke yi uwe n'acha uhie uhie nwere ga ije nsere ụkwụ nke ọgbako ihe ngosi nke'Heart Truth Red Dress Collection show, nsonye nke New York Fashion Week

Patti yi uwe uhie ọbụna abụọ nke Marc Bouwer N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Bouwer nyere aka mee ka anyị hụrụ onye ahịa ya na enyi ya,bụ Shania Twain, ma n'edozi uwe maka njem Still The One Tour ya nke mepere N'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012 na Caesars Palace
Bouwer bụ onye mmepụta ejiji America mbụ na-emepụta ihe ngosi ejiji na nzaghachi maka mgba akụ na ụba n'ụwa niile yana gburugburu ebe obibi
N'emezughi igosi anyi ihe ejiji na Bryant Park, Bouwer gosiputara nke a, na nchịkọta mmalite ya Spring / Summer 2009, na weebụ

nke Ọ bụghị naanị na ejiji ọhụrụ a nyere ndị enyi na ndị ahịa ohere ịnweta nghọta ọhụrụ a ma ọ bụrụ na ha enweghị ike ịga ihe ngosi, kamakwa o meghekwara ka ihe ngosi a pụta ihe n'ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ nke ndị na-emepụta ejiji, ndị na-azụ ahịa, ndị nta akụkọ, na ndị na-emepụta ejiji n'ebe niile
Bouwer chere na ọ bụ ntinye yana 'ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na gburugburu ebe obibi' ya iji mepee ụzọ maka mmegharị dị otú ahụ 'na-ebelata mmetụta na mkpofu'
Bouwer gosipụtara nchịkọta Fall 2010 ya n'abụghị n'ihe, nke Candice Swanepoel gosipụtara, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na nchoputa ya
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2011 Bouwer bụ onye mbụ na-emepụta ihe ngosi ejiji 3D na nchịkọta Fall 2011 ya nke gosipụtara onye nlereanya Selita Ebanks
Ihe nrite Bouwer maka izere ngwaahịa anụmanụ n'ụdị ejiji ya gụnyere PETA Humanitarian Award, na United States Humane Societies “Compassion in Fashion Award'
Marc na-eji nkà na ụzụ emepụta ihe, iji mepụta ejiji nna anaghị egosi obi ọjọọ na iji faux furs dị elu, ma n'enweta ọtụtụ nkwado nke PETA
Marcelle Capy bụ aha njirimara nke Marcelle Marquès (1891 Xi 1962), onye France na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye nta akụkọ, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị na onye na-eme udo
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1916 ruo afọ 1950, ha niile raara onwe ha nye mmasị ya na pacifism
A na-echeta ya karịsịa maka ihe nrite ya Des hommes passèrent (Ndị Nwoke Gafere), nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1930
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, o nyere aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị La Vague nke o guzobere n'afọ 1918
Na mbido afọ 1930, ọ bụ onye otu Ligue internationale des combattants de la paix (International League of Fighters for Peace)
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 16 Machị n'afọ 1891 na Cherbourg, Eugénie Marie Marcelle Marquès bụ nwa nwanyị nke abụọ nke Jean Marquès, onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri, na nwunye ya Marceline Capy
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ na-anọkarị na nne nne ya na ugbo ha na Pradines na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ France
Ọ mụtara banyere ihe efu nke agha site n'aka nna nna ya nke lụrụ agha na Agha Franco-Prussian
Ọ bịarutere nso na nne na nna nna ya nke na ọ nabatara aha ha, bụrụ Marcelle Capy
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Toulouse, na-agbanye aha na nsonaazụ magburu onwe ya

Ka ọ nọ na Toulouse, na-ezube ịghọ onye nkuzi, ọ gara n'ihu na-aga klas nkwadebe maka École normale supérieure de Sèvres mana, mgbe ọ nụsịrị okwu gbasara Tolstoy site n'aka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Socialist Jean Jaurès mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, o kpebiri kama ịghọ onye nta akụkọ na Paris
Site n'oge ahụ gaa n'ihu, ọrụ ndụ ya bụ ilekwasị anya na pacifism, ọrụ ụmụnwanyị na ọha mmadụ nke oge a, na humanitarian socialism na-ekwu maka ahụhụ na ịda ogbenye
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ na-enye aka na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere La Voix des femmes, Journal du peuple na Hommes de jour

Site n'ọnwa Septemba 1913, edemede ya na akwụkwọ ndị ọrụ aka Bataille syndicaliste kpuchiri ọnọdụ dị egwu a na-etinye n'ahụ ụmụnwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ịkpa ákwà nke France, dabere na ahụmịhe nke onwe ya nke ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ha

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1915, ya na onye mmekọ ya Fernand Desprès, a manyere ya ịhapụ Bataille syndicaliste nke kwadoro Union sacrée na-akwado gọọmentị n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ebe di na nwunye ahụ nọgidere na-akwado udo

Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ede akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ, n'afọ 1916 Capy bipụtara ọrụ mbụ ya, Une voix de femme au-dessus de la mélée (A Women's Voice in the Fray) na okwu mbido nke Romain Rolland, na-akatọ ebube nke agha na ike nke ndị agha
N'ihi Agha Ụwa Mbụ, a machibidoro ọrụ ahụ nke ukwuu
Ọrụ ndị yiri ya sochiri, gụnyere La défense de la vie (1918) na L'Amour roi (1925), nke ikpeazụ na-ejikọta nkwenkwe ya nke Ndị Kraịst ọhụrụ na-elekwasị anya na pacifism
Ọrụ ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Des hommes passèrent nke e nyere ihe nrite Séverine na 1930
Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere ndị mkpọrọ Germany na-arụ ọrụ n'ugbo ndị France mgbe a kpọrọ ndị ọrụ mpaghara ka ha gaa n'ihu
Ọkpụkpọ maka fraternity, a na-etinye ya na Pradines ebe Capy nọrọ ọtụtụ oge n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Onye ọkà okwu ihu ọha ruru eru, ọ sonyere na nzukọ na Europe, United States na Canada
N'afọ 1924, o guzobere otu agụmakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka udo nke a na-akpọ Les Amis de la Paix ma gaa nzukọ Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na Washington, DC
N'afọ 1916, ọ gwara okwu na nzukọ Femmes pour la Paix et la Liberté na Geneva
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ, mana ndị Nazi katọrọ ya dị ka onye Kọmunist n'afọ 1943 ma wakpo ụlọ ya na Pradines
Laa azụ na Paris, n'afọ 1944 o nyere aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ahụ maka udo Germinal, na-ede akụkọ gbasara mmadụ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Jeanne Marquès gara Ijipt, bipụta L'Egypte au coeur du monde n'afọ 1950
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950, ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ ya na Pradines
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 5, 1962, mgbe ọ ghọsịrị Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi n'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya
E liri ya na ndị ikwu nne ya na ili ozu Pradines
Marcelline Aboh (1940 - 20 August 2017), nke a maara site na aha ya bụ Détin Bonsoir, bụ onye Benin na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Porto-Novo
Ọ nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe ọ nwesịrị nsogbu ahụike n'ihi afọ ndụ ya
Ọ bụ onye isi na-eme ihe ọchị nke otu ụmụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu Les échos de la capitale Ọ sonyeere ha na 1980 mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na 1958
O nwere ụmụ asatọ
Maachị bu onwa nke ato na afo na kalenda Julian na Gregorian
Ọ bụ nke abụọ n'ime ọnwa asaa iji nwee ogologo ụbọchị iri atọ na otu
Na Northern Hemisphere, mmalite meteorological nke oge opupu ihe ubi na-eme n'ụbọchị mbụ nke March

Equinox nke Maachị na 20 ma ọ bụ 21 na-aka akara mmalite nke mbara igwe nke oge opupu ihe ubi na Northern Hemisphere na mmalite nke mgbụsị akwụkwọ na Southern Hemisphere, ebe Septemba bụ oge oge nke Northern Hemisphere's March
Aha March sitere na Martius, ọnwa mbụ nke kalenda ndị Rom mbụ
Aha ya bụ Mars, chi agha ndị Rom, na nna ochie nke ndị Rom site n'aka ụmụ ya nwoke Romulus na Remus
Ọnwa ya Martius bụ mmalite nke oge maka agha, na ememme ndị a na-eme maka nsọpụrụ ya n'ọnwa ahụ bụ ndị ọzọ gosipụtara na October, mgbe oge maka ihe omume ndị a bịara na njedebe
Martius nọgidere n'ọnwa mbụ nke afọ kalenda ndị Rom ikekwe n'ikpeazụ dị ka 153 BC, na ọtụtụ ememe okpukpe na ọkara mbụ nke ọnwa bụ ememme afọ ọhụrụ
Ọbụna n'oge ochie, mosaics Roman na-ese onyinyo ọnwa mgbe ụfọdụ ka na-ebute March mbụ
Machị bụ ọnwa mbụ nke oge opupu ihe ubi na Northern Hemisphere (North America, Europe, Asia na akụkụ nke Africa) na ọnwa mbụ nke ọdịda ma ọ bụ oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ na Southern Hemisphere

Ememe ndị Rom oge ochie a na-eme na Machị gụnyere Agonium Martiale, nke a na-ememe na Maachị 1, Machị 14, na Machị 17, Matronalia, nke a-eme na March 1, Junonalia, nke e na-eme ememe na Mahadum 7, Equirria, nke a ga-eme na Matchị 14, Mamuralia, nke ememe na March 14 ma ọ bụ 15, Hilaria na Machị 15 wee ruo Machị 22-28, Argei, nke a ma ama na Machị 16-17, Liberalia na Bacchanalia, nke A na-eme Machị 17, nke a na Machị 19-23, na Tubilustrium
Ụbọchị ndị a adabaghị na kalenda Gregorian nke oge a

Marchuwa (Geʽez, Wolaytta) bụ ego alaeze Wolaita ji eme ihe
Marchuwa bụ ụyọkọ nke eriri ígwè dị nro nke dị otu ogologo cubit, nke e ji eme ihe dị ka ego azụmaahịa
Marchuwa hà ka 18 Maria Theresa Thalers ma ọ bụ 050 US dollar
Dị ka Chauncey Hugh Stigand si kwuo, ndị Welayta mepụtara nkà nke ịkpa ákwà na iyi ákwà e ji ogho wee mee tupu obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Etiopia
Mkpa ogho dị na Welayta karịrị uwe
Shalluwa, ụdị eriri ụmụ nwanyị na-agbagharị, na ngwaahịa owuwe ihe ubi dị ka Karretta Sinna, eriri na-acha oji nke e ji ogho were mee, ka a na-eji dị ka ego
Mgbe akụkụ dị iche iche nke Africa jiri usoro mgbanwe (ịgbanwere ngwongwo), steeti Wolaita gbasara ụdị ego a n'ógbè ya niile
Dị ka Remo Chiatti gosiputara n'afọ 1903, otu Marchuwa hà ka 18 Maria Theresa Thalers ma ọ bụ 050 US dollar
Ya mere, steeti Wolaita nwere usoro ụlọ akụ tupu steeti ndị ọzọ dị na Etiopia
Isi mmalite gosipụtara na ruo mgbe Menelik nke Abụọ meriri ndịda Hadiya, Kambatta, Sidama, Dawuro, Gamo, na Gofa e jirila Marchuwa dị ka ego

Ka ọ na-erule oge ndị Welayta sonyeere Alaeze Ukwu Etiopia site na Menelik nke Abụọ, Maria Theresa thaler na blọk nnu a na-akpọ 'Amole tchew' nọchiri Marchuwa, nke a na-ewere na ọ bụ ego mbụ nke Etiopia
Marcia Ashong bụ onye United Kingdom - onye Ghana ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu ghọtara maka ọrụ ya n'ịkwado maka nnọchite ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ụlọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke The Boardroom Africa(TBR Africa), na Brace Energy
A mụrụ Marcia na United Kingdom site na ezinụlọ Fante
Ọ gara Mahadum Minnesota wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke Arts na International Relations & Science Political Science
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Exeter wee nweta ọkwa LLB Hons
(Iwu) na na Mahadum Dundee ọ nwetara Master of Laws (LLM) na Iwu Energy na Iwu
Marcia Ashong bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke The Boardroom Africa (TBR Africa) na Brace Energy
N'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị isi azụmaahịa 20 Top Under 40 nke Ghana
N'afọ 2010, o guzobere Ghana Oil Club (GOC), otu na-enyere ndị ọkachamara na mmanụ na ike aka ịtụle ngalaba mmanụ na ike nke Ghana
Na June 2020, e gosipụtara Ashong na Visual Collaborative Polaris catalogue, n'okpuru usoro Amplified maka ụmụ mmadụ na ihe ọhụrụ, a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ si gburugburu ụwa
Marcia Judith Freedman (Hibru; née Prince; May 17, 1938 September 21, 2021) bụ onye America-Izrel na-eme ihe maka udo, ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na ikike nwoke idina nwoke
N'afọ 1969, ọ gara Israel ebe o nyere aka guzobe ma duzie òtù ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ ndị 1970
Ọ bụ onye otu Knesset site na 1974 ruo 1977
A mụrụ ya na ezinụlọ ndị Juu na Newark, New Jersey na Mee 17, 1938, Freedman nwetara BA na Bennington College na MA na Mahadum New York
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na American Civil Rights Movement n'etiti afọ 1960 na 1967
N'afọ 1969, ọ gara Israel, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ banyere n'ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama site na ọchịchọ ya ị gbanwe iwu ite ime ma mee ka a mara ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
N'afọ 1973, òtù ụmụ nwanyị kpebiri ị kwado Ratz nke Shulamit Aloni (Movement nke Ikike Obodo), e nyekwara Freedman ọnọdụ nke atọ na Ratz slate
Ọ dọtara uche Shulamit Aloni dabere na mmasị ya, mkpebi ya, na ịnụ ọkụ na obi maka mmegharị ahụ
Aloni gwara Freedman ka ọ bụrụ oche nke atọ na party ahụ
Òtù ahụ meriri oche atọ na ntuli aka ndị ome iwu Israel nke afọ 1973, Freedman ghọrọ onye otu Knesset
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Ratz sonyeere Ya'ad ̊ Civil Rights Movement, mana Freedman na Aryeh Eliav kewara iji guzobe Social-Democratic Faction (nke e mechara kpọwa Independent Socialist Faction)
Freedman jere ozi na Knesset site na 1974 ruo 1977
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkwado siri ike maka òtù ndị na-ahụ maka ikike nwoke na nwanyị n'ihi na ọ pụtara dị ka nwanyị na-edina nwanyị n'ebe nwa ya nwanyị nọ na nwa ya nwanyị malitere i kewapụ onwe ya
Tupu ntuli aka nke afọ 1977, Freedman guzobere Women's Party, ọ bụ ezie na ọ kwụghị dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa ya
Òtù ahụ emeghị ka 1% nke ntuli aka gafee ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na ịdọta nkwado ọha na eze maka nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị

Mgbe ọ bụ onye otu Knesset, Freedman kwuru okwu na ezoghị ọnụ banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị ma mee ka ọha na eze mara okwu ndị a na-ekwukarị n'ihu ọha na Israel, gụnyere ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, ọrịa cancer ara, ndina n'ike, mmekọahụ, na ịgba akwụna ndị ntorobịa
Na mgbakwunye, Freedman na-etinye aka na mkparịta ụka banyere udo na ndị Palestine

Otú ọ dị, n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na 2015 na American Jewish Peace Archive, o kwuru na 'a dọtara ya n'ihe m ga-akpọ nsogbu iwu mba ọzọ n'ihi na abụ m onye otu Knesset, nke ahụ bụ ihe mberede na nke a na-atụghị anya ya' (maka itinye aka ya na esemokwu Palestine)
Freedman bụ onye mbụ kwadoro ịmepụta steeti nwere onwe ya na Palestine
O tinyere aka na nkwukọrịta ya na Palestinian Liberation Organization ma kwado ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka ngwọta mba abụọ
Freedman nyere aka mepụta netwọk nkwado na nkwado maka ụmụ nwanyị na Israel
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, ya na Barbara Swersky na ndị ọzọ nke ebe obibi mbụ nke Israel maka ụmụ nwanyị a na-eti ihe, nke e guzobere na 1977 na Haifa
Freedman hapụrụ Israel wee laghachi na United States na 1981
Ọ biri ọzọ na Israel site na 1997 ruo 2002, wee guzobe Community of Learning Women, nke nyere agụmakwụkwọ na ọmụmụ ụmụ nwanyị na ịgụ na ide na kọmputa
Freedman dere edemede akpọrọ 'Feminist Publishing in Israel' maka Women's Studies Newsletter na 1980
Ọ kwuru banyere ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ dị iche iche metụtara akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na Hibru na ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ isii na-enye ohere ka e bipụta ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị
O kwukwara banyere akwụkwọ ole na ole e dere banyere ụmụ nwanyị na Hibru na obere mgbalị e mere iji bipụta akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Freedman dere akwụkwọ ncheta akpọrọ, Exile in the Promised Land, ma raara ya nye nna ya
O kwuru na peeji 'onye m gbasoro ihe nlereanya ya n'ụzọ dị ukwuu'
Ọ bụkwa onye dere ọtụtụ isiokwu na nyocha
Freedman bụ onye guzobere onye isi oche nke Brit Tzedek v'Shalom, otu na-akwado Israel na nke na-akwado udo nke jikọtara na J Street na 2010
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche gara aga nke San Francisco Jewish Film Festival
Ọ lụrụ Bill Freedman na 1961, ma nwee otu nwa nwanyị
Freedman nwụrụ na Septemba 21, 2021 mgbe ọ dị afọ 83
Ka ọ na-eru 2021, ọ ka bụ naanị nwanyị na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha jere ozi na Knesset
Marcia Jones (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka 1972 na Chicago Illinois) bụ ónyé prọfesọ America na onye na-ese ihe n'oge a, nke a maara màkà ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya na nnukwu ọrụ ntinye
A mụrụ Jones n'oge na Chicago's Little Company of Mary Hospital na Paul Davis na Christine Jones
Mgbè ya na nne ya kwagara ọtụtụ ugboro, ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Los Angeles, CA na Marshall High School
Jones gụrụ akwụkwọ na Fashion Design na Mahadum Clark Atlanta ebe o mechara kụzie ma kwaga New York na 1995 mgbe ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Radcliffe Bailey kpaliri ya ịchụso nka dị mmá
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Juan Logan, Kojo Griffin, Susan Page na Cora Cohen na UNC Greensboro iji nweta MFA ya na nka ányá na 2004
Jones kwagara New York na 1995 iji chụsoo imepụta ejiji ma rụọ ọrụ màkà Harriette Cole tupu ọ chọta oku ya dị ka ezigbo ónyé na-ese ihe

Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe (ihe ngosi), na-ese onyinyo iji mee ka egwu dị ndụ n'elu ikpo okwu, na ihe nkiri Brooklyn Bohemian na ebe ndị dị ka Brooklyn Moon Cafe nke gosipụtara mmalite nkè ọrụ dịka Mos Def, Common, Saul Williams, Erykah Badu, Kevin Powell, na Sarah Jones
Ọrụ ya pụtara dị ka ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ Saul Williams, The Seventh Octave na abọm ya, Amethyst Rock Star, ya na ya rụkọkwara ọrụ n'akwụkwọ ya, S / HE
Jones zutere onye na-ede uri Saul Williams mgbè ọ kwagara New York ma na 1996 mụọ nwa ha nwanyị, Saturn River Renge, mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ awa iri isii
N'afọ 2004, ụbọchị atọ ka ọ nwetasịrị MFA ya, a kpọgara Jones n'ụlọ ọgwụ ma chọpụta na ọ na-arịa ọrịa Multiple Sclerosis

Marcia Kure (amuru 1970) bu onye omenka Naijiria dabere na America na onye otu Mahadum Nsukka nke Mahadum Naijiria nke ama ama maka eserese mgbasa ozi agwakọtara na eserese ya na-etinye aka na ọnọdụ adị adị na njirimara postcolonial
A mụrụ Kure na Kano Steeti ￼￼ dị na Naijiria
Ọ zụrụ azụ na Mahadum Naijiria , Nsukka n'okpuru onye na-ese ihe bụ Obiora Udechukwu, onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Nsukka, wee gụchaa ya na Bachelor of Arts na eserese n'afọ 1994
Ọrụ mbụ Kure lekwasịrị anya na ime ihe ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụlọ ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na obodo ndị nna ochie
Ọrụ ya mechara bụrụ gbasara isiokwu ndị metụtara ịbụ nne, ejiji ejiji, ihe ịchọ mma hip-hop

N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2015 maka ARTCTUALITE, Kure kwuputara mmetụta nke ohere na ọrụ ya, na-ekwu na ọ '[na-agbalị] ime ka esemokwu maka ndị na-enweghị ohere a kapịrị ọnụ,' na ụzọ o si ejikọta usoro ihe ịchọ mma nke ọdịda anyanwụ n'akụkụ
Ndị Africa
Bụ'Enweghị m mmasị na nke ọ bụla ma ọ bụ, na ihe bụ ihe ma ọ bụ ihe ọ na-abụghị; kama nke ahụ, m na-ahọrọ ebe isi awọ nke na-emekọ ihe kpọmkwem na mmegide na juxtapositions
Achọpụtara m ike ibi n'echiche dị iche iche na-akpali akpali
Echere m na nchikota nke ụdị ọdịda anyanwụ na usoro na ọrụ m na-enye m ohere ijikọ na ịkọwa ụwa site na oghere prismatic dị mma karịa onye nwere echiche dị iche'
Kure egosila na mba ụwa na ihe ngosi solo na Goethe-Institut, Legọs ; Ụlọ ihe ngosi Purdy Hicks, London; na Susan Inglett Gallery, New York

E gosikwara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu na ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art ; New Museum, New York; Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka Barbican, London; Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke mba, Legọs ; na, WIELS Contemporary Art Center, Brussels

Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke British Museum ; Ụlọ ọrụ Pompidou ; National Museum of African Art, Smithsonian Institution ; Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka Newark ; Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke North Carolina ; Ụlọ ọgwụ Cleveland ; Ụlọ ọrụ Sindika Dokolo, Luanda, Angola; na, Ụlọ ọrụ Embassy United Steeti , Abuja
Kure esonyela na La Triennial (2013); the International Biennial of Contemporary Art, Seville (2006), onye duru ya bụ Okwui Enwezor ; na Sharjah International Biennial (2005)
Site na Jenụwarị ruo Maachị 2014, Kure bụ onye na-ese ihe na Victoria na Albert Museum na London
Enyere ya ihe nrite Uche Okeke maka ịse ihe n'afọ 1994
Onye na-ese ihe bụ Susan Inglett Gallery, New York; Ụlọ ihe ngosi Purdy Hicks, London; na, Ụlọ ọrụ Dell'Immagine, Milan
Marco Cianfanelli (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1970) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ metụtara nka, ihe owuwu na oghere ọha
Cianfanelli jikọtara ngwa ndị kọmputa mepụtara, nke data na-eduzi na mmadụ, na-egosipụta, mmegharị aka iji mepụta esemokwu n'ọrụ ya
Cianfanelli bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà South Africa ole na ole nke ọrụ ha na-aga nke ọma n'ihu ọha na n'ụlọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-ese ihe osise ala ma na-aga n'ihu na-echegbu onwe ya banyere oghere mmekọ ịhụnanya na nke a na-ewepụ site na omume nke mmekọ ịhụnanya
Ọrụ ndị na-adịbeghị anya nke Cianfanelli na-arụ n'oge na-adịgide adịgide na-ejikọta ya na mgbagwoju anya nke ịhụ South Africa n'anya
Otu n'ime ọrụ ndị a ma ama nke Cianfanelli bụ ihe ngosi nke isi Nelson Mandela nke dị na ebe e jidere Mandela na Howick, South Africa
N'afọ 1992, Cianfanelli natara BA / FA (ihe osise) ya na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand

Mardam-Bey (Arabụ ) bụ aha nna nke ezinụlọ Siria a ma ama nke ndị nna nna Ottoman Turkish

Mardam-Beyńs bụkwa ụmụ Abd Al Rahman Ben Mouhamad Ben Moustafa Bey Al Kourmoshi onye nna nna ya bụ minista a ma ama Lala Moustafa Pasha, Grand Vizier nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman na onye ndú nke mmeri nke agwaetiti Saịprọs
A na-ewere ezinụlọ a dị ka otu n'ime ezinụlọ ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ndị dị ebube [nke onye?] na Damaskọs
A maara ndị òtù ezinụlọ ahụ dị ka ndị a ma ama n'obodo ahụ ma ha etinyeghị aka na ndụ ndị ọzọ

Margaret Adebisi Sowunmi (née Jadesimi) (amuru ya na Septemba 24, n'afọ 1939) bu onye Naijiria botanist na okachamara ihe mgbe ochie
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Palynology na Environmental Archaeology na Mahadum Ibadan
Ọ sụrụ ụzọ ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ihe ochie gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi na palaeoethnobotany na Naijiria ma bụrụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Palynological Association of Nigeria
A mụrụ Sowunmi na Kano, Northern Nigeria na Septemba 24, n'afọ 1939
Nna ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu na Ụka Nigeria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Anne Ibadan maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka BSc na Special Botany na Ngalaba Botany, na mahadum mahadum Ibadan, gụsịrị akwụkwọ N'afọ 1962
Ọ nwetara akwụkwọ mmụta postgraduate na n'afọ 1963 iji mee nyocha Phd na palynology
Iji malite nyocha na palynology, Sowunmi gara Sweden ka ya na Gunnar Erdtman mụọ ihe, onye na-elekọta PhD ya
O nwetara PhD na botany na mahadum nke Ibadan n'afọ 1967
N'afọ 1967 ka a họpụtara Sowunmi ka ọ bụrụ onye nyocha postdoctoral na ngalaba mmụta ihe ochie na Institute of African Studies, Mahadum Ibadan
N'afọ 1971, o hiwere ụlọ nyocha nyocha nke mahadum Naijiria
A họpụtara Sowunmi Prọfesọ nke Palynology na Environmental Archaeology na 1982

N'ime oge ọrụ ya Sowunmi nwere ọkwa nleta dị iche iche, na 1997 na ngalaba nke African Archaeology, Uppsala University, na 1998 na Institute of Archaeology, University College London na Ngalaba nke African Archaeology na African Archaeobotany, Johann Wolfgang Goethe-Universität
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọ na-elekọta ụmụ akwụkwọ PhD asaa, ma mara ya maka ịbụ onye nkuzi na-akpali akpali
Sowunmi arụwo ọrụ na okwu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na nkà mmụta ihe ochie na Nigeria, gụnyere imegharị aha nkuzi androcentric
Sowunmi bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Palynological Association of Nigeria, na onyeisi oche nke West African Archaeological Association
Sowunmi lara ezumike nka na 2004

Mmezu nchọcha Sowunmi rụpụtara gụnyere njirimara izizi nke afọ na paleoenvironment nke f the Gwandu Formation, nkọwa mbụ nke Eocene pollen nke Ogwashi-Asaba Formation, ọmụmụ izizi nke ahịhịa Late Quaternary na akụkọ gburugburu ebe obibi nke Nigeria, na ọmụmụ ihe mbụ gbasara pollen sitere na saịtị ihe ochie na Nigeria

N'afọ 2003, Sowunmi nwetara nzere Dọkịta nke Philosophy na Humanities site na Mahadum Uppsala iji mata onyinye mmụta ya pụtara ìhè na nyocha na ntinye nkuzi na nkà mmụta ihe ochie gburugburu ebe obibi na paleobotany

Margaret Ashton (19 Jenụwarị 1856 - 15 Ọktoba 1937) bụ onye England suffragist, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara, onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye ọrụ ebere, na nwanyị mbụ bụ onye ndụmọdụ obodo maka Manchester
Margaret Ashton bụ nwanyị mbụ gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka na Manchester City Council, n'afọ 1908 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ City Councillor mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Councillur maka Manchester Withington

Dị ka onye otu kọmitii ahụike ọha na eze nke Manchester na onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịmụ nwa na ọdịmma ụmụaka, Ashton kwadoro ụlọ ọgwụ nne na nwa ma kwalite mmiri ara n'efu maka ụmụ ọhụrụ na nne ọhụrụ
N'afọ 1914, ya na Dr Catherine Chisholm (1878ī 1952) guzobere Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ụmụaka Manchester
Mgbe agha ụwa mbụ malitere n'afọ 1914, Ashton so n'etiti ndị na-akwado mba ụwa nke kewara na NUWSS na òtù suffragette
Ọ bụ onye bịanyere aka na 'Open Christmas Letter', oku maka udo nke a na-ekwu maka nwanne nwanyị 'Nye ụmụnwanyị nke Germany na Austria', nke e bipụtara na Jus Suffragii na Jenụwarị 1915
Ọ malitere alaka Manchester nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
N'afọ 1920, Women's Farm and Garden Union guzobere obere ụlọ na 1920 maka ụmụnwanyị na Surrey
Ndị mbụ nyere ego bụ Margaret Ashton onye chọtara £ 5,000 na Sydney Renee Courtauld onye gbazinyere £ 4,000
N'afọ 1938, ụfọdụ ndị enyi na ndị na-enwe mmasị na Ashton guzobere kọmitii ncheta nke kwadoro ọrụ abụọ
N'afọ 1982, e meghere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Harpurhey maka ụmụ nwanyị dị ka Margaret Ashton Sixth Form College
Aha ya na foto ya (na nke ụmụ nwanyị 58 ndị ọzọ na-akwado ikike nhọpụta) dị na ala nke ihe oyiyi nke Millicent Fawcett na Parliament Square, London; a kpughere ya n'afọ 2018
Margaret Ashton bụ otu n'ime ụmụnwanyị isii na ndepụta nhọpụta maka ihe oyiyi ọha ọhụrụ na Manchester
A ga-ekwupụta onye mmeri, nke ọha na eze họpụtara, n'afọ 2019
Margaret Baba Diri bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke a họpụtara na mbụ n'ime ụlọ omebe iwu Uganda dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị nwere nkwarụ na afo 1996 ebe ọ nọ ruo ugbu a
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na St
Charles Lwanga na Koboko n'etiti afo 1976 na afo 1990 nakwa dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe nwoke na nwanyị na National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda (NUDIPU) n'etiti afo 1992 na afo 1996
A mụrụ Margaret Baba Diri na 29 June na afo 1954
O nwere diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ site na National Teachers College Kyambogo, ọ nwetakwara nzere bachelọ na Adult and Community Education site na Mahadum Kyambogo
Margaret Baba Diri malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na St
Charles Lwanga Koboko n'etiti afo 1976 na afo 1990 na dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe nwoke na nwanyị na National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda (NUDIPU) n'etiti afo 1992 na afo 1996
O mechara sonye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị nwere nkwarụ
Ọ nọwo na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu maka oge ise site na afo 1996 ebe ọ nọchitekwara anya Koboko dị ka nwanyị omebe iwu
Margaret Baba Diri bụ onye otu Kọmitii Ndị omeiwu na Kọmitii, Ndị Ọchịchị Steeti na Ụlọ Ọrụ Steeti ma bụrụkwa onye otu KọMitii Ndị omebe iwu na Education na Sports

Margaret Ballinger (née Hodgson; Na afọ 1894[[1980) bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Liberal Party nke South Africa na onye omeiwu South Africa
N'afọ 1944, magazin TIME kpọrọ Ballinger 'Queen of the Blacks'
A mụrụ Margaret Hodgson na Glasgow, Scotland na afọ 1894 wee kwaga Cape Colony na ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Nna ya rutere obere oge tupu Agha Boer ma mechaa lụso ndị Britain ọgụ
Hodgson (Ballinger) gara Huguenot College na Wellington tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na England
N'England ọ gara Somerville College, Oxford
Ọ kụziri akụkọ ihe mere eme mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown na Mahaduma nke Witwatersrand
Ọ guzoro maka ntuli aka ebe e nwere ndị nnọchiteanya asaa maka nde ndị isi ojii South Africa asatọ megide ndị MP
140 na-anọchite anya 20% ndị ọzọ nke ndị bi na ya
O guzoro megide ụmụ nwoke ndị ọzọ na-azọ ọkwa ma na-ekwu okwu site na onye ntụgharị nwere ike inweta obi ike nke ndị na-eme ntụli aka
A na-ekwu na o jiri ihe atụ nke Joan of Arc mee ihe iji gosipụta ihe nwanyị nwere ike ime maka ha
Ọ nọchitere anya ndị Eastern Cape site na afo 1937 na Native Representatives Council (NRC)
E nyere ya otuto, ya na Senator Edgar Brookes, maka ịkpali ndị mmadụ ikwu banyere ịchịkwa ndị obodo South Africa iji chọpụta otú e si eme ka ndụ ha dịkwuo mma
N'afọ 1943, ọ na-atụ aro iwu ọhụrụ ma na 1947 atụmatụ ya gụnyere ọzụzụ ọhụrụ na nnọchite anya obodo maka 'ndị isi ojii' na ndụmọdụ ka mma na NRC
A na-ahụ oge a site na 1937 ruo 1950s dị ka mgbe Ballinger nwere ike na mmetụta kachasị
Ike ya dị ka ọkà okwu bụ naanị ndị praịm minista, Jan Smuts, na Jan Hofmeyr, onye ga-anọchi ya
Ọdịnihu nke isiokwu ahụ hụrụ maka Ballinger bụ dị ka 'olileanya ọcha' na-eduga ndị isi ojii 24,000,000 dị ka akụkụ nke mmetụta Britain gbasaa na ndịda Africa
Ọ kpuchiri di ya, William, onye ụfọdụ na-ahụ ugbu a site na omimi ya na mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ha abụọ guzobere otu ndị enyi nke Afrịka, mana nke a lere anya na Britain maka ego karịa ka ọ mere na ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ijikọ ya na òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Afrịka na-apụta
Mgbe e guzobere Liberal Party nke South Africa na afọ 1953 ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ ya
E guzobere otu ahụ gburugburu Alan Paton, onye bụ otu n'ime ndị osote onye isi ala
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole na-ekwu okwu megide echiche ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke Hendrik Frensch Verwoerd
N'afọ 1960, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ omebe iwu mgbe gọọmentị South Africa wepụrụ oche ndị omebe iwu na-anọchite anya ndị Afrịka
British Royal African Society nyere ya ọla nchara na afọ 1961 maka ọrụ ya na Africa
Nkwupụta ya kwuru banyere njikọ ọ guzobere n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị Africa na Europe na maka ụlọ maka ụmụaka na-arịa ọrịa ọ guzobere
Ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ tupu ndị otu ya emebie ya na 1968
N'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ iwu na-akwadoghị maka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị inwe ndị otu si n'ihe karịrị otu agbụrụ
Ndị otu ahụ họọrọ ịnwụ karịa ịhọrọ
E mechiri ụlọ ụmụaka na-arịa ọrịa nke o guzobere n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, mana ọ na-ewere ọdịdị ọhụrụ
Ballinger malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ atọ na Soweto na-enweghị ikike gọọmentị, a na-akpọ nke mbụ iji sọpụrụ ya
