Margaret E
Collinson bụ onye paleobotanist na Royal Holloway, Mahadum nke London, United Kingdom
Ọrụ ya emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye ndu nke otu Plant Paleobiology Research Group na Royal Holloway, Mahadum London, UK
Mmasị nyocha ya na-emekọrịta ihe yana obosara n'ime osisi Paleobotany dị ka akwụkwọ ya gosipụtara
Ha na-agụnye karịsịa nleba anya nke geochemical mbinye aka nke oxygen, biomolecules na ihe ndị ọzọ; paleoclimate na floral assemblages; pollen na anụ ahụ ndị ọzọ; na evolushọn na osisi oge ochie

Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke International Organisation of Paleobotany, onye mba ofesi nke Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences (2007), na onye otu Senckenberg Gesellschaft für Naturforschung (Germany)
N'afọ 2015, e nyere ya onye otu Distinguished Fellow of the Botanical Society of America
Ọ bụ onye odee ma ọ bụ onye na-edekọ ihe karịrị akwụkwọ sayensị 180
N'ime akwụkwọ ya kacha pụta ìhè bụ
MECollinson odee ọkọlọtọ ka ejiri gosi onye a dị ka onye odee mgbe ọ na-ehota aha botanical

Margaret Danner (1915-1984) (Margaret Esse Danner, Margaret Danner Cunningham) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị nke a maara maka ihe osise ya na ememe ya nke ihe nketa Afrịka na ụdị ọdịbendị
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1915, Margaret Esse Danner toro na Chicago n'oge Great Migration
Na klas nke asatọ, ọ nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ maka 'The Violin', uri na-akọwa ngwa égwu violin Stradivarius na Guarnerius
Agụmakwụkwọ kọleji Danner gụnyere ọmụmụ na Mahadum Loyola, Mahadum Northwestern, YMCA College, na Roosevelt College e guzobere ọhụrụ

Ikekwe ihe dị ịrịba ama bụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na obodo ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka-Amerịka nke Chicago's South Side, nke n'afọ ndị 1930s na 1940s nwere ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị na mpaghara ndị na-abụghị nke gọọmentị raara onwe ha nye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, agụmakwụkwọ, nka na akwụkwọ ma na-ejikọkarị na Communist Popular Front

Ọ bụ ezie na Danner nọpụrụ iche na ọchịchị Kọmunist ma mesịa megide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile, ọ sonyere n'òtù dị iche iche nke South Side, gụnyere Inez Cunningham Stark's poetry workshop na South Side Community Art Center, tinyere Gwendolyn Brooks na Margaret Goss Burroughs, ya 'ndị enyi (na ndị na-asọmpi) ' N'afọ 1946, Danner guzobere Art Associates iji chịkọta ma kwalite ndị edemede na ndị na-ede uri ojii nke Chicago
Ọ gụrụ dị ka ndị enyi onye na-ede uri na onye nkatọ Edward Bland, yana Hoyt Fuller, onye ga-eduzi Negro Digest (mgbe e mesịrị Black World) malite n'afọ 1951
'Onye na-eme okwu na onye na-ese ihe, ọ na-enye onye na-agụ ya 'ihe osise okwu' nke ọma nke na-akpali akpali na nke na-egosipụta

Abụ ya, nke sitere na okwu dị n'etiti olu nke oge gara aga, ugbu a, na ọdịnihu, na-ekpughe ọrụ ya na mmekọrịta ya na ọdịnala nke abụ ọdịda anyanwụ; ihe osise ya nke abụ dị ka ihe ngosi na-ejikọta nkatọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ihe ngosi, nke bụ ma nkuzi ma mimetic, n'ime njikọ na-akpali akpali nke ihe ọhụrụ mara mma; amaokwu ya na-eme ka onye na-agụ ya bụrụ onye na-ekiri nka (ihe oyiyi synesthetic)
' Erlene Stetson

'Onye nwere ike ịghọta n'etiti mkpuchi abụọ nke otu mpịakọta a, n'ụzọ zuru oke, web nke ihe oyiyi dị mgbagwoju anya na nke na-egbuke egbuke nke mkpịsị akwụkwọ ya tụgharịrị na njem nke mmụọ nwere mmetụta, nke nwere onwe ya na ọmịiko gafee oge ọgba aghara ndị a n'ebe a a na-ejighị n'aka
' Samuel A
Allen
A mụrụ Margaret E
Grigsby na Jenụwarị 16, n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri abụo na atọ, na Prairie View, Texas, nke John Richard na Lee (Hankins) Grigsby
Ọ bụ dibịa Afrika-Amerika, nke a ma ama dị ka nwaanyị Afrịka-Amerika mbụ ghọrọ onye òtù American College of Physicians na nwaanyị mbụ na-elekọta nnukwu ngalaba ahụike na Howard University Hospital
A maara Grigsby nke ọma dị ka Dọkịta nke Ọgwụ Ime Obodo, na ọkachamara na Ọgwụ Tropical na Ọrịa Na-efe efe na-eme ma na United States na Africa
Grigsby nwụrụ n'onwa June 24, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iteghete mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na isii na ụlọ ọgwụ Howard University, Washington, DC
Grigsby nwetara nzere baccalaureate ya na Prairie View College n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na atọ
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị baccalaureate ya, ọ gara Mahadum Michigan iji nweta nzere ahụike ya
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị MD, ọ gara mba ndị so na Soviet Union n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii ma gosipụta akwụkwọ na Moscow, Warsaw, na Prague
Mgbe Grigsby nọ na mba ọzọ, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya dị ka prọfesọ nke ọgwụ na Mahadum nke Ibadan na Naịjirịa
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na atọ Grisby natara diplọma na Tropical Medicine & Hygiene site na London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Grigsby natara ihe nrite n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asaa dị ka prọfesọ a ma ama nke ọgwụ na West Africa
E mechara kwanyere onyinye ya na ọgwụ kịtịkpa na Afrịka ùgwù na Presidential n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa na abụọ
Malite nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na asatọ Grigsby nọrọ na Homer G
Phillips Hospital na St
Louis ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na iteghete
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri anọ na iteghete, a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye bi na nkà mmụta ọgwụ, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise, Grigsby nwere ohere ịbụ onye enyemaka bi na Freedmen's Hospital na Washington
N'ihi ya, ọ bufere ụlọ ọgwụ ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọkwa a, ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na otú mgbe Freedman's Hospital kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ osote dibịa

N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na isii, Grigsby ghọrọ dibịa na-elekọta ụlọ ọgwụ Freedmen's Hospital ma n'oge a, ọ bụ ọkachamara na ọgwụ ime ụlọ site na n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na atọ ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na anọ
N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na asaa, ọ nabatara ọrụ na Mahadum Howard ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi ọgwụ
Ọ kụziri ihe dị ka onye nkuzi ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri ise na asaa e wee kwalite ya dị ka osote prọfesọ na Howard
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii mgbe ọ ghọrọ osote prọfesọ
Grigsby rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na isii mgbe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ oge niile
Ka o sina dị, n'oge ọrụ Grigsby, ọ nọkwa n'ọkwa ndị ọzọ

Na Howard, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke ọrịa na-efe efe site n'afo otu puku narị iteghete na iri ise na abụọ ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri asaa na otú, na onye enyemaka nchịkwa maka ngalaba nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọgwụ site na n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na otú ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na atọ
Na mgbakwunye na ọkwa ya na Howard, Grigsby nwere ọkwa di na nwunye na Ibadan, Nigeria

O nwere ọkwa na Epidemiologist United States Public Health Service site nafo otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na isii ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asatọ ma jee ozi dị ka prọfesọ nleta na-asọpụrụ maka ọgwụ mgbochi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site N'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asaa ruo n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri isii na asatọ
N'ime afọ abụọ Grigsby nọ n'Afrịka, ọ lekọtara ọgwụ kịtịkpa nke ọtụtụ nde mmadụ
Grigsby nwere ike ime nke a site na Smallpox Eradication Program site na Howard University College of Medicine
Mgbe o si Afrịka lọta, ọ gara n'ihu na ọrụ ya dị ka prọfesọ na Mahadum Howard ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ otú pụkụ narị iteghete na iri iteghete na atọ

Margaret Ekpo (July 27, 1914 - Septemba 21, 2006) bụ onye inyom na-akwado ndị inyom na ndị na-akwado ọha na eze bụ ndị bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị inyom ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Republic nke mbu na onye isi nke otu ụmụ nwanyị omenala ndị inyom Naijiria, bụ ndị ọtụtụ n'ime ha gbakọtara ndị inyom na-enweghị echiche nke ịdị n'otu agbụrụ

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ndị dị mkpa dịka imimeobodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba na obodo Aba nke dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria, n'oge oge ndị isi na-achịkwa onwe ha maka nnwere onwe, na ọ naghị ebili na enyemaka nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ enyemaka ma ọ bụ ntinye aka oru nke nwoke
A mụrụ Margaret Ekpo na Creek Town, Cross River State, na ezinụlọ Okoroafor Obiasulor na Inyang Eyo Aniemewue
O ruru akara isii nke akwụkwọ akwụkwọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1934
Otú ọ dị, ọdachi dakwasịrị n'ụlọ na ọnwụ nna ya na 1934, ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya maka ịkụkwu akwụkwọ na ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi bụ ihe kpatara ya
O wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nwantakịrị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
Ọ lụrụ dọkịta, John Udo Ekpo, na 1938
Ọ si na agbụrụ Ibibio bụ ndị kachasị na Akwa Ibom State, ebe ọ bụ nke Igbo na Efik nketa
O mesịrị soro di ya kwaga Aba
Na 1946, o nwere ohere ịmụ akwụkwọ na mba Dublin Institute of Technology, Dublin Ireland
Ọ nwetara diplọma na sayensị ụlọ na mgbe ọ laghachiri na Nigeria, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ sayensị na ụlọ ọrụ Sewing Institute na Aba
Ihe mbụ Margaret Ekpo na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mkpakọrịta bụ na 1945
Di ya na-ewesa ndị ọchịchị na-elekọta ndị dọkịta na-elekọta ndị dọkịta Naijiria kama dị ka onye ọrụ obodo, ọ pụghị ịga nzukọ iji kwurịta okwu ahụ
Margaret Ekpo gara nzukọ na ebe di ya, a haziri nzukọ iji kwurịta omume ịkpa ókè nke ịchịisi gọọmentị n'obodo ahụ na ịlụ ọgụ na omenala na agbụrụ na nchịkwa
O mechara gaa nnọkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị ahụ na-aga nnọkọ, nke hụrụ okwu ọkụ si Mbonu Ojike, Nnamdi Azikiwe na Herbert Macaulay
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị nke afọ iri, ọ haziri Ahịa otu mumu nwaanyi na zu ahia na Aba ka ha na-ejikọta ụmụ ahịa ahịa n'obodo
O jiri otu a kwalite mmekọrịta ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ikpo okwu maka ịlụ ọgụ maka ikike akụ na ụba nke ụmụ nwanyị, nchedo akụ na ụba na ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ụmụ nwanyị

Ihe Margaret Ekpo maara banyere mmepe na-eto eto maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ụwa nile kwadoro ya ka ọ na-achọ otu ihe ahụ maka ndị inyom nọ ná mba ya na ịlụ ọgụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị ọchịchị na-emegbu onwe ha na-achịkwa ụmụ nwanyị
O wee chee na ndị inyom na mba ọzọ gụnyere ndị nọ na Britain, na-alụrịrị ọgụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ ma na-enwekwu olu n'okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke obodo karịa ndị ibe ha na Nigeria
O mechara sonye na decolonization-na-eduzi National Council of Nigeria na Cameroons (NGNC), dị ka ikpo okwu na-anọchite anya otu ndị mejupụtara
N'afọ ndị 1950, ya na Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti jikọtara ya na mkpesa na igbu mmadụ na Enugu
ndị ahụ metụtara bụ ndị isi na-eme mkpesa na colonial omume na m
N'afọ 1953, NGNC họpụtara Ekpo na Chiefs Chiefs nke mpaghara, na 1954, o guzobere Association nke Aba na Women's Association
Dị ka onye ndú nke ìgwè ahịa ọhụrụ ahụ, ọ na-enwe ike ịtụkwasị obi nke ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'obodo ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nrụgide
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1955, ụmụ nwanyị dị na Aba nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke ndị ikom na-eme ntuli aka na ntuli aka obodo
O meriri oche na Eastern Regional Assembly nke dị na 1961, ọnọdụ nke nyere ya ohere ịlụ ọgụ maka nsogbu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ahụ
Karịsịa, e nwere nsogbu banyere ọganihu nke ụmụ nwanyị n'okwu akụ na ụba na nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, karịsịa na mpaghara njem n'akụkụ nnukwu ụzọ na-eduga n'ahịa na njem ime obodo n'ozuzu ha
Mgbe agha ndị agha jidere na Mbụ Republic, ọ na-ewere ụzọ na-enweghị isi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 2001, a kpọrọ Calabar Airport aha ya
Margaret Etim (amụrụ ya na 28 Nọvemba n'afọ 1992) bụ Naijiria n'agba ọsọ onye bụ ọkachamara na 400 mita
O meriri nrite ọla ọcha n'afọ 2010 World Junior Championship na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ nrite na Naijiria 4 × 400 mita relay
Ihe kachasị mma ya na ihe omume ahụ bụ 5124 sekọnd edobere na Makurdi na 2010
Margaret Joan Holmes AM (née Read; 24 Jenụwarị 1909 10 Septemba 2009) bụ onye Australia na-eme udo, ọkachasị n'oge Agha Vietnam na dịka akụkụ nke Anglican Pacifist Fellowship
O guzobere alaka New South Wales nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na 1960, na 2001 e mere ya onye otu Order of Australia maka ọrụ ya na obodo
A mụrụ Margaret Holmes n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya na Sydney na ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1909, nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ise, ma too na Wahroonga
Ọ gara The Women's College, Mahadum Sydney, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwanyị mbụ nwere ụgbọ ala, ma mụọ ọgwụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, Holmes sonyeere Christian Student Movement ma jikọta ya na Christian pacifism
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Science ma na 1933 lụọ dọkịta, T
(Tag) Holmes, kama ịghọ otu
Margaret na Tag Holmes wuru ụlọ na Military Road, Mosman, mpaghara dị na Lower North Shore nke Sydney, ebe T
Holmes nwere ọrụ ahụike ya ma zụlite ụmụ isii
Na mbido Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ndị Holmes guzobere '50-50 Club', mgbede oriri na ọṅụṅụ kwa izu ebe 'ndị Australia ọhụrụ' nwere ike ịmara ndị obodo ahụ ma sonye n'ime obodo ọhụrụ ha

N'afọ 1959, Holmes mere njem ịga mgbakọ nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na Stockholm; ọ matara banyere nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị a na 1940 site na edemede na The Peacemaker nke Eleanor Moore dere
Ebe ọ bụ na enweghị alaka Sydney nke WILPF n'oge ahụ, ọ sonyeere dị ka onye otu mba ụwa
O guzobere NSW Branch mgbe o si na nnọkọ ahụ lọta
Njem ya gụnyere ịga Austria maka nzukọ IFOR, Russia (ebe o bugara Bible ndị a na-ebubata na Moscow Baptist Church) na India (na oku nke Sushila Nayar, onye ọ zutere na nzukọ WILPF)
N'afọ ndị 1960 n'oge Agha Vietnam, ọrụ Holmes ghọrọ nke ọha na eze
Ọ duziri ngagharị iwe gụnyere ịgagharị ma bụrụ onye na-eme mkpọsa mgbe niile n'etiti obodo Sydney, na-ekere òkè na ekpere, ọkụ kandụl, nzukọ ọha na eze na nkesa akwụkwọ
N'oge a, ọ malitekwara ịrụsi ọrụ ike na mkpọsa maka ikike ndị Aborigine na nkwụsị nuklia
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya, Margaret Holmes The Life and Times of an Australian Peace Campaigner, nke Michelle Cavanagh dere, na 2006
E dekwara ndụ ya n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dị iche iche na ihe ndị ọzọ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ nke Australian War Memorial

N'afọ 2001, e mere Holmes onye otu Order of Australia na Queen's Birthday Honours, 'maka ijere obodo ozi site na òtù na-akwalite udo, ikike mmadụ na ngwọta esemokwu, ọkachasị dịka onye otu Women's International League for Peace and Freedom'
Holmes mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ 100 ya na 24 Jenụwarị 2009 n'ụlọ ya na Sydney, ya na ụmụ ya isii, ọtụtụ ụmụ ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ
Ọ nwụrụ na 10 Septemba 2009 na Coffs Harbour, Australia
Margaret Joan Roberts (1937 – 4 Maachị 2017) bụburu Dibia Mkpọrọgwu na Mkpaakwụkwọ nke mba South Africa na onye dere akwụkwọ karịrị 40 gbasara ahịhịa na isiokwu ndị metụtara ya
Margaret Roberts wetara ahịhịa na South Africa ihe karịrị afọ 60 gara aga wee nye nkuzi gbasara uru mkpuru akwụkwọ na ibi ndụ ahụike, ebumnuche ya bụ 'Kụziere na kpate mmuo'
Margaret Roberts Herbal Center na De Wildt, North West Province bụ Margaret mepụtara ma kpọọ ya aha ya, nke a na-aga n'ihu na nwa ya nwanyị Sandy Roberts bụ onye ya na Margaret rụkọrọ ọrụ ruo afọ 32
Margaret agbazinyela aha ya n'ụdị ngwaahịa gụnyere usoro nri, ụlọ mposi, onyinye, ngwa kichin, ngwa akwụkwọ, akwa akwa, mkpụrụ na akwụkwọ
A maara Margaret Roberts Herbal Center dị ka otu n'ime ubi iri kacha elu na South Africa

A maara Margaret nke ọma maka Margaret Roberts lavenders nke ọ na-agafe ihe karịrị afọ 15 na nke dị na South Africa, nke a makwaara maka Ginger Rosemary, High Hopes Basil na Margaret Roberts Rose, ụdị ndị a niile bụ aha ya
Ọ bụ onye dibia bekee tozuru oke wee nweta ihe nrite Laureate site na Mahadum Pretoria maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ugbo mbụ na South Africa
Margaret Roberts dere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri anọ gbasara ahịhịa na isiokwu ndị metụtara ya
Ndị a gụnyere
Margaret Jepkoech Kamar (amụrụ 28 Eprel 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya na osote onye na-ekwuchitere Sineti
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara osote onye isi okwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Sineti Kenya
O so na Jubilee Alliance Party
A họpụtara ya nke mbụ ịnọchite anya Uasin Gishu County na Senate nke Kenya kamgbe 2017 ka emechara ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Kenya nke 2017
A mụrụ Kamar na 28 Eprel 1959 na Keiyo, Kenya
Ọ nwetara BSc
Hon
na Agriculture na nchekwa mmiri
O mechara nweta nzere Med Soil Science na Mahadum McGill na 1986 nakwa nzere PhD
na nchekwa ala na mmiri sitere na ngalaba nke oke ohia na nchekwa nke mahadum nke Toronto
N'afọ 1988, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na UNEP n'oge mmepe nke Map Desertification
Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ na Sayensị Soil na Mahadum Moi na 1999 wee nwee ọkwa dị iche iche na mahadum
Site na 1999 ruo 2006, ọ bụ onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu East Africa ma bụrụ onye isi oche kọmitii gburugburu gburugburu, akụrụngwa okike, ọrụ ugbo na njem nlegharị anya
Ọ durukwa ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ gaa nzukọ mba ụwa a kpọrọ World Summit on Sustainable Development (WSSD) nke weere ọnọdụ na mba South Africa n'afọ 2002
Site n'afọ 2008 ruo na 2010, ọ bụrugo onye ndu ndị nnọchiteanya na African, Caribbean na Pacific na European Union Joint Parliamentary Assembly (ACP-EU JPA)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka minista gburugburu na akụrụngwa sitere na 2010 ruo 2011 na onye minista nke agụmakwụkwọ ka elu, sayensị na teknụzụ site na 2011 ruo 2013
N'afọ 2013, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi na International Center for Research in Sustainable Development, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
Àtụ Wikiquote

Margaret Kudirat Ladipo (a mụrụ n'abali iri-na isii n’onwa Eprel nke afọ 1961) bu onye akwukwo na onye nchoputa nke Naijiria nke jere ozi dika Rektọ nke Yaba College of Technology site n’afọ 2009 rue n'afọ 2017
Margaret bụ onye Kwara steeti ma a mụrụru ya na Kaduna, dị na Kaduna State, nke Naijirịa
Ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Anglican Girls School, Kaduna na Government Secondary School, Kaduna n'otu n'otu
Margaret nwere asambodo BSc na kemistri, asambodo MSc na Polima Sayensị na Tekịnụzụ yana PhD na nyocha kemistri na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọrụ Margaret Ladipo hụrụ na mgbe mbụ ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello n'afọ 1982 tupu ọ gawa ọrụ dị ka Lecturer III na Kaduna Polytechnic n'afọ 1984
N’afọ 1986, ọ banyere na Yaba College of Technology dịka Lecturer II ebe ọ gbagoro n’ọkwa were bụrụ onye isi ndi nkuzi n’afọ 2002
Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka Rektọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njụ ụlọ ọrụ kọleji hụ
Margaret e deela akwụkwọ abụọ ma bipụta ọtụtụ ederede na akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara obodo na mba ụwa
Ọ bụ onye otu Institute of Operations Research nke Naijirịa, Civil Institute of Democratic Administration na Institute of Investment Management and Research
N'ime ọchịchị ya, e boro Margaret ebubo 'i zo ego' na 'i zu ego' nke e wepụtara maka mwulite Yaba College of Technology
Margaret Leinen (amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba ụbọchị iri abụo, n'afọ 1946) bụ ónyé American paleoceanographer na paleoclimatologist
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara Leinen dịka ónyé nduzi nke iri na otu nke Scripps Institution of Oceanography, yana ónyé isi nke School of Marine Sciences na Mahadum California, San Diego
O guzobere Climate Response Fund, ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru nke lekwasịrị anya n'ime ka nghọta ka mma, nhazi na iji nyocha injinia ihu igwe mee ihe, ma jee ozi dị ka ónyé isi oche ya ruo oge ụfọdụ
Ruo afọ abụọ, Leinen rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi sayensị màkà ụlọ ọrụ na-amalite na teknụzụ ahịhịa ndụ na mbelata mgbanwe ihu igwe

N'afọ 1969, Leinen nwetara nzèrè bachelọ nkè sayensị na Geology na Mahadum Illinois, nzèrè masta na geological oceanography na Mahadim Oregon State n'afọ 1975, na nzèrè doctorate ya na oceanography n'afọ 1980 na Mahadị Rhode Island
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé otu American Association for the Advancement of Science na nkè Geological Society of America
N'afọ 2016, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọchịchị United States họpụtara ya dị ka ónyé nnọchi anya sayensị US
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara Leinen na American Academy of Arts and Sciences ma kpọọ ya ónyé otu The Oceanography Society
Margaret Lemon (amuru c
1614) bu ome ihe nlere anya Bekee
Ọ bụ nwanyị na-esekarị ihe osise na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, ọ bụkwa onye mmekọ Anthony van Dyck
A maara na Lemọn bụ onye bekee, mana ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nwere ike ịkọwa naanị site n'ịtụle afọ ndụ ya na eserese ya
Ekwenyere na ya nwere agbụrụ Flemish ma eleghị anya ọ bụ onye nkwanye ùgwù mgbe ọ zutere Anthony van Dyck mgbe ọ bịarutere ọrụ, ọzọ, na England na 1632
Ọ bụ onye na-egwu egwu nke nwere ike ịkpọ viol
A na-emeghachi akụkọ ndụ ya dabere na asịrị karịa ndekọ
A maara ya dika onye nọ na London site na 1629
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere oke ego, e nyere ya ọrụ ilekọta ụlọ onye ọlụlụ ya na Blackfriars na n'ọnụ ụlọ ya dị na Eltham Palace
Van Dyck nabatara ndị ọgaranya ya n'ụlọ ya gụnyere Charles I nke England
Edekọghị na ya na Eze zutere n'agbanyeghị na Charles mechara zụta ihe osise ya
Ọ bụ ihe atụ maka eserese Van Dyck dabere na echiche oge gboo nke ' Venus Modest '
Ihe osise a dị na mkpokọta Royal Royal na-egosi Lemọn na-agbalị, iji obi umeala kpuchie ara ya
Ekwuru na Lemon nwere Endymion Porter dị ka ọbịa mgbe Van Dyck na-anọghị ya, mana ọ tụrụ anya na Van Dyck ga-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi
Wenceslaus Hollar kwuru na ọ nwara itinye ọrụ Van Dyck n'ihe egwu mgbe ọ nwara ibipụ isi mkpịsị aka ya na ekworo
Mmekọrịta Lemon na Van Dyck kwụsịrị mgbe ha lụrụ Mary Ruthven, bụ onye e weere na ọ ka mma, na February 1640
Nwunye ọhụrụ ya sitere na ezinụlọ aristocratic Scottish na ọ bụ nwanyị na-echere Queen Henrietta Maria

Van Dyck nwụrụ afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ma Lemon gara n'ihu dị ka ihe nlereanya na-adọta mmasị site na ndị na-eto eto nwere oké ọchịchọ gụnyere Peter Lely, Samuel Cooper, Cornelis Jansen van Ceulen na Adriaen Hanneman
E nwere ihe osise ya na mkpokọta Frick nke Van Dyck mere n'ihe dị ka 1638, nke furu efu ruo afọ ụfọdụ
Enwere ihe ọzọ na mkpokọta Royal nke edobere na Hampton Court Obí
N'afọ 2022, enwere eserese asatọ banyere ya na National Portrait Gallery nke bụ 'mgbe Anthony van Dyck gasịrị'
Ihe osise Peter Lely nke ya, na 'The Concert', dị na Courtauld Institute
Mpempe akwụkwọ na ihe osise nke ihe osise Van Dyck nke oge a ka Flora dị n'agbanyeghị na nke mbụ efuola
Ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ́ Susan E
James kwuru na ọ bụ ya bụ nwanyị a na-esekarị ihe na narị afọ nke iri na asaa
Margaret Nakhla ( Arabic ) bụ onye Egypt nke oge a na-ese ihe (1908–1977)
Nakhla, onye a mụrụ na 12/10/1908 na Alexandria, gụrụ nka na France ọkachamara na eserese mmanụ
O nwetara diplọma nkuzi ya n'afọ 1939, wee mụọ nka nke eserese mgbidi na École du Louvre n'afọ 1951
Ọ kụziri na Institute of Fine Arts for Girls, Egypt
O bi na Alexandria, Paris, Cairo na Port Said
1965 onyinye oge niile nke mmepụta nka maka otu afọ
Ìgwè ndị mmadụ pụrụ iche n'ụlọ na mba ofesi

Iji tụgharịa uche na eserese nke Margaret Nakhla ọtụtụ ìgwè mmadụ, mgbe ụfọdụ na-enyo enyo na izi ezi nke echiche ahịa ahịa Vlouhadtha ndị mmadụ na-achọsi ike na ego dị ịtụnanya iburu n'uche na okwu ndị a nwere onyinyo nke okike, mana n'etiti mkpofu nke onye na-ese ihe, abụwo onye na-ese ihe nwere ụzọ niile nke ịdepụta na ikike dị elu, n'otu oge ahụ, ha emeela ka echiche mara echiche mara ọkwa mmadụ
Margaret Okayo (amụrụ na ọnwa Mee 30, na afọ 1976 na Masaba, Kisii District) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ marathon si Kenya
O meriri ọtụtụ nnukwu marathons, gụnyere New York City Marathon (ugboro abụọ), Boston Marathon, na London Marathon
O nwetakwala mmeri na San Diego Marathon ugboro abụọ
Okayo malitere ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Itierio Secondary School, nke dị nso n'obodo Kisii, na afọ 1993
Ọ natara ọrụ site na Kenya Prisons Service, ebe obibi nke ndị na-agba ọsọ marathon nke ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu na mba ahụ, na afọ 1995 ebe ọ zụlitere ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya
Na afọ 1998 Commonwealth Games ọ mechara nke ise na 10,000 mita
Ọ mechara nke iri na atọ na 1999 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
Otu n'ime agbụrụ ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma bụ mmeri na New York Marathon na afo 2001 na afọ 2003, Boston Marathon na 2002 na London Marathon na 2004
Ọ ka na-ejide ihe ndekọ na New York Marathon na Boston Marathon
Marathons ndị ọzọ Okayo meriri gụnyere Milan na afọ 2003, San Diego na afọ 2000 na afo 2001
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya Kenya na afọ 2004 Summer Olympic Games na Athens, Gris, mana ọ gwụbeghị marathon ahụ
Ọ na-etinye ọnwa atọ nke ọzụzụ kwa afọ na Ịtali
O meriri na 2003 Udine Half Marathon ma mechie nke atọ na afọ 2008 Rome-Ostia Half Marathon
Okayo bụ onye agbụrụ Gusii
Ọ bụ Federico Rosa na-achịkwa ya ma Gabriele Rosa na-azụ ya
Ọ dị naanị sentimita 152 n'ogologo ma dị kilogram 43 n'arọ
Margaret Quainoo (1941-2006) nke a makwaara dị ka Araba Stamp bụ onye onye na-atụrụ ndụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Ghana onye nyere aka na uto nke ụlọ ọrụ site na nka ya
O tinyere aka na ihe nkiri a ma ama nke m gwara gị nke 1970 na n'usoro ihe onyonyo Efiewura
O meela n'ọtụtụ oriri egwu na ihe nkiri na Ghana
O nwetara ihe ngosi mgbe o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Ọ kwụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ wee sonye na Brigade Drama Group na Nungua, nke dị na Accra
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha 37 dị na Accra mgbe ọ rịasịrị obere ọrịa
Margaret Rose Vendryes (1955 rụo n'ọnwa Machị ubochí irí abụọ na isé, 2022) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye nlekọta, na ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme nke bi na New York
Vendryes malitere ọmụmụ ya na ejiji ejiji tupu ọ gaa na nka màrà mmá ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Amherst College, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1984
Ọ gàrà n'ihu nweta MA ya na akụkọ nka na 1992 na Mahadum Tulane na PhD ya na Mahadụ Princeton na 1997 ebe o lekwasịrị anya na akụkọ nka nke ndị Africa America
Ndị Southeast Queens Artists' Alliance márá ọkwa ọnwụ Vendryes
Vendryes jere ozi dị ka Ónyé isi óchè nke Ngalaba nke Performing na Fine Arts na Onye nduzi nke Fine Arts Gallery na York College na New York ébé ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na 2000
A kwadoro ya ka ọ bụrụ Dean nké School of the Museum of Fine Arts na Mahadum Tufts na Boston na June 2022
Site na 2000 ruo 2001 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi nleta màkà Art & Archaeology na African American Studies na Mahadum Princeton
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ màkà Modern American na Contemporary Art na City University of New York site na 2002 ruo 2007

Ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị megide ihe ọ na-akpọ 'ụzọ agbụrụ na-emetụta' ịkọwa ọrụ nka, omume nke ịgụ mmetụta nke agbụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'ime ọrụ nka ha, ebe ọ kwenyere na ọ nwere ike igbochi nkọwa na ọnọdụ nke ọrụ ahụ ma belata nyocha nke mmetụta ha na nnukwu nka
N'afọ 2005, Vendryes malitere usoro ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị íchè íchè n'ime ọrụ ya The African Diva Project, na mmanụ na wax oyi na ákwà, na n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá, ihe nkpuchi Africa
Usoro ahụ malitere site na onyinyo Donna Summer nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ya Four Seasons of Love album cover
Ihe oyiyi ahụ na-ejikọta ma jikọta ihe osise nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ na ihe nkpuchi ọdịnala Afrịka
N'ihi na ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwoke na-eyi ihe mkpuchi ndị a, ọ chọpụtara nchọpụta ya banyere ike, agbụrụ, okike na ịma mma site na ọrụ ndị a
Ọrụ ahụ gụnyere ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi ụmụ nwanyị Black American gụnyere Aretha Franklin, Grace Jones, na Whitney Houston
Margaret Simpson (amụrụ na 31 Disemba na afọ 1981 na Krapa) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu heptathlete
O meriri ọla nchara na afọ 2005 World Championships, na-etinye ọtụtụ ihe kachasị mma n'ime usoro ahụ
Ihe kacha mma ya bụ 6423 points, nke o nwetara na Götzis na ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2005
N'otu n'ime ihe ngosi mba ụwa mbụ ya, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na afọ 1999 All-Africa Games
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na afo 1999 African Junior Athletics Championships, mana o nweghị ike ịmecha na ihe omume ahụ na afo 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics
A họpụtara ya maka heptathlon na afọ 2001 World Championships in Athletics ma tinye ya na 13th n'ozuzu
Nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma bịara n'afọ sochirinụ ka ọ na-ewere ọla nchara na afọ 2002 Commonwealth Games wee merie ọla edo heptathlon na 2002 African Championships in Athletics
O nweghị ike ịmecha na afo 2003 World Championships in Athletics
N'afọ 2004, Simpson ghọrọ onye mmeri Afrịka nke ugboro abụọ wee soro nsonaazụ a site na nke itoolu na afọ 2004 Athens Olympics
Simpson ruru n'ọkwa ụwa na nke mbụ ya na 2005 World Championships in Athletics, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ na arụmọrụ nke abụọ kachasị mma nke ọrụ ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke 6375 isi
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 6423 na Hypo-Meeting na mbido oge ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ oge afọ 2006 mana ọ laghachiri n'afọ sochirinụ na nrite ọla edo na afo 2007 All-Africa Games
O nweghị ike ịmecha na afọ 2007 World Championships in Athletics n'ikpeazụ n'oge ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ oge niile nke afọ 2008 mgbe nke a gasịrị
Ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2009 wee debanye aha kachasị mma nke oge nke 5872 na Meeting International d'Arles
Ọ laghachiri n'ọnọdụ dị mma na afọ 2010 African Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ meriri nke atọ heptathlon title na akara nke 6031 points
Ọ chịkwara nke asatọ na elu elu maka Afrịka na afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup
O meriri mbipụta na afọ 2011 nke nzukọ Multistars na Desenzano del Garda na akara nke 6270 isi, na-emeri onye mmeri na afọ 2010 Marina Goncharova
Ọ bụ onye nke iri na anọ na afo 2011 World Championships in Athletics ma merie nke atọ na-esote na 2011 All-Africa Games
O meriri African Combined Events Championship na afọ 2011 na 2012
Ọ hapụrụ heptathlon na afo 2012 Summer Olympics n'ihi ọrịa akụrụ
Simpson bụ onye a ma ama maka ịgba ụta ya siri ike, nke kachasị mma ya bụ mita 5636

Margaret Simwanza Sitta (Amụrụ na 24 Julaị 1946) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania nke so n'òtù Chama Cha Mapinduzi na-achị, A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Urambo, na-eje ozi site n'afọ 2015 ruo afọ 2020
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Mmụta na Ọzụzụ Ọrụ na Minista nke Mmepe Obodo, Mmekọahụ na Ụmụaka
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị
A mụrụ Margaret Simwanza Sitta n'ụbọchị 24 Julaị 1946Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Tabora Town Primary School site n'afọ 1954 ruo afọ 1957, wee gaa Ussoke Girls Middle School site n'afọ 1958 ruo afọ 1961
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tabora Girls Secondary School n'afọ 1965 wee nata asambodo nke Grade 'A' site na Mpwapwa Teachers College n'afọ 1967; o mechara nweta diplọma ya n'otu kọleji ahụ n'afọ 1985
O mechara nweta Ba ED Hons-Degree na Mahadum Dar es Salaam n'afọ 1988
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị - na Tabora Girls, Azania, Mwanza na Forodhani n'ime afọ 1968 ruo 1980
N'afọ 1980, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi agụmakwụkwọ distrikti nke Urambo, Moshi na Kinondoni Municipal site n'afọ 1990 ruo 1995

N'afọ 1996, ọ ghọrọ Onye isi nke Ngalaba Mmụta Ndị Ọrụ- DSM, nke Trade Unions Confederation of Tanzania bụ TUCTA) Institution nọchiri ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ anọ kemgbe afọ 1996, n'afọ 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Education and Vocational Training dị ka onye isi-ọfịs nke Kọmishọna nke EducationDSM, Ọ ghọrọ onye minista nke Education na Vocational Training site n'afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2008, Ọ gara n'ihu na-ejide ọkwa minista ya mana n'oge a bụ nke Ministry of Community Development, Gender and Children site n'ọfịs site n'ụbọchị 2008 ruo afọ 2010
Margaret Wild (amụrụ ya na 1948) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ ụmụaka Australia
Odela akwụkwọ maka ụmụaka karịa akwụkwọ ịrị anọ
Ebipụtala ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa wee nweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite
Amụrụ Wild na Eshowe, South Africa, ebe obibi ndị Europe oge ochie ugbu a bụ obodo ahịa
Ezinụlọ onye njikwa ụlọ akụ ya na-akwagharị ugboro ugboro wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti na Johannesburg
Ọ bịara Australia n'afọ 1972, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, wee gụchaa akwụkwọ na Australian National University na Canberra

Na Sydney ọ zụlitere ezinụlọ, rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede nweere onwe ya, rụọ ọrụ afọ iri na isii dị ka onye na-edezi akwụkwọ na mbipụta ụmụaka-1984 ruo 2000, n'ikpeazụ na ABC Books, Australian Broadcasting Corporation
Akwụkwọ nke anụ ọhịa na-enyocha isiokwu dị iche iche mana ọ kacha mara ya maka ịchọpụta ihe gbasara njirimara, ntụkwasị obi na ọnwụ

Let the Celebration Begin (1991) lekwasịrị anya na ntọhapụ dị nso nke ndị mkpọrọ ndị Juu n'ogige ịta ahụhụ ndị Nazi, mgbe na The Very Best of Friends (1989) ọnwụ nke onye ọrụ ugbo kpaliri nwunye ya di ya nwụrụ ịchọta ịhụnanya ilekọta anụ ụlọ ha, nwamba na nkịta, otu
Fox (2000), nke Ron Brooks gosipụtara site n'iji agba nke odida obodo Australia, bụ akụkọ siri ike gbasara ntụkwasị obi na ịrara mmadụ nye
Na nso nso a Wild ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ n'amaokwu, Otu abalị na Jinx
Akwụkwọ ndị a na-enyocha ule na nchegbu ndị na-eto eto na-eche ihu na ụlọ akwụkwọ, mmekọrịta na ntolite
Na Machị afọ 2020 Wild enwetara ihe nrite maka mmeri ndụ n'ime akwụkwọ site n'aka Council Australia
Na Disemba 2020, ahọpụtara ya dị ka onye ndoro-ndoro anya onye ode akwụkwọ Australia maka onyinye 2022 Hans Christian Andersen
O bizi na Sidni
Margaret Nantongo Zziwa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke 3rd East African Legislative Assembly (EALA) na Arusha, Tanzania
A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na onwa June na afọ 2012
A chụpụrụ ya ma tụfuo ya n'ọfịs na 17 Disemba nke afọ 2014, n'ihi omume ọjọọ na mmetọ nke ọfịs, mana e mechara nye ya ụgwọ maka iwepụ ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
A mụrụ ya na Charles Mugerwa na Josephine Mugerwa nke Mpererwe, mpaghara nke isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu, Kampala, na 1963
Margaret Zziwa nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na Economics na Postgraduate Diploma na Education, ma site na Mahadum Makerere, ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu kachasị ochie na Uganda
Otu n'ime nzere masta ya, nke ọ nwetara na Makerere, bụ Master of Arts na Gender and Women Studies
O nwekwara nzere masta ọzọ, Master of Arts in Social Policy Studies, site na Mahadum Stirling na United Kingdom
Mgbe e mesịrị, Mahadum Stirling nyere ya Doctor of Philosophy
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ kụziri akụ na ụba na ọdịdị ala na Kololo Senior Secondary School, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị n'etiti Kampala, nke bụ isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi oge na Faculty of Women and Gender Studies na Mahadum Makerere
N'agbata na afọ 1993 na afọ 1995, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Constituent Assembly nke dere Iwu Iwu Ugandan nke afọ 1995
Site na afọ 1996 ruo na afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ n'usoro na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka Onye omeiwu ụmụ nwanyị maka Kampala District
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, onye nọ n'ọkwa, Nabilah Naggayi Sempala, tụfuru ya n'oche ndị omeiwu
Kemgbe na afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị omeiwu Uganda itoolu na East African Legislative Assembly (EALA), akụkụ iwu nke East African Community
Na onwa June nke afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ekwuchitere EALA maka afọ ise
Zziwa bụ onye otu St
Margaret Secondary School, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ malitere
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere St
Francis Choir na St
Jude Catholic Church na Naguru, mpaghara ọzọ dịpụrụ adịpụ na Kampala
Zziwa lụrụ Francis Babu
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ onye okpukpe Roman Katọlik
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị Uganda kemgbe na afọ 1986
Margarete Kühn (4 Febụwarị 1902 - 12 Septemba 1995) bụ onye edemede German na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ bụ onye nduzi mbụ nke State Palaces and Gardens Administration na Berlin
O mere mgbalị dị ukwuu maka ichebe Obí Berlin na iwughachi Obí Charlottenburg n'oge agha gachara
N'afọ 1948, o nyere aka nyefee ihe odide oge ochie, Riesencodex, nchịkọta zuru ezu nke ọrụ St
Hildegard nke Bingen site na Dresden gaa na Hildegard Abbey site na ọwa na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
A mụrụ Margarete Kühn na 4 Febụwarị 1902 na Lütgendortmund [de], Germany
Ọ gụrụ sayensị okike na Munich, mana o mechara gbanwee gaa na akụkọ nka
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Vienna na Leipzig
N'afọ 1928, ọ natara nzere doctorate ya na Munich
Ọ sonyeere dị ka onye enyemaka na Prussian Palace Administration na 1929 ma mesịa ghọọ onye enyemaka nyocha n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ebe ọ bụ na 1935 ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ernst Gall (1888-1958), mgbe ahụ onye nduzi nke Prussian Palace Administration, na-ahụ maka Charlottenburg Palace

N'oge nkewa nke Berlin], Kühn mere mkpesa na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma megide mpụ nke Berlin Palace site German People's Ndị uwe ojii Mgbe onye ọka ikpe East Berlin kwaturu ụlọ eze ahụ, Kühn na Hinnerk Scheper, onye na-ahụ maka obodo Berlin, bufere ụlọ ọrụ ha na West Berlin

Na Jenụwarị 1997, Minista Ọrụ Ugbo Gunhild Øyangen sitere na Labour Party kwuru na steeti na otu ndị ọrụ ugbo Norwegian ekwenyela imeghe maka asọmpi na ngalaba mmiri ara ehi Na 1995, onye nwe ọhụrụ ahụ gara ịzụrụ mmiri ara ehi Tine mechiri emechi na Alvdal
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1969
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, Martin Sperlich nọchiri ya dị ka onye nduzi
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ewuzigharị Obí Charlottenburg ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1984
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara Obí Charlottenburg na ihe ncheta ndị ọzọ dị na Berlin
N'agbata afọ 1958 na 1974 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ maka akụkọ nka
Site na 1962 ruo 1995, ọ dezigharịrị ọrụ Karl Friedrich Schinkel
E nyere Kühn Great Federal Cross of Merit na Ernst Reuter Plaque
N'afọ 2005, iji kwado mbọ ọ gbara maka iwughachi Obí Charlottenburg, a gụrụ otu okporo ámá dị na Charlottenbourg aha ya
Margarethe Lenore Selenka-Heinemann (n'ụbọchị 7 Ọktoba 1860, Hamburg n'ụbọchị 16 Disemba 1922, Munich) bụ onye Germany na-amụ banyere ụmụ anụmanụ, anthropologist, feminist na pacifist
Ọ nyochara enwe ma duzie njem sayensị na Dutch East Indies
A mụrụ Selenka dị ka Margarethe Heinemann, nwa nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
N'afọ 1886, ọ lụrụ onye edemede Ferdinand Neubürger, mana alụmdi na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghịm afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị
N'afọ 1893, ọ lụrụ Emil Selenka ọzọ, prọfesọ na zoology na Mahadum Erlangen, onye di ya nwụrụ nke nwanne ya nwanyị
N'okpuru mmetụta Selenka, ọ malitere ịmụ paleontology, anthropology na zoology wee bụrụ onye enyemaka ya
N'afọ 1892 o sonyere na njem sayensị na Ceylon, Japan, China na Dutch East Indies nke di ya duziri
Mgbe Emil Selenka dara ezigbo ọrịa n'oge ha nọrọ na Dutch East Indies ma laghachi Germany, ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ahụ, na-etinye ọnwa ole na ole na-enyocha ọhịa nke Borneo iji mụọ apụl
Laa azụ na Germany, di na nwunye ahụ dere akụkọ banyere njem ha akpọrọ Sonnige Welten Ostasiatische Reiseskizzen (Sunny worlds East Asian travel sketches)
Ndị Selenka kwagara Munich n'afọ 1895
N'ebe a, Margarethe ga-emesị bụrụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Ludwig Maximilian

Ọ ghọrọ enyi ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị Anita Augspurg na Lida Gustava Heymann ma tinye aka na German feminist-pacifist movement, nke jikọtara ime ihe ike n'ụlọ megide ụmụ nwanyị na omume na mba na-aga agha
Ya na Augspurg, onye bụ nwanyị ọka iwu ọkachamara mbụ nke Germany, Selenka mere mkpọsa maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị n'alaeze Germany
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Verband fortschrittlicher Frauenvereine (VfFV), òtù ụmụ nwanyị nke Germany nke a na-ewere dị ka ndị siri ike n'oge ahụ
Selenka bụkwa onye na-eme udo, onye kwenyere na a ga-egbochi agha n'ọdịnihu site na mkparịta ụka na ịmepụta iwu mba ụwa
N'afọ 1899, ọ bụ onye isi na-ahazi ngagharị iwe mba ụwa
Margarita Michelena (Juli iri abuo na otu, 1917, Pachuca, Hidalgo - Machi iri abuo na asaa, 1998, Mexico City) bụ onye na-ede uri na Mexico, onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ, onye ntụgharị na onye nta akụkọ
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Spain biri na France ruo oge ụfọdụ tupu ha abịarute Mexico
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) na Mexico City, na Faculty of Philosophy and Letters
Ọ malitere ọrụ edemede ya na magazin América, ma mesịa bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke El Libro y el Pueblo na Secretariat of Public Education (ruo 1962)
O mechara bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ Novedades na Excélsior
N'otu oge ahụ, o nwere mmemme redio na-ekwu maka ajụjụ gbasara akwụkwọ nkọwa okwu
N'afọ 1967, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke ndi Secretariat of Tourism
N'afọ 1980, o guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ Cotidiano, nke ụmụ nwanyị mepụtara ma na-egosi akụkọ ahụ site n'echiche ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
A na-ekwu na uru ya dị egwu, ziri ezi ma nwe kwa ihe atụ
O kọwapụtara ha n'ọtụtụ ebe
Nsụgharị
Akwụkwọ ndị o bupụtara gụnyere ndị a Ha niile bụ akwụkwọ uri ma e wezụga dịka egosiri
Octavio Paz 'Abụ ya bụ ụlọ elu dị nro, ihe owuwu ọgụgụ isi nke nwere ọgụgụ isi'
(Ebumnuche ya bụ ụlọ elu dị gịrịgịrị, ihe owuwu ọgụgụ isi nke ọgụgụ isi)
Margarita Petrova (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na 2000 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Margarita Shtarkelova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 5 Julaị 1951) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Marghi Special bụ nri Naịjirịa nke sitere na ndị Marghi nke mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria
A na-ejikarị azụ sitere na Lake Chad, sorrel, spinach, tomato (na mgbe ụfọdụ akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ dị ka dọc mùng), na mkpụrụ ọka, na broth tamarind
A na-eji galik na-esi ísì ụtọ yana ahịhịa ndị ọzọ chọọ ya mma, dịka ụdị dị iche iche nke usoro nri pụrụ iche nke Margi si dị
Enwere ike inye ya naanị ya ma ọ bụ na yam, buwo, osikapa ọcha wdg
Marghi South bụ asụsụ nke ndi Chadic na Naijiria
O nwere ike ịbụ na ọ dị nso na Huba karịa Margi
Àtụ Languages of Nigeria

Margie Orford (amụrụ ya na 30 Septemba 1964) bụ onye odeakụkọ South Africa, onye isi ihe nkiri na onye ode akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo, akụkọ ụmụaka, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ na akwụkwọ ederede ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Orford na London ma tolite na Namibia na South Africa
Ejidere ya n'oge steeti mberede nke afọ 1985 mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town, na-anwale ule ikpeazụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Mgbe ọ gachara njem n'ọtụtụ ebe, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru JM Coetzee tupu ọ malite ọrụ na-ebipụta na Namibia ọhụrụ pụtara
Ọ laghachiri na South Africa n'afọ 2001
Orford (30 September 2006)
Fabulously 40 and Beyond Coming into Your Power an Embracing Change
Spearhead P
Margie Sudre (Amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1943) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Reunionese a mụrụ na Vietnamese na onye otu European Parliament maka 'Outre-mer' nke France

Tupu a họpụta ya na European Parliament (UMP-'les républicains'), o nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma nke obodo ma nke mba onye isi oche nke Réunion Island regional Council (1993 ruo afọ 1998, onye otu kemgbe afọ 1998), odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka French-Speaking World (1995 ruo afọ 1997)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka French bụrụ asụsụ nke abụọ nke Atlanta Olympic Games
Ọ bụ onye otu Union for a Popular Movement, nke bụ akụkụ nke European People's Party, ma nọrọ na Kọmitii European Parliament's Committee on Fisheries na Kọmiti ya na Regional Development
Margo Humphrey (amụrụ na June 25, 1942) bụ ónyé America na-ebi akwụkwọ, ónyé na-ese ihe osise na ónyé nkụzi nka
O nwetara nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Stanford mgbè ọ nwetasịrị nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts n'ụlọ akwụkwọ California College of Arts and Crafts na obibi akwụkwọ
Ọ gara Africa, Brazil, Caribbean, na Europe ma kụzie na Fiji, Nigeria, Uganda, na Mahadum Maryland
Dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ, a maara ya maka 'iji obi ike, iji agba na nnwere onwe nke ọdịdị', na-emepụta ọrụ ndị 'na-akpali akpali, na-akpali ma na-adị ndụ'
Usoro ya màkà ịdepụta agba bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe na lithography
A na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka 'n'ihu nke óbíbí akwụkwọ nke oge a'
A mụrụ ya na Oakland, California na June 25, 1942
Ọ gàrà Oakland Public Schools ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1960 na Oakland High School dị ka ónyé isi nka

Mgbè ọ nwetasịrị BFA ya na Painting na Printmaking na California College of Arts and Crafts, ọ gàrà Stanford University Graduate School na-enweta nzèrè Masters of Fine Arts na Honors in Printmaking na 1974
Humphrey enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na nsọpụrụ gụnyere

Margret Holmes Bates (née, Martha Mary Victoria Ernsperger; October 6, 1844 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 21, 1927) bụ onye edemede America nke a maara nke ọma site na aha edemede ya, Mrs M E Holmes, MargretHolmes, Margrot Holmes Bates, na Margaret Holmes Bates
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ, Manitou, nke atụmatụ ya dị na Rochester, Indiana na Indianapolis, Indiana
Otu n'ime akwụkwọ ya a ma ama, Hildegarde, bụ nchịkọta uri, raara nye nwa ya nwoke, Charles
Amụrụ Martha Mary Victoria Ernsperger na Fremont, Ohio, n'ọnwa October 6, 1844
Aha mbụ ya bụ Ernsperger, mgbe ọgbọ ise gachara n'ala US, aha ahụ na-echekwa mkpụrụ okwu na ịkpọpụta ya
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Christopher, onye ọrụ ugbo, na Julia (Ensminger) Ernsperger
A mụrụ nna Bates na Baltimore, Maryland
Ọ sonyeere ezinụlọ nna ya oge ụfọdụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ogo ya wee biri n'ebe ugwu Ohio
Site na Ohio, ọ kwagara Rochester, Indiana, n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1858
Ezinụlọ nne ahụ, dị ka ndị German dị ka nke nna ya, bụ ndị Pennsylvania
Dị ka ezinụlọ, ha bụ ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị a nụchara anụcha, na-agba ọsọ na ọrụ, ọkachasị ndị nke iwu na nkà mmụta okpukpe

N'oge Bates bụ nwata, o gosipụtara mmasị dị ukwuu n'akwụkwọ, dịka nwa agbọghọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, 'ihe' a na-ede kwa izu ma ọ bụ kwa izu bụ oge na-atọ ụtọ n'oge gara aga, ezumike site na ọmụmụ ihe na-adịghị mma, nke na-adịghị mfe nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na iwu nke ụtọ asụsụ

Ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ya ụtọ ka a hapụ ya, mgbe ọ na-anọghị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, itinye echiche ya n'ụdị ederede, ma ọ bụ ịnọdụ ala na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị na nwanne ya nwoke gbara ya gburugburu ma kọọrọ ha akụkọ dịka ọ na-eche banyere ha
Marguerite Marie Broquedis (Mkpọpụta ya n'asụsụ French [maʁɡ(ə)ʁit bʁɔk(ə)di]; aha di na nwunye Billout-Bordes; 17 Eprel 1893 - 23 Eprel 1983) bụ onye egwuregwu tenis French

A mụrụ Broquedis na 17 Eprel 1893 na Pau, Pyrénées-Atlantiques Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Paris n'ihe dị ka mmalite narị afọ ahụ wee malite ịkụ tenis n'ụlọ ikpe abụọ nwere uzuzu nke bụ akụkụ nke Galerie des machines
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere Racing Club de France
Broquedis sọrọ mpi na 1912 Olympics na Stockholm ebe o meriri nrite ọla edo n'èzí site n'ịkụ onye Germany Dora Köring 4–6, 6–3, 6–4 na nke ikpeazụ
Na ngwakọta abụọ, o ritere ọla nchara ya na Albert Canet
N'afọ 1913 na 1914, o meriri asọmpi French, na-eti Suzanne Lenglen dị afọ iri na ise na 1914 ikpeazụ
Broquedis, nke a na-akpọ 'chi nwanyị', a makwaara ya maka ịbụ naanị onye ọkpụkpọ meriri Lenglen na egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke ọma
O sonyekwara n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 1924 na Paris mana o nweghị ike inweta ihe nrite ọ bụla n'ebe ahụ
O meriri n'asọmpi French Covered Court Championship ugboro isii (1910, 1912–13, 1922, 1925, na 1927)

Site na 1925 ruo 1927, Broquedis nwere oge ọzọ na-aga nke ọma na ọrụ tenis ya, na-eru ọkara ikpeazụ na Wimbledon na 1925, na nkeji iri na ise ugboro abụọ na asọmpi French (nke zuru oke ugbu a) na 1925 na 1927
Ọzọkwa, o meriri n'asọmpi abụọ na Jean Borotra na Paris n'afọ 1927
Wallis Myers họọrọ ya n'ọkwa nke 9 n'ụwa n'afọ 1925
Broquedis nwụrụ na Orléans n'afọ 1983, ọ dị afọ 90
Marguerite Poland (amuru 3 Eprel 1950, Johannesburg ) bu onye odee South Africa na onye ode akwukwo akwukwo iri na otu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ezinụlọ Poland kwagara Eastern Cape bụ ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St Dominic's Priory School na Port Elizabeth, Poland gụchara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Mahadum Rhodes, na-amụba na Social Anthropology na Xhosa
Na 1971, Marguerite Poland dechara akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ ya na asụsụ Africa na Mahadum Stellenbosch
N'afọ 1977, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nna ya ukwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ Zulu, ọkachamara na akụkọ ifo Zulu - ngalaba ọpụrụiche ya bụ ehi
N'afọ 1997, e nyere ya PhD, nzere doctoral ya bụ 'Ọmụmụ Ihe Nkọwa nke Sanga-Nguni Cattle of the Zulu People' - sitere na Mahadum Natal
O nwekwara nzere nkwanye ugwu na Comparative African Languages na MA na PhD na Zulu Literature sitere na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal
Poland rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta mmadụ na Port Elizabeth na Durban
Poland rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ọkà mmụta gbasara agbụrụ na Iziko South African Museum na Cape Town
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya ọ kuziri Bekee otu afọ na St
Andrew's College na Grahamstown, ebe e nyere ya ọrụ ide akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mee emume ncheta afọ narị na iri ịse nke ntọala ya n'afọ 2005
Mbipụta sitere na The Boy in You Biography of St Andrew's College, Grahamstown 1855–2005 ka ewepụtara na South Africa na London n'afọ 2008
Poland lụrụ onye ọka iwu, Martin Oosthuizen, onye zụlitekwara na Eastern Cape wee gaa St Andrew's College
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na ụmụ ụmụ anọ wee kee oge ha n'etiti Durban na Grahamstown ebe ọ na-eme dị ka onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na kọleji
N'ime ọrụ ya bụ Mantis na Ọnwa na Woodash Stars maka abụọ nke ọ nwetara Percy FitzPatrick Award, akwụkwọ abụọ mbụ iji nweta ihe nrite a
Mantis na Ọnwa nwetakwara ihe nrite Sankei Honorable Award maka ntụgharị asụsụ Japanese
Odela akwụkwọ ọgụgụ okenye ise
Ụgbọ oloko ahụ gaa Doringbult bụ nkenke edepụtara maka onyinye CNA na Shades maka onyinye M-Net
Shades abụrụla usoro ngụkọ ihe karịrị afọ iri na South Africa dum
A sụgharịrị ya n'asụsụ Dutch ka Schimmen Spel n'afọ 2015 (Ndị mbipụta Mozaik)
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke atọ, Iron Love, na-adọta ọtụtụ n'ime mkpali ya site na ndụ nke otu ụmụ nwoke tupu Agha Ukwu nke 1914-1918
Nkwagharị ogbo nke Ingrid Wylde dere ma duzie ya pụtara na National Arts Festival na Grahamstown n'afọ 2006
Ọrụ ya na nso nso a, Recessional for Grace and The Abundant Herds Ememe Nguni Cattle nke ndị Zulu ka emegharịrị maka ihe nkiri akwụkwọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, The Keeper bipụtara n'afọ 2014 wee sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans site n'aka Daniel Hugo, akpọrọ Die Bewaker
Nke a sochiri na Ọktoba 2019 site na A Sin of Omission, akwụkwọ akụkọ mere eme nke edobere na Eastern Cape
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, St Andrew's College Chapel - akụkọ ihe mere eme 1955-2018 ka ebipụtara n'afọ 2018
N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, a sụgharịala ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ gụnyere Afrikaans, Dutch, French, na Japanese
A 'họpụtara ya ka ọ pụta na Twentieth Century Children's Writers, 'International Who's Who', nke Cambridge University Press bipụtara na ọ bụ onye edemede pụtara ìhè na ọrụ KZN Literary Tourism

Marguerite Poland bụ onye nnata nke mba abụọ Lifetime Achievement Awards maka akwụkwọ Bekee; otu sitere na Ngalaba Arts na Culture n'afọ 2005 wee n'afọ 2010 sitere na onyinye akwụkwọ edemede South Africa
Poland bụ onye mbụ nwetara ihe nrite Percy FitzPatrick maka akwụkwọ ụmụaka N'afọ 1979 maka Mantis na Ọnwa na n'afọ 1983 ọ meriri ihe nrite ọzọ maka Woodash Stars
N'afọ 1984 ọ natara Japanese Sankei Honorable Award for The Mantis and the Moon na ntụgharị asụsụ
Edepụtara ụgbọ oloko gaa Doringbult maka onyinye CNA n'afọ 1988 yana n'afọ 1994 Shades ka edepụtara aha maka onyinye nrite M-Net
N'afọ 2013 ka Nnụnụ dọọrọ n'agha ka edepụtara aha maka onyinye Nielsen Booksellers' Choice Award

Poland nwetara onyinye Nielsen Booksellers' Choice Award n'afọ 2015 maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, The Keeper A na-enye ihe nrite a n'aha nke ndị na-ere akwụkwọ South Africa nwere mmasị ịgụ, ịkwalite na ire n'afọ 2014
N'afọ 2015 ọ meriri ihe nrite Ingwazi maka ntinye aka na akụkọ ọdịnala nke KwaZulu-Natal
Na 28 Eprel 2016, e nyere Order of Ikhamanga - Silver (OIS) na Marguerite Poland, maka 'ntụnye aka ya magburu onwe ya na mpaghara asụsụ ụmụ amaala, akwụkwọ na nkà mmụta ihe ọmụmụ'
Enyere aka na
Marguerite Wyke OBE (May 1908), bụ ónyé nkụzi Trinidad, ónyé na-ede uri, onye na'ese ihe na ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbè ọ tolitere na Jersey City, New Jersey, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, ọ lụrụ di ma kwaga Canada ruo afọ iri wee kwaga Trinidad
N'ide akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche, ma zụlite ndị na-ese ihe na Trinidad, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara
N'ịhapụ nwa amaala US ya, Wyke ghọrọ nwa amaala Trinidad na 1953 wee bụrụ ónyé na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọchịchị agwaetiti ahụ

Site na nguzobe nke West Indies Federation, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Senate abụọ si Trinidad na Tobago na otu n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị Senate abụọ na-eje ozi na Federal Parliament nke West Indias Federation
Mgbè Federation ahụ gbasara, Wyke laghachiri na mbọ nka ya, na-ebipụta uri ma na-ekere òkè na mgbasa ozi nka dị iche iche
A mụrụ Marguerite N
Abrams na Mee 1908 na New Jersey n'aka Jessie B
(née Wardlaw) na James Edward Abrams, ndị ha abụọ bụ ndị Africa America
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke ónyé na-ebubata ndị njem Pullman, James, nwèrè ụmụnne James Jr
na Bessie (ma ọ bụ Jessie)
Abrams gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lincoln High School na 1926 wee gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York
N'otu ógè ahụ na-agụ akwụkwọ nka na Grand Central School of Art, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na akwụkwọ Bekee
Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya, Abrams gụsịrị nzèrè nkụzi na New Jersey State Normal School na Jersey City
Ka ọ na-erule 1929, Abrams na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkụzi na Jersey City Public School System
Abrams malitere ibipụta uri, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị dị ka Opportunity Magazine ma kụzie ruo mgbè ọ lụrụ David Arnold Wyke na 18 February 1933
Ọ bụ dọkịta Trinidad nke na-arụ ọrụ na Toronto, Ontario, Canada n'oge alụmdi na nwunye ha dị ka naanị dọkịta ojii nọ n'ọbọdọ ahụ
Di na nwunye ahụ na-eto eto kwagara Toronto mgbe alụmdi na ọṅụṅụ ha gasịrị ebe David gara n'ihu na-arụ akwụkwọ ya dị ka dọkịta na Marguerite gàrà n'iyi, na-enye aka na Canadian Forum
Di na nwunye a so na ndị West Indian na-arụsi ọrụ na Toronto
Ọ bụ ezie na di ya bụ ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Wyke bụ onye aka ekpe ma ọ sonyeere Co-operative Commonwealth Federation (CCF) mgbè ọ bi na Canada
Wyke nwụrụ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1995
N'afọ 2002, ụlọ ọrụ Cultural Center Art Gallery nke Inter-American Development Bank na Port of Spain, kwadoro ihe ngosi nka màkà ncheta afọ 40 nke nnwere onwé mba ahụ
Wyke bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-egosi na ihe ngosi ahụ
Marguerite van Eeden (amụrụ n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Juun) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto na South Africa
A maara ya nkè ọma màkà ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans na Vaselinetjie na Vergeet My Nie
N'ịbụ onye si Cape, van Eeden tolitere na Botswana
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ óbíbí na La Rochelle Girls' High School na Paarl, na-abanye afọ 2015
Ọ gụrụ ma agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Van Eeden bịanyere aka na MPM Acting Agency
O bu ụzọ pụta na ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi Coca-Cola ma mee ihe nkiri telivishọn izizi ya na ọrụ ọbịa n'afọ 2016 nke usoro mpụ Die Byl

N'ime afọ izizi ya na mahadum na Stellenbosch, a tụbara Van Eeden n'ọrụ isi nke ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nkè afọ 2017 Vaselinetjie, nke e mere ka akwụkwọ akụkọ 2004 nke otu aha ahụ site n'aka onye edemede Namibia Anoeschka von Meck
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ malitere igwu Anita na usoro Sara se Geheim, onye ọ ga-egwuri egwu ugboro ugboro maka oge abụọ, na ụdị onye na-eto eto nke Milan Murray na usoro Waterfront
Site n'afọ 2018 ruo afọ 2020, Van Eeden pụtara na ógè atọ nkè Fynskrif dị ka Alex Kruger
Van Eeden pụtara dị ka Mardaleen Coetzer n'afọ 2020 Afrikaans romcom Vergeet my nie, nke mere ka o nweta ihe nrite na màkà Best Actress na Silver Screen Film Festival (Silwerskermfees)
N'afọ 2021, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke kykNET Afgrond dị ka Hannelie Fourie
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, Van Eeden kwere onye egwu Danie du Toit nkè otu égwu Afrikaans bụ Spoegwolf nkwa ọlụlụ
Marié Heese (amuru 27 Septemba na afo 1942, Cape Town ) bu onye ode akwukwo na onye nkuzi South Afrika
Ọ meriri ihe nrite Commonwealth Writer's Prize for Africa na afo 2010
Ọ bụ ada Audrey Blignault
O tolitere na Cape Town
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch na Mahadum South Africa (UNISA)
Ọ lụrụ Chris Heese; ha nwere ụmụ atọ
James Kuzwa Dique Enoque bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo Mozambik
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụ onye otu Pan-Afrikan Parliament na kọmitii ọrụ ugbo
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Republik nke obodo Mozambique na RENAMO site na mpaghara Manica na ntuli aka 1999
Maria Aurora Lopes bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ìgwè mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị so na National Assembly n'afọ 1975
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1975, a họpụtara Lopes ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị inyom isii mbụ nọ na ndị omeiwu
Maria Grigoryevna Bolshakova (Russian; amụrụ ya na 1947), bụ onye mba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Russia nke jere ozi dị ka Gọvanọ na-anọchite anya Ulyanovsk Oblast site na ahụ 2004 ruo na 2005
A mụrụ Maria Bolshakova na Zabaluyka na ahụ 1947
Na 22 Nọvemba 2004, Bolshakova bụ onye na-anọchite anya gọvanọ nke Ulyanovsk Oblast, ruo 6 Jenụwarị 2005, ebe Sergey Ivanovich Morozov, ghọrọ Gọvanọ nke atọ nke Ulyakovsk Oblast
Na ubs 28 na owa Jenụwarị 2021, ọ kwadoro 'Afọ nke Akwụkwọ Oge Ịgụ', nke ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze nke Ulyanovsk haziri, nke Gọvanọ Morozov haziri, ka ọ bịanyere aka na akwụkwọ ahụ na Septemba 2020

Maria Hajara Braimoh (amuru 19 Jenuarị 1990) bu onye egwu badminton nke Naijiria
Ọ so na ndị otu mba anyi nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na 2007 ya na 2011 All-Africa Games
Braimoh gbara na asọmpi Commonwealth 2010 na New Delhi, India

Maria Ibeshi Hewa (amụrụ na 10 June 1950) bụ onye ome iwu na National Assembly of Tanzania

Maria Kiwanuka (amụrụ na 12 Mee, 1955) bụ onye Uganda na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ Maka ego na Cabinet nke Uganda site na 27 Mee 2011 ruo 1 Machị 2015
Kemgbe afọ 2015 ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ukwu nke onye isi ala nke Uganda na okwu ego, na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Bretton Woods
Tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Radio One na ụlọ ọrụ nwanne ya nwanyị Radio Two nke a maara n'ógbè ahụ dị ka Akaboozi FM, na Uganda, ebe ezinụlọ ya nwere ọtụtụ òkè

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi na bọọdụ ndị nduzi nke Aga Khan Foundation (East Africa), Nabagereka Development Trust, Nkumba University, Uganda Development Bank na Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na bọọdụ Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited site na 2009 ruo 2011
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke ndị nduzi na United Bank for Africa Uganda Limited, ruo ọtụtụ afọ, a họpụtara Maria na bọọdụ nke Standard Chartered Uganda na Mee 2021
A mụrụ ya na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda na 12 Mee 1955

Maria Kiwanuka gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Gayaza, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị ụmụ nwanyị niile, nke dị ihe dị ka kilota 26 (16 mi), site n'okporo ụzọ, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Kampala, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1973
N'afọ 1974, ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere, ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu kachasị ochie na Uganda
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1977 na nzere Bachelor of Commerce (BCom)
O mechara gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ na London Business School na United Kingdom, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Master of Business Administration (MBA)
Malite n'ihe dị ka afọ 1980, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe karịrị afọ iri na World Bank, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye na-enyocha ego maka mpaghara East Asia na Southern Africa
Karịsịa, ọ kọọrọ ọrụ na Burma, Malawi, Swaziland na Uganda
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị World Bank, ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya bụ Uganda wee banye na azụmahịa onwe onye
Ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya, hiwere azụmaahịa na mpaghara mgbasa ozi, mbipụta, ụlọ na ndụmọdụ akụ na ụba

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ego na Nabagereka nke Buganda kemgbe mmalite afọ pụkụ abụọ N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na 1 Machị 2015 a chụpụrụ ya na kansụl ma họpụta ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ego nke onye isi ala
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited, Agha Khan Foundation, Nkumba University na Uganda Development Bank
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ kansụl Uganda na 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke United Bank for Africa Uganda Limited
Ka ọ na-erule Mee 2022, ọ na-anọdụ na bọọdụ nke Standard Chartered Uganda, dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi, kemgbe Mee 2021
Na Mee 2022, a họpụtara Maria Kiwanuka ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Airtel Mobile Commerce Uganda Limited (AMCUL), onye mmekọ nke Airtel Uganda na onye na-eweta Airtel Money Uganda
Ọ lụrụ Mohan Kiwanuka, onye isi nchịkwa nke Oscar Industries Limited
N'afọ 2007, afọ anọ tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ego, edepụtara di ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị kasị baa ọgaranya na Uganda

Maria Louisa Bustill Robeson (Novemba 8, 1853 – Jenuari 20, 1904) bu onye nkuzi na Quaker buru nwunye William Drew Robeson, onye nkuzi uka ndi Witherspoon Street Presbyterian Church dina Princeton, New Jersey burukwa mama Paul Robeson na umunne ya
Amuru Maria Louisa Bustill (anakpo Louisa na nwa) na aro 1853 na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, nke agburu Africa, Igbo, Lenni-Lenape America na Anglo-American
Nne na Nna ya bu Charles Hicks Bustill na Emily Robinson, ndi oji ama ama na Quakers
Na aro 1870s, Louisa jere Mahadum Lincoln University, otu black university na Oxford, Pennsylvania
Louisa aburugo onye nkuzi tupu ofu William Drew Robeson Ya na nwanne ya nwanyi Gertrude nuru umu nwoke guru akwukwo na mahadum Lincoln, mana ndibe Louisa chere na Robeson aburo ogbo ya
Ndi nna nna Bustill nwere onwe ha na-ebe 1700s, mgbe when her great-grandfather Cyrus Bustill was freed after several years of service to a new owner in Burlington, New Jersey
He moved into Philadelphia where he built a business as a baker
Cyrus Bustill became one of the founders in Philadelphia of the Free African Society in 1787
Other family had genealogical records going back to the early days of the Pennsylvania colony
Maria Alexeyevna Lvova-Belova ( Russian , amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise na Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke bụ onye bụ Kọmishọna Onye isi ala maka ikike ụmụaka na Rọshịa
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Penza, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na A
Arkhangelsky College of Culture and Arts n'afọ 2002 dị ka onye nduzi
Site na 2000 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi guitar na ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu ụmụaka na Penza
Lvova-Belova bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nke nzukọ ọha na eze mpaghara Penza maka ịkwalite mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya 'Blagovest'
N'afọ 2011–14 na n'ime afọ 2017–19 ọ bụ onye otu Civic Chamber nke Penza Oblast, n'otu oge ahụ na 2017–19 onye otu Civic Chamber nke Russian Federation
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke isi ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara All-Russia People's Front
Nà 2019, Lvova-Belova sonyeere n'otu United Russia party (onye isi ala Dmitry Medvedev nyere ya kaadị ID n'ọnwa Nọvemba 23)
N'ọnwa Nọvemba abalị irí abụọ na inọ, a họpụtara ya na Presidium nke General Council of the United Russia, ọ ghọkwara onye isi oche nke otu na-arụ ọrụ iji kwado ọha mmadụ
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2020, a họpụtara gọvanọ nke Penza Oblast Ivan Belozertsev họpụtara Lvova-Belova dị ka onye otu Federation Council of Russia site na ngalaba ndị isi nke Penza Oblast
Mgbe ntuli aka nke 2021 gasịrị, Oleg Melnichenko họpụtara ya ọzọ

Na abalị irí ná asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021, onye isi ala Russia bụ Vladimir Putin họpụtara Senator Maria Lvova-Belova dị ka Kọmishọna gọọmentị etiti maka ikike ụmụaka, otu ọnwa mgbe kọmishọna gara aga bụ Anna Kuznetsova ghọrọ onye omeiwu
Maria Lvova-Belova lụrụ di site n'afọ 2003 ma nwekwaa ụmụ ise bú nkè yá na ụmụ iri na asaa ọ́ nakweere
Di ya bụ Pavel Kogelman bụ onye ụkọchukwu nke Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Russia ma bụrụbu onye mmemme
Maria Emily Lubega Mutagamba (5 Septemba na afọ 1952 na 24 June 2017) bụ onye Uganda na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ minista nke njem nleta, anụ ọhịa na ihe ochie na Cabinet Ugandan site na onwa 15 August 2012 ruo 6 June 2016
Site na 2011 ruo 2012, ọ bụ minista nke mmiri na gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Rakai District site na 2001 ruo 2016
A mụrụ Mutagamba na Rakai District na 5 Septemba 1952
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Aloysius Senior Secondary School na Bwanda, Kalungu District maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya (1967-1970)
Ọ gara Mount Saint Mary's College Namagunga na Mukono District maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya (1971 Xi 1972)
Ọ gara Mahadum Makerere site na afọ 1973 ruo afọ 1976, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na akụ na ụba
O nwetakwara diplọma na mmemme kọmputa site na ICL Computer School na Nairobi, Kenya, nke o nwetara na 1980, yana asambodo na ndị isi nchịkwa site na John F
Kennedy School of Government na Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States, nke o nyere na 1997
N'afọ 2013, Mahadum McMaster dị na Canada nyere ya nzere doctorate na iwu
Mutagamba jere ozi dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ na Bank of Uganda site na 1976 ruo 1980 ma bụrụ onye nduzi ụlọ akụ ahụ site na 1991 ruo 1999
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Constituent Assembly n'etiti afọ 1994 na 1995
N'afọ 1999, ọ bụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Democratic Party of Uganda
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista nke steeti maka akụ mmiri ma mesịa n'afọ 2006 a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke mmiri na gburugburu ebe obibi, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke African Ministers' Council on Water site na 2004 ruo 2012 na onye nhazi nke Global Women Leaders Forum for Water and Sanitation site na afọ 2005 ruo na afọ 2012
Ọ bụkwa osote onyeisi oche nke United Nations Task Force on Integrated Water Resource Management
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya maka ihe kpatara nsogbu metụtara mmiri na Global Water Harvesting Network
Mutagamba jere ozi dị ka minista nke njem nleta, anụ ọhịa na ihe ochie site na 15 nke onwa Ọgọst na afọ 2012 ruo mgbe Ephraim Kamuntu nọchiri ya na 6 June nke afọ 2016
Mgbe ọ bụ onye ozi, a maara ya maka ịkwalite àkwá, akwụkwọ nri, na chapati wrap a ma ama na Uganda nke a maara dị ka Rolex
Ọ maliteghachiri asọmpi ịma mma Miss Tourism Uganda nke malitere na 2010
Ọ hapụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2016 n'ihi ahụike ya na-akawanye njọ
Ọ lụrụ Tarsis Matthew Mutagamba onye rụrụ ọrụ na Bank of Uganda ruo afọ iri na asaa ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na afọ 1980
Ọ bụ onye isi ego Afrịka mbụ na ụlọ akụ ahụ
Tarsis nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na Jenụwarị 2, 2004 mgbe ọ dị afọ 70
Ụmụ iri na isii hapụrụ ya
Mutagamba nwụrụ na onwa 24 June na afọ 2017 na Case Medical Centre na Kampala site na nsogbu nke ọrịa kansa imeju, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-arịa ọrịa gallstones
Ọ dị afọ iri isii na anọ
A nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ izu atọ tupu ọnwụ ya
Praịm Minista Ruhakana Rugunda kpọrọ ọnwụ ya 'nnukwu mfu maka mba ahụ'
E liri ya na onwa 28 June nke afọ 2017 na obodo Gamba, Kakuuto Subcounty na Rakai District
Ọ bụ John Baptist Kaggwa, bishọp nke Roman Catholic Diocese nke Masaka, mere olili ozu ahụ
María P
Neira (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ dọkịta Spanish, onye ọrụ gọọmentị mba ụwa na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, onye kemgbe afọ 2005, jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke
Ahike ọha, gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị na-ahụ maka ọha na eze nke ngalaba ahụike (PHE) nke nzukọ ahụike ụwa (W
nization (WHO)
Makhoni Maria Ntuli (amụrụ na 10 June 1953) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa maka African National Congress
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba n'afọ 2019
Ntuli jere ozi na KwaZulu-Natal Provincial Legislature
Kemgbe ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu, Ntuli jere ozi na Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Nchịkwa
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Maria Olsen (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abuọ N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1966) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke a maara maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri égwù
Ndị a gụnyere Paranormal Activity 3, The Lords of Salem, Gore Orphanage, na Starry Eyes
Ọrụ ndị na-abụghị nke ihe nkiri egwu gụnyere Percy Jackson & the Olympians The Lightning Thief
A mụrụ Olsen N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1966, na East London, Eastern Cape, South Africa
Olsen apụtala n'ihe karịrị ọrụ otu narị kemgbe afọ 2005
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụ ọrụ nkwado, nke ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-enye ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọrụ karịa ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ ndị isi
Ọ na-ekwu na ọrụ kachasị masị ya bụ na African Gothic, Percy Jackson, Die-ner (Get It?), The Haunting of Whaley House, na Live-In Fear, nke bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ọ mepụtara
N'afọ 2011, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri bu MOnsterworks66
N'afọ 2018, Olsen pụtara na, 'The Exorcist Forbidden Screening,' ihe nkiri 4D na Warner Bros
'Horror made Here A festival of frights
Church na Warner Brothers backlot, Olsen rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ihe na-adọta egwu, site na ihe nkiri 1973, The Exorcist
Olsen bịara America n'onwa Jenụwarị 2005
Ihe omume ọkà hụ n'anya gụnyere ịgụ na ịkpa ákwà
Ọ bụ onye na-edina nwanyị

Maria Pognon née Rengnet (15 Febụwarị 1844 na 17 Eprel 1925) bụ onye France na-ede akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye na'ahụ maka ụmụ nwoke, onye na na-ahụ n'udo na onye na-eme ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ka onye na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19
Site na 1892 ruo 1903, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ligue Française pour le Droit des Femmes, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị na-ahụ maka udo Société française pour l'arbitrage entre nations
Dị ka onye Freemason, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị iri na asaa guzobere Loge du Droit humain (Human Rights Lodge), nke meghere ma ụmụ nwoke ma ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Honfleur na ụbọchị iri na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1844, Maria Rengnet bụ nwa nwanyị nke Julien Rengnet, onye na-edozi nkume
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya, n'afọ 1873 ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Raymond Pognon, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
Di ya nwụrụ n'ọrịa ịba ahụ n'afọ 1876
N'afọ 1880, ọ kwagara Paris ebe ọ na-elekọta ụlọ obibi dị elu
N'afọ 1889, mgbe ọ gachara nnọkọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị Congrès français et international du droit des femmes, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị
Site na 1892, ọ bụ onye isi na French League for Women's Rights (Ligue Française pour le Droit des Femmes), ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị ma nọgide n'ọkwa ahụ ruo 1903

O gosipụtara na ọ bụ onye ndu dị irè na onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha, na-ahazi ma na-eduzi International Feminist Congress (Congrès Feministe International) na Paris na 1882 na 1896 na, ya na Marguerite Durand, 1900 International Congress on the Status and Rights of Women (Congrés international de la condition et des droits des femmes), nke emere na Paris
N'afọ 1901, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii guzobere National Council of French Women (Conseil National des Femmes Françaises)
Pognon bụkwa onye edemede siri ike, na-enye ihe dị ka isiokwu iri asaa n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị La Fronde n'etiti 1897 - 1900
N'afọ 1893, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri na asaa guzobere ụlọ ụka Droit Humain nke a na-emeghe maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1905, na mberede na-enweghị ego, ya na nwa ya nwanyị, Mathilde sonyeere nwa ya nwoke na New Caledonia
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ya na nwa ya nwanyị, kwagara Sydney, Australia, ebe ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Double Bay nke dịpụrụ adịpụ na Sydney na 17 Eprel 1925
Maria Ramos (amụrụ 1959) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego South Africa, onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-eje ozi dịka onye isi oche AngloGold Ashanti kemgbe 2020
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ (CEO) nke Absa Group Limited
Tupu ịbanye na Absa na March 2009, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Transnet
Nke a bụ mgbe ọ jesiri ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke National Treasury
A mụrụ Ramos na Lisbon, Portugal, na 22 Febuwarị 1959, nwa nwanyị n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ
Nne na nna ya kwagara Mozambique nakwa South Africa n'etiti 1960 ebe ha na-achọ ohere ka mma
Ramos dị afọ isii mgbe ezinụlọ ya malitere ndụ ọhụrụ ha na Vereeniging, ihe dịka kilomita iri ise na asatọ (maịlu iri atọ na isii), n'okporo ụzọ, ndịda Johannesburg

Ramos gụrụ akwụkwọ na 1977 wee gaa rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọọrụ Barclays na Vereeniging dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ mkpofu, nke gụnyere ịnakọta akwụkwọ dị ka mpempe akwụkwọ nkwụnye ego na akwụkwọ ndenye ego, n'azụ ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ ma jiri aka hazie ha
Ka o na-achọ ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu, Ramos chọpụtara na ụlọ akụ ya nwere atụmatụ ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu ebe ha na-akwado ndị ọrụ ka ha gụchaa ma nweta akara mmụta azụmahịa nke mahadum
Mgbe o tinyere akwụkwọ, ọ chọpụtara na ọ bụ naanị ndị nwoke nwere ohere a
Nke a butere agha nke nọrọ ogologo oge, nke Ramos wezụgara ihe mgbochi dị iche iche na mgbalị ya inweta mgbanwe iwu; n'ikpeazụ, a gwara ya na ọ bụrụ na o lee ule ndị mbu ma gafee, na ha ga-atụle ya

Ọ gbara ụgbọ ala site na Vereeniging gaa Johannesburg abalị atọ n'izu ka ọ rụchara ọrụ, wee gaa klaasị mgbede nke Institute of Bankers na-eme, wee gafee ule ahụ n'oge ndekọ, na-enweta nzere diploma nke onye na-arụ n'ụlọọrụ ọbá ego
Onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na-eme nke ọma, onye kuziri ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche, Ramos nwetara Institute of Bankers' Diploma (CAIB) na 1983

Ọ gbasoro nke a site n'inweta nzere bachelọ nke Commerce na Mahadum Witwatersrand (Wits) n'agọ 1986, Bachelor of Commerce Honors in Economics (nke sitere na Wits) na 1987 na Master of Science (Economics) sitere na Mahadum London na 1992
Ná mmalite ọrụ ya, Ramos jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke National Treasury site na 1996 ruo 2003
Ramos rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke Absa Group Limited afọ iri, ruo Febuwarị 2019
Ọ nwere ọrụ maka imezu atụmatụ otu ahụ n'ofe ọrụ iri n'Africa, na-ejere ndị ahịa nde iri na ise ozi site n'ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ pụkụ iri na otu
Tupu isonyere Absa dị ka onye isi otu na Maachị 2009, ọ bụ onye isi otu nke Transnet Limited, onye na-ahụ maka ụgbọ njem na ngwa ije nke steeti nwere afọ ise

N'igbakwunye n'ọrụ ya na Absa, Ramos na-eje ozi n'oge gara aga dị ka onye na-abụghị onye isi na onye nduzi na bọọdụ Sanlam Limited, Remgro Limited na SABmiller Plc, ma na-eje ozi ugbu a na Bọọdụ nke Richemont SA
Ramos rụrụ ọrụ n'oge gara aga dị ka onye isi oche nke otu ụlọ akụ nke South Africa

Onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations bụ António Guterres họpụtara, ọ chịkwara (n'akụkụ Achim Steiner ) otu United Nations' Task Force on Digital Financing of Sustainable Development Goals site na 2018 ruo 2020

Na 2021, a họpụtara ya na World Bank - International Monetary Fund High-Level Advisory Group (HLAG) na Sustainable and Inclusive Recovery and Growth, nke Mari Pangestu, Ceyla Pazarbasioglu, na Nicholas Stern na-edu
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Ramos bụ onye nnata nke doctorate sitere na mahadum Stellenbosch na Free State
Ramos duuru Transnet site na nnukwu mgbanwe ego, omenala na arụmọrụ

N'oge ya dị ka Director-General nke National Treasury (nke bụbu Department of Finance), ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịgbanwe Treasury ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ngalaba steeti kachasị dị irè ma dị mma na nchịkwa ọchịchị mgbe apartheid gasịrị

Ahọpụtala ya nke ọma na nyocha kwa afọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Fortune banyere ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị ike na azụmaahịa ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ebe etinyere ya n'onye nke iri na otu na mpaghara Yuropu, Middle East na Afrịka maka 2015
Achọpụtala ntinye aka ya site n'ọtụtụ ihe nrite
Akpọrọ ya aha CNBC Africa Woman Leader of the Year (2011), wee nye ya onyinye Wits Business School's Management Excellence Award (2010)
Akpọrọ ya aha onye isi azụmaahịa nke Sunday Times Business Times na 2005 na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke afọ site na otu SA Businesswomen's Association na 2001
Ramos lụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa Trevor Manuel na 2008

Maria Ruth B
Pineda-Cortel bụ osote prọfesọ na ónyé nhazi ụlọ nyocha na Mahadum Santo Tomas (UST) ébé ọ na-akụzi na Ngalaba Nkà na Ụzụ Ọgwụ nke Faculty of Pharmacy
Ọ na-emekwa nnyocha na Mahadum Research Center for the Natural Sciences and Applied Sciences (RCNAS)

Pineda-Cortel emeela nnyocha sara mbara na-elekwasị ányá na ọrịa shuga ime (GDM, nke a makwaara dị ka ọrịa shuga n'oge ime) na polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) dị ka ụzọ isi mee ka ọrịa ndị na-emetụta naanị ụmụ nwanyị
Dị ka nwanyị sayensị, ọ na-akwado ma na-arụ ọrụ iji meziwanye nlekọta ahụike màkà ụmụ nwanyị
Pineda-Cortel emeela nnyocha na-ekpuchi ọtụtụ nsogbụ metụtara ahụike nke gụnyere mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọrịa na-efe efe nke jupụtara na Philippines, dị ka dengue na ịba

Pineda-Cortel gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Santo Tomas na Manila, Philippines ébé ọ natara nzèrè ya niile Bachelor of Science na Medical Technology, Master of Science na Medicine Technology, na Doctor of Philosophy na isi na Biological Sciences
Pineda-Cortel na-elekwasị ányà na nyocha ya na nchọpụta na nchọpụta nke GDM na ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na Philippines
Mgbasawanye nke GDM na Philippines dị ihe dị ka pasenti iri atọ, Pineda-Cortel na-ezube ịbawanye nnweta na nnweta nke nyocha nyocha na nyocha màkà GDM iji gbochie nsogbụ ahụike ọzọ na nne na nwa
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịchọta ihe ndị na-egosi ihe ndị dị ndụ nké nwéré ike ịchọpụta na ụmụ nwanyị dị ime iji gbochie mmepe nke GDM

Ọ na-eme nnwale ya site n'ịchịkọta ọbara ọ bụla n'ime ọnwa atọ site n'aka otu ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na-enweghị ọrịa shuga (ìgwè na-abụghị GDM) na otu ụmụ nwanyị ọzọ dị ime na ọrịa shuga tupu ime ime na / ma ọ bụ nwéré GDM n'oge ime gara-aga (ìgwè GDM)

A na-enyocha RNA sitere na ihe nlele ọbara site na ngosipụta mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa dị íchè íchè iji tụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a gụrụ nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe ndụ ihe nkesa dị mkpa n'etiti ndị na-abụghị GDM na ndị GDM n'oge nke izizi, nke abụọ, na nke atọ
N'otu n'ime ọmụmụ ya, ọ kwubiri na ụdị mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa rs7754840 nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe ndụ CDKAL1 (nke a maara na ọ na-egbochi mmepụta insulin) anaghị eme ka GDM ghara ịbawanye
Otu n'ime nnyocha ya na-atụkwa aro na ụkọ iron na ụmụ nwanyị dị ime na-ebelata ihe ize ndụ nke ịmalite GDM
Nnyocha Pineda-Cortel bụ mgbalị iji kwụsị usoro ọrịa shuga na-aga n'ihu ka mgbasa ya na-agawanye n'ihu n'ụwa niile
Pineda-Cortel na-emekwa nnyocha iji chọpụta mmetụta nkè mgbanwe ihu ígwé na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara gburugburu ébé obibi na ihe omume dengue na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị na-arịa ya na gburugburu ọ bụla
Nnyocha ya na-egosi njikọ siri ike n'etiti ihe na-eme na dengue na okpomọkụ, mmiri ozuzo na iru mmiri
N'ihi na Philippines dị n'ebe okpomọkụ, mgbanwe ihu igwe atọ a bụ isi ihe na-akpali ọrịa dengue
Okpomọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ na-eme ka oge mpụga nke nje dengue na mmepe nkè anwụnta nke na-emewanye ọnụọgụ ọrịa
Na ntinye, nchọpụta ya na-egosiputakwa na mmiri ozuzo na-enye ákà n'ịbawanye ọrịa dengue dịka mmiri kwụ otu ébé na-enye ébé anwụnta na-amụ
N'iburu ihe ndị a na-enye aka n'uche, Pineda-Cortel mepụtara ụdị amụma nkè ọrịa dengue na mpaghara anọ a mụrụ na Philippines
Maria dos Santos Lima da Costa Tebús Torres (Amụrụ na 2 Septemba 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Santa Filomena na agwaetiti São Tomé
Kemgbe ụbọchị 21 Eprel 2006, ọ bụ osote praịm minista na minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ na ego na gọọmentị Tomé Vera Cruz
Ọ nọkwa n'ọkwa Minista nke Atụmatụ na Ego site n'afọ 2002 ruo ọnwa Ọgọst 2003
Maria Tomé de Araujo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ, Nkwado, Ụmụ nwanyị, & Ihe gbasara Ezinụlọ n'okpuru Praịm Minista Rafael Branco
O mechara bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike na Mmekọrịta Ọha n'okpuru iwu nke onye isi ala Manuel Pinto da Costa n'ụbọchị 21 Jenụwarị 2014

Maria Usifo (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu Olimpik nke nọchitere anya Naijirịa n'egwuregwu Los Angeles (1984) na Seoul (1988) Olympic Games
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na 100 na 400 mita ihe mgbochi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu n'akụkọ egwuregwu nke Naijirịa bụ ndị na-achịkwa ihe omume egwuregwu ma na mba na mba ụwa
Usifo malitere ọrụ ya na egwuregwu na Naijirịa n'afọ ndị 1970 mgbe usoro egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ

Ọ bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ na onye na-eme egwuregwu nke egwuregwu ya meghere ohere maka ya ịhọrọ na mahadum 10 mba ọzọ mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ịrịba ama na Commonwealth Games ṅa Brisbane, Australia na 1982
O sonyere n'egwuregwu Olympic na Los Angeles na 1984 na Seoul na 1988
Usifo bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo nke egwuregwu niile n'Africa na onye nwetara ihe nkiri ọla edo nke African Championships

Maria das Neves Ceita Baptista de Sousa (Amụrụ n'afọ 1958) jere ozi dị ka praịm minista nke iri na otu nke São Tomé na Príncipe
Ọ bụ onye isi na Movement for the Liberation of São Tomé and Príncipe-Social Democratic Party (MLSTP-PSD) wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi gọọmentị na mba ahụ
Maria das Neves gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na Cuba na ọkachamara na ego ọha na eze
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi ọchịchị, Maria das Neves rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ gọọmentị na Ministry of Finance, na World Bank na UN Children's Fund (UNICEF)
Ọ lụrụ di ma mgbe ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ toro, ọ nwere nnukwu ọkwa gọọmentị Minista nke akụ na ụba (n'afọ 1999), Minista nke ego 2001/02 na Minista nke Azụmaahịa, Ụlọ Ọrụ, na Njem (n'afọ 2002)

Onye bụbu onye nkuzi na onye nyocha ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ otu n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị dị ntakịrị mana na-abawanye ụba na-erute ọkwa dị elu n'ofe ndịda Sahara Africa
Mariam Coulibaly (amụrụ na 7 Ọktoba, na afọ 1997) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball maka Landerneau Bretagne Basket na otu mba Mali
O sonyere na Afrobasket ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2017
