Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ivorian maka 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Mariam Mohamed Fakhr Eddine (8 Septemba 1933 - 3 Nọvemba 2014) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, ọ bụkwa nwunye nke abụọ nke onye nduzi ihe nkiri Mahmoud Zulfikar
A na-akpọ ya 'ịma mma nke ihe nkiri' (Egyptian Arabic)
Tupu ọ chụsoo ọrụ na ime ihe nkiri, ọ meriri aha nke Most Beautiful Face na asọmpi nke magazin French-language Image haziri
Ọ bụ onye nduzi Mahmoud Zulfikar, onye ga-abụ di ya, chọpụtara ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 nakwa na mmalite afọ 1960, ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma na ọrụ mmetụta uche buru ibu tupu ọ gbanwee n'ịkọwa matriarch n'oge ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara Mariam Fakhr Eddine dị ka Mrs
Aida n'ihe nkiri ịhụnanya French-Canadian Lola Whatever Wants
Ọ gara Alexandria International Film Festival na 2009
Ruo ọnwụ ya na 2014, Fakhr Eddine pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri narị abụọ
Nwanne ya nwoke nke obere, Youssef Fakhr Eddine, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Faiyum, Middle Egypt nye nna onye Ijipt na nne onye Hungary
Nwanne ya nwoke nke obere bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Youssef Fakhr Eddine (1935-2002)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị German
Tupu ọ chụsoo ọrụ nke ime ihe nkiri, ọ meriri aha 'Most Beautiful Face' na asọmpi nke magazin French-language Image haziri
Onye nduzi ihe nkiri bụ Mahmoud Zulfikar chọpụtara ya, onye ọ lụrụ n'afọ 1952
Ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị, Iman
E tinyere ihe nkiri ahụ na 5th Cannes Film Festival

Ọ gara n'ihu pụta na ihe nkiri The Murderous Suspicion (1953), Devil of the Sahara (1954), The Love Message (1954), A Window on Paradise (1954), Back Again (1957), Rendezvous with the past (1961), The Cursed Palace (1962) na Soft Hands (1963)
Ọnwa ole na ole mgbe a wasịrị ya ụbụrụ, Fakhr Eddine nwụrụ na 3 Nọvemba 2014, na Maadi Armed Forces Hospital na Cairo
Mgbe emesịrị olili ozu okpukpe nke e mere na Maadi Military Hospital Mosque, e liri ya na 6th of October City, Giza Governorate

Mariam Ibekwe (onye aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Nnodu ; amụrụ ụbochị iri abuo na iteghete, nke onwa Ọktoba, n'afọ 1969) bụ onye Naịjịrịa n'eme egwuregwu trak na fịud, ma sọkwa mpị na shọt puutu

Mpụtara nke onwe ya kachasị mma nke 1668 m (54 ft 8+1⁄2 in) n'afọ 2007Ibekwe nwetara ihe nrite mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'afọ 1989, were nweta ntụrụugo na West African University Games nakwa ihe nrita ọlaọcha n'azu Hanan Ahmed Khaled n'asọmpi 1989 African Championships in Athletics, nke e mere na Legọsụ
Na 1991 All-Africa Games, Ọ nọkwa n'azụ Khaled nke mba Ijipụtụ, ebe ọ gbara onye nke atọ na ya bu asọmpi

Ọ gara ezumike asọmpi mba ụwa n'etiti afọ ndi sochiri afọ 1990, mana ọ laghachitere n'afọ 1997 ebe o nwetara mmeri n'asọmpi West African Athletics Championships ma gbakwaa onye nke asatọ na 1998 IAAF World CupỌ gara n'ihu n'asọrịta mpi ka ọ gbachara afo iri atọ, ma sorokwa na ndi ikpeazu na 2003 All-Africa Games nakwa 2003 Afro-Asian Games
Elu ọrụ ya kacha gbagote mgbe o ruru afọ iri anọ, mgbe o tuuru ugo ma nata ihe nrite ọla edo n'asọmpi shot puutu na 2010 African Championships in Athletics
Na ngosipụta ukwu ikpeazụ ya na mba ụwa, ọ gbara onye nke asaa na 2010 IAAF Continental CupI
N'ọkwa mba, o nwetara nturụugo atọ kwụ ọtọ n'asọmpi Nigerian Athletics Championships n'etiti afọ 1989 na 1991, were bụrụ nwanyị mbụ tụbara ihe karịrị mita iri na anọ n'asọmpi ahụ

Ọ dara n'azụ Vivian Chukwuemeka n'ọkwa mba n'etiti afọ ndi sochiri afọ 1990, mana o jiri nturụugo mba abụọ laghachi n'afọ 1997 na 1998, yana ndetu mmeri nke 1554 m (50 ft 11+¾ in) na 1642 m (53 ft 10+¼ in)
Chukwuemeka nwetara nturụugo asaa na -esote ya, ma Ibekwe nwetara nwetara nturụugo mba nke isii ya n'afọ 2006
Mariam Salum Mfaki (26 Nọvemba 1946 21 Julaị 2015) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu pụrụ iche nke National Assembly maka Dodoma site n'afọ 2000 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2015
Mfaki malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) Women's Organisation, (UWT), nke dị na Kondoa District, site n'afọ 1973 ruo afọ 1976
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ UWT nke mpaghara Dodoma site n'afọ 1976 ruo afọ 1983
N'afọ 1984, a kpọfere ya n'ọfịs Praịm Minista nke Tanzania dị ka odeakwụkwọ ngalaba, ọkwá o nwere site n'afọ 1984 ruo afọ 1998
Mfaki nwụrụ na Dodoma Regional Hospital n'ụbọchị 21 Julaị 2015, mgbe ọ dị afọ 69
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa n'afọ 2012
E liri Mfaki n'obodo ya na mpaghara Dodoma
Mariam Najjemba Mbabaali, onye a maara dị ka Rosemary Najjemba Muyinda bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Atụmatụ Obodo na Kọmitii Ugandan site na 15 Ọgọst na afo 2012, ruo 6 June afo 2016, mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na kọmitii
N'ime kansụl, ọ nọchiri Justine Lumumba Kasule, onye a họpụtara dị ka Chief Whip nke Gọọmentị
Najjemba jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka Gomba County, Gomba District na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM), maka oge abụọ n'usoro, site na afo 2006 ruo afo 2016
A mụrụ ya na Gomba District na 4 Ọgọstụ afo 1972
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Kitante Hill maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na MacKay College maka ọmụmụ A-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1993
Ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere na afo 1994, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1997 na nzere Bachelor of Arts na Public Administration and Management
O nwekwara nzere Master of Arts n'otu mpaghara ahụ, nke ọ nwetara na afo 2004, site na Mahadum Makerere

Malite na afo 1999, ruo mgbe ọ sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afo 2006, Mariam Najjemba rụrụ ọrụ nchịkwa dị iche iche n'ọfịs onye isi ala nke Uganda, gụnyere dịka onye isi nke Desịkụ ụmụ nwanyị na State House Uganda na dịka onye enyemaka onye isi ala maka nyocha na State House, Uganda
N'afọ 2006, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye na-asọ mpi maka oche ndị omeiwu Gomba County, n'ihe bụ Mpigi District n'oge ahụ
Ọ gbara ọsọ na tiketi nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee merie
N'afọ 2011, e kewara Gomba County na Mpigi District, wee guzobe Gomba District
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na mpaghara a gbanwere aha ya ma nọchite anya mpaghara ọhụrụ ahụ na ndị omeiwu nke itoolu ( na afo 2011 ruo na afo 2016)
N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na 15 Ọgọstụ na afo 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Steeti maka Atụmatụ na Mmepe Obodo
N'afọ 2015, Najjemba kwupụtara na ọ na-ahapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
O sonyeghị na ntuli aka nke pati n'afọ ahụ ma gbachitere mpaghara ya n'afọ 2016
A chụpụkwara ya n'ọchịchị n'afọ 2016
Mariam Najjemba lụrụ di
Ọ bụ onye okpukpe Alakụba
O nwere ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-esonụ na ndị omeiwu
Mariam Patience Nalubega bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị omebe iwu, na-anọchite anya mpaghara Butambala na omebe iwu nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Machị 2011
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 2005 ruo 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye National Female Youth Member of Parliament na Uganda
A mụrụ ya na Butambala District, Central Uganda, na 27 Nọvemba 1981 na Saidi Lubega na Jalia Nakayange
Ọ gara Makerere University Primary School, tupu ọ gaa Butawuka Secondary School maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Ọ gara St
Francis Secondary School na Mengo, maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya
Nalubega nwere nzere Bachelor of Public Administration, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum St Lawrence, A Certificate of Public admistration and Management do (mahadum Makerere)
O nwekwara diplọma na Iwu, nke ọ nwetara na Law Development Centre na Kampala
Site na 2001 ruo 2006, Mariam Nalubega bụ onye otu Mpigi District Council, na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ distrikti maka ahụike site na 2003 ruo 2006
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye National Female Youth Member of Parliament, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 2011
N'oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu na akụ na ụba na kọmiti Information and Communications Technology
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke mpaghara nwanyị, maka mpaghara Butambala nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ
Mariam Nalubega bụ nne na-alụbeghị di nke ụmụ anọ, ọ bụ onye Rotarian, onye ọchụnta ego na-achụso diplọma na nchịkwa ọha na eze ugbu a
Mariam Omar bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zanzibari na onye otu Sauti ya Umma (SAU)
Na ịgba ọsọ dị ka onye SAU na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Zanzibar n'October 30, 2005, Omar mechara nke ikpeazụ n'ime mmadụ isii, na-enweta 007% nke votu
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na azọ ọkwa onye isi ala Zanzibar
Mariam Osman Sherifay bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sweden, onye ndọrọndọrọ mmekọrịta, onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na onye bụbu onye omeiwu
Sherifay bụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu Sweden n'etiti afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2003, dị ka onye nọchiri anya Council of State, Björn von Sydow
Ọ bụ onye so na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ụlọ (Bostadsutskottet) na osote onye na-ahụ maka kọmitii na-ahụ maka mba ọzọ na Kọmitii European Union, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nhọpụta

N'afọ 2009, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke Swedish Martin Luther King Prize [ sv ], ihe nrite nke Swedish Fellowship of Reconciliation na Swedish Baptist Church tọrọ ntọala maka ọgụ ọ na-alụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na oku edere edere m jụrụ ịbụ onye e merụrụ
A mụrụ Sherifay na Cairo, Egypt dị ka onye nke anọ n'ime ụmụnne iri na abụọ
Nna ya si Eritrea bịa, ma nne ya bụ onye Ijipt
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị Alakụba ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik

Mariam Usman (amuru 9 Nọvemba 1990) bu onye Naijiria
Ọ na-asọ mpi na ụmụ nwanyị +75 klaasị n'arọ, ebe ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro anọ n'Afrịka na ọnye nwetala ọla edo na asọmpi Commonwealth
Ọ nwetakwara nrite ọla n'asọmpị ịdị arọ nke ụwa nke afọ 2011 wee soro na mbipụta atọ nke egwuregwu a na akpọ Olympic, na-emeri ihe nrite ọla na 2008
A mụrụ Usman na Kaduna, Naijiria wee malite ibu ibu dị ka ụzọ isi luso mkpagbụ ọ na-enweta site n'aka ụmụ nwoke
Ọ gbara mgba na egwuregwu mba ụwa na 2007, ebe ọ nara ọlaọcha n'ụdị atọ niile nke ngalaba +75 na 2007 na egwuregwu Africa na Algiers, Algeria wee gụchaa 9th na asọmpi ụwa na Chiang Mai, Thailand
O wee ruo eruo maka asọmpi Summer Summer 2008 na Beijing, China site na imeri +75 klaasị n'asọmpi ibu arọ nke Africa 2008 na Strand, South Africa

Na egwuregwu Beijing Usman na-asọ mpi na ngalaba + 75 n'arọ wee gụchaa nke ise, mana emelitere ya ka ọ bụrụ ọla ọla mgbe ndị na-enweta ọla ọcha na ọla kọpa sitere na ihe omume ahụ, Olha Korobka na Mariya Grabovetskaya, kwụsịrị n'August 2016 mgbe nyochachara nke ọma maka dehydrochlormethyltestosterone
Ọ bịara n'ọkwa ise na asọmpi mba ụwa na 2009 na Goyang, South Korea wee were ọlaọcha n'ozuzu ya na egwuregwu Commonwealth 2010 na Delhi, India
Ọ gara nke mbụ n'asọmpi Commonwealth na Africa nke afọ 2011 wee were ọla nchara n'asọmpi mba ụwa nke 2011 emere na Paris, France
Usman tozuru maka asọmpi Olimpiks Summer 2012 site na imeri +75 kg nkewa n'asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ ahụ na Nairobi, Kenya, mana na Lọndọn emechabeghị akụkụ Clean & Jerk nke mmemme ahụ ma etinyeghị ya
Ọ gara nke ọma karị n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, Otụ ọ dị, na-ewere ọla edo na 2013 Commonwealth Championship na Penang, Malaysia na 2014 Commonwealth Games na Glasgow, Scotland
N'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2015 na Brazzaville, Congo, Otú ọ dị, ọ dabara na ọlaọcha wee gụchaa nke iri na asaa na asọmpi mba ụwa na Houston, Texas
Ka o sina dị, Usman meriri asọmpi mba Afrịka nke afọ 2016, nke e mere na Yaounde, Cameroon, ma so na ndị nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Summer Olympics nke afọ 2016 na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
N'ebe ahụ ọ gụchara 8th n'ime ndị asọmpi iri na isii na ụdị +75 n'arọ
Usman boro ya ebubo na ọ naghị enye ya ohere ọzụzụ na Naịjirịa ma kwuo na ya agaghịzị asọmpi mba ụwa maka obodo nna ya

Mariam Yalwaji Katagum (amuru ụbọchị iri na asatọ n' onwa Nọvemba, 1954, Azare, Bauchi steeti ), na-eje ozi dika onye omebe iwu Naijiria maka ulo oru ahia, ahia na itinye ego
Na mbụ, Katagum bụ onye nnọchi anya, onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide nke Nigeria na UNESCO
N'afo 1976, Mariam Y
Katagum nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na bekee yana asambodo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
N'afọ 1985, ọ nwetara nzere Master na nchịkwa na nhazi na Mahadum Lagos
Na 1999, Katagum nwetara Asambodo na Social Development Policy, Planning and Practice na Mahadum University, London
N'otu afọ ahụ, e nyere ya UNESCO Fellowship
Katagum malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na National Youth Service, na Board Water, Jos
N'afọ 1977-1981, Katagum bụ onye isi mmụta na kọleji gọọmentị etiti, Azare
O mechara jee ozi na ndị na afụ maka agụma akwukwo na efu na Federal dị na Lagos (1981-1984)
Afọ iri na ise sochirinụ e zigara ya na Nigerian National Commission for UNESCO (1985-2000)
N2000-2001, Katagum bụ onye isi maka ọrụ pụrụ iche na National Primary Education Commission na Abuja
Malite na 2001, Katagum jere ozi dịka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National National Commission for UNESCO
Na 2004, Katagum nyere okwu ikpeazụ na UNU -UNESCO Conference gbasara Aya na 21st Century na Paris
Malite n' afọ 2006 Katagum nọ na-elekọta Ngalaba Mmekọrịta Mba na Mba Nile nke Federal Ministry of Education
Na June 2009, a họpụtara Katagum ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya, onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide nke Nigeria na UNESCO
Ọ na-eje ozi na ọtụtụ kọmitii mba na mba ụwa na Panels gụnyere Board of Trustees of the African World Heritage Fund (2009-2011), West Africa Group na UNESCO (2009-2012), E-9 Group na UNESCO (2010)
-2012), Kọmitii isi ụlọ ọrụ UNESCO (2011-2013), Commission PX nke Board Executive (2013) na ndị ọzọ
N' afọ 2017, Katagum gara abalị ngosi nke izu Afrịka n' afọ 2017 nke otu Afrika haziri na isi ụlọ ọrụ UNESCO na Paris
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Katagum ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ, azụmaahịa na itinye ego na steeti Bauchi dị na Naịjirịa
Dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ, azụmaahịa na itinye ego, Katagum na-akwado mmejuputa atumatu mpaghara Azụmahịa Ahịhịa Afrịka (AfCFTA) dị ka ihe dị mkpa iji nweta uru ndị Naijiria ga-erite
Mariam al-Sadiq al-Mahdi (Arabic; amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudan, onye ndú nke National Umma Party, na Minista Sudan nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ kemgbe 11 Febụwarị 2021
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Sadiq al-Mahdi, onye ndú mmegide na onye bụbu praịm minista nke Sudan, na onye otu etiti nke pati ahụ
A mụrụ al-Mahdi na Omdurman n'afọ 1965
Ọ sonyeere ndị Umma Party ma mesịa nweta ọkwa onye ndu n'ime ya
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Mahadum Jọdan n'afọ 1991, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na ọgwụ ụmụaka na-ekpo ọkụ na Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine n'afọ 1995
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụike afọ isii dị ka onye na-agwọ ọrịa n'etiti afọ 1990 n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka Sudan
al-Mahdi nwetara diplọma dị elu na mmepe na nsogbu okike na Mahadum Ahfad maka ụmụ nwanyị na Omdurman n'afọ 2006, na Bachelor of Law na Mahadim Neelain na Sudan n'afọ 2013
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019, ndị otu National Umma Party mara ọkwa na ndị ọrụ nchekwa jidere osote onye isi ala nke pati ahụ, Mariam Al-Mahdi
Dị ka ndị isi pati ahụ si kwuo, e jidere al-Mahdi n'ụlọ ya na Khartoum
Nke a na-abịa n'ime usoro nke ngagharị iwe na Sudan kemgbe 19 Disemba 2019, na n'ihi mkpebi gọọmentị nwere ịtọhapụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'echi ya, a tọhapụrụ Mariam, mgbe e jidere ya ruo ọtụtụ awa
Na 10 Machị 2019, e jidere ya ọzọ ma maa ya ikpe otu izu n'ụlọ mkpọrọ mana a tọhapụrụ ya ụbọchị atọ ka e mesịrị
O kwusiri ike na iwepụ Sudan na ndị na-akwado ndepụta iyi ọha egwu na United States bụ ihe kachasị mkpa mana ọ jụrụ ijikọ ya na nkwekọrịta Israel-Sudan
Na Febụwarị 11, 2021, al-Mahdi weghaara ọkwa Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na gọọmentị Abdalla Hamdok
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ mgbe Asma Mohamed Abdalla gasịrị

Mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Ọktọba 2021 nke Sudan gasịrị, Financial Times depụtara al-Mahdi dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na ise kachasị emetụta 2021 ma kọwaa ya 'dị ka otu n'ime ndị nkatọ [ndị agha] kachasị ekwu okwu na dị ka olu maka ụmụ nwanyị niile gara n'okporo ámá iji mee mkpọsa maka mgbanwe
' Ụbọchị abụọ mgbe nnupụisi ahụ gasịrị, odeakwụkwọ nke US State Antony Blinken gwara al-Mahdi okwu iji kwupụta 'nkatọ nke US maka mmeri ndị agha' ma gbaa ume ka a tọhapụ ndị isi obodo e jidere ozugbo
Mariama Khan (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Gambia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede uri, onye na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na onye ọ̀kà mmụta
Ọ na-akụzi mmepeanya Afrịka na Ụmụnwanyị n'obodo Afrịka na Lehman College na New York
A mụrụ Mariama Khan na 1977 n'aka nna bụ onye Senegal na nne bụ onye Gambia
O tolitere na Brikama New Town na mpaghara Kombo Central nke Gambia
Khan malitere ime ihe nkiri dị n'obere n'obere dị ka nwa akwụkwọ Henry Felt na Mahadum Brandeis
O mere ihe ngosi anọ na 2008-9
Sutura meriri ihe nrite UNFPA, e gosikwara The Journey Up The Hill na Cinekambiya International Film Festival na 2016
Na Gambia, Khan rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchite anya ma mesịa bụrụ onye nduzi nke Ngalaba Nnyocha Iwu na Ọfịs Onye isi ala
Onye isi ala Yahya Jammeh họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ọrụ gọọmentị Gambia na 2010, ọ bụ ezie na nhọpụta ahụ nọrọ naanị ọnwa ole na ole
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Ụlọ Ọrụ Nlekọta Ndị Ọrụ
N'afọ 2018 o degaara Onye isi ala Adama Barrow akwụkwọ ozi n'ihu ọha, iji gbachitere ASP Musa Fatty

Fatty, onye o kwenyere na e boro ebubo ụgha, na ọ gbagburu ndị ntorobịa, bụ otu n'ime ndị uwe ojii ise e boro ebubo igbu ọchụ maka ọnwụ nke ndị ntorobịa atọ na-eme ngagharị iwe na nnọkọ mgbochi mmetọ na Faraba Banta
Mariama Mamane bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu na injinia si Niger
Mamane guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Jacigreen ma rite ọtụtụ ihe nrite ọhụrụ maka ọrụ ya iji melite ọnọdụ gburugburu osimiri
A mụrụ Mamane n'aka nne nwere nzere masta na ndụ na sayensị ụwa
Mamane tolitere n'akụkụ Osimiri Niger n'obodo ya bụ Niamey, ma na 2020 ọ bi na Burkina Faso
O nwere akara ugo mmụta na biodiversity na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Niamey

N'afọ 2016, Mamane ritere ihe nrite Entrepreneurial Journey site na International Institute for Water and Environmental Engineering (nke a makwaara dị ka 2iE) wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Jacigreen ma debanye aha ya na Ouagadougou
Jacigreen na-arụ ọrụ iji gbanwee hyacinth na-awakpo n'ime fatịlaịza na compost na biogas
A na-eji biogas eme ihe na generators iji mepụta ọkụ eletrik
N'afọ 2016, Mamane nwetakwara ihe nrite purụ iche nke ndị ọkacha mmasị na African Rethink Awards
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Mamane onyinye United Nations Environment Programme nke a kpọrọ Young Champions of the Earth Prize
Ihe nrite ahụ ruru $ 15,000
Mariama Mamoudou Ittatou (amụrụ ya na Julaị 23, 1997) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na 2016 Summer Olympics na ihe omume mita nari anọ nke ụmụ nwanyị; oge ya nke 5432 sekọnd na okpomọkụ emeghị ka ọ ruo eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ
E mekwara ndokwa ịnọchite anya Niger na 2014 Summer Youth Olympics mana ọ malitereghị na ihe omume mita 800 nke ụmụ nwanyị
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 African Championships in Athletics
O mekwara asọmpi na asọmpi mita narị abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2018 African Championships in Athletics yana asọmpi mita narị anọ nke ụmụ nwanyị
N'egwuregwu Afrịka nke afọ 2019 ọ sonyere na 400 mita ụmụ nwanyị mana ọ rughị eru maka ngwụcha
Mariama Sarr (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 4 Machị 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ Ọha na Mmezigharị Ọrụ Ọha n'ọchịchị nke anọ
Sarr jere ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, ụmụaka na ọchụnta ego ụmụ nwanyị site n'afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2013
Ọ bụkwa onye isi obodo Kaolack
Mariama Souley Bana (amụrụ ya na 21 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ nwanyị Nijeria na-egwu egwuregwu mmiri
Bana sonyere Niger na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2008 na Swimming
Ọ gwụchara na nke asatọ na nke ikpeazụ na okpomọkụ abụọ na mita iri ise nke ụmụ nwanyị
Marian Barry (1 Ọktoba 1871 - 8 Septemba 1921) bụ onye Irish na-arụ ọrụ
A mụrụ Barry na Skibbereen, County Cork, nwa nwanyị nke John na Mary (née Ronan) Barry
Ọ sooro nne na nna ya gaa n'ịkwa ákwà, wee kwaga London mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere otu ndị inyom na-akwa ákwà, nke sonyeere Women's Trade Union League n'oge na-adịghị anya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Barry ghọrọ ọnụ na-ekwuru league ahụ, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ya na 1896
Ọ na-agakarị na London Trades Council, nke kwadoro nhọpụta ya nke ọma na kọmiti agụmakwụkwọ teknuzu nke London County na 1897
Site n'ọrụ otu ya, Barry zutere Pete Curran, ha abụọ lụrụ na 1897 ma ọ bụ 1898, ma emesịa mara ya dị ka ' Oriakụ Pete Curran '
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ anọ, Marian sikwa naọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ruo 1906 iji wepụta ha
N'afọ 1906, a họpụtara Barry dị ka onye nhazi maka Women's Trade Union League
O guzobere alaka na Jarrow, ebe di ya meriri ntuli aka, na 1907, mkpọsa nke Marian bụ onye a ma ama
Ọ gbara mbọ maka mgbanwe gụnyere nri ụlọ akwụkwọ n'efu, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Njikọ ahụ na 1908
E kwenyere na ọ gbakwara mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị nwere
Pete Curran tụfuru oche ya na 1910 wee nwụọ n'oge na-adịghị anya
Marian kwagara Hackney, ebe ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mgbanwe ọrụ mpaghara
Ọ nwụrụ na Brighton na 1921

A mụrụ Marian Ellis na Nottingham, otu n'ime ụmụ ejima nke Quaker na ndị nne na nna na-eme ihe ike, onye nwe ebe a na-egwupụta coal na Liberal MP John Ellis na nwunye ya na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka Maria (née Rowntree)
Aha ejima ya bụ Edith
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ ma mụta ịkpọ cello
N'oge Jameson Raid n'afọ 1895, ọ ghọrọ ode akwụkwọ nna ya, na n'oge Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer, ọ sonyere na ọrụ Ruth Fry iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị agha ahụ aka
N'Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ụmụnne nwanyị Ellis nyere ego maka ezinụlọ ndị na-ata ahụhụ nke ndị jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche ma kwado No Conscription Fellowship

Mgbe o bipụtara akwụkwọ mpịakọta nke gọọmentị na-enyochaghị, a tụrụ Edith na ndị Quakers ndị ọzọ mkpọrọ n'okpuru Iwu Nchebe nke Alaeze n'afọ 1918, ebe Marian nọgidere na-enye aka n'echiche Quaker nke agha
N'afọ 1919, Marian Ellis na Baroness Courtney nke Penwith guzobere Kọmitii Na-alụso Ụnwụ
Na ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ ahụ, ọ lụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Charles Cripps, '1st Baron Parmoor', nwanne di Lady Courtney na Beatrice Webb
Alụmdi na nwunye ahụ enweghị nwa, mana Lady Parmoor nwere mmetụta siri ike n'ebe nwa ya nwoke nke nta, Stafford Cripps nọ
Lady Parmoor rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke World YWCA n'etiti 1924 na 1928, ma nyere aka guzobe Fellowship of Reconciliation
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Women's International League for Peace and Freedom ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke alaka ụlọ ọrụ Britain na 1950
Lady Parmoor jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke National Peace Council ma kwuo na ọ kwadoro ịnabata China na United Nations ma kwurịta maka njedebe nke Agha Korea
N'afọ 1948, Lady Parmoor dere akwụkwọ nta akpọrọ The Challenge of the Atomic Bomb, nke Kọmitii Udo Ndị Enyi bipụtara
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 70, Dowager Baroness Parmoor malitere nyocha nke fission nuklia iji kwuo okwu megide iji ngwá agha nuklia
Ụbọchị abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya n'ụlọ ya dị na London, mgbe ọ dị afọ 74, o nyere aka dee ozi Quaker nye praịm minista, Winston Churchill, iji mee mkpesa megide ịtụ bọmbụ North Korea
A kpọrọ ozu ya ọkụ na Golders Green Crematorium, a kpọgakwara ntụ ya na Frieth
Nwanne ejima ya, Edith, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ike
Marian Rogers Croak bụ osote onye isi oche nke injinia na Google
Ọ na-arụbu ọrụ dị ka osote onyeisi ndi ọkà iwu Vice nyocha na mmepe na AT&T, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ịkwalite olu na teknụzụ IP, na-eme ka ikike nke ọdịyo na ihie ana ele ele maka ikpo okwu dị ka Zoom
Croak bu onye tolitere na obodo New York City
Ọ gara Mahadum Princeton wee gụchaa akwụkwọ mmụta doctoral na Mahadum Southern California na 1982, ọkachamara na mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze na nyocha quantitative
Ọ sonyere AT&T na Bell Labs na 1982
Ọ kwadoro ka ọ gbanwee site na teknụzụ ekwentị wired gaa na protocol ịntanetị
O ji Hossein Eslambolchi ihe karịrị narị abụọ, gụnyere ihe karịrị otu narị n'ihe gbasara olu n'elu IP
Ọ sụrụ ụzọ iji ọrụ netwọk ekwentị mee ka ọ dịrị ọha na eze mfe inye onyinye maka mkpesa nsogbu
Mgbe AT&T na American Idol jikọrọ aka iji usoro ịtụ vootu ozi ederede, 22% nke ndị na-ele ihie omume mụtara eti esi ede ederede iji sonye na ihe nkiri ahụ
O tinyere akwụkwọ ikike maka onyinye ndị sitere na ederede maka ọrụ ebere na 2005
Ikike a gbanwere ka ndị mmadụ nwere ike isi nye ndị otu ọrụ ebere ego ego dịka ọmụmaatụ, mgbe ala ọma jijiji nke Haiti 2010 gasịrị, ekwenyere opekata mpe $22 nde n'ụdị a
Ọ duuru ngalaba 20 Architecture wee jikwaa ihe karịrị ndị injinia 2,000
Na 2012, Croak degaara ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto akwụkwọ ozi na Huffington Post
A kpọbatara ya na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Nkà na Ụzụ nke Fame na 2013
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ATIS, otu mmepe teknụzụ

A kwanyere ya ugwu maka 'Ntụnye aka nka na ụzụ pụtara ìhè - Industrylọ ọrụ' na 28th kwa afọ Black Engineer of the Year Awards (BEYA) Science Technology Engineering and Mathematics (STEM) Conference na Washington, DC na 2014
N'otu afọ ahụ, e depụtara ya na ndepụta nke ụmụ nwanyị kachasị emetụta na ndepụta ikuku site na FierceWireless
A kwanyere ya ugwu na Culture Shifting A Weekend of Innovation in 2014
Na 2014, ọ hapụrụ AT&T isonye na Google, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche maka injinia
O duuru mgbasawanye ọrụ Google n'ime ahịa ndị na-apụta, gụnyere ijikwa otu ndị mepụtara teknụzụ nkwukọrịta mbụ maka Project Loon, nke na-eji balloons ịgbatị mkpuchi
O duziri mbubata WiFi n'ofe usoro ụgbọ oloko India, na-ahụ maka ihu igwe dị oke egwu yana ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị elu
Kemgbe 2017, ọ ewerela ọrụ maka injinịa ntụkwasị obi maka ọtụtụ ọrụ Google
Ọ na-eje ozi na bọọdụ ndị isi nke Center for Holocausts, Human Rights & Genocide Education
ma bụrụ onye otu Board Advisory Corporate nke Mahadum Southern California
Ọ bụ nne nwere ụmụ atọ toro eto, ụmụ nwoke abụọ na otu nwa nwanyị
Na 2021, a mara ọkwa na ọ ga-abụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ojii abụọ mbụ (ya na Patricia Bath ) ga-abanye na National Inventors Hall of Fame
Marian Veitch (8 Julaị 1913 - 24 Julaị 1973) bụ onye otu azụmaahịa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain
Amụrụ na Sheffield, Veitch gara Huntsman's Gardens School tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ mkpuchi
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Labour Party na, mgbe e mesịrị, gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ruskin College
N'afọ 1945, a họpụtara Veitch ka ọ bụrụ onye Sheffield City Council, na-eje ozi mgbe ọ na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ
N'oge a, o nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụaka nwere nkwarụ
Na ntuli aka nke United Kingdom n'afọ 1951, ọ guzo na Leeds North West, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke abụọ na 375% nke votu
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na kansụl na ọrụ ya dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ na 1956, iji were ọrụ oge niile nke Yorkshire District Organiser na National Union of General and Municipal Workers
N'afọ 1960, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ
Veitch sonyeere onye isi nke Confederation of Shipbuilding and Engineering Unions na 1962, naanị nwanyị jere ozi na ya n'oge a
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na International Metalworkers' Federation wee jee ozi na kọmitii ụkpụrụ nri site na 1965 ruo 1968
Na 1965, Veitch lụrụ Donald Barnie, onye nkuzi na Hendon Polytechnic
Ọ lara ezumike nka n'ọrụ otu ya na 1970
Mariana Chobanova (amụrụ na 13 Septemba 1965) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Mariana Mincheva (amụrụ na 6 Nọvemba 1959) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị asatọ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Mariana Naydenova (amụrụ na 11 Febụwarị 1962) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ

Marianne ma ọ bụ Edda Fannin (ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1845 na ụbọchị irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Irish botanical artist, nke a maara màkà ọrụ ya na-ese ihe osise nke South Africa
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi na-ese ihe na South Africa n'oge ya
A mụrụ Marianne Edwardine Fannin na Dublin ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1845, nwa nwanyị nke Thomas na Ellen Fannin
Mgbè Fannin dị ọnwa ole na ole, ezinụlọ ya si Dublin kwaga South Africa
Na mbụ, ha biri na Cape of Good Hope
Ha wee biri na Dargle, nke bụ isi iyi nke Osimiri Umgeni, nna Fannin gụrụ ya aha Osimiri Dargle dị nso na Dublin
A maara mpaghara ahụ ugbu a site na aha Dargle
Fannin lụrụ Reverend Eustace Wilberforce Jacob n'afọ 1869
Di na nwunye ahụ gara England n'afọ 1871, ebe Jacob nwụrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ha rutere
Fannin nọgidere na England ruo oge ụfọdụ, na-amụ egwu na eserese
Ọ laghachiri South Africa n'afọ 1875
Site n'afọ 1878, ọ biri na Transvaal, lụọ Reverend Alfred Roberts n'afọ 1879 onye ọ zutere site na nnọkọ ozi ala ọzọ
Roberts mechara bụrụ onye isi dikọn na Diocese nke Pretoria
Di na nwunye ahụ biri na Potchefstroom site na 1881 ruo 1896, ebe ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Nwa ha nwoke, Dr Austin Roberts, gara n'ihu bụrụ onye a ma ama na-amụ banyere ụmụ nnụnụ
Fannin bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere St
Mary's Diocesan School for Girls, Pretoria, Roberts jere ozi dị ka onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwoke St Birinus
N'afọ 1881, n'oge nnọchibido nke Pretoria, Fannin laghachiri n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ahụ na Natal
Fannin nwụrụ n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1938, ma ọ bụ na Heidelberg, Gauteng, ma ọ bụ Na New Muckleneuk, Pretoria
Fannin yiri ka ọ bụ Ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, George Fox Fannin, onye na-amụ màkà ihe ọkụkụ, gbara ya ume ịmụ banyere ihe ọkpọkọ South Africa
Mmasị ha dị na orchid na Asclepiadoideae (milkweeds)
Mmasị a mere ka Fannin na-agbanye ma na-ese ihe osise George chịkọtara ma zigara William Henry Harvey ihe osise na Trinity College, Dublin
Ihe osise ya masịrị Harvey nkè ukwuu, ọ kpọrọ orchid aha iji sọpụrụ ya, na-eto ya dị ka onye chọpụtara ya
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ1869, Fannin sere otu abọm na-akọwapụta okooko osisi nke Natal
N'afọ 1878, Fannin bụ onye otu ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Bishọp Henry Bousfield duziri, n'oge njem ha si Durban gaa Pretoria Fannin sere ihe osise nke ime obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Mgbè ọ bi na Transvaal, Fannin sere okooko osisi ọhịa na ọdịdị ala
Ihe osise okooko osisi ya dị na School of Botany, Trinity College, Dublin
A na-edebe ihe osise ya na nchịkọta onwe onye na South Africa

Marianne Kriel (amụrụ na 30 ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 1971 na Bellville, Western Cape) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri n'azụ azụ na freestyle si South Africa, onye ritere ọla nchara na 100m backstroke na 1996 Summer Olympics na Atlanta, Georgia
Ya na Nelson Mandela zutere
Ọ nọrọ oge ụfọdụ na-azụ onwe ya na Southern Methodist University (SMU) ebe ọ zutere ezigbo ndị enyi Tia Gibson na ụmụ ya nwanyị Meg na Katie
Kriel sonyekwara na 1992 Summer Olympics na Barcelona, Spain, ma nata onyinye onye isi ala na 1993 na 1996
Kriel bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi otu ọtụtụ koodu na 1994 Commonwealth Games na 1995 All-Africa Games
Kriel tolitere na Bellville (nke dị nso na Cape Town) ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Bellville
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ ihe nlereanya nye ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya nke agbụrụ na nzụlite niile, n'ụzọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịdị n'otu nke ndị ntorobịa South Africa
Marianne Thamm bụ onye nta akụkọ South Africa, odee na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
Ọ bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Daily Maverick ma dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2016, o wepụtara akwụkwọ ncheta, Hitler, Verwoerd, Mandela na m
A mụrụ Thamm n'England ebe nna ya bụ onye Germany bụ onye nga agha ma zute nne Thamm, onye ọrụ ụlọ Portuguese
Thamm na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka ọkara Portuguese, ọkara German, na-agbake na Roman Katọlik na-ekweghị na Chineke na ndị inyom kwagara mba ọzọ
Ya na onye otu ya na ụmụ ya nwaanyị abụọ bi na Cape Town
Marianne du Toit (amụrụ ya na 1970) bụ onye na-eme njem na onye na-ese foto South Africa, ama ama maka njem egwu ya n'ịnyịnya na ụkwụ si Argentina gaa New York n'ime ọnwa nke iri abuo na otu

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 1992 na nzere BA na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akparamaagwa, ọ nọrọ afọ atọ ịgagharị na ịgba ígwè na Europe tupu ya ebie na Dublin, ebe ọ bi ugbu a
Site n'ike mmụọ nsọ onye njem Switzerland Aimé Félix Tschiffely, bụ onye site na afọ 1925 ruo afọ 1928 ji ịnyịnya Criollo abụọ si Buenos Aires gaa Washington DC, Marianne kpebiri ịgbaso nzọụkwụ ya
O kpebiri iji njem ahụ kwalite na ịkpata ego n'ịkwado ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụgwọ na Ireland
“Echetara m, ebe m dị ihe dị ka afọ iri na asaa, m na-agụkarị akụkọ ndị a banyere ụmụ nwanyị nwere obi ike bụ́ ndị mere njem ndị a magburu onwe ha
Ọ dị mgbe ọ bụla ihe dị omimi na-ebuga m n'ihe ndị a na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ
Enwere m mmasị na adrenaline na obi ụtọ ahụ
Ọ naghị asụ Spanish, ọ maghịkwa ntakịrị gbasara ịnyịnya na ịnya ịnyịnya, mana ọ gara na May 2002 site na Ireland maka South America ebe enwetara Criollo abụọ ya, Mise na Tusa
Aha ha pụtara otu mụ na gị n'asụsụ Irish
Ọnwa isii ka ọ gafesịrị njem ya, a chọpụtara na Tusa na-arịa ọrịa anaemia na a ga-ewepụ ya
Marianne tụlere ịnakwere mmeri; Otú ọ dị, n'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ ihe isi ike ndị ọzọ, ọ nọgidere na-eme njem ahụ, na-esonye na ngagharị nke St Patrick's Day n'okporo ámá New York n'afọ 2004
A na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Marianne n'akwụkwọ ya Crying with Cockroaches
Na-akwado Dublin Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, Marianne na-anapụta nkịta kpafuo n'okporo ámá Dublin
Ụlọ ọrụ foie gras, ọrụ ugbo ụlọ mmepụta ihe, ịnwale anụmanụ, ịzụ ahịa ajị anụ na iji anụmanụ eme ihe n'ime egwuregwu bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ọ họọrọ ime ka ọ pụta ìhè
Mariano Rajoy Brey (27 Maachị 1955) bu bụ presidenti nke Spain
Mariatou Diarra (amụrụ na onwa Nọvemba 20, na afo 1985) bụ onye Mali na-egwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị
Diarra sonyeere Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe o nwetara 2 na 3 egwuregwu
A mụrụ ya na Bamako ma na-egwuri egwu na Senegal maka Dakar Université Club
Àtụ Mali squad - 2009 FIBA Africa Championship for Women
Mariatu Bala Usman bụ onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ministrị ahụike na steeti Katsina ugbu a, o so na Kansul Ndị Isi nke Katsina Steeti

N'ịbụ onye kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ministrị ahụike na steeti Katsina, Mariatu haziri atụmatụ ikpochapụ ọrịa maningitis nke pụtara n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụarị n'afọ 2018 na ngalaba Bugaje nke ọchịchị ime obodo Jibia
Ọ na-eziga ndị ọrụ ọtụtụ oge ime nnyocha, nye ọgwụgwọ, ọgwụ na mmụta ahụike dị ka ụzọ mgbochi
Mariatu kwupụtakwara ahụhụ ndị Katsina na-ata iji iga njem otu awa inweta ọdịdị ahụike
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ 'Ihe ịma aka na-eche ihu na inye nlekọta ahụike na steeti Katsina na ụzọ oga n'ihu
Maricela Monserrate Gómez (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba 23, 1976) bụ onye Ecuadorian na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi onyonyo, na ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ
A mụrụ Maricela Gómez na Guayaquil na Nọvemba 23, 1976
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na mmalite afọ 1990 dị ka onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Teatro Bambalinas, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Raúl Varela duziri
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na telivishọn na 1993 dị ka onye mgbakwunye na telenovela Ángel o Demonio [es], nke Ecuavisa mepụtara
Nke a dugara na ọrụ na mmepụta ndị ọzọ dị ka Dulce tormento [es] (1995) na María Soledad [es] (1995)
O nwetara nkwanye ùgwù ọha na eze na 1999, mgbe ọ pụtara na TC Televisión telenovela Emergencia [es]
N'afọ 2003, ọ pụtara na telenovela La Hechicera [es], na-egwu onye na-emegide ndị isi Sharon la Hechicera na Bernie Paz
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị otu Ecuavisa telenovela Yo vendo un ojos negros [es]
N'afọ 2005, o mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi azụmahịa Sharon y los especialistas, ya na Sharon la Hechicera na-ekerịta ihuenyo ọzọ

N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara na telenovela Amores que matan [es], n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Kliffor n'akụkụ Richard Barker [es] N'afọ 2007, ọ pụtara dị ka María na usoro ndị ntorobịa na-aga nke ọma Súper Papá [es]
N'afọ 2008, Gómez laghachiri TC Televisión na usoro ihe nkiri El Gabinete, ya na Santiago Naranjo [es], Prisca Bustamante, na, ọzọ, Sharon la Hechicera
Na ngwụcha afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Corazón contento
N'afọ 2009, ọ sonyeere RTS dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi ụtụtụ El Club de la Mañana, ya na Marcelo Cornejo, María Gracia Manzano, na Sandra Pareja
Gómez nọgidere na ihe ngosi ahụ ruo mgbe a kagbuo ya na mbido afọ 2018
N'afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri ime ihe nkiri mgbe afọ iri gasịrị, sonye na telenovela Sharon la Hechicera [es] na oge nke abụọ ya
Omume ya, Wilma Aguilar, bụ onye ọka iwu na-enyocha ọnwụ onye na-agụ egwu Sharon
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na usoro TC Televisión Juntos y revueltos [es], nke ọ na-egwu María Elena
Gómez nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Patricio Moreno
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ Darío León n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ iri abụọ
009, mana ha gara n'ihu na mmekọrịta ha ruo 2011
Ya na ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ Gerardo Panchana nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya kemgbe afọ 2014
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa fibromyalgia n'afọ 2011, nke ọ natara ọgwụgwọ iji mee ka ihe mgbu ahụ dị jụụ ma gbakee
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị n'ihi ọrịa kansa afọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ gbanwere àgwà iri nri ya kpamkpam, na mgbakwunye na izere usoro mmega ahụ dị elu na ilekọta akpụkpọ ahụ ya gbasara ihe ịchọ mma
N'afọ 2018, Gómez gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na Mahadum Guayaquil, na-enwetakwa onyinye Contenta nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ hapụrụ ime ihe nkiri ma na-enye usoro ọgwụgwọ n'ịntanetị n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Marie-Françoise Peignon (1818-1876) ọ̄ nabụ onye ọchụnta ego French
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ejiji masquerade a ma ama nka ọma na La maison Peignon-Costumiers (1853)
Marie-Josèphe Zani-Fé Touam-Bona (née Valangadede, n'oge gara aga Franck; 12 Septemba, na afọ 1933 - 7 Disemba, na afọ 2001) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Central African Republic (CAR)
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ minista gọọmentị na mba ahụ
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Marie-Josèphe rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ dị elu na gọọmentị David Dacko n'afọ ndị afọ 1960, ma nọgide na-enwe ihu ọma mgbe Jean-Bédel Bokassa weghaara ọchịchị na afọ 1966
Bokassa họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl na afọ 1970, ọ nọgidekwara n'ọkwa ruo mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na afọ 1979, na-ejide ọtụtụ ọfịs dị iche iche
Marie-Josèphe batara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 1993 dị ka onye otu nke National Assembly, ma jee ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ

A mụrụ Marie-Josèphe n'obodo Ippy (nke dị ugbu a na Ouaka prefecture), nwa nwanyị nke Achille Petit-Jean (onye injinia na-egwupụta ihe na Belgium) na Augustine Valagandede (nwanyi Banda sitere na Mbrès)
Nna ya hapụrụ obodo ahụ tupu a mụọ ya, ọ bụ naanị mgbe iri afọ ole na ole gachara ka ọ kwetara na ọ bụ nwa ya nwanyị
N'ihi agbụrụ ya, Marie-Josèphe nwetara agụmakwụkwọ asụsụ French, na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ na Bangui na Mbaïki nke ndị nọn Katọlik na-elekọta
E nyere ya aha nna ọzọ n'oge ọ na-aga akwụkwọ, Jeannot, iji mata ya dị ka onye nna nna Europe, mana o weere aha nna di ya (Franck) mgbe ọ di na afọ 1951
N'afọ 1960, Marie-Josèphe natara agụmakwụkwọ site n'aka gọọmentị mba iji gaa ọzụzụ akụ na ụba n'ụlọ na Paris, nke ruru 30,000 francs
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ laghachiri na CAR, mana n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1961 ọ sonyeere ọrụ gọọmentị dị ka onye na-enyere onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya aka
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1962, Onye isi ala David Dacko họpụtara Marie-Josèphe ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Social and Economic Council, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo Jenụwarị 1966
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1964, o mekwara ya onye isi nke Service for the Advancement of Women, ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ọhụrụ raara onwe ya nye imeziwanye ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na ndị obodo Central Africa
A kwalitewo Marie-Josèphe n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1965, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke Social Affairs
Na Maachị, na afọ 1967, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii mba nke Central African Red Cross Society
Na Jenụwarị, na afọ 1965, a họpụtara Marie-Josèphe ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Union Féminine Centrafricaine (UFCA; 'Central African Women's Association'), ọkwá ọ ga-ejide ruo ọnwụ ya
E guzobere UFCA n'afọ gara aga dị ka ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke MESAN, naanị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iwu kwadoro n'oge ahụ

N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1970, e mere Marie-Josèphe odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ọchịchị onye isi ala Jean-Bédel Bokassa, onye weghaara ọchịchị na Jenụwarị, na afọ 1966
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ minista gọọmentị na CAR, ma nọrọ na kansụl ruo ihe karịrị afọ itoolu, ọ hapụrụ na Septemba, na afọ 1979 mgbe a chụpụrụ Bokassa
O nwere ọtụtụ ọfịs na utu aha dị iche iche n'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, n'oge dị iche iche na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, agụmakwụkwọ, na ọganihu ụmụ nwanyị
Marie-Josèphe laghachiri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ntuli aka nke afọ 1993, merie ntuli aka na National Assembly dị ka onye nweere onwe ya ma guzo na mpaghara Mbrès
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 1998, mana ọ nwụrụ n'ọchịchị na Disemba 2001, mgbe ọ na-agwọ ọrịa na Paris
E bughachiri ozu ya na CAR, ọ dinara n'ụlọ National Assembly ruo ụbọchị abụọ tupu e lie ya n'obodo ya
Onye isi ala Ange-Félix Patassé na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị ndị ọzọ bịara olili ozu ya
N'afọ 1951, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Marie-Josèphe lụrụ Antonio Franck, onye ọrụ gọọmentị si Middle Congo
Ha nwere ụmụ asaa, ụmụ nwoke anọ na ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Antonio Franck ghọkwara onye minista n'okpuru Onye isi ala Bokassa, na-abanye na kansụl afọ atọ tupu nwunye ya
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm na afọ 1973, Marie-Josèphe mechara lụọ André Zani-Fé Touam-Bona, onye ọzọ n'ime ndị minista Bokassa

Marie-Laure Ryan bụ onye ọkà mmụta na-ede akwụkwọ n'onwe ya na onye nkatọ
O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na isiokwụ gbasara akụkọ, akụkọ ifo, na culture ndi cyber,ma nye ya onyinye ọtụtụ ugboro maka ọrụ ya
Ọ gara Mahadụm Geneva iji mụọ akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-agụsị akwụkwọ, tupu ọ kwaga United States na 1968
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Utah, ebe ọ nwetara MA
ya na Linguistics na German, yana PhD na French
O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ na Computer Science na Mahadum California San Diego

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na onye injinia ngwanrọ ma bipụta ihe karịrị isiokwu iri ise, sụgharịrị n'ọtụtụ asụsụ ma nyefee, ọkachasị, echiche nke akụkọ dijitalụ, echiche akụkọ, echiche nke ụdị, ụzọ asụsụ na akwụkwọ, na ọdịbendị dijitalụ ma nye ọtụtụ okwu a kpọrọ
Na akụkọ Avatar, ọ na-anabata nkọwa transmedial nke akụkọ dabere na ntọala ọgụgụ isi

Ọ bi ugbụ a na Bellvue, Colorado ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ok mmuta na Residence na Mahadum Colorado site na afo 2009 ruo 2010 tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka Gutenberg Fellow na Mahadim Johannes Gutenberg, site na 2010 ruo 2011
O dezigharịrị Johns Hopkins Guide to New Media and Digital Textuality na Lori Emerson na Benjamin Robertson, nke e bipụtara na 2014

Marie-Louise Potter (Amụrụ na Machị 15, 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Seychelles na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ nke National Assembly of Seychelles Ọ bụ onye otu Seychelles People's Progressive Front, a họpụtakwara ya na Nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 1993
N'afọ 2007 ọ ghọrọ onye ndu nke Government Business

A họpụtara Potter n'ọnwa Machị 2012 dị ka onye nnọchi anya Seychelles na United Nations, n'ọnwa June 9, 2012 dị ka Onye nnọchi anya Seychellense na United States, Kọmishọna Ukwu (Commonwealth) na Ottawa n'ụbọchị 1 Nọvemba 2016 dị ka odeakwụkwọ mba ọzọ, wee laa ezumike nká na ọkwa ndị a n'ụbọchị 1 Machị 2017
Marie-Noëlle Koyara (amụrụ n'afọ 1955) bụ onye bụbu minista gọọmentị nke Central African Republic
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa mba na 2015mekwa ya na afọ 2017 nakwa 2021
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka nchekwa na mba ahụ kemgbe NWere onwe malitere ịdị na afọ 1960
Na oge gara aga onwere ọtụtụ ọkwa onye nye maka ma jee ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Central African Republic na Food and Agriculture Organization
Koyara gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bouar na Bangui
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ka a nabata ya na ndị uwe ojii mba, ebe ọ nọ wee bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ anabatara
Otú ọ dị, n'otu afọ ahụ nne ya nwụrụ, Koyara laghachikwara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma mesịa gaa mahadum, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka injinia na ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo

O nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa na ọrụ mmepe ọrụ ugbo, yana ịrụ ọrụ na African Development Foundation, tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka nkwalite ime obodo ma mesịa bụrụ minista nke nkwalite ụmụ nwanyị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndị Nyemeaka a n'agbata afọ 1993 na Kwa 1996
N'ikpeazụ, Koyara ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Central Africa nke Food nakwa Agriculture Organization
Ọ biri na Cape Verde, nakwa afọ asaa na Burkina Faso, nakwa afọ asaa na okara na Ivory Coast

N'ọchịchị nke abụọ nke Nicolas Tiangaye, na June 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo, mgbe ahụ ọ nọ n'ọkwa Minista nke State nke Ọrụ na Mmekọrịta Ọha, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka steeti na mba ahụ, mgbe ahụ Minista nke Steeti nke Mmepe Ime obodo, na Jenụwarị 2015 a họpụtara ọ bụ Minista nke mbụ nke Nchebe Mba
Marie-Roger Biloa bụ ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ magazin Cameroon, ónyé na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, ónyé nta akụkọ, onye na'eme ihe nkiri na onye isi oche nke atụmatụ dị iche iche na-elekwasị anya na ọbọdọ
Ọ bi na France, ebe ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi okwu telivishọn
Na France, a kpọrọ ya Chevalier nke Order of Arts and Letters
Maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ, ọ nwetakwara onyinye Percy Qoboza
Ms Biloa nwere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akpọrọ Africa-internationalinfo
Biloa bụ nwa nwanyị nke Germain Tsala Mekongo, onye na 1957 ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke steeti Cameroon màkà ọrụ gọọmentị
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Paris-IV, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ German
N'afọ 1991, Biloa ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Africa International, magazin nke e guzobere na 1958 nke lekwasịrị ányá na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụkọ akụ na ụba na ọdịbendị mgbè Biloa sonyeere ya
Ka ógè na-aga, Marie-Roger Biloa sonyeere magazin pan-African na-ese okwu Jeune Afrique, nke a machibidoro iwu na mbụ n'ọtụtụ mba Northern Africa (Arab)
N'afọ 1997, ụlọ ọrụ America, National Association of Black Journalists, sọpụrụ Biloa dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ nke afọ, na-anata ònyìnyé ahụ site n'aka Onye isi ala United States Bill Clinton n'onwe ya
N'afọ 2001, Unesco kpọrọ Biloa nwanyị kachasị mmà

Biloa kwupụtara na Ọktoba 15, 2018, na ọ ga-amalite ọwa telivishọn ọhụrụ akpọrọ MRB TV (ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na MRB Productions, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkírí America), nke bụ ọwa tebụl cable na satellite
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ dị ichè ichè nke ọma, gụnyere Spanish, English, French na German
Biloa bi n'etiti Paris, Berlin na Yaounde, Cameroon
Marie-Solange Kayisire bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Rwanda, onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta Cabinet, n'ọfịs Praịm Minista na onye otu ndị kansụl Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 31 Ọgọst 2017
Marie-Solange Kayisire jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta nke Cabinet, n'ọfịs nke Praịm Minista na dị ka onye otu nke ndị kansụl Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 31 31 Ọgọst 2017
Nwa nwanyị nke Georges d'Armand de Chateauvieux na Amélie Adam de Villiers, a mụrụ Marie-Thérèse de Chateuvieux na Eprel 20, 1915, na Saint-Denis
Nwa nwa nke Marquis Joseph Antoine Sosthènes d'Armand de Chateauvieux, ọ bụ onye isi nke nnukwu ala ugbo nke Marquis guzobere na Hauts nke obodo Saint-Leu, mgbe nna ya Georges nwụrụ na 1961
N'afọ 1965, de Chateauvieux bu nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi npaghara nke ngalaba Réunion
Ọ nọchiri Henri Bègue, onye gwara ya ka ọ nọchie ya dị ka onye isi obodo nke Saint-Leu
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 1971 na 1976, tupu Mario Hoareau eti ya ihe na 1983
De Chateauvieux bụkwa General Councilor nke La Réunion na 1970
De Chateauvieux bụ nwa nwanne nna nna onye ọchụnta ego Jacques de Chateauvierux
Ezinaụlọ ya nwere otutu ala nke oyibo kpolo(estate), mana ọ rere ha ka a gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ Nechonal Botanical Conservatory of Mascarin na mbido afọ 1990
O mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ 100 ya n'ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ ya n'Eprel 20, 2015
De Chateauvieux nwụrụ na Eprel 12, 2017, na Paris, ụbọchị ole na ole tupu afọ 102 ya
E liri ya na Saint-Leu
Marie Belkine (amụrụ n'abali otu n'ọnwa Disemba 1948), nke a maara dị ka Marie Agba-Otikpo, bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Central Afrika Republik
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembli na onye isi nke Defence na security Commission (CDS)
A mụrụ Agba-Otikpo n'abali otu n'ọnwa Disemba 1948 na Bocaranga

Na mbido ọrụ ya, Agba-Otikpo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma were ya n'ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya nke sentral Afrika Republik, na Paris dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze
N'ịgbaso onwe ya na Onye isi ala Ange-Félix Patassé, a họpụtara Agba-Otikpo ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya MLPC maka Ngaoundaye na 1998
O nwetara pasent 763 nke votu, ma jee ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa nke nzukọ ahụ site na arụ 1999 ruo arụ 2000
A họpụtara Agba-Otikpo ọzọ na arụ 8 Mee 2005
Ọ bụ onye otu Pan-Afrikan Parliament site na arụ 2005 rụo na arụ 2011 na onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ahụike, ọrụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
E meriri ya na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2011
Agba-Otikpo bụkwa onye otu REFPAC (Network of sentral Afrikan Women Parliamentariansi) n'afọ 2007
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2015, Agba-Otikpo guzobeghachiri Ministri nke Nchebe Ọha mgbe ndị uwe ojii mere ngagharị iwe n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2015 na Bangui
N'oge ndị uwe ojii na-eme ngagharị iwe, Agba-Otikpo bụ onye na-ahụ maka Commission nke Defence na nchekwaba ndị National Transitional Council (CNT)
Na ntuli aka 2015-16, Agba-Otikpo gbara ọsọ maka Ngaoundaye nke abụọ nke Ouham-Pendé maka Party nke Democratik Governance
Mgbe ntuli aka nke abụọ gasịrị n'ọnwa Eprel 2016, Antoine Koirokpi meriri ya
Marie Blandine Ouédraogo Sawadogo bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-Africa si na Burkina Faso
Sawadogo bụ onye otu Nzukọ Omeiwu mba Burkina Faso (National Assembly of Burkina Faso) na-anọchite anya otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Congress for Democracy and Progress
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Pan-African n'afọ 2004
Sawadogo bụ osote onye isi oche nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Congress for Democracy and Progress (CDP) ugbu a, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị na Burkina Faso
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye nhazi nke nzukọ ezumezu
Marie Brizard et Roger International bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-aṅụ mmanya na France nke e guzobere n'afọ 1755
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka nke Belvédère kemgbe afọ 2006, ma dabere na Ivry-sur-Seine, France
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ere mmanya mmanya, sirop okpete dị ọcha, ntụziaka, na mmanya na ngwakọta
Ngwaahịa ndị a dị n'ihe karịrị mba Otu narị na iri abụọ
A mụrụ onye guzobere ya, Marie Brizard, na 1714 na Bordeaux otu n'ime ụmụ iri na ise nke onye ọkwá nkà
N'afọ 1755, ọ lekọtara onye ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri West Indian na-arịa ọrịa, na nzaghachi o nyere ya ntụziaka maka mmanya na-aba n'anya
N'afọ ahụ, ya na nwa nwanne ya nwoke, Jean-Baptiste Roger, guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere itolite, ọbụnakwa nyefee ya Eze Louis nke iri na ise
N'afọ 1795, Jean-Baptiste Roger nwụrụ
N'afọ 1801, Marie nwụrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gafere n'aka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Roger, ezinụlọ ahụ nọgidekwara na-achịkwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo ihe karịrị ọgbọ iri ruo 1998
N'afọ 1954, ọ ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze

Marie Christina Kolo (amụrụ ya na 1989) bụ onye na-akwado ihu igwe, onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, na onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ sitere na Madagascar, bụ onye welitere mmata zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere mmetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe na Madagascar ma rịọ maka nkwado mba ụwa n'ịgbasa mmetụta ya
A mụrụ Kolo n'afọ 1989 ma too na Ambodirano
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ hụrụ mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke ụlọ ọrụ akwa dị nso n'ụlọ ya kpatara, wee rịọ ka a kwụsị mmetọ ahụ
Ọ gara Mahadum Katọlik nke Paris ma nweta nzere masta na Humanitarian and Development Project Management
E nyere ya Mahadum Maine Mandela Washington Fellowship n'afọ 2017
Kolo malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ọrụ ihu igwe n'afọ 2015, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo nke United Nations na mpaghara Androy nke mmiri ozuzo na-enwekarị
N'oge ahụ, Kolo guzobere netwọk ihu igwe nke Indian Ocean dị ka ikpo okwu maka ndị ntorobịa na-eme ihe ike si Madagascar, Mauritius, Réunion, na Seychelles
Ikpo okwu ahụ haziri mmadụ 3,000 ka ha gaa ngagharị iwe ihu igwe mbụ nke Madagascar n'afọ 2015
Kolo guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze Green N Kool n'afọ 2016

Nzukọ a na-emepụta ogige egwuregwu na ala ala site na ihe eji emegharịgharị ma na-ere ngwaahịa na gburugburu ebe obibi iji kwado ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ebe etiti obodo, na mmemme obodo na mpaghara Antananarivo na Nosy Be
Iji dozie ọrịa COVID-19, Green N Kool wepụtara ncha ịsa aka na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi nke e ji mmanụ a na-eri eri mee
Na njem ya na-enweghị egwu, nzukọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iji dozie nsogbu mmekọahụ na njem ọha na eze
N'afọ 2018, Kolo guzobere Ecofeminism Madagascar, ikpo okwu n'ịntanetị lekwasịrị anya na mgbanwe ihu igwe na mmekọrịta ya na ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị
N'afọ ahụ, e nyekwara ya ọkwa nke abụọ na World Wide Fund for Nature Africa Youth Awards
N'afọ 2019, Kolo gara ọgbakọ 2019 United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP25), ebe onye minista gburugburu Madagascar, Alexandre Georget zutere ya n'ihu ọha

O ji akwụkwọ ozi ghere oghe zaghachi ('Non à līâgisme et à la misogynie par les membres de notre gouvernement') nke o degaara onye isi ala, Andry Rajoelina, na-akatọ omume Georget, na-ajụ nchụpụ nke ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe ike na ndị nnọchi anya COP25 nke Madagascar, ma na-ekwu okwu megide ịkpa nká na ịkpọasị ụmụ nwanyị site n'aka ndị otu gọọmentị

N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, Kolo duru otu otu enyere onyinye United States Department of State Alumni Engagement Innovation Fund award maka oru ngo iji luso mwakpo mmekọahụ na ime ihe ike dabere na Madagascar
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Kolo, ya na Paloma Costa nke Brazil, gwara odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations António Guterres okwu n'onwe ya na mkparịta ụka gbasara omume ihu igwe ndị ntorobịa
O kwuru maka mmetụta nke COVID-19 na mgbanwe ihu igwe na mba ya, dị ka ụnwụ nri Madagascar nke afọ 2021-2022, ma kwe nkwa na ụwa ndị ọzọ ga-egosi ịdị n'otu na mba ndị mgbanwe ihu igwe emetụtalarị
Kolo gara ọgbakọ 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP26) dịka akụkụ nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị na okike
Marie T
Cochran (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkụzi, ónyé na-eme atụmatụ, ónyé na'ede nka, na ónyé na-ahụ màkà nka
N'afọ 2020 ruo 2022, ọ bụ Lehman Brady Prọfesọ, na Mahadum Duke
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Toccoa, Georgia, ebe Cochran na-ezo aka dị ka 'ebe pụrụ iche'

Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'ihe gbásárá agbụrụ na okike site n'echiche ndị Africa America, ma na-enyocha ike nke Affrilachia, na-ezo aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị nke ndị Africa America na ndị ọzọ na-acha ọbara ọbara si mpaghara Appalachian nke United States
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Candice Dyer, Cochran kwuru, n'ihe gbasara Appalachia, na 'Ndị mmadụ na-ejikọta Blackness na Atlanta, Detroit, DC, mana anyị nwèrè ya ebe a n'ugwu
Anyị nwèrè ike ịbụ obéré n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, mana anyị nwere nnukwu mmetụta
A mụrụ Marie Cochran na Toccoa, Georgia na 1962
O nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Drawing na Painting na Mahadum Georgia na 1985, na 1987, were ọnọdụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Mahadim Georgia Southern

E mechara nye ya onyinye agụmakwụkwọ Ford Foundation ma nweta Master of Fine Arts na Fiber na Drawing / Painting site na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na 1992, ebe o mechara nweta NEA fellowship na agụmakwụkwọ ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
Site na 1992 ruo 1996, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum Georgia Southern
Site na 1996 ruo 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nké nka na Mahadum Georgia
Cochran abụwo prọfesọ nleta n'ọtụtụ mahadum, gụnyere Mahadum Georgia, Prince Georges Community College, na Mahadum Western Carolina
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ Lehman Brady na Center for Documentary Studies na Mahadum Duke malite na ọdịda semester 2020 site na ógè opupu ihe ubi nkè 2022
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nkè afọ 2022, ọ kụziri ihe ọmụmụ nke undergraduate na graduate dị ka Lehman Brady Prọfesọ nkè akpọrọ Black Spaces Matter Race, Place, and Resilience
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe na ọtụtụ mahadum ọ ga-aga ọtụtụ ebe na nka ma ọ bụ na ọ ga-enye ndị na-ese egwu oge iji chee echiche ma rụọ ọrụ n'èzí mpaghara ntụsara ahụ ha
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ a mèrè na Asheville, North Carolina
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Studio Museum na Harlem, Spelman College, High Museum of Art, na Georgia Museum of Art
Cochran enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite na nkwado ya maka nka
O meriri na Cultural Olympiad Regional Designation Award site na Kọmitii Atlanta Cultural Olympics iji sọpụrụ 1996 Summer Olympics

O nwetakwara onyinye nke ónyé na-ese ihe nke Georgia Council; onyinye nke Mid-Atlantic Arts Council nke 'Artist as a Catalyst'; NEA / Southern Arts Federation Sculpture Fellowship na Fast Track Challenge Grant na 'We Shall Overcome Fund' site na Higherlander Center for Research and Education na New Market, Tennessee
Marie Edwards Johnson-Calloway (April 10, 1920 na February 11, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọhịa nké eserese na ngwakọta mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ Marie Edwards na Pimlico, Baltimore, ónyé Africa America Johnson-Calloway gara kọleji ndị nkụzi nke Coppin State
Edwards kụziri na Baltimore School District ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1952, ọ nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Morgan State College, Baltimore, Maryland, na agụmakwụkwọ nka
N'afọ 1968 ọ natara Master of Arts na eserese site na Mahadum San Jose State dị ka ónyé nkụzi nwéré ahụmahụ na Graduate Studies
Ọ kụziri na mahadum na kọleji dị na Bay Area ruo mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na nkụzi na 1983
Johnson-Calloway arụwo ọrụ na Bay Area Women Artists nke Northern California na ọrụ obodo
Ebe ngosi nka Oakland so n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya
Johnson-Calloway akụzikwaara na Mahadum San Francisco State na California College of Arts and Crafts Alụrụ di ugboro abụọ (Arthur Johnson, MD na Charles Calloway
MD), o nwere ụmụ abụọ (nwa nwanyị April Watkins, na nwa nwoke, Art Johnson), na ụmụ ụmụ anọ, ma bírí na Oakland, California
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke San Jose nke NAACP, ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ikike ọbọdọ
Johnson-Calloway nwụrụ na Febụwarị 2018 mgbè ọ dị afọ 97
Marie Josephe Fegue (a mụrụ 28 Mee 1991) bụ onye na-ebu ibu nke Cameroon
Ọ gbara n'asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị kilogram 69 na asọmpi Commonwealth 2014 ebe ọ meriri nrite ọla edo
Ọ gbara asọmpi na asọmpi ụwa, kacha nso nso a na asọmpi ịdị arọ ụwa nke 2010
YouMarie Humbert bụ onye Switzerland - Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ natara nhọpụta abụọ na 2016 Ghana Movie Awards maka nchọpụta kachasị mma na onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma, yana na 10th Africa Movie Academy Awards maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị ike
Ya na ezinụlọ ya tolitere na mba isii
Nna ya bụ onye Swiss French si Geneva na nne ya bụ onye Ghana si Akim Oda, na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ

Emume mmeri e mere na Kempinski Gold Coast Hotel, Accra na Disemba

Humbert bụ onye Ghana na Switzerland

Ọ na-asụ Bekee na French nke ọma
Marie Josephe Fegue (a mụrụ 28 Mee 1991) bụ onye na-ebu ibu nke Cameroon

Marie Khemesse Ngom Ndiaye bụ dọkịta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Senegal
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop n'afọ 1991
N'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na Senegal, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke ahụike ọha na eze na Ministri ahụike
N'ọnwa Mee 2022, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike na gọọmentị nke anọ, na-anọchi Abdoulaye Diouf Sarr onye a chụpụrụ

Marie Louise Asseu (November 21, 1966 ruo December 7, 2016) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ivorian, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha nna ya bụ Malou
Na mgbakwunye, ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Limale Festival nke Cote d'Ivore
Asseu weputara abọm dị iche iche
Asseu sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn na Ivory Coast, gụnyere RTI channel's 'Mon Experience' ('My Experience')
N'afọ 2012, o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye nduzi na Les infideles Ọ pụtakwara na
N'afọ 2011, Asseu jisiri ike gbanahụ mgbalị igbu ya site n'aka ìgwè ndị na-eto eto

Dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ si kwuo, asịrị na-atụ aro na ya na Patrick Achi, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo ahụ, na-enwe mmekọahụ; asịrị a mere ka ìgwè mmadụ ji ụtarị na ngwá agha ndị ọzọ gbalịa ịbịakwute ya na ebumnuche doro anya nke igbu ya
Otú ọ dị, otu nwoke napụtara ya ozugbo
Assou nwere nsogbu uche site na ihe omume a ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Asseu nwere nsogbu ahụike n'ime afọ olenaole ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya

Marie Madoé Sivomey (na ọnwa July 3, 1923 ̊ September 15, na afọ 2008), a mụrụ Marie Madoe Gbikpi Tian Benissan, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Togo onye bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo na Togo, na-elekọta isi obodo, Lomé, site na afọ 1967 ruo na afọ 1974
A mụrụ ya na afọ 1923 n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst na Aného, obodo dị na mpaghara Maritime nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Togo, ebe ime mmụọ nke ndị Guin-Mina
Nwanne ya nwoke, Jean Kuassi Gbikpi, ga-emesị bụrụ achịbishọp nke Lomé
Mgbe ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Aného, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Porto-Novo, Benin
Ọ gara Cours Complémentaire na Lomé
Ọchịchị ndị France were Sivomey n'ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ gọọmentị, na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ego site na 1940 ruo 1945
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ego a n'okpuru usoro nke French West Africa site na 1945 ruo 1953, gụnyere na Ngalaba Ụtụ Isi nke obodo Bobo-Dioulasso, n'ihe bụ Burkina Faso ugbu a
Ọ laghachiri na Togo kpamkpam, nke nwetara nnwere onwe site na France na 1960, ma kwado idu ndú nke Ngalaba Ụtụ Isi kpọmkwem nke mba ahụ site na 1960 ruo 1962
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ nchịkwa na onye nduzi nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya malite na 1963
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ nọchitere anya Togo na nnọkọ na mgbakọ dị iche iche, na 1961 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Togolese mbụ sonyere na nnọkọ nke Nzukọ Ezumezu nke United Nations
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka o nyekwara aka hazie L'Union des Femmes du Togo (UFEMTO), Union of Togolese Women, n'akụkụ Marguerite Adjoavi Thompson-Trénou na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike

Mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Togo na Jenụwarị 1967 na ịrịgo n'ike nke Onye isi ala Gnassingbé Eyadéma, a gbasara ndị otu niile a họpụtara ahọpụta na mba ahụ, a machibidoro òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iwu, na nchịkwa nke obodo Togo dara n'aka ndị nnọchi anya pụrụ iche, ma ọ bụ ndị nnọchianya pụrụ iche
N'ọnọdụ a, a họpụtara Marie Madoé Sivomey ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Lomé na July 24, 1967, dabere na ahụmịhe ya dị ukwuu dị ka onye ọrụ gọọmentị
'N'etiti ndị nwere ike ịzọ ọkwa onye isi obodo, abụ m onye nwere ahụmịhe na ọrụ nke nchịkwa, ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-elekọta ọrụ ọha na eze, 'ka o mechara kwuo
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo na Mee 17, 1974
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, Sivomey biri na Lom-Nava
Ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na parish ya, dị ka nwanyị ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe nke ndị ntorobịa mba ahụ katọrọ mgbe ụfọdụ maka nguzo omume ọma ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị Togolese, ọkachasị na nkwado maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 15, 2008, na Lomé

Marie Misamu (16 Nọvemba, na afọ 1974, 16 Jenụwarị, na afo 2016), onye aha ya bụ Marie Misamu Ngolo, bụ onye na-agụ egwú, onye Congolese na-ede egwú amụrụ na Nọvemba16, na afọ 1974 na Kinshasa ma nwụọ na Jenụwarị 16, na afọ 2016 ka nọ n'otu ebe ahụ
Marie Misamu si n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asatọ
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ gachara, ndị enyi ya na-ezukọta gburugburu ya iji gee ya ntị n'ịbụ abụ
Ọ ga-azụlite ụdị ozioma n'akụkụ onye na-ekwusa ozi ọma Debaba
Ọ na-ekere òkè na abọm nke nwanne ya nwoke Del (Musamaliya) mgbe ahụ ya na Debaba n'onwe ya wee wepụta abọm Nazhirea, Ònye bụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ ?
N'ime abọm a, bụ abụ 'Reconnaissance' nke Marie Misamu maara ọha na eze nke DRC, Congo-Brazzaville na mba ndị ọzọ
Ọ lụrụ di mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu ma mụọ nwa ya nwanyị Ruth na Mee afọ 1994
Ọ bụ na abọm a, Nazhirea, Ònye bụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ ? Marie Misamu malitere ime aha ma mara ihe ịga nke ọma
Olu ya, ihe ọ na-eme, ụdị ya, nkà ya dị iche iche na-eme ka a mara ya karịa ókèala nke Congo
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Sébastien Fath na-ele ya anya dị ka 'onye ọsụ ụzọ dị ukwuu nke akụkọ ihe mere e mere eme ọhụrụ nke Oziọma Afrịka nke ga-ede otu ụbọchị'
Na mbido afọ 2016, ọ kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na mmetụta ya nke enweghị ntụkwasị obi na BestAfrica Radio na-agbasa na B-One TV
Ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 16, 2016, n'ihi ọrịa obi
Na mgbakwunye na egwu, ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji, onye na-eme ihe nlereanya, onye na'akwa akwa na onye na-achọ mma
Site na nkà ya, ọ na-ekere òkè na ihe nkiri ebe ya na Felix Wazekwa nwere mmekọrịta

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, arụmụka DRC banyere ọdịiche dị n'etiti egwu okpukpe (Ndị Kraịst) na egwu na-abụghị nke okpukpe (egwú ụwa) n'ihi na Marie Misamu na-emetụ onye ọ bụla n'ubu, ma na-eche banyere ịdị mma nke ndị na-ese ihe na-adịghị eme egwu okpukpe
Mgbe ya na nwanne ya nwoke bu Dieka Mbaki Claude, ama dika nwanne ya nwoke Debaba rụchara ọrụ ma sonye n'ọtụtụ egwu, Marie Misamu kpebiri ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
N'ihi ya, o wepụtara abọm Béatitudes, est-ce que ? na afọ 2003, abọm nke na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, ma eleghị anya n'ihi àgwà ya 'International'
Ọ bụ naanị n'afọ 2004, ka ọrụ ya n'onwe ya nwetara ume site na ntọhapụ nke abọm Mystère du Voile na egwu dịka 'Eh Yahweh' nke ya na Mike Kalambay, 'Reconnaissance', 'Bilaka', wdg
Abọm a nke asụsụ ya bụ Lingala so n'ime abọm kachasị mma nke egwu Ndị Kraịst na afọ 2005 na DRC
E rere abọm ahụ na mba ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa ma nke a nyere Marie Misamu ohere ka a kwalite ya na ihe omume Muana Mboka (Oman Mboka Trophy) na afọ 2005 na Kinshasa
N'afọ 2006, Marie Misamu gara njem nleta site n'ala nna ya iji bụrụ Chineke ma jikọta Ndị Kraịst gburugburu ụwa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Kinshasa, a kwalite ya ọzọ nke ugboro abụọ na ihe omume Muana Mboka nke mbipụta nke anọ
N'afọ 2008, o wepụtara abọm 'Mystère du Voile (Mpịakọta 2)' ebe anyị nwere ike ịchọta egwu dịka 'Salela ngai bikamwa', 'Masolo ya kati', 'Associé', wdg
Mgbe ahụ, ya na ndị egwu Ndị Kraịst ndị ọzọ dị ka Charles Mombaya na-arụkọ ọrụ ma na-aga n'ihu na-eme kọntaktị n'Africa na Europe

Mgbe ahụ, ọ wepụghị abọm ruo n'afọ 2014 mgbe abọm nke atọ ya Mystère du Voile, Mpịakọta 3 La Résurrection, ebe ya na nwa ya nwanyị Ruth Misamu na-abụ abụ Resurrection Aha ndị nwere ihe nkiri e wepụtara na abọm ikpeazụ ya bụ Saison, Reconnaissance na Nzambe ya ba defis

N'ikpeazụ, Marie Misamu hapụrụ abọm asaa n'onwe ya n'ahịa Nazhirea, Ònye bụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ ?, Vallée ya Bacca, Beatitudes, est-ce que ?, Mystère du Voile, Mystères du Voile (Mpịakọta 2), Face B Elonga (100% Adoration) na Mystère del Voile 3 La Résurrection ma e wezụga nke ọ na-abụ abụ abụọ na Debaba na ndị ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ
O sonyere na ihe karịrị abọm 9 n'oge ndụ ya
