Marie Sarr Mbodj (Amụrụ na 28 Septemba 1935 na Thiès, Senegal) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal

Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ steeti nke Minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ mba na-ahụ anya na agụmakwụkwọ teknụzụ na ọrụ aka site n'afọ Eprel 3rd, 1983 ruo ọnwa Jenụwarị 2nd, 1986, mgbe ahụ Minista na Ahụike Ọha site n'ọnwa Jenụwarụ 2nd, 1986 ruo n'ọnwa Eprel 5th, 1988 n'okpuru onye isi oche Abdou Diouf
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị minista nwanyị mbụ nke Senegal, na nwanyị mbụ Minista nke Ahụike Ọha
Mbodj gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Filles de Thiès n'etiti afọ 1943 na 1949
Ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ wee gaa ule nke École normale
O mechara bụrụ onye nyocha nke agụmakwụkwọ teknụzụ
Dị ka ndekọ 1999 si kwuo, Mbodj anọtụbeghị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu ọ banye n'ọchịchị na 1983
Marie Solange Pagonendji-Ndakala bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke etiti Afrịka republic ma bụrụ kwa minister nke nwulite na njem na ọrụ aka

Marie Elizabeth Sukers (amụrụ na 18 June 1972) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si Western Cape onye bụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa maka African Christian Democratic Party kemgbe Mee 2019
N'afọ 1991, o nwetara diplọma mmepe nke ndị Minista site na Rhema Bible Training Centre
O mezuru mmemme nchịkwa na Wits Business School n'afọ 2005
Sukers nwetara nzere bachelọ na nkà mmụta okpukpe site na International School of Ministry (ISOM) n'afọ 2018
A họpụtara Sukers ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke South Africa mgbe ntuli aka nke emere na 8 Mee 2019 gasịrị n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na e debere ya nke abụọ na ndepụta mpaghara ACDP
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na 22 Mee 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun, ọ natara ọrụ kọmitii ya
N'oge arụmụka banyere ime ihe ike metụtara nwoke na nwanyị na Septemba 2019, Sukers kpọrọ oku ka ụlọ ahụ chefuo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na igosi ndị ndu n'ịnagide ihe ike ahụ
Ọ kpọrọ oku maka ụbọchị ekpere mba megide ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Marie Thérèse Ma ọ bụ Marie-Thérèse nwere ike ịpụta
Marie Warder (amụrụ Marie van Zyl, 30 Eprel 1927 – 20 Ọktoba 2014) bụ onye South Africa onye odeakụkọ, onye edemede na onye ndọrọndọrọ ama ama maka mmemme ya na-akwalite mmata gbasara hemochromatosis

Warder tọrọ ntọala Hemochromatosis Society of South Africa, na Canadian Hemochromatosis Society (CHS), ma bụrụ onye nchoputa na ogologo oge onye isi oche nke International Association of Hemochromatosis Societies (IAHS), na-ede akwụkwọ nkọwa
maka ha niile, nke pụtara na, n'oge ahụ, akwụkwọ ọ bụla nke Canadian Hemochromatosis Society nwere ihe odide ala ala peeji 'Emepụtara maka International Association of Haemochromatosis Societies'
Obodo hemochromatosis ọ bụla na-apụta ma ọ bụ na-eto eto n'akụkụ ụwa ndị ọzọ nweere onwe ya iji ihe ya, na nkwenye kwesịrị ekwesị na IAHS

Ka oge na-aga, Guy Fernau, bụ onye guzobere Haemochromatosis Society na United Kingdom, kọrọ otú, tupu e nwee ike ịkwadebe ihe nke ya, ọ bụ nanị na ọ dị ya mkpa inyocha akwụkwọ nta Canada ma gbanwee nsụgharị ya
A mụrụ Warder Marie van Zyl na Ficksburg, South Africa n'afọ 1927
Ọ lụrụ Tom Warder mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 na ọ dị afọ 21, mgbe ọ lọtara site n'ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ma mesịa soro ya kwaga Canada
A chọpụtara na Tom nwere hemochromatosis n'afọ 1975, a chọpụtakwara nwa ha nwanyị nwere otu ọrịa ahụ n'afọ 1979
Ihe omume abụọ a kpaliri Warder ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe ike, na-eme ka a mara banyere nsogbu a n'ime obodo ahụike na ọha mmadụ

A nụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke Warder ka ọ na-ekwu na ọ ga-abụrịrị na a mụrụ nwa ya nwoke nwere ink nke onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na veins ya maka ọrụ nta akụkọ ya malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu mgbe ọ meriri ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi edemede gbasara mpaghara nke onye nchịkwa malitere
nke ihe a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka 'Orange Free State' na South Africa
Isiokwu ọ họọrọ bụ 'The Natural Order of Lepidoptera' na ihe nrite bụ penny ọlaọcha Queen Victoria nke ụdị enyere ndị ogbenye kwesịrị ekwesị dịka akụkụ nke emume okpukpe a na-eme na Tọzdee tupu Ista

Na Febrụwarị 1939, ebe ọ deburu egwuregwu, Ihe Nzuzo nke Kennels maka mmemme ụmụaka SABC Young Ideas n'afọ gara aga, Warder malitere ide akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara, na-erere Cape Argus akụkọ mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 12
] N'afọ 1944, o nwere akụkọ abụọ e bipụtara na British magazin Everybody's na e mesịa dee maka ọtụtụ South Africa periodicals
Site na mgbe odi afọ iri na asaa ọ bụkwa onye isi akụkọ maka Germiston Advocate
N'ọrụ a, a kọrọ na Warder bụ onye nta akụkọ kacha nta n'ụwa
Warder nwere ohere ịgba ajụjụ ọnụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, Pat Boone, Field Marshal Jan Christiaan Smuts na Frances Steloff, onye nchoputa nke New York's Gotham Book Mart n'afọ 1920
A kacha mara ọrụ nta akụkọ Warder maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nta na akụkọ gbasara isiokwu gbasara hemochromatosis
Mgbe ọ ka bi na South Africa, Warder gara dee akụkọ ifo
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ iri abụọ na anọ, e dere n'asụsụ Bekee na Afrikaans ; atọ n'ime ha bụ ndị e ji mee ihe ruo afọ ụfọdụ ka a chọrọ ịgụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ South Africa
Ọtụtụ n'ime akụkọ ya na-ewere ọnọdụ n'ime na gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'ikpeazụ na 2003, Warder laghachiri na ide akwụkwọ akụkọ
Oké mmiri ozuzo na enweghị nchegharị… ewepụtara n'otu oge ihe na-erughị otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị

N'ọgwụgwụ 2010, Warder nọ na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ 23 ya ụdị emelitere nke Penny of the Morning Star, akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ deburu na South Africa na 1960 dịka akụkụ nke ọzụzụ ọzụzụ na Bekee dị ka asụsụ nke abụọ
Akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya, April na Portugal, wepụtara na mbubreyo May 2011, ọ na-edekwa usoro nke 'Little Kindle Tales for Little People'
N'afọa 1975, di Warder, Tom, onye na-arịa ọrịa siri ike kemgbe afọ asatọ, mechara chọpụta na ọ nwere hemochromatosis mgbe ọ dị afọiri ise0, wee nwụọ na 1992
'afọ 1979 nwa ha nwanyị, mgbe ahụiri atọ na abụọ2, a chọpụtara na hemochromatosis
Warder kwubiri na nsogbu ahụ bụ ihe nketa na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe a gwara ya banyere ya ezighi ezi ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ịmalite hemochromatosis n'ezie, ọ bụghịkwa naanị nsogbu nke etiti afọ
Warder mere ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ya ime ka ụwa mara maka nsogbu a, gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara Ida Clarkson na igwe onyonyo CHEK
N'ime ihe karịrị afọiri abụo na asatọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ma e wezụga maka usoro akụkọ njem, Warder tinyere mgbalị akwụkwọ ya na-arụ ọrụ gbasara hemochromatosis
N'oge a, o dere The Bronze Killer, nke mbụ raara onwe ya nye kpamkpam na isiokwu nke ọrịa mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa hemochromatosis

A na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'Bronze Killer' mee ihe, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, na Toronto Star, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Britain, na mgbakwunye magazin nke Johannesburg Sunday Express na na mbipụta Quebec French nke Reader's Digest, ebe ọ bụ
a na-akpọ ' La tueuse au masque du bronze '
A na-akpọ Hemochromatosis dị ka 'onye na-egbu ọla' na nchịkọta akụkọ Clement Finch, Prọfesọ nke Medicine Emeritus nke Mahadum Washington, na Western Journal of Medicine, Septemba 1990
Warder gara n'ihu chọta obodo hemochromatosis na South Africa na Canada
Warder ebipụtawokwa ihe karịrị narỊ atọ akụkọ gbasara hemochromatosis, yana akwụkwọ ndị ọrịa maka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ ọgwụ ndị ọzọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na broshuọ ya agaala ihe karịrị mba iri na isii

Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Warder abụrụla onye nkụzi, na-emepụta ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi mbụ nke Windsor House Academy, ụlọ akwụkwọ 'dual-medium' na Kempton Park, South Africa; na onye na-egwu egwu, na-akpọ piano na clavioline na ìgwè di ya
na, n'oge ndụ ya, onye ụkọchukwu dina n'ụlọ ọgwụ Delta dị na Ladner, British Columbia
Maka mbọ ya n'ịtọ ntọala CHS, onye isi obodo GJ Blair, nke Richmond, British Columbia nyere Warder asambodo ekele na 11 Eprel 1988 maka nkwado ya maka ọrụ afọ ofufo' n'obodo ahụ, otu afọ ka ọ gachara
Onye isi obodo mbụ na Canada na-akpọsa izu mmata kwa afọ maka Hemochromatosis
N'ime izu mmata mbụ, narị ise na iri abụọ na atọ ọhụrụ nke hemochromatosis ka a chọpụtara

N'afọ 2011, e nyere ya onyinye mmeri ndụ na International Bio-Iron Conference nke e mere na Vancouver, 'na-asọpụrụ itinye aka na ndụ ya na nraranye ya na ịmara Hemochromatosis gburugburu ụwa' Afọ ole na ole gara aga, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike na Canada kwupụtara May kwa afọ ka ọ bụrụ ọnwa nke Mgbasa Ozi Mba maka ọrịa a na-ahụkwa ya ugbu a site n'aka òtù dị iche iche na mba ndị ọzọ dịka ọmụmaatụ United States
Enyere Warder onyinye afọ ofufo Canada n'afọ 1991 site na Health and Welfare Canada maka ọrụ ya na nkwado nke ịkwalite mmata maka hemochromatosis
[lower-alpha 2]
Warder nwụrụ na 20 Ọktoba 2014
Hart Sonder Liefde and Penny of the Morning Star - the story of a girl reporter
Mariela de Jesús Viteri Velasco (amụrụ ya na Disemba 27, 1968) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Ecuador, onye na-ahụ maka redio, onye nduzi mgbasa ozi, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela ihe ngosi okwu dịka Simplemente Mariela, nke gbara oge iri na abụọ na Telecentro (nke bụ TC Televisión ugbu a)
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị na-azụ ahịa, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi mgbasa ozi nke Radio Fuego na magazin Revista Mariela
N'afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ ya Producciones de Fuego malitere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ MarielaTVcom na ọwa YouTube MarielaTV
A mụrụ Mariela Viteri na Bahía de Caráquez na Disemba 27, 1968, nne na nna ya bụ Mariana Velasco na Dr
Leonardo Viteri
O nwere ụmụnne anọ

Viteri malitere ọrụ telivishọn ya n'afọ 1989 na mmemme Telecentro Aplausos Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ya na Gerardo España kwadoro Música y Deportes na ọwa CableDeportes, na-agbaso usoro ajụjụ ọnụ na-adịghị mma na ndị mba na mba ụwa
Ọ ghọrọ isi ihu nke ihe ngosi ahụ mgbe España hapụrụ
N'afọ 1993, Viteri kwagara CRE Televisión (nke bụ Canal Uno ugbu a), ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ maka ihe ngosi Na 'que ver na Media hora con Mariela
Ná mmalite afọ 1994, o mepụtara mmemme Aquí Mariela na Teleamazonas, ebe e nyere ya ohere ịgba ndị si Ecuador na Spain ajụjụ ọnụ
Viteri laghachiri Telecentro na 1997 iji kwado La Hora de Mariela
Nke a nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala, ebe ọ bụ mmemme etiti ehihie n'akụkụ El Show de Bernard a ma ama
N'ihi arụmọrụ ya na-adịghị mma, Jorge Kronfle tụrụ aro usoro ajụjụ ọnụ ọhụrụ kwa izu, Simplemente Mariela
Nke a bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma, na-anọ n'ikuku maka oge iri na abụọ, ma na-edugakarị oge ya
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka ọtụtụ mmemme asọmpi, dị ka Escuela de famosos na 2011, Soy el mejor VIP n'afọ 2014, na Prueba de amor na 2019
N'afọ 2018, Viteri mere ihe nkiri na Ecuavisa telenovela Sharon la Hechicera [es], nke ọ na-akọ ndụ onye na-agụ egwu
N'akụkọ ahụ, Viteri na-eme Luz María, onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV Destellos, dabere na Luzmila Nicolalde, onye na-elekọta Chispazos
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na oge nke anọ nke ihe nkiri ezinụlọ atọ [es], na Ecuavisa

Viteri bụ nwanyị na-azụ ahịa, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Radio Fuego 1065 FM, nke e kere n'afọ 1995 ya na di ya mgbe ahụ Ricardo Mórtola, na nke Revista Mariela, malitere n'afọ 2006 dị ka onye nduzi maka ụmụ nwanyị na isiokwu nke nri, akparamaagwa, ajụjụ ọnụ, ntụrụndụ, na ejiji
N'afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ ya Producciones de Fuego malitere ikpo okwu weebụ MarielaTVcom, dị ka ụzọ maka magazin na ụlọ ọrụ redio
Ọwa YouTube ya nwere ọdịnaya dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị mmadụ sitere na ntụrụndụ n'okpuru aha Miércoles de MarielaTV, yana nri, ahụike, ịma mma, na ajụjụ ọnụ akparamaagwa na Mariela en Cabina

O dekọrọ obere abọm Krismas isii maka ọrụ ebere Que canten los niños, Ahora tengo más, Vive, Yo quiero ser como tú, La familia, na Amigos por Ecuador, nke ikpeazụ ya na Daniel Betancourth, Fausto Miño, David Reinoso [es], na Francisco Pinoargotti [es]
Mariem Alaoui Selsouli (Arabic, amụrụ na Julaị 8, na afọ 1984) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ n'etiti na ogologo oge
A mụrụ ya na Marrakech
Na afo 2009 World Athletics Final na Berlin, Selsouli si na 1500m ikpeazụ pụọ mgbe ọ dara ule ọgwụ maka EPO
IAAF kwụsịtụrụ ya afọ abụọ, site na Ougost 22, na afọ 2009 ruo ougustu 21, na afọ 2011
Na Julaị 23, na afọ 2012 a machibidoro ya iwu na Summer Olympics na London mgbe ọ nwalere na ọ bụ furosemide diuretic, na-eso asọmpi ya na Diamond league na Julaị 6, na afọ 2012 na Paris-Saint-Denis
A machibidoro ya iwu ọgwụ ọjọọ afọ asatọ site na 6 Julaị , na afọ 2012 ruo 24 Julaị, na afọ 2020
Mariem Ben Chaabane (Arabic, a mụrụ na Julaị 30, 1983) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya karịsịa maka ọrụ ya na usoro Tunisian Casting na Machair
A mụrụ Meriam Ben Chaabane n'abalị 30 nke ọnwa July, afọ 1983
N'afọ 2007 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sorbonne Nouvelle Paris 3 na nzere bachelọ na nka ihe nkiri
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ na-agba egwu ma na-abụ abụ Training, Ọ jikwaa ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2010, ndị Tunisian na-ege ntị chọpụtara Mariem na ọrụ ya nke Dorra mnawer na usoro Tunisia 'Casting'
Ma n'afọ 2012 ọ laghachiri n'ike n'ike na ọrụ ya na usoro Maktoub
Ọ nọ n'ihu magazin ndị mmadụ Tunivisions n'ọnwa Septemba 2012
N'afọ 2016, ọ pụtara na usoro abụọ nke a na-agbasa n'ọnwa Ramadan, Awled Moufida na Flashback, Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Woh! nke onye nduzi Tunisian Ismahane Lahmar

N'afọ 2019, Mariem Ben Chaabane rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Tunisian Machair nke onye nduzi Turkey bụ Muhammet Gok, ọ pụtara dịka Meriem 'Nwanyị na-alụ ọgụ nke nwere ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ ma nwee naanị ụbọchị olenaole fọdụrụ ndụ'
Usoro ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na mpaghara Maghreb n'oge Ramadan afọ 2019, ndị Tunisian na Maghreb na-ege ntị nwere mmasị na ọrụ ya
Marieme Faye Sall, nke a na-akpọkwa Marème Faye Sell, bụ onye Senegalese nke jere ozi dị ka nwanyị mbụ nke Senegal kemgbe afọ 2012
Sall, nwunye onye isi ala Macky Sall, bụ nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ nwere ihe nketa Senegalese zuru oke site na ọmụmụ na agbụrụ, dịka ndị atọ bu ya ụzọ bụ ndị agbụrụ French ma ọ bụ Lebanese
A mụrụ Faye Sall n'obodo Saint-Louis, Senegal, dị ka nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke ezinụlọ ya
Dị ka akụkọ ndụ ya si kwuo, ọ bụ onye Peule na Serer
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Saint-Louis tupu ya na ezinụlọ ya kwaga Diourbel, obodo dị na mpaghara Diourbel nke etiti Senegal
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị
Sall debanyere aha na Higher Institute of Technology na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop, ebe ọ gụrụ injinia eletrik, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ hapụrụ Cheikh Anta Diop mgbe amuchara nwa mbụ ya
Marieme Faye Sall zutere onye ga-abụ di ya, Macky Sall, n'afọ 1992 mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop n'afọ 1995 mgbe ọ lụsịrị di na nwunye na ọmụmụ nwa mbụ ya
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ
N'oge di ya na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'afọ 2012 megide onye isi ala Abdoulaye Wade Marieme Faye Sall rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na onye na-akwado ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ nọgidere na-anọghị na atụmatụ kwa ụbọchị nke Alliance for the Republic nke di ya
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ndị dị nso na Onye isi ala Wade gbalịrị igosi ya dị ka onye nwere oké ọchịchọ na onye na-asọpụrụ Chineke n'oge mkpọsa ahụ
Macky Sall meriri Onye isi ala Wade na ntuli aka nke e mere n'ọnwa Machị 25, 2012
Sall ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nke anọ nke Senegal n'ọnwa Eprel 2, 2012
Sall bụ nwanyị mbụ ojii na Senegal, nwanyị mbụ onye Alakụba, yana nwanyị mbụ Senegalese a mụrụ ma zụlite na mba ahụ
Ndị inyom mbụ na nke atọ nke Senegal, Colette Senghor na Viviane Wade (onye bu ụzọ Sal), si France, ebe onye bụbu onye isi ala Elizabeth Diouf, nwunye onye bụbu Onye isi ala Abdou Diouf
Ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị Senegal kpọrọ ya 'ezi nwanyị Senegalese'
Dibice Marieta Kouassi bụ onye Ivorian bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-aga n'ihu
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ivory Coast
Kouassi gbara Ivory Coast na ọkwa dị elu n'oge asọmpi asọmpi asọmpị ụmụ nwanyị nke Afrịka nke afọ 2008 (agba nke abụọ)

Marii Hasegawa (September 17, 1918 , July 1, 2012) bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo, nke a maara maka afọ iri ise ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Women's International League for Peace and Freedom, gụnyere ije ozi dị ka onye isi oche ya n'oge Agha Vietnam
Amụrụ Hasegawa na Hiroshima, Japan
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara na United States n'afọ 1919, mgbe e kenyere nna ya, onye ụkọchukwu Buddha, ije ozi na ndị Buddha na California
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum California, Berkeley na BA na akụ na ụba ụlọ n'afọ 1938
N'afọ 1942, gọọmentị US kpọchiri Hasegawa na ezinụlọ ya na Topaz War Relocation Center n'ihi Executive Order 9066
A kpọchiri ha n'ebe ahụ ruo afọ atọ, n'afọ 1945 a tọhapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ ma kwaga Philadelphia

Mgbe ọ nọ na Philadelphia, Hasegawa malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF), otu na-achọ udo nke na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke megidere n'ụzọ siri ike itinye ndị Japan America n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ma nyere aka ịkwaga ma gbanwee ndị Japan tọhapụrụ

Ọ ga-arụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche n'ime WILPF maka afọ iri ise sochirinụ, dị ka onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Ndị otu na Mgbasawanye ya site n'afọ 1960 ruo afọ 1965, onye ndụmọdụ ya na kọmitii site n'afọ 1965 ruo afọ 1968, na onye isi ala ya site n'afọ 1971 ruo afọ 1975
Onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ bụ n'oge Agha Vietnam
Hasegawa haziri ngagharị iwe megide agha ahụ ma duru ndị nnọchi anya udo na North Vietnam
Hawegawa natara onyinye Niwano Peace Prize na 1996
Ọ kwagara South Hadley, Massachusetts na 2001, ebe ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka udo na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti okpukpe ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa July 1, 2012
A kpọrọ ya otu n'ime Ọbá Akwụkwọ Virginia's Virginia Women in History n'afọ 2018
Marike de Klerk ( née Willemse ; 29 Maachị 1937 – 3 Disemba 2001) bụ nwunye mbụ nke South Africa, dịka nwunye onye isi ala steeti Frederik Willem de Klerk, site na 1989–1994
Ọ bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Party na-achịbu n'aka nke ya
Egburu De Klerk n'ụlọ ya na Cape Town n'afọ 2001
A mụrụ Marike Willemse n'ime ezinụlọ Africaner nke etiti dị na Pretoria
Nna ya, Wilhelm Willemse, bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na onye edemede
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke Social Pathology na nkà mmụta uche na Mahadum Pretoria
Willemse zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, FW de Klerk, na Mahadum Potchefstroom (ebe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ maka akara mmụta na azụmahịa )
Di na nwunye ahụ mechara lụọ ma mụta ụmụ atọ ọnụ; Jan, Willem, na Susan
N'afọ 1983, a katọrọ de Klerk n'elu ihe o kwuru banyere obodo Colored 'Ị maara, ha bụ otu ọjọọ
na-abụghị onye
Ha bụ ndị fọdụrụ mgbe e dochara mba dị iche iche
Ha bụ ndị ọzọ'
N'afọ 1991 ọ banyere na ihe nkiri nkeonwe mgbe ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South Africa kpughere na nwa ya nwoke, Willem nọ na mmekọrịta dị ogologo ọnwa 18 na nwanyị nwere agba, Erica Adams
Adams bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nna ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka Labour Party
Ihụnanya Willem na Erica kpasuru Marike bụ isi akụkọ nke Sunday Times bipụtara
A kọrọ na Willem nọ na nrụgide sitere n'aka nne ya ka ọ kwụsị mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị dị n'etiti agbụrụ, di na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị njikọ ha na 1992 na Willem lụrụ nwanyị ọzọ n'afọ na-esote
De Klerk mechara enweghị obi ụtọ maka nhazi ụlọ n'oge mgbanwe South Africa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ebubere ya na mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị na 1994, ya na onye isi ala ga-anọ n'ụlọ Libertas na Nelson Mandela ga-ebikwa n'ụlọ ọzọ a maara dị ka onyeisi oche
Mandela mechara kwuo na ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya bụ ANC nọ na-arụgide ya ka ọ biri na Libertas
Ya mere, de Klerks ga-akwaga na Presidency
Mandela gwaziri de Klerks na ndị ọrụ ibe ha chọrọ iji onyeisi oche maka ihe ndị ọzọ
Ya mere, ha kwagara na Overvaal, ebe obibi mbụ nke ndị nchịkwa Transvaal
Overvaal chọrọ nnukwu nrụzigharị ma de Klerk were iwe na Mandela mere nyocha nkeonwe iji kpebie ihe ụlọ chọrọ, ụgwọ nke ngalaba ọrụ ọha ga-ezute
FW de Klerk mechara kwuo, sị 'O wutere ya nke ukwuu maka igbubi na mgbanwe niile ọ kọwara dị ka mbọ Mandela n'onwe ya gbakọrọ iji weda anyị ala
Mweda n'ala ọhụrụ a ghọrọ nke ukwuu nke na o iloli
Ọ bịara katọọ Mandela nke ukwuu ma ọ laghị azụ ikwupụta nkatọ ya' Ndị de Klerks mechara gaa nraranye Mandela dị ka onye isi ala na Union Buildings na Pretoria
Melanie Verwoerd ga-emesị kọọ na de Klerk bụ naanị onye nọ ọdụ na ụlọ ngosi ọha juru ebe niile ka Mandela banyere n'ime ụlọ na ndị gbara ya gburugburu bilie ma kụọ aka
Otu onye omeiwu rịọrọ nwunye mbụ ahụ ka o kweta emume ahụ 'Bilie Marike, ị na-akparị mmadụ!', mana de Klerk nọrọ ọdụ wee legide MP anya
N'afọ 1994, FW de Klerk malitere mmekọrịta ya na Elita Georgiades, nwunye Tony Georgiades, onye na-ebufe ụgbọ mmiri Gris bụ onye boro ebubo nyere de Klerk na nkwado ego nke National Party
Alụmdi na nwunye FW na Marike biri n'afọ 1996 na FW na-ekwupụta na ụbọchị Valentine na ya bu n'obi ịgba alụkwaghịm nwunye ya nke afọ 37
Marike megidere ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ 'Ọ bụrụ na ị gbanwee obi gị, m ga- agbaghara ihe niile - ruo ugboro 70 ugboro asaa' Agbanyeghị, FW zara ya, sị “Eji m n'aka maka mkpebi m
Kwụsị inwe olileanya' FW de Klerk lụrụ Georgiades otu izu ka ya na Marike gbara alụkwaghịm
N'afọ 2000, ọ nwekwuru ọgba aghara mmetụta uche mgbe mmekọrịta ya na onye chọrọ ịlụ na onye ọchụnta ego bụ Johan Koekemoer, dara
Mgbe ndị mgbasa ozi kpughere na ọ na-eche ihu n'ịgba ụgwọ ego na-abịanụ, de Klerk gbachitere onye chọrọ ịlụ, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ụjọ jidere ya wee lelee ụlọ ọgwụ Pretoria
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, ọ dara ịda mbà n'obi
N'oge di ya na-achị, Marike bụ onye isi otu nku ụmụ nwanyị National Party
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Women's Outreach Foundation (WOF), otu nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo
Na 1990 de Klerk kpọrọ oku ka ụmụ nwanyị na-ekere òkè na-arụsi ọrụ ike na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1993, e nyere ya ihe nrite nwanyị maka udo na Geneva, Switzerland maka ịkwalite ọdịmma na mmepe ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo
N'afọ 1994, de Klerk na ndị òtù ya gara United States maka njem mmụta ọhụrụ na Los Angeles nke e mere iji nwee mmasị na ndị Africa-America na sayensị
WOF na-anọkarị na akụkọ na afọ mgbe 1990s maka ịkatọ nrụrụ aka n'etiti ndị isi ANC
Agha okwu dị n'etiti pati na-achị achị na onye bụbu nwunye onyeisiala dara mgbe pati ahụ chụrụ ya dịka 'onye obi ilu na-enweghị ike ịkweta n'eziokwu na ọ bụbu nwunye mbụ nke obodo a'
N'afọ 1998, de Klerk bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya, Njem N'oge Summer na Winter, nke ọ nyochara alụmdi na nwunye ya nke afọ iri atọ na itoolu na FW de Klerk
Akwụkwọ ahụ mechara nweta ama ama mgbe ọ pụtachara na FW enyochala otu isiakwụkwọ na-ekwu maka obi mgbawa ya mgbe ọ chọpụtachara ihe di ya na Elita Georgiades nwere
Mgbe e mesịrị de Klerk bipụtara Ebe Ebe Sun na-enwu ọzọ ebe ọ na-enye nduzi nye ụmụ nwanyị na-eche ịgba alụkwaghịm mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ
Na 3 Disemba 2001, e gburu de Klerk n'ụlọ ya Dolphin Beach na Blouberg, Cape Town
Na mbụ a kọrọ na onye bụbu onye isi ala gburu onwe ya
Onye gburu ya, Luyanda Mboniswa dị afọ , rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eche nche n'ụlọ nchekwa okomoko ebe de Klerk bi
Mboniswa ji ike jide Klerk n'olu, gbajie ọtụtụ ọkpụkpụ n'akpịrị ya wee mee ka arịa ọbara gbawaa n'anya ya
Achọtara mma steak gbanyere n'azụ ya ma mekwara ọtụtụ mmerụ ahụ n'isi
A tọhapụrụ Mboniswa maka ebubo idina mmadụ n'ike mana onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa enweghị ike iwepụ nbanye

Di ya gara aga, n'oge achọpụtara ahụ ya, nọ na Stockholm maka emume na narị afọ nke Nobel Peace Prize, ma laghachi na South Africa ngwa ngwa iji nye nkwupụta na-ekwu 'Amụtala m na nnukwu ihe ijuanya na mwute nke ọnọdụ ọnwụ dị egwu nke nwunye m mbụ Marike' Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, mgbe ahụ di ya bụ Nelson gbara alụkwaghịm, kwuru okwu n'oge olili ozu mbụ nke First Lady na Pretoria, na-ekwu; 'Dịka nwanyị, a na m achọpụta na ike ọgwụgwụ nke ihe mmetụta uche ya na-enyere aka ịkpụzi ọrụ di ya' Ọ họọrọ ịga olili ozu de Klerk karịa olili ozu ANC stalwart Joe Modise
De Klerk nyefere ụmụ ya ala na ihe onwunwe R2 nde ya
A mara Luyanda Mboniswa ikpe maka igbu ọchụ de Klerk ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ ndụ

Marilyn Nance (amụrụ na Nọvemba 12, 1953), nkè a makwaara dị ka Soulsista, bụ onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi ọtụtụ ndị Afrịka na America na-elekwasị ányà n'ịchọpụta njikọ mmadụ, ime mmụọ, na iji teknụzụ na ịkọ akụkọ
E bipụtara foto ya na Life, The New York Times, The Village Voice, Essence, na New York Newsday

Ọrụ Nance dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Smithsonian National Museum of American Art, Museum of Fine Arts Houston na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture's Preservation of the Black Religious Heritage Project
A mụrụ Nance na New York City na Nọvemba 12, 1953, ma too na Brooklyn
Nne ya bụ ónyé na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na nna ya bụ ónyé ọrụ elevator na post ọfịs dị n'ógbè ahụ

Nance gàrà Mahadum New York (1971-1972), na-amụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, tupu ọ nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na nkwukọrịta na eserese eserese site na Pratt Institute (1972-1976) na Masters of Fine Arts site na Maryland Institute College of Art, (1996) yana ị gụchaa na ITP, New York University's Interactive Telecommunications Program (1998)
Ọ bụ ónyé mbụ n'ezinụlọ ya ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
Marilyn Chinwenwa Okoro (mụrụ 23 Septemba 1984 na London) bụ onye na agbara obodo Britain ihe egwụregwụ ọsọ
Ọ gbara onye atọ na ọsọ egwụregwụ a n'akpọ IAAF Wọldụ Atileti na afọ abụọ pụkụ na asaa, ya na afọ pụkụ abụọ na asatọ
ọ so na ndi ritara ọla nchara na egwuregwu ọsọ nke a n'akpọ 'Wọldụ Champiọnshipụ' na afọ pụkụ abụọ na asaa
Ọ nọchitere anya ndi nụkwụ obodo Briteni
Marina Paule Ewodo (amụrụ na June 24, 1998) bụ onye French-Cameroonian basketball player
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Saint-Amand Hainaut Basket na French Ligue maka ụmụ nwanyị na otu egwuregwu basketball nke Cameroon
Marina gara LJ Mermoz Montpellier High School
O meriri onye mmeri nke France na School Sport 2014 na osote onye mmeri ya na French Championship 2016
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka UC Riverside Highlanders, n'afọ mbụ ya, ọ nwetara akara abụọ, 16 nyere aka na 13 rebounds
O nwere egwuregwu kachasị elu nke 11 na UC Irvine Anteaters
N'afọ nke abụọ ya na 2017-18 Season, ọ nwetara akara 56, 22 nyere aka na 54 rebounds
N'afọ nke atọ ya, ọ nwetara akara 119, 29 nyere aka na 69 rebounds n'oge oge 2018 na afọ 2018
N'oge ikpeazụ ya, O nwetara akara 109, 22 nyere aka na 82 rebounds n'oge oge 2018 na 1919
Marina na-egwuri egwu maka Saint-Amand Hainaut Basket na FranceO sonyere na 2021 EuroCup nke umunwaanyi ebe ọ nwetara akara abụọ, 07 rebounds na 03 assists
O nwetara akara 22, 16 rebounds na 03 nyere aka na 2020-21 Ligue Féminine de Basketball oge
Marina nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Cameroon na Afrobasket ụmụ nwanyị nke 2021
Ọ nwetara akara 86, 44 rebounds na 14 assists
A kpọrọ aha ya na Tournaments All Star squad
Marina bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon bụ Narcisse Ewodo
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere bụ Yohana Isabelle Ewodo na-egwu basketball ndị ntorobịa maka otu ndị France
Marina Pellizzer (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1972) bụ onye Ịtali na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị ,ọ na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye na-agba n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ịtali
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na UEFA Women's Euro 2001
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Foroni Verona na Ịtali
Marina van Zyl bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa site na Democratic Alliance na onye otu National Assembly of South Africa
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, ọ sonyeere Kọmitii na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi
Marinel Sumook Ubaldo (1997) bụ onye Filipinos na-ahụ maka ihu igwe si mba Philippines nke nyere aka ịhazi ọgbaghara ihu igwe nke ndị ntorobịa mbụ na mba ya

Ọ gbara akaebe dị ka onye akaebe obodo maka Commission on Human Rights nke Philippines dị ka akụkụ nke nyocha ha banyere ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na ma enwere ike iwere mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe dị ka mmebi nke ikike mmadụ nke Philippines
A mụrụ Ubaldo na 1997 site nye nna bụ onye ọkụ azụ na Matarinao, Salcedo, Eastern Samar
Ubadio mụtara banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe na mbelata ihe ize ndụ ọdachi n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2012
Ubaldo bụbụ onye ndú ndị ntorobịa na Plan International, otu na-achọ ịkwalite ụmụaka na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'ọrụ a, Ubaldo na-ekwu na ọ zụrụ ndị otu mpaghara na ihe kpatara okpomọkụ ụwa
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, Typhoon Haiyan wetara ifufe ruru 275 km / h (170 mph) na ebili mmiri ruru 15 m (45 ft), karịsịa na-emetụta mpaghara dị ala nke Philippines
Ihe karịrị mmadụ pụkụ isii nwụrụ na ọdachi ahụ ebe mmadụ pụkụ ịrị abụọ na asatọ merụrụ ahụ
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ekwuola na ihe omume ihu igwe siri ike dị ka ajọ ifufe a, na-akawanye njọ ma ọ bụ mee ka o yikarịrị ka ọ ga-abụ site na ịrị elu okpomọkụ ụwa
N'ịbụ onye nwere mmetụta nke Typhoon Haiyan, Ubaldo gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ihu igwe ya, na-agba gọọmentị ume maka nsogbu mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'afọ 2015, Ubaldo nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Leyte Normal iji nweta nzere Bachelor of Science in Social Work ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019
Ubaldo na-akwado maka mmachibido iwu na plastik a na-eji eme ihe otu ugboro, mbelata nke ikuku carbon na itinye ego na ike na-agbanwe agbanwe

N'afọ 2015, Ubaldo kwuru okwu na United Nations (UN) Climate Conference ebe o kwuru na ọ dị mma iche echiche banyere anyị, chee echiche banyere ọgbọ ndị na-abịa ga-ata ahụhụ n'ihi na i meghị mkpebi n'oge
Ubaldo ekwuola na ịlụso mgbanwe ihu igwe ọgụ bụ ebumnuche nke ndụ m
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtakwara na ihe ngosi nke Christoph Schwaiger duziri
Aha ihe nkiri ahụ bụ Girl and Typhoons
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, Ubaldo gara mmemme ọzụzụ nke ndị isi ihu igwe na Yokohama, Japan, nke Al Gore guzobere
Ọ kwukwara okwu na mahadum dị iche iche nke Japan
Ubaldo kwuru na
Mba ụwa mbụ[nwere ike] ịkwụsị ịkwalite mgbanwe ihu igwe, ma gbanwee omume azụmahịa ka e wee belata ikuku carbon gị
Mba ndị a kwesịrị ịbụ ndị na-aza ajụjụ
Ọ bụ ihe na-ezighị ezi maka ndị mmadụ, maka mba ndị dị ka Philippines, ịta ahụhụ site na ihe anyị na-akpata
Ubaldo na-ekwu na ekwesighi ikwe ka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala mee ka ha kwuo mmeghachi omume na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ ka nwere nchekwube na enwere ike ịmepụta atụmatụ iji belata mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, ọ gbara akaebe na Kọmitii Senate nke United States na-ege ntị na mmekọrịta mba ọzọ nke akpọrọ 'Ịlụ ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia na Pacific'
Ubaldo na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Mmekọrịta Ndị Ntorobịa na Living Laudato Siʹ Philippines
Mario Gully nke a makwaara dị ka OMG
bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, onye mepụtara usoro akwụkwọ na-eme ihe ọchị Ant
Arcana Studios bu ụzọ buru Ant ma mesịa kwaga Image Comics ebe ọ ga-emeso isiokwu ndị okenye, na-eduga n'ihe omume ebe Gully ga-arịọ mgbaghara màkà ihe nkiri na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị ga-aga ọzọ na Big City Comics ebe e bipụtara mbipụta atọ ọzọ
Mario Gully mechara si n'ọdọ mmiri Independent nke ndị na-eme ihe ọchị gaa n'ihu ma dọrọ maka Marvel Comics
Njikọ ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere Matt Nixon, JScott Campbell, Joe Benitez, Roy Thomas, na Thomas Riviere, Mario Gully rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese onyinyo
Ọ dọtkwara Marvel Illustrated Treasure Island nké ónyé édémédé a ma ama bụ Roy Thomas kwadoro ónyé ya na ya ga-arụkwa ọrụ na mgbanwe nke Kidnapped, Marvel Adventures Hulk, na Exiles
Ant bụ usoro akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị nke Mario Gully mepụtara
Ant bụ akụkọ banyéré nwá agbọghọ na-aghọta ụwa ndị okenye ngwa ngwa karịa ụmụaka ndị ọzọ
Mgbè ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya na-emegbu ya, ọ na-ekpebi ịmepụta ụwa efu na akwụkwọ eserese ma mepụta dike, Ant
Dị ka Gully si kwuo,
Mario Gully sonyeere Roy Thomas, onye edemede na ónyé bụbu ónyé ísì nchịkọta akụkọ Marvel, wee bipụta akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na-atọ ọchị a na-akpọ Kidnapped
Kidnapped bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe méré eme nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu nke Thomas webatara ya n'ime usoro akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị
Kidnapped bụ banyéré nwa okorobịa dị afọ iri na isii nke nwanne nnà ya manyere ịbanye n'ụgbọ mmiri ma gaa njem
Thomas na Gully bu n'uche akụkọ ihe méré eme nke afọ niile
Gully aghaghị ime ka ụdị nka ya kwekọọ n'ụdị nka ógè ochie ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ime ihe osise ochie
Thomas kwuru na ọ ga-amasị ya ka ya na Gully laghachi ọzọ màkà ọrụ ọzọ
Treasure Island bụ akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị nke Gully rụrụ ọrụ na ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise

'O nwèrè ihe e bipụtara na mbụ n'ụdị magazin dị ka Marvel Illustrated Treasure Island, $ 1-6 Mmadụ iri na ise n'obi nwoke ahụ nwụrụ anwụ - yo-ho-ho na karama rum!' Site na egwu egwu a na-emegharị n'ụsọ oké osimiri England, Billy Bones dị omimi na-ewebata Jim Hawkins na-eto eto n'ime ụwa a na-atụghị ányá ya nke ihe ize ndụ na njem na Treasure Island dị ányá, nke anwụrụ ọkụ kpuchiri
N'elu ya niile, onyinyo dị elu nkè ónyé na-agba ọsọ a ma ama n'ime ha niile - Long John Silver, ónyé na-eme atụmatụ, onye na'amaghị ama, na ónyé dị mgbagwoju anya - site na jaket ájá azụ
Ọrụ Comics gụnyere

Mario Mendell Winans (ónyé a mụrụ Brown; amụrụ n'August 29, 1974) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke a maara nke ọma maka egwu 2004 ya 'I Don't Wanna Know', nke ruru ọnụọgụ 2 na United States na ọnụọgụ 1 na United Kingdom
Winans nwetakwara Grammy Award maka Best Gospel Performance màkà ide egwu CeCe Winans 'Pray'
Mario Winans dekọrọ abọm nké abụọ ya Hurt No More na 2001, 2002, na 2003 n'etiti ịrụ ọrụ na ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ
Abọm ahụ dabeere na akụkọ ịhụnanya na aghụghọ

Otu egwu mbụ 'I Don't Wanna Know' dabeere na ihe nlele nke egwu egwu Fugees '1996 'Ready or Not', nke n'onwe ya dabeere na nnwale dị ala nke egwu egwu 'Boadicea' nke Enya sitere na abọm ya nke aha ya na 1987
Enya na ndị nnọchi anya ya gwara Winans na P
Diddy ee maka nkwado ya maka ihe nnwale ahụ
Ọbụna o dekọrọ Boadicea màkà abụ ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na Winans amaghị na nnwale Fugees o ji mee ihe bụ nnwale n'onwe ya
Ọbụna ha nyèrè Enya onwé ya otuto màkà egwu ahụ dị ka 'Mario Winans featuring P
Diddy and Enya'
Abụ ahụ gosipụtara rap nke P
Diddy

A tọhapụrụ egwu ahụ dị ka otu na mbido afọ 2004 wee bụrụ ihe a ma ama n'ụwa niile, na-eru nọmba 1 na Germany na United Kingdom na chaatị redio 40 kachasị elu na United States; na nọmba 2 na Hot 100 na chaatụ R&B / Hip-Hop; na nọmba 3 na chaatọ ndị Australia na Norwegian
O rutekwara n'elu iri na chaatị ndị Europe
Marion Barron onye amụrụ na abalị iri-abụọ na asatọ nke onwa atọ n'afo 1958, bụ Omee nke Scottish
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ amaara gụnyere Dont Wait Up (1983) na Screen Two (1985)
Á mụrụ Marion Barron n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na asato nke ọnwa Maachị 1958 na British Naịjirịa
O tolitere na Dumfries, Scotland
Ọ pụtakwara na Screen Two na The Bill
Marion lụrụ Simon ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ogo Barron dị 5 '5 '(165 m)
Marion Hamilton ọtụtụ mmadụ ma
Marion Molteno (amụrụ Bloemfontein, na afo 1944) bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye edemede na-enweta ihe nrite, onye akụkọ ifo ya na-adọta mmụọ site na oke ọdịnala nke ahụmịhe ndụ ya

Ọ hapụrụ South Afrika ka o tinyechara aka na mkpesa ụmụ akwụkwọ megide ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, biri na Zambia afọ asatọ, na kemgbe afo 1977 bi na London, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na obodo nta na ndị na-achọ mgbaba
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ndụmọdụ na Save the Children, na-akwado ọrụ na ụmụaka na-adịghị ike n'ofe ụwa
Ọ na-edezi ọrụ onye ọkà mmụta Urdu Ralph Russell
Ìhè na-ejighị n'aka (2015) ka edepụtara aha maka International Indie Book Awards, afo 2016, na International Rubery Book Awards nke afo 2017
N'ịbụ nke etinyere na Central Asia n'ihi agha obodo, ọ na-egosipụta ndụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe mba ụwa na ọgba aghara mmadụ

Alastair Niven, onye ọka ikpe nke Man Booker Prize maka afo 2014, kọwara ya dị ka 'akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akpali akpali ma dịkwa mkpa', onye na-ere akwụkwọ na-akpọkwa ya 'ihe na-adọrọ adọrọ nke ukwuu, na-ekwu okwu na nwayọ na-emetụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ụwa na mmekọrịta na-ejikọta ọnụ'
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ike ịga ije, ị nwere ike ịgba egwu (1999 ) nweta ihe nrite Commonwealth Writers maka akwụkwọ kacha mma na mpaghara Afrika
N'afọ 2017, akwụkwọ Niyogi dị na India weghachiri ya, ebe e depụtara ya ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Atta Galatta Bangalore Literary Festival
Ọ na-esote otu nwa agbọghọ na-agbapụ n'ihe egwu nke ụlọ mkpọrọ na South Afrika, na mba na omenala, ịchọta ihe ọhụrụ maka ndụ ya site na egwu

Onye na-ede egwú Diana Burrell kpọrọ ya 'akwụkwọ na-akpali akpali nke na-akwado ike egwu dị ka asụsụ zuru ụwa ọnụ, onye na-agwọ ọrịa, ngwá ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị - eri nke na-ejikọta ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ na omenala na kọntinent'
Boyd Tonkin, onye na-enyocha maka The Independent, kọwara ya dị ka 'oké ọchịchọ ma na-ejide
nchọpụta dị egwu nke ihe egwu nwere ike ịpụta na ndụ
ejiri zest nke na-eme ka ọtụtụ n'ime cacophony nke afọ a nke akụkọ ifo egwu egwu'
Ebe dị mfe karị (2007 ) ka edobere na obere ụwa nke Isles of Scilly, n'akụkụ ụsọ oké osimiri nke Cornwall
Ọ bụ akụkọ banyere ndị bịara n'agwaetiti ndị ọhụrụ, dọtara n'ihe yiri ndụ dị mfe n'ebe e kere eke gọziri ma o doro anya na ebipụ ya na nrụgide ala; ma mgbagwoju anya nke ha na-eso ha
Shield of Coolest Air (1992) meriri ihe nrite David St John Thomas maka akụkọ ifo
Ọ gbasara mmekọrịta enyi dị n'etiti nne abụọ na-eto eto, ndị otu n'ime ha bụ onye Somalia gbapụrụ n'agha obodo mana enweghị ike ịkpọrọ ụmụ ya niile pụọ

Onye edemede Ijipt bụ Nawal el Saadawi kwuru na ọ bụ 'akụkọ ifo mara mma, na-ekpughe ihe ndị zoro ezo' Onye nyocha nke Independent na Sọnde kwuru, sị 'Molteno emeela nke ọma ume ndụ n'ime agwa ya nke na anyị ga-aghọta nke ọma adịghị ike ha, ọnụma ha, mwute ha na nkwụsi ike ha dị ịtụnanya'
A Language in Common (1987) bụ nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirisi na-egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị South Asia na UK, ndị mbata na ọgbọ mbụ na-ezukọ na klas Bekee

Onye ode akwụkwọ Pakistan Ahmed Rashid kpọrọ ya 'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi pụrụ iche - otu n'ime mbọ mbụ ịgbagha n'akụkọ ifo banyere oke mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị Britain ọcha na ndị Eshia' Addenda, New Zealand weghachiri ya na afo 2000, ebe New Zealand Herald kọwara Molteno dị ka 'onye edemede enweghị nkọwa, onye ọmịiko na eziokwu na-enwu'
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwu okwu ọha nwere ahụmahụ wee gwa ndị na-ege ntị n'ofe UK, New Zealand, India na Pakistan okwu banyere ihe odide ya
Ọ mụtara Urdu site n'aka ọkà mmụta na onye ntụgharị okwu, Ralph Russell, ma soro ya rụọ ọrụ afọ 26 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afo 2008

Ugbu a ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ ya, na-ewepụta mbipụta ọhụrụ nke ọrụ ya, ma na-eji nsụgharị ya ewebata akwụkwọ Urdu nye ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị, gụnyere na Poetry Translation Center, London na Royal Asiatic Society, London
Mbipụta ọhụrụ nke ọrụ agụmagụ Ralph Russell, nke ya deziri yana okwu mmalite ya, bụ
O bipụtala akụkọ gbasara ọrụ ya na The Annual of Urdu Studies na ebe ndị ọzọ wee dezie akụkọ ndụ ya

O nwere akara ugo mmụta na akụkọ ihe mere eme site na Mahadum Cape Town, nzere post-gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ịkụzi Bekee sitere na Mahadum Manchester, MA na nkuzi Asụsụ Modern site na Institute of Education, Mahadum London, wee mụọ Urdu na School of Ọmụmụ Oriental na Africa

N'ime ogologo oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na agụmakwụkwọ ọ kụzirila site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara ruo n'agụmakwụkwọ ndị okenye, zụrụ ndị nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme na asụsụ, akwụkwọ ndị e dere maka ndị nkuzi, mepụta usoro ọmụmụ ọhụrụ maka nzaghachi mgbanwe n'ime ọha mmadụ, hazie klas Bekee maka ndị okenye ọhụrụ na Britain, na mkpọsa
maka asụsụ ndị otu pere mpe ka a ga-akụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ UK
Na nzaghachi maka mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-achọ mgbaba na Britain na mmalite 1990s ọ tọrọ ntọala South London Refugee Project
O hibere wee na-aga n'ihu na-ejikwa Live Lives Press, nke na-ebipụta akụkọ ndụ dị mkpirikpi nke ndị bịara UK dịka ndị okenye
Ọ nwere ọkwa dị elu na Save the Children, wee gaa ihe karịrị mba 30 iji soro ndị ọrụ mmemme rụọ ọrụ

Dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ izizi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dabere na onye ndụmọdụ mmụta, ọ kpọkọtara ahụmịhe nke mmemme agụmakwụkwọ n'ofe ụwa niile, iji wepụta akwụkwọ dị iche iche nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ dị iche iche nke ndị na-eme ya na-eji ọtụtụ ebe
Mbipụta na agụmakwụkwọ & mmepe mba ụwa gụnyere
Di ya bụ Robert Molteno, onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ na onye nduzi nke Zed Books
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, ọ bụkwa nne ochie na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Blọọgụ Molteno na marionmoltenocouk
Marion Sampler bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe
A maara Sampler nke ọma maka ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe osise Black mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta azụmahịa
A mụrụ Sampler na 1920 na Anniston, Alabama
Nna ya bụ onye na-ese ihe, Sampler n'onwe ya malitere agụmakwụkwọ na nka n'oge ọ dị obere na Cincinnati
Sampler wee kwaga California, debanye aha na Jepson Art Institute na 1953
Mgbe emesiri, ọ gụrụ na California Institute of the Arts
Sampler gara Mahadum nke Southern California, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na 1955
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Southern California, Sampler malitere ịkụzi nka na Fremont High School na Los Angeles
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa, Sampler gara n'ihu ịkụzi na Fremont High School
N'afọ 1956, Sampler sonyeere otu ndị nduzi imepụta ihe nke Saul Bass, Norm Gollin, Louis Danziger, na Milton Zolotow mepụtara
Ebumnuche mmemme ahụ bụ inyere ndị na-acha uhie uhie aka ịchọta ọrụ na ọzụzụ na eserese
Sampler bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe mbụ ritere uru site n'òtù ahụ
Ọ sonyeere Los Angeles County Museum of Art's design and typography program n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 1957, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu Victor Gruen and Associates were Sampler n'ọrụ; ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị Black mbụ na-ese ihe osise iji rụọ ọrụ na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na Los Angeles
N'afọ 1963, Sampler ghọrọ onye isi nke ngalaba eserese eserese, ebe ọ ga-anọgide na-arụ ọrụ ruo afọ 20
N'afọ 1973, e nyere Gruen & Associates nkwekọrịta imepụta ma wuo South Coast Plaza, ụlọ ahịa dị na Orange County, California
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tụrụ aro ka e wuo ihe dị ka dome ebe anyanwụ ga-esi wee weta ihe dị ka akụkụ nke ụlọ ahịa ahụ
Marion Sampler chepụtara dome, na-ahọrọ iji ugegbe na-acha odo odo mepụta ugegbe dome n'elu ụlọ
Sampler gara n'ihu na-emepụta maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa
E nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta njirimara njirimara maka ụlọ ahịa ahụ dị ka eserese gburugburu ebe obibi, akara ngosi, na mgbidi tebụl
N'etiti afọ 1980, Sampler hapụrụ Gruen & Associates wee soro Anita Berry malite ụlọ ọrụ mmewe nke ya, Anita Berry na Marion Sampler Design
O mechara malite imepụta ihe osise yana ọrụ imepụta ihe
A maara Sampler maka ojiji ọ na-eji geometry na ọdịdị
Ụdị mbinye aka ya gosipụtara ọdịdị geometric na-egbuke egbuke nke a na-etinye n'ime nhazi dị ka grid
Sampler nwere mmasị na triangles na triangular, nke a na-ahụ n'ọtụtụ atụmatụ azụmahịa ya yana ihe osise ya
Usoro keere òkè dị mkpa na usoro ime ihe oyiyi nke Sampler, ebe ọ bụ na nke a bụ isiokwu na-apụta ugboro ugboro na atụmatụ ya
Ndị na-emepụta ihe mkpuchi ojii na Southern America nwere mmetụta na Sampler, ọkachasị na-ezo aka n'ụdị nnụnụ ha na-efe efe n'ụdị triangular ya
E chefuru ọrụ Sampler n'ụzọ dị ukwuu mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya n'oge ndụ ya, ma mara ya nke ọma n'etiti ndị na-emepụta ihe na Los Angeles na New York, Sampler enweela obere nkwenye mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
E depụtara Sampler na akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu ole na ole nke ndị Black na-ese ihe
E tinyekwara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Los Angeles County Museum of Art California Design, 1930-1965 Living in a Modern Way
A na-enwe anọ n'ime ọrụ Sampler na nchịkọta nke California African American Museum
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya dị na Metropolitan Museum of Art
Ewezuga obere ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ, ọrụ ya kpuchiri n'ụzọ dị ukwuu, na New York Times na Design Observer na-akọwa ya dị ka 'echefuru echefu'
Marisa Bosman (amụrụ na abali ato onwa Mee 1980), nke onye obula maara dịka Marisa Drummond, bụ onye mba South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ngosiputa ya na ihe nkiri Elke Skewe Pot, Stom na Isidingo
A mụrụ ya na abali ato n' onwa Mee afo 1980 na Bloemfontein, South Africa
Ọ nwetara nzere BA na Drama na Theatre Arts na Mahadum nke Free State
Ebe o mechara kwaga Johannesburg ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri ya
Ọ lụrụ Christopher Drummond
Mgbe o mụsịrị nwa ya Annabel, ọ dara mbà n'obi bu onodu na-eso omumu nwal(PND)
N'ime afọ atọ ikpeazụ ya, ọ malitere nwenwe obi mmafu, mgbako mmiri na nsogbu nke akuru
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ịmụ nwa izu atọ tupu oge eruo ma nwee ịwa ahụ na mberede
Ọrụ mbụ ya dị mkpa na ihe onyonyo sitere na kykNET sitcom Hester & Ester Bester
N'ime usoro ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ gosiputara agwa 'Ester', onye nkuzi ịgba egwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwu Marthur Curry
Usoro a ghọrọ ihe a ma ama ma mesịa puta n' ngalaba ihe omume iri ise na abụọ na 2010
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn dịka kykNET soapie Villa Rosa na usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 Geraamtes
E mere ya ka ọ pụta dịka onye ọbịa na ihe omume nke usoro njem SABC2 Mooiloop! inn 2013
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn dị ka Begeertes, Dof en Dilly Poppie na Sterlopers
Ewezuga i puta n' onyonyo,o gosiputala onwe ya n' otutu ihe emume ejije di iche iche dika Uda egwu, Nwanyi ocha nkem, Fiddler on the Roof nakwa Ons vir Jou
O gosiputakwara onwe na Broadway Theater production Thoroughly Modern Millie
N' afo 2016, o meputara aka oru nke aka ya na short Spoor(loos)
N' otu afo ahu, o sonyere n' emume onyonyo tv n' ewu ewu bu Fluiters
O biakwa gosiputa onwe ya n' ngala emume onyonyo soapie bu Isidingo ebe o gosiputara agwa 'Kimberly Lewis-Haines'
O gosiputakwara agwa 'Alexa' n' ime kykNET soap opera Binnelanders, na 2013
N' agwa o mechara nwee ihe nrite inaugural Royalty Soapie maka onye nwanyi putara ihe n' ikpa ike na 2014
Maristella Okpala (a mụrụ Maristella Chidiogo Okpala; Ọnwa Ise 9, 1993) bụ nwafọ Naijiria bụ onye ngosi nlere anya na ịma mma, onye enyere okpu mmeri na Miss Universe Nigeria n'afọ 2021
Marita van der Vyver (amuru ya na 6 Mee 1958) bu odee Afrikaans dere otutu akwukwo maka ma ndi okenye na ndi ntorobia
Kemgbe afọ 1999, ya na di ya na ụmụ ya atọ bi na France

Van der Vyver dere nchịkọta edemede ọchị na-akọwa ndụ na ime obodo France, aha ya bụ Die hart van ons huis n'afọ 2004, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a tọhapụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Bestemmings, ya na onye otu onye bekee
Amụrụ ya na Cape Town n'afọ 1958 wee tolite na Bellville, Menlo Park wee nweta agụmakwụkwọ mmalite ya na Hoërskool Nelspruit
N'afọ 1975, n'asọmpi uri Afrikaans nke mba maka ụmụ akwụkwọ matric, ọ meriri n'agụmakwụkwọ akwụkwọ afọ anọ na mahadum ọ họọrọ
Ọ họọrọ Mahadum Stellenbosch, ebe o sonyeere na nkuzi uri DJ Opperman wee nye ya nzere BA, isi na Afrikaans na French, n'afọ 1978
N'afọ sochiri ya, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'ọrụ nta akụkọ
Ọ gụchara nzere masta na ọrụ ntaakụkọ ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị

Mgbe ọ laghachiri na South Africa mgbe otu afọ nke njem na Europe gasịrị, van der Vyver rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ maka Die Burger, dị ka onye na-edegharị akwụkwọ maka Leserskring (otu akwụkwọ akwụkwọ) na onye edemede edemede maka Sarie

O bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ntorobịa atọ, Van Jou Jas (1982), Tien vir 'n Vriend (1987) na Eenkantkind (1991) tupu ewepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya maka ndị okenye, Griet skryf 'n Sprokie n'afọ 1992, nke meriri ATKV, M-Net na ihe nrite Eugène Marais
A sụgharịrị ya n'asụsụ Bekee, Dutch, Italian, French, Spanish, Swedish, Czech, Chinese na Hibru
N'afọ 1994, Dinge van 'n Kind, akwụkwọ akụkọ ntorobịa ọzọ, ka ebipụtara tupu o wepụta akwụkwọ mbụ ya maka ụmụntakịrị, Olinosters op die Dak na 1997
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ okenye ọzọ, Wegkomkans na 1999, Griet Kom Weer sochiri ya n'afọ 2001
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ntorobịa ya Die Ongelooflike Avonture van Hanna Hoekom meriri Sanlam Prize for Youth Fiction n'afọ 2002 wee mee ihe nkiri n'afọ 2010
Marius Jacques Kloppers (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 26 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Australia amụrụ na South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi nke BHP Billiton, ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ụwa
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche na onye isi oche nke Group Management Committee site na 2007 ruo 2013
A gwara ya ka ọ laa ezumike nká dị ka onye isi oche na 1 Ọktoba 2013, Andrew Mackenzie nọchiri ya
Kloppers gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Helpmekaar Kollege, mgbe ahụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Johannesburg
Kloppers gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Chemical Engineering na Mahadum nke Pretoria ma mesịa gaa n'ihu nweta PhD na Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MBA na INSEAD
Kloppers rụrụ ọrụ na mmanụ ala na Sasol na nyocha ihe na Mintek na South Africa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị MBA ya na INSEAD, ya na ndị ndụmọdụ nchịkwa McKinsey & Company na Netherlands rụkọrọ ọrụ tupu ọ banye na Billiton na 1993
N'afọ 2007, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na anọ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ akụ na ụba kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa, BHP Billiton
O weghaara ọkwa nke onye isi oche na 1 Ọktoba 2007
N'afọ 2009, ụgwọ ọrụ ya kwa afọ bụ $ US 104 nde, nke $ 2M bụ ụgwọ ọrụ na nkwụnye ego bụ bonus

Marius Weyers (a mụrụ na 3 Febụwarị 1945, na Johannesburg) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ya na nwunye ya Yvette, onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, bi na Rooi-Els na Western Cape
Ọ natara nlebara anya mba ụwa na-eme Andrew Steyn, onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-eme ihe nkiri The Gods Must Be Crazy (1980)
Ọ pụtara na Blood Diamond (2006)
Mariya Mahmoud Bunkure bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ kachasi elu na Kano Steeti, Naijiria
Onye hoputara bu Gọvanọ Kano steeti bụ Alhaji Abdullahi Umar Ganduje
A mụrụ Mariya Mahmoud Bunkure n'obodo Bunkure nke dị na Kano Steeti
Ọ kwupụtara na 26 Ọktoba 2020 bu ụbọchị o doziri maka ịmalitegharị ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ tesharị, steeti nwere, ka emechiri ọnwa asaa n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na steeti ahụ
Mariya Stoyanova (Bulgarian Мария Стоянова; amụrụ na 19 Julaị 1947) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Mariyka Modeva (Bulgarian Марика Модева, amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri nke sonyere na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
N'afọ 1976, ọ bụ onye otu ụgbọ mmiri nke Bulgaria nke meriri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume coxed anọ
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha nke abụọ ya na ụgbọ mmiri Bulgarian na asọmpi coxed anọ
nke 1980
Marjorie Rees Clark (mgbe e mesịrị Smith, 6 Nọvemba 1909 ̊ 15 June 1993) bụ onye South Africa bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu track and field, onye sonyere na 1928 Summer Olympics na 1932 Summer Olympics
A mụrụ ya na Bulwer, KwaZulu-Natal ma sọọ mpi maka Albion Ladies Athletic Club
N'afọ 1928, Clark mechara nke ise na asọmpi Olympic high jump
O sonyekwara na asọmpi 100m, mana e wepụrụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, o ritere ọla nchara na asọmpi mgbochi 80m na 1932 Olympics
N'ihe omume ịwụli elu nke afọ 1932, ọ mechara nke ise ọzọ na asọmpi 100m, mana e wepụrụ ya na agba nke mbụ
Ọzọkwa na 1928 Women's Amateur Association Championships Miss Clark meriri ma 100 yds hurdles & high jump
Na 1934 British Empire Games ọ meriri nrite ọla edo na asọmpi mgbochi 80m nakwa na ihe omume ịwụ elu
Dị ka onye otu ndị otu relay nke South Africa, ọ mechara nke anọ na asọmpi 110-220-110 yards
Na asọmpi 100 yards na 220 yards ihe omume e wepụrụ ya na agba nke mbụ
Marjorie Lee Browne (July 2, afo 1914 - Ọktoba 19, afo 1979) bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America mbụ nwetara PhD na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Marjorie Lee Browne bụ ọkà mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye nkụzi a ma ama bụ onye, na afo 1949, ghọrọ nanị nwanyị America nke atọ nke Africa iji nweta akara mmụta doctorate n'ọhịa ya
A mụrụ Browne na Septemba 9, afo 1914, na Memphis, Tennessee, nye Mary Taylor Lee na Lawrence Johnson Lee
Nna ya, onye ode akwụkwọ nzi ozi ụgbọ oloko lụgharịrị nwunye obere oge ka nwunye ya nwụsịrị, mgbe Browne dị ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ
Ya na nwunye ya nke abụọ, Lottie, bụ́ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, gbara nwa ha nwanyị ume iji ọmụmụ ihe ya kpọrọ ihe n’ihi na ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwere nkà
Browne gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị LeMoyne, ụlọ akwụkwọ Methodist nkeonwe nke malitere mgbe agha obodo gasịrị
N'oge agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ meriri Memphis City Tennis Singles Championship na afo 1929 na afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na LeMoyne High School
Ọ gara Mahadum Howard, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1935
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere bachelọ, ọ kuziri ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na kọleji obere oge, gụnyere na Gilbert Academy na New Orleans
O tinyeziri akwụkwọ na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum nke Michigan na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Michigan nabatara ndị America America, ebe ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ US ndị ọzọ anabataghị n'oge ahụ

Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ oge niile na kọleji Wiley ojii nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na Marshall, Texas, na ịga Michigan naanị n'oge ọkọchị, ọrụ Browne kwụrụ ụgwọ wee nweta mkpakọrịta nkuzi na Michigan, na-aga oge niile wee dechaa akwụkwọ edemede ya na afo 1949
George Yuri Rainich na-elekọta akwụkwọ edemede ya, 'Ọmụmụ nke Otu Parameter Subgroups of Some Topological and Matrix Groups,' bụ onye nlekọta ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ America-Afrika nọ na US nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na mgbakọ na mwepụ, yana Evelyn Boyd Granville, onye nwetakwara PhD
n'afọ 1949
Euphemia Haynes bụ nwanyị mbụ onye America America nọ na US nwetara akara ugo mmụta doctorate na mgbakọ na mwepụ, ebe ọ nwetara nke ya na afo 1943
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara mmụta doctorate ya, Browne enweghị ike idobe ọkwa nkuzi na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha

N'ihi nke a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị nkụzi mgbakọ na mwepụ, na-akụziri ha na 'modern mgbakọ na mwepụ' O lekwasịrị anya karịsịa n'ịkwado mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ maka ndị pere mpe na ụmụ nwanyị
Browne wee sonye na ngalaba na North Carolina College (ugbu a North Carolina Central University (NCCU)), ebe ọ kuziri ma mee nyocha ruo afọ iri atọ
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ngalaba ahụ ọtụtụ oge ya na NCCU, site na afo 1951 ruo na afo 1970
N'ebe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nyocha, onye nhazi ngalaba mgbakọ na mwepụ, na onye nkuzi maka Summer Institute for Secondary School Science and Mathematics Teachers
Marjorie Lee Browne nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na Durham, North Carolina, na Ọktoba 19, afo 1979

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ụmụ akwụkwọ ya anọ guzobere Marjorie Lee Brown Trust Fund na North Carolina Central University nke na-akwado Marjorie Lee Browne Scholarship na Marjorie Lee Browne Distinguished Alumni Lecture Series

Ebe ọ bụ na afo 1999, Ngalaba mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Michigan kwadoro Marjorie Lee Browne Colloquium, nke na-eweta kwa afọ ọkà okwu 'iji gosipụta okwu nke na-eme ka nchọpụta ha pụta ìhè ma na-ekwukwa okwu banyere ọdịiche dị na sayensị'
Ọrụ Browne na otu oge gboo gosipụtara ihe akaebe dị mfe nke njirimara topological dị mkpa na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti otu oge gboo
Ọrụ ya n'ozuzu lekwasịrị anya na linear na matrix algebra
Browne hụrụ mkpa sayensị kọmputa dị n'oge, na-ede onyinye $ 60,000 nye IBM iji weta kọmputa na NCCU na 1960-otu n'ime kọmputa mbụ na mgbakọ agụmakwụkwọ, ma eleghị anya nke mbụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ojii
N'ime oge ọrụ ya niile, Browne rụrụ ọrụ iji nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ mgbakọ na mwepụ nwere nkà aka, na-akụziri ha ma na-enye ha nkwado ego iji nweta agụmakwụkwọ ka elu
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ama ama gụnyere Joseph Battle, William Fletcher, Asamoah Nkwanta, na Nathan Simms
O guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ okpomọkụ iji nye ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na- aga n'ihu na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Na afo 1974, e nyere ya onyinye ncheta ncheta WW Rankin mbụ sitere na North Carolina Council of Teachers of Mathematics maka ọrụ ya na agụmakwụkwọ mgbakọ na mwepụ
Ọ bụ onye so na Women's Research Society, American Mathematical Society, Mathematical Association of America, na International Congress of Mathematicians
Ọ bụ ezie na ịkpa ókè megide ndị America America na ụmụ nwanyị dị ịrịba ama n'oge mmalite Browne, a matara ya maka mmezu ya na agụmakwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Marjorie Wallace (1925 na Edinburgh - 26 June 2005 na Onrus, Western Cape) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe nke a mụrụ na Scotland, nke a maara maka njikọ ya na Sestigers literary movement
A zụrụ Wallace na Edinburgh College of Art, na-adọrọ mmasị nke ukwuu na ọrụ mbụ ya ma bụrụ onye kachasị nta a họpụtara na Royal Scottish Academy
E nyere ya onyinye njem iji gaa Europe na Ịtali mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1947

Na ngwụcha njem ya, ọ gara biri na Montparnasse ebe ọ zutere odee South Africa Jan Rabie na ndị Afrikaners ibe ya bụ ndị mechara bụrụ ndị a maara dị ka Sestigers, nkegụnyere André Brink, Breyten Breytenbach, Etienne Leroux, Ingrid Jonker, Adam Small, Bartho Smit, Chris Barnard, Hennie Aucamp, Dolf van Niekerk, Abraham H
de Vries na Elsa Joubert
Usoro eserese ya gụnyere ebe mmanụ na-acha otu, na-eji ihe na-egbuke egbuke na nke na-egwuri egwu
Ọ bụ ụdị dabara nke ọma na ọnọdụ nke Western Cape
Ọ gbapụrụ n'ihe omimi a ma ama n'oge 1960s na 1970s, ma kwupụta mmasị ya maka onyinyo mmadụ
Marjorie Hope van Heerden (amụrụ Ọktoba 8, 1949) bụ onye odee na onye na-akọwa akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Kemgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ foto ụmụ mbụ ya na 1983, Van Heerden ka ebipụtara dị ka onye na-ese ihe ma ọ bụ onye edemede / onye na-ese ihe n'asụsụ 33 na Africa, Britain, Europe, Orient, Canada na USA
Amụrụ ya na De Doorns site na Alex na Marina van Niekerk (née Botha), Marjorie tolitere n'ugbo mkpụrụ vaịn na-abụghị De Doorns na ndagwurugwu Hex River dị nso na Cape Town na South Africa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rustenburg School for Girls na Cape Town n'afọ 1967, mụọ Fine Art maka otu afọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch wee gaa na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town afọ atọ
N'afọ 1973 ọ lụrụ Johann van Heerden na ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ezinụlọ a na-eme njem n'ọtụtụ ebe, ebe ha biri otu afọ na Evanston, Chicago
Site n'afọ 1989 ruo 1999 ha biri na Johannesburg na site na 1999 ruo afọ 2003 na Athens, Greece
Kemgbe 2003 di na nwunye a na-ebi na Gordon's Bay village na False Bay na mpụga Cape Town
N'afọ 2003 van Heerden malitere South Africa isi nke International Society of Children's Book Writers and Illustrators ( SCBWI ), nke dabeere na Los Angeles
N'afọ 2000 ya na enyi ya malitekwara isi SCBWI na Gris
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ ngalaba mpaghara mpaghara South Africa

Awards Marjorie van Heerden emeriela maka ọrụ ya gụnyere 2011 WB Mkhize Award, nke Usiba Writers' Guild na-enye kwa afọ, maka ụdị Zulu nke ogologo ụzọ ụlọ Lulama ( Uhambo LukaLulama Olude ), akwụkwọ foto o dere na ihe atụ, nke bipụtara ya
Akwụkwọ Giraffe, akara nke Pan MacMillan

N'afọ 2012, Marjorie na onye edemede Alex D'Angelo meriri MER Award (otu n'ime Media24 Books Literary Awards ) maka akwụkwọ ụmụaka kacha akọwapụta nke e bipụtara na South Africa n'oge afọ gara aga (2011) - ha meriri maka Goblin Diaries Appreticed to the Red Witch, nke Tafelberg Publishers (SA) bipụtara
Nke a bụ oge nke abụọ enyere ya onyinye a dị egwu - nke mbụ bụ n'afọ 2008 mgbe o meriri ya na onye edemede Wendy Hartmann maka Nina na Little Duck, nke Human & Rousseau (SA) bipụtara n'afọ 2007
Mak nwere ike izo aka na
Deutsche Mark, ego gọọmentị nke West Germany site na 1948 ruo 1990 na emesia Germany jikọrọ ọnụ site na 1990 ruo 2002
Mark Angel (amụrụ na 27 Mee na afọ 1991) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta vidiyo

A maara ya nke ọma maka usoro mkpirikpi Mark Angel Comedy na YouTube, na-egosipụtakarị ụmụaka na-eme ihe ọchị dịka nwa nwanne ya, Emmanuella Samuel (afọ ịrị abụọ ), nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, na nwa nwanne ya nwoke 'Aunty' Success Madubuike (afọ 8)
Angel's YouTube channel bụ nke mbụ African comedy channel iru otu nde debanyere aha
Mark mmụọ ozi nwekwara nwunye nke na-emekwa ihe ọchị na akara mmụọ ozi na-eme ihe ọchị na ndị na-eme ya na ndị na ya na-eme egwuregwu bụ Maazị Azu, Baze10, Ebere, The Law, Mimi, Kingsley Brown
A mụrụ Angel na afọ 1991 na Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria
Ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo iji mụọ ọgwụ, mana ọ hapụrụ n'ihi ihe ezinụlọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na India ma nọrọ oge na Naijiria na-enweta ahụmịhe na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, mana ọ pụghị ịchọta ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na Nollywood
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri onwe ya na afọ 2013 n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ ya, Mechanic Pictures
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Chelsea FC

Mark Kenneth Jaccard (amụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel n'ubochi iri na abuo, afọ 1955) bụ onye Canada na-ahụ màkà akụ na ụba na ónyé édémédé
Ọ na-emepụta ma na-etinye n'ọrụ ụdị ndị na-enyocha ụkpụrụ nkwado màkà ike na ihe onwunwe
Jaccard bụ prọfesọ nkè ike na-adịgide adịgide na School of Resource and Environmental Management (REM) na Mahadum Simon Fraser
A mụrụ Jaccard na Vancouver, British Columbia
PhD
ya sitere na Energy Economics and Policy Institute na Mahadum Grenoble (nkè a na-akpọzi Mahadum Granada Alpes)

Jaccard abụwo prọfesọ na Mahadum Simon Fraser kemgbe afọ 1986, ébé ọ na-akụzi ọmụmụ ihe na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na akụ na ụba akụ na ụba, ike na ihe ndị na-adịgide adịgide na ihe ndị dị na akụ na ụzụ na ụkpụrụ
Nnyocha ya na-elekwasị anya na mmepe na itinye n'ọrụ ụdị ike-akụnụba-emissions nke na-eṅomi mmetụta nke iwu ike na-adịgide adịgide
O nwèrè ihe karịrị otu narị akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ na-adụ gọọmentị, ụlọ ọrụ na òtù ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị ọdụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ụwa
Jaccard jere ozi dị ka Ónyé isi oche na ónyé isi oche nke BC

Utilities Commission (afọ 1992 ruo afọ 1997), na Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (1993[[96, 2008[[09), na na China Council for International Cooperation on Environment and Development (afọ 1996-2001, 2008[[09)
N'ọrụ ọhụrụ ya màkà Kansụl China, ọ bụ ónyé isi oche nke otu ọrụ na-ahụ màkà iji coal eme ihe, na-agakwuru onye isi ala nke China
N'afọ 2007-12 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi edemede màkà iwu ike na mmepụta nke Global Energy Assessment
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na National Roundtable on the Environment and the Economy (2006ī09) ma kemgbe afọ 2006 ọ bụ ónyé nyocha na CD
Howe Institute
N'afọ 2005, akwụkwọ ya, Sustainable Fossil Fuels meriri Donner Prize màkà akwụkwọ iwu kachasị elu na Canada
N'afọ 2008, Association of British Columbia faculty members kpọrọ ya Academic of the Year
N'afọ 2009, a kpọrọ ya Fellow nke Royal Society of Canada màkà nyocha ndụ ya
N'afọ 2012, Jaccard bụ onye natara onyinye Clean16 na Clean 50 nke Canada, iji kwado onyinye ya na agụmakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Canada
N'afọ 2014, ọ natara Simon Fraser University Award nke mbụ Prọfesọ màkà Nkwado, n'afọ ahụ kwa, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche dị iche iche dị ka Prọfesor Mahadum SFU
