Mark O'Hara (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri abuo n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye Scotland na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara St Mirren bọọlụ dị ka onye egwuregwu etiti
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Kilmarnock, Dundee, Peterborough United, Lincoln City na Motherwell

O'Hara, onye otu Kilmarnock n's under-20 squad mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 28 August n'afọ 2012, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya nkeji iri na atọ na egwuregwu Scottish League Cup megide Stenhousemuir, dochie Jeroen Tesselaar merụrụ ahụ na mmeri 2-1
Mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na isii na mbido ya, O'Hara ghọrọ onye nke ise kacha nta na-egwuri egwu maka Kilmarnock na naanị onye nke abụọ kacha nta na asọmupi ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2012, o mere mmalite mbụ ya na egwuregwu mbụ ya na mmeri 2–0 megide Celtic na Celtic Park, mmeri mbụ Kilmarnock meriri na ebe ahụ kemgbe 1955
O'Hara bịanyere aka na Dundee na June 2016
Mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Dundee, onye njikwa Paul Hartley mere ka ọ banye n'ọkwa na-awakpo etiti, onye kwuru na ọ maghị ihe mere O'Hara ji na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, o nyere goolu mbụ ya, na mmeri abụo–otụ nke Dundee megide Rangers O nyeziri goolu ọzọ n'egwuregwu sochirinụ, na-enweta akara nhata na otụ–otụ megide Hamilton Academical
Na 19 Febụwarị n'afọ 2017, o nyere goolu mmeghe ka Dundee meriri 2–1 megide Rangers, nke mbụ kemgbe 1992 na Dundee meriri ha n'ụlọ na league
Mgbe Paul Hartley si Dundee pụọ, O'Hara nyere goolu na egwuregwu mbụ nke onye njikwa ọhụrụ Neil McCann, mmeri 3–2 megide otu Motherwell
O'Hara nyere goolu nhata na 1–1 na Dundee derby megide Dundee United na Scottish league cup group stage
O nyere goolu ọzọ megide Rangers, nweta goolu abụọ ahụ na mmeri 2–1 n'ụlọ na 24 Nọvemba n'afo 2017, nke a bụ goolu nke anọ O'Hara nyere Rangers na egwuregwu ụlọ ya nke atọ megide ha
O'Hara kwagara Peterborough United na Mee 2018 n'okpuru nnwere onwe nkwekọrịta, Dundee na-enweta ụgwọ ọrụ

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na London Road n'ụdị goolu, na-etinye goolu atọ na egwuregwu abụọ mbụ ya na League One megide Bristol Rovers na Rochdale Mmalite iri na anọ na mpụta asatọ sochiri na ọkara mbụ nke oge 2018 wee ruo 2019, mana njedebe nke onye njikwa Steve Evans na klọb ahụ dabara na mgbazinye ego na Njikọ Abụọ Lincoln City

Ụdị etiti ya na-eme ihe ike na nke siri ike hụrụ ya ka ọ na-enwe mmetụta ozugbo na Imps, na-eme ngosi iri na asaa ka ndị otu Danny Cowley meriri aha egwuregwu ahụ site na akara isii karịa Bury na MK Dons
Peterborough United depụtara ya na njedebe nke oge 2018 wee ruo 2019
Na 2 Septemba n'afo 2019, O'Hara sonyeere Motherwell na mgbazinye ego maka oge 2019-20 fọdụrụnụ
Na 24 June n'afo 2020, Motherwell kwupụtara ntinye aka nke O'Hara na nkwekọrịta na-adịgide adịgide site na Peterborough United maka ego efu, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ

Na Mee 2022 mgbe nkwekọrịta Motherwell ya biara na njedebe, O'Hara bịanyere aka na ndị otu Scottish Premiership St Mirren na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ, ebe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta tupu nkwekọrịta ya na Buddies na Machị
Mark Peploe (amụrụ na 3 Maachị 1943) bụ onye edemede Bekee na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ nwanne Clare Peploe, na nwanne nwunye onye nduzi Bernardo Bertolucci
Maka Eze Ukwu Ikpeazụ
Àtụ Golden Globe Award Best Screenplay
Mark Roper (amụrụ na 16 Machị 1958) bụ odee na onye nduzi ihe nkiri South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote onye nduzi na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri anọ kemgbe afọ 1984
Mark Skapinker bụ onye mmekọ na-ahụ maka njikwa na Brightspark, ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ, ịntanetị na ekwentị mkpanaaka nwere ụlọ ọrụ na Montreal, Quebec, Canada na Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Brightspark emeriela Canadian Venture Capital Association 'Award of the Year Award' ugboro abụọ maka itinye ego ya na-aga nke ọma na ThinkDynamics (nke IBM nwetara) na Radian6 (nke Salesforcecom nwetara)
Amụrụ na South Africa, ọ kwagara Canada ebe, yana Bert Amato na Dennis Bennie, o mebere Delrina, ebe ha chepụtara ngwaahịa mbụ ya, ụdị sọftụwia eletrọnịkị PerForm
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala Delrina
A maara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke ọma maka ngwaahịa WinFax ya wee nweta ya site na Symantec na Nọvemba 1995
N'afọ 1997 ọ tọrọ ntọala Balisoft Teknụzụ, ụlọ ọrụ akụrụngwa ịntanetị nke mepụtara ngwanrọ mmekọrịta ndị ahịa nwere ọgụgụ isi
Ejikọtara ụlọ ọrụ a na Servicesoft Teknụzụ na 1999, nke Broadbase Software nwetara na Septemba 2000, ma mechaa site na Kana
Na 2008, Mark kwadoro iStopOvercom, azụmahịa ịntanetị dabere na Toronto lekwasịrị anya na njem ndị ọgbọ na ecommerce ịntanetị nke rere ya na 9Flats na 2012
N'afọ 2000, Mark mebere Brightspark Ventures na Toronto
N'ime ihe karịrị afọ 20, Brightspark ejikwa ego mmalite na mkpụrụ ego Venture Capital, yana ihe karịrị $135 nde n'okpuru njikwa
Sophie Forest abụrụla onye mmekọ na-ahụ maka njikwa na Brightspark kemgbe 2004
Ndị na-etinye ego na Brightspark gụnyere ndị ọchụnta ego Canada nwere ikike n'otu n'otu, ụlọ ọrụ ezinụlọ na ndị na-etinye ego ụlọ ọrụ
Mark Thomas Gibson (amụrụ n'afọ 1980, Miami, FL) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, mbipụta, ink, na mmiri
Ọrụ Gibson na-enyocha nnọchite anya Black na United States site na iji usoro ihe ọchị
Gibson natara BFA
ya site na The Cooper Union na MFa
ya site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Yale School of Art na eserese na óbìbì akwụkwọ na 2013, ébé ọ natara Ely Harwood Schless Memorial Fund Award
Gibson na-elekwasị ányà n'iji asụsụ nke ihe ọchị dị ka ngwá ọrụ màkà ikpe ziri ezi
Ọrụ ya na-agụnye akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ese onyinyo, nke nwéré ihe osise ojii na nke ọcha, na ihe osise mara mma sitere na ihe oyiyi ahọrọ site na akwụkwọ ya

Nkwupụta ónyé na-ese ihe nke Gibson na-akọwa nhọrọ na ọhụụ ya ile omenala America anya site n'echiche dị iche iche dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwoke ojii, prọfesọ, onye na-anụ ọkụ n'obi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke America na onye na-atọ ọchị

Ọtụtụ echiche ndị a na-agbagwoju anya na-akwalite nchọpụta m banyere ọdịbendị America site na asụsụ dị elu na nke dị ala nke eserese na ihe ọchị iji kpughee akụkọ nke na-akọwa mbibi anyị chepụtara echepụta
Ink ojii na ụcha siri ike n'ọrụ m na-emepụta ọdịiche dị ukwuu nke ohere dị mma na nke na-adịghị mma na-akọwa ihe mejupụtara
Ana m adabere na obere ihe márá mma, na-egwuri egwu ma ọmarịcha nka na akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị nke akụkọ na-aga n'ihu
N'ọrụ niile, ana m agbalị ime ka ìhè pụta ìhè na ihe ọjọọ na ihe siri ike nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke America nke ógè a
Mmetụta ya gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe ọchị Dwayne McDuffie, na Jim Steranko, yana ndị nduzi ihe nkiri Stanley Kubrick na Alfred Hitchcock
Ely Harwood Schless Memorial Fund Award 2013, Yale School of Art Yale Norfolk Assistantship 2012, nke Samuel Messer, Associate Dean nyere
Marko Perković (1966) bu onye Croatia bu ọmẹka
Marleen Anmortsoo Hutchful (née Mensah; 27 Ọktoba 1986 - 11 Jenụwarị 2022) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri
E gosipụtara ya na usoro nkiri TV nke Ghana bụ Things We Do For Love
A mụrụ Marleen Anmortsoo Mensah na Accra na 27 Ọktoba 1986
Nne na nna ya bụ Cyril Neeborquaye na Renate Ilse Mensah
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Ghana International School(GIS) na agụmakwụkwọ tertiary ya na Mahadum Ashesi Site na Mahadum Ashesi, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Business Administration
Hutchful rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ Ghana Amazing-U
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na DreamOval dị ka onye nhazi mmemme
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Beacon College International
Hutchful banyere n'ihe nkiri nke usoro Ghana nke a kpọrọ Things We Do For Love na 2000 dị ka onye 'Lois'
Ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ bụ nke onye Ghana nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
A maara ya maka ụda olu America ya pụrụ iche na ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Adjetey Annan, nke a maara n'otu usoro ahụ dị ka Pusher
Hutchful lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Di ya bụ Claud Kweku Ampoful Hutchful
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Elaine Ewuresi Hutchful na Claire Renate Kuukua Hutchful
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst
Hutchful nwụrụ na 11 Jenụwarị 2022 site na ọrịa leukemia myeloid
E liri ya na Ghana na 27 Jenụwarị 2022 na Lashibi Funeral Home na Accra
Marlene Dumas (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1953) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe ugbu a na Netherlands
A mụrụ Dumas na 1953 na Cape Town, South Africa ma tolite na Kuils River na Western Cape, ebe nna ya nwere ubi vaịn
Dumas malitere eserese na 1973 ma gosipụta nchegbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na ntụgharị uche ya na njirimara ya dị ka nwanyị ọcha nke agbụrụ Afrikaans na South Africa
Ọ gụrụ nka na Mahadum nke Cape Town site na 1972 ruo 1975, wee gaa Ateliers '63 na Haarlem, nke dị ugbu a na Amsterdam
Ọ gụrụ akparamaagwa na Mahadum Amsterdam na 1979 na 1980
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Netherlands ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na mba ahụ
Dumas egosipụtala na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri, Miss Interpreted (1997), Alice Neel (2007), Kentridge na Dumas in Conversation (2009), The Future is Now! (2011), na Screwed (2017)

Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gụnyere ihe osise nke Dumas, - Marlene Dumas Myths and Mortals, Venus and Adonis, David Zwirner 25 Years, Marlene Dumas Against the Wall, Marlene Dumas Sweet Nothings, Marlene Dumas The Image as Burden, Marlene Dumas Measuring Your Own Grave, Experiments with Truth Gandhi and Images of Violence
Dumas na-ejikarị ihe ntụgharị nke foto polaroid nke ndị enyi ya na ndị hụrụ ya n'anya, ebe ọ na-ezo aka na magazin na ihe ndị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ
Ọ na-ese ihe osise nke ụmụaka na ihe nkiri na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ iji metụta ụwa nke nka nke oge a
O kwuru na a na-eji ọrụ ya akpọrọ ihe dị ka ihe mbụ ebe ọ bụ na ọtụtụ n'ime obere ọrụ mmekọahụ ya dị oke mma
Site n'ọtụtụ ihe osise ya, ọ na-egosi ndị enyi ya, ndị nlereanya ya, na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama
A na-ahụta eserese Dumas dị ka ihe osise mana ha anaghị anọchite anya ndị mmadụ kama ọ bụ ọnọdụ mmetụta uche nke mmadụ nwere ike ịnọ na ya
Ihe osise ya na-elekwasị anya n'okwu ndị ka njọ na isiokwu ndị dị ka mmekọahụ na agbụrụ, ikpe ọmụma na aka ya dị ọcha, ime ihe ike na ịdị nro
Ụdị Dumas bụ ọdịnala Romantik ochie
Ọ na-eji brushstrokes na-enweghị isi iji tinye mgbagwoju anya ma na-enyekwa nkọwa zuru ezu na nka ya
Dumas na-enwe mmasị iji usoro mmiri-na-mmiri, nke na-ejikọta oghere dị nro na ndị siri ike
Mgbasa ozi ọ họọrọ bụ mmanụ na akwa na ink na mpempe akwụkwọ
Ihe ọmụmụ ya sitere na ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ, ndị nlereanya, ndị na-ese ihe, na ọtụtụ ndị sitere na omenala a ma ama
Ahịa nke Dumas's Jule-die Vrou (1985), mere ka Dumas bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ dị ndụ na-ese ihe na-azụ ahịa maka ihe karịrị $ 1 nde

Dumas kụziri na Academie voor Beeldende Vorming (ABV) na Tilburg, Academie voor Kunst en Industrie (AKI) na Enschede, Rijksakademie Van Beeldende Kunsten na Amsterdam, na De Ateliers na Amsterdam (Tutorials and Coaching)
Ọrụ Dumas dị na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art E tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi 2022 Women Painting Women na Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth
E nyere Dumas akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na Mahadum Antwerp
O nwekwara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum nke Cape Town, site na Ateliers 63 na Haarlem na Institute of Psychology, Mahadum nke Amsterdam

Marlon Williams (amụrụ na Septemba 30, 1962), nke a maara nkè ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Marley Marl, bụ ónyé American DJ, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na'egwú rap na ónyé guzobere akara ndekọ, na-arụ ọrụ na egwu hip hop
Marlon tolitere na ụlọ Queensbridge dị na Queens, New York
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi nka mpaghara n'oge mmalite nke egwu rap, na-akwalite mmasị ya
E gosipụtakwara ya na Eric B
& Rakim's 'Paid in Full' site na abọm izizi ha, nke edekwara na ụlọ ọrụ ya
Dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe, otu ọrụ ama ama bụ LL Cool J
A na-ekwu na ọ na-emetụta ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi hip hop dịka RZA, DJ Premier, Madlib, na Pete Rock
Ónyé na-emepụta Madlib kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ na Marley bụ onye na-emepụta ihe mbụ kpaliri ya ime ihe
Magazin Vibe dere na ya, 'gbanwere ụda hip-hop ruo Mgbe ebighi ebi site na mgbochi egwu ya pụrụ iche'
Ọrụ Marley malitere na mmasị na electronica
Dị ka ónyé na-eto eto na Unique Recording Studios na mbido afọ 1980, o nwèrè ohere ịnwale ihe nnwale dị oke ọnụ dị ka Fairlight CMI
Otu ụbọchị n'oge nnọkọ studio ya na onye na-ese ihe aha ya bụ Captain Rock ọ chọpụtara nnwale na mberede
Marlise Keith (amụrụ n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1972) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa na-arụ ọrụ na ink, pensụl na acrylics na ákwà, bọọdụ na iko (ihe osise iko azụ)
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta mbà ụwa na South Africa, America, Britain, Germany, Portugal na Sweden
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi nka na Rustenburg High School for Girls na Cape Town rụọ 2003
Ndị mmadụ, gbụrụ-gbúrụ ya na akụkụ nke ndụ onwé ya na-emetụta ọrụ Keith
Nrọ na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpà n'ọtụtụ ọrụ, ebe ọ na-ejide oge na-enye nsogbu mgbé mgbè ma na-abụkarị oge na-enweghị isi na obere, mpaghara zuru ezu nke nnukwu ọrụ ya
Ọ dị mkpà inyocha ọrụ ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu iji hụ ihe oyiyi na-alaghachi n'elu ma nwee obi ụtọ zuru oke na mgbagwoju anya na ọdịdị na-enweghị isi nke ụdị ihe osise ya
Keith egosila n'ọtụtụ ebe ma a ga-ahụ ọrụ ya na nchịkọta gbụrụ-gbúrụ ụwa
Ónyé mmeri nkè asọmpi nka Vuleka 2006 Team Sanity, 140 x 100 cm, Mixed media on board, 2006
A họpụtara ya màkà Absa Atelier 2006
Elysian Fields na UCA Gallery na Cape Town, South Africa 2009
Marlon Brando, Jr
(Önwa ano 3, 1924 – Önwa ishíi 1, 2004) bu mgbe mbu ómeka nke Amerikạ nke rürü na ọkara ohu afo ise

Madu màrà ya maka ómeka o mèrè ka Stanley Kowalski na A Streetcar Named Desire na ómeka o mèrè nke o gbatara ihe onyinyé ka Terry Malloy ime On the Waterfront, ha ma abuọo bu nke Elia Kazan kèrè na afo ndi 1950
Na etítỉ ndu ya ómeka nke ndi madu mara ya na nke oma ka nke o nwetere ihe onyinyé ka Don Vito Corleone na The Godfather, Colonel Walter Kurtz na Apocalypse Now, na Paul ime Last Tango in Paris
Brando bu onye merírírí na ómeka
O bu onye zífùrù ómeka nke 'method' na ndi madu mekari ya maka okwu a naghị a numárí, mànà o bu omèmé nke obʼabuọo na nke ndi madu nyere ya áká màkà
Brando bukwárá onye né gbá na uzor maka ihe, nke di ukwu bu American Civil Rights na American Indian Movements
Marlon Mullen (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Contra Costa County, California, na-arụsi ọrụ na NIAD Art Center
A mụrụ ya na 1963 na Richmond, California, Mullen bụ ónyé na-arịa ọrịa autistic ma bụrụ ónyé na-adịghị ekwu okwu
Mullen anọgidewo na-arụ ọrụ nka ya na NIAD (Nurturing Independence through Artistic Development) Art Center na Richmond, CA, kemgbe afọ 1993
Mullen na-eme ihe osise sitere na ederede, na-ezo áká na eserese nké magazin nka dịka Artforum

Marlyse Bernadette Ngo Ndoumbouk (onye amụrụ n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1985) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu dị ka ọ ga n'ihu maka onyinye goolu nke klọb French Lille na dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti maka otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon
Ngo Ndoumbouk gbara bọọlụ nye ndị otu Cameroon n'ọtụtụ nkeji Africa Women Cup of Nations (2006, 2008, 2010, 2018)
Akara nweta edepụtara nke mba Cameroon bu nke mbụ
Maroko bụ obodo dị na Eti-Osa, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ dị nso na Ikoyi na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Victoria Island
Ọ bụ mpaghara na-enweta ego dị ala nke dọtara ọtụtụ ndị mbịarambịa ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị nso na mpaghara ndị siri ike na akụ na ụba
Idei mmiri na ájá jupụtara na Maroko n'oge ndụ ya
N'ọnwa Julaị, n'afọ 1990, ndị Igaw na Ilaje bi na Maroko n'etiti ndị Yoruba ndị ọzọ
Gọmentị Lagos Steeti, n'okpuru gọvanọ Alhaji Lateef Jakande na-anwa ịchụpụ mbụ nke ebe obibi ahụ na afọ 1980 nke dugara na kiosk ebe ndị ọrụ gọọmentị tụfuru ndụ ha
Onye nchịkwa ndị agha bụ Raji Rasaki, chụpụrụ ndị bi na Maroko ma kwatuo obodo ahụ
Gọmentị kwuru na Maroko dị n'okpuru oke osimiri ma chọọ ka e jupụta na ájá nakwa na Maroko chọrọ mmeziwanye akụrụngwa
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 300,000 tụfuru ụlọ ha
Ọ bụ otu n'ime nnukwu nchụpụ a manyere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naijiria
Ndị bibu ebe ahụ gbalịrị inweta ụgwọ ọrụ na usoro ụlọ ikpe Naijiria

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2008, Social and Economic Rights Action Centre (SERAC) na Debevoise & Plimpton, tinyere nkwukọrịta na African Commission na Human ya na Peoples' Rights, na-ekwu na nchụpụ ahụ mebiri African Charter na Human ya na People' Rights
The Beatification of Area Boy (1995), egwuregwu nke Wole Soyinka dere, nwere atụmatụ ya gbasara nchụpụ ọjọọ nke ndị bi na Maroko
Maroko bụ ọnọdụ dị n'akwụkwọ Graceland (2004) nke Chris Abani dere
Mgbochi alụmdi na nwunye bụ omume nke igbochi ọrụ nke ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di

Ihe a na-ahụkarị na mba ọdịda anyanwụ site na ngwụsị narị afọ nke iri na itoolu ruo n'afọ ndị 1970, omume a na-akpọkarị ka a kwụsị ọrụ nke nwanyị n'alụmdi na nwunye ya, ọkachasị na nkuzi na ọrụ ndị ụkọchukwu
Ọzọkwa, a ka na-ewere ụmụnwanyị di ha nwụrụ nwere ụmụ dị ka ndị lụrụ di na nwunye mgbe ụfọdụ, na-egbochi ha ka a ghara ịrụ ọrụ
Omume ahụ enweghị ihe ziri ezi na akụ na ụba, na itinye ya n'ọrụ siri ike na-akpaghasịkarị ebe ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye dị jụụ n'oge agha, n'ihi mmụba nke ọchịchọ maka ọrụ

Nnyocha nke Claudia Goldin mere iji chọpụta ihe ha na-ekpebi site na iji data ọkwa siri ike site n'afọ 1931 nakwa n'afọ 1940, chọpụta na ha na-ejikọta ya na nkwalite site n'ime, ụgwọ ọrụ dabeere na ọrụ, na omume ndị ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ ndị ọzọ
Kemgbe afọ 1960, a na-ele omume a anya dị ka enweghị nhata n'ọrụ na ịkpa ókè n'ụzọ mmekọahụ, ma kwụsịla ya ma ọ bụ machibido iwu site na iwu mgbochi ịkpa ókè
Na Netherlands, ewepụrụ ihe mgbochi alụmdi na nwunye n'afọ 1957, na Ireland ewepụrụ ya n'afọ 1973
Ọ bụ ezie na 'ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye' bụ okwu a na-ejikarị agụnye omume niile na-akpa ókè megide ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di, ọdịiche abụọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị maka ndị ọrụ n'afọ 1900s
'Ụlọ ọrụ' bụ nhazi nke igbochi ịhọpụta ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di
'Ụlọ mmanya nchekwa' bụ igbochi ịnọgide na-enwe ndị ọrụ lụrụ di na nwunye
Okwu abụọ ahụ na-adaba n'okpuru okwu mkpuchi ka ukwuu
Iji zere omume yiri ịkpa ókè, ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ jiri ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye kpaa ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di dị ka ndị ọrụ mgbakwunye, kama ịbụ ndị na-adịgide adịgide
Nke a bụ ikpe, dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Lloyds Bank ruo 1949, mgbe ụlọ akụ ahụ kagburu ụlọ ọrụ alụmdi na nwunye ya
Ịhazi ụmụnwanyị dị ka ndị mgbakwunye, kama ndị ọrụ oge niile, nyere ndị ọrụ ohere izere ịkwụ ụmụnwanyị ụgwọ ọnwa na ịkwụsị ụmụnwanyị n'ụzọ dị mfe
Na UK, ọtụtụ ọrụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ alụmdi na nwunye ruo n'afọ ndị 1970, na British Geological Survey ruo n'afọ 1975; Ụlọ ọrụ alụmdi na nwunye machibidoro ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di na nwunye ịbanye n'ọrụ obodo
A kpochapụrụ ya na 1946 maka Home Civil Service na 1973 maka Foreign Service, ruo mgbe ahụ, a chọrọ ka ụmụnwanyị hapụ ọrụ mgbe ha lụrụ
Omume nke mgbochi alụmdi na nwunye bilitere na United States na ngwụsị afọ 1800
A na-ahụkarị ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye na ụlọ ọrụ nkuzi na ndị ụkọchukwu

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị zoro ọnọdụ alụmdi na nwunye ha na mgbalị iji nọgide na-arụ ọrụ ha, iwu akwadoghị ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye ruo n'afọ 1964 mgbe Title VII nke Civil Rights Act nke afọ 1964 machibidoro ịkpa ókè n'ọrụ n'ihi agbụrụ, ụcha, mmekọahụ, ma ọ bụ agbụrụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na United States, ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye dị jụụ na mpaghara ụfọdụ na oge
N'adịghị ka obodo mepere emepe, ime obodo na-achọkarị ndị nkụzi ka ha wee dị njikere ịnara ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di
Ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye adịchaghị oke njọ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ n'ihi na a chọrọ ụmụnwanyị iji nyere aka n'agha
Ná mmalite nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, 87% nke ụlọ akwụkwọ agaghị akwụ ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di na 70% agaghị ejigide nwanyị lụrụ di
Mana n'afọ 1951, ọ bụ naanị 18% nke bọọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere 'ụlọ mmanya' na 10% nwere 'ụlọ mmanya nchekwa'
Ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye na-emetụta ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di na nwunye gụrụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị ụmụnwanyị ọcha amụrụ
Ọrụ ha bụ nke izi ihe na ọrụ ndị ụkọchukwu
Ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị na-acha ọcha na-arụ ọrụ n'ichepụta ihe, ndị na-eje ozi, na ndị na-eje ozi n'ụlọ anaghị emetụta ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye
Akwụsịghị ịkpa ókè megide ndị nkụzi nwanyị lụrụ di na nwunye na US ruo n'afọ 1964 na ngafe nke Civil Rights Act
Otu isiokwu nke afọ 1946 na The Spectator, magazin British conservative, nyere ihe ole na ole maka nkwado nke ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye
Isiokwu ahụ kwuru na di ha na-akwado ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di, ya mere ha adịghị ha mkpa ọrụ
Ọzọkwa, ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye nyere ohere maka ndị na-akwado ha lere anya dị ka 'n'ezie' chọrọ ọrụ, dị ka ụmụnwanyị na-alụbeghị di
Arụmụka ọzọ The Spectator na-ekwu na ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di bụ ndị a pụrụ ịdabere na ha ma na-agagharị agagharị karịa ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di, ebe ha enweghị ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị mkpa
Ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye nwere njikọ na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba, yana, ọkachasị mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ gasịrị
Ndị ọrụ na-alọghachi chọrọ ọrụ, na mgbe e mesịrị ịda mbà n'obi na 1930s, dugara na mmejuputa ụlọ mmanya alụmdi na nwunye n'ọtụtụ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, a na-ekwukarị na ọdịnala, ọkachasị n'ebe enwere ọdịnala siri ike nke ụmụnwanyị lụrụ di dị ka ndị nlekọta
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị njikọ kpọmkwem na ụlọ ọrụ alụmdi na nwunye, ụfọdụ omume ịkpa ókè n'ezie taa na-ewelite nchegbu yiri nke ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị dị ka ụlọ ọrụ alụmdi na nwunye mere na n'afọ 1900s
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, [nkọwa ọzọ dị mkpa] ụfọdụ omume ịkpa ókè megide ụmụnwanyị dị ime dugara na Iwu ịkpa ókè nke afọ ime nke afọ 1978
Mars Kadiombo Yamba Bilonda (3 Machị 1958 -15 Julaị 2021) bụ onye Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Akụkụ mmiri bụ nchịkọta nke ọkpọkọ plastik ejikọtara na ogwe osisi nke a na-etinye n'ime mmiri iji tụọ mmetụta nke oge idei mmiri na ugboro ole idei mmiri na mmepụta nke ahịhịa mmiri
A na-eji ozi ahụ eme ihe maka ebumnuche nyocha sayensị
Ọ bụ James Morris si na Mahadum nke South Carolina mepụtara akụkụ ahụ mmiri na nkwado sitere na National Science Foundation na NOAA's National Centers for Coastal Ocean Science

Ebumnuche ha bụ ịkọwa mmetụta dị mkpirikpi na nke ogologo oge nke ịrị elu nke oke osimiri na usoro ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri dị ka mmepụta ihe ọkụkụ, ire ure nke ihe ndị dị n'ime ala, sedimentation nke na-enye aka n'ịhazi nkwụsi ike nke ala mmiri
A na-eji akụkụ mmiri ahụ chọpụta otú usoro dị iche iche dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ga-esi meghachi omume na ịrị elu nke oke osimiri

Mmetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe dị ka ịrị elu nke oke osimiri na-eme ka ala mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nwee ọkwa mmiri dị elu karịa ka ọ dị, nke na-eduga na nnu dị elu n'ime ala, sediment na ọnwụ dị elu, na mgbanwe na nhazi obodo osisi
Nsonaazụ ndị a ga-emetụta nrụgide-nkwụsị nke a na-etinye na ahịhịa ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, mana nnagide nke ụdị osisi ndị a na azụmahịa ha nwere ike ịnwale edoghị anya
Ngwaọrụ a bụ ụzọ isi chịkwaa ihe ahịhịa marsh nwere ike ịnwale n'ọdịnihu ma nye nghọta ka mma banyere mgbalị mweghachi dị mkpa iji gbochie ihe na-emebi ihe na ala mmiri nke osimiri
Ọkpụkpọ ala opitoropi bụ ihe owuwu nwere ahịrị ọkpọkọ n'ebe dị iche iche dị elu
A na-eji apịtị jupụta na ọkpọkọ ndị a ma na-akụ ụdị osisi ala opitoropi n'ime ọkpọkọ ọ bụla
Ọnọdụ dị iche iche kwụ ọtọ na-anọchite anya 'ịdị elu' dịgasị iche iche nke mmiri nke osisi marsh ga-enwe
Ka ebili mmiri na-agbadata ma na-aga, a na-ekpughe paịpụ ahụ na mmiri na-arị elu ma na-ada
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị nwere ike idozi ihe dị iche iche, dị ka oke elu nke nhazi ahụ, oge ide mmiri, ihe oriri na-agbakwunye na ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ
Ka oge na-aga, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị nwere ike ịnakọta ozi dịka mkpokọta ihe ọkụkụ zuru oke, ihe niile dị ndụ, mmepụta peat, ọnụego ire ure, na sedimentation
Enwere ike iji data ahụ mee ihe iji buo amụma maka ahụike ọdịnihu nke marsh a na-amụ, yana otu marsh ga-esi meghachi omume na ịrị elu nke oke osimiri n'ọdịnihu
Site n'ọtụtụ ụdị ọmụmụ na ụzọ dị iche iche, ndị na-eme nchọpụta achọpụtala na osisi marsh nwere ike imeghachi omume na ịrị elu nke oke osimiri n'ọdịnihu n'ụzọ dị iche, ya mere ọ bụ kpamkpam ụdị

Ndị na-eme nchọpụta na-amụ mmeghachi omume nke osisi marsh na Northeast Pacific tidal marshes jiri akụkụ marsh ma chọpụta na ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị na ala marsh dị elu (na-ejupụta naanị n'oge oke mmiri ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ ihu igwe siri ike) dị ka Salicornia pacifica na Juncus balticus nwere mmetụta maka idei mmiri na-arịwanye elu
Ụdị ndị ọzọ dị ka Bolboschoenus maritimus na Carex lyngbyei jupụtara na marshes na ma ọ bụ n'elu elu nke kwekọrọ na mmepụta ha kachasị
Otu ọzọ na-eji akụkụ marsh ahụ chọpụtakwara na mmụba nke idei mmiri belatara biomass maka ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị n'ebe dị elu
Ọnụnọ nke ndị agbata obi belatara ngụkọta biomass ọbụna karịa
Otu ìgwè ndị na-eme nchọpụta jiri akụkụ mmiri nyochaa mmetụta nke ahịhịa na-awakpo obodo osisi nke estuary na China
Ha chọpụtara na ahịhịa na-awakpo na-adịgide nke ọma n'ebe kachasị elu, ọ bụghịkwa nke ọma n'ebe dị elu na ala
Mgbe a na-agwakọta ya na ụdị ala, ahịhịa na-awakpo na-egbochi biomass ala site na pasentị iri itoolu (90%) na ịdị elu dị n'etiti ebe biomass bụ nke kachasị ukwuu
Tinyere nrụgide nke ịrị elu nke oke osimiri, ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka oké ifufe, ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, enrichment nke ihe na-edozi ahụ, na mgbanwe elu na-agbadata na ọdịda na-emetụta ahịhịa marsh
A chọpụtala mmeghachi omume nke osisi marsh na ihe ndị a na-eme ka nrụgide dị na nyocha dị iche iche site na iji akụkụ marsh

Otu ìgwè na-eji akụkụ marsh iji mụọ , ọtụtụ ala ala ala (nke na-enwekarị idei mmiri n'ụbọchị niile) chọpụtara na oké ifufe na nsogbu ụkọ mmiri ozuzo mere ka ihe dị ala dị ala karịa ihe ndị a kụrụ n'ọnọdụ mmiri ozuzo
Osisi ndị idei mmiri na-eme na nnukwu ide mmiri nwekwara mgbọrọgwụ na okooko osisi dị mma nke na-eme ka osisi na-adịghị ike
Mgbakwunye na-edozi ahụ nwere ike inye aka na uto nke ọtụtụ ụdị osisi, mana ihe na-edochi ahụ gabigara oke nwere ike inwe mmetụta dị iche ma mebie ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọtụtụ osisi marsh

N'otu nnyocha nke akụkụ ahụ marsh, ndị na-eme nchọpụta chọpụtara mmekọrịta dị mma ebe agbakwunyere nitrogen na-eme ka osisi na-eto eto n'ogo oké osimiri ebe idei mmiri na-emetụta osisi, mmetụta ya dịkwa ukwuu na njikọta ya na carbon dioxide dị elu

Otú ọ dị, ha kwuru na mgbakwunye nitrogen na-adịghị ala ala site na mmetọ na-ebelata nnweta nke propagules (mkpụrụ osisi ọhụrụ) nke ụdị na-anabata ide mmiri nke ga-agbanwe ụdị na-eme ka marshes nwee ike ịda
A chọpụtakwala mgbanwe a na ọmụmụ nke akụkụ ahụ marsh ebe mgbakwunye ihe na-edozi ahụ nwere ike ịbawanye mmepụta ihe, mana ọ nwere ike imetụta mkpokọta ihe ndị dị ndụ na mmepụta peat
Osisi ndị dị n'ọhịa nwere ike ịdị n'otu maka mgbanwe dị elu nke na-eso oke osimiri n'ihi mgbanwe nke ebe obibi ha chọrọ

N'iji nhazi nke akụkụ ahụ marsh, ndị na-eme nchọpụta chọpụtara na maka ịdị elu nke marsh dị elu karịa nke kachasị mma a tụrụ anya ya na ọnụego ịrị elu dị ala nke oke osimiri, ọsọ ọsọ na ọnụego nke ịrị elu nke oke osimiri ga-eme ka uto mgbọrọgwụ dịkwuo elu, mmụba nke ihe ndị dị ndụ na nkwụsi ike nke ala mmiri kpamkpam
Mana, maka ịdị elu nke ala mmiri kachasị mma a na-atụ anya na ọnụego ịrị elu nke oke osimiri na obere mmiri, mmụba nke mmiri ga-eduga na mbelata nke uto mgbọrọgwụ na mbelata na ọnụego nke mmeri elu
Nke a nwere ike iduga n'ịmebi ala mmiri ngwa ngwa

N'ikwekọ na ịdị elu, otu ìgwè ndị na-eme nchọpụta na-eji akụkụ mmiri ahụ eme ihe chọpụtara na ala belatara obere na ọgwụgwọ a kụrụ akụ karịa ọgwụgwọ nchịkwa a na-akụghị akụ tụrụ aro na osisi nwere ike inye aka belata ọnwụ nke ịdị elu mmiri n'ihi ịrị elu nke oke osimiri

Marshall coils, nke a makwaara dị ka encased coils ma ọ bụ encased Mmiri(nke a maara nke ọma na North America dị ka Springs akpa), bụ akụkụ ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere nke matarasị nke a na-ekpuchi coil ọ bụla n'ụzọ dị iche na ihe akwa
Ọ bụ James Marshall, onye Canada a mụrụ, mepụtara coils Marshall na 1899, onye na-arụ ọrụ na injinia a mụrụ na nso Haldimand, Ontario, Canada
Ọ natara ikike ikike nke Canada na 1900, na ikike ikike nke United States na United Kingdom na 1902
Marshall guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Marshall Mattress mbụ na Toronto, Canada, nke gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ihe karịrị afọ 119
O nyekwara ikike ikike maka United Kingdom nye ndị ọrụ mbụ ya; ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru aha Ụlọ ọrụ Marshall Sanitary Mattress ruo na mbido afọ 1930, mgbe ha gbanwere aha ha ka ọ bụrụ VI-Mmiri

Na Jenụwarị 2019, Flex Group nwetara (Canada) Marshall Mattress ụlọ ọrụ site n'aka Onye Okike Anyị nyere Anyị aka n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi ozi ọma ahụ n'ebe nile ndị nwe ya n'oge ahụ, ezinụlọ Warner, iji gaa n'ihu na-emepụta dị n'ala matarasị aka
Marshall tụụrụ ime matarasị ebe isi iyi ndị kwụụrụ onwe ha n'ime ga-enye nkwado na nkasi obi n'ime matarasị ahụ n'onwe ya
Marshall mepụtara isi iyi cylindrical coil, nke ọ bụla a dụkọtara n'ime akpa ákwà ogho, nke nyere nkwado na-ebuli elu n'onwe ya
Mgbe a na-etinye ya ọnụ, coils ahụ ghọrọ usoro nkwụsị nke onwe ya nke na-agbanye n'ụdị na ịdị arọ nke onye ọ bụla, na-enye nkwado na nkasi obi na-enweghị atụ
Mgbe a na-etinye ya, matarasị Marshall a rụchara arụcha na-achọ ibelata nrụgide anụ ahụ n'okpuru onye na-ehi ụra, ma na-azọrọ na ọ ga-ebelata ya
Usoro matarasị jupụtara n'akpa uwe nke Marshall ghọrọ ụkpụrụ mbụ zuru ụwa ọnụ maka iwu matarasị juputara n'isi
Àtụ Mattresses
Marsinah (10 Eprel 1969 - c

8 Mee 1993) bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya nke na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ elekere dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Java, Indonesia, onye ogbugbu ya dọtara uche mba ụwa na mmegide obi ọjọọ nke ọchịchị aka ike nke Suharto
Marsinah na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ekwuchitere ndị ọrụ 500 na-eme ngagharị iwe maka enweghị ike itinye ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta na nnwere onwe ndị otu ọrụ
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Mee, a tọọrọ ya mgbe emesịrị ngagharị iwe; a chọtara ozu ya e merụrụ ahụ ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị
E kwenyere n'ọtụtụ ebe na ndị agha so na-apụ n'anya na ọnwụ ya
Nwa nke abụọ nke Sumini na Mastin, Marsinah tolitere n'okpuru nlekọta nke nne nne ya, Puirah, na nwanne nne ya Sini, na Nglundo, East Java
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Karangasem Public School 189, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Nganjuk No5 Middle School
Afọ ndị ọ bụ nwata bụ ndị a ma ama na azụmahịa, na-ere ihe oriri iji bulie ego nne nne ya na nwanne nne ya
Marsinah nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ikpeazụ ya na Muhammadiyah Boarding School, a na-egbochi ọganihu agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ihi enweghị ego
N'ịbụ onye na-enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ na Nglundo, Marsinah tụgharịrị uche ya n'obodo ukwu, na-ezigara akwụkwọ anamachọihe na Surabaya, Mojokerto na Gresik
Ndị Bata Shoes goro ka ọ rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Surabaya ha na 1989, ọ kwagara otu afọ ka e mesịrị na ụlọ ọrụ elekere Catur Putra Surya (nke bụbu Empat Putra Surya) na Sidoarjo
N'ịgafe n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ Porong ha ka emepechara ya, Marsinah mechara hụ onwe ya na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ekwuchitere ndị ọrụ ibe ya
Mgbe, na 1993, Gọvanọ nke East Java kwupụtara ịrị elu na ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta nke mpaghara, Catur Putra Surya (ụlọ ọrụ nwere njikọ na ndị agha Indonesian-ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe) jụrụ irube isi
Na 3-4 May ndị ọrụ gara abụbọ ọrụ na-achọ mmejuputa atumatu ụgwọ ọnwa opekempe yana ka chụsasịa ngalaba otu steeti na-achị, SPSI
Marsinah gara na Ministry of Labor nke Indonesia iji weghachite akwụkwọ ntuziaka gọvanọ iji nyefee ndị nlekọta CPS
On 5 May the Sidoarjo District Military Command summoned 13 workers to its headquarters and forced them to sign letters of resignation, with eight more to follow in the next couple of days
Outraged by this turn of events, Marsinah decided to go there herself and demand an explanation that very same day
She was never seen alive again
She was raped and tortured
Her mutilated body was found some distance from the factory days later
Ndị uwe ojii Indonesia nwara ikpuchi ogbugbu Marsinah
A kpọbatara ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ikpe maka igbu ọchụ ya mana ha mechara hapụ ya mgbe a chọpụtara na amanyela nkwupụta ha
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị agha etinyela aka na nchekwa nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na enwere ihe akaebe na-egosi na ndị agha tinyere aka na igbu ọchụ ya, ọ dịghị mgbe a kpọtara ndị gburu mmadụ ikpe n'ikpe
Òtù ụmụ nwanyị na òtù ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ tinyere nrụgide na ọtụtụ ndị Indonesia na-echeta ọnwụ Marsinah
Mgbasa ozi nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị Indonesia, òtù ndị ọrụ, na òtù ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ gosipụtara Marsinah
Mgbasa ozi Indonesia ji nwayọ kọọ ihe merenụ na ụlọ ọrụ elekere
Izu abụọ gafere tupu Surabaya Post akọ akụkọ banyere ihe ahụ merenụ
Ndị otu na-achọpụta eziokwu nke na-anọghị na gọọmentị guzobere site na Workers Solidarity Forum (FORSOL) izu abụọ mgbe a chọtara ozu ya
N'ime otu ọnwa, e guzobere Komite Solidaritas Untuk Marsinah (KSUM), kọmitii nkwado nke ụlọ ọrụ 20 na-abụghị nke gọọmentị guzobere, iji nyochaa ma nyochaa omume ndị ọchịchị gbasara ogbugbu ahụ
Ndị otu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ jikwa ogbugbu Marsinah mee ihe iji nye United States nsogbu iji gbochie imezigharị ọnọdụ mba kachasị amasị Indonesia
N'afọ 2002, onye isi ala Indonesia bụ Megawati Soekarnoputri kwadoro nyocha nke Human Rights Commission
Enyere ya onyinye nturu ugo Yap Thiam Hien mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ndị International Labour Organisation gosipụtara igbu ọchụ ya dị ka ikpe # 1773
Mart-Life Detox Clinic bụ ụlọ ọgwụ Myar nke oge a nke mbụ na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ bụ ụlọ ọgwụ Anti-age Spa na Wellness nakwa nke mbụ n'ụdị ya n'Afrịka
Medical Art Center (MART) guzobere maka enyemaka ọmụmụ, meghere Modern Mayr Medical Spa na Maryland, Lagos Steeti na mmekorita ya na Viva-Mayr Clinic na Austria
Ụlọ spa ahụ bụ ebe ahụike kachasị mma na ebe ntọhapụ nke nwere ụlọ ọgwụ na ahụkarị maka ọgwụgwọ na ịma mma
Marta Wenger (amụrụ na 18 Julaị 1953) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye omeiwu na Democratic Alliance ugbu a
Ọ bụbu onye isi obodo Midvaal na Gauteng, ma jee ozi dị ka Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mmiri na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi site na 2012 ruo 2014

Marte bụ mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo dị na steeti Borno, Naijiria, n'akụkụ oke osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke ọdọ mmiri Chad
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Marte
Ọ nwere mpaghara dị puku atọ,otu narị na iri ise na anọ km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ ruru puku narị iri abụọ na iteghete, narị atọ na irí asaa na ngụkọ afọ 2006
Ọ bụ otu n'ime okpuru ọchịchị gọọmenti iri na isii mebere Borno Emirate, steeti ọdịnala dị na Borno State, Naijiria
Na afọ 2013, dị ka PM News si kwuo,

A hapụrụ hectare puku ise (acres puku iri na abụọ, narị atọ na iri ise na ise`) nke ọka wit na osikapa ka ire ere na mpaghara Marte nke Borno dịdebere ọdọ mmiri Chad mgbe ndị ọrụ ugbo ruru puku iri na iteghete gbahapụrụ ugbo ha
Abubakar Gabra Iliya, onye isi otu Lake Chad Basin Development Agency, nke dabeere na isi obodo Borno steeti, Maiduguri kwuru, sị 'Ụdị ọka wit narị abụọ tụfuru anyị
Na ọnwa May n'afọ 2014, Boko Haram wakporo obodo ndị dị na okpúrù ọchịchị Marte, dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Punch siri kwuo
Obodo Kirenowa nwụrụ ihe dị ka mmadụ iri abụọ, ebe otu onye na-ekiri ya kwuru na a gbara ihe karịrị ụlọ iri isii ọkụ
N'obodo Ngumuji, ihe karịrị mmadụ iri anọ nwụrụ
N'ime obodo Gurmushi, 'obodo dịpụrụ adịpụ' nke dị n'ókè Naijiria na Cameroon, a kọrọ na mmadụ iri anọ nwụrụ
N'agbanyeghị, enweghị ike igosipụta nkwupụta a ruo Ụbọchị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Mee

Na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Febụrụwarị n'afọ 2015, ndị agha Naijiria kwuru na ha eweghachila Marte site na Boko Haram, tinyere obodo ndị dị nso nke Gamboru, Mafa, Mallam Fatori, na Abadam, na-esote ọrụ ndị agha jikọtara ọnụ nke ndị agha Naijiria na ndị Cameroon, ndị agha nkịtị, na ụbọchị atọ
Mwakpo ụgbọ elu ndị Chad
N' agbanyeghị, n' ọnwa August n'afọ 2016, gọọmentị Borno steeti kwuru na Marte ka ekpochapụbeghị kpamkpam na njikwa Boko Haram
Na abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2021, ndị agha Islamic State West Africa Province (ISWAP) ndị ji egbe ji egbe gafere ebe ndị agha dị na Marte
ISWAP kwuru na e gburu mmadụ asaa ma nwụde otu onye
Ha kwuru na ha nwụdere ngwa ọgụ, mgbọ, ụgbọ ala nwere ụkwụ isii, ma gbaa ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ ọkụ
Pobee nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na bekee na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum Ghana na nzere nna ya ukwu na ọmụmụ mmepe site na International Institute of Social Studies na Hague
Ọ gụkwara diplomacy multilateral na Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies (IHEID) na Public Administration na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA)
Martha Ankomah bụ onye omee ihe nkiri Ghana na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ Ankomah na Accra, Ghana, dị ka ada nne ya, nanị nne ya zụru ya, Ankomah chetara na o zutere ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Ọ bụ nwata akwụkwọ nke Adabraka Presbyterian Junior High School, Labone Senior High School na Mahadum Coleji Jayee
Dị ka ya si kwuo, ọ banyere ime ihe site n'aka nwa nwanne nna ya na 1994
Mgbe o so na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri maka ule ihe nkiri, ma na-eme ihe nkiri na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri onyonyo, ọ banyere na Next Movie Star, bụ ebe e debere ya nke atọ na mbipụta 2007 nke ihe ngosi n'ezie
Ankomah kwupụtara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Hitz FM na 2016 na site ugbu a na ọ ga-atụle naanị ọrụ ndị ziri ezi ma weta mgbanwe dị mma na ọha mmadụ
Na Septemba 2018, ọ kọwapụtara ọnọdụ ya, na-akọwa na ya nwere ike iwere ọrụ ọ bụla na fim ma ọ bụrụhaala na ọ na-enye ndị na-ege ya ntị ozi dị mma
N'afọ 2017, ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri katọrọ Ankomah mgbe ọ jụrụ akụkọ gbasara ihe nkiri Ghana
O kwuputara nchegbu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwesịrị ịgbanwe isiokwu nke ihe nkiri ha iji malite
Ndị na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri chere na nkwupụta ya enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na enweghị ihe ọmụma banyere nka nke ime ihe nkiri
Na Nọvemba afọ 2018, ọ malitere mkpọsa na-achọ ịgba ndị na-eto eto ume ịgụ ihe
Martha Appiah (amụrụ na 19 Disemba afọ 1965) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afo 1987 Summer Olympics nke mere na Stadio Olimpico, Rome
O sonyere na 4 x 400 mita relay na afọ 1984 nke mere na Memorial Coliseum na Los Angeles
Martha Bissah (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Ghana na-eme egwuregwu
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi 800m nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2014 Summer Youth Olympics na oge 2 0490
Bissah gara Aduman Senior High School na Ashanti Region nke Ghana
N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta na azụmaahịa na njikwa na Mahadum Norfolk State na United States
Na Mee 2021, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere nke abụọ na General Business / Marketing na Mahadum Norfolk State
N'afọ 2014, Bissah ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi 800m nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2014 Summer Youth Olympics
Ghana Athletics Association machibidoro Bissah iwu ruo mgbe ebighi ebi na June 2016
N'ọnwa Febụwarị na afọ 2017, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo anọ na Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Indoor and Track & Field Championships
N'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu nke afọ maka oge nke abụọ na Mahadum Norfolk State

N'afọ 2019, maka oge nke abụọ a kpọrọ Martha onye na-eme egwuregwu nwanyị nke afọ na Mahadum Norfolk State, ọ nwetara ihe nrite ahụ mgbe o debanyere aha oge nke nkeji iri na asaa na sekọnd iri na isii, si otú ahụ na-etinye ndekọ mmeri ọhụrụ
Martha Ann Cassell Thompson (1925 ruo 1968) bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Cassell a ma ama nke ndị na-ewu ụlọ n'Afrịka Amerịka
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka mweghachi maka Washington National Cathedral
Martha Ann Cassell Thompson bụ nwa nke abụọ nke Albert Cassell, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, na Ann Mason Cassell, Onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Baltimore
Ọ gara James Monroe Elementary School, Garnett Patterson na Banneker Junior School, na Dunbar High School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ na 1943
Ya na ụmụnne ya Charles Cassell na Alberta Jeannette Cassell, nna ha Albert Cassell gbara Martha ume ịga Cornell University College of Architecture, Art, and Planning maka ọrụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na ihe owuwu site na Cornell University's School of Architecture na 1947 ma ọ bụ 1948
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Alberta Jeannette Cassell bụ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka Amerịka abụọ mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na bachelor nke ụlọ na mahadum
Thompson, site na 1949 ruo 1951, rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na St
Louis
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ya na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Philip Hurbert Frohman (1887 ruo 1972) rụkọtara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Frohman, Robb, & Little na District of Columbia
N'ebe ahụ, n'ihi nka ya na Gothic architecture, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nri na-eweghachi ihe owuwu maka Cathedral nke St
Peter na Paul (nke Bodley & Vaughn mepụtara na mbụ), nke e mechara mara dị ka Washington National Cathedral
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime naanị ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na otu na-ahụ maka mmezu nke ọrụ ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ ahụ site na 1959 ruo 1968
Martha Cassell Thompson bụkwa onye na-akpọ piano, ma hazie Kọmitii Ọrụ Ọha maka YWCA
N'afọ 1948, Martha Cassell lụrụ Dr
Victor Thompson, onye bụ nwa akwụkwọ ahụike na Meharry Medical College
Ha nwere otu nwa, Karen Thompson, na 1949, onye zụrụ na Illinois Institute of Technology wee ghọọ ọgbọ nke atọ nke ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Martha Cassell Thompson nwụrụ na 1968, e lie ya na Lincoln Memorial Cemetery, Suitland, Maryland

Martha Jachi Umbulla (10 Nọvemba 1955 20 Jenụwarị 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania

Martha Jane Pettway (1898 - 2003) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke jikọtara ya na otu Gee's Bend nke ndị na-ese akwa
A mụrụ Pettway na Gee's Bend, Alabama ma bírí ndụ ya niile n'ebe ahụ
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Philadelphia Museum of Art na Metropolitan Museum of Art
Martha Jane na di ya Little Pettway bụ ndị isi na-ahụ màkà ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'ụzọ doro anya na obodo Gee's Bend
Ha bụ ezinụlọ mbụ natara Roosevelt House ma mee ka ezinụlọ ndị ọzọ nke Gee sonye na ọrụ enyemaka ọha na eze nke New Deal
Little Pettway bụ ónyé na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta obodo nke butere ụzọ n'ịgbapụ na ịnyeghachi ala ndị nwe ubi na-eleghara ányá nye ezinụlọ Gee's Bend
Site na nkwekọrịta ala nke Agricultural Adjustment Administration, Martha Jane na ezinụlọ ya nwetara 75 acres nke ala a na-akọ ugbo na ala kpọrọ nkụ
Ọ na-akpakarị ụmụ ya na di ya ịga ngagharị na Selma n'oge mmegharị ikike ọbọdọ
Martha Jane na Little zụlitere ụmụ iri na ise, ụmụ nwoke ise na ụmụ nwanyị iri
Ọ kụziiri ụmụ ya nwanyị niile ka ha na-ekpuchi ákwà, nké mụrụ ụfọdụ ndị na-ekpu ákwà pụrụ iche dị ka Plummer T
Pettway na Joanna Pettway
Nwunye di ya, Louella Pettway, bụkwa ónyé na-emepụta ákwà
Uwe Martha Jane bụ akụkụ dị mkpà nke ntụsara ahụ na okpomọkụ ụmụ ya n'ụlọ ma jiri uwe ọrụ a rụgharịrị arụgharị mee ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime uwe ya na ụmụ ya nwanyị ga-adịru naanị otu afọ n'ihi na nnukwu ezinụlọ na-eji ha eme ihe nkè ukwuu
N'ihi ya, ọ dị mkpa ka ụmụ ya nwanyị niile mụta ịkpa ákwà ma weghachite ihe ezinụlọ
Nwa Martha Jane bụ Nathan (nke bụkwa di Louella Pettway) na-echeta na ọ na-ehi ụra n'okpuru uwe ụmụnne ya nwanyị ruo mgbè ọ toro
Martha Wangari Karua (Ọmụmụ 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke si na obodo Kenya
Ọdi na oge mbụ bụrụ onye otu ndi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na anochite anya ndi ọgbako nke ndi Gichugu Constituency ma bụrụ kwa onye okpe ikpe na ụlọ ikpe nke di na obodo Kenya
Ọdikwa na oge mbụ bụrụ onye isi etiti na ihe gbasara okpe ikpe na Kenya tupu ọgba ha alụkwaghim na April nke afọ 2009
Nwa ada Karua na aluchitere ụmụ nwanyi ọgụ ma na etinyekwa olu ya na eti ka ihe gbasara nwere onwe nke ụmụ nwanyi pụta ihe
A mụrụ Koome na 1960 na obodo Kithiu, Meru County
O nwere LLB
sitere na Mahadum Nairobi na LLM na Iwu Mba Ọha sitere na Mahadum London
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nairobi na 1986, Koome debara aha na Kenya School of Law n'afọ na-esote
Ọ gụchara nzere Masters (LLM) na iwu mba ụwa na Mahadum London na 2010
A họpụtara Koome Onyeikpe nke Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị Ikpe na Jenụwarị 2012
Tupu a họpụta ya n'Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị, ọ jere ozi dị ka Puisne Onyeikpe ihe karịrị afọ asatọ
Martha Emily Larsen Jahn (17 Eprel 1875 na 2 Ọgọst 1954) bụ onye Norwegian na-ahụ maka udo na ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Christiania dị ka nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ere ahịa Christian Larsen (1842ī1905) na Sanda Plate (1851ī1879)
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1911 ọ lụrụ Gunnar Jahn, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nduzi nke Statistics Norway
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'afọ 1895, ọ gụrụ asụsụ na Scotland na Germany site n'afọ 1895 ruo 1896
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ n'ọfịs site na 1897, mgbe ahụ na Deichman Library site n'afọ 1898, na-agwụcha agụmakwụkwọ onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na New York State Library School na 1902
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Trondhjem Public Library site na 1902 ruo 1911, na-ezute ma lụọ di ya n'obodo ahụ, mgbe ahụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Norwegian National Academy of Craft and Art Industry
Site na 1910 ruo 1913 ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Ministry of Education and Church Affairs dị ka onye nyocha nke ọbá akwụkwọ ọha na eze
Site na 1915 ọ nweghị ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ, na-etinye oge ya niile n'ọrụ afọ ofufo
N'afọ 1915, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Internasjonal Killeliga for fred ogebel, alaka Norwegian nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom nke e hiwere n'otu afọ ahụ
Site n'afọ 1919 ruo n'afọ 1929 ọ bụkwa onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke nzukọ mba ụwa, site n'afọ 1925 ruo n'afọ 1934 ọ bụ onye isi oche nke alaka Norwegian
N'afọ 1949, ọ ghọrọ onye otu nsọpụrụ
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Norway na Njikọ Mba site na 1925 ruo 1927, kọmitii na-arụ ọrụ nke Norwegian Women's Public Health Association site na 1925 na onyeisi oche site na 1935 ruo 1948

Nsonaazụ dị ịrịba ama n'oge ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe omume gụnyere mkpọsa mbinye aka nke ndị sonyere 80,000 maka nzukọ nkwụsị agha na 1932, yana okpukpu abụọ nke ndị otu Women's Public Health Association site na ihe dị ka 100,000 ruo 200,000
N'okpuru nduzi Jahn, Women's Public Health Association jisiri ike nọgide na-enwe onwe ya n'oge ndị Nazi Germany bi na Norway
Martha Tarhemba bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti

O sonyere Zambia na afọ 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu egwuregwu atọ
Martha Yujra Apaza (amụrụ na 19 Jenụwarị 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Bolivia na onye otu ọrụ nke jere ozi dị ka minista nke ọdịbendị na njem nleta site na 2019 ruo 2020
Onye isi otu ọrụ a ma ama na El Alto, Yujra bụ naanị onye otu Jeanine Áñez Cabinet ma bụrụ onye ọrụ ikpeazụ na-eduzi Ministry of Cultures and Tourism; e wepụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa

N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, ọfịs Yujra lekwasịrị anya na mmetụta nke ọrịa COVID-19 na ngalaba ọdịbendị, na-echepụta ụzọ isi belata mmetụta akụ na ụba nke usoro nnọpụiche na ndị ọrụ aka na ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Embassy nke Bolivia na Quito site na July ruo November 2020
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye minista, Yujra nwetara aha ọjọọ maka mmegide siri ike ya megide ọchịchị Evo Morales
N'afọ 2017, ọ duziri otu akụkụ nke El Alto Regional Workers' Center na-akwado gọọmentị
Dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ ya, Yujra jikọtara njikọ ahụ na Bolivia Says No alliance, na-agba ọsọ n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na-anọchite anya La Paz na Chamber of Deputies na ntuli aka 2019 a kagburu
A mụrụ Martha Yujra na 19 Jenụwarị 1964 na La Chojlla, obere obodo na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala nke dị na La Paz Yungas
Nne Yujra nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa; n'ihi ya, nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ zụlitere ya
Site n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, a zụrụ ya na idu ndú ndị ọrụ, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ akwụkwọ na Chojlla mine
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-enupụ isi megide ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị ọdịnala nke obodo ya manyere, na-achọ ịchụso ọrụ na òtù ndị ọrụ a haziri ahazi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Yujra kwagara El Alto, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Eduardo Abaroa School, mgbe e mesịrị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Simón Bolívar Educational Unit
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Yujra malitere ọrụ ogologo oge na trade unionism; n'afọ 2000, ọ sonyeere ndị nne na nna Federation tupu ọ bụrụ onye otu Bartolina Sisa Federation
Ka oge na-aga, Yujra ghọrọ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Regional Workers' Center of El Alto (COR-El Alto), na-anọgide na-etinye aka na nzukọ ahụ ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri
N'agbanyeghị ọrụ ya, ọ na-enwekarị àgwà nna ochie site n'aka ndị enyi ya 'na mbụ, na COR, ndị ọrụ ibe m zigara m na ụlọ ahịa [ọ bụ ezie na] Abụ m ọgbọ ha
Ruo mgbe m kwụsịrị ma sị a ga-akwanyere ụmụ nwanyị ùgwù'
Dị ka onye otu COR, Yujra nọ n'oge ọgba aghara nke El Alto nwere n'oge esemokwu gas nke Bolivia, nke mechara bụrụ onye isi ala Gonzalo Sánchez de Lozada n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2003
Site na mmegide ya, Yujra bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama na El Alto, na-enweta aha ọjọọ maka nkatọ olu ya nke Onye isi ala Evo Morales, onye ngalaba ọrụ na-asọpụrụ
N'ihi ya, ọnọdụ ya na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị na COR mgbe ụfọdụ, nke jikọtara onwe ya na pati Morales, Movement for Socialism (MAS-IPSP)
N'afọ 2015, Yujra megidere onye isi obodo Edgar Patana n'ọchịchị COR kwadoro maka nhọpụta ọzọ, na-ekwu na njikwa ya ejirila ọkara afọ iri laghachi azụ

Dị ka onye nnọchi anya Neighborhood Civic Movement, ọ bịanyere aka na njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji kwado mkpọsa onye isi obodo nke Soledad Chapetón, onye mechara jụ Patana oge nke abụọ na ntuli aka obodo nke afọ ahụ

Ọpụpụ ikpeazụ nke Yujra na COR bịara na June 2017, mgbe ekwuputara na ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke COR na nnọkọ nke ya onwe ya kpọkọtara, na-ama ọchịchị Eliseo Suxo aka, onye bụbu onye omeiwu na-akwado gọọmentị, onye wepụtara usoro iji gbatịkwuo oge ya n'ọchịchị
Nzọụkwụ ahụ kewara COR n'ime akụkụ abụọ, ebe Yujra na Suxo kwupụtara onwe ha dị ka ndị odeakwụkwọ iwu kwadoro nke nzukọ ahụ dum
A gbakwunyere nke atọ nke Pedro Chinche duziri, nke nwere njikọ na nchịkwa Chapetón
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba, ndị na-akwado gọọmentị nke COR chụpụrụ Yujra n'ọkwa ya, na-ebo ya ebubo na ya na ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emebi iwu nnọpụiche nke njikọ ahụ
N'agbanyeghị mwepụ ya, ndị otu Yujra nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ n'obodo ahụ

Na mbido ntuli aka nke afọ 2019, COR nke Yujra sonyere n'ọtụtụ mmegide ndị mmegide na-eduzi, na-ajụ nhọpụta nke Onye isi ala Morales maka oge nke anọ, nke megidere ntuli aka 2016 nke tụgharịrị ntuli aka iwepụ oke oge
Yujra ji okwu mmeghe nke 21F,[lower-Greek 2] duziri ngagharị gafee El Alto, na-ekwu na 'ndị Alteño sonyeere ọgụ a n'ihi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụkwa nke Alteños'
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ ahụ, Yujra sonyere n'ọgba aghara agụụ ụbọchị asaa megide onye isi ala, naanị iwepụ iwu ahụ na arịrịọ ngwa ngwa nke ndị ọrụ ahụike
N'oge mkpọsa ahụ, ọ kwadoro ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Senator Oscar Ortiz, na akụkụ ya nke COR na-aghọ akụkụ nke njikọ Bolivia Says No (BDN)
BDN họpụtara Yujra dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya La Paz, na-etinye ya nke abụọ na ndepụta ntuli aka ya
N'ikpeazụ, njikọ BDN enwetaghị nkwado dị ukwuu na Ngalaba La Paz, na-enweta naanị pasent 119 nke votu
Ka ọ na-erule oge ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị na La Paz kwubiri, Otú ọ dị, Bolivia abanyela n'oge ọgba aghara zuru oke nke ebubo nke aghụghọ ntuli aka na mba ahụ kpatara
N'etiti ọgbaghara obodo niile, COR nke Yujra duziri ngagharị iwe na El Alto, na-achọ ka ndị otu Supreme Electoral Tribunal, ndị ọ kpọrọ 'ndị na-agba ala nna ha mgba okpuru', gbaa arụkwaghịm
Mgbe ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu nke ngagharị iwe gasịrị, ihe a na-akpọ Pitita Revolution rụzuru na arụkwaghịm nke Morales na gọọmentị ya
Onye nnọchi anya ndị mmegide bụ Jeanine Áñez nọchiri Morales, onye kwagara ngwa ngwa iji guzobe kọmitii ad hoc iji lekọta gọọmentị na-elekọta
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2019, ụbọchị abụọ ka ọ banyere n'ọkwa, Áñez họpụtara Yujra ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Ministry of Cultures and Tourism
Yujra bụ naanị nwa amaala so na Cabinet Áñez, ihe ọ gosipụtara na emume iyi ya, ebe ọ '[kwesịrị], dị ka nwanyị na pollera,
ịga n'ihu na-alụ ọgụ maka mba dị n'otu n'ụdị dị iche iche'
N'okwu ya, o kwupụtakwara na 'ọ bụ oge ụmụ nwanyị
Anyị bụ ndị na-achịkwa mba a'; n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, Áñez bụ naanị nwanyị nke abụọ bụ onye isi ala na Bolivia
Mgbe emesịrị ya, n'etiti ọgba aghara na-aga n'ihu na mba ahụ, Yujra gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye ogbugbo na mkparịta ụka gọọmentị na ngalaba ọrụ na El Alto
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, ọ gara obodo ahụ izute ndị isi nke òtù ndị agbata obi, na-achọ ịmekọrịta nkwụsị nke ngagharị iwe megide gọọmentị
Mkparịta ụka gara nke ọma, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi ọrụ El Alto kwetara ịhapụ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, ngalaba ndị ọzọ siri ike nọgidere na-enwe nrụgide, na-agbanyụ na ogbugbu ndị uwe ojii na-eduzi na Senkata barrio
Yujra boro ndị na-akwado gọọmentị gara aga ụta maka ọtụtụ n'ime ọgba aghara ahụ, na-ebo ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị achị ebubo na ha na-amanye ndị Alteños isonye na ngagharị iwe
Tụkwasị na nke a, gọọmentị Yujra na ndị ọkàiwu kwadoro n'ime usoro mpụ megide onye bu ya ụzọ, Wilma Alanoca, onye a na-ebo ebubo na ọ na-eduzi ime ihe ike n'obodo ahụ
N'ime ihe mbụ ya dị ka onye minista, Yujra gbalịrị inweta nkwado gọọmentị nke obodo Chola nke Bolivia

N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2020, n'emume ndị isi nke otu chola dị iche iche bịara, Áñez bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ iwu na-echeta cholas sitere na ngalaba ise na obodo Afro-Bolivian, na-amata njirimara ha dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nketa ọdịbendị a na-apụghị ịhụ anya nke mba ahụ
N'akụkụ ya, Yujra - n'onwe ya bụ chola - kwuru na 'site na iwu a, ụmụ nwanyị nọ na polleras ga-enwe ọnọdụ kwekọrọ na anyị'
N'okpuru okwu mmeghe 'omenala nke udo na ịdị n'otu iji gwọọ', Ministri nke Ọdịbendị na Njem malitere emume carnival nke afọ 2020

Emere emume mmeghe nke emume ahụ na Viru Viru International Airport, na-egosi ndị na-agba egwú, ndị ọchịchị kpọrọ - gụnyere Yujra - na ndị ọbịa ndị ọzọ, ha niile sonyere na emume ahụ n'ime ụgbọ elu azụmahịa
N'oge emume ahụ, ozi Yujra na ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye na-arụkọ ọrụ, na-achọ ịkwalite njem nleta na mba ahụ
Na mmalite nke ọrịa COVID-19, nchịkwa Yujra chere mmetụta nke usoro nkewapụ na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na'eme ihe ntụrụndụ nke mba ahụ ihu
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel, Ngalaba Ọdịbendị nwere nzukọ weebụ na ndị nnọchiteanya si na ngalaba ntụrụndụ dị iche iche, ebe e depụtara ihe ngwọta ndị dị irè iji chee ọnọdụ siri ike ihu
Ka o sina dị, a katọrọ Yujra maka ịghara igbo mkpa nke ndị na-ese ihe n'ụzọ zuru oke, ndị na-emegide ya na-ekwu na ozi ya enweghị nlekọta dị mma n'oge ọrịa a

Tụkwasị na nke a, Federation of Neighborhood Councils of El Alto boro Yujra ebubo na ya na ndị ọchịchị mpaghara anaghị arụkọ ọrụ mgbochi COVID, n'agbanyeghị na a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya onye isi ala n'obodo ahụ maka nzube ahụ
N'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke ọchịchị ya, Yujra nyere ikike inye onyinye, na mgbazinye afọ iri itoolu, nke La Sombrerería Cultural Center na Central Bank of Bolivia's Cultural Foundation

N'ịbụ nke dị na Sucre, La Sombrerería bụ akụkụ kachasị ukwuu nke ọdịbendị na mba ahụ, nke nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ihe nkiri, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ụmụaka, na ebe ndị dị n'èzí, niile nwere ike ịba ọtụtụ narị mmadụ
E meghere ebe ọdịnala ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019 mana ọ nọgidere na-emechi kemgbe, na-adaba na nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị malitere n'oge ahụ
Yujra chere na mgbazinye ego ahụ - nke e nyere ikike site na Iwu Kasị Elu N° 4243 - ga-akwụ ndị ọrụ nwere ike ịkwụ ụgwọ maka idebe ihe onwunwe ahụ, na-enye ya ohere imeghe ya mgbe ọtụtụ ọnwa gachara
Oge Yujra nọ n'ọchịchị dịgidere ruo 4 June, mgbe a kwụsịrị ya mgbe Áñez kpebiri iwepụ ozi atọ kpamkpam; n'etiti ha, Ministry of Cultures and Tourism, nke e jikọtara ya na Ministry of Education
Onye isi ala ahụ kọwara mkpebi ahụ dị ka usoro ịchekwa ego iji chekwaa ihe onwunwe iji lụso ọrịa COVID-19 ọgụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Página Siete, Yujra kwuru na a jụghị ya maka mkpebi imechi ozi ahụ 'eziokwu, ọ bụ ihe ijuanya nye m,
Naanị ihe m mere bụ ịnakwere ya'
Onye bụbu minista lere mkpebi ahụ anya dị ka njehie, na-ekwupụta olileanya ya na a ga-eweghachi ozi ahụ, ikekwe jikọta ya na Ministry of Sports, nke a kagburu

Víctor Hugo Cárdenas, minista nke agụmakwụkwọ, nọchiri Yujra, ọ bụ ezie na osote minista nke ọdịbendị - nke a na-ebo ebubo na ọ na-eduzi ngalaba ọdịbendị-anọgide na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla ruo ọnwa atọ, a họpụtara Marcelo Bazán ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ya na Septemba
Ọnwa abụọ mgbe e wepụrụ ya n'ọfịs, na ngwụcha ọnwa Julaị, Áñez họpụtara Yujra ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya Bolivia na Quito, Ecuador

N'ịgbaso ntuli aka zuru oke nke afọ 2020 na nloghachi nke MAS, ngalaba ndị na-akwado gọọmentị site na El Alto, La Paz, na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu gosipụtara Yujra n'etiti ndepụta ha nke ihe karịrị ndị mmekọ iri atọ na 'ọchịchị ọchịchị' nke afọ 2019, na-arịọ ka Ọfịs Prosecutor malite nyocha mpụ megide ha

N'akụkụ ya, na-esochi oge ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ, Yujra lara ezumike nká n'ụlọ ya na El Alto, na-ekwusi ike na o nweghị ebumnuche ịhapụ mba ahụ ma ọ bụ zoo 'onye na-eme ihe ọ bụla anaghị atụ egwu ihe ọ bụla
Enweghị m ihe mere m ga-eji zoo, gịnị mere m ga ga-eji zoro?'

Marthe Koala (amụrụ na 8 Machị 1994) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na Burkinabe na-asọmpi na 100 mita ihe mgbochi na heptathlon
Na 2012 na 2020 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ, ọ sonyere na 100 mita ihe mgbochi nke ụmụ nwanyị
O mekwara asọmpi na heptathlon ụmụ nwanyị na 2020 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ, mana o merụrụ ahụ n'oge a na-agba ya ma ghara isonye na ihe omume anọ fọdụrụnụ

Marthe Yolande Ongmahan (bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa June afọ 1992) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-eche goolu maka AWA Yaoundé na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon
Ongmahan na-agba bọọlụ klọb nye ntị otu klob AWA Yaoundé na Yaoundée, ebe ọ meriri ọ̀zụ̀za aha Cameroon Women's league t n'afọ 2017
A gụnyere Ongmahan na ndị otu Cameroon egwuregwu 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations na mba Ghana, ọ bụ ezie na ọ pụtaghị na asọmpi ahụ
Ndị otu ahụ mechara merie n'ọkwa nke atọ na egwuregwu onyinye goolu anọ asatara abụọ megide Mali, si otú a ruo eru maka 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup na France
Ya mere, n'afọ sochirinụ, a gụnyere ya na ndị otu Cameroon maka iko mba ụwa ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ pụtaghị ọzọ na asọmpi ahụ, nke Cameroon ruru agba nke iri na isii tupu England emerei ha na onyinye goolu atọ ha asataghị̀ ma otu
Marthe Wandou (amụrụ ya na ubochi15 na onwa Ọktoba 1963) bụ onye ọka iwu Cameroon na onye na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmunwanyị
A mụrụ Wandou na Kaélé, Cameroon na 15 Ọktoba 1963
Nne na nna ya kwadoro agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ si Kaélé debanyere aha na mahadum
Ọ natara ikikere na iwu onwe onye na Mahadum nke Yaoundé na nzere masta na njikwa ọrụ na Mahadim Katọlik nke Central Africa
Ọ gụkwara ọmụmụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na Mahadum Antwerp
N'afọ 1998, Wandou guzobere Action Locale pour un Développement Participatif et Autogéré (ALDEPA) iji nye ụmụagbọghọ agụmakwụkwọ na Cameroon ma gbochie ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado nkwado nke psychosocial maka ndị a na-eme ihe ike mmekọahụ na ntọrọ
Wandou na-enye nkwado iwu maka ndị na-eme ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ na-enyekwa nkwado maka ụmụaka ndị Boko Haram na-emetụta
Wandou bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite maka ihazi ihe gbasara ike nakwa ihe gbasara obibi ndu na afo 2021, na-aghọ onye Cameroon mbụ natara ihe nrite ahụ
Òtù ahụ kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị isi olu maka ichebe ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị na mpaghara ahụ'
Martin Bajčičák (amụrụ na ọnwa June 12, n'afọ 1976 na Dolný Kubín) bụ onye Slovak na-agba ọsọ ski na-agbagharị n'elu ugwu nke na-asọmpi kemgbe afọ 1994
Ihe kacha mma o mere na FIS Nordic World Ski Championships bụ nke anọ na 15 km + 15 km abụọ na 2005
Ihe kacha mma Bajčičák mere n'egwuregwu Olimpik n'oge oyi bụkwa na 15 km + 15 km abụọ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ nke asatọ na 2006
Nanị mmeri ya n'otu n'otu na World Cup bịara na 15 km na Germany na afọ 2005
Bajčičák nwekwara mmeri asaa na asọmupi FIS ruo kilomita 15 + kilomita 15 abụọ site na 2000 ruo 2006

Martin Copley (1940 – 30 Julaị 2014) bụ onye amụrụ n’Australia nke amụrụ na nchekwa na onye na-eme ebere bụ onye guzobere Australian Wildlife Conservancy (AWC), otu nzukọ nke na-azụta ma na-ejikwa nnukwu ala, ọkachasị ihe ndị bụbu anụ ụlọ, dị ka ihe okike (nke a na-akpọ “ebe nsọ”)
) maka ichekwa ihe dị iche iche dị ndụ
iche
Copley bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ego na onye na-ahụ Maka mkpuchi
Ọ gara Australia na mbụ n'afọ 1966

Martin Gauger (August 4, 1905 Elberfeld July 14, 1941 Pirna) bụ onye ọka iwu Germany na onye na-ahụ maka udo si Wuppertal, Rhenish Prussia
Ọ bụ onye otu Kreisau Circle nke chọrọ ịkwatu ọchịchị Nazi na Germany n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụ nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ asatọ
Site n'afọ 1924-1930 ọ gụrụ sayensị iwu na akụ na ụba na Tübingen, Kiel, London, Berlin na Breslau
N'afọ 1934, dị ka onye ọka iwu n'ọfịs onye ọkàiwu ọha na eze na München-Gladbach, Gauger jụrụ ịṅụ iyi ịkwado Hitler ma gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ gọọmentị
N'ọkwa ọzọ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu na (chọọchị na-ekwupụta) o tinyere onwe ya n'òtù nnupụisi
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1940, ọ gbagara Netherlands site n'ịgba mmiri gafee Osimiri Rhine
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ọ bịarutere dịka Wehrmacht nke Germany wakporo mba ahụ na-anọpụ iche
E merụrụ ya ahụ ma jide ya, tụọ ya mkpọrọ ruo n'ọnwa June 1941 na Düsseldorf-Derendorf
N'ụbọchị 2 June, a kpọgara ya n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Buchenwald; n'ụbọchị 14 July 1941 e zigara ya na Sonnenstein Euthanasia Centre, ebe e gburu ya
Martin Luther King, Jr
(Önwa mbu 15, 1929 — Önwa áno 4, 1968), mgbe mbu, bu onye Amerika onye íshí üka, onye ne mmẹ mmẹ maka ńdu madu na onye íshí di mkpa nke na cẹdolu na ogẹ mbu íwú ndụ madu nke ndi Afrika nke Amerika
Ihe o mẹrẹ di mkpa na uwa bu I me ka íwú ndu na Amerika gawá na nke oma, na dé má a wúziálá onyé madu né lezí anyá élú na ya
Üka abụọ nke Ndi Eféfé Kraist húrú ya ka onye nyéré onwe ya maka Chi
Onye íshí éféfé Baptist, King mere bú onye o bu na mgbe mbu mbu ime orü ya
O mereíshí Montgomery Bus Boycott 1955 na ó nyèrè áká I ké Southern Christian Leadership Conference na afọr 1957 ya bu íshí ya
Ihe o merìrì mere ka Ije na Washington na afọr 1963 me, o bu nga ka o nyèrè okwu 'I Have a Dream'
Nga, o safùrù madu anya na ihe íwú madu na é jé mgbe ahu na ọ mere onwe ya na anya ndi madu ka dioka ukwu na okwu ma okwu
Martin Luther King, Jr
(Önwa mbu 15, 1929 — Önwa áno 4, 1968), mgbe mbu, bu onye Amerika onye íshí üka, onye ne mmẹ mmẹ maka ńdu madu na onye íshí di mkpa nke na cẹdolu na ogẹ mbu íwú ndụ madu nke ndi Afrika nke Amerika
Ihe o mẹrẹ di mkpa na uwa bu I me ka íwú ndu na Amerika gawá na nke oma, na dé má a wúziálá onyé madu né lezí anyá élú na ya
Üka abụọ nke Ndi Eféfé Kraist húrú ya ka onye nyéré onwe ya maka Chi
Onye íshí éféfé Baptist, King mere bú onye o bu na mgbe mbu mbu ime orü ya
O mereíshí Montgomery Bus Boycott 1955 na ó nyèrè áká I ké Southern Christian Leadership Conference na afọr 1957 ya bu íshí ya

Martina Awele Nwakoby (amuru 1937) bu onye odee Naijiria
Amụrụ ya na Ọgwashi-Uku wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Niger, na Birmingham, na Mahadum Pittsburgh na mahadum nke Ibadan, na-enweta nzere PhD na agụm akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ikpeazụ
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na mahadum Abia State
Nwakoby meriri asọmpi akwụkwọ ụmụaka Macmillan nke 1978

Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ịtali

ụmụ nwanyị, iji gbaa bọọlụ na La Liga nke Spain
Piemonte bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị U-17 nke Ịtali ma gbaa bọọlụ na 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup, ebe mba ya pụtara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ

A na-enye Martine-Anstett Award, ma ọ bụ Martine-Anstett Ihe nrite nke ruuru mmadụ, kwa afọ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel na Paris nye onye, nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, na-agbasi mbọ ike ịgbachitere ikike mmadụ
Ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel bụ ụbọchị ncheta nke ụbọchị Martine Anstett nwụrụ
Onyinye ruuru mmadụ nke' Martine Anstett bụkwa iji chebe ikike nke ndị mbịarambịa
Ihe nrite a na-enye kwa afọ ruru Euro otu puku na narị ise

Onye nta akụkọ bụ Frantz Vaillant mepụtara onyinye a n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2015 iji cheta Martine Anstett (afọ 1969 rụọ afọ 2015), onye ọka iwu ọkachamara na iwu mba ụwa na onye raara ndụ ya nye Human Rights mbụ na United Nations (Geneva na New York City), mgbe ahụ maka Amnesty International, tupu ọ banye na Organisation internationale de la Francophonie (OIF)

Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke mkpakọrịta ahụ si kwuo, ihe nrite mba ụwa a na-ezube ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti mmadụ n'enweghị ọdịiche nke afọ, mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ okpukpe, 'Màkà na e nwere ndị nọ n'ụwa ndị ọrụ ha na-enweghị ekele, na-akwado ikike mmadụ, kwesịrị ka a gbaa ha ume
Ndị ọka ikpe ahụ nwere mmadụ isii (abụọ n'ime ha bụ onye isi ala na onye otu ọzọ, ndị otu NGO abụọ na ndị nta akụkọ abụọ
Ọ na-ekpebi mgbe arụmụka gasịrị màkà uru atụnyere nke ndị a họọrọ

N'ubochí iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, n'ihu Michel Forst, UN Special Rapporteur on the situation of defenders of human rights and Michaëlle Jean, Secretary General of the International Organization of La Francophonie (OIF), e nyere Cesar Estrada Chuquilin nke Peru onyinye Martine Anstett nke mbụ
César agbanahụla mgbalị igbu ọchụ ugboro ugboro
O kpughere nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi nke ọrụ Ngwuputa na Conga kpatara yana ọtụtụ mmegbu gbasara esemokwu ala na mpaghara Cajamarca
N'ubochí iri n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2017 na mmemme mmeghe nke ememme ihe nkiri nke iri na ise na nnọkọ gbasara ikike mmadụ na Geneva Switzerland Martine Anstett nyere onye nta akụkọ foto Teddy Mazina
Teddy Mazina kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'onye na-eme ncheta'
'Ise foto bụ maka m omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ana m agbalị iwulite ncheta ọhụụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme anyị ka anyị wee ghara ichefu ihe anyị nwetara

N'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, na mmemme mmeghe nke International Film Festival on Human Rights FIFDH na Geneva (Switzerland) e nyere onye ọka iwu Ijipt Azza Soliman, onye na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ ihe nrite Martine Anstett iji kwanyere ọgụ ya megide ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na mba ya
N'afọ 2018 kwa Nkwupụta Ụwa nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ (UDHR) gbara afọ iri asaa nke e mere n'emume nrite
E nyere Evdokia Romanova ihe nrite n'afọ 2019 site na obodo Samara na Russia
Onye meriri na Martine Anstett Human Rights 2020 bụ Tahani Abass, onye SudanTahani Abass bụ onye ọka iwu, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ikpe Noura Hussein onye e belatara ikpe ọnwụ ya na mkpọrọ afọ ise
