mgbe ọ hoputara n'abali iri na otu nke ọnwa Juun, afo 2015
Ọ rụbuola ọrụ dịka otu n'ime ndị Omeiwu nke nọchitere anya Isiala Ngwa North Constituency
Ọ bụ Kennedy Njoku nọchiri anya ya ka onye isi ụlọ nzukọ Omeiwu dịka ndị otu ụlọ omebe iwu ahụ wepụrụ ya na ọchịchị

Martti Oiva Kalevi Ahtisaari (Finnish (na-ege ntị); a mụrụ na 23 June 1937) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Finland, onye isi ala nke iri nke Finland (1994- 2000), onye nrite Nobel Peace Prize, na onye nnọchi anya mba United Nations na onye ogbugbo ama ama maka ọrụ udo mba ụwa ya
A mụrụ Martti Ahtisaari na Viipuri, Finland (nke bụzi Vyborg, Russia)

Nna ya, Oiva Ahtisaari (onye nna nna ya Julius Marenius Adolfsen na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara Finland n'afọ 1872 site na Tistedalen na Southern Norway) nwetara nwa amaala Finland n'afọ 1929 ma nye aha nna ya n'aka Adolfsen n'afọ 1936
Agha Na-aga n'ihu (Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ) kpọgara nna Martti n'ihu dịka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'agha NCO, ebe nne ya, Tyyne, kpọọrọ nwa ya nwoke kwaga Kuopio iji gbanahụ ihe ize ndụ ozugbo site na agha ahụ
Kuopio bụ ebe Ahtisaari nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata, mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kuopion Lyseo
N'afọ 1952, Martti Ahtisaari na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Oulu ịchọ ọrụ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1956
Ọ sonyekwara na YMCA mpaghara
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha ya (Ahtisaari nwere ọkwa nke onyeisi na Finnish Army Reserve), ọ malitere ịmụ ihe site na nkuzi nkuzi dị anya na kọleji ndị nkuzi Oulu
O nwere ike ibi n'ụlọ mgbe ọ na-aga ọmụmụ ihe afọ abụọ nke mere ka o ruo eru dịka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'afọ 1959
E wezụga asụsụ ala ya, Finnish, Ahtisaari na-asụ Swedish, French, English, na German
N'afọ 1960, ọ kwagara Karachi, Pakistan, iji duzie ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ahụike nke Swedish Pakistani Institute, ebe ọ bịara mara gburugburu mba ụwa
Na mgbakwunye na ijikwa ụlọ ụmụ akwụkwọ, ọrụ Ahtisaari gụnyere ịzụ ndị nkuzi
Ọ laghachiri Finland n'afọ 1963, wee bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị na-ahụ maka enyemaka maka mba ndị na-emepe emepe
Ọ sonyeere nzukọ ụmụ akwụkwọ mba ụwa AIESEC, ebe ọ chọpụtara mmasị ọhụrụ banyere ịdị iche iche na mmekọrịta mba na mba
N'afọ 1965, ọ sonyeere Ministry for Foreign Affairs na Bureau for International Development Aid, mesịa bụrụ osote onye isi nke ngalaba ahụ
N'afọ 1968, ọ lụrụ Eeva Irmeli Hyvärinen
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwoke, Marko Ahtisaari, onye ọchụnta ego teknụzụ na onye egwu
Marufatu Abiola Bawuah (amụrụ 25 Septemba 1968) bụ nwanyị na-ahụ maka ego na onye azụmaahịa Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa nakwa onye isi oche nke United Bank for Africa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ

Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya nke gụnyere 2016 Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana (CIMG) Marketing Woman of the Year nakwa ihe nrite Fimace Personality of the Year Award na Ghana Accountancy and Finance
Bawuah tolitere na Aflao wee gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụm akwụkwọ ya na mahadum lagos dị na Naijiria, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Actuarial Science
O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu (LLB) na Mahadum London
O nwetara diplọma n'ịre ahịa site na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA) na Executive of Master of Business Administration (EMBA) na ego sitere na Mahadum Ghana
N'ihe gbasara ịbụ onye isi, o nwere ọtụtụ iru eru na Harvard Business School, Columbia, University of New York, INSEAD na Institut Villa Pierrefeu na Switzerland
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi oche mpaghara (CEO) nke United Bank for Africa, na-ahụ maka mba isii gụnyere Ghana, Benin, Burkina Faso, Côte d'Ivoire, Liberia na Sierra Leone

Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Standard Chartered Bank dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta azụmahịa, nakwa na CAL Bank dị ka onye njikwa mmekọrịta, Strategic African Securities dị ka onye na-ere ahịa ikike, yana ya na Bentsi-Enchi na Letsa (ugbu a Bentsi-Enchil, Letsa na Ankomah) ụlọ ọrụ iwu dị ka onye ọrụ itinye ego
Na Jenụwarị 2023, Abiola Bawuah ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ onye isi oche nke UBA Africa
Ọ lụọla dị ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Marvin Pentz Gay Jr, onye dekwara aha nna ya dị ka Gaye (amuru n'ọnwa Eprel 2, n'afọ 1939 - Eprel 1, 1984) bụ onye Amerịka na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu

O nyere aka mepụta ụda Motown na 1960s, nke mbụ dị ka onye na-egwu egwu n'ime ụlọ ma mesịa dị ka onye na-ese egwu naanị ya na ọtụtụ ihe ịga nke ọma, na-enweta ya aha njirimara 'Diọkpara nke Motown' na 'Diọkpara nke obi'
Egwu Motown nke Gaye gụnyere 'Ain't That Peculiar', 'How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved By You),' na 'I Heard It Through the Grapevine'
Gaye dekwara egwu abụọ ya na Mary Wells, Kim Weston, Tammi Terrell, na Diana Ross
N'ime afọ ndị 1970, Gaye dekọrọ abọm What's Going On na Let's Get It On wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ese ihe na Motown ịhapụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Ihe ndekọ ya mechara metụta ọtụtụ ụdị R&B nke oge a, dị ka oké ifufe dị jụụ na mkpụrụ obi ọhụrụ

Ọ bụ onye a chụpụrụ ụtụ isi na Europe na mmalite afọ 1980; ọ wepụtara 'Sexual Healing' na afọ 1982, nke meriri ya Grammy Awards abụọ mbụ ya na abọm Midnight Love Ngosipụta ikpeazụ Gaye na ihe ọyoyo bụ na 1983 NBA All-Star Game, ebe ọ bụrụ abụ 'The Star-Spangled Banner'; Motown 25 Ụnyaahụ, Taa, Ruo Mgbe Ebighị Ebi; na Soul Train
Marwa Hassan (Arabic) bụ onye Egypt na agba ọsọ
Mgbe Hassan ka bụ nwata, nne di ya gbochiri Hassan n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma mee ka ọ ree ngwugwu anụ ahụ n'okporo ámá
Ọ maghị akwụkwọ, o nweghịkwa ekwentị ma ọ bụ uwe mapụtara ya
Na February 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ 13, ọ hụrụ igwe mmadụ n'okporo ụzọ wee gwa ya na ọ bụ marathon ụmụaka maka Aswan Heart Center
Ọ bụ ezie na o nweghị uwe mwụda ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ọ gwara ya ka ọ bata
Ndị na-ahazi asọmpi ahụ nyere ya ohere isonye na-akwụghị ụgwọ ụzọ mbata, n'ụkwụ efu na iyi ogologo uwe mwụda, ọ meriri marathon na-atụghị anya ya
O nwetara nrite, otu karama mmanụ esi nri, na njem ụgbọ mmiri n'efu na osimiri Naịl nke gụnyere nri ehihie
Ọ natara otuto site n'aka onye nnọchi anya Britain bụ John Casson na Kọmitii Olympic nke Ijipt
E mere ya onye otu Egyptian Athletic Federation na Tala'ea El Gaish SC
Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri na ere akwa n'okporo ámá, ebe nna ya bụ onye ọrụ na arụ ọrụ na obere ego, a kwụsịtụrụ ọzụzụ egwuregwu ya n'oge ọrịa COVID-19, ụlọ ha furu efu na idei mmiri nke 2021
O jisiri ike bụrụ naanị onye n'ezinụlọ ya gara ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na mbido afọ 2022, ọ banyere n'asọmpi mbụ ya dị ka onye na agba ọsọ ọkachamara, nke Tala'ea El Gaish SC kwadoro, wee merie ọzọ n'ọnọdụ mbụ
Ka ọ na erule Septemba 2022 ọ na aga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Marwa Hassani (amụrụ na 15 Septemba 2002) bụ onye na agba bọọlụ nke na agbachitere otu egwuregwu VGA Saint-Maur nke Division 2 Féminine
A mụrụ ya na France, ọ na anọchite anya Morocco na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Hassani na Tournan-en-Brie
Hassani agbaala bọọlụ maka Saint-Maur na France
Hassani mere nke mbụ ya na Morocco na 26 Nọvemba 2020
Marwa Rakha (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Ijipt na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị

Rakha bụ onye mmekọrịta na ndụmọdụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'ọtụtụ ebe na Egypt na Arab World, na-apụtakarị na mbipụta na usoro mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi, ọkachasị ihe ngosi okwu, a makwaara ya nke ọma maka echiche esemokwu ya banyere mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwa agbọghọbia na-amaghị nwoke
Ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma bụ The Poison Tree Planted and Grown in Egypt
Rakha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ain Shams na 1996 na nzere na akwụkwọ Bekee
Tupu ọ ghọọ onye edemede mmekọrịta na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị, Rakha nwere otutu ọrụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere onye nnabata na onye nduzi ahịa maka ụlọ nkwari akụ
N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ibipụta isiokwu mgbe ọ na-akụzi ihe na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Akwụkwọ ya, The Poison Tree Planted and Grown in Egypt, pụtara na Jenụwarị 2008
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ọ bidoro ihe ngosi redio Arabic ma n'ọnwa Juun, ọ malitere nsụgharị Bekee
Ọ na-akụzi ahịa ugbu a na Mahadum America dị na Cairo ma na-ede maka magazin asụsụ Bekee atọ, otu akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin Arabic, na weebụsaịtị abụọ
A gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ ogologo oge banyere echiche ya banyere alụmdi na nwunye na mmekọrịta n'akwụkwọ 'Sex and the Citadel'
A maara Rakha nke oma na obodo Arab World maka echiche esemokwu ya banyere ọtụtụ isiokwu metụtara mmekọrịta na ahụike mmekọahụ

O kwuru, sị, 'A zụlitere m ka m bụrụ ezigbo nwa agbọghọ Ijipt; mana n'ụzọ ụfọdụ, ịdị mma adabaghị n'echiche mEnweghị m ike ịghọta ihe mere e ji gbuo ụmụ agbọghọbia, gbuo onwe ha, ma ọ bụ bie ndụ na ihere ebighi ebi mgbe ha tụfuru nwa agbọghọbia nke na-amaghị nwoke
Amaghị m ihe mere iwu dị otú ahụ ji emetụta naanị ụmụ agbọghọbia na ụmụ nwoke ibe ha ji dị ndụ

Edere ya n'ọtụtụ ụdị, The Poison Tree Planted and Grown in Egypt na-ekpuchi isiokwu sitere na alụmdi na nwunye, ịgba alụkwaghịm, mmekọahụ, mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwa agbọghọ na nwanyị, okpukpe, na agha nwoke na nwanyị
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na Jenụwarị, 2008
Marwan Hamed (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt na-eto eto
Ọ bụ nwa onye edemede Wahid Hamed na onye nta akụkọ Zeinab Sweidan
Nke sochiri ya bu ihe nkiri dị mkpa akpọrọ The Yacoubian Building nke dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Alaa Al Aswany na Adel Emam
O sonyere na ntụziaka nke usoro Lahzat Harija ma mepụta vidiyo egwu maka Amr Diab
Ibrahim Labyad nke Ahmed El-Sakka na Hend Sabry sochiri Yacoubian Building nke e wepụtara na 2009
Mgbe ahụ, ọ wepụtara The Blue Elephant nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Karim Abdel Aziz na Khaled Al Sawy, ma dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ahmed Mourad nke otu aha ahụ
Marwazi (Persian) ma ọ bụ al-Marwazi (Arabụ) bụ nisba nke pụtara 'site na Merv', obodo akụkọ ihe mere eme na (Khorasan mbụ na Central Asia ugbu a), nso Mary nke taa na Turkmenistan
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na

MaryJane Mwangi, nakwa Mary Jane Mwangi, bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Kenya, bụ onye jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa na onye isi nchịkwa nke National Oil Corporation of Kenya, site na Augusiti 2017 ruo Okotomber 2019
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nairobi na Master of Business Administration na 2006
Ọ na-ejidekwa Diploma Higher na Human Resource Management, nke e nyere na 2013, site na Institute of Human Resource Management (IHRM), nke dabeere na Nairobi, isi obodo Kenya na obodo kacha ukwuu

Ọ malitere ogologo ọrụ ya na mpaghara mmanụ ndị ahịa na 1993, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mbupụ maka Agip Kenya Limited (AGKL), onye na-ahụ maka ikesa mmanụ na mmanụ sitere na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị na Mombasa ruo mba ise na mpaghara nnukwu ọdọ mmiri Africa, na-eje ozi
n'ime ikike ahụ ruo 1998
Ruo otu afọ, site na 1998 ruo 1999, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ ahịa na AGKL
N'afọ sochirinụ, site na 1999 ruo 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta LPG na AGKL
Na afọ 2000, ọ gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ wee kwaga Shell / BP, dị ka onye njikwa LPG, dabere na obodo Malindi dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo 2001
Na 2001 ọ kwagara ọzọ, na-akwaga na Chevron / Caltex Kenya Limited, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa ahịa, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ afọ asaa
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara Mwangi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba ire ahịa na ahịa na National Oil Corporation of Kenya (NOCK), na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ afọ ise na-abịa
Na onwa July 2013, a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa, Downstream Operations na NOCK, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo July 2016, mgbe a họpụtara ya Onye isi nchịkwa na onye na-arụ ọrụ

Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ ike na otu afọ, ndị ụlọ ọrụ NOCK kwadoro Mwangi, dị ka onye isi isi na onye isi njikwa, maka afọ atọ dị irè na ubochi nke mbụ na onwa August 2017, nọchiri Sumayya Hassan-Athmani, onye gbara arụkwaghịm na July 2016
Na July 2016, n'ikike ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ CEO, ọ sonyeere na ndị isi oche nke NOCK, ma bụrụ onye otu ruo mgbe ọ ga-apụ na October 2019
Mangi lụrụ Martin Mbogo, onye njikwa Tullow Oil Kenya
Mary A
Miller (née, Davis; aha mkpịsị aka, dị iche iche; September 18, 1837 - September 23, 1925) bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ America na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye dere History of the Woman's Foreign Missionary Society of the Methodist Protestant Church, 1896

Aha Miller pụtara dị ka onye nchịkọta ozi ala ọzọ nke ngalaba nwanyị ahụ na Methodist Recorder, nke e bipụtara na Pittsburgh, ma kemgbe 1885, dị ka onye editọ na onye na-ebipụta na Women's Missionary Record, akụkụ nke Women's Foreign Missionary Society nke Methodist Protestant Church (WFMS; haziri na 1879)
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke Women'S Missionary Record na-eje ozi na ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ iri
Miller jere ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ isii, na nzukọ ndị nnọchi anya World, na nzukọ abụọ nke London, na nzukọ World Conference, na 1885
A mụrụ Mary A
Davis na Allegheny, Pennsylvania, na Septemba 18, 1837
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke abụọ nke David Davis

Choosing the profession of teacher she taught for five years until she married William Miller of allegheny her first public literary work was done in 1858 being poems and short stories the latter of which were continued with more or less intermission under a pen name until 1874 when the death of her husband and the business cares consequently caused an interruptionher natural timidity in her early efforts caused her frequently to change her pen name so that it often occurred in the household Thatcher stories were read without a suspicion of the authors presenỌrụ edemede mbụ ya n'aha nke ya bụ na 1878, na-abụ usoro akwụkwọ ozi na-akọwa njem ọdịda anyanwụ site na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, gaa Montana site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ikpo okwu, site na Montana gaa Utah, na site na Utah gaa New Mexico
Miller bụ onye guzobere WFMS nke Chọọchị Protestant Metọdist, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bịanye aka na Charter ya, ya na Mrs
John Scott, Oriakụ Susan E
Anderson, Oriakụ J
Claney, na Mrs
James I

Bennett N'oge Nzukọ nke Abụọ nke WFMS, nke e mere na Pittsburgh, 1881, a họpụtara Miller dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke 'Methodist Recorder', nke ọ jupụtara ruo mgbe a malitere akụkụ nke Society, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya
Akụkụ ahụ, Woman's Missionary Record, bụ kwa ọnwa, na ọnụahịa nke US $50 kwa afọ

N'oge Nzukọ nke Atọ Kwa Afọ, nke e mere na Cambridge, Ohio, 1882 Miller kwuru na n'echiche ya, 'Ọchịchọ Society nwere ịnwe onwe ya na Board of Missions bụ na ọ nwere ike ịkwaga ọrụ ya na mba ọzọ ngwa ngwa karịa ka iwu nke Board yiri ka ọ na-akwado'
Na Nzukọ Afọ nke Ise, nke emere na Springfield, Ohio, 1884, Miller bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ a họpụtara ịnọchite anya Society na General Conference
Na Nzukọ nke asatọ kwa afọ, nke e mere na Ohio, Illinois, 1887, Miller na Mrs
A họpụtara J
Palmer ka ọ nọchite anya WFMS na nnọkọ ọzọ nke Nzukọ Ezumezu

Na Nzukọ nke itoolu kwa afọ, nke emere na Washington, DC, 1888, a mara ọkwa na Miller nọchitere anya Society na Nzukọ mbụ nke Ecumenical nke Foreign Missions of World's Missionary Convention nke zutere na Exeter Hall London na Miller na-ebu ego nke ya na ọ nwere ike ịnọ na nzukọ a ma si otú a nweta mkpali ọhụrụ, ma n'otu aka ahụ, tinye ọrụ nke Society yana ndị otu ochie
E mere nnọkọ nke iri na isii kwa afọ na 1895 na Lafayette Ave
Chọọchị Protestant Metọdist, na Baltimore, Maryland, ebe, Miller, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke 'Missionary Record', gbara arụkwaghịm ka ọ na-ahapụ Pittsburgh iji mee ụlọ ya na Kansas City, Kansas
O dere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke WFMS na 1896, ebe ọ chịkọtara akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke afọ iri na isii mbụ nke nzukọ ahụ
N'afọ 1907, ọ sonyeere Marietta Louise Gibson Stephens na Julia Hickey na Japan ileta ụlọ ọrụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke mba ahụ
Mary A
Davis Miller nwụrụ na Septemba 23, 1925 ma lie ya na Forest Hill Cemetery, Dunmore, Pennsylvania

Mary Akpobome amụrụ kpọọ Mary Udoh Bassey, July 11, 1968 nye Ben Bassey Udoh, na Janet Bassey Udoh, Efa,na Akwa Ibom, Nigeria bụ onye nduzi nke Heritage Banking Company Limited nke Nigeria (HBCL)
Mary gara Qua Iboe Mission Secondary School, Etinan, Akwa Ibom wee gaa Mahadum Benin ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Theater Arts na 1991, na 2001, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ nwetara MBA ya
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ a ma ama INSEAD na INSEAD Business School, Orchestrating Winning Performance (IMD), Lausanne, Switzerland na Lagos Business School (LBS)
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi (IOD), onye otu ibe nke Institute of Credit Administration (ICA)

Mary bụ onye isi nchịkwa maka otu ọrụ na njikwa akụ nke Heritage Banking Company Limited (HBCL)

N'ịbụ onye malitere ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya na 1991 na n'ime ihe karịrị ohu afọ abụọ nke ahụmahụ ụlọ akụ na-arụ ọrụ; Citizens International Bank (ugbu a Enterprise Bank Limited, Nigeria ) na Bank PHB (ugbu a Keystone Bank )

Mary Ammirato-Collins (ma ọ bụ Mary Collins Ammirato, amụrụ na Eprel 3, 1908, ụbọchị ọnwụ ya bụ nke a na-amaghị) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ede uri amụrụ na Houston, Texas
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Académie Julian na Paris
O gosipụtara na Salon des Indépendants na 1937
Mary gosipụtakwara enamels ya na ọla kọpa n'oge ọ gara US na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Mary biri na Canary Islands ya na di ya Claudio Ammirato, onye bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ede egwu, na onye guru physics

Mary bụ onye njem nke Eleanor na nwa agbọghọ Ziegfeld Follies na New York City ebe ọ zutere Claudio
Ammirato-Collins dere libretto maka opera di ya, Paradise Lost (A comedy for Modern Times)
Ammirato bụ onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ uri, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ ndị di ya Claudio Ammirato sere
-Mary Hardie Bamber (née Little; 18 Jenụarị 1874 – 4 June 1938), nke a na-akpọkarị Ma Bamber, bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Scotland, onye otu azụmaahịa, onye ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ na onye nkwuputa
Nwa ya nwanyị Bessie Braddock bụ onye omeiwu nke Labour (MP)
N'ịbụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na nzuzo ma biri n'otu n'ime akụkụ ndị kasị baa ọgaranya nke Edinburgh, ndụ nwata Bamber dị nnọọ iche na nke ndị ogbenye nọ na Liverpool ọ ga-ebi n'etiti ha
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa agbọghọ, nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu malitere ịṅụ mmanya ma otu ụbọchị ọ hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ ka a ghara ịhụ ya ọzọ

Ndụ nne ya Agnes Glanders Little (née Thomson) ruo mgbe ahụ bụ nkwadebe na-adịghị mma maka ịdị ike nke ịbụ nne naanị ya na ụmụ isii iji kwaỌ rụsiri ọrụ ike n'ịgba akwụkwọ na n'ọrụ ndị ọzọ iji na-elekọta ezinụlọ ya, na-emekọrịta ihe nke ọma na ọnọdụ ịda ogbenye, mgbe ọkpara ya nwetara ọrụ na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Liverpool, ezinụlọ ya so ya bịa
N'oge oyi nke 1906-7, Mary nọ na njem nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ofe iji ree efere site na ụgbọala Clarion nke St George's Hall kwụsịrị na Lime Street
Ọ gara leta ndị ọrịa, chịkọta maka ndị na-enweghị ọrụ ma mee ka ụlọ ghere oghe maka ndị na'eme njem
Ọ na-ekwukarị okwu na nzukọ ndị dị n'èzí, mgbe mgbe na ihe ncheta Wellington ma ọ bụ na nkuku okporo ámáSylvia Pankhurst kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-ekwu okwu ikpo okwu kachasị mma na mba ahụ'
N'otu obodo nke ịrọ òtù na-achị, ọ jụrụ ihe e ji amata okpukpe ọ bụla, ọ na-agbasikwa mbọ ike ná nnọkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Katọlik ma ndị Protestant
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ site na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahazi òtù ọrụ ka Bamber ghọrọ onye a na-ahụkarị
N'ime afọ ndị na-eduga na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akwụsịghị akwụsị dị ka onye ọrụ maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Ndị Ọrụ
Ọ gara ogologo ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri, na-ahazi ụmụ nwanyị site na Johnson's Cleaners and Dye Works na njedebe North ruo Wilson's Bobbin Works na South
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahazi òtù ndị ọrụ bụ isi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Bamber, ọ na-ejikọta ya na ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ nọ na ngosipụta 'Bloody Sunday' n'oge ọgbaghara ụgbọ njem Liverpool na 1911
N'afọ 1919, o guzoro dị ka onye otu Labour Party na mpaghara ndị Protestant nke Everton
N'ime mkpọsa maka okwu ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị dị ka mmiri ara ehi, agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ ịsa ákwà obodo, ọ meriri site na obere mmeri
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Kọmunist nke mpaghara ahụ ma na 1920 ọ gara Nzukọ nke Abụọ nke International nke Atọ na Moscow
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii mpaghara na National Unemployed Workers Committee ma, na Septemba 1921, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị e jidere n'oge ọrụ nke Walker Art Gallery
Ọ chọghị oge nke abụọ dị ka onye kansụl obodo ma ka ọ na-erule afọ 1924 ọ hapụrụ ndị Communist Party, na-ekwu na ọ na-etinye aka n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye nhazi
Ọ nọ na ngosipụta niile dị mkpa e mere n'afọ ndị 1920 na n'ime afọ iri atọ
Ọ kwuru okwu na nzukọ ikpeazụ ya naanị izu abụọ tupu ya anwụọ
Mary Begumisa (born in 1976) is a Ugandan politician and woman member of parliament
The office she attained after being elected as a woman representative for Sembabule district during the 2021 Uganda general elections in January

Mary completed her primary level education (PLE) at Lwebitakuli primary school, and completed her Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) for lower secondary education at Bukulula secondary school in Masaka

a school where she later completed her advanced secondary level known as Uganda Advanced Certification of Education (UACE)Begumisa graduate from Makerere University with a bachelor's degree in Social Sciences
Mary's career begun taking a shape in 2000, after her appointment as a sub county chief in Rakai district

After graduating from Makerere University in 2003, she resigned and chose to venture into the Tour and Travel Business with her husband Wilbur Begumisa and they later established a Gorilla Trek Africa Adventure Safaris
Mary Berko (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa isii n'afọ 1988) o bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke dịka onye na-agba n'etiti bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2014 African Women's Championship
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ndị uwe ojii Accra na Ghana
Mary Bluett (amụrụ na 12 Machị 1951) bụ onye ọrụ aka Australia na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke alaka Victoria nke Australian Education Union (AEU)
N'afọ 1974, Bluett ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya alaka nke Victorian Secondary Teachers Association (VSTA)
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Central Committee nke VSTA
N'afọ 1982, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke VSTA, tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche ናይ VSTA n'afọ 1994
VSTA mechara jikọta ya na ndị nkuzi Victorian abụọ ọzọ iji ghọọ alaka Victorian nke AEU
Bluett ghọrọ osote onye isi oche mbụ nke Victoria AEU
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke AEU's Victorian Branch na 1998

N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2012, Fair Work Australia nyere AEU ohere ịtụ vootu ndị enyemaka ndị nkuzi na ndị ọrụ nkwado ndị ọzọ ma ha ga-esonye na atụmatụ ịgba arụkwaghịm na Septemba n'afọ 2012 gbasara ụgwọ gọọmentị Ted Baillieu
Bluett kpọrọ mkpebi ahụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-ekwu na 'anyị emeela mkparịta ụka n'ihe gbasara ndị nkuzi ihe karịrị ọnwa itoolu, ọ bụghịkwa ihe ezi uche dị na ya ime ihe a manyere anyị ime'

Ntuli aka ahụ gafere na ihe karịrị 97% nkwado, na Bluett na-ekwu na 'ndị ọrụ nkwado agụmakwụkwọ ka bụ ndị a na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị ala n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Victorian ma na-enweta obere ma ọ bụ enweghị nkwenye maka nkà ha, ahụmịhe na ọrụ dị mkpa ha na-arụ'

Ọgbaghara a mere n'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2012, ebe Bluett kwuru na mkparịta ụka ya na gọọmentị Victoria kwụsịrị n'ụbọchị iri itoolu n'ọnwarị, ma kpọọ atụmatụ ịbawanye ụgwọ ọrụ 25% mkparị
O kwukwara na atụmatụ gọọmentị gụnyere echiche ndị na-akpali akpali dịka ịchụpụ pasent ise nke ndị nkuzi na ime ka ndị nkuzi nwee ọganihu ọkachamara n'oge ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ

Ụbọchị isii ka e mesịrị, Bluett kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịpụ dịka onye isi oche AEU Victoria na 31 Disemba 2012, na njedebe nke oge ya, na-ekwu na 'òtù ahụ etoola nke ukwuu n'ike, nke bụ ihe m ji n'ezie'
Mary Boyoi bụ onye na-agụ egwu South Sudan, onye edemede na nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu SSPDF Commander
Nna Mary, onye isi agbụrụ Murle na onye isi agha n'ime Sudan People's Liberation Movement / Army (SPLM / A) nwụrụ n'afọ 1989
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ya na ezinụlọ ya nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Sudan na ogige ndị gbara ndụ na Etiopia iji zere esemokwu nke agha
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu na Kenya ma mechaa usoro ọmụmụ diplọma
N'afọ 2002, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na ebe dị iche iche na South Sudan
Site n'ọrụ enyemaka, Boyoi chọtara mmasị ya na-enyere ndị ọzọ aka
Boyoi na-eji nkà pụrụ iche ya n'egwú eme ka ihe doo anya n'okwu ma na-akpọ maka udo na ime udo n'etiti ndị ya
N'afọ 2005, o guzobere ABONA International, otu na-enweghị uru nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwado udo na South Sudan dum na inye ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ agbọghọ aka n'ọnọdụ ime ihe ike na mbibi
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọrụ egwu mbụ ya, nke a na-akpọ 'SáReferendum'
Mary Boyoi bụ onye isi nchịkwa na onye guzobere Voice of the Peace (VOP) ugbu a
VOP bụ otu NGO nke mba na-enye nkwado psychosocial na ụzọ ntụgharị maka nlekọta ahụike nye ndị lanarịrị Gender-Based Violence (GBV)
Òtù NGO na-elekwasị anya n'ịmata obodo site n'ịgakwuru ndị otu dị iche iche na obodo
VOP nwere oghere maka ụmụaka yana oghere maka ụmụ agbọghọ iji nye ndị GBV lanarịrị ebe nchekwa
Ha na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na-adịghị ike na-arụkwa ọrụ site n'inye ha nkà dị ka ịkpa nkata, ịkpa ákwà na ọrụ aka ndị ọzọ iji nye ha ike ịghọ ndị nweere onwe ha n'ụzọ ego
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, ndị otu Murle họpụtara Boyoi ka ọ gbaa ọsọ maka oche ndị omeiwu na Southern Sudan Legislative Assembly na Juba
O mere mkpọsa maka ntuli aka e mere n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2010
Zooz, abụ sitere na Boyoi nke a ka na-ewepụta abọm nke abụọ gosipụtara na Sudan Votes Music Hopes na Machị 2010
Sudan Votes Music Hopes bụ njikọ aka nke ndị na-ese ihe si n'ofe Sudan dere egwu ntuli aka 'iji gbaa ndị Sudan ume ka ha mee akara maka ọdịnihu ha'
Onye na-agụ egwú German bụ Max Herre chịkọtara abọm SVMH ma na-ekesa ya gafee Sudan na cassettes ọdịyo, redio na dijitalụ site na sudanvotescom
Ọ bụ Media in Cooperation and Transition (MICT) mepụtara mmepụta ahụ ma ụlọ ọrụ German Foreign Office kwadoro ya
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, ụlọ ọrụ Süd Electronic wepụtara vinyl nwere ụlọ remixes site na Tama Sumo na Portable
Mary lụrụ onye ọrụ enyemaka America nke ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ; ụmụ nwoke niile
E kwenyere na ya na nwoke ahụ kewara
O nwekwara nwa 'Akech' ya na onye na-eti egwu na Hardlife Avenue bụ Mantani nke o kwupụtara na ThaWave Podcast na Facebook ya mgbe onye na-eme egwu ahụ nwụrụ
Mary Carlin (13 Ọgọst 1873 - 5 Eprel 1939) bụ onye otu ọrụ aka nke Britain
A mụrụ ya na Eastwood, Nottinghamshire, Carlin ghọrọ onye na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 1916, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye nhazi mba, maka Dock, Wharf, Riverside na General Labourers' Union
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Women's Advisory Council nke Ministry of Munitions, na kọmitii nyocha banyere Women's Army Auxiliary Corps
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, Carlin malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na No More War Movement, na-ahazi nnukwu ngagharị iwe na 1922
Ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama na Labour Party, a họpụtara ya na National Executive Committee na 1924 ma jee ozi ọtụtụ afọ
O guzoro n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na Balham na Tooting na ntuli aka 1928 London County Council
N'afọ 1930, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka Westminster Abbey, ọ bụ ezie na o mechara ghara iguzo
Òtù ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Transport and General Workers' Union, Carlin ghọkwara onye ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ na odeakwụkwọ nke Women's Guild
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe nke ndị ọka ikpe dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ọrụ
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ngwụcha afọ 1930 wee nwụọ na mberede na 1939

Mary Cathryn Ricker (amụrụ na Disemba 15, 1968) bụ onye isi ọrụ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi na United States, onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Albert Shanker Institute ugbu a, otu na-enweghị uru, nke na-enweghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị raara onwe ya nye isiokwu atọ ịdị mma na agụmakwụkwọ ọha na eze, òtù dị ka ndị na-akwado àgwà, na nnwere onwe nke mkpakọrịta na ndụ ọha na eze nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịmepụta echiche, ịkwalite mgbanwe ndị na-achọ, ma kwalite atụmatụ iwu na-ewuli elu metụtara nsogbu ndị a
N'ihi ebumnuche ndị a, ASI na-eme nchọpụta mbụ, na-akwado nchọpụta, ma na-ahazi nzukọ na mkparịta ụka na mpaghara atọ ya
Ricker jere ozi dị ka onye nkuzi klas, Kọmishọna nke Mmụta maka Steeti Minnesota, dị ka Onye isi oche nke American Federation of Teachers, na dị ka Onye Isi oche nke Saint Paul Federation of Teachors
A mụrụ Ricker ma zụlite ya na Hibbing, Minnesota
Ricker bụ onye nkuzi National Board Certified onye bụ onye nkuchi Bekee na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Bekee / asụsụ maka afọ 13 na St
Cloud, Minnesota; Camas, Washington; na Seoul
Ọ kụzikwaara afọ ise na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze Saint Paul
Ricker nwere ahụmịhe dị ka onye isi oche gara aga nke St
Paul Federation of Teachers site na 2005 ruo 2014, otu ndị otu 4000+ na-ejere ndị nkuzi na ndị enyemaka agụmakwụkwọ na St
Paul Public Schools ozi
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Ricker ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke American Federation of Teachers
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya mpaghara na St
Paul Area Trades and Labor Assembly ma jee ozi na bọọdụ nke Minnesota AFL-CIO
A họpụtara Ricker ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Education Minnesota Governing Board ma rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii ndị otu Education Minnesota
Ricker rụkwara ọrụ na National Board for Professional Teaching Standards na dịka onye isi oche gara aga nke Education Minnesota Foundation for Teaching and Learning
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Middle School na bọọdụ nke Minnesota Council of Teachers of English
Ricker na-ejekwa ozi na Board of Directors maka National Democratic Institute, Department for Professional Employees, AFL-CIO, United Way of America, na Albert Shanker Institute
Àtụ Soundbox

Mary Ella Dignam (A mụrụ Mary Ella Williams; 1857ń1938) bụ onye Canada na-ese ihe, onye nkuzi, na onye na-ahazi nka nke a na-echeta nke ọma dị ka onye guzobere na onye isi oche mbụ nke Women's Art Association of Canada (WAAC)
A mụrụ Mary Ella Williams na Port Burwell, Ontario na ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1857
Ọ gụrụ nka na Western School of Art and Design na London, Ontario

N'afọ 1886, ọ gara New York City iji gaa n'ihu na ọzụzụ ya na Art Students League, oge sochiri ya na Paris, France, na ụlọ ọrụ onye na-ese ihe nke Raphaël Collin (1850-1916) na Luc-Olivier Merson (1846-1920) na-eduzi
N'afọ 1886, Dignam guzobere Women's Art Club, nke mechara ghọọ WAAC
N'oge ọ bụ onye isi ala (1887-1913, 1935-1938), Dignam bụ ihe na-akpali mmepụta nke Cabot Commemorative State Dinner Service
Nke a bụ ihe eji aka mee ihe asatọ, ebe iri abụọ na anọ na-anọchite anya ndị Canada nke ndị otu WAAC mere iji cheta ncheta 400 nke nchọpụta John Cabot nke Canada
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Canada na 1891, ọ kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ụmụ nwanyị na Toronto, Ontario ma mesịa hazie ụlọ ọrụ nka mbụ nke Moulton Ladies' College na Mahadum McMaster

N'afọ 1898, Dignam na Lady Edgar, nwunye onye isi oche nke House of Commons, mere ndokwa ka ndị otu House na Senate tinye $ 1,000 iji zụta ọrụ ahụ, nke e nyere Lady Aberdeen n'ụzọ ziri ezi n'oge di ya na-emecha ọrụ ya dị ka Gọvanọ General nke Canada

O mechara nyere aka hazie International Society of Women Painters and Sculptors na n'afọ 1900, hiwere ihe ngosi nka mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na-akpọ ndị otu Women's Art Association & Women's International Art
Dignam bụ onye otu Art Association nke Montreal (1886-1931), Ontario Society of Artists (1883-1912), Royal Canadian Academy of Arts (1883-1924), na Toronto Industrial Exhibition (1891-1900)
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Canada na New York, London, na Paris
Dignam gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Palace of Fine Arts na 1893 World's Columbian Exposition na Chicago, Illinois
Ọ nwụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Septemba 1938 na Toronto, Ontario

Mary Adeola Temitope Asake Durojaye, ma ọ bụ Mary Durojaye, (amụru n'abalị iri na anọ nke onwa julai n'afọ 1990 na London, United Kingdom) bụ nwanyị Britain na-egwu egwuregwu basketball nke oma ma site na ala Naijiria
Mary E
Ireland (née, Haines; aha mkpịsị aka, Marie Norman; Jenụwarị 9, 1834 - Ọktoba 29, 1927) bụ onye edemede na onye ntụgharị America
A mụrụ ya na Maryland, ọ biri ndụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Washington, DC, na-ele ọrụ edemede ya anya dị ka ntụrụndụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-echeta ya dị ka 'onye na-ede uri nke Cecil County', ọ malitere ide uri n'oge ndụ ya, ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ọ nwetara ọdịiche dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ
Site na 1895 ruo 1918, o dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ a ma ama maka ndị na-eto eto, ma e wezụga ịbụ onye dere akụkọ, uri, na edemede
Ọrụ ya pụtara na Cecil Whig, Scribner's Magazine, Oxford Press, Arthur's Magazine
Ọrụ ya kachasị ewu ewu bụ Timothy na ndị enyi ya

Ọ sụgharịrị site na German ọrụ Bertha Clément (1852-1930), Elisabeth Philippine Karoline von Dewitz (1820-1899), Nikolaus Fries (1823-1894), Elizabeth Halden (aha njirimara nke Agnes Breitzmann), John J
Messmer, Karl Gustav Nieritz (1795-1876), Otto Nietschmann (1840-1929), Emmy von Rhoden (aha njikere nke Emilie Auguste Karoline Henriette Friedrich-Friedrich), Richard Roth, na Emma Seifert
A mụrụ Mary Eliza Haines n'obodo nta nke Brick Meeting House (nke bụzi Calvert), Maryland, na Jenụwarị 9, 1834
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Joseph na Harriet (Kirk) Haines
N'akụkụ nna, nke isii n'agbụrụ Richard Haines, Quaker English, onye si Oxfordshire na 1682
N'akụkụ nne, Scotch-Irish; nke isii n'agbụrụ Roger Kirk, onye si Lurgen, Province of Ulster, na 1712
Ezinụlọ abụọ ahụ zụrụ ala dị n'akụkụ 40 acres nke William Penn nyere n'onwe ya na 1701 nke ha ga-ewu ụlọ nzukọ ndị enyi
Ha chere na ha nọ na Chester County, Pennsylvania, mana mgbe, na 1763, akara Mason-Dixon na-agba ọsọ, ha chọpụtara na ha nọ n'ime Cecil County, Maryland
Nna nna ya, Job Haines, dị ka onye otu Maryland Legislature, sooro ndị ọzọ so n'òtù ahụ gaa olili ozu nke General George Washington
N'ụlọ ochie nke nne na nna ya, ọ tolitere ruo ogo mmadụ, ya na ụmụnne ya, Charles (1826-1866), Cornelia (b
1828), Lewis K
(1831-1835), William L
(b1825), na Reuben (b
Ireland gụrụ akwụkwọ na seminarị ụmụ nwanyị nke Jamaica, Long Island, ma nwee nkà maka egwu na eserese
Mgbe ọ dNo ị obere, Ireland' dere akụkọ dị mkpirikpi akpọrọ 'Ellen Linwood', n'okpuru aha 'Marie Norman', nke e bipụtara na Cecil Whig, nke Palmer C
Ricketts dezigharịrị
Otu n'ime ihe osise mbụ ya bụ 'The Defoe Family in America,' nke e bipụtara na Scribner's Magazine na 1876, nke e depụtaghachiri n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ
N'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, ọ na-ede akwụkwọ maka Cecil Whig na Oxford Press mgbe ụfọdụ

O dere akụkọ maka Arthur's Magazine, ebe ọ nọ na Philadelphia n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe edere ya, ọ kpọgara ya n'ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ, ebe ọ zutere Timothy Shay Arthur na nke mbụ ya, onye ọ matara site na nwata site na akwụkwọ ya
O ji obiọma nabata ya, kwe ya nkwa ịgụ akụkọ ya, ma mee ka ọ mara mkpebi ya n'echi ya
Mkpebi ahụ bụ, na ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-atọ ụtọ ma dee ya nke ọma, ọ dabara na magazin ya
Ọ tụrụ aro akwụkwọ akụkọ ọzọ ebe ọ ga-enwe ihu ọma
Ọ rịọkwara maka akụkọ ọzọ, ma nye ya ọtụtụ magazin ka ọ hụ ụdị edemede ọ chọrọ
Ọ nọgidere na-akọ akụkọ mbụ ya (nke ọ jụrụ) ruo afọ atọ, mee mgbanwe ụfọdụ na ya, ọ nabatara ma bipụta ya
O mechara bụrụ onye na-enye aka na Cottage Hearth, Household, na magazin ndị ọzọ dị n'ụlọ, ma e wezụga The Literary World, Ladies' Cabinet, Woman's Journal, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ụka
Oge ya gụnyere nyochaa akwụkwọ ọhụrụ maka ndị nta akụkọ
O dere akụkọ abụọ nke nwetara ihe nrite mbụ
N'afọ 1882, a chịkọtara akụkọ mkpirikpi ya ma mee ka ọ bụrụ akụkọ na-aga n'ihu nke J
Lippincott & Co, Philadelphia bipụtara, n'okpuru aha Timothy, His Neighbors and His Friends

Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ozi ekele sitere n'akụkụ ndị dị anya nke mba ahụ gbara akaebe banyere uru nke akwụkwọ ahụ, a gbakwara ya ume ka ọ kwado arịrịọ nke Presbyterian Observer Company nke Baltimore iji dee usoro maka akwụkwọ ha
A kpọrọ ya 'Ivandale', ndị ọkàikpe nke akwụkwọ edemede ji obi ụtọ jaa ya mma

Na Otterbrook's Blessing (1902), Ireland dere akụkọ dị nro, nke na-akpali akpali banyere ndụ nwa agbọghọ, dịka Liela Harcourt kọrọ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, malitere n'ụbọchị ọ dị afọ iri na isii, na aro nne nne ya

Otterbrook Parsonage (1904), ihe na-aga n'ihu na Otterbroak's Blessing, dị ka obi ụtọ na nke dị mma dị ka onye bu ya ụzọ, na-egosi Liela Harcourt na-ebi ndụ obi ụtọ ma baa uru dị ka nwunye onye ụkọchukwu obodo
N'ịchọ ịgụ akwụkwọ German na mbụ, ọ malitere ịmụ asụsụ ahụ

Ebe ọ bụ na ọ chọghị imepụta oge maka nkuzi oge niile, ọ nwetara onye na-agụ mkpụrụedemede German, na-enweghị ntụziaka site n'aka onye ọ bụla, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịmụta ịgụ na ịsụgharị, na-akpọ mkpụrụedemede nke ọma iji ghọta ya site n'etiti ndị na-asụ asụsụ ala
Ihe ọmụma a banyere asụsụ ahụ bụ isi iyi nke obi ụtọ nye ya, ma kwụọ ya ụgwọ maka nlebara anya ọ na-enye ya kwa ụbọchị
TỊsụgharị site na German ghọrọ ihe ntụrụndụ kachasị amasị ya
Ọ sụgharịrị ọtụtụ akwụkwọ site na German, abụọ n'ime ha bipụtara dị ka usoro na Oxford Press, na Lutheran Board of Publication bipụtara otu n'ime nsụgharị ya
Site n'otu asụsụ ahụ, Ireland sụgharịrị ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirikpi ma tinye ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke oge ahụ
Eckhart's Boys (1902) bụ akụkọ banyere ezinụlọ ụmụaka, ma na-akọ banyere ịdị mfe na ịma mma nke ndụ ezinụlọ n'ụlọ ime obodo nke mmetụta okpukpe sitere na ya
Ụbọchị Pita Onye Ukwu, bụ ezigbo akụkọ banyere oge onye ọchịchị ahụ
Happy Days at Grandfather's na-akọ banyere Lottie Von Alstyne, onye nna ya, onye isi ndị agha, nyere iwu ka ọ gaa Constantinople, wee gaa nọrọ otu afọ, ya na Mrs
Von Alstyne Afọ nke Abụọ Lottie na Wendorfs bụ ihe na-esote Happy Days na Grandfather's

Stolen for Ransom bụ maka njem nke nwa eze eze nke a tọọrọ mgbe ya na onye nkuzi ya na-agagharị n'akụkụ osimiri, ma kpọga ya n'ụlọ zoro ezo n'otu agwaetiti, ebe ọ biri ndụ dị mwute ruo mgbe ezi Providence zitere ya enyi, nwa nwoke dị nso na afọ ya, nwa nwoke nke nwoke gụrụ akwụkwọ nke gafere dị ka onye ọkụ azụ
An Obstinate Maid, na mbụ, gafere mbipụta 21 tupu ntụgharị nke Ireland

Nsụgharị ndị ọzọ e bipụtara n'ụdị akwụkwọ gụnyere Red Carl (na-agwọ ajụjụ ọrụ), Lenchen's Brother, Platzbacker of Plauen, The Block House on the Shore, Erna Stark, Christian Beck's Grandson, Her First and Only School Friend, Adolph's Victories, In Days of Abd-el-Rader, The School of Luneburg Heath, Driven Out, Eric's Vacation, Life Work of Pastor Louis Harms, The First Year, Dorris and Her Mountain School Home, The Tower Angel, and Pixy's Holiday
N'afọ 1859, ọ lụrụ John M
Ireland (d
March 1911), onye ahịa obodo, nwa Colonel Joseph Ireland, nke Kent County, Maryland, onye ya na ya biri n'ụlọ nke ya
N'oge 1867 ruo n'etiti afọ 1880, ha biri na Elisha Kirk House
Ka ọ na-erule 1887, ha biri na Baltimore, ebe Maazị Ireland nwere ọkwa onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa United States na Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ụtụ Isi
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ha kwagara Washington, DC
Ha bụ nne na nna nke ụmụ atọ, otu n'ime ha nwụrụ na nwata
Ọ bụ onye otu Eastern Presbyterian Church na ndị ozi ala ọzọ ya, yana Women's Christian Temperance Union

Mary Edwards nke Kensington (1704 – 23 Ọgọst 1743) bụ onye nketa ala bekee na onye nkwado nka nke ekwuru na ọ bụ nwanyị kacha baa ọgaranya na England
A kọrọ na ọ lụrụ di ma mesịa nwaa iwepụ ihe àmà ọ bụla nke ememe ahụ
Ya na Lord Anne Hamilton biri ọtụtụ afọ ma mụọ nwa, ma ọ lụrụ ọzọ, na-enweghị ịgba alụkwaghịm
Na eleghị anya, a mụrụ Edwards na London n'ihe dị ka 1704 ma ọ bụ 1705
Nne ya sitere na ezi na ulo Dutch ndi kpochapuru fens na nna ya, Francis Edwards ( d
1729), onye otu ndi ala, nwere ala na Leicestershire, Northamptonshire, London & Middlesex, Essex, Hertfordshire na Kent na o nwere
Ụgwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ New River Company na Islington
Nna ya nwụrụ na 1729 na ebe ọ bụ na ọ dịghị ọchịchọ ya, a ga-ahapụ akụ ya n'aka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na nne ya Anna Margaretta Vernatti
Agbanyeghị, nne ya jụrụ nkwupụta ya wee nye Meri ala ahụ
Akụ̀ na ụba ya mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ 23 e mere atụmatụ dị n'agbata £50,000 na £60,000 (ihe dị ka £8m na 2021), nke mere Mary bụrụ nwanyị kasị baa ọgaranya na Britain
Ọ hụrụ Onyenwe anyị Anne Hamilton n'anya wee lụọ ya na ma ọ bụ tupu 1731, n'alụmdi na nwunye nzuzo nke ekwuru na ọ nọ n'ụlọ ekpere nke Fleet Prison
A kọrọ ya na The Gentleman's Magazine mana ihe ndekọ ụlọ ụka adịghị (ugbu a) gụnyere nkọwa na Mary Edwards kwadoro alụmdi na nwunye ahụ ma ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-eji aha nna ya
Lord Anne weghaara aha na ogwe aka Mary Edwards dika Lord Anne Edwards Hamilton
N'afọ 1734, William Hogarth na nwa ha nwoke bụ Gerard Anne Edwards sere ihe osise ezinụlọ ha

Ha mechara kewapụ n'ihi na Lord Anne na-emefu ego na akụ 'nwunye' ya, Mary Edwards wee mee nzọụkwụ pụrụ iche nke ịjụ alụmdi na nwunye ya, kwupụta na ya bụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di ma mee ihe iji mepụta ihe àmà na ọ dịghị alụmdi na nwunye mere
Nwa ha, Gerard Anne Edwards, ghọrọ onye iwu na-akwadoghị, mana nke a dị ka emebere ya dịka baptism 1733 dekọtara aha nna ya dị ka Edwards na nne ya dị ka ndị na-alụbeghị di
N'afọ 1742, Hogarth na-ese ya ọzọ - ihe osise a dị ugbu a na nchịkọta Frick
Eserese a na-egosipụta ọkwa Edwards na agwa siri ike; ọ na-eji ọtụtụ akara ngosi nke ike na-edobekarị maka eserese ụmụ nwoke

Ọ na-egosi akụ na ụba ya na ọtụtụ ola diamond, a na-egosi ya na nnukwu hound ịchụ nta kama ịbụ nwanyị lapdog dị ka nwanyị, na n'azụ bụ ihe osise nke Alfred the Great na Queen Elizabeth I, dị mkpa na akụkọ Bekee
Akwụkwọ dị n'azụ ya bụ nkwupụta ikike onye ọ bụla sitere na egwuregwu Joseph Addison 1712 Cato
Edwards nwere ezigbo enyi na Hogarth, ma nyekwa ụfọdụ ọrụ ya kacha mkpa
Ọ ghọrọ onye nkwado dị mkpa nke nka, na-emebi n'ụzọ kwekọrọ
Mary Edwards nyere ọrụ Hogarth's 1733 Southwark Fair, na eserese ya nke 1742 Taste in High Life, nke na-eme ka ụdị ejiji dị oke egwu nke ụbọchị ahụ na oke ibu
N'October 1742 'di' ya lụrụ Anna Powell, ọ dịghịkwa ebubo bigamy
ODNB kwuru nke a dịka ihe akaebe na agbanyeghị na ya na Lord Anne Hamilton bi wee mụọ nwa, ha alụbeghị di na nwunye n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro
Edwards nwụrụ na Kensington na 1743 ma e liri ya ngwa ngwa mana n'akụkụ nna ya na St Andrews Church na Welham
Ọ kpachaara anya nke ukwuu na nkuzi nwa ya nwoke Gerard Anne Edwards (1734–1773), ma o bufere akụ ya niile nye ya
Na 1754 ọ lụrụ Lady Jane Noel, ada Baptist Noel, 4th Earl nke Gainsborough nke mbụ e kere
Ha bụ nne na nna Sir Gerard Noel, 2nd Baronet, nna nna nke Earls nke Gainsborough nke okike nke abụọ
Mary Edwards (c
1750 – Septemba 1815) bụ kọmpụta mmadụ maka British Nautical Almanac na otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-akwụ ụgwọ ozugbo site na Board of Longitude, na iji kpata ego n'ọrụ sayensị n'oge ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime kọmpụta mmadụ iri atọ na ise ndị gbakọrọ ọnọdụ anyanwụ, ọnwa na mbara ala n'oge dị iche iche n'ụbọchị maka agụmakwụkwọ ụgbọ mmiri kwa afọ a na-eji eme njem n'oké osimiri

Ewebata Edwards na oru almanac na Nevil Maskelyne, onye England Astronomer Royal nke ise, site n'aka di onye ụkọchukwu ya bụ Revd John Edwards (c 1748–1784) onye werela obere ọrụ dịka kọmpụta iji gbakwunye ego ezinụlọ wee nata ụgwọ ọrụ na uru ọnwa 6 nke almanac ọ bụla site na 1773 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1784
E kpughere na Meri mere ọtụtụ n'ime mgbakọ ahụ mgbe o degaara Maskeline akwụkwọ ka ọ jụọ ma ọ ga-anọgide na-arụ ọrụ iji kwado onwe ya na ụmụ ya nwanyị mgbe di ya nwụsịrị
Na ọnwụ di ya, Mary Edwards weghaara ọrụ mgbako ya na oge niile yana dịka naanị isi iyi ego ya
O nwere ike ịbụ na Maskelyne maara kemgbe na o mere mgbakọ ahụ n'ihi na ọ gara leta ezinụlọ ahụ ọtụtụ oge
Otú ọ dị, mgbe Maskeline nwụrụ na 1811 ọ chọpụtara na ọhụrụ Astronomer Royal John Pond enyeghị ya ọrụ zuru ezu
Ndị Board nke Longitude mechara kpebie na ọdọ mmiri ga-aga n'ihu na-ekenye ya ọrụ
Ka oge na-aga, aha ya maka ntụkwasị obi na izi ezi pụtara na ọ nwere ike ịmalite ọrụ ọzọ
Ọ gara n'ihu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1815
Nwa ya nwanyị, Eliza Edwards (1779-1846), rụkwara ọrụ dị ka kọmpụta, na-enyere aka site na nwata wee nwee onwe ya mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị na 1815

Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka Nautical Almanac ruo 1832, bụ ụbọchị a na-arụ ọrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na London na na HM Nautical Almanac Office ọhụrụ enweghị ebe maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ihi na iwu ndị ọrụ obodo mere ka ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị sie ike
Obere mbara ala 12627 Maryedwards ka akpọrọ aha na nsọpụrụ ya
Na 2016 Ludlow Civic Society kpebiri itinye Blue Plaque na ụlọ mbụ ya na 4 Brand Lane, Ludlow, Shropshire, iji kwado ọrụ ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ 'kọmputa'
Mary Ekpere-Eta bụ onye ọka iwu na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe na Naijiria
O bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke National Centre for Women Development (NCWD) na Abuja
Mary Eta bụ onye ọka iwu, onye ọrụ ugbo na onye otu Chartered Institute of Taxation nke Nigeria
N'afọ 2012, ọ gbara mbọ ịghọ Gọvanọ nke Cross River State
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị South-South na bọọdù ndị nlekọta nke All Progressives Congress (APC)
Onye isi ala Buhari họpụtara Ekpere-Eta dị ka ọnye isi nchịkwa nke NCWD n'ọnwa Eprel 2017
Àtụ Data box
Mary Elizabeth Connell (ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Machị 1917, York rụo ọnwa Julaị 1997) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise botanical nkè South Africa
Ọbụna n'oge ọ dị obéré, Connell gosipụtara nkà nka pụrụ iche na agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ na York College for Girls (nke mechiri na 1997)
O zigara ọrụ ya na Royal College of Art maka ule Masters ha ma nye ya nsọpụrụ na 1932 màkà Drawing sí Nature Forms na 1933 màkà Pictorial Representation
N'afọ 1933, ezinụlọ ya kwagara South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Barnato Park High School na Berea, wee banye na Johannesburg School of Art
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 1936, é bịdọrọ inweta ọkwa ónyé na-ese ihe na National Herbarium na Pretoria ma kwado nhọpụta ya

Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ imepụta nnukwu efere na-egosi osisi ndị na-egbu egbu na ndị na-emerụ ahụ màkà mbipụta na 'Farming in South Africa', ma mesịa bipụta ya dị ka Henderson na Anderson's 'Common Weeds in South Africa' (Botanical Survey Memoir nọmba irí atọ na asaá nke 1966)
A kpọọrọ ya n'okpuru nku nke Cythna Letty, nnukwu nwanyị nke ndị na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa, wee malite imepụta efere màkà akwụkwọ akụkọ botanical 'Flowering Plants of Africa'
N'ozuzu, o mepụtara efere otu narị na iri abụọ na otu màkà ọrụ ahụ
Na mgbakwunye, o nyèrè aka na ihe osise màkà White, Dyer & Sloane's 'The Succulent Euphorbieae' (1941), Meredith's ' The Grasses and Pastures of South Africa' (1955) na 'Flora of Southern Africa'

Mgbè ọ mepụtara ma zụlite ezinụlọ, ọ laghachiri na National Herbarium n'etiti afọ 1958 na 1960, wee mepụta ihe osise iri asatọ na àtó nke ahịhịa maka 'Onye ahịhịhịa na South Africa' (1966), nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke Phillips es 'Onye Ahịhịa nke South Africa' (afọ 1939), mbipụta nke o nyekwara aka na ya
Ọ lụrụ Niko Stutterheim (1915-2005), ónyé injinia kemịkal na ónyé nduzi ụlọ ọrụ, nwa Nicolaas Anton Stutterheim na Elizabeth Catherina van Nouhuijs, na Febụwarị 1942
Ụmụ ha bụ Jan Anton, Catherine Mary, Konrad, Adrian Henk, na Philip Oswald
Mary Emma Macintosh (nwụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1916) bụ onye South Africa suffragist
Ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Women's Enfranchisement Association of the Union
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Huguenot College
Ọ lụrụ onye ahịa, William MacIntosh
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Women's Christian Temperance Union, Guild of Loyal Women, na Empire League
Ọmụmụ 31 Julaị 1864 Ọnwụ 2 Disemba 1915 (afọ 51) Ili South End Cemetery Port Elizabeth, Nelson Mandela Bay Metropolitan Municipality, Eastern Cape, South Africa Memorial ID 140645835
Mary Essiful (amụrụ ya na 22 na onwa nke ise, na afọ 1993) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye na-agba n'etiti maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afo 2014 African Women's Championship
N'ọkwa klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Soccer Intellectuals Ladies na Ghana
N'afọ 2020, ọ bịanyere aka na NWFL Premiership, Rivers Angels FC
Mary Evans (a mụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na England
Ọ na-eji ihe n'isiokwu ya ma ihe nketa Afrịka ya na nkuzi Europe
A mụrụ Evans na Lagos, Nigeria n'afọ 1963
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St Helens College of Art & Design (1981-82), ọ gụrụ ihe osise maka BA
ya na Gloucestershire College of Arts and Technology (1982–85), wee nweta MA
ya na Fine Art na Goldsmiths 'College (1987–89)
O mechara mee ihe gbasara ebe obibi na Rijksakademie, Amsterdam (1991–93)
Evans enwetala ọtụtụ ọrụ dị mkpa, onyinye na ebe obibi, nke gụnyere Smithsonian Artists Research Fellowship, National Museum of African Art, Washington, DC, na 2010
Ọ na-ejikarị akwụkwọ eme ihe dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ ya, na-emepụta nnukwu ọrụ, nke saịtị - mgbe ụfọdụ na-arutu aka na isiokwu ndị a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ukwuu, dị ka lynching na Deep South

E gosipụtala ọrụ ya nke ọma na UK, yana mba ụwa - na United States, Netherlands, Mexico na China, gụnyere Farewell to Post-Colonialism na 3rd Guangzhou Triennale na 2008, Port City (2007) na Arnolfini, Bristol, na A Fiction of Authenticity Contemporary Africa Abroad (2003), Contemporary Art Museum St
Louis

N'ịtụle ihe ngosi ya Cut and Paste (2012, Tiwani Contemporary, London), onye nkatọ Stephanie Baptist dere, sị 'Ihe osise mgbasa ozi ya na-ekpughe ọ bụghị naanị akụkọ ya, kama akụkọ ndị nna nna Afrịka nke a na-adịghị akọkarị
Aga m eji Evans tụnyere griot
Ọrụ a bụ nke dị mkpa, ebe ọ bụ ma ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme ma onye na-akọ akụkọ
Ọ na-ebu akụkọ nchịkọta nke obodo nta ahụ, ọdachi na mmeri
Onye na-echeta nwere ike ịkọwa akụkọ ihe mere eme ndị a na-edeghị ede ma kesaa akụkọ ndị a na-akọghị nke ndị a na-akpọghị aha nke nwere ike ichefu
N'afọ 2020, e tinyere Evans na ihe ngosi Paper Routes Women to Watch 2020 na National Museum of Women in the Arts
Evans bụ onye nkuzi na Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design na London
Mary foy nwere ike izo aka na
Mary Emily Foy (July 13, 1862 - February 21, 1962) bụ nwanyị mbụ na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ nke Los Angeles Public Library, nke a họpụtara n'ọrụ ahụ na 1880 mgbe ọ dị afọ 18
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ gara aga na Los Angeles High School
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ naanị afọ anọ mana ọ hapụrụ ihe nketa maka ndị na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ Los Angeles iji cheta
A mụrụ Foy na Los Angeles, California
Ụmụ nwanyị rụrụ ọrụ enyemaka na Los Angeles Public Library ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Mgbe e guzobere ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ na 1872, a machibidoro ụmụ nwanyị iji ya mee ihe
A họpụtara John C
Littlefield, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Los Angeles Weekly Express, dị ka onye na-elekọta ọ́bá akwụkwọ mbụ nke obodo ahụ na 1872
Littlefield bụ onye ụkwara ume ọkụ ma na-ese siga n'ọfịs ya nke na-ewute ndị ahịa

Onye nọchiri ya n'afọ 1879 bụ onye a na-azụghị aha ya, Patrick Connolly, onye, a tụrụ aro ya, bụ onye aṅụrụma nke furu ihe karịrị ụbọchị ya n'ọrụ ma bụrụ onye ụlọ ọrụ ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ chụpụrụ, nke ṅụrụ iyi ịkpọ aha 'onye na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ nwanyị'
Foy, nwa nwanyị dị afọ iri na asatọ nke onye ahịa Samuel Foy, jụrụ onye agbata obi nke ndị Foys, Mayor John Toberman, maka ọrụ ahụ ma ọ dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ kpọọ ndị otu City Council niile, nke o mere
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọkọchị nke 1880 na mpaghara San Francisco Bay, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na San Francisco na Oakland iji mụta ọrụ ya
O mechara dee na ọrụ ya n'ọbá akwụkwọ dị na Main na Temple Streets na Los Angeles gụnyere
Dị ka Sheri D
Irvin si kwuo, n'oge ahụ, a na-ahọpụta ụmụ nwanyị n'ọkwá obodo Los Angeles maka ebumnuche ebere dịka mkpa nwanyị maka nkwado ego
Mgbe Onye isi obodo Toberman hapụrụ ọrụ, a họpụtara bọọdụ ọbá akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na nwanyị ọzọ a họpụtara n'ọnọdụ Foy
Otú ọ dị, Foy ahapụghị n'ụzọ dị jụụ Ọ 'bipụtara okwu nkwụsịtụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ebe ọ katọrọ bọọdụ [na-apụ apụ] maka enweghị itinye aka na mmasị na ọbá akwụkwọ'
Nwanyị a họpụtara iji dochie Foy bụ nwa nwanyị LD
Gavitt, Jessie
Ụlọ ebe amụrụ Mary Foy na July 13, 1862, ebe ọ bi bụ Los Angeles Historical Cultural Monument No
O mechara kụzie na Alameda School na Downey na Eighth Street School na Los Angeles ma site na 1903 ọ na-akụzi na Los Angeles High School

Onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ John Adams, na-ede na Downey Eagle, kwuru na Foy bụ 'nwanyi siri ike' nke 'na-eme mkpọsa maka Woodrow Wilson n'oge ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ya ma lụọ ọgụ ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ maka California Progressive Movement na Women's Rights'
E depụtara ya na akwụkwọ afọ 1913 nke Los Angeles High School dị ka 'nwaanyị a ma ama na klọb na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị'
Na Febụwarị 21, 1962, Foy nwụrụ
Ọ dị afọ 99

A kwanyeere Foy ùgwù site n'ịmepụta Ụlọ Mary Foy California n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze ọhụrụ dị na Fifth na Olive Streets, ọ bụ ezie na ụlọ ahụ abụghị akụkụ nke imezigharị ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mgbe e wughachiri ya mgbe nnukwu ọkụ abụọ gasịrị na 1986
A na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọrụ Foy na Los Angeles Central Library na Susan Orlean's The Library Book
Mary Kelly Foy (née McStea; amụrụ na 27 Febụwarị 1968) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị British Labour Party na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) maka obodo Durham kemgbe ntuli aka 2019
Ọ bụ onye otu Socialist Campaign Group parliamentary caucus
A mụrụ Foy na Jarrow, County Durham, ma too n'ụlọ kansụl
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ise na nne na nna ya ochie bụ ndị Irish kwagara mba ọzọ
Nna ya bụbu onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe a na-arụ ụgbọ mmiri nke a chụrụ n'ọrụ ya n'afọ ndị 1980 n'okpuru ọchịchị Margaret Thatcher
Foy nwere akara ugo mmụta na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nke ọ nwetara dị ka nwa akwụkwọ tozuru oke
Foy bụ onye otu UNISON na Unite the Union
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ mmepe obodo na Durham site na 2006 ruo 2013, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ndị omeiwu nke onye bụbu onye omeiwu Jarrow Stephen Hepburn
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara iji nọchite anya mpaghara Lamesley (nke aha ya sitere na mpaghara nke otu aha na Gateshead Council Metropolitan Borough Council na 2006
O mechara bụrụ onye otu kansụl maka ahụike na ọdịmma na kansụl ahụ n'afọ 2009, na-ejide ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na kansụল ahụ n'ọnwa 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Blaydon tupu ọ kwaga na City of Durham, na onye nnọchi anya mpaghara nke Labour's National Policy Forum
Onye Socialist na onye nọ n'aka ekpe nke pati ahụ, ọtụtụ òtù kwadoro mgbalị Foy
Ọ kwụsịrị na Gateshead Council mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu maka obodo Durham na 2019, wee sonye n'òtù ndị omeiwu nke Socialist Campaign Group

N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, Foy gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke Andy McDonald iji mee ntuli aka megide iwu nzuzo nke ndị mmadụ (omume mpụ) Bill, na-ekwenyeghị na onye ọrụ ahụ ka ọ ghara
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Foy tinyere aka n'ịzọpụta ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ, St Thomas More Primary School, Belmont

Foy zutere ndị nnọchi anya diocese na ndị na-achịkwa, ndị isi Durham County Council na ndị isi a họpụtara ahọpụta, ndị nne na nna na ndị obodo iji gee ntị na nchegbu ma nyere aka chọta ụzọ iji dozie ọnọdụ ahụ
Foy so na Kọmitii nke nyochara Iwu Ahụike na Nlekọta na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
ka akụkụ nke kọmitii a, Foy wepụtara ọtụtụ mmezigharị metụtara ahụike ịṅụ sịga, gụnyere ịmachibido oghere nke na-eme e nye ndị na-erubeghị afọ n'efu ma bulie afọ ire siga ruo 21

Mary Emmeline Godfrey (3 Julaị 1913 - 30 Eprel 2007) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nka nke ghọrọ ónyé mbụ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile na Mahadum Penn State
E were ya n'ọrụ n'afọ 1957 ma jee ozi dị ka osote prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ nka ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1979

Godfrey nwetara nzèrè bachelọ nke nka márá mma site na Pratt Institute na nzere masta site na Mahadum Columbia ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-enyere ónyé nlekọta steeti aka na agụmakwụkwọ nka maka Ngalaba Mmụta Virginia
N'afọ 1957, Dr
Viktor Lowenfeld, onye isi nke Ngalaba Mmụta nka, College of Education, na Mahadum Pennsylvania State, were Godfrey n'ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ nka
A mụrụ Mary Godfrey na July 3, 1913 na obéré ọbọdọ dị n'ebe ndịda nke Charlotte Court House, Virginia, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke Henry B
Godfrey Na Louise (née Reid) Godfrey
N'oge a na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ, Godfrey kwuru na a mụrụ ya na New York City
Ezinụlọ Godfrey nwere ugbo na Charlotte Court House na ébé óbíbí na New York City, ebe nna ya guzobere azụmahịa
Godfrey banyèrè na Pratt Institute Department of Teacher Training in Art Education na 1933, mgbè ọ dị afọ 20, wee nweta asambodo nkụzi na 1937
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe ndekọ na-egosi na Godfrey nwetara BFA na agụmakwụkwọ nka, Pratt enyeghị nzèrè bachelọ afọ anọ ruo 1938
Ọrụ ọmụmụ Godfrey nwetara n'ime afọ anọ ya bụ otu ihe na nzere bachelọ
O ruru eru ịkụzi usoro nka niile n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na nke onwe site na elementrị ruo na kọleji na steeti ọ bụla
Godfrey gárá n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya wee nweta nzèrè masta na Columbia University Teachers College
Mgbè Godfrey gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Pratt Institute ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi nka / onye nlekọta maka Camden Public School na Camden, New Jersey site na 1938-1947
N'afọ 1947, Godfrey ghọrọ ónyé Africa America mbụ dị ka ónyé enyemaka State Art Supervisor màkà Virginia State
Ọrụ ya bụ ilekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị isi ojii na steeti ahụ na ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ nka
Mary Goretti Kitutu, nke a na-akpọkwa Mary GorettiKitutu Kimono bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Ugandan, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara Karamoja na 8 June 2021, na-anọchi John Byabagambi
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ike na mmepe nke mineral, na Cabinet nke Uganda, site na 14 Disemba 2019 ruo 8 June 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 10 June 2016, ruo 14 December 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Cabinet nke Uganda
Dr Mary Kitutu na-eje ozi n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị Manafwa District, na 10th Parliament (2016 - 2021)
A mụrụ ya na Manafwa District na 17 Septemba 1962
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ, ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere na 1984, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1987 na nzere Bachelor of Science na Chemistry na Geology
N'afọ 1993, ọ laghachiri Makerere wee nweta diplọma postgraduate na agụmakwụkwọ
E nwetara nzere Master of Science ya na 1998 site na Faculty of Geo-Information Science and Earth Observation nke Mahadum Twente, na Enschede, Netherlands
N'afọ 2011, ọ nwetara Doctor of Philosophy na Mahadum Makerere, na Kampala, Uganda
Ọrụ mbụ ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum bụ dịka onye nkuzi na Busoga College Mwiri, site na 1988 ruo 1991
Site na 1991 ruo 1996, ọ kụziri na Our Lady of Good Counsel School, na Gayaza, Wakiso District
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị nkuzi, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Axis Technical Geo Mineral Consult, n'etiti afọ 1998 na 2001
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2002, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha na ọkachamara gburugburu ebe obibi na National Environment Management Authority (NEMA), na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015
Site na Febụwarị 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Tetra Tech, ọrụ nke USAID kwadoro, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise
Na ngwụcha afọ 2015, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka nke Uganda site na ịsọ mpi maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị Manafwa District na ntuli aka mba na nke ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016
Ọ gbara ọsọ na National Resistance Movement ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ meriri ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na 6 June 2016
N'ime mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ na 14 Disemba 2019, a kpọrọ Mary Goretti Kitutu, Minista nke Energy na Mineral Development
Ọ nọchiri Irene Muloni, onye e wepụrụ na Cabinet
Mary Jackson (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye Africa America na-ese eriri
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịkpa nkata ahịhịa na-atọ ụtọ site na iji usoro ọdịnala jikọtara ya na atụmatụ nke ógè a
A mụrụ ya n'ụsọ oké osimiri South Carolina na nwa nke ọgbọ nke ndị na-akpa nkata Gullah, e nyèrè Jackson MacArthur Foundation fellowship na 2008 maka 'ịkwalite ọdịnala na ntụziaka ọhụrụ dị egwu'
A mụrụ Jackson na Febụwarị 15, 1945
Ọ tolitere na ọbọdọ Gullah nke Mount Pleasant, na mpụga Charleston, South Carolina
Nné ya na nné nne ya kụziiri ya, Jackson malitere ime nkata ahịhịa na-atọ ụtọ mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ
Omenala na usoro nke ịkpa nkata na-atọ ụtọ agafeela site n'otu ọgbọ gaa na nke ọzọ, sitere na ndị ohu West Africa a kpọtara na South Carolina n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mmalite afọ 1700
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Jackson, ya na ụmụnne ya na ụmụ nwanne nne ya ga-ezukọta n'ogige nne nne ya iji nyéré aka ịkpa nkata
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Jackson kwagara New York City, ébé ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ màkà Metropolitan Insurance Company
Jackson bìrì na New York ruo afọ iri
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọbọdọ New York, ọ ga-eleta ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na ébé ngosi nka wee malite ịnakọta ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ógè a
Mary Jarvis Yak, onye a na-akpọ Mary Jarvase Yak mgbe ụfọdụ, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ego na atụmatụ ugbu a na Gọọmentị Transitional of National Unity (TGoNU) nke Republic of South Sudan, nke Onye isi ala nke Republic of Sud Sudan -HE
Salva Kiir họpụtara na 28 Eprel 2016
Yak nwetara nzere bachelọ na Economics na Mahadum nke Khartoum
O nwekwara nzere masta na Gender and Development na Mahadum Sussex
Yak bụ onye omeiwụ nke Southern Sudan, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Sudan Women Association
Mary Jarvis Yak bụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe nke mmadụ na Cabinet nke South Sudan, a họpụtara ya na 10 Julaị 2011
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2012, Yak nwere utu aha osote minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ
Dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka atụmatụ, Yak bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na African Development Bank Group, na-enye South Sudan ohere ịghọ onye otu Bank Group
Yak kwadoro South Sudan ịbanye na Bank Group dị ka ụzọ isi kwalite mmepe akụ na ụba ọha na eze na mbelata ịda ogbenye
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2013, Yak nwere ụtu aha osote minista na-ahụ maka ego na atụmatụ akụ na ụba
Dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ego na atụmatụ akụ na ụba, Yak kwupụtara na gọọmentị enweghị ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ ọnwa niile mgbe niile, mana na gọọmentụ nwere ike ịkwụ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị ụgwọ ọnwa abụọ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ego na atụmatụ na Gọọmentị Transitional of National Unity (TGoNU) nke Republic of South Sudan, nke Onye isi ala nke Republic of Sud Sudan -HE
Salva Kiir họpụtara na 28 Eprel 2016
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2016, Yak na United Nations Development Programme malitere Diagnostic Trade Integration Study iji mepụta mmepe akụ na ụba na South Sudan
Mary Karlino Madut bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndị omeiwu nke Western Bahr el Ghazal kemgbe 18 Mee 2010
Mary Kitagawa (nee Murakami; amuru ya 1935) OBC bu onye nkuzi Canada
Dị ka onye Japan-Canadian na-etolite na British Columbia, e debere ezinụlọ ya n'ogige ụlọ ọrụ Japan dị iche iche n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ nakweere ọkwá na Kitsilano Secondary School ma mesịa nye ya akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na Mahadum British Columbia
A mụrụ Kitagawa ma zụlite ya na Salt Spring Island, British Columbia n'ezinụlọ mmadụ ise

Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, e jidere nna ya dịka akụkụ nke njide nke ndị Canada Japan n'ofe ụsọ oké osimiri British Columbia n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ Ndị ezinaụlọ ya ndị ọzọ ga-emecha sonyere nna ya n'ogige Internment dị iche iche wee nwetakwa ugbo ha
Mgbe agha ahụ biri, ọ laghachiri Salt Spring Island na 1954
Kitagawa chọrọ ịmalite ọrụ nkuzi ya n'ụlọ na Salt Spring Island mana o chere ajọ mbunobi ihu n'ihi agbụrụ ya
N'ihi ya, ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Kitsilano Secondary School, ebe ọ ga-ezute di ya n'ọdịnihu
Mgbe amuchara ụmụ ya, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na-anọchi anya ma mesịa debanye aha na Mahadum British Columbia (UBC)
N'afọ 2011, Kitagawa nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwado UBC ka ọ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ 76 nke Japan Canada bụ ndị a manyere ịpụ na UBC mgbe mwakpo ahụ mere na Pearl Harbor
O mechara bụrụ onye natara 2013 Queen Elizabeth II Diamond Jubilee Medal na National Association of Japanese Canadians Leadership Award
Kitagawa na di ya Tosh nọdụrụ na Community Council for the Landscapes of Injustice project na Mahadum Victoria
N'afọ 2018, Kitagawa natara Order of British Columbia maka mbọ ọ na-agba maka ndị Japan Canada

Mary Winefride Bousted (née Bleasdale; amuru 15 Septemba 1959) bu onye ahia ahia nke Britain bu onye okacha amara nke National Education Union (NEU) n’akuku Kevin CourtneyBousted bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ndị nkuzi, Association of Teachers and Lecturers (ATL) tupu ya na National Union of Teachers, guzobe NEU
Bousted attended the University of Hull, gaining a BA in English
From the University of Durham (Collingwood College), she gained a PGCE
From the UCL Institute of Education she gained an MA
Later from the University of York she gained a PhD
Bousted kụziri Bekee site na 1982 ruo 1987 na Bentley Wood High School na Harrow
Site na 1988 ruo 1991 ọ bụ Onye isi nke Bekee na Whitmore High School na Harrow
