'Missionary' Mary L
Proctor (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ọhụụ ya, collages, na assemblages
A mụrụ Mary Proctor (née Cooksey) na 1960 na Pauline Cooksey na Lloyd, Florida
Nné ya dị afọ iri na otu enweghị ike ilekọta ya, ya mèrè nné na nnà ya zụlitere ya
Nne nne ya bụ onye Africa-America na-elekọta ụlọ na nna nna ya bụ onye ọrụ ugbo ọcha
Proctor gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze ruo mgbè ọ tụụrụ ime na klas nke itoolu
Mgbè ahụ, ọ were ọrụ ịzụlite ụmụnne ya ndị obéré
Mgbè ọnwụ nna nna ya, na ọgụ nné nné ya na ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè, Mary zutere ma lụọ Tyrone Proctor
Ha abụọ kwagara Tallahassee, Florida
Mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ n'ọhịa ndị nọọsụ ruo afọ iri, Proctor meghere Tender Loving Care Day Care Center ma bụrụ ónyé nwe ya ruo afọ ise
N'ịchọ 'ihe dị mfe' Proctor malitere ịnakọta ihe site n'akụkụ ụzọ iji ree na ahịa flea dị n'ógbè ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, ọ meghere ụlọ ahịa nke ya, 'Noah's Ark Flea Market'
Ịchịkọta ihe ka bụ ihe ntụrụndụ ya
N'afọ 1994, ọkụ gbara ụlọ gbùrù nne nne Proctor, nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya
Proctor na-ekwu na o nwèrè ọhụụ ozugbo tupu ọkụ ahụ emee ebe ọ '
hụrụ ìhè na-aga n'eluigwe'
Mgbè ọkụ ahụ gasịrị na 1995, Proctor kwuru na o nwere ọhụụ n'oge ekpere nke gwara ya ka ọ 'Pint'
Ọhụụ ndị a kpaliri ya ịmalite ịchụso ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Ihe mbụ ya bụ foto, nke e sere n'ọnụ ụzọ, nke ndị ezinụlọ ya nwụrụ n'ọkụ ahụ
O debere ha n'ihu ụlọ ya ebe ha dọtara uche ónyé nlekọta na onye nkatọ Tricia Collins, onye zụrụ ha maka gallery ya na New York

Mary Lazarus (amuru May 5, 1989) bu onye omere Naijiria na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke meriri ihe nrite City People Movie Award for Most Promising Actress of the Year (Bekee) na City People Entertainment Awards na 2018 wee hoputa ya maka Best Actress na onye ndu n'ime otu afọ na Best of Nollywood Awards
Lazarọs sitere na steeti Abia dị na Naịjirịa, mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria bụ nke ndị Igbo nọ na Naịjirịa kacha bi

Lazarọs bụ kpọmkwem onye si n'okpuru ọchịchị Ukwa East nke steeti Abia wee mụọ ya n'ezinaụlọ mmadụ itoolu nke nwere nne, nna na ụmụnne isii nke ọ bụ ejima na otu n'ime ụmụ ikpeazụ a mụrụ na ezinụlọ ya na ejima ya bu Josef

Lazarọs mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị wee nweta asambodo izizi ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ na asambodo Senior School West Africa n'otu n'otu tinye akwụkwọ na mahadum nke Ibadan iji nweta akara ugo mmụta mahadum
A nabatara ya wee nye ya ohere ka ọ mụọ Geography na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ebe o mechara jiri akara ọkwa 44 gụchaa na nzere BSc
na Geography

Lazarọs bụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood dị iche iche rụrụ arụ na mbụ dị ka ihe nlereanya na 2002 tupu ọ banye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria na 2009 na ihe nkiri akpọrọ “Afọ ichere” O nwetara ọrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ site n'enyemaka nke Gbenro Ajibade onye gosipụtara ya na John Njamah, onye nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ bụ onye mechara kenye ya ọrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ e kwuru n'elu
Lazarọs jiri ihe nkiri akpọrọ 'Dance To My Beat' nke o mekwara na 2017
Lazarọs dị ka ihe nlereanya emeela ka ọ pụta ìhè na mgbasa ozi nke Airtel na MTN

Lazarọs, na mkparịtaụka ya na ndị mgbasa ozi Vanguard na-akparịta ụka, kpọpụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood bụ Omotola Jalade Ekeinde na Joke Silva dị ka ihe nlereanya ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Lazarọs ọzọ ya na mgbasa ozi akwụkwọ akụkọ Punch kpọrọ aha onye omere America bụ Kimberly Elise dịka onye mmasị ya n'ihi oke ọrụ ya
Lazarọs si n'ezinụlọ mmadụ itoolu, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ụmụ ikpeazụ nne na nna ya mụrụ n'akụkụ nwanne ejima ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị mgbasa ozi Punch na- ebipụta ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka onye na-ahụ n'anya
Mary Le Ravin (1905 September 1992) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe na onye ozi a họpụtara ahọpụta
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke a maara nke ọma màkà ịmepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọla, ihe ụlọ na ihe ndị e ji ọkpụkpụ anụmanụ, ihe ndị sitere n'okike, na ihe ndị ọzọ a chọtara
A mụrụ Le Ravin Mary Cooper na Natchez, Mississippi ma too na Jefferson County, Mississippi
Ọ kọrọ na ọ bụ ihe ime mmụọ na-ekwurịta okwu kpọmkwem na Chineke site na nwata
Ọ kọrọ akụkọ banyéré ịbụ onye Mmụọ Nsọ 'na-awụfu' mgbè ọ na-anọdụ ala n'ọnụ ụzọ ya n'oge égbè eluigwe
N'akụkọ ọzọ banyere ihe omume a, nke mere mgbè ọ dị n'agbata afọ ise na afọ asaá, azụ si n'eluigwe daa ma nye ezinụlọ ya nri abalị n'abalị ahụ
Ahụmahụ ndị na-atọ ụtọ méré ka ndụ okpukpe mbụ nke Le Ravin na ozi ndụ ya niile mara
Ọ malitere ịnakọta ọkpụkpụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Di na nwunye ahụ kwagara Gary, Indiana n'ihe dị ka 1936 ma ọ bụ 1937 dị ka akụkụ nke Great Migration, Louis wee gaa rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ígwè nke ọbọdọ ahụ
Mary na-elekọta ụlọ obibi ma na-arụ ọrụ ụka, nke mbụ na ụka Baptist ebe a machibidoro ya ịrụ ọrụ ọ bụla n'ihi okike ya, mgbè ahụ dị ka Onyeàmà Jehova
Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị Onyeàmà Jehova, mbọ Le Ravin na-agba ikwusa ozi ọma méré ka ọ gaa njem na South na Midwest US
N'afọ 1968, mgbè a kpọrọ ya mkparị agbụrụ na ngosi ọbọdọ na Gary, ebe ọ meriri ọtụtụ asọmpi nka, Le Ravin kwagara Los Angeles ka ọ nọrọ nwanne ya nwanyị, Sarah nso
Ka ọ na-erule ógè Le Ravin kwụsịrị na California ọ bụ onye ozi a họpụtara ahọpụta
Dị ka Nné Mary, ọ zụtara iji ụlọ ahịa n'efu n'otu mpaghara, nso Mahadum nke Southern California, nke nwere ọtụtụ azụmaahịa ndị isi ojii
Site n'ebe a, o guzobere ụlọ ahịa na-echekwa ihe niile, ụlọ ọrụ nka, na kichin màkà inye ndị ogbenye na ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi nri
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịnala Daniel Wojcik kpọrọ oghere a, ébé Le Ravin na-ejere ndị agbata obi ozi, 'chọọchị dị n'ihu ụlọ ahịa'
Mary Lee Bendolph (amụrụ n'afọ 1935) bụ onye America na-eme akwa akwa nke Gee's Bend Collective si Gee's bend (Boykin), Alabama
Ọrụ ya enweela mmetụta na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na'ese ihe na-esote ma gosipụta ákwà ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na gallery gbụrụ-gbúrụ mba ahụ
Bendolph na-eji ákwà sitere na uwe eji eme ihe màkà ịkwa akwa iji kwado 'ịhụnanya na mmụọ' na ákwà ochie
Bendolph anọwo na ndụ ya na Gee's Bend ma nwee ọrụ gosipụtara na Philadelphia Museum of Art yana Minneapolis Institute of Art na Minnesota
N'afọ 1999, Los Angeles Times gosipụtara Bendolph na akụkọ Pulitzer Prize-winning 'Crossing Over', banyéré mgbalị iji weghachite ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri gafee Osimiri Alabama
Bendolph tolitere na Gee's Bend, Alabama
A zụlitere ya n'omenala akwa, nke nne ya kụziiri Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, naanị afọ abụọ tupu ya amalite ịmụ ụmụ
Ọ mụrụ nwa mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ nke gbochiri ya ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbè ọ gụsịrị klas nke isii
Ọ lụrụ Rubin Bendolph na 1955 ma ha nwèrè ụmụ asatọ
N'afọ 1965, Bendolph sonyere na ngagharị nke Martin Luther King, Jr
duziri na Camden, Alabama
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na 1992, Bendolph etinyela oge ka ukwuu n'ime akwa

Ihe mkpuchi nke Gee's Bend jikọtara ụdị nke ihe mkpuchi ọdịnala ndị Africa America na ụdị geometric dị mfe nke e jiri tụnyere ihe mkpuchi Amish na ndị na-ese ihe nke ógè a dịka Henri Matisse na Paul Klee
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na Gee's Bend malitere ịdọta uche dị egwu na ngwụcha afọ 1990, na-eduga na nnukwu ihe ngosi na Whitney Museum of Modern Art, na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na mbipụta ndị sochirinụ
Mary Lovelace O'Neal (amụrụ na úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1942) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nka
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na mgbasa ozi agwakọta agwakọta (nke bụ isi eserese na obibi akwụkwọ) na minimalism
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ Emeritus, Mahadum California, Berkeley ma laa ezumike nká na nkụzi na 2006
E gosipụtara nka O'Neal n'ọtụtụ ebe na North America na mba ụwa, yana ngosipụta otu na nke onwé na Ịtali, France, Chile, Senegal na Naịjirịa
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Oakland, California, ma na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ na Chile
A mụrụ Mary Lovelace na Jackson, Mississippi, na úbọchị irí n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1942
Ọ na-eto nna ya màkà ịzụlite ịhụnanya ya màkà nka
N'oge ọ bụ nwata na n'oge uto nna O'Neal, Ariel Lovelace, bụ ónyé nduzi ukwe na prọfesọ nke egwu na Tougaloo College na Mahadum Arkansas
O'Neal gara Mahadum Howard na Washington, DC, site na 1960 ruo 1964 ma soro David Driskell, Lois Mailou Jones na James A
Porter mụọ, nwéta BFA
ya na 1964
Ọ gàrà Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Maine n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1963

N'oge ọ nọ na Mahadum Howard, O'Neal malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Civil Rights Movement ma bụrụ ónyé ọtụtụ ndị isi nwere mmetụta na-eduzi, gụnyere Stokely Carmichael, Jacob Lawrence na nwunye ya, ónyé na-ese ihe Gwendolyn Lawrence
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè na Free Southern Theater (FST) na otu n'ime ndị guzobere ihe nkírí ahụ, di mbụ ya John O'Neal
Ihe osise Mary Lovelace O'Neal enweela ọganihu site na usoro dị iche iche n'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, malite na ụdị ndị na-enweghị isi ma gbanwee gaa na usoro ziri ezi
O'Neal enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba na nke mba ụwa n'oge ọrụ ya
A kpọrọ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe bi na ya ka ọ sonye na mmemme nka mba ụwa na Asilah, Morocco, n'afọ 1983
O'Neal haziri ihe ngosi màkà Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes na Santiago, Chile, '17 Artistas Latino y Afro Americanos en USA' na 1991
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ natara onyinye Artist En France nke gọọmentị France na Moet & Chandon kwadoro
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Mississippi na Committees Exhibition na National Museum of Women in the Arts na Washington, DC
O'Neal mepụtara ihe osise ndị a mgbè ọ na-enweta MFA ya na Mahadum Columbia

Usoro monochromes a, nke e mere na ngwụcha afọ 1960 - mmalite afọ irí asaá, bụ ihe dị egwu ma mee ya site na iji ihe na-acha odo odo nke a na-agbanye n'ime ákwà a na-adịghị agbatị agbatị site na iji chalkboard eraser ma ọ bụ aka ya
Ọchịchịrị dị omimi nke elu nwéré ike, 'na-amịkọrọ ma na-emechi mkpọtụ nke echiche, na-eme ka ohere rụọ ọrụ, ma na-emetụta ahụ'
Na Febụwarị 2020, Mnuchin Gallery mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ nke O'Neal na New York kemgbe 1993, nke nyochara ihe karịrị afọ iri ise nke ọrụ ya, site na ngwụcha afọ 1960 ruo afọ 2000

Obéré ihe ncheta, Chasing Down the Image, na-ekpughe ụzọ O'Neal si etinye aka na abstraction na materiality nke ọma màkà ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-alụ ndị na-eme nnwale ojii na mmetụta nke Minimalism

Ọ na-etinye aka na nsogbụ ndị Donald Judd, Joseph Stella, na Sam Gilliam na-ewe mgbe ya na Amiri Baraka na-akparịta ụka n'otu ógè ahụ bụ ónyé kpaliri ya ime ihe oyiyi nke Black Power movement kama abstraction
N'ime afọ 60 na 70 O'Neal's abstraction gàrà megide nkwenye nke Black Arts Movement na Black Panthers na-etinye na figuration dị ka ụzọ maka inye Black ike
Ọrụ O'Neal, 'na-ekwusi ike na njikọta mara mma nke ahụmịhe na ụdị ndị a na-akọwa na ha bụ ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha'
O'Neal na ónyé na-eme ihe ike Stokely Carmichael, onye ọ zutere mgbè ọ na-aga Mahadum Howard na 1960s
Di mbụ ya bụ John O'Neal
N'afọ 1983, O'Neal zutere ónyé na-ese ihe na Chile bụ Patricio Moreno Toro, o mechara lụọ di ọzọ

Mary Machuche Mwanjelwa (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania nke so n'òtù Chama Cha Mapinduzi na-achị achị ma bụrụ onye omeiwu pụrụ iche kemgbe afọ 2010
Ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo, dịka osote minisita nke steeti ugbu a n'ọfịs onye isi ala na-ahụ anya maka ọrụ ọha na eze na ezi ọchịchị
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Mbeya nke oge a, na 27 Ọgọst 1965
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Muungano
Ọ gara Sangu Secondary School maka ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Siha Secondary School
N'afọ 2009, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum St
Augustine nke Tanzania, na nzere Master of Science
Mgbe e mesịrị, e nyere ya nzere Doctor of Philosophy site na Open University of Tanzania
Site na 2000 ruo 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa na Two Wings Pegasus Tanzania
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gafere na 'Placer Dome Tanzania', ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo nke Barrick Gold, dị ka onye njikwa, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ site na 2001 ruo 2005
Site na 2006 ruo 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi ụlọ ọrụ na PSI Tanzania
Dị ka profaịlụ ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke ndị omeiwu Tanzania si kwuo, Mary Machuche Mwanjelwa anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Chama Cha Mapinduzi site na 2006
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Tanzania n'afọ 2010, na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu oche pụrụ iche ruo n'afọ 2015
N'oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Board nke National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR), site na 2013 ruo 2015
N'afọ 2015, a họpụ tara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye ome iwu

N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa atọ (a) dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ala, Akụnụba na Njem nke Nzukọ Ndị Ome iwu nke Tanzania (b) dị ka Onye isi oche nke Nzukọ ndị Ome iwu Tanzania na (c) dị ka otu Kọmitii Na-eduzi Nzukọ Ndị Isi nke Tanzania
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, onye isi ala John Magufuli ṅụrụ iyi dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo
Mary Makhatho (10 Ọgọst 1965 - 7 Ọgọst 2017) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ telivishọn ya na Yizo Yizo, Gaz'lam, Generations na Ga Re Dumele
Amụrụ Makhatho n'abali iri nke ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 1965 na Soshanguve, South Africa
N'abali isii nke ọnwa Julaị 2017, o merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu mgbe ọ dachara
Ọ kụrụ isi n'oge ọdịda ma nọrọ na coma
Mgbe ahụ, e bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Johannesburg
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Pretoria ma tinye ya na nlekọta dị elu n'abali iri nke ọnwa Julaị
Agbanyeghị, ọ nwụrụ n'abali asaa nke ọnwa ọgọstụ 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na otu na-enwetaghachighị mmụọ
E liri ya na ili ozu Block VV na Soshanguve na 14 August 2017
N'afọ 1998, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 Kelebone
Na 2000, o sonyeere SABC1 serial ụmụaka bu Soul Buddyz, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Beauty'
N'afọ 2002, ọ pụtara na usoro abụọ Yizo Yizo na Gaz'lam nke ọ weere obere ọrụ
Mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara n'akụkụ ụfọdụ dị ka 'Puleng' nke SABC1 soap opera Generations
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Canadian CBC serial Jozi-H na ọrụ 'Dumisani's First Wife'
Na 2008, o sonye na etv soap opera Rhythm City maka ọrụ 'Connie'
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gachara, ọ lara ezumike nká na ihe nkiri ahụ, mana ọ sonyehachi na ihe nkiri ahụ na 2014
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere SABC2 sitcom Ga Re Dumele ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke 'Esther Mamoruti Tlhong'
Ihe ngosi ahụ wuru ewu nke ukwuu ebe ọ gara n'ihu n'egosipụta agwa nke agba ise ruo 2016
Na 2015, o sonyeere na SABC2 drama serial Mamello ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka 'Mosumbuka'
Na 2015, o mere ihe nkiri n'ihe nkiri Hollywood blockbuster Duma nke Carroll Ballard duziri
Na fim ahụ, ọ na-egosipụta àgwà nkatọ dị ka 'Thandi'
Mary Maud Page (ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Septemba 1867 London rụo ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1925 Cape Town) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise botanical nke South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Nathaniel Page, ónyé bụbu onyé isi obodo Croydon
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise, mànà n'ihi na ányá na-adịghị mma, ọ gbanwere na nkuzi na ịkpụ osisi na ọla na enamels, wee bụrụ ọkachamara na ịkpụ ihe, ịkpa ákwà na ime lace
Ọ mụkwara Braille iji nyéré enyi ya kpuru ìsì aka
Mgbè nnà ya nwụrụ ma chee ọrịa ya ihu, ọ hapụrụ South Africa na July 1911
Ọ biri na Dealesville na Orange Free State na mbụ, mana n'oge na-adịghị ányá ọ kwagara Bloemfontein na 1912
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gàrà Palapye na Pretoria, wee gaa Rhodesia na Basutoland, laghachi na mbà nke ikpeazụ ọtụtụ ugboro
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka a mụrụ mmasị ya na botany, malite nchịkọta nke ụdị osisi ma nyéré enyi ya, Mrs Beaumont, aka ịmepụta herbarium màkà ụmụ Morija
Mgbe ọ na-eleta Cape Town na Jenụwarị 1915 ọ gosiri Louisa Bolus ihe osise okooko osisi ụfọdụ, ónyé àgwà ha masịrị ya, ma mee ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Bolus Herbarium, mmekọrịta nke dịgidere ruo ọnwụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-ekwu maka Aizoaceae, mana o gosikwara Iridaceae na orchid
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya pụtara na Flowering Plants of Africa ma jiri ya mee ihe n'akwụkwọ Hans Herre
Royal Horticultural Society bipụtara akwụkwọ ntuziaka banyéré ahịhịa nri nke o dèrè

Mary Maytham Kidd a mụrụ Mary Catherine Maytham (ubochí irí abụọ na ànó n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1914 rụọ úbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2001 East London, Cape Province), nwa nwanyị nke Albert Archibald Maytham, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ nà South Africa
A mụrụ yá nà East London, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Roedean School na Johannesburg n'etiti afọ 1927 na 1930 ma, n'etiti afọ 1931 na 1933, ọ gụrụ na Sorbonne na Paris
Ọ zụkwara na Royal Academy School na London site n'afọ 1936 ruo 1938
Kidd dere ma gosipụta 'Wild Flowers of the Cape Peninsula' (Cape Town 1950 - okwu mmalite nke J
Smuts), akwụkwọ abụọ gbasara fungus na-égbú ègbu na nke a na-eri eri nke South Africa nke Edith L
Stephens (Longmans, Cape Town 1953) ma gosipụta usoro akwụkwọ nta gbasara okooko osisi ọhịa echedoro màkà Ngalaba Nchekwa Okike nke Cape Province
Ọrụ ya nke 1950, 'Wild Flowers of the Cape Peninsula', ka e bipụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá dị ka 'WildFlowers of of the Table Mountain National Park', site na Botanical Society of South Africa
O mepụtakwara ihe osise màkà arịa, kaadị Krismas nà kalenda
Ebe ndebe ihe ochie nke Mahadum Cape Town nwetara akwụkwọ eserese ya, akwụkwọ diary na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ mgbè ọ nwụsịrị
Ha na-egosi na o mèrè njem ụgbọ mmiri na 1936 n'osimiri Danube wee gaa Nyasaland na Zomba Plateau na 1943
Ka oge na-aga n'afọ 1973/74, ọ nọrọ ógè ụfọdụ na Suffolk
Ọ lụrụ Hubert John Kidd (1896-1963), ónyé isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Diocesan College of Bishops na Rondebosch, n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Mee 1948
Ha kuchiri nwa, Charles James Anthony Kidd (1942-2005)
Mary nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2001 nà Maitland, Cape Town
Mary Mdziniso (1924 na 1 June 2000) bụ onye nkụzi Swazi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A họpụtara ya na Senate na 1968, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ na ndị omeiwụ mba ahụ
A mụrụ Mdziniso na B Costazi na Manzini District na 1924
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-amụ nwa ma nna ya (Efrom Dlamini) kpọọrọ ya gaa ozi ala ọzọ na Bethany na South Africa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, a kpọfere ya na ozi ala ọzọ na Mbuluzi, ebe Mary Peak Brown zụlitere ya, onye ọ natara aha mbụ ya
N'afọ 1929, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mbuluzi Girls' Skulu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1937, ọ gara Inanda Seminary School na Natal, ebe ọ zụrụ ịbụ onye nkuzi sayensị ụlọ
Mgbe afọ atọ nke ọzụzụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na Mbuluzi Girls' School wee malite ịkụzi ihe
N'oge ọ nọ na Inanda, ọ zutere Mdziniso, onye na-azụ ịbụ onye ụkọchukwu
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ na 1947
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Swazi National High School N'afọ 1965, ọ banyere n'ọrụ gọọmentị dị ka onye ọrụ sayensị na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo
O guzobere òtù ụmụ nwanyị Lutsango lwaka Ngwane afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1967 gasịrị, Eze Sobhuza nke Abụọ họpụtara Mdziniso ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ so na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke Senate, nọgidere bụrụ Senator ruo n'afọ 1998
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na bọọdụ nke Swazi Red Cross and Dairy Board, Mahadum Swaziland nyekwara ya nzere doctorate nke iwu
Ọ nwụrụ n'otu na ọnwa jụni 2000
Mary Mensah (amụrụ na 24 na onwa isii, na afọ 1963) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 1984 Summer Olympics
Mary Morison Webster (1894 – 1980) bu onye odee na onye ode akwukwo nke amuru na South Africa n'afọ 1920
O biri na Johannesburg, ebe ọ bụ onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ na-enwe mmetụta maka The Rand Daily Mail na Sunday Times ruo afọ iri anọ
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ise, gụnyere otu na mmekorita ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, onye edemede Elizabeth Charlotte Webster, na ọtụtụ nchịkọta uri
Mmiri ara ehi dị ụtọ na mmiri ara ehi site n'aka Nuruddin Farah akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-emepe site na epigram na-ehota site na uri Mary Webster
Mary Morrissey (amuru 1949) bu onye odee akwukwo n' America na onye na-akwado mmegide umu uwa
Ọ bụ onye odee nke building your field of dreams, nke na-agwa Morrissey mgba na nkuzi sitere na ndụ nwata ya
Ọ bụkwa onye odee nke No Less than Greatness, akwụkwọ gbasara mmekọrịta ọgwụgwọ
Na 2002 ọ chịkọtara ma dezie akwụkwọ New Thought A Practical Spirituality
Onye edemede America bụ Wayne Dyer kpọrọ ya 'one of the most thoughtful teachers of our time'
N'ịbụ onye na-arụ ọrụ site na mmalite ọrụ ya na ọrụ enyemaka mba ụwa, Morrissey kwadoro Association for Global New Thought na 1995 ma bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ ya
N'afọ 1997, o sonyeere nwa nwa Mahatma Gandhi, Arun Gandhi, n'ịhazi oge mba ụwa maka enweghị ike ime ihe ike
Dị ka nke Jenụwarị 2019, a na-eme ememe oge maka enweghị mmegide gburugburu ụwa dị ka ohere 'ịkpọkọta obodo ọnụ, na-enye ha ike iche echiche na nyere aka ịmepụta ụwa na-adịghị eme ihe ike'
N'akwụkwọ ya, Shadow Medicine The Placebo in Conventional and Alternative Therapies, John S
Haller na-adọ aka ná ntị na ụzọ ọzọ e si abịarute ọgwụ, dị ka nke Mary Morrissey na-enye, ekwesịghị ka e were dochie anya ọgwụ nkịtị
Sia Mary Musa (onye a mụrụ Kaingbanja, nwụrụ n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone na onye na-eme ihe ike si Koidu-Sefadu, Kono District
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo Koidu, na onye otu ndị mmegide Sierra Leone People's Party (SLPP)

Mary Musa biri ma rụọ ọrụ n'obodo ya bụ Koidu, isi obodo na obodo kachasị ukwuu nke mpaghara Kono nke nwere diamond na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Sierra Leone, na obodo nke anọ kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ
Ọ kụziri ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche n'ógbè ahụ, gụnyere Jaima Secondary School, Koidu Secondary School
Mgbe Agha Obodo Sierra Leone tiwapụrụ, Mary Musa gara mba ọzọ, laghachi Koidu mgbe agha ahụ gwụrụ
E bibiri akụkụ dị ukwuu nke akụrụngwa obodo ahụ mgbe ọ na-anọghị, gụnyere ụfọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe ọ kụziri, na nnukwu ọnwụ hapụrụ ọtụtụ ụmụ mgbei
Musa rụrụ ọrụ iji nye ụmụ ya na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ mgbei ndị a ebe obibi, na-eji brik sitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ iwu obere ụlọ
N'ịgbaso nduzi ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nkuzi ndị ọzọ nyere aka na usoro a
N'agbanyeghị mmegide dị ukwuu, n'ógbè ndị ikom na-achịkwa, Mary Musa gara n'ihu bụrụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo na onyeisi oche nke kansụl Koidu
Mgbe a họpụtara ya, ụlọ ọrụ USAID nke gọọmentị United States zụrụ ya na usoro ihe owuwu mba, yana ọzụzụ idu ndú
Mary Musa lụrụ Maazị SEK
Musa, onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị, tupu agha obodo amalite, mana mgbe ọ laghachiri n'obodo ahụ ọ chọpụtara na e gburu di ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya
Ya na di ya nwere ụmụ ise Sia Mary Sawyer, Kumba Edna Keili, Finda Eileen Mattia, Yei Gladys Musa, na Sahr Edward Musa, yana ọtụtụ ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ
Mary Nnenna Njoku (amakwaara ya dị ka Mary Remmy ma ọ bụ Mary Remmy Njoku, nke amụrụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na Machị n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Nigerian na eme ihe nkiri ma na-emeputakwa fim
Njoku bukwa onye isi na ụlọ fim, ROK Studios, ndi nke nwegoro mmeri na ihe banyere ọrụ ha (ime fim)
nke di na Lagos, Nigeria
Na oge na adịbeghị anya, otu nnukwu TV ndị French, amara dị kaCANAL zụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ rụpụtara ma sonye na ihe nkiri Thy Will be Done, Husbands of Lagos, Single Ladies na Festac Town
Mary Njoku, onye bụ nwa nke isii n’ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ asatọ, bụ onye amụrụ na Amuwo Odofin, Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwafọ Igbo onye Nsukka, Enugu State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Amuwo Odofin, National College Bagada na Navy Town Secondary School
Ọ nwere diploma di na sayensị nke cọmpụta
Site n'afọ 2010, Njoku gara na Mahadum Lagos State ebe o guru akwukwo wee nweta asambodo asusu Bekee
Na 2012, Njoku gara London Movie Academy na UK ebe ọ mere ihe ọmụmụ na akụkụ dị iche iche n'ime Mmepụta ihe nkiri
Site na nwata, o nwere mmasi ime ihe nkiri, ọwee bido ime ihe na onyonyo mgbe ọ no na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Njoku sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood na 2003, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Njoku pụtara na ihe nkiri ya mbu na fim Nollywood n’afọ 2004 nke akpọ ‘Home Sickness’ nke Chioma Chukwuka Akpotha so kwa na ya
Nwanyị a bịara bụrụ onye amara ama mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ nke Nollywood akpọrọ 'Blackberry Babes' n’afọ 2011
N’agbata afọ 2011 na 2013, Njoku wepụtara iROKtv, na ihe ntanetị nke YouTube nke na egosipụta ajụjụ ọnụ agbara ndị a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood na ihe egwu Afrobeats na Naijirịa
N’afọ 2015, Njoku ghọrọ Onye Ọkachasị Edemede na ụlọ ọrụ IROKO Partners
Ka ọ na-erule March, o mere ihe ngosi nke mbu n'ụwa niile maka ihe nkiri Thy Will Be Done na BFI IMAX London, ihe nkiri nke izizi Nollywood mbụ na IMAX
Na n’afọ 2018 na ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Njoku mepụtara ihe nkiri Nwanyioma, ebe ọrụ ya chọrọ ka ọ kpụchaa ntutu isi ya kpamkpam
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afọ 2013, Njoku hibere ROK Studios
Kemgbe o bidoro na 2013, ROK ewepụtala ihe nkiri kariri narị ise na iri anọ na ihe usoro TV iri abụọ na ise nke ọbụ ha malitere
Festac Town, Single Ladies , Body Language, Losing Control na Husbands of Lagos sokwa na ọrụ aka ha
N’afọ 2016, Njoku hiwere ROK na Sky , netwọkụ nke ana enweta na UK
Iji mee mmemme ahụ, ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ọrụ ibe ya Nollywood gara nnọkọ mmemme ahụ nke weere ọnọdụ na National High Commission na UK
N'otu afọ ahụ, Njoku hiwekwara ROK na DSTV, maka iji igwe teknụzụ na-efefe ọrụ ya na mpaghara Afrịka niile
Na ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2018, ROK Studios mepụtara ọwa ọhụrụ abụọ, ROK2 na ROK3 na DSTV, iji mezuo ọnụ ọgụgụ ebe ha egosiputa ọrụ ha maka agụụ nke ọtụtụ ndị mmadu na ihe ha na-eme

ROK2 na-ekesa ọdịnaya gosipụtara mmalite nke Nollywood, ebe ROK3 na-egosi ọtụtụ onyinye ndị Ghana, ma nwee atụmatụ ọwa egwu na mgbakwunye ihe nkiri na ihe usoro usoro nke bụ ihe ana eme awa iri abụọ na anọ anaghị akwụsị akwụsị
N’afọ 2019, Njoku lekọtara ka CANAL+ si were gota ROK, nkwekọrịta mba ụwa kachasị ukwuu maka akara Nollywood

N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2013, ya na Jason Njoku na Bastian Gotter, ndị ha na ya na-azụ ahịa, wepụtara nde dollars abụọ maka dị ka ego nkwado inyere ndị na mmalite ọrụ teknụzụ na ihe gbasara ntanetị na Legọs a na-akpọ Spark aka
Mary Njoku lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Naịjirịa ama ama na Britain, nke bụkwa onye na etinye ego na ihe mbido teknụzụ (start-up) na Africa, Jason Njoku
Ha gbara akwụkwọ na Festac, Lagos na ụbọchị iri na asatọ ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, n'ihu ezinụlọ, ndị enyi na ndị ọrụ ibe ha

Ha mụrụ nwa nwoke na mbụ, Jason Obinna Njoku, na ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2013, mụọ nwa nke abụọ Nwakaego Annabelle Njoku na ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2015, ha wee nabata nwa ha nke atọ, Amber Nnenna Njoku na ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017
Mary Nzimiro, nke aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Mary Nwametu Onumonu, (1898–1993) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nwaafọ Naịjirịa, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị

N’afọ 1948, a họpụtara ya dika onye nnọchi anya onye isi ụlọ ọrụ United Africa Company (UAC) maka mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa, ebe ọ na-edozigharị ebe a na-ere akwa na ihe ịchọ mma nke ya na Port Harcourt, Aba na Owerri
Ka ọ na-erule mbido 1950, o sooro na ndị kacha baa ọgaranya na West Afrika, bụrụ onye nanị ya bi na Bernard Carr Street na Port Harcourt
N'elu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ onye otu National Council of Nigeria na Cameroons, bụrụ onye otu kọmitii onye isi ya na 1957 na osote onye isi nke NCNC Estern Women Association na 1962
Oge a lụrụ agha obodo na Nigeria (1967–1970), ọ haziri ụmụnwaanyị Igbo ka ha kwadoo ndị Biafra
N’ihi nke a ihe niile o nwere lara n’iyi na Port Harcourt wee lawa n’obodo ya bụ Oguta ebe ọ nwụrụ n’afọ 1993
Mary Nwametu Onumonu, onye amụrụ na 16 Oktoba 1898 na Oguta, Imo Steeti, bụ ada onye isi ndị Igbo bụ Onumonu Uzoaru, onye isi na-achị obodo, yana nwunye ya bụ Ruth, onye na-azụ ahịa nkwụ
Onye mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Sacred Heart School na Oguta n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ Convent na Asaba, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1920
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ lụrụ Richard Nzimiro onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke UAC
Onye nne ya zụụrụ na azụum ahịa, mgbe ọrụ di ya kpọgara ha Illah, ọ na-ere nnu na mmanụ nkwụ nke ọ na-ere n'ahịa Nkwo na Eke
Mgbe ha kwagara Onitsha na Opobo, ha mechara biri na Port Harcourt n’etiti 1940s
Di ya hapụrụ ọrụ oche ya ka o nyere Mary Nzimiro aka n’ahịa ya
N’obodo mepere emepe, ọ na-azụ ahịa akwa, ntụ egbe na ntecha
N'ihi echiche azụmahịa ya na aha ọma ya maka ntụkwasị obi, ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ UAC, bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ maka mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Nigeria na 1948
N'ikike a, o resịrị ndị na-ere ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa nnukwu ngwaahịa na ngwongwo na Nigeria, Ghana na Sierra Leone
O mepekwara ụlọ ahịa na-ere akwa na nke ịchọ mma na Port Harcourt na obodo ndị agbata obi
Ndị nduzi UAC mere ndokwa ka ọ gaa ọtụtụ njem azụmahịa na London, Manchester na Glasgow
Na mgbakwunye, o mepere ebe mmanụ ụgbọala abụọ, otu n' Agip na Port Harcourt, nke ọzọ na Total na Lagos
Mary Nzimiro ghọrọ onye kacha baa ọgaranya na West Africa nwere ọtụtụ ala na ụlọ na Port Harcourt, gụnyere ụlọ nke nanị ya na Bernard Carr Street
O nyeere ụmụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ naefu ma nyere ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị aka ọrụ aka ha ịbanye azụmaahịa n'onwe ha

Ya na di ya, na 1945 o mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ na Oguta, nke o mechara kpọọ Priscilla Memorial Grammar School maka icheta nwa ya nwanyị Priscilla Nzimiro onye nwụrụ obere oge ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọgwụ na Mahadum Glasgow
Na 1966, na-eso ọnwụ nke di ya nwụrụ na 1959, oguzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụ nwanyị Nzimiro Memorial

N'ihe banyere ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ onye otu National Council of Nigeria na Cameroons nwere mmetụta, bụrụ onye otu kọmitii onye isi ya na 1957 na osote onye isi nke NCNC Eastern Women Association na 1962
Oge a lụrụ agha obodo na Nigeria (1967–1970), ọ haziri ụmụnwaanyị Igbo ka ha kwado ndị Biafra
N'ihi nke a ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe ya funahụrụ ya na Port Harcourt ma laghachi n'obodo ya bụ Oguta ebe ọ nwụrụ na 16 Jenụwarị 1993, gbara afọ 95
Mary Ukaego Odili (née Nzenwa ; CFR Onye amuru na 12 n'ime onwa Mee 1952) bu onye okaikpe Naijiria na nwunye Peter Odili, onye jere ozi dika Gọvanọ Rivers Steeti site n'aro 1999 rue 2007
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi okikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Nigeria (JSC) ma bụrụ onye isi ọkaikpe Katsina-Alu nyere ya iyi ọrụ na 23 na onwa June 2011

Tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi okikpe nke SCN, o nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ dị mkpa ọrụ, gụnyere Onyeikpe, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Rivers Steeti (1992-2004), ụlọ ikpe nke ukwu, ụlọ ikpe mkpehari, nkewa Abuja (2004-2010), na ulo ikpe ziri ezi, ụlọ ikpe mkpehari, nkewa Kaduna
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka nwunye mbụ nke Rivers steeti n'oge di ya bụ gọvanọ
Nkemdilim Onyali-Omagbemi (née Onyali, a mụrụ ya n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ ọsọ, ọ bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Olimpik ugboro ise n'afọ 1988 - 2004
O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 100 m relay na 1992 Olympic Games na 200 m na 1996 Olympic Games
O nwetakwara mmeri na 1994 Commonwealth Games 100 mita title
Onyali-Omagbemi rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma karịsịa na All-Africa Games, na-emeri ngụkọta nke ihe nrite asaa n'otu n'otu na sprints dị mkpirikpi
O meriri 100m na 1991, 1995 na 2003 wee nweta ọla nchara na 1987
E nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na 200m n'afọ 1987, 1995 na 2003
Ọzọkwa, ndị otu 4 × 100 m relay nke Naijiria meriri agbụrụ niile n'etiti 1987 na 2003, na African Games
Ndị na-egwu tenis table bụ Bose Kaffo na Segun Toriola nwekọrọ ihe omume a afọ anọ ka e mesịrị na Beijing, PR China
Mary Oyaya bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ Jedi Master Luminara Unduli na ihe nkiri American blockbuster, Star Wars Episode II - Attack of the Clones
A mụrụ ya na Mombasa, Kenya dịka nwa mbụ n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne anọ
O nwetara nzere masta ya na International Relations wee nweta nzere masta nke abụọ na International Social Development, ha abụọ site na Mahadum nke New South Wales
Mgbe ọ kwagara Australia, ọ nọgidere na-apụta na mgbasa ozi telivishọn na mgbasa ozi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na United Nations kemgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ na-arụkarị ọrụ na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Australia maka ọtụtụ NGO
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ọ gbasoro ọrụ ịme ihe ngosi
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ magazin ejiji dịka 'CAT' na 'S'
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi na Salvatore Ferragamo na Gucci sunglasses, Chanel na Jan Logan ọla na akpụkpọ ụkwụ na Sergio Rossi
Mary emeela ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka Telstra Communications, Hewlett Packard Bell, nakwa mgbasa ozi egwuregwu dị iche iche
N'afọ 1999, o mere ihe nkiri na SciFi network TV series, Farscape
N'oge a, ọ banyere n'ime ihe nkiri, dịka Lost Souls na Down and Under
N'afọ 2002, ọ pụtara dịka Jedi Master Luminara Unduli na ihe nkiri American blockbuster Star Wars Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Mary T
Quaile (8 Ọgọst 1886 - 16 Disemba 1958) bụ onye otu Oru ndị ahịa Irish
Amụrụ na Dublin, Quaile tolitere na Manchester, wee hapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
Na mbụ ọ bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ, n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ kwagara ịrụ ọrụ na kọfị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, Margaret Bondfield gara obodo ahụ iji hazie ndị ọrụ
N'ịbụ onye kpaliri, Quaile malitere ime ka ndị ọrụ nri nọ n'obodo ahụ sonye n'òtù ndị ọrụ
N'ihi ya, na 1911, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka Ọhazi nke Manchester Women's Trade Union Council (WTUC), emesịa bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nhazi ya

Na 1919, WTUC ghọrọ akụkụ nke Manchester Trades Council, Quaile wee bụrụ onye isi nwanyị mba nke Dock, Wharf, Riverside na General Labourers' Union, nke mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke Transport na general workers Union
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Trades Union Congress (TUC), ma jee ozi na General Council nke TUC site na 1923 ruo 1926
Site na 1923, Quaile bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ngalaba Ụmụ nwanyị Manchester Trades Council, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, ọ bụkwa onye na-echekwa ego nke kansụl
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Trades Union Congress (TUC), ma jee ozi na General Council nke TUC site na 1923 ruo 1926
Site na 1923, Quaile bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ngalaba Ụmụ nwanyị Manchester Trades Council, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, ọ bụkwa onye na-echekwa ego nke kansụl
a General workers Union
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Trades Union Congress (TUC), ma jee ozi na General Council nke TUC site na 1923 ruo 1926
Site na 1923, Quaile bụ odeakwụkwọ nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke Manchester Trades Council, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke kansụl ahụ
N'afọ 1925, Quaile duuru ndị nnọchi anya TUC ụmụ nwanyị na Soviet Union
A họpụtakwara ya na Kọmitii Ndụmọdụ Ụmụ nwanyị nke International Federation of Trade Unions
N'ihi enweghị ahụ ike, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ọkwa mba ya niile na 1933, mana ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu na 1934 ma jigide ọrụ kansụl trades ya n'ime ọchịchị 1950

Mary Sibande (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1982) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke bi na Johannesburg
Ihe osise ya nwere ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese, foto, na imewe
Sibande na-eji usoro na usoro ndị a enyere aka gosipụta ọdịdị mmadụ ma chọpụta owuwu nke njirimara na ọnọdụ South Africa
Na mgbakwunye, Sibande na-elekwasị anya n'iji ọrụ ya gosipụta ahụmịhe onwe ya site na Apartheid
Ihe osise ya na-anwa ịkatọ ihe ngosi nke ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị ojii
A mụrụ Sibande na Barberton na apartheid South Africa ma nne nne ya zụlitere ya
Nne ya bụ onye ọrụ ụlọ n'onwe ya, nna ya nọkwa na ndị agha South Africa
Ọ maghị nna ya mgbe ọ dị obere mana ọ matara ya ógè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
N'ihi na nne ya bụ onye ọrụ ụlọ, ọ na-asọpụrụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ na ọrụ nka ya
Ihe osise dị ka ndị sitere na ihe ngosi ya, 'Long Live the Dead Queen'
Sibande ga-akọwa nwata ya dị ka onye zuru oke; ọ na-ekwu na 'Enwere m ihe niile m chọrọ, agara m ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị mma nke nwere agbụrụ dị iche iche
Ụfọdụ ezinụlọ enweghị ike iziga ụmụ ha ebe ahụ mana enwere m obi ụtọ na nne m nwere ike
Echere m na nke ahụ kpalikwara m n'otu ụzọ
Sibande natara diplọma ya na Fine Arts na Technikon Witwatersrand n'afọ 2004
O nwetara nzere B-tech na Mahadum Johannesburg n'afọ 2007
Na mgbe mbu, Sibande chọrọ ịbụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na nka bụ ihe a na-eche ógè e mesịrị
Ọchịchọ ya nke ịbụ onye na-emepụta ejiji ka pụtara ìhè n'ọrụ ya niile
Ojiji nke ejiji na imewe agwụla ma gosipụta ya nke ọma n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya ọ bụla
N'afọ 2001, Sibande na nne ya kwagara Johannesburg ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Witwatersrand Technikon
Sibande ejirila ọrụ ya kpughee ụfọdụ ihe dị iche iche, site na postcolonial South Africa na echiche nke ụmụ nwanyị yana echiche banyere ụmụ nwanyị ojii na South Africa
Ọrụ ya nwere ọtụtụ ụdị ihe eji eme ihe dịka ihe ọkpụkpụ, foto, imewe, collage, na ọbụna ihe nkiri
Ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ Sibande na-eji ọdịdị mmadụ iji chọpụta ihe owuwu nke njirimara na ọnọdụ South Africa, mana ọ na-anwa ịkatọ ihe ngosi nke ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya South Africa na 45th 2011 Venice Biennale, a hụkwara ọrụ ya Long Live the Dead Queen na murals n'obodo Johannesburg niile n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2016, ọrụ ya bụ The Purple Shall Govern gara South Africa
Sibande ejirila ihe osise ya lekwasị anya n'inye ndị na-enweghị olu olu olu ha

Ụfọdụ ekwuola na ọrụ ya na-eche echiche nke nwanyị Afrịka na-enweghị ike ihu nakwa na ọrụ ya na-ezube imebi ụkpụrụ morse nke metụtara echiche ọdịda anyanwụ nke ịma mma na otú ha nwere ike isi rịọ ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Sibande kpebisiri ike ịbụ onye na-emepụta ejiji ma kwuo, sị, 'Enweghị ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ebe ngosi ihe ngosi nka n'obodo m tolitere; nke ahụ bụ ihe mba ọzọ nye m
' Sibande ejirila ihe ọmụma ya na ịhụnanya ya n'ihe banyere imewe tinye n'ọrụ ya
O lekwasịrị anya n'ụdị ejiji ya maka ihe gbasara uwe ọ bụla ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-eyi
N'ihe ngosi ya 'Mkparịta ụka ya na Madam CJ Walker', ihe ọmụma ya na nkà ya banyere ákwà na ejiji ejiji pụtara ìhè
A na-echekwa atụmatụ ya na ọrụ ejiji ya nke ọma
Uwe na agba Sibande họọrọ iji nwere ihe dị iche iche na mmetụta dị iche na ọrụ ya
N'isiokwu akwụkwọ akụkọ maka UNISA na Durban Art Gallery otu onye edemede aha ya bụ Carol Brown kwuru màkà ojiji nke ákwà na ọrụ Sibande

Ọ na-ekwu na 'Ụdị ákwà eji emepụta uwe maka ndị ọrụ ụlọ bụ ihe a na-ahụ anya ozugbo n'ime ụlọ na South Africa, site n'itinye ya na uwe Victorian ọ na-anwa ikwu okwu banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ịgba ohu na ọchịchị dị ka ọ metụtara ugbu a n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta ụlọ
Sibande ejirila foto weghara ma wuo ihe osise ya

N'afọ 2013, o nwere foto asaa sara mbara nke ọrụ ya gosipụtara n'okporo ámá nke ime obodo ndị France dịka Ivry-sur-Seine, Vitry-sur-Seine na Choisy-le-Roi Ọ bụghị naanị na ese foto na-ekere òkè dị ukwuu na nnukwu ihe ngosi ọha ya kamakwa n'ọrụ ya kwa ụbọchị
Sibande na-atụle otú a ga-esi na-ese foto ọrụ ya nke gosipụtara n'otú o si egosipụta ma hazie ọrụ ya na ntinye ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ya gụnyere ma ngosipụta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ya yana foto o sere nke ọrụ ya ma ọ bụ ntinye ya
Na mgbé mbụ, ọ na-eji ụrọ eme ntakịrị ihe osise na nke ahụ bụ ihe gbasara oke ọrụ nka n'oge ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, ọ ga-eji ụzọ nka; Otú ọ dị, Sibande na-ekwu, 'Enwere m ike ịlụ ụwa abụọ ahụ ugbu a - ejiji na nka dị mma adịghị anya n'ebe ibe ha nọ
' Ógè e mesịrị na nzụlite Sibande na ihe ọmụma na ihe ọkpụkpụ ghọrọ nke sara mbara
Site na ihe ngosi dị ka 'Long Live the Dead Queen Series' n'afọ 2013, mmadụ nwere ike ịhụ mmalite nke àgwà ya 'Sophie' bụ otu n'ime àgwà ya a maara nke ọma ma na-apụtaghachi na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Sophie, isi ihe dị na ọrụ ya niile bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ
A na-akpụzi Sophie dịka Sibande n'onwe ya ma dị ka alter-ego ya
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Sibande na-enweta ike site na ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ, n'oge apartheid na post-apartheid
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ, Sophie, na-anwa ịkatọ ogologo akụkọ mmegbu na South Africa, kpọmkwem banyere ụmụ nwanyị ojii na South Africa
A maara ọrụ Sibande nke ọma n'ihe banyere echiche ya ma ihe nkiri ya

N'isiokwu nke Leora Farber dere, onye edemede ahụ na-eme nyocha nke ụfọdụ nkatọ ndị ọzọ kwuru, 'Sibande's theatrical quotations of the language of dress and use of dramatic poses may be related to photograph representations of the Victorian female hysteric in various stages of a hysterical attack, in that they both evoke a sense of excess
' Ojiji Sibande nwere maka ihe gbasara itinye ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, na mgbakwunye na ihe ndị ọzọ niile nke ọrụ ya bụ iji mee ka onye na-ekiri ya nwee mmetụta
Sophie arụwo nnukwu ọrụ na ọrụ Sibande
Sophie dị ka e kwuru na mgbe mbụ bụ onye na-agbanwe onwe Sibande, ọ bụ onye ọrụ ụlọ nke na-achọta udo na ụzọ mgbapụ site na ịgba ohu site na nrọ nke ịtọhapụ onwe ya
Onye a nọ n'ime ụwa a na-eche n'echiche na nrọ ebe o mechara nweere onwe ya
A na-anakọta ndụ Sophie ma gosipụta ya site na usoro ihe ọkpụkpụ mmadụ, nke a kpụrụ na Sibande n'onwe ya
A na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbanwee uwe ọrụ Sophie ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu uwe Victorian nke ndị isi Europe
Itinye Sophie n'uwe Victorian na-ekwu màkà mmachi nke ụmụ nwanyị na nnukwu uwe ndị a, dị arọ ma sie ike
Uwe ya bụ ngagharị iwe megide ịbụ onye na-eje ozi, n'otu oge ahụ, ọ bụ ihu ya na-enye ohere ka echiche efu ya dị ndụ
Sophie na-ebido ịrụ ọrụ dị iche iche n'ọrụ Sibande na mgbakwunye na ịbụ ụdị mmadụ dị iche iche

N'ime ọrụ nke ọ bụla Sophie na-egosi mmadụ dị iche iche, otu bụ eze nwanyị Victoria, onye ọzọ bụ ọchịagha nke na-edu ndị agha niile na mmeri, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mara mma na-aga bọọlụ na ọbụna poopu n'otu oge
A na-egosi Sophie dị ka dike na onye jupụtara n'ike na nnọgidesi ike
Ọzọkwa, Sibande na-akpọrọ Sophie tinyé n'ihe ngosi dị iche iche n'ime afọ niile
O bu ụzọ gosipụta Sophie na ihe ngosi ya 'Long Live the Dead Queen' site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2013
'Long Live the Dead Queen' na-egosi Sophie dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-eje ozi nke na-eweghachite onye ọ na-achị achị
A kpọghachiri ya ọzọ na ọnọdụ dị iche na 'The Purple Shall Govern' na 2013–2017
Ihe ngosi a bụ mgbe Sibande kwere ka 'ọhụrụ' Sophie pụta ma gosipụta onwe ya
Ihe ngosi ahụ na-ewere ebe ntinye nke na-ewe ohere ahụ
Sophie na-apụta ọzọ na usoro Sibande kachasị ugbu a, “I Came Apart at the Seams’ nke na-ewere ọnọdụ site na 2019 ruo ugbu a
A na-egosipụtakwa Sophie na ihe ọkpụkpụ a na-akpọ Sophie / Elsie, nke Sibande kere iji sọpụrụ nne nne ya (onye ọrụ ụlọ nke ndị nna ya ukwu nyere ya 'Elsie' dị ka aha ọdịda anyanwụ)
A na-arụ ọrụ Sibande na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide ndị a
Ọ bụkwa onye Smithsonian Fellow na Washington DC, Ampersand Foundation Fellow na New York, na Fellowship na University of Michigan Fellowship
N'afọ 2018 rụọ 2019, Sibande bụ Prọfesọ Virginia C
Gildersleeve na Barnard College
Mary Mitchell Slessor (Ụbọchi nke abụọ Ọnwa iri na abụọ 1848 – ụbọchi iri na atọ Ọnwa nke mbụ 1915) Ọ bụ onye ala a n'akpọ Scotland ezitere igbasa oziọma n'ala Nigeria
Maka aka ọrụ ya na ngbasike ya mere ndi obodo ji nabata ma tụkwasa ya obi na oziọma ọ na agbasa, nchebe ụmụaka na nkwado ụmụnwanyi
Ihe eji mara ya bụ nkwụsi ogbụgbụ ejima na obodo a n'akpọ Efik na Nigeria
Mary Slessọr, a mụrụ ya na ụbọchi nke abụọ, Ọnwa iri na abụo na afọ 1848 na obodo a n'akpọ Gilcomston, Aberdeen, nọ na Scotland, na-ezin'ụlọ ndi ogbenye
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ asaa a mụrụ n'ụlọ Rọbeti na Mary Slessọ
Papa ya bụ onye obodo Buchan, aka ọrụ ya bụ Ọkwa akpu-ụkwụ
Na afọ 1859, ezin'ụlọ ya kwalara obodo Dundee ichọ ọrụ Robeti Slessọ bụ onye aṅuruma, nke a mere omeghi nke ọma na ikwa akpụ-ụkwụ, owe bido orụ a n'akpọ lebọra na nkụme igwe nri
Mama ya n'akpa akwa, ọ na eso kwa di ya na arụ ọrụ na nkụme igwe nri

Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na otu, Mary Slessọ bidoro oru ọ na arụ na oge nkeji abụọ na ebe nkụme igwe nri a n'akpọ 'Baxter Brothers' Mill' nke a pụtara na ọgacha ụlọ akwụkwọ ndi nwe 'Baxter Brothers' Mill' tinyere ya, ọge ya fọrọ nụ, ọ na eji ya arụ na nkụme igwe nri a

Mary Agnes Stainbank (afọ 1899 rụọ afọ 1996) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ Stainbank n'afọ 1899 n'ugbo Coedmore na Bellair, Durban
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St

Anne's Diocesan College na Hilton, KwaZulu-Natal Ọ zụrụ na Durban School of Art site n'afọ 1916 ruo afọ 1921 n'okpuru John Adams na Alfred Martin, na site na afọ 1922 rụọ afọ 1924 na Royal College of Art, London, n'okpuru William Rothenstein na Frederick John Wilcoxson
E nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ Royal College n'afọ 1925 ma mụọ ọla nchara na ụlọ ọrụ injinia na London
Ógè ọ laghachiri Saụt Afrịka n'afọ 1926, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ - Ezayo - na Coedmore estate ebe, n'agbata afọ 1926 na afọ 1940, ọ mepụtara ọrụ ya kachasị mma
Eric Gill na Jacob Epstein metụrụ ya n'ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akwanyere ya ùgwù n'ihe banyere iwebata ụlọ akwụkwọ ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ na South Africa n'oge mbido ọrụ ya, a na-akatọkarị ya maka iji ihe oyiyi avant-garde

Nhọrọ ya nke isiokwu Afrịka na iji ya mee ihe dị nkọ, ụdị akụkụ na mgbagha nke akụkụ aka iji gosipụta isiokwu ya wụrụ ndị na-ekiri ihe n'oge ahụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, bụ ndị na-eji ụdị ịhụnanya nke ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa
N'ihi ya, ihe ọkpụkpụ ya adịghị amasị ọha na eze na-azụ ahịa n'oge ahụ
E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya n'oge afọ 1930s na ihe ngosi nke Natal Society of Artists haziri
Ógè ọ rụchara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ eserese ndị agha n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi ngalaba ihe ọkpụkpụ na Durban School of Art, ebe ọ kụziri ihe ruo afọ 1957
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya ereghị, ọ gara n'ihu na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, nke e debere na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Coedmore
N'afọ ndị 1980, e gosipụtara nnukwu ọrụ ndị a na Old Parliament Buildings na Pietermartzburg
E mechara bufee nchịkọta a na Voortrekker / Msunduzi Museum na Pietermaritzburg
Site na nhazigharị nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ, e weghachiri ọrụ ahụ n'aka ezinụlọ Stainbank
A na-ele nchịkọta Stainbank anya dị ka ọrụ kachasị ukwuu nke otu onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nọgidere na-adịgide adịgide
A na-edebe nchịkọta ahụ na Mary Stainbank Memorial Gallery na Coedmore, ụlọ izizi nke ezinụlọ Stainbank, ebe ezinụlọ ahụ biri n'afọ 1880s
N'oge ọrụ ya, Stainbank mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise nke ndị bi na Coedmore estate yana ọrụ ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke ọ natara
Ndị a gụnyere ịchọ mma na ụlọ, na Durban, dị ka ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka na Addington Beach na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị dị na CBD

Ọtụtụ ihe ọkpụkpụ ya n'ihu ọha na Durban gụnyere ndị na-ere okooko osisi; ihe oyiyi ya na-atọ ụtọ n'ezie dị ka gargoyle na ụlọ ochie Receiver of Revenue; pediments na ceramik na ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka Addington ochie na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara nke John Ross guzo na Durban's Victoria Embankment
Ọ bụ Stainbank mere reredos na chọọchị All Saints Maidstone
O mere ihe nrite Springbok maka South African Polo Association
O mepụtara ihe ịchọ mma n'ihe banyere Port Elizabeth Magistrates' Court
